verse_text: Thɩ kɔ̃ ʋrɛraakɛ Jeju Kirisitikɛ dɔnɩ Davɩdɩɩ bi məl, Abɩrahamɩ məl thenɩ.
Abɩraham kɔɔ kɔna Ɩjkɩ dɩ Ɩjakɩ kɔ̃ Jakɔbɩ, dɩ Jakɔbɩ gba kɔ̃ Juda na ɔɔ õkuunsɔ;
dɩ Juda gba kɔ̃ Farɛsɩ na Jara khɛr ʋrɛraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Tamaar, dɩ Farɛsɩra kɔna Ɛsɩrɔm, dɩ Ɛsɩrɔm gba kɔ̃ Aram;
dɩ Aram kɔ̃ Amɩnadabɩ, dɩ Amɩnadabɩ gba kɔ̃ Nasɔ̃, dɩ Nasɔ̃ gba kɔ̃ Salmɔ̃;
dɩ Salmɔ̃ gba kɔ̃ Boajɩ khɛr ʋrɛraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Rahabɩ, dɩ Boajɩ gba kɔ̃ Obɛɛdɩ khɛr ʋrɛraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Ruti;
dɩ Obɛɛdɩ kɔ̃ Ɩjaɩ, dɩ Ɩjaɩ gba kɔ̃ Davɩdɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ fãgadaar. Dɩ Davɩdɩ gba kɔ̃ Salomɔ̃ khɛrraakɛ kɔɔ dɔnɩ Urii khɛr;
dɩ Salomɔ̃ gba kɔ̃ Roboam, dɩ Roboam gba kɔ̃ Abɩa, dɩ Abɩa gba kɔ̃ Aja;
dɩ Aja gba kɔ̃ Jojafatɩ, dɩ Jojafatɩ gba kɔ̃ Joram, sɩ Ojɩasɩ dor Joramɩ məl;
dɩ Ojɩasɩ gba kɔ̃ Joatam, dɩ Joatam gba kɔ̃ Akaajɩ, dɩ Akaajɩ gba kɔ̃ Ejekɩasɩ;
dɩ Ejekɩasɩ gba kɔ̃ Manase, dɩ Manase gba kɔ̃ Amɔ̃, dɩ Amɔ̃ gba kɔ̃ Jojɩasɩ;
dɩ Jojɩasɩ gba kɔ̃ Jekonɩasɩ na ɔɔ õkuunsɔ, bɔɔkɛ wɩ fʋlɛnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldara a jalna Babɩlɔn.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ fʋlɛnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldara a jalna Babɩlɔn pɩ, gɛr Jekonɩasɩ kɔɔ kʋɔn Salatɩɛl, dɩ Salatɩɛl gba kɔ̃ Jorobabɛl;
dɩ Jorobabɛl gba kɔ̃ Abiyudi, dɩ Abiyudi gba kɔ̃ Elɩakɩm, dɩ Elɩakɩm gba kɔ̃ Ajɔɔr;
dɩ Ajɔɔr gba kɔ̃ Sadɔkɩ, dɩ Sadɔkɩ gba kɔ̃ Akɩm, dɩ Akɩm gba kɔ̃ Eliyudi;
dɩ Eliyudi gba kɔ̃ Eleajaar, dɩ Eleajaar gba kɔ̃ Matã, dɩ Matã gba kɔ̃ Jakɔbɩ;
dɩ Jakɔbɩ gba kɔ̃ Jojɛfɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ Marɩɩ ko, Marɩɩkɛra kɔɔ kɔnanɩ Jejuukɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Kirisiti.

A fʋna Abɩrahamɩ bɔɔ a dana Davɩdɩɩ bɔɔ, thɩ kʋɔn yʋɔr yenã haanle fɛʋ; dɩ a fʋna Davɩdɩɩ bɔɔ a dana bɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ fʋlɛnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldara a jalna Babɩlɔn, thɩ kʋɔn yʋɔr yenã haanle, dɩ a fʋna bɔɔkɛ wɩ fʋlɛnɩ Ɩjɩryɛldara a jalna Babɩlɔn a dana Kirisitii bɔɔ, thɩ kʋɔn yʋɔr yenã haanle.
Hɩnɛ mɔ̃ gɩ kɔɔ danɩ sɩ dɩ wɩ kɔ̃ Jeju Kirisiti. Jojɛfɩ kɔɔ wɛna Jejuu nɩ Marɩ, sɩ wa kɔɔ dã kha pa', sɩ Thu Phuu cʋgɛɛ dɩ hana pɛmɛr.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ ɔɔ ko Jojɛfɩ dor tɩɩ sarʋ, aa ƴaal a kʋɛsʋʋ ire tibil jɔra ga, sɩ ɔɔ hara a kpɩɛr sa yɩ ɩna fagʋʋrɛ gbulu.

Dɩ hɩnɛ, mɔ̃ a hanɩ ga kpɩɛraalera, Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bɩɛl pʋɔraarɛ dəəlela a sʋʋraa: Jojɛfɩ, Davɩdɩɩ bikuun, fa-n do maar n fʋ fɩ afɩ khɛr Marɩɩ kpara ga, gɩdonɩ pɛmɛrɩlera a hananɩ Thu Phuu pa gɩ the.
Kũubir a na kɔ̃ dɩ fa dʋʋ ire Jeju, gɩdonɩ ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ na taanɩ ɔɔ too awɩ sopugosɔra.
Gɩrɛ fɛʋ daan, gɩ cʋʋ gɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ gbanɩ ɔɔ bobonɩ nɔ a mɩɩna gɩ ha oti, gɩ sor:
“Hɩnɛ, khɛ biireekɛ na jɛnɩ kuun pa', a na hananɛ pɛmɛr a na kɔ̃ kũubir, wɩ haa ire Emanʋɛl”, i kɩrʋ dʋɔn Thãgba har kha na sɛrɛ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jojɛfɩra jaanɩ, a cʋʋrɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thurə sʋʋraanɩ, dɩ a kpar ɔɔ khɛrra a kɔna,
sɩ aa-n phɩnaa ga, phaphapha dɩ kɔ̃ kũubirrə a haa irera Jeju.
Bɛtɩlɛhɛm Jude dɩɩra wɩ kɔɔ kɔ̃ Jeju, dɩ dabɔɔlera Ɛrɔɔdɩ kɔɔ do fãgadaar. Dɩ hɩnɛ, tɩɩ kpɛsɛsɔɔkɛ jɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛ ƴepələ̃berə kɔɔ ther kɩrrɔ a pɔ dã Jerujalɛm,
dɩ wa-n bule ayɩ: Juifisɔɔ fãgadaarɩkɛ wɩ kɔnɩ, kana a ha? Gɩdonɩ ɔɔ ƴepələ̃bi sɩ kɔɔ yɩ kɩrrɔ a ɩ̃ sɩ fʋɔrʋʋ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩ fãgadaar nɩɛnɩ gele, ɔɔ kpɩɛr nyanyaanɛ na wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanaanɩ kha le Jerujalɛm.
Dɩ a kpar bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna fɛʋ nakha tɩbɩlaa jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaarsɔ, a bule wi ka teananɩ wɩ kɔna Kirisitira.
Dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa: Bɛtɩlɛhɛm Jude dɩɩra gɩ, gɩdonɩ gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobon kɔɔ kherenɩ, gɩ sor ayɩ:
“Fɛr Bɛtɩlɛhɛmɩkɛ dɔnɩ Juda dɩɩ, sobɔr gɩ, fa do dɩɩkɛ 'lunoni a jɔ Juda dɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔa'. Gɩdonɩ afɩ pa kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ na thɔɔnɩ mɛr Thãgbaa tookɛ dɔnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldara na the.”
Le Ɛrɔɔdɩ wolõ a we tɩɩ kpɛsɛsɔ, a jɩɩ bule wi a jɩɩ jɩ bɔɔbɔɔ bɔɔkɛ ƴepələ̃bireelera phanɩ.
Agɩpɩ dɩ thɔ̃ wɩ Bɛtɩlɛhɛm dɩɩra ayɩ: Nɩ jala a jɩɛ 'lo bɩsaanɩdaalera; ado nɩ yɩɩ, nɩ dɔ ɩ̃ nɩɛ ɩ̃ jal dakha mer ɩ̃ fʋɔrʋʋ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ gelela fãgadaarɩle so warnɩ pɩ, wɩ jaal. Dɩ hɩnɛ, ƴepələ̃bireekɛ wɩ kɔɔ yɩnɩ kɩrrɔ, ɔr kʋlɛ wɩ ƴɩɛ a jal phaphapha a dã ka bɩsaanna hanɩ a jɩɩl ƴũ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩnɩ ƴepələ̃bireele, da kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ kɔɔ fʋ wɛr na sobɔr.

Dɩ wɩ pɔ dã a lõ cʋɔrɔɔlera a yɩ bɩsã buurə nakha ɔɔ nɩ Marɩ, dɩ wɩ gburõkure a fʋɔrʋʋ, sɩ agɩpɩ, wɩ thʋbɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ wɩ pɔnanɩ a haa khaardaa, dɛ gɩ na thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n hʋnanɩ daʋ, nakha thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hɔnɩ latɩkolo ni caar.
Sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ mɩɩna wɛr dəəlela wa-n bir jal Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ pa bã, dɩ wɩ bire gba hʋ kpɩɩ a kɔ̃ awɩ dʋɔ.

Ɔbɔɔkɛ tɩɩ kpɛsɛsɔ kɔnɩ pɩ, hɩnɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bɩɛl pɔr Jojɛfɩra dəəlela a sʋʋraa ayɩ: Ɩrɛ, gba biikɛra na ɔɔ nɩ, a fuo jala Ejipiti, a tɔɔ le gɩ dana bɔɔkɛ ma so farnɩ fɩ kɛr fɩ ɩ̃, gɩdonɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ n ƴaalɛ a kʋ biikɛra.
Dɩ Jojɛfɩ ɩɩr dɩtɩnɔna, a gba biile na ɔɔ nɩ a jal Ejipiti.
Dɩ le a too phaphapha Ɛrɔɔdɩ khinə, dɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛɛkɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ gbanɩ ɔɔ bobonɩ nɔ a mɩɩna dã otirə, gɩ sor: “Mɛr Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ wɛ ɩ̃ Bikuun dɩ the Ejipiti.”

Ɔbɔɔkɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩ yɩnɩ mɔ̃ kpɛsɛsɔɔle fɩɩlʋʋnɩ, nĩkhii fʋʋrɛ dɩɩ pho ka, dɩ hɩɩnɔ bɔɔkɛ tɩɩ kpɛsɛsɔ kɔɔ mɩɛnɩ, sa thɔ̃ Bɛtɩlɛhɛm dɩ bɩnɔ na Bɛtɩlɛhɛm dɩ khuirə fɛʋ, a kʋʋr bɩsã kuuminə fɛʋ phaphapha a jalna dana yɛna yenyɔdara.
Dɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobon Jeremɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ dã a ha oti, gɩ sor:
“Hulẽbe kɔɔ ther Rama, khɩsa na benɩɛ jɔɔ. Rasɛl gɩ da-n bɩ ɔɔ bɩsãsɔra. A bor ayɩ, ɩna faa haara', gɩdonɩ wa hale bã.”
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩ khini pɩ, hɩnɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bɩɛl bire pɔ Jojɛfɩra Ejipiti, a sʋʋraa dəəlela ayɩ:
Ɩrɛ, gba biikɛra na ɔɔ nɩ a kɛra birə Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩra, gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ n kɔɔ ƴaalɛnɩ bɩsã buukɛraa yʋ wɩ khiire.
Dɩ Jojɛfɩ ɩɩr a gba bɩsã buurə na ɔɔ nɩ a kɛr bir Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩra.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ dɩ wɩ yɩ Arkɛlayʋsɩ kɔɔ gbaan ɔɔ thɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ too pa a do fãgadaar Jude dɩɩra, maar fʋʋrɛ, aa 'la na lõ la', sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ mɩɩnaanɛ dəəlela, dɩ kɛr jal lõ Galile khʋra,
a pɔ too dɩ bɩɛllaakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Najarɛtɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobona kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ na dã oti, gɩ sor: “Wa-n wɩɩrɛ Najarɛtɩdaar.”
Ga bɔɔlera Jã Batɩsɩtɩ ɩɩr da-n mɩɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ Jude bəənnə da-n so ayɩ:
Nɩ deba haar, gɩdonɩ bɔɔ daan dɩ ƴũ Eãgadaar na-n gba fãga.
Jana dɔ ʋrɛ Ejaɩ Thãgbaa bobon kɔɔ sonɩ ayɩ: “Tibil wire gɩ dɩ ga-n hulẽ bəənnə ayɩ: Na-n gbɛbɩrɛ hʋɛ Kɔ̃tɩnna, na-n wɛbɩrɛ ɔɔ hʋ bisɔ gɩ pɔlɔ.”
Kɩ̃kɩɩnɩkɛ wɩ cʋʋnanɩ nyɔɔmɛɛ sũu Jana n kɔɔ to, dɩ khɩmɩna lo phɛrɛ pelela. Sɩ toosõo na thʋʋr n kɔɔ dɔ ɔɔ dɩko.
Dɩ Jerujalɛmdara na Judedara fɛʋ, na wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ thɛnɩ Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩr khʋra, n kɔɔ pɔr ɔɔ pa,
dɩ wɩ cã awɩ sopugosɔ, sɩ da-n kpɛɛ wɩ nyʋɔnɔ Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩrra.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ a yɩnɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala', dɩ wa-n pʋɔraa jɔɔjɔɔ a kpɛa wɩ nyʋɔnɔ, a so warɛ ayɩ: Nɛr sikori bisɔ, amɛ sɔ nar nɩ fuo Thãgbaa nĩkhirəəkɛ na ɩnanɩ?
Na-n sɛ beekɛ n nɛnanɩ anɩ ha debi.
Na-n too na kpɩɛr anɩ hara waa ayɩ, Abɩraham dʋɔn anɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tã', gɩdonɩ mɩ so narɛ dɩ bokanaakɛrakɛ Thãgba punone a cʋʋ gɩ dɩ gɩ debi a do bɩsana Abɩrahamna.
Dɩrakɛ kpãkpo 'lire leere thɩr nɛ kuur leere, dɩ thɩrʋ wo thɩrʋʋkɛ na-n sɛnɩ bi bʋɔa', wa kurre na dʋna dɔɔ.
Me wer nyʋɔnɔ mɩ-n kpɛɛ nɩ dɩ na debi haar, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na kpaanɛnɩ, a hananɛ fãga a jɔ mɩ, dɩ ma hɩɩrʋʋrakɛ a na julẽ ɔɔ nɛfaa ga. Ɔr, Thu Phuurə na dɔɔra a na kpɛɛ nɩ.
Dɩ jʋ jɛ nyɔ̃kpʋʋn hale dɩ fʋrɔ ɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ. A na jɛr jɔ a gba jʋ be a pɛ ɔɔ thʋ̃ bɩnɔ, sɩ a thii laagbee dɔɔraakɛ na dɔnɩ thɩ̃ khiirnənə'.
Ga bɔɔlera Jeju the Galile, a pɔ Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩrra Jãa pa a kpɛa nɩ nyʋɔnɔ.
Sɩ Jã kɔɔ bor sa so ayɩ: Mɛr ka teena fɩ kpɛa mɩ nyʋɔnɔ, sɩ dɩ fɩ ka ɩ̃ marɩ?
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Nɛnɛ̃ wer, sɛ gar gɩ ha mɛ̃. Gɩdonɩ gɩ teenanɛ dɩ sa cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ saranɩ. Dɩ Jã na kɔɔ banaa bã.
Dɩ dapaara ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kpɛɛnɩ Jeju nyʋɔnɔ dɩ na the, hɩnɛ thãgbara ƴũ phubire dɩ yɩ Thãgbaa Thu da-n gbũ a ho puusɩ̃ɛ a pɔ lʋʋnaa.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, nʋɔ ther le thãgbara ƴunə a so ayɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛ dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, a lõ mer haar kpɛ.
Agɩpɩ Thu Phuu thɔɔ Jeju a jalna bəənnə Satã n fifilənee.
A kɔɔ lire nʋɔ a cʋʋna wire kpalanyɔ na dɩtɩnɛ kpalanyɔ, agɩpɩ kɔmɛr fʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ fifilədaarɩlera tɔr dã a sʋʋraa ayɩ: Ado Thãgbaa Bikuun fɩ do, sɔ bokananaakɛ gɩ debi gɩ do dɩkor.
Sɩ dɩ Jeju birsee: Gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Ga do dɩkor dɩbara na hana tibil yirə', sɩ thɩmɩa fɛʋʋkɛ n thɛnɩ Thãgbaa nɔra gɩ.”
Agɩpɩ dɩ Satana bir kpaa a jalna dɩ phuurəəkɛ dɔnɩ Jerujalɛm, a jʋʋnna Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna ƴũ, sa sʋʋraa:
Ado Thãgbaa Bikuun fɩ do, ubo je thʋnɔ, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere ayɩ: “Thãgba na pɛrɛ ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ wɩ tɛ fɩ, a mɛ̃ gaa fa ber nɔɔ bokaarra.”
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Gɩ kherere dakha wo ayɩ: “Fa-n fifilə Kɔ̃tɩn afɩ Thãgba a hɩɩna'.”
Dɩ Satã kpaa wo a jalna jʋʋnna gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ gbaanɔnɩ dɩɩ ka, a nɩɩraa fãgadaar dɩɩsɔ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ thɩɩra na awɩ nyɔ̃kor bɔ,
sa sʋʋraa: Fɛr ma ha thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛra ado fa gburõkure na fʋɔr mɩ.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Hala jala pal Satã. Mee gɩ kherere ayɩ: “Kɔ̃tɩn afɩ Thãgba fa fʋɔr, dɩ ɔrra dɩbara fa doro thɔma.”
Agɩpɩ Satã sɩɩraa, dɩ hɩnɛ, Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ pɔr dɩ wa-n haa gɩrɛ n danaanɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju nɩɛnɩ dɩ wɩ fʋrɛ Jã a to khaɩra, a kɛrrɛ bir lõ Galile.
Mɛ̃ a the Najarɛtɩ dɩɩra a jal too Kapɛrnayʋm mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔra Jabʋlɔ̃ na Nɛfɩtalɩ bəənnə.
Gɩ do mɛ̃ gɩrɛ Ejaɩ Thãgbaa bobon sonɩ dã oti, gɩ sor:
“Jabʋlɔ̃ dɩɩ na Nɛfɩtalɩ dɩɩ, mɩɩr nɔ hʋɛ, kɛ hanɩ Jʋrdɛ̃ iiro, Galile ca kpala.
Tɩbɩlaakɛ hanɩ dabirəra, wɩ yɩrɛ dahɩrɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, na wɩrɛɛkɛ hanɩ khĩdi dɩ birəra, dahɩrɛ carã warɛ.”
A fʋna ga bɔɔlera Jeju ma da-n mɩɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ dɩ yɩ: Nɩ deba haar, gɩdonɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ bɔ daan.
Mɔ̃ Jeju n jalnɩ na Galile mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔ, a yɩrɛ õkona yenyɔ, Sɩmɔ̃ɔkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Pɩɛr gɩ, na Ãdire ɔɔ õkuun, dɩ wa-n dʋna thʋ̃ pherdaakɛ n hɔnɩ jɔ̃ lanyʋɔnɔ, gɩdonɩ thʋ̃ pherdara ha wɩ.
Dɩ a so warɛ: Na-n kpa mar, dɩ ma cʋʋ nɛr na-n ƴaal tɩbɩla thʋ̃ khaa.
Dɩ dapaara, wɩ faarɛ awɩ thʋ̃ pherdasɔ sɩ wa-n kpaaraa.
Dɩ bir tɔ na jal wo a yɩ wɩ̃ õkona yenyɔ, Jakɩ Jebedee bikuun, na Jã ɔɔ õkuun, dɩ wɩ ha kha na awɩ thɩ Jebede gboroona, dɩ wa-n gbɛbɩ awɩ thʋ̃ pherdasɔ.
Dɩ a we wer, dɩ dapaara wɩ faarɛ gborõo na awɩ thɩ sɩ dɩ wa-n kpaaraa.

Dɩ Jeju kɔɔ kpaarɛ Galile dɩɩra fɛʋ, da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔ, da-n mɩɩna tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ ƴũ fãgadaar doda, da-n kpɛɛna khoosɔ dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ, na tãdarasɔ dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ tɩbɩlaa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Dɩ ɔɔ i kpaarɛ Siri dɩɩra fɛʋ. Dɩ wɩ kpar wɩrɛɛkɛ kho caar dɩɩdɩɩ fʋnɩ dɩ wa-n gaar, na wɩrɛɛkɛ n 'wãganɛnɩ: Kpãkpũdara, na ji khidara, na gbãgbarasɔ a pɔnanaa dɩ a kpɛɛ wɛr.
Dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ ther Galile, na Dekapol, na Jerujalɛm, na Jude, na Jʋrdɛ̃ iiro dɩ wa-n kpaaraa.
Mɔ̃ Jeju yɩnɩ tibil jɔjʋɔɔle, a jʋʋnɛ gɔ̃gʋɔna ƴũ a too, dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara tɔr a wɔrɔ̃ɔ.
Agɩpɩ dɩ ma da-n dɩɩr wɩ thakɛ ayɩwɔɔ:
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ jɩɛnnɩ dɩ thu thɩ̃ɛ n ɓɔr wɛr, gɩdonɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ wɛr hɩna.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ n bɩɛnnɩ, gɩdonɩ Thãgba na cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wa faa haar.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ hɛlɛlɛ fɩldara, gɩdonɩ wɛr na hɩna thɩɩkɛ.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ n gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛnɩ gɩrɛ saranɩɩ cʋʋra, gɩdonɩ Thãgba na cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wa 'li dɩbara.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ n dɔnanɩ tɩbɩla bʋɔ, gɩdonɩ wɛr Thãgba na dona bʋɔ.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ hananɩ ha phuu, gɩdonɩ wɛr na yɛ Thãgba.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ n cʋɛnɩ ha ɩɩ dɩ ga-n hale, gɩdonɩ wɛr wa-n we Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔ.
Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ wɩ-n kpooronɩ dɩɩ do fɩl sarʋ dɔ nɔɔ, gɩdonɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ wɛr hɩna.
Gɩ da nar ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n nɩɩr nɩnɩ dɩ wa-n kpoona nar, dɩ wa-n kʋɛna anɩ isɔ na sõso bɩɩ, dɩɩ do mɛr dɔ nɔɔ, gɩdonɩ mɛ̃ wɩ kɔɔ kpoo Thãgbaa bobonasɔraakɛ kɔɔ kʋlɛ nɩnɩ ƴɩɛ.
Nɩ dɔ daʋ na-n fʋ nɩ na-n kãka, gɩdonɩ anɩ khaardaakɛ na 'lɛnɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, ga kɔ̃tɩnɛ.
Nɛr dʋɔn laan thɩɩra, sɩ ado laan bir dasɩ a mɩla bã, mɔ̃ wa fʋ sɩ na cʋʋ gɩ dɩ ga bir na hana mɩlalɛ? Ga dor ga bɔr bã, khuirə wa dʋna na faa mɛ̃, dɩ tɩbɩla na-n saar na nɛɛ.
Nɛr dʋɔn dahɩrɛ tɩbɩlala fɛʋ thɩɩra. Dɩɩkɛ wɩ thenɩ gɔ̃gʋɔna na puno na kera'.
Dɩ wa-n pɛ dɔɔ lãphana a suuro bɩlãkpʋʋnna', sɩ bilela wɩ-n dɛ̃ɛ dɩɩ hɩrɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩle cɔ bɩnɔ.
Nɩ dɔ anɩ dahɩrɛ na-n hɩrɛ tɩbɩlaa ƴɛra thale, wɩ puno wa-n yɩ anɩ thɔ̃ bɔsɔ, wa-n dʋbɩ anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũu i.
Na-n kpɩɛr waa mɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ kʋkʋʋl Thãgbaa jɔfʋa', dɩ Thãgbaa bobonaa so ga. Ma ɩ̃ ɩ̃ kʋkʋʋl ga, sɩ ɩ̃ ka ɩ̃ cʋʋ gɩrɛ fɛʋ jɔfʋ n ƴaalnɩ ga-n cʋɛ.
Gɩdonɩ sobɔr mɩ so nar, a fʋna bɔɔkɛ ƴũ na thɩɩ hanɩle na jalna na pɩna, dɩkhaa thɩ̃ bu fɩɩʋ na halerakɛ jɔfʋra gɩ do gɩ kʋkʋʋla', foo thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ n cʋʋ gɩ dã oti.

Dɩ gɛr gɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na kʋɛanɩ jɔfʋsɔɔkɛ bɩɛl, a jɔfʋ buu gɩrakɛ fɩɩʋ dɩ ntɛ kʋɛ, sɩ da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla wa-n cʋɛ ɔmɛ̃, ɔr wa we dabuu ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n hɩnɛ gɩnɩ sɩ da-n dɩɩrna tɩbɩla wa-n cʋɛ ɔmɛ̃, ntɛɛle wa-n we kɔ̃tɩn ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra.
Gɩdonɩ mɩ so narɛ, ado anɩ fɩl sar na ba jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔɔda ga, na lõ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra yuuraka'.
Nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ mɔ̃ wɩ kɔɔ sonɩ mamadarara ayɩ: “Fa-n kʋ tibilə'.” Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kɔnɩ tibil, a na 'lɛr kɩɩlɛ.

Sɩ me wer mɩ so narɛ gɩrɛ: Tibil wo tibilikɛ nĩkhi haar, kɛ na fʋnɩnakɛ ɔɔ omina, a na 'lɛr kɩɩlɛ. Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na nɩrɛnɩ ɔɔ omi, gɩ daan dɩ wa kɩɩlnaa Juifi so gʋʋrdaraa ƴɛra, dɩ ʋrɛ na sɔnɩ ɔɔ omina nayɩ, də̃bəl haa, gɩ daan dɩ ntɛɛle na jal bu paar dɔɔra.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ ado fɩ-n 'laarɛ khaardaa Thãgba fʋɔr paar dɩɩ do le fɩ jɩnanɛ afɩ omi hananɛ sor na fɛrɛ,
faa le afɩ khaarda Thãgba fʋɔr paar sa jala nɩ gʋʋr kha sor na afɩ omi ɓo gɩ pɩ, sɩ fɩ bir fɩ jal fɩ 'laa afɩ khaarda dɩphã.

Nɩ kuune kha kɔrɔ na afɩ sodaar, bɔɔkɛ nɩ hanɩ kha hʋɛra dɩ na-n jal. Agado mɛ̃ gaa, afɩ sodaar na gba fɛr na ha so kɩɩldaar, dɩ so kɩɩldaar na gba fɩ dakha na ha gardɩ, dɩ gardɩ na gba fɩ na to khaɩra.
Sobɔr mɩ so far, fa the liir kpɩɩraka', phaphapha fɩ lɩmɩ afɩ mũsũ koo fɩ pɩ.
Nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ dɩ wɩ so ayɩ: “Fa-n ƴaal khɛ kpɩa', fa-n ƴaal kuun kpɩa'.”
Sɩ me wer mɩ so narɛ gɩrɛ: Tibil wo tibilikɛ n hɩnɛnɩ khɛr ƴaƴaal hɩɩnʋ, gɩ dor a ƴaalɛ khɛrɩle le ɔɔ hara a pɩ.
Ado afɩ nyɔ̃bɔ yi do far baradaa, te dɔna faa ƴɔɔ, gɩdonɩ ga ba farɛ ado afɩ tomɩ ɓã bɩɛl bu, gɩ baar gɩrɛ wa gbanɩ afɩ tomɩ koo na dʋna bu paar dɔɔra.
Ado afɩ nyɔ̃bɔ nyɔ̃ do farɛ baradaa, kuro dɔna faa ƴɔɔ, gɩdonɩ ga ba farɛ ado afɩ tomɩ ɓã bɩɛl bu, gɩ baar gɩrɛ wa gbanɩ afɩ tomɩ koo na dʋna bu paar dɔɔra.
Gɩ kɔɔ sor dakha ayɩ: “Ado ntɛ na faa ɔɔ khɛr a hanaa he kuur sɛbɛ.”

Sɩ me wer mɩ so narɛ: Tibil wo tibilikɛ na faanɩ ɔɔ khɛr, sɩ agado kũu kpɩɩ ƴaalɛ dɔ nɔa', gɩ nɩnanɛ a cʋgʋʋrɛ dɩ debi do kũu kpɩɩ ƴaaldaar, dɩ tibilikɛ na hɛnɩ khɛrɩkɛ wɩ faanɩ, khɛ ƴaal kpɩɩ sopugo a cʋʋ.
Nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ dɩ wɩ kɔɔ so wo mamadarara ayɩ: “Fa-n ʋlfɛ sõso ʋlfɛra', sɩ cʋɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ fɩ kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanɩ Kɔ̃tɩn.”
Sɩ me wer mɩ so narɛ: Na-n ʋlfɛ kpɩɩraka', dɩ na-n ʋlfɛrakɛ na Thãgbaa dʋɔa', gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa fãga too pa gɩ.
Na-n ʋlfɛ na thɩa', gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa nɛ jəəda gɩ, na-n ʋlfɛ na Jerujalɛm dɩa', gɩdonɩ Fãgadaar kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ dɩ gɩ.
Fa-n ʋlfɛ na afɩ yʋa', gɩdonɩ fa punonakɛ na cʋʋ afɩ yʋsũ bɩɛllakɛ dɩ ga bulolo, agɩbo gɩ biiroə'.
Ado nɩ so thɩ̃ɛ ayɩ, ɔɔ, nɩ dɔ gɩ do ɔɔra; anɩ ooho n do oohora, gɩrɛ na hanɩle na ɓaan, ga dor puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarɩ pa gɩ the dɩphã mɛ̃.
Nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ dɩ wɩ kɔɔ so ayɩ: “A tibil kʋɛ tibil yire, wɩ kʋɛaa yire dakha. A nyɩnɛ a khaa, wɩ khaa nyɩnɛ dakha.”
Sɩ me wer mɩ so narɛ: Na-n kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ kha na tɩɩ puə'. A tibil ka ɓa fɩ nyɔ̃bɔ gbʋaa, birə fe gbʋa kpɩɩ pɩɛraa wo.
A tibil ƴaal ɩnɩ-n wɛ fɩ kɩɩl paar a gba fɩ kẽkẽ gburo, birə gba afɩ darã a ɓananaa.
A tibil tɔ fɩ na fãga pɛr nɩ jala kha gɩ dã kilə bɩɛl, tɔ kilə bɩɛl pɩɛr gɩ ha yenyɔ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ n bɩɛlnɛ farnɩ thɩ̃ɛ hanaa, fa-n tɔ̃ ʋrɛɛkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ a pemi far thɩ̃a'.
Nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ dɩ wɩ kɔɔ so ayɩ: “Fa-n na afɩ 'walãkha tibil,” sɩ na laarɛ afɩ lãlaardaar.
Sɩ me wer mɩ so narɛ: Na-n na anɩ lãlaardara, na-n bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba na pɛ wɩrɛraakɛ n kpoa narnɩ.
Thale na do bɩsana anɩ Thɩraakɛ hanɩle ƴũ, gɩdonɩ a-n cʋʋrɛ ɔɔ wi dɩɩ phã tɩɩ puusɔra na tɩɩ bɔɩsɔra, dɩ cʋʋ dakha nyʋɔn dɩ ga-n dã tɩɩ sarasɔra na wɩrɛra na sarana'.
Gɩdonɩ ado nɩ-n nar wɩrɛɛkɛ n naan nɩnɩ, anyee khaarda na 'lɛ? Ga do thalera war gbadara n cʋʋ dakha gaa?
Dɩ ado anɩ omi ha nɩ-n fʋɔr dɩbara, anye nɩ cʋʋ dɩɩ tiro a ha kpɩɩ? Ga do thalera wɩrɛ na jɛnɩ Thãgba ga n cʋʋ dakha gaa?
Gɛr gɩ nɛrɛ nɩ bʋɔnɔ a ka, mɔ̃kɛ anɩ Thɩ le ƴũ bɔrnɩ a ka.
Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ na-n nɩna anɩ bɔ cʋʋ tɩbɩlala wa-n yɛ ga, a gɩ ha mɛ̃ na 'lɛ khaardaa anɩ Thɩraakɛ hanɩle ƴũ fɩɩʋraka'.

Gɛr gɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ fɩ-n hanɩ bɔdara thɩ̃ɛ, fa-n do wɩ ʋ̃ tutuu afɩ ƴɛra, mɔ̃kɛ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara n cʋʋnɩ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔa', na ƴatɔɔ tɩbɩla n yɛ wɩ a na khɩa wa'. Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wɩ 'lɛr awɩ khaarda thalera pɩ.
Sɩ fɛrɛ̃, ado fɩ-n har bɔdara thɩ̃ɛ, fa-n dorakɛ afɩ nyɔ̃bɩlã n jɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ afɩ nyɔ̃bɔ n cʋʋna';
gɩ do mɛ̃ afɩ thɩ̃ 'laa na wolone, dɩ afɩ Thɩɩkɛra yɛ gɩnɩ wolonena ɔr na ka fɩ.

Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba, na-n ho bɩnɛ yenyɔdaraakɛ n naannɩ ɩnɩ-n jɩlɛ na bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔ na hʋ nʋɔrasɔ tɩbɩla na-n yɛ na'. Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wɩ 'lɛr awɩ khaarda thalera pɩ.
Sɩ fɛrɛ, ɔbɔɔkɛ fɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba, lona afɩ du bɩnɔ a khaanɛ loo, sa bɩɛlnɛ afɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ ka keranɩ; dɩ afɩ Thɩɩkɛra n yɛnɩ gɩrɛ keranɩ, ɔr na ka fɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba, na-n ther thɩmɩa pɛrɛ pɛrɛ a na pɛra', mɔ̃kɛ thɩldara n cʋʋna', gɩdonɩ wɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ jɔ mɩɩrɛ na dɔ nɔɔ, dɩ Thãgba na tu awɩ bɩɛl.
Na-n ho waa koe, gɩdonɩ anɩ Thɩ jɩrɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ n ɓɔra nɩnɩ, sɩ dɩ na kɔɔ bɩɛlɛɛ pa'.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ nɩ bɩɛlnɛ thakɛ: Asɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũ, dɔ afɩ i n dʋbɩrɔ;
dɔ afɩ fãgadaar do n ɩ̃; dɔ afɩ tuur na-n cʋʋ kɛ thɩɩra, mɔ̃ gɩ-n cʋʋɩɩɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ.
Hana sɩ nĩ dɩkorɩkɛ na dana sɩnɩ.
Faa asɩ puukɛ sɩ-n cʋʋnɩ na hana sɩ mɔ̃ sɛrɛ dakha n faanɩ ɩkhasɔɔ puukɛ wɩ-n cʋʋ sarnɩ dɩ sa-n ha wɩ.
Fa-n faa sɩ fifiləle n puno sa', sɩ na taa sɩ puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ. [Gɩdonɩ fɛr hɩna nũfiire, na punone, na i dʋbɩrɛ bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr. Amɛn.]
Dɩ ado nɩ-n faarɛ sopugookɛ tɩbɩla n cʋʋ narnɩ dɩ na-n ha wɩ, anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ ƴũ a na faarɛ anɩ sopugo dakha a na-n ha nɩ.
Sɩ ado na-n faa sopugookɛ tɩbɩla n cʋʋ narna', anɩ Thɩ na faa dakha anɩ sopugo na ha na'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ-n lin nʋɔ, na-n ho bɩnɛ yenyɔdaraakɛ n lenɩ sɩ dɩ wa-n kpaar na gbobira', gɩdonɩ wɩ-n lire ƴɩɛ dɩ wa-n nɩna tɩbɩla wɩ jɛ nʋɔ ɩnɩ li. Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wɩ 'lɛr awɩ khaarda thalera pɩ.
Sɩ fɛrɛ, ɔbɔɔkɛ fɩ-n lini nʋɔ, hulo ƴɩƴ, a bʋlana niin yʋʋ;
dɩ mɛ̃ fa nɩ̃na tɩbɩla wɩ jɩ nʋɔ fɩ lə', sɩ afɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ ka keranɩ ɔr fa nɩna, dɩ afɩ Thɩɩkɛra n yɛnɩ dakha gɩrɛ keranɩ, ɔr na ka fɩ.
Na-n khɩɩ lẽle thɩ̃ɛ a thɩɩn kɛ thɩɩra, ka ɔphãkerẽsɔ na dʋʋn na kʋɛ gɩna', na ka yo na cɩnɩ na cu sɩ na lõ na yuə'.
Sɩ na-n khɩa lẽle thɩ̃ɛ a na thɩnɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, kãkɛ ɔphãkerẽsɔ na dʋʋn na kʋɛ gɩna', dɩ yo wɛ a na cɩ na cu sɩ na lõ na yuə'.
Gɩdonɩ kãkɛ afɩ lẽle thɩ̃sɔ hanɩ, le afɩ ha na ha dakha.
Yire dʋɔn lãphã tormrra. Ado afɩ yi bɔr, afɩ tomɩ fɛʋ dahɩrɛra ga ha.
Sɩ adõ afɩ yi na bɔra', afɩ tõmɩ fɛʋ na har dabɩrəra. Sɩ ado dahɩrɛɛkɛ fɩ hananɩ afɩ bɩnɔ birəre, ga dor dabirəra na kɔtɩnɛ na ka.
Tibil bɩɛllakɛ na puno na do thɔma kɔ̃tɩna yenyɔra ga, foo a na laarɛ bɩɛl sɩ a na na bɩɛl, agɩbo a na mar kha an bɩɛl sɩ a hɛbɩ bɩɛl. Na puno na do thɔma Thãgbara nakha lẽle thɩ̃a'.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so nar: Na-n too na dɛna anɩ yi gɩrɛraakɛ na khonɩ na-n yɔna ga, dɩ anɩ tomɩda gɩ gɩrɛraakɛ na tona'. Yire na ba dɩkoraa? Dɩ tomɩr na ba kɩ̃kɩɩnaa?
Nɩ hɩnɛ mɔ̃kɛ 'lominə jɩɛra hanɩ. Wa-n diirə', wa-n kha ga, wa-n hana thɩ̃ɛ a ur thʋnɛna ga, sɩ anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ ƴũ, ɔr n haanɛ wɩ. Anɩ the nɔ ga khɩɩr a jɔ wɛr fĩiəə?
Ʋmɔ̃ɔ tibil nɛrɛra dɛr na do nɔɔ da puno na dɛɛnɔ ɔɔ yɛ nɔ?
Dɩ mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n dɛ kẽkẽ thɩmɩɩrra? Na-n kpɩɛrna naporsɔ hʋɔnɔ wo na hɩnɛ mɔ̃ wɩ-n phuni. Wa-n do thɔma ga, wa-n kpar kẽkẽ wiirə'.
Sɩ mɩ so narɛ Salomɔ̃ɔ thɛthɛrakɛ, kɛ dɔnɩ fãgadaar, na ɔɔ nyɔ̃kor bɔ fɛʋ na kɔɔ to kɩ̃kɩɩn dɩɩ hona wɛr bɩɛllaka'.
Dɩ ado Thãgba na to hʋɔnɩkɛ hanɩle hʋɔnɔ nĩ dɩɩ ha thaa, sɩɩ do cʋɔ wa to garɛ dɔɔ, a na ka na cʋʋ mɛ̃ dakha nɛrɛraakɛ kanɩ hana ha pɛrɛ gbəə?
Dɩ gɛr gɩ na-n ha na dɛ a na so: Anye sa kho yaa, na anye sa yɔ yaa, agɩbo anye sa gba na to yaa ga.
Gɩdonɩ gelesɔ fɛʋ wɩrɛ na jɛnɩ Thãgba ga n ƴaalɛ gɩ. Sɩ anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũ, a jɩrɛ gɩrɛ n ɓɔra nɩnɩ.
Sɩ caca thɩ̃ɛ nɩ ka na ƴaalɛ ɓo Thãgbaa fãgadaar do na ɔɔ fɩl sar, sɩ gelesɔɔlerarakɛ fɛʋ Thãgba na ha nɛr a na ɓaan.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ na-n ha na dɛna cʋɔdaa ga, gɩdonɩ cʋɔɔ thɛthɛrakɛ n dɛnanɛ ɔɔbara. Na-n bãbanɛ na nĩkɛɛ nɩ, gɩ daan.
Na-n fi do kɩɩldara ga, dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba na do nar Kɩɩldaara'. Mɔ̃ nɩ fi nɩ do kɩɩldara, mɛ̃ Thãgba na do nar Kɩɩldaar.
Gɩdonɩ mɩɛda ca ʋrɛ nɩ-n kɔɔ mɩɛnanɩ thɩ̃ɛ, ɔr wa mɩɛna na ha nɩ.
Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fɩ ka gar yire hɔ̃ phɩɩnaakɛ hanɩ afɩ omii yiro, sɩ fa-n ka dɩ fɩ hɩɩn kparrɛɛkɛ hanɩ afɩ yiroə?
Wo mɔ̃ fa fʋ sɩ na so afɩ omina nayɩ: Jɩlɛ ɩ̃ ti hɔ̃ phɩ̃ɩkɛ ha fɩnɩ yiro, sɩɩ dorakɛ kparrɛ hale afɩ yiro?
Fɛr bɩnɛ yenyɔdaar, te kparrɛɛkɛ hanɩ afɩ yiro ɓo, le fa jɩɩ yɩ hɔ̃ phɩ̃ɩkɛ hanɩ afɩ omii yiro dɩphã a na ti.
Na-n gba Thãgbaa thɩ̃ a na ha bena ga, anaa wa kɛrna fɛr a na cɛcɛbɛ fɩ. Na-n gba dakha anɩ dɛ thɩ̃ a na dʋna sɩthɔra ga, anaa wa bɩɩrnanɛ thɩɩ.
Na-n bɩɛlnɛ na 'lɛr, na-n ƴaalɛ na yɩɛrɛ, na-n bɛ loo wa khɛr nɛr.
Gɩdonɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ n bɩɛlnɛnɩ a-n 'lɛr, dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ a-n yɩɛrɛ, dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n bɛnɩ loo wa khɛrʋʋrɛ.
Ʋmɔ̃ɔ tibil anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn ɔɔ bi na bɩɛllɔ buru dɩ na haa bokaar?
A thʋm a bɩɛl a haa sii?
Ado nɛrɛɛkɛ dʋɔnnɩ tɩɩ puusɔ jɩ thɩ̃ bʋɔ a na ha anɩ bisɔ, mɔ̃ ga thʋ̃ na da anɩ Thɩraakɛ hanɩle ƴũ na pɔna, a na gba thɩ̃ bʋɔ na ha wɩrɛɛkɛ n bɩɛlnɛnaa?
Thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ nɩ-n ƴaalnɩ tɩbɩla na-n cʋɛ nar, nɛrɛ dakha na-n cʋɛ ga thɩ̃ ca wɛrra, gɩdonɩ gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Mʋɩjɩɩ jɔfʋ na Thãgbaa bobonaa so sonɩ.
Na-n lona na lõfonʋɔɔkɛ 'luruneni fɩɩʋ, gɩdonɩ lõfonɔ pɩɛ hə̃ə na hʋ pɩɛ hə̃ə dʋɔn gɩrɛ n jalananɩ bu paar, dɩ wɩrɛ kɛ harɔnɩ wɩ jɔrɛ ka.
Sɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ yɛnɩ lõfonʋɔɔkɛ 'luruneni ka, na hʋɛɛkɛ hanɩ ɓɩnɩnɩnɩ kɛ n jalanɩ yire khorra, wa kpɛra'.
Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ sõso bobonasɔra, wɩ-n debire a ho banaasɔ a na pɔ anɩ pa, sɩ awɩ bɩnɔ kpe wɛ, kɛ n phʋnɛnɩ.
Sɩ awɩ biikɛ wɩ-n senɩ na jɩna wɩ. Fa khʋnɛ ɓãɓar be ʋsɩɛra ya? Dɩ fa yɛɛrɛ bara dakha pabɩrʋra ya?
Thale gɩ, thɩrʋ wo thɩrʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ thɩr bʋɔ, bi bɔɩra a-n se, dɩ thɩr puu na-n se bi puu oti.
Thɩr bʋɔ na puno na se bi puə', dɩ thɩr puu na puno na se bi bʋɔ dakha ga.
Dɩ thɩrʋ wo thɩrʋʋkɛ na-n sɛnɩ bi bʋɔa', wa kurre na dʋna dɔɔra.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ awɩ birəəkɛ wɩ-n senɩ na jɩ wɩ.
Ga do wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n wɛ mɩnɩ Kɔ̃tɩn, Kɔ̃tɩn, na lona ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra ga, sɩ ʋrɛ dɩbara n cʋɛnɩ ɩ̃ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũu tuur.

Tibil jɔjʋɔ na so marɛ dawiile nayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, Kɔ̃tɩn, ga do afɩ i sɩ kɔɔ gba dɩ sa-n tinə Thãgba tukɩrʋaa? Ga do afɩ i sɩ kɔɔ gba a weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔaa? Ga do afɩ i sɩ kɔɔ gba a cʋʋna nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ jɔjʋɔaa?
Liir ma so war casɩ nayɩ: Ma kɔɔ jɩ nɩnakɛ kpɩɩa', nɩ hala sa sɛ mɩ nɛrkɛ dɔnɩ sopugo cʋʋdara.
Mɛ̃ gɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ nɩɛnɛnɩ ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩsɔɔkɛ a yɩr da-n cʋʋ, a na hʋrɛ kũu kpɛsɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ ɔɔ cɔ boka nã thɛrɛɛra.
Dɩ thãgba nyʋɔn n daan, dɩ nyʋɔn be poo a gbʋma, dɩ jɩɛ ɩɩrɛ dɩ ga-n be cʋɔrɩle, sɩ ga jə', gɩdonɩ boka nã thɛrɛɛra wɩ thɩɩ.
Sɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ nɩɛnɛnɩ ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩsɔɔkɛ sɩ aa-n cʋa', a na hʋrɛ kũu də̃bəəluukɛ thɛnɩ ɔɔ cɔ gbalãkothɩnna.
Dɩ thãgba nyʋɔn n daan, dɩ nyʋɔn be poo a gbʋma, dɩ jɩɛ ɩɩrɛ dɩ ga-n be cʋɔrɩle dɩɩ do gɩ təəre ji, dɩ ɔɔ jirə puurore ka.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ thɩmɩaakɛ dɩɩ pɩ, nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ tibil jɔɔle ɔɔ dɩɩrra.
Gɩdonɩ a dɩɩr wɛr mɔ̃ a hananɩ hʋɛ, ga ho mɔ̃ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ n dɩɩr wɩna'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ thenɩ gɔ̃gʋɔna da-n gbũ, tibil jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ kpaaraarɛ.
Dɩ gbuul bɩɛl pʋɔraa, a gburõku ɔɔ ƴɛra, sa sʋʋraa: Kɔ̃tɩn, ado fɩ ture fɩ punone cʋʋ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ gbuul pɩ.
Dɩ Jeju 'laa nyɔ̃ɔ a thaaraa sa sʋʋraa: Mɩ ture afɩ gbuul n pɛ. Dɩ dapaara ɔɔ gbuul pɩɩraa.
Agɩpɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ fa-n so tibillə ga, sɩ jala nɛna Thãgbaa bonɩ jidaar mɔ̃ fɩ hanɩ, a 'laanɛna phɔphʋɔl thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sonɩ, gɩ nɩna tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩ fɩ kpɛɛrɛ.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju kɔɔ lonɩ Kapɛrnayʋm, sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl pʋɔraarɛ da-n phʋʋrʋʋ thakɛ ayɩwɔɔ:
Kɔ̃tɩn, ɩ̃ thɔ̃daar hale a gbãgbar, a phɩ̃ le cʋɔrɔ da-n 'wãga jɔɔ ka.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Mɛrɛ, ma jaal a na kpɛsɛɛ.
Dɩ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩnna birsee ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, ma teena dɩ fa lõ ɩ̃ cɔa', sɔ nɔ haarɩkɛrakɛ dɔrɔɔm, sɩ ɩ̃ thɔ̃daar na kpɛɛrɛ.
Gɩdonɩ mɛrɛ dakha, mɩ hananɛ ɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔkɛ jɔ mɩnɩ, dɩ mɩ hananɛ dakha sɔrasɛsɔɔkɛ mɩ jɔnɩ. A mɩ so bɩɛlla: Jala, dɩ jal. A mɩ so bɩɛlla wo ayɩ: Ɩna, dɩ ɩ̃. A mɩ so ɩ̃ thɔ̃daarra: Gʋɛ gɩrɛ, dɩ cʋʋ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju nɩɛnɩ dɩ mɩɩna thale pɩ, nʋɔ kpagʋʋrɛ dɩ so wɩrɛraakɛ n kpaaraanɩ ayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩrarakɛ, ma kɔɔ yɩ tibil bɩɛllakɛ dɩ thʋ̃ hana ha pɛrɛ dɩɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ thaka'.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ mɩ so narɛ gɩrɛ, tibil jɔjʋɔ na ther wi phã paar na wi lõ paar, a na too dɩko kho paar na Abɩraham, na Ɩjakɩ, na Jakɔbɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra.
Sɩ wa dʋnanɛ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩɩ bɩsãsɔ jɩɛra dabirə paar na faa, ka wa bɩnɩ wa-n yɩrna nyɩma.
Agɩpɩ Jeju sor sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩnaale ayɩ: Kɔna, mɔ̃ fɩ pɛrnɩ haar ɔmɛna ga ha; dɩɩ do wa bɔraalera thɔ̃daarɩlee kho kpɛɛrɛ.
Agɩpɩ Jeju gbaar jal Pɩɛrɩ cɔ, a yɩ Pɩɛrɩ khɛrɩ nɩ dɩ phɩ̃ na tomɩ kporre,
dɩ a thaaraarɛ nyɔ̃ɔ dɩɩ do ɔɔ tomɩ kpor ɩɩraarɛ, dɩ pal ɩɩr a teguu kpakpaalɛ.
A dɩɩ dʋɔr, wɩ kɔɔ kpar kpãkpũdara jɔɔ a pɔnanaa. Dɩ a weere kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ na thɩmɩɩ bi bɩɛl, a kpɛɛna dakha khodara fɛʋ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩ kɔɔ sonɩ dã ayɩ: “Ɔr kɔɔ wea asɩ tomɩ sɩsɔ a hɛlna asɩ khosɔ a faa.”
Mɔ̃ Jeju yɩnɩ tibil jɔ dɩ wɩ jɛ a kpalalaa, a 'laarɛ hʋɛ ɩnɩ-n ire iiro.
Dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaar bɩɛl tɔr wɔrɔ̃ɔ a sʋʋraa: Dɩɩrdaar, ma-n kpa farɛ paar wo paarɩkɛ fɩ-n jalnɩ.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Ɓãɓoisɔ hananɛ awɩ ka, dɩ 'lominə hana awɩ tɛl, sɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na hana ka ma jəəni yʋa'.
Tibil bɩɛl wo kpãkpãadarara sʋʋraa: Kɔ̃tɩn, ha mɩ hʋɛ ɩ̃ jal ɩ̃ dʋ ɩ̃ thɩ bo.
Sɩ Jeju birsee ayɩ: Na kpa mar sa sɛ khesɔra wa-n dʋ awɩ khisɔ.
Dɩ Jeju kɔɔ lʋʋn gboroona, dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara kpaaraarɛ.
Dɩ le jɛkhu kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ ɩɩr mɩɩr nɔɔra, dɩ gborõo na-n ibi nyʋɔn. Sɩ Jeju wer ha da-n daar,
dɩ kpãkpãadara tɔr pɔ a jagʋʋ sa sʋʋraa: Kɔ̃tɩn, taa sɩ sɩ-n khiire.
Dɩ bule wi ayɩ: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ maar fʋ nɩ, nɛrɛɛkɛ kanɩ hana ha pɛrɛ gbe? Le a ɩɩr a mana jɩɛ na mɩɩr nɔɔ, dɩ thɩ̃ɛ na-n tutugo bã.
Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ tɩbɩlaale dɩ wa-n bule ayɩ: Anyee tibil ca ha ʋrɛ ya fɛ, dɩ jɩɛrakɛ na mɩɩr nɔɔ na-n nɩɩ nũu?
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju iirni gɩ̃ iiro Gadarɛ̃daraa dʋɔ na pɩ, kona yenyɔɔkɛ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbii ther khi dʋ paar dɩ wa-n caanʋʋ. Wɩ-n kʋrɛ maar ka, dɩ tibil na-n 'la dɩ kana hʋɛɛla'.
Dɩ wɩ mar dɩ wa-n hulẽ ayɩ: Anye sɩ ha kha na fɛr, Thãgbaa Bikuun? Fɩ ɩnɛ kɛ fɩ hʋɔl sar, sɩ bɔɔ na dã na paa ya?
Sɩ dabulo sɩthɔ jɔɔ wɛ a kɔɔ hale ƴɔɔ dɩ wa-n khʋʋl.
Dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbiirə na-n phʋʋr Jeju thakɛ ayɩ: Ado fɩ wee sɩ, thɔna sɩ sɩ lõ sɩthɔsɔraale.
Dɩ a so warɛ: Nɩ jala. Dɩ wɩ thɩɩr a jal a lõ sɩthɔsɔraale bɩnɔ, a tinə wi fɛʋ dɩ wɩ ca birbirbir na gɔ̃gɔ̃ horʋ, a jiir mɩɩr nɔɔra, a khiir le nyʋɔnɔ.
Dɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ n khɛ wɩnɩ, wɩ kɔɔ car kɔ̃, a mɩɩ dɩɩra thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ na gɩrɛ kɔɔ dananɩ kuunnaakɛ kɔɔ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ.
Dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩɩra ther jal Jejuu pa; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩɩnɩ, wɩ phʋʋrʋʋrɛ ayɩ a thɛ nɩ dɩɩra.
Dɩ Jeju kɔɔ lʋʋn gboroona a iir lanyʋɔn, sa gba kɔ̃ ɔɔ dʋɔ.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, wɩ kɔɔ gbaar gbãgbarʋʋkɛ n phɩnanɩ phɩ̃ paar a pɔnanaa. Dɩ mɔ̃ Jeju yɩnɩ awɩ ha pɛ, a sor gbãgbarʋra: Pɩɛr 'lar ɩ̃ bɩsã, afɩ sopugo hɛl farɛ.
Dɩ wɩ̃ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ n sor na awɩ bɩ̃ ayɩ: Thãgbaa i kuunikɛ n kʋɛ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ Jeju jɩnɩ awɩ kpɩɛr, a bule wer ayɩ: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ nɩ hana kpɩɛr puu thakɛ anɩ bɩnɔ?
Gɩmɔ̃ yɔɔnɛ sorra: Afɩ sopugo hɛl farɛ gɩ yaa, agɩbo ɩrɛ jala gɩ?
Sɩ mɔ̃ na fʋnɩ sɩ na jɩ, dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun hananɛ hʋɛ thɩɩra dɩ ɩ̃ faana sopugo, sa bir so gbãgbarʋra: Ɩrɛ, gba afɩ phɩ̃ pa na kɔna.
Dɩ a ɩɩrɛ da-n kɔ̃ ɔɔ cɔ.
Mɔ̃ tibil jɔɔle yɩnɩ gele, maar fʋlɛ wɛr dɩ wa-n dʋbɩ Thãgbaakɛ hananɩ tɩbɩla ga puno caale.
Dɩ Jeju tɔr na jal gbe, a yɩ kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Matiə dɩ too war gba paar da-n tee war, dɩ sʋʋraa: Na kpa mar. Dɩ Matiə ɩɩr da-n kpaaraa.
Dɩ Jeju kɔɔ har dɩko kho paar cʋɔrɔ, dɩ war gbadara jɔɔ na sopugodara kɔɔ toonanɛ kha Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadarasɔ.
Mɔ̃ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara yɩnɩ thɩ̃ɛ thale, wɩ sor ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ anɩ dɩɩrdaar na-n kho dɩkɔ na war gbadara na sopugodarasɔ?
Dɩ mɔ̃ Jeju nɩɛnɩ gele, a so warɛ: Ga do tɩɩ khena n kɔɔ ƴaalɛ dɔtɔrɔa', sɩ wɩrɛ gɩ-n khonɩ gɩ.
Nɩ jala na dɩrɛ a jɛ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛɛ kɩr, kɛ sɔnɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩwɔɔ: “Bɔ donanɛ mɛr Thãgba n ƴaal, ga do bonɩ jir ga.” Gɩdonɩ ga do fɩl sardara mɩ ɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴaala', sɩ sopugodara wɛ.
Le Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ kpãkpãadarasɔ pɔ Jejura a bulee: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ se wer na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ na-n li nʋɔ, sɩ afɩ kpãkpãadarasɔ wer na-n li nʋɔa'.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Nɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ dɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ wenɩ herra na punone wa-n bɩ bɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ kha na khɛr he ya? Sɩ wiresɔ na hale wa hɛl warnɩ khɛr he. Le wa li nʋɔ dɩphã.
Tibil na gba kẽkẽ phaa na kur na bɛbɩna kẽkẽ tɩ̃a', gɩdonɩ daphaale na-n haalɛ datɩ̃ɩ, gɩ do gɩ ka ɓəəre dɩphã waa a ka puuro ka.
Wa-n gba dakha thʋʋrɩkɛ dɔnɩ daphaa a pɛ bʋla tɩɩna ga. A wɩ cʋʋ mɛ̃, bʋlaa na wɩɛlɛ dɩ thʋʋr na deer, gɩ do bʋlaale kʋɛrɛ mɛ̃. Sɩ wɩ-n pɛr thʋ phaa bʋla phaara oti dɩɩ gbɛbɩ too.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ hanɩ da-n mɩɩ wɩ ga thɩmɩɩsɔɔkɛ, kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl pɔr dã a gburõkuraa ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn sa so: Ɩ̃ bikhɛr khire ga pʋɔr pa', sɩ ɩna a dɛɛnaa nyɛ̃ɛ a na bɩre na hana yɩre.
Dɩ Jeju ɩɩrɛ da-n kpaaraa nakha ɔɔ kpãkpãadara.
Dɩ hɩnɛ khɛ bɩɛl gɩ, a kɔɔ hale a hana tɩ̃ɩ a cʋʋna yɛna yuɔr yenyɔ, dɩ a tɔr pɔ Jejura khiro a thaaraaa kẽkẽ nʋɔra.
Gɩdonɩ a kɔɔ sor le na ɔɔ bɩ̃ ayɩ: A mɩ punonakɛ a thar ɔɔ kẽkẽ haraakɛrakɛ sɩ ma kpɛɛrɛ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ Jeju kɩɩlnɩ a yɩɩ a sʋʋraarɛ: Pɩɛr 'lar ɩ̃ bikhɛr, afɩ ha pɛ kpɛɛnɛ fɩ; dɩ dapaara khɛrɩlee kho kpɛɛ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju danɩ kɔ̃tɩnɩ cɔ, a yɩrɛ bel ʋ̃dara na tɩbɩla jɔɔ dɩ wa-n khɔ̃, dɩ a so warɛ:
Nɩ tɔ birə gɩdonɩ khebirrə na khə', sɩ a-n daarɛ; sɩ wɩ-n maanʋʋnɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a tini tibil jɔɔle dɩ wɩ thɩɩr, a lʋʋn a fʋ khebirrə nyɔ̃ɔ dɩ pal ɩɩr.
Dɩ ga tutugo kɔɔ kpaarɛ paar fɛʋ ga bənəəle.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju thenɩ le da-n jal, yara yenyɔ n kpaaraarɛ dɩ wa-n hulẽ ayɩ: Jɛ sɩ bʋɔrarakɛ ya, Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun.
Dɩ mɔ̃ a lonɩ cʋɔrɔ na pɩ, yaraale pɔr wɔrɔ̃ɔ dɩ bule wi: Nɩ pɛrɛ haar ma punone gelela a na cʋʋ ya? Dɩ wɩ birsee: Ɔɔ, Kɔ̃tɩn.
Dɩ le a tha war yinəna sa so: Mɔ̃ anɩ ha pɛ hanɩ, ɔmɛna ga ha.
Dɩ awɩ yi khɛrrɛ. Sɩ Jeju jɩɛ kpãkpãa war thakɛ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ: Nɩ jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ, na-n do tibil n jɩ thɩ̃ɛɛka';
sɩ mɔ̃ wa thenɩ, dapaara wɩ mar ɔɔda a be dɩ wa-n wɩɛl ga bənəəle koo.
Mɔ̃kɛ wa thenɩ le, wɩ kpar kuunikɛ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbu nɔ madaar a pɔnanaa.
Dɩ a weeraarɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbuule sɩ dɩ nɔ madaarɩle na-n mɩɩ thɩmɩa dɩphã. Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ tibil jɔɔle dɩ wa-n so: Sa kɔɔ yɩ thɩ̃ɛ thakɛ Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩra kpɩɩraka'.
Sɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ wer na-n so ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ n hanaa fãga dɩ weena kɔ̃tɛɛbii.

Dɩ Jeju n kɔɔ kpaarɛ dɩ kɔ̃tɩnasɔra fɛʋ na dɩ biisɔra, da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔ, da-n mɩɩna tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ ƴũ fãgadaar doda, da-n kpɛɛna khoosɔ dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ na tãdarasɔ dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ.
Sɩ mɔ̃ a yɩnɩ tibil jɔɔle, bʋɔ fʋʋrɛ gɩdonɩ wɩ thʋnɛ vɔɔ dɩɩ ka war, dɩ wa-n puno bã a ho banaakɛ na hananɩ khekha'.
Dɩ le a so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara ayɩ: Jɔ jɔrɛ, sɩ jʋ kha na kpɛra'.
Gɛr gɩ na-n bɩɛlnɛ ʋrɛ dɔnɩ Kɔ̃tɩn jʋ kharra a thɔna thɔ̃dara wa-n kha jɔ.
Agɩpɩ dɩ Jeju we ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ a ha wɩ punone dɩ wa-n weena kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔlasɔ, wa-n kpɛɛna khoosɔ dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ na tãdarasɔ dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ.
Thɔ̃thɔna yʋɔr yenyɔɔ isɔra ha gɩrɛ: Gacadaar Sɩmɔ̃ɔkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Pɩɛr na ɔɔ õkuun Ãdire, Jakɩ Jebedee bikuun na Jã ɔɔ õkuun,
Filipi na Bartelemɩ, Tomasɩ na Matiəəkɛ dɔnɩ war gbadaar, Jakɩ Alfee bikuun, na Tade,
Sɩmɔ̃ɔkɛ dʋɔnnɩ gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ tibil, na Judasɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Karɩyɔtɩ dɩɩra, kɛ lirenanɩ Jeju.
Wɛr dɔ yʋɔr yenyɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ thɔnɩ a so war thakɛ ayɩ: Na-n jal thɩldaraa pa ga, na-n lõ Samarɩdarasɔɔ dɩsɔra ga.
Sɩ nɩ ka na jala Ɩjɩrayɛl ca wɩrɛra bureni a ho banaa.
Sɩ mɔ̃ nɩ-n jalnɩ na-n mɩa ayɛ, bɔɔ n daan dɩ ƴũ Fãgadaar na-n gba fãga.
Na-n kpɛɛnɛ khodarasɔ dakha, na-n ɩrɛ khesɔ khirera, na-n cʋɛ gbulosɔɔ gbuul ga-n pɩ, na-n wea kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ na faa. Khaar nɩ 'lɛ, na-n 'laanɛ khaar.
Na-n gba dɛ a fʋrɔa', na-n gba war dɩ war yɩra gɩ a to lokaara';
na-n fʋrɔ kpakpaar lokaara', na-n gba kẽkena yenyɔa', na-n to nɛfaa ga, na-n fʋrɔ gbʋʋla', gɩdonɩ thɔ̃daar teenanɛ haanɛ.
Dɩ dɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ dɔɔraakɛ na lonɩ, a dɩ buurə gɩ, nɩ bulene ado tibil hale kɛ teananɩ a na tee nɩ. Nɩ tɔɔ le ntɛɛ pa phaphapha gɩ dana wireekɛ na thenɩ le.
Sɩ ado na lõ cɔ dɔɔra, nɩ kɔɔ fʋɔrɛɛ.
Ado cɔ dɔɔ teere kha, anɩ ha ie n ɓananaa, sɩ ado cɔ dɔɔ na tee kha ga, anɩ ha ie n birə nar.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wa-n tee nɩna', dɩ ga do wɩ-n pɛ anɩ thɩmɩɩ nũu dakha ga, nɩ thɛ cɔ dɔɔrara agɩbo dɩ dɔɔrara, sa kpɛɛnɛ thɩlãkobe anɩ nɛra.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla, Sɔdɔmdara na Gɔmɔɔrdaraa kɩɩlɩkɛ wa 'lɛnɩ na khɩɩr mɔ̃ dɩɩlee kɩɩl na khɩɩrna'.
Sɩ nɩ hɩnɛ, banaa nɩ ho dɩ ɩ̃ thɔ̃ kpesɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn; gɛr gɩ nɩ kpɛsɛnɛ sii kha sa hana hɛlɛlɛ a hɔ puusɩ̃ɛ.
Sɩ na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ tɩbɩlala, gɩdonɩ wa fʋlɛ nɛr na jalna kɩɩl paar, wa ciil ner na khasa Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra.
Mɛr na dɔ nɔɔ dɩ̃ wa fʋlɛ nɩ na jalna gobanɛrsɔ na fãgadarasɔɔ ƴɛra, gɩ mɩɩ wɩ anɩ ha pɛda na ca kpala dakha.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wa liirna nɩnɩ, na-n dɛ mɔ̃kɛ na mɩɩnɩ, agɩbo gɩrɛɛkɛ na sona'. Gɩrɛ na sonɩ na ɩ̃ narɛ ga bɔraalera.
Gɩdonɩ ga do nɛr na mɩa ga, sɩ anɩ Thɩɩ Thu gɩɩkɛ na mɩanɩ le anɩ bɩnɔ na ha nɩ.
õkuun na liirnanɛ ɔɔ õkũu bɩnɔ dɩ wa kʋ; ɔmɛ̃ thɩrɛ na cʋʋ na ɔɔ bɩsã. Bɩsana dakha na ɩɩrɛ na tɛna thɛ na nɛ na cʋʋ dɩ wa kʋʋr wɩ.
Tɩbɩla fɛʋ na laar nɛr, gɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ, sɩ ʋrɛ na yɩranɩ na dana khu paar, ɔr na 'lɛ taarɛ.
A wɩ kpoo nar dɩ bɩɛlla, nɩ fuo ca ka dɩ kpɩɩra. Sɩ sobɔr mɩ so nar, na kpaar Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩ fɛʋ na pɩ sɩɩ do mɛr tibili Bikuun bire ɩ̃a'.
Kpãkpãadaar na hale a na kɔ̃tɩ̃ na jɔ ʋrɛ n dɩrɛɛna', dɩ thɔ̃daar wo na hale a na kɔ̃tɩ̃ na jɔ ɔɔ kɔ̃tã'.
Gɩ daan dɩ wa hɩɩn kpãkpãadaar mɔ̃ wɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ ʋrɛ n dɩrɛɛnɩ, wɩ hɩɩn thɔ̃daar dakha mɔ̃ wɩ hɩɩnnɩ ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃. Ado wɩ we cɔdaar kuun Bɛljɛbul, dɩ mɔ̃ wa ka na we dɩphã ɔɔ cɔdara?
Gɛr gɩ na-n ma wɩ kpɩɩa', gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ɛ na hale na ker sɩɩ do ga yɩraa ga, dɩ thɩ̃ɛ na hale na ha gbul sɩɩ do wa jɩ gaaga.
Gɩrɛ mɩ khe narnɩ pa birə paar, nɩ sɔ gɩ dahɩrɛra tɩbɩla n nɩɛ. Gɩrɛ nɩ nɩɛnɩ bʋ̃bʋʋnɛna, nɩ hulene gi nãsʋrɔ.
Na-n ma wɩrɛ n kɔnɩ tomɩr, sɩ wa-n puno thue dɩ wɩ kʋaa ga, sɩ nɩ ka na ma ʋrɛ hananɩ punone a na cʋʋ dɩ anɩ thu na anɩ tomɩ na kʋɛ bu paar dɔɔra.
Wa-n dolõ 'lominə yenyɔ war be yenyɔaa? Sɩrakɛ bɩɛl na puno na ji thʋnɔ, sɩ agado anɩ Thɩ tuonaa ga.
Anɩ thɛthɛɛ yʋsũsɔrakɛ Thãgba ther ger fɛʋ.
Gɛr gɩ na-n do maar na-n fʋ na', anɩ the nɔ khɩɩrɛ a jɔ 'lomĩ jɔjɔjʋɔ.
Gɛr gɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na tuon mini tɩbɩlaa ƴɛra, mɛrɛ dakha ma tuure ɩ̃ Thɩraakɛ hanɩle ƴũu ƴɛra.
Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ bɔ mɩnɩ tɩbɩlaa ƴɛra, mɛrɛ dakha ma bor ntɛɛle ɩ̃ Thɩraakɛ hanɩle ƴũu ƴɛra dakha.
Na-n kpɩɛr ha ɩɩ mɩ ɩna ɩ̃ 'laa thɩɩra ga. Ma ɩ̃ ɩ̃ 'laa ha ɩa', sɩ bajɩna gɩ.
Gɩdonɩ mɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ pɛr leere bikuunna na ɔɔ thɩ, bikhɩɛnna na ɔɔ nɩ, khɛrra na ɔɔ koo nɩ dakha,
dɩ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ tibili cɔdara na fien na do ɔɔ lãlaardara.
Ʋrɛ n naannɩ ɔɔ thɩ, a ɔɔ nɩ gɩ, a jɔ mɩ aa teena ma'; dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n naannɩ ɔɔ bikuun, a ɔɔ bikhɛr gɩ, a jɔ mɩ aa teena ma'.
Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n gbaannɩ ɔɔ kʋkʋ thɩr dɩ heen da-n kpana mara', aa teena ma'.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ n tɛbanɩ ɔɔ yi, ga ka na buurəəre, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛɛ yi na kanɩ na bu mɛrɛra, ɔr na lɛ waa gel.
Ʋrɛ tea nɩnɩ, mɛr a tee, dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ tea mɩnɩ, ʋrɛɛkɛ thɔna mɩnɩ a tee dakha.
Ʋrɛ teanɩ Thãgbaa bobon Thãgbaa bobon teguu, a na 'lɛr khor Thãgbaa bobonɩ kha; dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ teanɩ tɩɩ sarʋ tɩɩ sar teguu, a na 'lɛr khor tɩɩ sarʋʋ kha.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na cɛnɩ yɔ ie haarɩkɛrakɛ na ha ɩ̃ kpãkpãadaar pɩɛrʋʋkɛ, gɩdonɩ mɛrra a-n kpa dɩɩ do gɛr dɔ nɔɔ, sobɔr mɩ so nar, ntɛ na 'lee ɔɔ khoa'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ dɩɩrnɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ pɩ, a ther le a jal da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla da-n mɩɩna wɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ awɩ dɩsɔra.
Jãakɛ wɩ kɔɔ fʋnɩ a to khaɩra, a nɩɛrɛ thɔmaakɛ Kirisiti n cʋʋnɩ, dɩ a thʋɔn ɔɔ kpãkpãadara wɩ jala bulenee ayɛwɔɔ:
Fɛr dɔ ʋrɛɛkɛra na ɩnanɩ yaa, agɩbo dɔ sa-n pɩɛr tɩɩ kpɩɩ?
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Nɩ kɛra birə a sɔ Jana gɩrɛɛkɛ nɩ-n nɩɛnɩ na gɩrɛɛkɛ nɩ-n yɩnɩ:
Yarasɔ n yɩrɛ, nɛ kʋɛdarasɔ n sar bɔɔbɔɔ, gbulosɔɔ gbuul pɩrɛ, dɩ nʋrasɔ khɛrrɛ, dɩ khesɔ n ɩɩrɛ dɩ wɩ the khirera, dɩ bɔdara nɩɛrɛ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ.
Sɩ gɩ da ʋrɛraakɛ ma doronɩ nɛ baradaa ga.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ tɩbɩlaakɛ kɔnɩ na pɩ, Jeju mar da-n mɩɩ tibil jɔɔle Jãadara aa: Anye nɩ kɔɔ ka jal bəənnə a hɩɩn? Poo balãsɩɩkɛ jɩɛ n khəəfəni gɩ ya?
Dɩ anye nɩ kɔɔ jal yɩ? Kuunikɛ n tɔnɩ kẽkẽ ɓʋ̃ɔ gɩ ya? Nɩ hɩnɛ wo wɩrɛɛkɛ n tɔnɩ kẽkẽ ɓɔna fãgadaraa cɔ wɩ-n ha.
Dɩ anye nɩ kɔɔ jal yɩ? Thãgbaa bobon gɩ ya? Mɩ so narɛ, sobɔr gɩ, bɩɛlɩkɛ jɔnɩ Thãgbaa bobon gɩ.
Jãada dɔ gɩrɛ kheranɩ kɩɛr Thãgbaa sɛbɛraakɛ ayɩ: “Hɩnɛ, mɛr Thãgba thɔna ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃, dɩ na kʋʋl fɩ ƴɩɛ, a gbɛbɩrɩ fɩ hʋɛ afɩ ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ.”
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ khɛra n kɔnɩɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, bɩɛl na hale a ɩɩr a kɔ̃tɩ̃ a jɔ Jã Batɩsɩtɩ kpɩɩraka'. Sɩ ʋrɛ kanɩ do dabuu fɩɩʋ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra, a kɔ̃tɩnɛ a jɔ Jã.
A fʋna Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ bɔɔ a dana nɛnɛ̃kɛ, wɩ-n pɛrɛ fãga dɩ wa-n lõ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra, dɩ wɩrɛ n pɩɛrnɩ fãga, wɛr hɩna.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa bobonasɔ fɛʋ na jɔfʋ, gɩ kɔɔ mɩɩrɛ Thãgbaa so a dana Jãa bɔɔ.
Dɩ ado nɩ ƴaalɛ nɩ tu gi, ɔr dɔ Elɩra teananɩ a ɩna.
Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu dɩ nɩna, dɔ a na-n pɛ nũu.
Ana ma cʋna nĩdaraakɛ dɩphã ya fɛ? Wɩ hʋrɛ bɩsanasɔɔkɛ n tɔɔnɩ ƴatɔɔ, dɩ wa-n we awɩ 'walãkhasɔ dɩ wa-n so:
Sɩ kɔɔ ʋnɛ bɩɩl nɛrɛra, sɩ na kɔɔ sa ga, sɩ kɔɔ khɩɩrɛ nɛrɛra, sɩ na kɔɔ ba'.
Gɩdonɩ Jã kɔɔ ɩnɛ, aa-n kɔɔ kho dɩkora', aa-n kɔɔ yɔ thɩ̃a', dɩ wɩ jɩɩl sa yɩ: Kɔ̃tɛɛbuu hanaanɛ.

Dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun ɩ̃ wo, a thɩ̃ɛ mɩ-n kho, a thɩ̃ɛ mɩ-n yɔ, dɩ wɩ jɩɩl wo sa yɩ: Hɩnɛ, kũu kɛ̃kɛbɩ gɩ, a dona ta yɔn, war gbadara na sopugodaraa kuun gɩ. Sɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgbaa kpɛsɛ n cʋʋnɩ n nɩnanɛ dɩ sobɔr har kpɛsɛrɛɛlee pa.
Le Jeju ma da-n phaan dɩɩsɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ cʋʋrɔnɩ ɔɔ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃sɔ jɔɔ, gɩdonɩ ha debire na kɔɔ hala', ayɩ:
Ga puu farɛ Korajɛ̃ dɩɩ, ga puu farɛ Bɛcaɩda dɩɩ, gɩdonɩ ado nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ cʋɛnɩ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn kɔɔ cʋʋrɛ mɛ̃ Tɩɩr na Sɩdɔ̃ dɩɩra, wa kɔɔ mãa debire haar kɛkɛkɛ, sɩ na to bɔrɔ na bʋlna thoo.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so nar: Wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla, Tɩɩrdara na Sɩdɔ̃daraa kɩɩlɩkɛ wa 'lɛnɩ na khɩɩr mɔ̃ anɩ kɩɩl na khɩɩrna'.

Sɩ fɛrɛ Kapɛrnayʋm dɩɩ, Thãgba na khəi fer na jʋʋnna ƴũ ya? Ǝ̃'ə̃, Thãgba na gbumo fer dɩ fa thʋ khĩdi dɩɩ. Gɩdonɩ ado nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ afɩ pa Sɔdɔm gɩ kɔɔ cʋʋ, ga dor a na kɔɔ hale na dana nĩ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so nar: Wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla, Sɔdɔmdaraa kɩɩlɩkɛ wa 'lɛnɩ na khɩɩr mɔ̃ anɩ kɩɩl na khɩɩrna'.
Ga bɔɔlera Jeju gba thɩmɩa da-n mɩɩ ayɩ: Thɩrɛ, mɩ-n fʋɔr fɛr, fɛrkɛ dɔnɩ Kɔ̃tɩn thãgbara ƴũ na thɩɩra, gɩrɛraakɛ fɩ kɔɔ kernɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛra kpɛsɛdarara na thɩ̃ jɩnana, sa gba gɩ a nɩna bɩsã bii.
Ɔɔ Thɩrɛ, fɛr gɩ kɔɔ da haar dɩ fɩ cʋʋ mɛ̃.
Ɩ̃ Thɩ gbaar thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ a dʋ mɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ, sɩ tibil na jɩ Bikuun saagado Thɩrɛ gaaga, dɩ tibil na jɩ Thɩrɛ dakha saagado Bikuun gaaga, saagado wo Bikuunna ɔr ƴaalɛ a nɩrɔ n taa ga.
Nɩ ɩna mɛrɛra, nɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n vɔɔnɩ kɛ n heenenɩ dakha heendaakɛ dɩbarɔnɩ, dɩ ma ha nɛr hɩɩrɛ.
Nɩ tɔ kpeleleekɛ dɔnɩ ɩ̃da, dɩ nɩ to ɩ̃ dɩɩrsɔ, gɩdonɩ hɛlɛlɛ fɩldaar na ha jodaar ha mɩ, dɩ na 'lɛr hɩɩrɛ anɩ hara.
Gɩdonɩ ɩ̃ kpeleekɛ ma to nɩnɩ, gɩ habarɛ; dɩ ɩ̃ heendaakɛ ma heen nɩnɩ, ga dɩbɩrɔa'.
Ga bɔɔlera Jeju n kɔɔ ka a lõ jʋ lɩɛra hɩɩr wire. Dɩ kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋrɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara, dɩ wɩ mar a 'laa kha jɔ dɩ wa-n kho.
Dɩ mɔ̃ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ yɩ gɩnɩ, wɩ sʋʋraarɛ ayɩ: Hɩnɛ, afɩ kpãkpãadara n cʋʋrɛ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ yɩnɩ gɩ-n sãsɩrɛ hɩɩr wire.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Na kɔɔ yɩɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra gɩrɛɛkɛ Davɩdɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋʋnɩ ɔr na wɩrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ kha gaa?
Mee a kɔɔ lʋʋn Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɔ a gba buruukɛ wɩ-n hanɩ Thãgba dɩ wɩ kho, sɩrakɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ na tɩbɩlaale a kɔɔ hananɩ kha na kɔɔ hana hʋɛ a na kho ga, Thãgbaa gbõdara dɩbaraada gɩ.
Dɩ na ba yɩ gɩ jɔfʋ sɛbɛra wo, mɔ̃kɛ Thãgbaa gbõdara n cʋʋnɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɔ gɩrɛ dɩ wa-n kʋɛ hɩɩr wire, sɩ wa-n 'lɛ soraa gaa?
Dɩ mɩ ka so narɛ ʋkhaakɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ a jɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔr hakɛ.
Ado nɩ kɔɔ jɩrɛ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛɛ kɩr, kɛ sɔnɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Bɔ donanɛ mɛr Thãgba n ƴaal, ga do bonɩ jir ga” na kɔɔ heen wɩrɛkɛ na hananɩ dɩa sora'.
Gɩdonɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun dʋɔn Kɔ̃tɩn hɩɩr wirerarakɛ.
Sɩ Jeju ther le a gba jal lõ awɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra.
Dɩ le a yɩ kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ nyɔ̃ɔ khini. Sɩ gɩdonɩ wɩ-n ƴaalɛ hʋɛ wɩ pɛr Jeju sor, wɩ buleele ayɩ: Hɩɩr wire teenanɛ kho kpɛɛrɛ ya?
Dɩ a birse wer: Ʋmɔ̃ɔ tibil nɛrɛra, ado a hana bana bɩɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ dɩ ji kõkorro hɩɩr wire, a na halʋʋ na təə?
Dɩ tibil na khɩɩr the nʋɔ a jɔ banaa fiiəə? Dɩ gɛr gɩ hɩɩr wire teena bɔ cʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ le a so kuunnaale ayɩ: 'Laanɛ afɩ nyɔ̃, dɩ 'laa dɩɩ do gɩ kpɛɛrɛ a ha mɔ̃ ʋ̃ nyɔ̃ hanɩ.
Dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ ther dɩ wa-n gʋʋr kha mɔ̃ wa fʋnɩ sɩ na kʋ Jeju.
Dɩ Jeju nɩɛrɛ gele a faa paarɩle sa the. Dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ kpaaraarɛ, dɩ a kpɛɛrɛ khodara fɛʋ;
sɩ a-n kpãkpãa warɛ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ, wa-n so ntɛ ɩnɩ dona'.
Gɩ do mɛ̃ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ Ejaɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ dã oti:
“Hɩnɛ, ɔr dʋɔn thɔ̃daarɩkɛ mɛr Thãgba phiirni, ʋrɛ mɩ-n nanɩ gɩ, a lõ mer haar kpɛ. Ma pɩɛraarɛ ɩ̃ Thu, dɩ a na mɩɩrɛ fɩl sarʋ tibil caar fɛʋra.
A na bana thɩ̃ banaa ga, a na hulə̃', dɩ tibil bɩɛl na nɩ ɔɔ nɔ dɩ bɩnɔ dakha ga.
A na kha jʋmũukɛ hanɩ kpɛlɛ kpɛlɛ na fa ga. A na khiir dakha lãphã pɔ̃ɔkɛ n dɔnɩnakɛ isi haara', phaphapha a cʋʋ fɩl sarʋ gɩ kəə.
Dɩ ɔr tibil caar fɛʋ na-n pɛ nũu.”
Le wɩ kpa kuunikɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbuu cʋʋnɩ dɩ do nɔ madaar a yaarna a pɔna Jejura, dɩ wee kɔ̃tɛɛbuu a faa, dɩ nɔ madaarɩle mɩɩrɛ nʋɔ da-n yɩna dɩphã.
Dɩ nʋɔ kpaarɛ tibil jɔɔle fɛʋ dɩ wa-n so: Dɩ ɔr ba dɔ Davɩdɩɩ Bikuunna yaa?
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara nɩɛnɩ gele, wɩ sor ayɩ: Kuunikɛ na-n wee kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ saagado na Bɛljɛbulikɛ dɔnɩ yʋʋ kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔraa fãga gaaga.

Mɔ̃ Jeju jɩnɩ awɩ kpɩɛr, a so warɛ: Fãgadaar dɩ wo fãgadaar dɩɩkɛ n tɩnɛnɛnɩ a bir da-n kena dɩbara, a na wɩɛlɛ; dɩ dɩɩ wo dɩɩkɛ agɩbo, cʋɔr wo cʋɔrɩkɛ tɩnɛnɛnɩ a bir da-n kena dɩbara, ga puno na jɩɩla'.
Dɩ ado Satã na wee Satã, a tɩnɛ a bir da-n kena dɩbara, mɔ̃ ɔɔ fãgadaar dɩ na fʋ sɩ na jɩɩl?
Dɩ ado mɛrɛ Bɛljɛbuli fãga mɩ-n gba dɩ ma-n weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ, sɩ anɩ bɩsãsɔ amɛɛ i wɩ-n gba dɩ wa-n weena wɩ? Dɩ gɛr gɩ anɩ thɛthɛɛ bɩsãsɔra na dʋɔn anɩ so kɩɩldara.
Dɩ ado mɛrɛ, Thãgbaa Thu mɩ-n gba dɩ ma-n weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ, ga dor Thãgbaa fãgadaar do dã nɛr mɛ̃ dɩphã.
Mɔ̃ tibil na fʋ sɩ na lõ na fãga kũu khɩɩ cɔ na taaraa thɩ̃ɛsɔ, saagado kũu khɩɩlera a kɔɔ fʋ ɓo a lə? Ado a punoo ɓo dɩphã, gɛr a na taaraa thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ cʋɔrɔ.
Ʋrɛ na-n hanɩ kha na mɛrɛa', ɩ̃da a-n bo, dɩ wo ʋrɛ na-n bulo mini sɩ kpa ga, ɔr n bɩ̃bɩlanɛ gɩ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so nar ayɩwɔɔ: Thãgba na faarɛ sopugo caar dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ na i kʋɛ caar dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋʋkɛ tɩbɩla n cʋʋnɩ a na-n ha wɩ, sɩ ʋrɛ na kʋɛanɩ Thu Phuu i, Thãgba na faa ga sopugo caale kpɩɩraka'.

Dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na mɩanɩ thɩmɩɩ puu na pɛ mɛr tibili Bikuunna, Thãgba na faarɛ ga sopugo caale na haa, sɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na mɩanɩ thɩmɩɩ puu na pɛ Thu Phuurə, Thãgba na faa ga sopugo caale kpɩɩrakɛ na haa, dɩ nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ gɩ, dɩ bɔɔraakɛ na ɩnanɩ ga.
A nɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ thɩrʋ bɔrɛ, oti ɔɔ bi n bɔr. A nɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ thɩrʋ puurore, oti ɔɔ bi n puuro. Gɩdonɩ be wɩ-n jɩna thɩrʋ.
Nɛr sikori bisɔ, mɔ̃ ner na kɔɔ punona na mɩɩ thɩmɩɩ bʋɔ, puu ca ʋrɛ nɩ thʋnɩ puuro? Gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ henɩ bɩnɔ, gɛr nʋɔ n mɩɩ.
Tɩɩ bʋɔ n tire dabʋɔ ɔɔ thɩ̃ bɔra. Dɩ tɩɩ puu n tire dapuu ɔɔ thɩ̃ puurə.
Mɩ so narɛ, wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla, thɩmɩɩ mɔlɔsɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ wa ther ger fɛʋ na ha wɩ.
Gɩdonɩ afɩ thɩmɩɩ na cʋɛ sor dɩ ga hɛl far, dɩ afɩ thɩmɩɩ na cʋɛ wo dɩ sor na heen fɩ.
Le ɩkhaa jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ hana thɩmɩɩr a so Jejura ayɩwɔɔ: Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ-n ƴaalɛ fɩ cʋɛ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ bɩɛl sɩ yɩ gɩ.
Dɩ birse wi: Nĩdaraakɛ puuroni thakɛ, kɛ faanɩ awɩ Thãgba, n ƴaalɛlakɛ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ, sɩ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ kpɩɩ na bir na yɩ saagado Jonasɩ Thãgbaa bobonɩda gaaga.
Gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ Jonasɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ wire yẽther na dɩtɩnɛ yẽther thʋ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ, ɔmɛ̃ mɛr tibili Bikuun na cʋʋ wire yẽther na dɩtɩnɛ yẽther thɩɩkɛɛ bɩnɔ.

Wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla, Nɩnɩvɩdara na ɩɩrɛ na the khirera nakha nĩdaraakɛ, dɩ wɛr na heene wɩ sor, gɩdonɩ wɩ kɔɔ debire haar ɔbɔɔkɛ Jonasɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ wɩnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ. Sɩ nɩ ka hɩnɛ ʋkhaakɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ a jɔ Jonasɩ hakɛ.

Wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla, khɛr fãgadaarɩkɛ kɔɔ hanɩ wi phã paar nyɔ̃bɩlana na ɩɩrɛ na the khirera nakha nĩdaraakɛ, dɩ ɔr na heene wɩ sor. Gɩdonɩ ɔr, thɩ khu paar a kɔɔ the a pɔ a pɛ Salomɔ̃ɔ kpɛsɛ nũu. Sɩ nɩ ka hɩnɛ ʋkhaakɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ a jɔ Salomɔ̃ hakɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl n thenɩ tibillə, a-n jaal da-n kpaar bə̃ kparaara, da-n ƴaal kãkɛ a na toonɩ na hɩɩr, sɩ aa-n yɩ gɩ kpɩɩa'.
Agɩpɩ a-n sor dɩ yɩ: Ma kɛrrɛ na bir ɩ̃ cɔ kãkɛ mɩ kɔɔ thenɩ. Ado a pɔ dã a yɩ cʋɔrɩle dɩɩ do dakhɩɩ, dɩ wɩ kpabɩ sa gbɛbɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ bɔɔbɔɔ,

le a-n jal dɩphã mɛ̃ dɩ kpa kɔ̃tɛɛbi kpɩɩsɔ wo makonyɔɔkɛ n hʋɔlɛnɩ dɩ wɩ jʋɔ, dɩ wɩ pɔ a lõ a too le. Dɩ mɔ̃ ga hanɩ tibilləəle pɩpɩɩ paar, ga ka na puurore na jɔ caca fʋ paar. Mɛ̃ ga ha gɩrɛ na nĩda puu ca ƴɩrɛ.
Mɔ̃ Jeju hanɩ da-n mɩɩna tibil jɔɔle, ɔɔ nɩ na ɔɔ õkũu bɩnɔsɔ pɔr a jɩɩl phiilo, dɩ wa-n ƴaal wɩ mɩɩnaa.
Dɩ ʋkha sʋʋraa: Hɩnɛ, afɩ nɩ na afɩ õkũu bɩnɔsɔ hale phiilo a ƴaal wɩ mɩɩna fɩ.
Dɩ Jeju birsee ayɩ: Amɛ n dʋɔn ɩ̃ nɩ, na ɩ̃ õkona, na ɩ̃ õkhɛrsɔ?
Agɩpɩ dɩ 'laa nyɔ̃ɔ ɔɔ kpãkpãadarasɔra sa so: Nɩ yɛ kɛ ɩ̃ nɩ na ɩ̃ õkona.
Gɩdonɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ ɩ̃ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũu tuur, ɔr dʋɔn ɩ̃ õkuun, na ɩ̃ õkhɛr, na ɩ̃ nɩ.
Ga wiilera Jeju kɔɔ the cʋɔrɔ a too mɩɩr nɔɔra,
dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ gbɛbɩ pʋɔraa a der, dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ jʋʋn a too gboroona, sɩ dɩ tibil jɔɔle too mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔra.
Dɩ a mɩɩ wɛr thɩmɩa jɔɔ na sokpaa. A so warɛ ayɩ:
Bi jaldaar gɩ, a the da-n jal be. Dɩ mɔna a-n jalnɩ, yɛ̃ bi jire hʋɛra, dɩ 'lominə pɔ ʋʋl.
Yɛ ji wo bokanana, ka thɩ nʋʋn na jɔrna', a phu dapaara kɔrɔ, gɩdonɩ ga jɩɩ mʋʋ a hulõə'.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wire phanɩ, dɩ ɩtʋɛ hẽ, gɩ ɔ̃'ɔlɔnɛ a khi, gɩdonɩ ga yɩ nɛ gɔ paara'.
Yɛ ji wo ka uu hanɩ, dɩ uu ɩɩr a sɩlã gɩ.
Yɛ ji thɩ bʋɔra a phu a bɩ̃, bi bɩɛl n bɩnɛ dɩɩ hana be tamaa, ɩkha kpalãther, ɩkha kpelẽ yʋɔr.
Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n pɛ nũu.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara tɔr pɔ Jejura a bulee: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fa-n mɩɩna wɩ sokpaa?
Dɩ birse wi: Nɛr Thãgba kɔɔ ha nɩ jɛ thɩ̃ gbulsɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ ƴũ fãgadaar doda, sɩ we wer Thãgba na ha wa'.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ thɩ̃ɛ, Thãgba na bire na haa na dɛbɩrɔ, dɩ na hana gɩ dɩ ga jɩɩ jɔr; sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ thɩ̃a', Thãgba na tiirəərerakɛ phubi gɩrɛɛkɛra a hananɩ.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ma-n mɩɩna wɩ sokpaa; gɩdonɩ wɩ-n hɩɩnɛ sɩ wa yɩ ga, wɩ-n pɛ nũu sɩ wa-n nɩa', dɩ wa jɩ kɩrʋ dakha ga.
Dɩ awɩdara Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ thakɛ ayɩ: “Na-n nɩɛrɛ wer bɔɔbɔɔ na anɩ nũ, sɩ na jɩ kɩrʋ kpɩɩraka'. Na-n hɩɩnɛ wer bɔɔbɔɔ na anɩ yi, sɩ na yɩ gɩ kpɩɩraka'.

Gɩdonɩ tɩbɩlaakɛɛ ha debire a dibi; wɩ sɔbɩrɛ awɩ nũ ka, a khaan dakha awɩ yi, anaa ga hor wa yɩ gɛr na awɩ yi, a na nɩɛ na awɩ nũ, a na jɩna kɩrʋ na awɩ bɩ̃, a na kɛr na bir mar, dɩ mɛr Thãgba na kpɛɛ wɩ.”
Sɩ gɩ da nar, gɩdonɩ ner n yɩ gɛr dɩ nɩ nɩ gɛr dakha.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, Thãgbaa bobona na tɩɩ sarasɔ jɔɔjɔɔ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ wɩ yɩ gɩrɛɛkɛra nɩ-n yɩnɩ gɩrɛ, sɩ wa kɔɔ yɩ ga, wɩ nɩɛna dakha gɩrɛɛkɛra nɩ-n nɩɛnɩ gɩrɛ, sɩ wa kɔɔ nɩ ga.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ nɛrɛ, nɩ pɛ nũu gɩrɛ dɔnɩ bi jal sokpaa kɩrra.
Ʋrɛ n nɩɛnɛnɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ thɩmɩɩ sɩ aa-n jɩ kɩrʋa', ɔr hʋɔn hʋ nʋɔ ka be kɔɔ jalnɩ, dɩɩ do Satã n pʋɔn, dɩ tiir beele kɔɔ jalanɩ ɔɔ hara.
Ʋkha n ho boka thɩɩ ka be jalnɩ, a-n nɩɛrɛ Thãgbaa so dɩ tu dapaara na daʋ,
sɩ aa-n sɩ gar dɩɩ yɩ nɛ gɔ paar ɔɔ hara ga, bɔɔ gbe a-n pər gar dɩbara; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩwɛ na kpoore n danɩ, dɩɩ do Thãgbaa soolera dɔ nɔɔ dɩɩ do dapaara a faarɛ ha pɛrɛ.
Ʋkha n nɩɛ Thãgbaa so sɩ dɩɩ do a hʋrɛ ka uu hanɩ sɩ be jallɔ, sɩ dɛr bɔɔraakɛra na lẽle thɩ̃ kpɩɛr fifiləle, gele n ɩrɛ dɩɩ sɩlã Thãgbaa so dɩ ga-n puno na se bə'.
Ʋrɛ n nɩɛnɛnɩ Thãgbaa so dɩ jɩ kɩrʋ, ɔr hʋɔn thɩ bʋɔ ka be kɔɔ jalnɩ dɩɩ do a-n ser be: Bi bɩɛl n ser tamaa, ʋ kpalãther, ʋ kpelẽ yʋɔr.
Dɩ a so warɛ sokpa kpɩɩ wo ayɩ: Ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ gɩ hurɛ kuunikɛ jalanɩ jʋ bi bʋɔ ɔɔ lɔɔ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla n daarnɩ, ɔɔ lãlaardaar pɔr a jal yaya a pɛr jɔraale sa kɔ̃.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ jɔ phuni a ɩ̃ a pemi dɩ ga-n bɩ̃, wɩ yɩrɛ dakha yaya.
Dɩ cɔdaar kuuni thɔ̃daarsɔ pɔ a bulee: Kɔ̃tɩn, ga do jʋ bi bɔɩ fɩ jal afɩ lɔaa? Sɩ ka yayasɔɔkɛ the le?
Dɩ birse wi: Lãlaardaar cʋɛ thɩ̃ɛɛle. Dɩ thɔ̃dara bulee, dɩ fɩ-n ƴaalɛ sɩ jala phɩrɛ yayasɔra ya?
Dɩ birse wi: Kpei, a nɩ yɩ nɩ phɩrɛ yaya, na phɩɩrnanɛ jʋ bɔɩ.
Nɩ sɛ gar, gɩ gbɛbɩ gɩ khɔ̃ bɩɛlbɩɛl, phaphapha gɩ dana jʋ kha bɔɔ. Dɩ a jʋ kha bɔɔ dã, gɛr ma sor jʋ khara: Nɩ kɔɔ phɩrɛ yaya ɓo a le gɩ dera gbulona gbulona wɩ thii, sa kha jɔ a uro ɩ̃ thʋna.
Dɩ Jeju so warɛ sokpa kpɩɩ wo ayɩ: Ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ gɩ hʋrɛ seneve bireekɛ kuun kɔɔ gbanɩ a jal ɔɔ lɔɔ.
Thɩr bireekɛ 'lunoni a jɔ be fɛʋ gɩ, sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a phuni pɩ, a-n kɔ̃tɩnɛ dɩ jɔ thɩr bii fɛʋ dɩ ɩ̃ dɩ do thɩrʋ, dɩ 'lominə n pɔ a na tɛl ɔɔ jɛ̃sɔra.
Dɩ a so warɛ sokpa kpɩɩ wo ayɩ: Ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ gɩ hʋrɛ tabɩɩrɩkɛ khɛr kɔɔ gbanɩ a mʋʋ buru mɩ̃ nyɔ̃kpõ khaa yẽtherra, phaphapha dɩ buru mɩ̃ boloola fɛʋ bʋ̃.
Gelesɔ fɛʋ sokpaa Jeju kɔɔ mɩɩna tibil jɔɔle. Aa-n kɔɔ mɩɩna wɩ saagado sokpaa gaaga;
dɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobon kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ na dã oti gɩ sor: “Sokpaasɔ, mɛr Thãgba na-n mɩɩna. Ma mɩɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ kɔɔ keranɩ kɛkɛkɛ a fʋna thɩ̃ ti bɔɔ.”
Agɩpɩ Jeju faarɛ tibil jɔɔle sa lõ cʋɔrɔ, dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara tɔr pʋɔraa sa sʋʋraa: Mɩɛnɛ sɩ yayaakɛra hanɩ lɔɔ sokpa kɩr.
Dɩ birse wi: Ʋrɛɛkɛ jalanɩ jʋ bi bʋɔɔle, mɛr tibili Bikuun gɩ.
Lɩɛ dʋɔn tɩbɩla fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ. Jʋ bi bɔɩ dʋɔn ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩɩ bɩsãsɔ; sɩ yaya dʋɔn puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarɩ bɩsãsɔ.
Lãlaardaarɩkɛ jalanɩ, Satã gɩ. Dɩ jʋ kha bɔɔ dʋɔn thɩɩkɛɛ pɩ bɔ. Jʋ khadara dʋɔn Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ wa khɩɩnɩ yaya a na thii, mɛ̃ ga ha thɩ̃ɩkɛɛ pɩ bɔ dakha.
Mɛ̃ mɛr tibili Bikuun na thɔ̃ ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ, dɩ wa tiir ɩ̃ fãgadaarɩ dɩra wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n cʋɛnɩ tɩbɩla dɩ wa-n bara, na wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ sopugo,
a na dʋʋrna wɩ dɔɔraakɛ jʋɔnɔnɩ dɩɩ ka bɩnɔ na faa, ka wa bɩnɩ wa-n yɩrna nyɩma.
Liir dɩphã tɩɩ sarasɔ na-n carã awɩ Thɩ fãgadaarɩ dɩra mɔ̃ wire n caranɩ. Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu dɩ nɩna, dɔ a na-n pɛ nũu.
Ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ, gɩ hʋrɛ lẽle thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ keranɩ lɔɔ. Dɩ tibilikɛ yɛ gɩnɩ, a-n kerore sɩ dɩ jal na daʋ, dɩ dolõ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ a hananɩ dɩ thena lɩɛɛle.
Ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ wo, gɩ hʋrɛ ƴaƴabɩdaarɩkɛ hanɩ dɛ ƴaallɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a yɩnɩ dɛ bireekɛ khiinoni the nʋɔ ka, a-n jaal dɩ dolõ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ a hananɩ dɩ thena dɛ bireele.
Ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ wo, gɩ hʋrɛ thʋ̃ pherdaakɛ wɩ dʋnanɩ lanyʋɔnna, dɩɩ fʋ thʋ̃ caar dɩɩdɩɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ gɩ hini, thʋ̃ pherdara n hallɛ thena gẽgerena, sa too a phiir gɩrɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ a pɛ daʋ, sa dʋʋrna gɩrɛ na bʋɔnɔna' a faa.
Mɛ̃ ga ha thɩɩkɛɛ pɩ bɔ. Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ na ɩna na lee tɩɩ puusɔ tɩɩ sarasɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn,
sɩ na dʋʋrna wɩ dɔɔraakɛ jʋɔnɔnɩ dɩɩ ka a na faa, ka wa bɩnɩ wa-n yɩrna nyɩma.
Nɩ jɩrɛ kɩrʋ gɩrɛsɔra fɛʋ dɩphã gaa? Dɩ wɩ tu: Ɔɔ, sɩ jɩrɛ kɩrʋ.
Dɩ a so warɛ ayɩ: Gɛr gɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaar wo jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaarɩkɛ 'lɛnɩ dɩɩrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ ƴũ fãgadaar doda, a hor cɔdaar kuunikɛ n tenɩ ɔɔ lẽle thɩna thɩ̃ phana na thɩ̃ tɩna.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju mɩɩnɩ ga sokpasɔɔkɛ pɩ, gɛr a ɩɩrɔ le a jal.
Dɩ a kɛrrɛ bir kɔ̃ ɔɔ dʋɔ, a ma da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, dɩ mɛ̃ nʋɔ kpaa wɩ dɩ wa-n so ayɩ: Ka kpɛsɛ caakɛ na nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ caakɛ a-n cʋʋnɩ the?
Ga do ɔr dʋɔn thɩr khaadaarɩ bikuunaa? Ga do ɔɔ nɩ wɩ-n we Marɩaa? Dɩ ga do Jakɩ, na Jojɛfɩ, na Sɩmɔ̃, na Juudi dɔ ɔɔ õkuunsɔaa?
Dɩ ɔɔ õkhɛrsɔ fɛʋ wo na ha kha na sɛrɛaa? Dɩ ka a yɩ gelesɔra fɛʋ?
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ beesuu. Dɩ Jeju so warɛ ayɩ: Paar fɛʋ Thãgbaa bobon na-n 'lee cʋrɛ, saagado ɔɔ dʋɔ na ɔɔ cɔ gaaga.
Dɩ aa-n cʋʋ le nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ jɔa', gɩdonɩ wa-n pɩɛ haara'.
Ga bɔɔlera Ɛrɔɔdɩ fãgadaar buu kɔɔ nɩɛ mɔ̃ Jejuu i the n kpaarnɩ, a so ɔɔ thɔ̃darara ayɩ:
Jã Batɩsɩtɩ gɩ, ɔr ɩrɛ a the khirera, gɛr gɩ dɩ puno da-n cʋʋ ga nɔ kpaa thɩ̃sɔɔle.
Gɩdonɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩra kɔɔ fʋrɛ Jã a li a to khaɩra. A cʋʋrɛ thale gɩ da Ɛrɔdɩadɩraakɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ õkuun Filipii khɛr.
Gɩdonɩ Jã n kɔɔ sʋʋraarɛ dɩ yɩ: Ga teena dɩ fa tee afɩ õkuuni khɛr na hea'.
Dɩ a-n ƴaalɛ a kʋʋ, sɩ dɩɩ do tibil jɔ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ maar na-n fʋʋ, gɩdonɩ wɩ-n hɩɩnɛ Jã dɩ do Thãgbaa bobon.
Sɩ wireekɛ wɩ kɔɔ kɔnɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ, ga wiile daan dɩ wɩ hana fɛtɩ; le Ɛrɔdɩadɩɩ bikhɛr lõ da-n sa bɩna wɩrɛraakɛ wɩ wenɩɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ gɩ kɔɔ dar Ɛrɔɔdɩra;
dɩ mɛ̃ a kɔɔ ʋlfɛ ayɩ, ɩna haarɛ thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ a na bɩɛlnɩ.
Dɩ ɔɔ nɩ kɔɔ tʋɔrɛ pɛr ayɩ ayɛ: Pɛ mɩ kɩɛr dapaara Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ yʋ kpɛ̃kpɛrɛ̃ biro.
Dɩ haar n kɔɔ helle fãgadaarɩle, sɩ gɩdonɩ ɔɔ ʋlfɛɛle na wɩrɛ a wenɩ fɛtɩra dɔ nɔɔ, dɩ so ayɩ, wɩ hanaa.
Dɩ a thʋɔn khaɩra dɩ wɩ jal a kʋ Jã a kur yʋʋ.
Dɩ wɩ gbaar yʋʋra a pɛr kpɛ̃kpɛrɛ̃ biro a pɔna ha khebir, dɩ khebir gba jalna ha ɔɔ nɩ.
Dɩ Jãa kpãkpãadara pɔr a gba khire a dʋ, sa jal a mɩɛ Jeju.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju nɩɛnɩ gele, a faarɛ sa gba gborõo a the le, a jal dɩkhãa pa bəənnə, dɩ tibil jɔ nɩɛrɛ a the dɩɩsɔra a kpaaraa na nɛɛ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a-n thenɩ gboroona, a yɩrɛ tɩbɩlaale tə̃tə̃tə̃ dɩ wa-n kʋʋ bʋɔ, dɩ a kpɛɛrɛ awɩ khodara.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ dʋɔrnɩ, kpãkpãadara tɔr pʋɔraa a sʋʋraa: Paarɩkɛra sɩ hanɩ bəənnə gɩ, dɩ bɔɔ 'lire kar. Bɩlanɛ tibil jɔɔkɛra, wɩ jal dɩ biisɔra, wɩ the dɩkɔ wɩ kho.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Ga teena wɩ kɔna ga, nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ n hana wɩ dɩkɔ wɩ kho.
Dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa: Sa hana thɩ̃ɛ saagado buru yemɔɩ na thʋma yenyɔ dɩbara gaaga.
Dɩ a sor: Nɩ gba ɛna ha mɩ.

Dɩ a sor tibil jɔraalera wɩ tɔɔ ka hʋɔn hanɩ. Dɩ a gbaar buru yemɔɩɩlera na thʋma yenyɔɔle, a gba ƴɩɛ ƴũ sa bɩɛl Thãgba pɛr. Sɩ agɩpɩ, dɩ kuur burura a ha kpãkpãadara, dɩ kpãkpãadara gba tɩnɛ tibil jɔɔle.
Dɩ wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ khor a hi phi, sɩ wɩ gbaar dakuruukɛ wɩ tɩnɛnɩ sa sɩ, dɩɩ hi kpona yʋɔr yenyɔ.
Sɩ wɩrɛ kɔɔ khɔnɩ, wɩ thɔɔrɛ kona gbɩlanɩ yemɔɩ, sɩ wa ther khɛra na bɩsana a pɛra'.
A gele pɩ dapaara, Jeju tɔr ɔɔ kpãkpãadara pɛr, dɩ wɩ lõ gboroona wɩ kʋʋlʋʋ ƴɩɛ wɩ iir gɩ̃ iiro, ɔbɔɔkɛ a na-n bɩlanɩ tibil jɔɔle.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a bɩlanɩ tibil jɔɔle pɩ, a gbaar jal jʋʋn gɔ̃gʋɔna dɩbara a bɩɛl Thãgba. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ dʋɔrnɩ, a hale dɩbara.
Sɩ gborõo 'lire ha mɩɩr nɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ nyʋɔn ubi dɩ ga-n be gborõole, gɩdonɩ jɩɛ wɩ telẽ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ n lɔrnɩ wɩllɛ, Jeju gbaar da-n pɔ ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara da-n ɩɩr mɩɩr nɔ nyʋɔnna ƴũ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩɩnɩ da-n ɩɩr nyʋɔnna ƴũ, maar fʋlɛ wɛr dɩɩ ka, dɩ wɩ sor aa: Khĩdidaar ga do. Dɩ gɩdonɩ maar fʋlɛ wɛr, wɩ mar dɩ wa-n hulẽ.
Dɩ Jeju so war dapaara ayɩ: Nɩ pɩɛr 'lar mɛr Jeju gɩ, na-n do maar n fʋ na'.
Dɩ Pɩɛr birsee: Kɔ̃tɩn, ado fɛr gɩ, sɔ mar ɩ̃ ɩɩr dakha mer nyʋɔnna ƴũ ɩ̃ pɔ far.
Dɩ sʋʋraa: Ɩna. Dɩ Pɩɛr the gboroona a ɩɩr nyʋɔnna ƴũ da-n jal Jejura.
Sɩ mɔ̃ a yɩnɩ jɩɛ dɩ ga-n the na fãga maar fʋʋrɛ, dɩ a mar da-n mʋʋ nyʋɔnɔ a hulẽ aa: Kɔ̃tɩn, taa mɩ.
Dɩ dapaara Jeju 'laa nyɔ̃ɔ fʋʋ sa sʋʋraa: Fɛr ha pɛ 'lũdaar, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fa-n baalɔ?
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ lonɩ gboroona jɩɛ kurre.
Dɩ wɩrɛ hanɩ gboroona pɔr a gburõku, dɩ wa-n fʋɔr Jeju dɩ wa-n sona aa: Sobɔr gɩ, Thãgbaa Bikuun fɩ do waa gel.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ iirni iiro pɩ, wɩ jaal a dã Jenejarɛtɩ khʋra.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla paarɩlera jɩnɩ Jeju, wɩ thɔnanɛ thɩmɩa paar fɛʋ ga bənəəle. Dɩ wɩ kpar khodarasɔ fɛʋ a pɔnanaa.
Dɩ wɩ-n phʋʋrʋʋrɛ a ha nɩ hʋɛ ɩna-n thar ɔɔ kẽkẽ nɔrarakɛ dɩbara dɔrɔɔm. Dɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ kɔɔ thaaraanɩ, awɩ kho kpɛɛrɛ.
Le jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ the Jerujalɛm a pɔ Jejuu pa a bulee:
Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ afɩ kpãkpãadarasɔ na-n kʋɛ asɩ mama kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ so? Gɩdonɩ a wa kho dɩkor, wa-n phʋɔl awɩbara ga.
Dɩ birse wi: Sɩ nɛrɛ dakha, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n kʋɛ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ dɩɩ do anɩ mama kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ so hɩɩn dɔ kɩrʋ?
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba sor ayɩ: “Na cɔ afɩ thɩ na afɩ nɩ” dɩ “ado ntɛ nɩɩr ɔɔ thɩ, a ɔɔ nɩ gɩ, wɩ kʋɔ.”
Sɩ ner n yɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛ na sɔnɩ ɔɔ thɩra agɩbo ɔɔ nɩra nayɩ: Thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ ma kɔɔ ha fɩnɩna gɩ bul fi, gɛr mɩ gba dɩɩ do Thãgbaa khaarda;
wa tibilile na hana a cʋ ɔɔ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ bã; dɩɩ do mɛ̃ anɩ mama kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ so cʋʋ Thãgbaa so dɩɩ debi do mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ.
Nɛr bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, sobɔr Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩ kɔɔ so anɩdara ger waa, gɩdonɩ a sor ayɩ:
“Nɔfaar tibil ca ƴɩrɛ n cʋna mɛr Thãgba pɔɩ, sɩ dɩ awɩ ha hʋnɔna mɩ fĩi.
Fʋɔrɛɛkɛ wɩ-n fʋɔr mɩnɩ, mɔlɔ gɩ, gɩdonɩ jɔfʋʋkɛ tɩbɩla pɛrnɩ wɩ-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla.”
Dɩ Jeju wer tibil jɔ dɩ wɩ pɔ dɩ so war: Na-n pɛ nũu a jɛ kɩrʋ.
Ga do gɩrɛ n lonanɩ tibil nɔɔ, gɛr na cʋgɛɛ dɩ na bisə', sɩ gɩrɛ n kanɩ the tibili nɔɔ, gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ na cʋgɛɛnɩ dɩ na bise.
Dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara tɔr pɔ a sʋʋraa: Fɩ jɩrɛ dɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ fɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ dor nɛ baradaa jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarara bɛ?
Dɩ birse wi: Thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ ɩ̃ Thɩ ƴũ na diirnə', nɛɛ wa phɩɩrna na faa.
Nɩ sɛ war. Yara wɛ dɩ wa-n thɔɔ yara. Ado yaarʋ na thɔɔ yaarʋ, wɛr yenyɔ fɛʋ na jiire kõkorro.
Dɩ Pɩɛr bulee: Mɩɛnɛ sɩ sokpaakɛɛ kɩrra.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Nɛrɛ dakha, jaa jɩɩr 'lũ ner dakha wo koe?
Na jɩ gɩ dɩɩ do thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n lonanɩ tibili nɔɔ, bucuurə gɩ-n ka ɓo, sɩ agɩpɩ dɩɩ the cuuəə?
Sɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ n thɛnɩ tibili nɔɔ gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ n thɛnɩ haarra, dɩ gɛr dɔ gɩrɛra n cʋɛnɩ tibil dɩ bise.
Gɩdonɩ tibil haarra, le kpɩɛr puu n the, na tɩɩ kʋr, na khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaalɛ na kũu kpɩɩ ƴaalɛ, na bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ, na yuur, na sõso so jɩɩr, na tibil i kʋɛrɛ.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ tibil dɩ bise, sɩ a fa phʋɔl afɩbara ga, sa kho dɩkor, gele na cʋʋ tibil da bisə'.
Dɩ agɩpɩ, Jeju the le a jal lõ Tɩɩr na Sɩdɔ̃ khʋra.
Dɩ hɩnɛ Kanãa khɛr gɩ, a ha ga khʋraalera, a pɔ da-n hulẽ ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun, jɛ mɩ bʋɔra. Ɩ̃ bikhɛr hale dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbuu na-n hʋɔlɔ jɔɔ ka.
Sɩ Jeju na deeraa nʋɔa', dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara tɔ pɔ a sʋʋraa: Weaa a kɔ̃, gɩdonɩ a-n kɩɛr sɛr nʋɔ khiro kpɛ.
Dɩ birse wi: Thãgba na thɔ̃ mɩ saagado Ɩjɩrayɛl caraakɛ bureni a ho banaa gaaga.
Sɩ khɛrɩle pɔr a gburõkuraa ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, ɩna taa mɩnakɛ.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Ga bɔr dɩ fa gba bɩsanaa dɩko na pɛ benana ga.
Dɩ khɛrɩle bir birsee: Sobɔr gɩ wer Kɔ̃tɩn, sɩ bebe n khorrakɛ dakurusɔɔkɛ awɩ hɩ̃hɩ̃sɔ na-n khonɩ dɩ ga-n jaal le dɩko kho paar thʋnɔ.
Dɩ le Jeju sʋʋraa: Sobɔr gɩ khɛr, afɩ ha pɛra waa gɩ kɔ̃tɩnɛ. Mɔ̃ fɩ-n ƴaalnɩ, ɔmɛna ga ha. Dɩ wa bɔraalera dɩɩ do ɔɔ bikhɛr kpɛɛrɛ.
Agɩpɩ Jeju faa paarɩle sa gbana Galile mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔ da-n jal. Dɩ le a jal a jʋʋn gɔ̃gʋɔna a too.
Dɩ le wo tibil jɔjʋɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃ pʋɔraarɛ na nɛ kʋɛdara, na tãdara, na yarasɔ, na nɔ madarasɔ, na wɩ̃ khodaar kpɩɩ jɔɔ. Dɩ wɩ pɔna wɛr a der ɔɔ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn dɩ a kpɛɛ wɛr.
Dɩ mɛ̃ nʋɔ kpaa tibil jɔɔle mɔ̃ wɩ yɩnɩ nɔ madara dɩ wa-n mɩɩ thɩmɩa, na tãdara dɩ wɩ kpɛɛna, dɩ nɛ kʋɛdara na-n sa bɔɔbɔɔ, yarasɔ bir wa-n yɩ. Dɩ tibil jɔɔlera n dʋbɩrɛ Ɩjɩrayɛl Thãgbaa i.
Dɩ Jeju wer ɔɔ kpãkpãadara a so war ayɩ: Bʋɔ fʋ mɛr tibil jɔraakɛ, gɩdonɩ wire yẽther ha gɩrɛ wɩ toona mɩnɩ, sɩ wa hana thɩ̃ɛ na khoa'. Dɩ ma ƴaal ɩ̃ bɩlã wɩ na kɔmɛra' agakpaana ga khabɩ wɛr hʋɛra.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara sʋʋraa ayɩ: Mɔ̃ sa fʋ sɩ na yɩ kɩɛr dɩkɔ bəənnə thaa, dɩ ga taa bʋɔ dɩ tibil jɔ ca ƴɩrɛ na kho na hi?
Dɩ Jeju bule wi: Buru yemɔ̃ nɩ hana? Dɩ wɩ birsee: Makonyɔ gɩ na thʋ̃ yɩra ɩkha.
Dɩ a sor tibil jɔraalera wɩ tɔɔ thʋnɔ;
agɩpɩ dɩ gba buru makonyɔɔlera na thʋmaalera. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba pɛr pɩ, a kuure a ha ɔɔ kpãkpãadarasɔ, dɩ kpãkpãadara gba a tɩnɛ tibil jɔɔlera.
Dɩ wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ khor a hi phi, sɩ dakurusɔɔkɛ sɛnɩ kpona makonyɔ wɩ kɔɔ gba dɩɩ hi.
Sɩ wɩrɛ kɔɔ khɔnɩ dɩkɔɔlera, wɩ kɔɔ daan kona gbɩlanɩ yenã, sɩ wa ther khɛra na bɩsana a pɛra'.
Agɩpɩ dɩ bɩlã dɩphã tibil jɔɔle sa lõ gboroona, a gba da-n jal Magadã khʋra.
Dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara, na wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala', pɔr Jejura dɩ wa-n fifiləə a bulee a nɛ nar nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ thãgbara ƴũ.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Dʋɔrɔ nɩ-n sor aa, thãgba na pəbire wire, gɩdonɩ ƴũ bɩsɩrɛ.
Dɩ duuro dɩ nɩ yɩ aa, thãgba na ɩnɛ nĩ, gɩdonɩ ƴũ dor ndɔlɔ̃pa sɛ haar. Nɩ-n punone dɩ nɩ jɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ n hanɩ thãgbara ƴũ, sɩ na-n ka dɩ nɩ puno jɩ jenasɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ bɔɔkɛɛda ga.
Nĩdaraakɛ puuroni thakɛ, kɛ faanɩ awɩ Thãgba, n ƴaalɛlakɛ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ, sɩ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ kpɩɩ na bir na yɩ saagado Jonasɩɩ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ gaaga. Agɩpɩ a faa wɛr sa jal.
Sɩ kpãkpãadara n kɔɔ iire sa diinə buru gbaar.
Dɩ Jeju so war ayɩ: Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ na-n tɛ̃tɛna jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ na wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na halaa taba'.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara ma dɩ wa-n mɩɩ kha awɩ ha ayɩ: Gɩdonɩ sa kɔɔ gba buruə', gɛr gɩ.
Dɩ Jeju jɩ mɔ̃ wɩ-n mɩɩnɩ kha a bule wi: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n mɩɩ kha anɩ ha, nɛr ha pɛ 'lũdara aa, na kɔɔ gba buruə yaa?
Jaa na jɩ kɩrʋ paa koe? Na jɩna buru yemɔɩɩkɛ tɩbɩla gbɩlanɩ yemɔɩ kɔɔ khonɩ na kpõ nʋɔɔkɛ nɩ kɔɔ uulnəə?
Na buru makonyɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla gbɩlanɩ yenã kɔɔ khonɩ na kpõ nʋɔɔkɛ nɩ kɔɔ uulnəə?
Mɔ̃ gɩ fʋ sɩ dɩ na jɩ kɩrʋ pa? Ga do burudaa mɩ mɩɩ na'. Sɩ na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na halaa tabɩra.
Dɩ le wɩ jɩ dɩphã dɩ mɔ̃ a yɩnɩ wa-n dɔ bʋrɛ, ga do buru cʋʋ tabɩɩr ga, sɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na halaa dɩɩr a so.
Dɩ mɔ̃ Jeju danɩ Sejare Fihpi khʋra, a bulele ɔɔ kpãkpãadara thɩ̃ɛ thakɛ ayɩwɔɔ: Amɛ tɩbɩla n yɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun ka dor?
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Ɩkha n yɩ, Jã Batɩsɩtɩ fɩ do. Wɛ n yɩ, Elɩ fɩ do. Wɛ n yɩ wo, fɛr dɔ Jeremɩ agɩbo Thãgbaa bobon bɩɛl.
Dɩ bule wi: Sɩ ner, amɛ nɩ-n yɩ mɩ dor?
Dɩ Sɩmɔ̃ Pɩɛr birsee: Fɛr dʋɔn Kirisiti Thãgba yidaarɩ Bikuun.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Gɩ da farɛ Sɩmɔ̃ Jonasɩɩ bikuun, gɩdonɩ ga do tibil kpɩɛrɛra gɩ the dɩ fɩ jɩ thɩ̃ɛɛka', sɩ ɩ̃ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũ gɩ.
Sɩ mɛrɛ, mɩ so farɛ: Ga boka kɔ̃tɩnaakɛra ma ɩɩr ɩ̃ we gbɛbɩdara, sɩ fe wer Pɩɛr fa-n do (i kɩrʋ dʋɔn bokaar), dɩ khĩdi dʋɔɔ fãgasɔ na mar na kəə war kpɩɩraka'.
Ma ha fɛr ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩɩ lakilesɔ, dɩ gɩrɛ fa lini thɩɩra, oti ga li Thãgbaa dʋɔ dakha, sɩ gɩrɛ fa thʋbɩnɩ thɩɩra, oti ga thʋbɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ dakha.
Dɩ a kpãkpaanɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ, wa-n so tibillə dɩ Kirisiti ha na'.

Liir Jeju ma dɩphã da-n so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara casɩ, mɔ̃ ɔr teenanɩ a jala Jerujalɛm, kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ n gaarʋʋ jɔɔ, sɩ wɩ kʋʋ dakha, sɩ wire yẽther wirera a na ɩɩrɛ na the khirera.
Sɩ Pɩɛr kpaarɛ kana pa kpɩɩ, a ma da-n phaanʋʋ ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, Thãgba na thʋ̃ na tu dɩ thɩ̃ɛ tha.e na dã fɩ kpɩɩa'.
Sɩ Jeju kɛr a so Pɩɛrra ayɩ: Hala mɩ ƴɔɔ Satã. Fɛr dɔ mar nɛ baradaa, gɩdonɩ ga do Thãgbaa kpɩɛr fɩ-n kpɩɛra', sɩ mɔ̃kɛ tibil n kpɩɛrnɩ gɩ.
Le Jeju so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara ayɩ: Ado ntɛ pɛr haar ɩna-n kpa mar, dɔ a faa dɩbara yɩrnanɛ, sɩ a gba ɔɔ kʋkʋ thɩr a na-n kpana mar.
Gɩdonɩ tibilikɛ n kanɩ dɩ hana bʋ dʋr na ɔɔ yi, ga ka na buurəəre. Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛɛ yi na bonɩ mɛrɛra, ɔr na ka na 'lɛ gɩ waa gel.
Gɩdonɩ anyee bɔ ca ga taa tibil, ado a 'lɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ, sɩɩ do ɔɔ yi buurəəre? Dɩ agɩbo anye haankɛ dɩ tibi na gba na debina ɔɔ yi?
Gɩdonɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na bire na ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ Thɩɩ i dʋbɩ nakha ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ. Liir ma ka tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl thɩ̃ɛ dɩ ga mɩɛna mɔ̃ ntɛɛ thɔna hanɩ.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ɩkhasɔ wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩ kɩɛr na khiir, sɩɩ do wa yɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun ɔbɔɔkɛ ma-n ɩnɩ ɩ̃ gba fãga gaaga.
A wire maadõ ka pɩ, Jeju kpar Pɩɛr na Jakɩ na Jã Jakɩɩ õkuun, dɩ wɩ jal kha pa kpɩɩ a jʋʋn gɔ̃gɔ̃ gbaana.
Dɩ Jejuu tomɩ debire awɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ ɔɔ ƴɛ na-n carbara mɔ̃ wire n carbaranɩ, ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ debi a bulolo phõphõphõ mɔ̃ dahɩrɛ n hanɩ.
Dɩ hɩnɛ Mʋɩjɩ na Elɩ kɔɔ the warɛ dɩ wa-n khʋɛ kha na Jeju.
Dɩ Pɩɛr so Jejura: Kɔ̃tɩn, gɩ bɔrɛ sɩ hanɩ kɩɛr. Ado fɩ ture, ma dʋrɛ waa yẽther kɩɛr, bɩɛl n do afɩda, bɩɛl n do Mʋɩjɩɩda, bɩɛl n do Elɩɩda.
Mɔna a hanɩ mɩɩrɔ, ndɔlɔ̃pa bulo phɩphɩphɩl gbune a thi war. Dɩ hɩnɛ nʋɔ ther le ndɔlɔ̃paarrara ayɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛra dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, a lõ mer haar kpɛ. Na-n pɩɛ nũu.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ kpãkpãadara nɩɛnɩ nʋɔɔle, wɩ jiire sumo thɩɩra, gɩdonɩ maar fʋlɛnɛ wɩ jɔɔ ka.
Sɩ Jeju tɔr dã wɩ a tha war sa so war: Nɩ ɩrɛ, na-n do maar n fʋ na'.
Dɩ wɩ gbaar ƴɩɛ na hɩɩn, wa yɩ tibil saagado Jeju gɩ dɩbara gaaga.
Mɔ̃ wɩ thenɩ gɔ̃gʋɔna dɩ wa-n gbũ, Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ thakɛ ayɩ: Na-n gba thɩ̃ɛɛlera nɩ yɩnɩ a mɩɩ tibil bɩɛllaka', phaphapha mɛr tibili Bikuun n ɩɩr ɩ̃ the khirera.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ bulele Jeju ayɩ: Dɩ a thale gɩ, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na-n so ayɩ: Elɩ kɔɔ teana a ɩna ɓo?
Dɩ birse wi: Sobɔr gɩ wer, Elɩ na ɩna na wɛbɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ.
Sɩ mɩ so narɛ Elɩ kɔɔ mãa ɩɩn sɩ wa kɔɔ jɩa', sa cʋgʋʋ mɔ̃ wɩ pɛrnɩ haar. Dɩ ɔmɛna wa gaar gɩrɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun.
Dɩ liir kpãkpãadara jɩ dɩphã dɩ Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩda a mɩɩ wɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ danɩ tibil jɔ, kũu bɩɛl pɔr agulẽga Jejura a sʋʋraa:
Kɔ̃tɩn, jɛ ɩ̃ bikuun bʋɔra, gɩdonɩ ji khidaar gɩ da-n gaar jɔɔ ka. Dɩ wire wire a-n ji dɔɔ na nyʋɔnɔ.
Dɩ mɩ kɔɔ kpaarɛ ha afɩ kpãkpãadara, sɩ wa kɔɔ punoo a kpɛa'.
Dɩ Jeju birse: Nɛr nĩ babala na puu cʋʋdaraakɛɛ, ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ ma thʋ̃ na toona nɩnakɛ gɩ dana? Dɩ ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ ma thʋ̃ na fʋ nar haarrarakɛ gɩ dana? Nɩ kpaa ɛna mar kɩɛr.
Dɩ Jeju mananɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbuule dɩ the bɩsaannaale, dɩ dapaara a kpɛɛrɛ.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara tɔr pɔ Jejura a bulee hɛllɩ ayɩ: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ ser na kɔɔ puno a wee kɔ̃tɛɛbuulera a fa ga?

Dɩ Jeju birse wi ayɩ: Gɩdonɩ anɩ ha pɛ na kpɛra', gɛr gɩ. Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ado nɩ hananɛ ha pɛrɛ dɩɩ ho seneve bireekɛ n hanɩ fɩɩʋ, na punone na so gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ nayɩ: Ǝlə kɩɛr a jala pal, dɩ a na əlle na jal. Dɩ thɩ̃ bɩɛl na hale dɩ na thʋnɔ kpɩɩraka'.
[Sɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbu ca ʋrɛ na ha therra na the, saagado Thãgba bɩɛlɛ gɩ na nɔ lirəə ga.]
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ dɩ wa-n kpaar Galile, Jeju so warɛ ayɩ: Wa fʋrɛ mɛrkɛ dɔnɩ tibili Bikuun na ha tɩbɩla,
dɩ wa kʋ mɩ, sɩ wire yẽther wirera ma ɩɩrɛ a na the khirera. Dɩ wɩ gbobire jɔɔ ka.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara danɩ Kapɛrnayʋm dɩɩ, wɩrɛ n gbaannɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ lãpho wer Pɩɛr a bulee ayɩ: Anɩ dɩɩrdaarra, a-n lɩmɩnɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ lãpho bɛ?

Dɩ birse wi: Ɔɔ, a-n lɩmɩnɛ. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Pɩɛr lonɩ cʋɔrɔ, Jeju kɔɔ kʋʋlɛ ƴɩɛ a bulee: Sɩmɔ̃, mɔ̃ fɩ-n kpɩɛr? Fãgadara thɩɩra, anara wɩ-n tee lãpho, dɩ agɩbo anara dʋɔnyɛ̃ n tee war? Awɩ bɩsãsɔra wɛ yaa, kpakpalala wɛ?
Dɩ birsee: Kpakpalala wɛ. Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Dɩ gɛr gɩ, bɩsana na hana lɩmɩnɛ na lɩma'.

Sɩ mɔ̃ sa cʋʋnɩ sɩ gɩ do sa do war nɛ baradaa ga, jala dɔna thʋ̃ pheru mɩɩr nɔ nyʋɔnɔ, sa hala te caca thʋmɩkɛ fa fʋnɩ. Khɛraa nʋɔ. Fa yɩrɛ le war bireekɛ na dananɩ tɩbɩla yenyɔɔ lãpho lɩmɩ. Te jalana a 'laanɛ ɩ̃da na afɩda.
Ga bɔɔlera kpãkpãadara tɔ pɔ Jejura, a bulee ayɩ: Amɛ dɔ kɔ̃tɩn a jɔrakɛ fɛʋ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra?
Le Jeju we bɩsã buu dɩ pɔ dɩ thɩɩnʋʋ awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn sa so:
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ado na debi a ho bɩsã biə', na lõ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra yuuraka'.
Gɛr gɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na debanɩ na wur na ho bɩsã buukɛ, ɔr na dɔ kɔ̃tɩn na jɔ fɛʋ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩra,
dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na teanɩ bɩsã buu ʋrɛɛ khaa kɛ, dɩɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ, mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ a tee.
Nã kɔ̃tɩ̃ tə̃ə juur tibillə fʋɔrɔ wɩ dʋnanaa wɩ faa lanyɔ̃ hulõ paar, baar gɩrɛɛkɛ a na kanɩ na cʋʋ dɩ bɩsã biikɛ pɛ mɩnɩ haar dɩ bɩɛl na bara.
Ga puure tɩbɩlala thɩɩra gɩrɛraakɛra nɛ baradaa hanɩkɛ. Nɛ baradaa werrakɛ dɔ ga-n hale, sɩ ga puure tibilləəkɛ n cʋɛnɩ dɩ ga-n hale.
Ado afɩ nyɔ̃ agɩbo afɩ nɔ do far baradaa, kuro dɔna faa ƴɔɔ. Gɩdonɩ a fɩ 'lɛ yire khorr na nyɔ̃ bɩɛl agɩbo nɔ bɩɛl, gɩ baar nyɛ̃ɛ yenyɔ agɩbo nɛɛ yenyɔɔkɛ fa hananɩ, sɩ wɩ dʋna fɩ wɩ faa khorr dɔɔra.
Dɩ ado afɩ yi dɔ far baradaa, te dɔna faa ƴɔɔ. A fɩ 'lɛ yire khorr na yi khoroo, gɩ baar yinə yenyɔɔkɛ fa hananɩ sɩ wɩ dʋna fɩ bu paar dɔɔra.
Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ na-n beesi bɩsã biisɔɔkɛ bɩɛllaka'. Gɩdonɩ mɩ so narɛ, awɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ hale Thãgbaa dʋɔ ɩ̃ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũu ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn bɔɔ fɛʋ.
[Gɩdonɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun ɩnɛ ɩ̃ taa wɩrɛɛkɛ bureni.]
Mɔ̃ nɩ-n kpɩɛr? Ado tibil hana banaa tamaa dɩ bɩɛl bu, a na sɩ tamaa phe birera gɔ̃gʋɔna sɩ a jal a ƴaal ʋrɛ bonəə?
Sobɔr mɩ so nar ado a yɩɩ, ga dʋʋraarɛ daʋ a na jɔ tamaa phe bireekɛ na burenə';
mɛ̃ gɩ, anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩle ƴũ, aa-n tu dɩ bɩsã biikɛ bɩɛllakɛ n buə'.
Ado afɩ omi cʋʋ sopugo, jala dɩbara a nɩɛraa ɔɔ sopugo. Ado a pɛ fɛr nũu, ga dor fɩ cʋʋrɛ afɩ omi dɩ kɛr bir.
Sɩ ado aa pɛ fɩ nũə', kpa tibil bɩɛl agɩbo yenyɔ a jalana, dɩ mɛ̃ “sɔɔle ɓibi na gʋʋr mɔ̃ sobɔ so jɩdara yenyɔ agɩbo yẽɩher yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ ha.”
Dɩ ado a bor wele nũ pɛrɛ, gba gɩ dɩphã a sɔ we gbɛbɩdarara. Dɩ ado a bor we gbɛbɩdara nũ pɛrɛ, dɔ dɩphã a ho far thilaar na war gbadaar.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na lini kɛ thɩɩra, ɔmɛ̃ ga li Thãgbaa dʋɔ. Sɩ thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na thʋbɩnɩ kɛ thɩɩra, ɔmɛ̃ ga thʋbɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar wo, ado tɩbɩla yenyɔ nɛrɛra na tu kha nɔ bɩɛl kɛ thɩɩra, thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩɛnaakɛ wa bɩɛlnɩ ɩ̃ Thɩraakɛ hanɩle ƴũ, a na ha wɛr.
Gɩdonɩ kãkɛ tɩbɩla yenyɔ yẽthersɔ gbɛbɩnɩ kha na ɩ̃ i, le mɩ-n ha awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Le Pɩɛr tɔ dã a bulee ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, ado ɩ̃ omi cʋʋ mɩ puure, balamɔ̃ ma faa na haa? Nyɛ̃be makonyɔ ga dã ya?
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Ga do nyɛ̃be makonyɔ mɩ so fara', sɩ nyɛ̃be makonyɔ der paar kpalãther yʋɔr mɩ so.
Gɛr gɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ, gɩ hʋrɛ fãgadaarɩkɛ ƴaalɛnɩ a ther war ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔɔ pa a hɩɩn.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a manɩ da-n ther, wɩ kpar tibil bɩɛlɩkɛ hanaanɩ helu gbɩlanɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ der paar gbɩlanɩ a pɔnanaa.
Dɩ mɔ̃ aa hananɩ thɩ̃ɛ a na lɩma', ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ yɩ dɩ wɩ dolonee, ɔr na ɔɔ khɛr, na ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ, na thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ a hananɩ a lɩma heluulera.
Dɩ thɔ̃daarɩle jire a gburõku ɔɔ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn sa sʋʋraa: Fɔ haar sɩ ma lɩmɩ fɛr fɛʋ.
Dɩ bʋɔ fʋrɛ thɔ̃daarɩlee kɔ̃tɩna, dɩ faa helula a haa, sa sɩɩraa dɩ jal.
Mɔ̃ thɔ̃daarɩlera gbanɩ da-n jal, a caananɛ ɔɔ 'walãkha bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n donanɩ kha thɔ̃ bɩɛl, kɛ hanaanɩ dakha helu war be yenãsɔ. Dɩ a fʋʋrɛ a khɩmɩ ulebire sa so: Lɩma mɩ heluukɛ fɩ hana mɩnɩ.
Dɩ ɔɔ 'walãkhaale jire ɔɔ ƴɛra da-n phʋʋrʋʋ ayɩ: Fɔ haar sɩ ma lɩmɩ fɛr.
Sɩ a bor sa jalnaa a to khaɩra phaphapha dɩ lɩmʋʋ ɔɔ hella.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ ɔɔ 'walãkhasɔ yɩnɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛɛle danɩ thale, bʋɔ fʋlɛ wɛr jɔɔ ka. Dɩ wɩ gbaar gɩrɛɛkɛ dananɩ fɛʋ a jalna a mɩɛ awɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃.
Le kɔ̃tɩn wɩɩ dɩ pɔ dɩ sʋʋraa: Eɛr thɔ̃daar puu, mɩ kɔɔ faarɛ afɩ hel fɛʋ a ha fɩ, gɩdonɩ fɩ kɔɔ phʋʋr mɛr.
Dɩ fɛrɛ dakha ga teena fɩ jɛ ʋrɛ nɩ donanɩ kha 'walãkha tibil thɔmana bʋɔra, mɔ̃ mɩ kɔɔ jɩ fɩnɩ bʋɔra gaa?
Dɩ nĩkhii fʋrɛ ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩle, dɩ gbaa 'laa gardɩ hɔ̃hɔlala wɩ hʋɔlaa phaphapha a bir a lɩmɩ dakha ɔɔ hella fɛʋ.
Thale ɩ̃ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ ƴũ na cʋʋ na nɛrɛ, ado nɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl yɩ, na-n faa anɩ omii dɩ pa na haar fɛʋ a na haa ga.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju mɩɩnɩ thɩmɩaakɛ dɩɩ pɩ, a ther Galile a jal Jude khʋra, Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩr iiro.
Dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃ kɔɔ kpaaraarɛ, dɩ le a kpɛɛ wɩ khoo.
Dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ pʋɔraarɛ dɩ wa-n fifiləə ayɩ: Hʋɛ hale dɩ tibil na faa ɔɔ khɛr gãgã dɔɔraakɛrakɛ a yɩɩraanɩ ya?
Dɩ birse wi: Na kɔɔ yɩɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra, dɩ “kuun na khɛr thɩ̃ Tidaar kɔɔ cʋʋ caca fʋ paaraa”?
Mee a kɔɔ sor ayɩ: “Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ kuun na lee kha na ɔɔ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ, sɩ a ɓã kha na ɔɔ khɛr, wɛr yenyɔ n gbɛbɩ wɩ do tibil bɩɛl.”
Gɩ do mɛ̃ wa do yenyɔ bã, sɩ wɩ coore kha a do bɩɛl. Gɛr gɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba coornɩ dɩɩ do bɩɛl, tibil na-n lee ga.
Dɩ wɩ bulee wo ayɩ: Dɩ a thale gɩ, mɔ̃gɩdo sɩ dɩ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ 'laa hʋɛ ayɩ: “Kuun n hana ɔɔ khɛr he kuur sɛbɛ sa weaa a faa?”
Dɩ birse wi ayɩ: Anɩdara khiinoni dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ 'laa hʋɛ nɩ wea anɩ khɛrsɔ na faa. Sɩ caca fʋ paar, ga kɔɔ ha thaka'.
Sɩ mɩ so narɛ, tibil wo tibilikɛ na faanɩ ɔɔ khɛr, sɩ ga do kũn kpɩɩ ƴaalɛ ga, sa bir he khɛ kpɩɩ, khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaal sopugo a cʋʋ.
Dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara sʋʋraa aa: Dɩ ado thale thɩɛna na ha kuun na khɛrra, gɩ baarrakɛ dɩ tibil na he khɛra'.
Dɩ birse wi: Tɩbɩla fɛʋ na tu thɩmɩɩrɩka', sɩ wɩrɛ dɩbara wɩ hanɩ punone.

Gɩdonɩ wɛ hale kɛ awɩ nɩsɔ kɔnɩnakɛ dɩ wɩ do kʋ̃bʋʋ, sɩ wɛ hale wo kɛ tɩbɩla cʋʋnɩ dɩ wɩ do kʋ̃bʋʋ. Wɛ hale wo ƴũ fãgadaar doda donɩ nɔɔ dɩ wɩ too kpakpaar. Gɛr gɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ punoneni a na tu thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ, a to.
Dɩ tɩbɩla kɔɔ gbaar bɩsã bii a pɔna Jejura a dɛɛnɛ war nyɛ̃ɛ sa bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba pɛ war. Sɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ phaanɛ wɩrɛ pɔna wɩnɩ.
Dɩ Jeju sor: Nɩ dɔ bɩsã bii na-n ɩ̃ mar, na-n pɩɛr Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ hɔnɩ bɩsana, wɛr ƴũ fãgadaar do mana.
Dɩ a dɛ̃ɛ warɛ nyɛ̃ɛ sa the le a jal.
Le tibil bɩɛl tɔ pɔ a bule Jeju ayɩ: Dɩɩrdaar, anye dɔ thɩ̃ bʋɔɔkɛ teananɩ ɩ̃ cʋɛ a 'lɛ yire khorr?
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fa-n bule mi gɩrɛraakɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ? Bɩɛl dɩbara haanle kɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ. Ado fɩ-n ƴaalɛ fɩ 'lɛ yire khorr, na hɩnɛ Thãgbaa jɔfʋsɔ.
Dɩ bulee: Gɩmɔ̃ɔ jɔfʋ? Dɩ Jeju birsee aa: “Fa-n kʋ tibilə', fa-n hana khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaala', fa-n hana kũu kpɩɩ ƴaala', fa-n yuə', fa-n sõso pɛ tibilə',
na cɔ afɩ thɩ na afɩ nɩ, dɩ na na dakha afɩ 'walãkha tibil mɔ̃ fɩ-n nanɩ afɩbara.”
Dɩ daɓolbirile sʋʋraa: Mɩ kɔɔ mãa nɩ ga jɔfʋraale fɛʋ nũu, anye sɛ mɩ cʋʋrɛra 'lo?
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Ado fɩ-n ƴaalɛ fɩ bʋɔnɔ a ka, jala dolone gɩrɛ fɩ hananɩ, a gba hana bɔdara, dɩ mɛ̃ fa 'lɛ lẽle thɩ̃ɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, agɩpɩ fɩ ɩ̃ fa-n kpa mar.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ daɓolbirile nɩɛnɩ ga thɩmɩɩle, a gbure ƴɩɛ da-n kɔna, gɩdonɩ lẽledaar gɩ na sobɔr.
Dɩ Jeju so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara ayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ƴũ fãgadaar dɩ lʋʋn khɩɩrɛ lẽlera.
Mɩ bire ma-n 'loro wo: Nyɔɔmɛɛ lõokɛ a na lonɩ mɩsɩmɩ kaarra, ka yɔɔrɛ jɔ lẽlee Thãgba fãgadaar dɩ lõ.
Mɔ̃ kpãkpãadara nɩɛnɩ gele, nʋɔ kpaa wɛr jɔɔ ka, dɩ wa-n so ayɩ: Dɩ a thale gɩ, amɛ na punonenakɛ a na 'lɛ taarɛ?
Dɩ Jeju hɩɩn wɩ sa so war: Ado tɩbɩlala wer gɩ, thɩ̃ punonaa ga, sɩ Thãgba wer, ɔr n punone thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ.
Le Pɩɛr gba thɩmɩa a sʋʋraa: Dɩ hɩnɛ, sɛrɛ sɩ faarɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ sɩ sa-n kpa far, anye sa yɩrɔ gɩrɛ kper?

Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ado mɛr tibili Bikuunna gɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ thɩ̃ɛ na birni na wɛbɩ ga-n do daphaa, dɩ ma too ɩ̃ i dʋbɩ too paraakɛ dɔnɩ fãga too paar, nɛrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ kpaanɛ marnɩ na toore dakha fãga too pa yʋɔr yenyɔra, sɩ na-n kɩɩlna Ɩjɩrayɛl ca yʋɔr yenyɔ.
Dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ ɩ̃ i na donɩ nɔɔ dɩ na faarɔ ɔɔ cɔ, a ɔɔ õkuunsɔ wɛ, a ɔɔ õkhɛrsɔ wɛ, a ɔɔ thɩ gɩ, a ɔɔ nɩ gɩ, a ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ wɛ, a ɔɔ lɛ gɩ, a na 'lɛr thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ a na 'lɛna yire khorr dakha.
Sɩ tibil jɔjʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ ƴɛ kʋla, wɛr na fien na do sɩka pɩra, sɩ sɩka pɩra jɔɔ n fi wɩ do ƴɛ kʋla.
Gɩdonɩ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ gɩ hʋrɛ cɔdaar kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ thɛnɩ cʋɔrɔ duuro phiphiphi, da-n ƴaal thɔ̃ dona a pɛr ɔɔ lɔɔ.
Dɩ wɩ gʋʋrɛ kha na thɔ̃ donaale dɩɩ do a na ha wɛr wi bɩɛl thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ lɩmɩ, agɩpɩ dɩ thɔ̃ wɩ ɔɔ lɔɔ.
Dɩ a ther khɛ yɔ kpãa bɔɔ a yɩ wɩ̃ tibil, dɩ wɩ too ƴatɔɔ mɔlɔ.
Dɩ so war: Nɛrɛ dakha, nɩ jala ɩ̃ lɔɔ, agɩpɩ ma ha nɛr gɩrɛɛkɛ na teana nɩnɩ.
Dɩ wɩ jal. Dɩ a bire the wo ʋlkhɔɔ na mɔ̃ wire ɩnɩ da-n dʋɔr a cʋʋ ɔmɛna wo.
Dɩ dʋɔrɔ a bire the wo a yɩ wɩ̃ tibil ɩkhasɔ dɩ wɩ too, dɩ bule wi. Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ nɩ too kɩɛrra dɩ wire na-n pɩna, sɩ na-n do thɔma ga.
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Tibil na gba sɩ thɔma ga, gɛr gɩ. Dɩ a so warɛ: Nɛrɛ dakha, nɩ jala ɩ̃ lɔɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wire n lonɩ, cɔdaar kuunilera hɩnanɩ lɩɛra sor ɔɔ thɔ̃daraa hɩɩndaarra ayɩ: Wɛ thɔ̃ donana a lɩma wɩ awɩ war, sɩ kɔɔ fɔna sɩka pɩra a danana ƴɛ kʋla.
Wɩrɛ kɔɔ jalanɩ thɔmana dʋɔrɔ, wɛr bɩɛlbɩɛl 'lɛr wi bɩɛl thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ lɩmɩna oti.
Dɩ ƴɛ kʋla pɔr pɩpɩɩ paar dɩ wa-n kpɩɛr waa, ɩna 'lɛr jɔɔ, sɩ wɛr bɩɛlbɩɛl dakha 'lɛr wi bɩɛl thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ lɩmɩna oti.
Dɩ mɔ̃ wɩ 'lɛnɩ thale, wɩ ɩɩrnanɛ khʋ̃ɛ cɔdaar kuunnaale dɩ wa-n so ayɩ:
Wɩrɛ pɩrɔnɩ a ɩ̃ a cʋʋ lɩɛr bɩɛl dɩbara, fɩ hɩɩn wɛr dɩɩ ka mãkhana sɛrkɛ vɔɔnɩ thɔmana, dɩ ɩtʋɛ be sɩ dakha ga do kpãkpalã ga.
Dɩ birse tibil bɩɛl wɛrra: Ɩ̃ kuun wei, ma dɩ far fɩɩʋraka'. Ga do mɔ̃ sɩ gʋʋrnɩ kha fɩ kɔɔ ture wi bɩɛl thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ lɩmaa?
Gba gɩrɛ dɔnɩ afɩda a kɔna. Mɛr ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ ha ʋrɛ dɔnɩ sɩka pɩr mɔ̃kɛ mɩ ha fɩnɩ.
Ma hana hʋɛ na cʋʋna ɩ̃ thɩ̃sɔ mɔ̃kɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnaa? Agɩbo fɩ-n bel mer gɩdonɩ mɩ hananɛ ha bulo filɛ ya?
Dɩ Jeju so war ayɩ: Mɛ̃ sɩka pɩra na fi na do ƴɛ kʋla, sɩ ƴɛ kʋla n fi wɩ do sɩka pɩra.
Mɔ̃ wɩ hanɩ hʋɛra dɩ wa-n jal Jerujalɛm, Jeju kpar kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ dɩ wɩ ha kha pa kpɩɩ, dɩ le hʋɛrara a so war ayɩ:
Nɩ hɩnɛ, Jerujalɛm sɩ-n jal gɩrɛ, ka wa fʋnɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na ha bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ, dɩ wa pɛ mar so kʋnanɛ,
sɩ na gba mɩ na ha ca kpala, dɩ wa mãa mɛr, wa ciil mer dakha na khasa, sɩ wɩ gba mɩ wɩ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra. Sɩ wire yẽther wirera ma ɩɩrɛ na the khirera.
Le Jebedee bikonaa nɩ pɔ na ɔɔ bikuunsɔ a gulẽga sa bɩɛl Jejura dɩkha.
Dɩ bulee ayɩ: Anye fɩ-n ƴaal? Dɩ birse Jeju: A fɩ gba fãga, 'laanɛ hʋɛ dɩ ɩ̃ bikona yenyɔɔkɛ bɩɛl n too afɩ nyɔ̃bɔra, bɩɛl n too afɩ nyɔ̃bɩlana.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Na jɩ gɩrɛ nɩ-n bɩɛlna'. Na punone na yɔ thɩ̃ yɔnanɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ bɔ gaarɛɛkɛ ma yɔnɩ ya? Dɩ wɩ birsee: Ɔɔ, sa punone.
Dɩ a bire birse wi wo: Sobɔr gɩ wer, na punone na yɔna ɩ̃ thɩ̃ yɔnada. Sɩ ado ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔ toora gɩ, na ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɩlã toora, ga do ɩ̃ pa gɩ ha dɩ ma 'laa hʋɛa', sɩ wɩrɛ dɩbara ɩ̃ Thɩ gbɛbɩrɔnɩɩda gɩ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ kpãkpãadara yʋɔrɩle kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ gele, nĩkhii kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr õkona yenyɔraale.
Dɩ Jeju we wer dɩ wɩ pɔ, dɩ so war ayɩ: Nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ ca kpalaa fãgadara n ʋʋnɛ tɩbɩlala kpɛ, dɩ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩna n cʋʋ warɛ fãga dɩɩ pho ka.
Sɩ na-n ka jɩna mɛ̃ gɩ ha anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩna'. Sɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩnɩ-n dɔ kɔ̃tɩn, dɔ ɔr n ka a do anɩ thɔ̃daar.
Sɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩnɩ-n dɔ ƴɛ kʋl anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɔ ɔr n ka a do anɩ dee.
Dɩ mɛ̃ mɛr tibili Bikuun ɩ̃, ga do dɩ tibil na do mar thɔma ga, sɩ mɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ ka ɩ̃ do thɔma ɩ̃ 'laana ɩ̃ yi gɩ birse tɩbɩla bərəəm.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n thenɩ Jeriko, tibil jɔjʋɔ bərəəm kɔɔ kpar Jejura.
Dɩ yara yenyɔ kɔɔ hale a too hʋ nʋɔra. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ dɩɩ do Jeju n ka, wɩ mar dɩ wa-n hulẽ ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun, jɛ sɩ bʋɔra.
Dɩ tibi. jɔɔle mana wɛr ayɩ, wɩ pɩra. Sɩ wɩ bire jɩɩ hulẽ kheu ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun, jɛ sɩ bʋɔra.
Dɩ Jeju jɩɩl sa we wɩ a bule wi: Anye nɩ-n ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋɛ nar?
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Kɔ̃tɩn, asɩ yi sɩ-n ƴaal gɩ khɛra.
Dɩ bʋɔ fʋ Jeju dɩ tha awɩ yirə, dɩ dapaara dɩ wɩ bir yɩ dɩ wa-n kpaaraa.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n wɔrɔnɩ Jerujalɛm a dã Bɛtɩfaje khʋra, gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔɔkɛ hananɩ olɩvɩ thɩra, le Jeju thɔ̃ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yenyɔ a so war:
Nɩ jala dɩɩraakɛ nɩ pɛnɩ ƴɩɛ. Na yɩrɛ dapaara kũkə̃ nɩɩ dɩ wa li na daɓolʋ. Nɩ thʋba a kpa wɩ ɛna ha mɩ.
Dɩ a tibil bule ni thɩ̃ɛ, nɩ sʋɔraa ayɛ: Kɔ̃tɩn n ƴaalɛ; dɩ dapaara a na sɩ warɛ dɩ na kpa na ɩna.
Dɩ thɩ̃ɛ thakɛ daan gɩ cʋʋ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobon sonɩ gɩ ha oti.
“Nɩ sɔ Sɩyɔ̃dara ayɛ: Nɩ hɩnɛ anɩ fãgadaar n pɔr nɛrɛra. Hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ hiirəəre dɩ jʋʋnna kũkə̃ nɩɩ, kũkə̃ ɓolʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ thɔ̃ do nʋmɩ bi.”
Dɩ kpãkpãadara jaal a cʋʋ gɩrɛ Jeju yɩnɩ wɩ cʋɛ.
Dɩ wɩ kpar kũkə̃ nɩrɛ na daɓolʋ a pɔna, a gba awɩ kẽkẽsɔ a dɛ̃ɛ war, sa cʋʋ Jeju dɩ jʋʋn.
Dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ n belle awɩ kẽkẽ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ dɩ wa-n pɛ hʋɛra, sɩ wɛ cɩ thɩr jɛ̃ɛ dɩ wa-n pɛ hʋɛra.
Dɩ tibil jɔɔle kʋʋlɛ Jeju ƴɩɛ, wɛ na-n kpaan khiro, dɩ wa-n hulenasɔ ayɩ: “Ojana, Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun. Bɔnanɛ n hana ʋrɛraakɛ n ɩnanɩ gɩrɛ na Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i. Ojana thãgbara ƴũ pər.”
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju lonɩ Jerujalɛm, dɩɩ fɛʋ kɔɔ tutugore, dɩ wa-n bule ayɩ: Amɛɛ tibil ca ha olela ya fɛ?
Dɩ tibil jɔɔle birse wi ayɩ: Jeju Thãgbaa bobon gɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Najarɛtɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ Galile dɩɩ.

Dɩ Jeju lʋʋn Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna. A weele wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n dolonenɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔ, na wɩrɛ n thɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛ le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ, a tʋɔrna war debidarasɔɔ tabalsɔ a kpɛɛ, na kʋlã puu dolõdaraa too pasɔ,
sa so war: Mee gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Mɛr Thãgbaa cɔ wa-n we mɛr Thãgbaa fʋɔr pa”, sɩ dɩ ne wer cʋʋ gɩ dɩɩ do yu hɔ̃hʋɔldaraa wɔ̃ pa.
Dɩ yarasɔ na nɛ kʋɛdara pɔr le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, dɩ Jeju kpɛɛ wɩ.
Sɩ nĩkhii fʋlɛlɛ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ mɔ̃ wɩ yɩnɩ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛsɔɔle a-n cʋʋnɩ, na mɔ̃ bɩsanasɔ n huleni le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ ayɩ:

Ojana, Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun. Dɩ wɩ buleele: Fɩ nɩɛrɛ gɩrɛra wɩ-n sonɩɩ? Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Ɔɔ, mɩ nɩɛrɛ. Sɩ a bire bule wi: Na kɔɔ yɩ ga thɩmɩɩ caakɛra Thãgbaa sɛbɛra kpɩɩaa ya? Mee gɩ sor: “Fɛr Thãgba n teere khɩɩrɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ bɩsã yɩrasɔ na ilẽ mamasɔɔ nɔra.”
Agɩpɩ a faa wɛr sa the dɩɩra a jal Betanɩ, kãkɛ a cɔnɩ.
A dɩɩ kɔɔ wɩl, mɔ̃ Jeju kɛrnɩ da-n bir le dɩɩra, kɔmɛr fʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ a yɩnɩ thɩr khonanɛ hʋɛra, a gbaar pɔ, sɩ aa yɩɩraa thɩ̃a', fa haar gɩ dɩbara. Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju so thɩrʋʋlera ayɩ: Fa se yuurakɛ bã. Dɩ dapaara thɩrʋʋle khi.
Mɔ̃ kpãkpãadara yɩnɩ thɩ̃ɛ thale, nʋɔ kpaa wɛr dɩ wɩ so aa: Mɔ̃ thɩrʋʋle fʋ sa khi dapaara thale ya fɛ?
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ado nɩ hananɛ ha pɛrɛ sɩɩ do na-n baalɔa', ga do gɩrɛ dananɩ thɩrʋʋkɛ dɩbara na cʋa', sɩ adorakɛ na so gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ ayɩ: Ǝlə kɩɛr a je pal lanyʋɔnna ga cʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na bɩɛlnɩ Thãgbara na ha pɛrɛ, na yɩ gɛr.

Dɩ Jeju gbaar jal lõ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a hanɩ da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ, bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na tɩbɩlaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ pɔr a bulee ayɩ: Ka hʋ caakɛra fɩ hananɩ dɩ fa-n cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛra the, dɩ amɛ hana fɩ hʋɛɛkɛra?
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Ma bule ner mer dakha thɩ̃ bɩɛl. Ado nɩ birse mi, mɛrɛ dakha ma so narɛ hʋ ca ʋrɛ mɩ hananɩ, dɩ ma-n cʋʋna thɩ̃ ca gɩrɛsɔra.

Jãa yɔ kpɛɛ, ka gɩ the? Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ yaa, tɩbɩlaa pa gɩ the? Dɩ wɩ mar dɩ wa-n bana kha awɩ hasɔ ayɩ: Ado sɩ tu wo ayɩ: Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ the, a na bule ser nayɩ, dɩ anye dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ sa kɔɔ pɛ ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haara?
Dɩ ado sɩ tu wo ayɩ: Tɩbɩlaa pa gɩ the, sa 'lɛr sor na tibil jɔɔkɛ gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ kɔɔ gbaar Jã dɩ do Thãgbaa bobon.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ birse Jeju: Sa ja'. Dɩ a so warɛ dakha ayɩ: Dɩ a thale gɩ, ma so nar mer ka mɩ yɩnɩ hʋɛ dɩ ma-n cʋʋna ga thɩ̃sɔɔka'.
Mɔ̃ nɩ-n kpɩɛr? Kũu bɩɛl gɩ a kɔɔ hana bikona yenyɔ, dɩ a sor cacadaarra ayɩ: Ɩ̃ bɩsã, jala nĩ lɔɔ a kʋlɛ mɩ.
Dɩ birsee: Ma jala'; agɩpɩ dɩ debi kpɩɛrɛ sa jal.
Dɩ bir so balanyɔdaarra ɔmɛna. Dɩ birsee: Kɔ̃tɩn, ma jaal, sɩ aa jala'.
Wɛr yenyɔraale, ʋmɔ̃ cʋɛ ɔɔ thɩɩ tuur? Dɩ wɩ birsee: Cacadaar gɩ. Dɩ Jeju so war ayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, war gbadara na bɔdɛlasɔ, wɛr fien kʋʋl nɩ ƴɩɛ dɩ wa-n lõ Thãgba fãgadaarɩ dɩra.

Gɩdonɩ Jã kɔɔ ɩnɛ anɩ pa a nɩ nar fɩl sar hʋɛ, sɩ na kɔɔ pɛ ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haara'; sɩ war gbadara na bɔdɛlasɔ wɛr pɩɛr ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haar, sɩ nɛrkɛ kanɩ yɩ gɩ, na debirakɛ haar pɩpɩɩ paar sa pɛ ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haara'.

Nɩ pɛ kɛ sokpa kpɩɩ nũu wo. Cɔdaar kũu bɩɛl gɩ, a kɔɔ cʋʋ nãkʋɔr a bã dãgbol diiro, a kpena dakha bi cɔrɔ paar sa mɩ bɛbɛr cɔ gbãa. Agɩpɩ dɩ gba nãkʋɔr hɩɩndara a pɛr wa-n hɩnɛ ɓo, sa gba jal kpaar paar.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ gɩ ɩnɩ dã bi khʋ̃ bɔɔ, a thʋɔn ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔ wɩ jala nãkʋɔr hɩɩndarara, a tea war nãkʋɔr thɩr be a pɔna.
Sɩ nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaraalera fʋlɛlɛ thɔ̃daraale, a bɩɩr bɩɛl sa kʋ bɩɛl wo, sa dʋʋrna bɩɛl bokana.
Dɩ a bire thɔ̃ wɩ̃ thɔ̃dara dɩ wɩ jɔ cacadaraale, sɩ nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaraalera cʋʋ wɛr otirə wo.
Pɩpɩɩ paar dɩ thɔna war dɩphã ɔɔ bikuun sa so: Wa cʋrɛ ɩ̃ bikuun.
