Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaraale 'laanɩ yɩ bikuun, wɩ mɩɩrɛ kha awɩ ha ayɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛ na dʋɔn thɩ̃ hɩn, nɩ dɔ sɩ kʋʋ, sɩɩ do sɛr hɩna thɩɛna.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ fʋʋ a dʋna nãkʋɔr khuirə sa kʋʋ.
Nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã, ado nãkʋɔr kɔ̃tɩn pɔ, anye a na cʋʋ nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaar ca wele?
Dɩ wɩ birsee ayɩ: A na kʋʋrɛ te puule sɩ bʋɔ na fʋʋa', sɩ a gba nãkʋɔr a ha nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaar kpɩɩsɔ wo, kɛ na khʋnanɩ be wa-n haa ɔbɔɔkɛ ga ɩnɩ ga-n se.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Na kɔɔ hɩɩn gɩrɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sonɩ yuuəə ya? Mee gɩ sor ayɩ: “Bokaarɩkɛ cɔ mɛ kɔɔ bonɩ debire a do go tɩ bokaar. Sɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ pa thɩ̃ɛɛlera the, dɩ sɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ do sar thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ.”
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so nar ayɩwɔɔ: Thãgba na taa narɛ ɔɔ fãgadaarɩ dɩ na ha caarɩkɛ na-n sɩɛnnɩ beekɛ na dɔnɩ Thãgba fãgadaarɩ dɩda.
[Dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na jenɩ bokaarraalera a na khaarɛ; sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ bokaarɩlera na jironi ga cʋ̃banʋʋnɛ pɛrɛ pɛrɛ pɛrɛ.]
Ɔbɔɔkɛ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ bu dʋdarasɔ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ sokpaasɔɔle, wɩ jɩrɛ dɩ wɛr Jeju kɔɔ so.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ hʋɛ wɩ fʋʋra, sɩɩ do maar kɔɔ fʋɔn wɩ tibil jɔraale, gɩdonɩ wɩ gbaar Jeju dɩ do Thãgbaa bobon.
Dɩ Jeju bire gba thɩmɩa wo da-n mɩɩna wɩ na sokpaa ayɩ:
Yũ fãgadaar do, gɩ hʋrɛ fãgadaarɩkɛ kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ fɛtɩ ɔɔ bikuuni herra.
Agɩpɩ a thʋɔn ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔ wɩ jala wɛ wɩrɛ wɩ kɔɔ soronɩ wɩ pɔ he fɛtɩrara, sɩ wa kɔɔ tu na pɔa'.

Dɩ a bire thɔ̃ thɔ̃daar kpɩɩsɔ wo a so war ayɩ: Nɩ sɔ wɩrɛrara wɩ wenɩ ayɛwɔɔ: Nɩ hɩnɛ, mɩ gbɛbɩrɛ he fɛtɩ dɩkorra pɩ, mɩ kʋʋrɛ nakena, a kʋʋrna nʋ̃ ƴɩkhasɔ wa khʋɔn kpãkpalã ga; thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ gbɛbɩrɛ pɩ, nɩ ɩna he fɛtɩrara mɛ̃.
Sɩ wa thernanakɛ werɩle wɩ we wɩna'; sɩ ʋ n gbaar da-n jal ɔɔ lɔɔ, ʋ n gba da-n jal ɔɔ ƴabɩ pa.
Sɩ wɛ fʋ thɔ̃dara a hʋɔlɔ sa kʋʋr wɩ.
Dɩ nĩkhii fʋrɛ fãgadaarɩle dɩ thɔ̃ ɔɔ sɔrasɩsɔ, dɩ wɩ bũburõ tɩɩ kʋʋrdaraalera sa thii wi dɩɩ.
Dɩ agɩpɩ a sor ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔrara ayɩ: Gɩdonɩ he fɛtɩ dɩkɔ gbɛbɩrɛ pɩ, sɩ wɩrɛ wɩ kɔɔ wenɩ dɩ ga do wɩ teena gɛra',
gɛr gɩ, nɩ jala hʋ lee paarsɔ a wɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ nɩ yɩnɩ, wɩ ɩ̃ he fɛtɩra.
Dɩ thɔ̃daraale ɩɩr jal hʋɛsɔrara a khɩɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ yɩnɩ, tɩɩ puusɔ na tɩɩ bɔɩsɔ, dɩ welela wɩ wenɩ a pɔna wɩ hire he dɩko kho paar.
Dɩ fãgadaarɩle lʋʋn da-n hɩɩn wɩrɛ tɔɔnɩ dɩko kho paarra, dɩ a yɩrɛ le kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ na tɔnɩ he kɩ̃kɩɩna'.
Dɩ a buleele: Ɩ̃ kuun, mɔ̃ fɩ fʋ sa lõ kɩɛr, sɩ fa to he kɩ̃kɩɩna'; dɩ kuunile pɩr pɔbɩ.
Le fãgadaarɩle so thɔ̃darara: Nɩ fʋɔnɛɛ a le nɛɛ na nyɛ̃ɛ a dɔna faa jɩɛra dabirə paar, ka wa bɩnɩ wa-n yɩrna nyɩma.
Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ wɩ wenɩ wɩ jɔrɛ kpɛ, sɩ wɩrɛ wɩ phiirni wa kpɛra'.
Le jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ jal dɩ wa-n gʋʋr kha, mɔ̃ wa fʋnɩ sɩ na nɔ Jeju thɩmɩɩraakɛ a na mɩɩnɩ.

Dɩ wɩ thʋɔn ɔɔ pa awɩ kpãkpãadarasɔ na Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ too, dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa ayɩ: Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sobɔ tibil fɩ do, dɩ fɩ-n dɩɩrɛ dakha Thãgbaa hʋ na sobɔr sɩ fa-n ma tibilə', gɩdonɩ fa-n hɩɩn tɩbɩla dɩɩdɩa';
dɩ gɛr gɩ sɔ sar mɔ̃ fɩ yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ ha. Gɩ teere kha dɩ sa lɩmɩ Sejaar lãpho yaa, ga tee kha ga.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ Jeju jɩrɛ awɩ bɩ̃ kpal thɩmɩɩ, a birse wer: Nɛr bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n fifilə mi?
Nɩ nɛ mar warɩkɛra nɩ-n gbanɩ dɩ nɩ lɩmɩ lãphora. Dɩ wɩ gba war birera a pɔna.
Dɩ a bule wer: Amɛ ha ʋrɛ fotoraakɛ, dɩ amɛɛ khere ha gɩrɛ?
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Sejaar gɩ. Dɩ mɛ̃ a so war ayɩ: Nɩ 'laanɛ Sejaarra gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Sejaarɩda, a 'laanɛ Thãgbara gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaada.
Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa wɛr thɩmɩɩraale wɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ, dɩ wɩ gba faa sa jal kɔ̃.
Ga wi bɩɛlɩlera Sadʋsɛ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala', pɔr Jejura a bulee bulele thakɛ ayɩ:
Dɩɩrdaar, Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sor ayɩ: “A tibil hana khɛr sa khi sɩ bɩsaan na hala', ɔɔ õkuun n gba khikhɛrʋʋlera a hɛ a kɔna bɩsana wɩ do ɔɔ õkuuni məl.”
Sɩɩ do õkona makonyɔ wɛ a kɔɔ hale asɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ cacadaar kɔɔ her khɛr a khi, sɩ gɩdonɩ bɩsaan na hala' dɩɩ do ɔɔ õkuunna a faa khɛrɩle mɛ̃.
Thalera gɩ kɔɔ ha na balanyɔdaar, agɩpɩ na balãtherdaar, a jalna thalera waa a ba dana makonyɔdaar.
A wele pɩ fɛʋ na pɩ, khɛr dakha khire.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ, ado khe na ɩɩrɛ na the khirera, ʋmɔ̃ wɛr makonyɔra na hɩna khɛrɩlera dɩphã gɩrɛ, gɩdonɩ wɛr fɛʋra kɔɔ hɩɛ.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Jaa, nɩ buure waa fĩi koe, gɩdonɩ na jɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ na Thãgbaa fãga ga, gɛr gɩ.
Gɩdonɩ ado khe na ɩɩr na the khirera, kona na he khɛra bã, dɩ khɛra dakha na he kona bã, sɩ wa hʋrɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔkɛ hanɩle Thãgbaa dʋɔ.
Sɩ ado khee ɩɩr gɩ, na kɔɔ yɩɛ le Thãgbaa sɛbɛra gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgba so narnaa?
Mee ayɩ: “Ɩnɛr dʋɔn Abɩrahamɩ Thãgba, na Ɩjakɩɩ Thãgba, na Jakɔbɩɩ Thãgba.” Thãgba na do khee Thãgba ga, sɩ wɩrɛ hananɩ yiree Thãgba a do.
Dɩ tibil jɔɔkɛ hande dɩ wa-n pɛ nũu, nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa wɛr Jejuu dɩɩrra.
Mɔ̃ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ dɩ wɩ yɩ, a cʋʋrɛ wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala', dɩ wa yɩ nʋɔ bã, wɩ kpar kha a pɔ.
Dɩ tibil bɩɛl wɛrraakɛ dɔnɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaar ɩɩrnanaa bule ʋrɛ wo, da-n fifiləə a hɩɩn ayɩ:
Dɩɩrdaar, ʋmɔ̃ dɔrakɛ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ a jɔ jɔfʋsɔ fɛʋ?
Dɩ Jeju birsee: “Dɔ fa-n na Kɔ̃tɩn afɩ Thãgba na afɩ bɩ̃ fɛʋ, na afɩ ha fɛʋ, na afɩ kpɩɛr fɛʋ.”
Ɔr dʋɔn cacadaa, kɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ a jɔ jɔfʋsɔ fɛʋ.
Dɩ yɛ kɛ balanyɔdaa wo kɛ n hʋɔnɛɛnɩ: “Dɔ fa-n na afɩ 'walãkha tibil mɔ̃kɛ fɩ-n nanɩ afɩbara.”
Jɔfʋ yenyɔraakɛ jɔfʋ fɛʋ na Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔ so jəəro yʋʋ fɛʋ.
Mɔ̃ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ kpanɩ kha a jɛ, Jeju bule wer thɩ̃ɛ ayɩ:
Anye nɩ-n kpɩɛrna Kirisiti? Amɛɛ bikuun a do? Dɩ wɩ birsee: Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun gɩ.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Dɩ mɔ̃ gɩ fʋ sɩ Thu Phuu cʋʋ Davɩdɩ da-n wɩɩ Kɔ̃tɩn, ɔbɔɔkɛ a sonɩ ayɩ:
“Thãgba sor ɩ̃ Kɔ̃tɩna ayɩ: Tɔɔ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra, phaphapha ɩ̃ cʋʋ afɩ lãlaardara wɩ do afɩ nɛ jəəda.”
Dɩ ado Davɩdɩ n wɩɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn thale, mɔ̃ a na fʋ sɩ na do ɔɔ bikuun?
Dɩ tibil bɩɛllakɛ na puno na deeraa ga. Dɩ a fʋna ga wiile tibil na-n 'la dɩ bulee thɩ̃ɛ bã.
Le Jeju kɔɔ mɩɩna tibil jɔɔle nakha ɔɔ kpãkpãadara ayɩwɔɔ:
Jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ fien gba Mʋɩjɩɩ too pa dɩ wa-n mɩɛ tɩbɩla jɔfʋ kɩrʋ.
Gɛr gɩ, nɩ hɩnɛ a na cʋɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ-n so narnɩ, sɩ na-n cʋʋ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ-n cʋʋna', gɩdonɩ nʋɔ wɩ-n sona sɩ wa-n cʋa'.
Wɩ-n lire heendaasɔɔkɛ dɩbarɔnɩ dɩ wɩ heen tɩbɩla, sɩ awɩ thɛthɛ na-n ƴaal wɩ tharna awɩ nyɛ̃ fɩɩʋraka'.
Wɩ-n cʋʋrɛ awɩ thɩ̃ fɛʋ tɩbɩla na-n yɛ wɩ. Gɛr n dɔ nɔɔ dɩ wɩ cʋʋ awɩ lo kɛra dɩɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃, dɩ wɩ cʋʋ dakha awɩ kẽkẽ kɔ̃tɩ̃ nɔsɔ dɩɩ gbaan jʋɔljʋɔl.
Wɩ-n nar ƴɛ kʋʋl too paar dɩko kho paar na ƴɛ kʋʋl too paar awɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔsɔra.
Wɩ-n nar tɩbɩla na-n fʋɔrɛ wɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ fʋɔrʋʋ a na wɛna wɩ dakha dɩɩrdara.
Sɩ ne wer, na-n do tɩbɩla na-n we nɩ dɩɩrdara ga, gɩdonɩ bɩɛl dɩbara 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ dʋɔn anɩ Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ omɩna nɩ do.
Dɩ na-n we tibil thɩɩra anɩ tha', gɩdonɩ bɩɛl dɩbara haanle kɛ dɔnɩ anɩ Thɩ, ʋrɛɛkɛ hanɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ.
Na-n do wa-n we nɩ kɔ̃tɩna ga, gɩdonɩ bɩɛl dɩbara haanle kɛ dɔnɩ anɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃, Kirisiti gɩ.
Sɩ ʋrɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩn anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn a jɔ, ɔr na ka na do anɩ thɔ̃daar.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ n kanɩ ire wa wuruure, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n wuroni dɩbara, ɔr wa ɩɩr.

Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ-n khaanɛ ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ hʋ tɩbɩlala, nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛɛkɛ yɛnɩ na-n lõa', dɩ wɩrɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ wɩ lõ wo na-n sɩ war wɩ lona ga.

[Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ-n phʋʋnɛ khikhɛra sɩɩ do fɩɩlɛ nɩ-n bɩɛlna Thãgba dɩ nɩ pʋɔrna ƴɛrr tɩbɩla na-n yɛ nɩ dɩphã. Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ so kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ na heen nɩ na khɩɩr na ka.]

Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ-n pɩrɛ paar fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ na lanyʋɔnna tɩɩ bɩɛlla nɩ cʋgʋʋ a fe a hɔ Juifi. Dɩ ado a debi pɩ, dɩɩ do nɩ ka cʋgʋʋrɛ dɩ do bu paarɩ bɩsã dɩ jɔ nɩ balanyɔ.
Ga puu narɛ nɛr thɔthɔɔda yarasɔɔkɛ n sɔnɩ dɩ nɩ yɩ: Ado tibil ʋlfɛna Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔr aa, ga do puure ga. Sɩ ado ntɛ ʋlfɛna dɛɛkɛ hanɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔr, a toorore.
Nɛr də̃bələ na yarasɔ, ʋmɔ̃ ka do dakɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ a jɔ? Dɛ gɩ yaa, Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɩkɛ n cʋɛnɩ dɛ dɩɩ do thɩ̃ phuu gɩ?
Nɩ sor wo ayɩ: Ado tibil ʋlfɛna bonɩ ji paar aa, ga do puure ga. Sɩ ado ntɛ ʋlfɛna bonɩ ji thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ dɛɛnɛnɩ bonɩ ji paar, a toorore.
Yara ha nɩ bã, ʋmɔ̃ ka do dakɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ a jɔ? Bonɩ ji thɩ̃ɛ gɩ yaa, bonɩ ji paarɩkɛ n cʋɛnɩ bonɩ ji thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ do daphuu gɩ?
Ʋrɛ ʋlfɛnanɩ bonɩ ji paar, bonɩ ji paarra a ʋlfɛna na gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ harɔnɩ.
Dɩ ʋrɛ ʋlfɛnanɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔr, Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrra a ʋlfɛna na ʋrɛ n cɔrɔnɩ.
Dɩ ʋrɛ ʋlfɛnanɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, Thãgbaa fãga too pa a ʋlfɛna na ʋrɛɛkɛ n tɔɔrɔnɩ.

Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ-n tire bɩɛl yʋɔr anɩ bi fara na anɩ thɩ̃ phulosɔraakɛ fɛʋ dʋɔnnɩ bii, sɩ dɩ nɩ ka hɛbɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩɩnaakɛ jɔfʋra a faa, kɛ dɔnɩ fɩl sarʋ, na bɔ jɩɩr, na sobɔ cʋʋrɛ. Sɩ gɛr ka do thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ nɩ kɔɔ teenanɩ nɩ cʋʋ, sɩ ga do wɩ yɩ nɩ hɛba gelela ga.
Nɛr thɔthɔɔda yarasɔ, nɩ-n tɛr cĩcinə a na faa, sɩ dɩ na-n dɩɩ nyɔɔmɛ.
Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ-n cɔcɔɔrɛ thɩ̃ yɔdaa na dɩko khodaa khiru, sɩɩ do bɩnɔ nɩ ka hire na thɩ̃ tagɩrɩ kpɩɛrɛ na dɩbara fʋ thʋnɔnɛ.
Fɛr jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaarɩkɛ yaarɛnɩ, dɔ fɩ cɔcɔɔ thɩ̃ yɔdaa na dɩko khodaa bɩnɛ ɓo, ɔmɛ̃ khiru na hɩrɛ.
Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ hʋrɛ kaakɛ wɩ calnɩ mɩlɛ, dɩɩ do jɩɛra wer gɩ bɔrɛ hɩɩnɛna, sɩ dɩɩ do bɩnɔ khi khubo he le na thɩ̃ bise caar fɛʋ.
Mɛ̃ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ ha; jɩɛra wer, nɩ-n hʋrɛ tɩɩ sara tɩbɩlala, sɩ bɩnɔ, bɩnɛ yenyɔ fɩlɛ he le na sopugo.
Ga puu narɛ nɛr jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, gɩdonɩ nɩ-n mɩrɛ Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔ ka, dɩ na-n gbɛbɩ tɩɩ sarasɔɔ ka gɩ bʋɔnɔ,
sɩ dɩ na-n so dɩ nɩ yɩ aa: Ado sɛr kɔɔ haanle asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ bɔɔle, sa kɔɔ tu awɩdaale a na deer Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔlee tɔmã'.
Thakɛrakɛ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ n nɩnanɛ, dɩ nɛr dʋɔn wɩrɛ kɔɔ kʋrɛnɩ Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔlee bɩsãsɔ.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ nɩ yɩra pɩɩrɛ anɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ thɔ̃ puurə mɛ̃.
Nɛr siisɔ, sikori bisɔ, mɔ̃ na cʋʋ sɩ na the so heenenaakɛ na jalana nɩnɩ bu paar dɔɔra?

Gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ma thɔna nar Thãgbaa bobonasɔ, na tɩɩ kpɛsɛsɔ, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ, dɩ na kʋʋrɛ ɩkhasɔ, na gba ɩkhasɔ na kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra, na ciil ɩkhasɔ na khasa awɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔsɔra, na kpoo warɛ dɩɩ wo dɩɩra;

dɩ mɛ̃ sor na heen nɩ dɩphã dɩ pa 'leedaraa tɔmɩnaakɛ fɛʋ, kɛ kɔɔ deerenɩ thɩɩraakɛ dɩɩ fʋna Abɛl tɩɩ sarʋʋ tɔmɩ̃ a jalna waa a ba dana Barasɩɩ bikuun Jakarɩɩ tɔmɩ̃, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ nɩ kɔɔ kʋnɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔr na bonɩ ji pa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, gele fɛʋ na heene nĩdaraakɛ sor.

Pha Jerujalɛm, Jerujalɛm, fɛrkɛ n kʋrɛnɩ Thãgbaa bobona, dɩ fa-n dʋʋrna wɩrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ thɔ̃ farnɩ bokana, balamɔ̃ balamɔ̃ mɩ kɔɔ ƴaal ɩ̃ gbɛbɩra afɩ too mɔ̃kɛ yɔl nɩɩ n gbɛbɩnɩ ɔɔ bisɔ dɩ thiro gbɛla, sɩ na kɔɔ tuə'.
Dɩ nɩ hɩnɛ dɩphã, wa faa narɛ anɩ cɔra dɩ ga do cɔ kpoloo,
gɩdonɩ mɩ so narɛ ayɩ: A fʋna nɛnɛ̃kɛ na yɩ mɩ bã, phaphapha gɩ dana bɔɔkɛ na sonɩ nayɩ: “Ʋrɛ n ɩnanɩ na Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i hɩna khɩɩrɛ.”
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju thenɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna da-n gba hʋɛ, ɔɔ kpãkpãadara tɔr pʋɔraa a nɩɩraa mɔ̃ wɩ mɩnɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩle.
Sɩ a birse wer ayɩ: Nɩ yɩrɛ gelesɔra fɛʋaa? Sobɔr mɩ so nar, na yɩ kɩɛr boka bɩɛl dɩ na bir na sɩ na dɛ̃ɛ ʋ̃ bokara ƴũ bã, fɛʋ na derre.
Mɔ̃ Jeju toonɩ gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ hananɩ olɩvɩ thɩra, kpãkpãadara kɔɔ pɔr a bulee hɛllɩ: So sar bɔɔkɛ gelela na danɩ, na gɩrɛ na dɔnɩ afɩ bir ɩ̃ bɔ jẽ, na thɩɩkɛɛ pɩ bɔda.
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ, na-n do tibil n fɩɩl na';
gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla bərəəm na gbaar ɩ̃ i na ɩna wa-n so wɩ yɩ, ɩnɛr dʋɔn Kirisitira; dɩ mɛ̃ wa fɩɩl tɩbɩla jɔɔ.
Na nɩɛrɛ ko thɩmɩasɔ, na nɩɛrɛ wa-n mɩɩ aa, kʋʋr na hale. A nɩ jɩ, na-n do maar n fʋ na', gɩdonɩ dɔ gele n kɔɔ dã, sɩ ga do gɛr na dʋɔn thɩ pɩ paar pa'.
Ʋ ca na ɩɩrɛ a na-n kena ʋ̃ ca, ʋ̃ fãgadaarɩ dɩ bɩɛl n ɩɩr a na-n kena ʋ̃ fãgadaarɩ dɩ kpɩɩ. Dɩ kɔmɛ kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na thɩ jɩɩnsɔ na hale paar dɩɩdɩɩsɔ dakha.
Sɩ gele fɛʋ bɔ gaarɛɛ fʋ pa gɩ dɩbara.
Ɔbɔɔle tɩbɩla na fʋlɛ nɩ a na gaar nɩ bʋɔ dɩ wa kʋʋr nɛr, dɩ tibil caar fɛʋ na-n laar nɛr, gɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ ga do nɛ baradaa tibil jɔjʋɔra, dɩ tɩbɩla na-n liire khasɔ wa-n laarna khasɔ dɩɩdɩɩ.
Sõso bobonasɔ na ɩɩrɛ wa-n fɩɩl tɩbɩla bərəəm.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ puure na jɔrɛ ga-n pɛr, ga dor nɔɔ dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ na hana naʋ bã.
Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na yɩranɩ na dana khu paar, ɔr na 'lɛ taarɛ.
Sɩ dɔ wɩ mɩɩ ƴũ fãgadaar tutugo bɔ thɩmɩɩkɛ thɩɩraakɛ koo, gɩ mɩɩ ha pɛdaa tibil caarra fɛʋ. Liir dɩphã na dɔ thɩ pɩ paar mɛ̃.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ ɔbɔɔkɛ na yɩnɩ thɩ̃ thuurnəəkɛ na kʋɛanɩ thɩ̃ɛ, kɛ Thãgbaa bobon Danɩɛl kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ dɩ ga ha pa phuurə (dɔ ʋrɛ n hɩnɛnɩ sɛbɛɛkɛ n dʋ gar bʋrɛ),
le wɩrɛ hanɩ Jude n fuo ca jala gɔ̃gʋɔna,
dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na hanɩ nãsʋrɔ a na-n gbũ cʋɔrɔ a gba thɩ̃a',
dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ dakha na hanɩ lɔɔ, a na-n kɛr bir a gba ɔɔ kẽkẽ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bã.
Ga wisɔɔle, ga puurore khɛ pɛmɛdarara na wɩrɛ n mamanɩ bibɔrɔsɔ.
Na-n bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba dɩ anɩ fuu bɔɔle na-n do yʋʋrɔa', agɩbo hɩɩr wirə'.
Gɩdonɩ bɔ gaarɛɛle na kɔ̃tɩnɛ na ka, bɔ gaar caa thale na kɔɔ hale kpɩɩrakɛ a fʋna bɔɔkɛ Thãgba tini thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ ba dana nɛnɛ̃ka', dɩ ga bir na halerakɛ kpɩɩ bã.
Ado wiresɔɔle na kɔɔ tɔ a gburoə', tibil bɩɛllakɛ na mar na ta ga, sɩ wɩrɛ Thãgba phiirni dɔ kɩrʋ da tɔ wiresɔɔle dɩ ga gburo.
Dɩ dabɔɔle ado tibil na so nar nayɩ: Nɩ hɩnɛ, Kirisiti har kɩɛr agɩbo a ha pal, na-n pɛr haara'.
Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ n sõsonenɩ dɩ wɩ yɩ, Kirisiti ha nɩ, agɩbo bobona ha nɩ, na ɩɩrɛ wa-n nɩna tɩbɩla nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na ma kʋ thɩ̃ɛsɔ, wa-n fɩɩlnanakɛ tɩbɩlaakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ phiirni, adora hʋɛ hale.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ kɔɔ mãa dɩ ma-n so nar gɩrɛ.
Ado wɩ so nar ayɩ: Bəənnə a ha, na-n jalaa dɛ, agɩbo: Du bɩnɔ a ha, na-n pɛ gɩ haara'.
Gɩdonɩ mɔ̃kɛ thãgba n lenɩ dɔɔ wi phã paar dɩɩ carbara a ka a dã wi lõ paar, thale mɛr tibili Bikuuni bir ɩ̃ na ha.
Kãkɛ thɩ̃ khire hanɩ, le dũusɔ na caan kha.
Ga bɔɔlera, a bɔ gaarɛ ka na pɩ, dapaara wire na birəre, por dakha na hɩrɛ bã, ƴepələ̃be na ther thãgbara ƴũ ga-n jɛ thɩɩra, dɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ fãgaakɛ hanɩ thãgbara ƴũ ga gbugbuyore.
Liiir dɩphã wa yɩ mɛr tibili Bikuuni jẽ dɩ ga yɩr thãgbara ƴũ, dɩ tibil caar fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ na-n bɩrɛ, gɩdonɩ wa yɩrɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun ma-n ɩ̃ na ndɔlɔ̃pana na fãga, na carbararɛ jɔɔ.
Dɩ ma thʋɔn ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ wa-n ʋ̃ tutuu kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, sɩ wɩ kpa wɩrɛ Thãgba phiirni, kɛ hanɩ kɩrrɔ, na gananɔ, na gɛla yenyɔra fɛʋ, wɩ jɛ pa bɩɛl gɩ fʋna ka thãgbara ƴũ khuni gɩ dana ʋ̃ khu pa.
Sɩ nɩ dɔ sokpaa thɩr khonanɛdara n dɩɩr nɩ thɩ̃ɛ. Ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ yɩnɩ ɔɔ jɛ̃sɔ dɩɩ ɓol a na thɔɔ fa ƴolo, nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ ubulo n wɩla.
Mɛ̃ gɩ, nɛrɛ dakha, ado na yɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔle fɛʋ, nɩ jɛ dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuuni ɩ̃ bɔ n daan, dɩ mɩ har lõfonɔɔ.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, nĩdaraakɛ na khiir koo, sɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ fɛʋ n dã ga.
Thãgbara ƴũ na thɩɩ na phor na ka, sɩ ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩsɔ na pho na ka kpɩɩraka'.
Sɩ ado wi jɩɩrra gɩ, na bɔɔkɛ ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ na danɩ, tibil bɩɛllakɛ na jɩ ga, thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔrakɛ le Thãgbaa dʋɔ wa ja', Bikuunnakɛ na ja', sɩ Thɩrɛ dɩbara jɩɛn gɩ.
Mɔ̃kɛ thɩ̃ɛ kɔɔ hanɩ Noee bɔɔ, mɛna ga ha tibili Bikuuni ɩna.
Gɩdonɩ wiresɔɔkɛ kɔɔ kanɩ, sɩ thɩ̃ kʋɛ nyʋɔnɩle na-n kpaan, tɩbɩla n kɔɔ khor dɩkɔ, dɩ wa-n yɔna, dɩ wa-n hena kha, dɩ wa-n 'laana awɩ bisɔ herra, phaphapha dɩɩ ba dana wireekɛ Noe kɔɔ lonɩ batora.
Sɩrakɛ wa-n kɔɔ dɛna dɩkha ga, foo dɩ nyʋɔn phã a gbʋma wɩ dɩ wɩ khiir fɛʋ. Ɔmɛna ga ha tibili Bikuuni ɩna.
Ga wiile kona yenyɔɔkɛ na hanɩ lɛ bɩɛlla, Thãgba na gbaar bɩɛl sɩ na faa bɩɛl.
Dɩ khɛra yenyɔɔkɛ na hanɩ kha jʋ nã paar, Thãgba na gbaar bɩɛl sɩ na faa bɩɛl.
Gɛr gɩ a nɩ jɩ na-n jʋrɛ, gɩdonɩ na jɩ wireekɛ anɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ na ɩna'.
Nɩ jɩɛ jɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ bɔɔbɔɔ, ado cɔdaar kuun jɩrɛ bɔ dɔɔkɛ yu na pɔnɩ ɔɔ cɔ dɩtɩnɔ, a na-n bɛrɛ a na sɩɩraa a lʋʋn cʋɔrɔa'.
Gɛr gɩ nɛrɛ dakha, nɩ gbɛbɩrɛ pɛ, gɩdonɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na bire na ɩ̃ bɔɔkɛ na kpɩɛrna mɩna'.
Ʋmɔ̃ dɔ sobɔ cʋʋ thɔ̃daar, kɛ kpɛsɛnɛnɩ, dɩ ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ na pɛr a na-n hɩnɛ ɔɔ cɔdara a na hana wɩ dɩkɔ bɔɔkɛ gɩ teenɩ kha?
Ga dar thɔ̃daar ca olela, ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ na-n danɩ a yɩɩ a na-n cʋʋ mɛ̃.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ na jɩɛ cʋgʋʋ a do ɔɔ thɩ̃sɔ fɛʋʋ hɩɩndaar.
Sɩ ado thɔ̃daar puu gɩ, a na sor ɔɔbarara nayɩ: Ɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩna n pʋɔrɛ ɩɩnna kpɛ;
dɩ ado a mar da-n bɩɩr ɔɔ 'walãkhasɔɔkɛ a-n donanɩ kha thɔma, dɩ khona da-n yɔna nakha ta 'laardara.
Thɔ̃daar ca olee kɔ̃tɩ̃ na phurore, dawiikɛ aa-n pɩɛrʋʋna', na bɔɔraakɛ aa kpɩɛrnana';
dɩ a na cɩɩrɛ yɩra yɩra, sɩ na gbaa na pɛ wɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔdara, paarɩkɛra wa bɩnɩ wa-n yɩrna nyɩma.
Ga bɔɔle, ƴũ fãgadaarɩ dɩ ga hʋrɛ khɛ biirə yʋɔrɩkɛ na jɛnɩ kuun pa', kɛ kɔɔ gbaannɩ awɩ lãphãsɔ a jal wɩ caan khɛrɩ ko.
Yemɔɩ wɛrra dor də̃bələ, sɩ yemɔɩ do khɛ bi kpɛsɛsɔ.
Də̃bələ gbaar awɩ lãphãsɔ sɩ wa kɔɔ gba niinə',
sɩ khɛ bi kpɛsɛsɔɔle gbaar awɩ lãphãsɔ a gbana niin na nĩ pɛdaa a fʋrɔ.
Mɔ̃ khɛrɩ ko n pʋɔrnɩ pʋɔrra, dayuur fʋlɛ wɛr fɛʋ dɩ wa-n daar.
A dɩɩ nɩrɔ hulẽbire ther aa: Nɩ yɛ khɛrɩ ko, nɩ thɛ na caanɛɛ.
Dɩ khɛ biirəəle fɛʋ pal ɩɩr a ma dɩ wa-n gbɛbɩ awɩ lãphãsɔ.
Dɩ khɛ bi də̃bələəle so khɛ bi kpɛsɛsɔra ayɩ: Nɩ pɛ sar anɩ ninə gbe, gɩdonɩ asɩ lãphãsɔ n khiire.
Dɩ khɛ bi kpɛsɛsɔɔle birse wi: Ǝ̃'ə̃, gɩdonɩ ga dã sɩ kha na nɛrɛa', nɩ jala wɩrɛraakɛ n dolonenɩ a thɛ anɩda.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ jalnɩ wɩ the, dɩɩ do khɛrɩ ko daan, dɩ khɛ bi wele kɔɔ gbɛbɩrɛnɩ pɩ, cʋrrɛ kha a lõ he fɛtɩ cʋgʋʋ, sɩ dɩ loo khaan.
Ga too gbe dɩ wa khɛ bisɔɔle pɔ dakha wer dɩ wa-n so: Kɔ̃tɩn, Kɔ̃tɩn, khɛra sɩ loo.
Dɩ birse wi: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ma jɩ na'.
Gɛr gɩ a nɩ jɩ na-n jʋrɛ, gɩdonɩ na jɩ wire dɩ bɔɔ ga.
Ga hʋrɛ kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ kɔɔ ƴaalɛnɩ a kpaar, a we ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔ, a pɛ war ɔɔ lẽle thɩ̃sɔ wa-n hɩnɛ.
Dɩ a har bɩɛl war bɔrɔ yemɔɩ, a ha bɩɛl war bɔrɔ yenyɔ, sa ha balãtherdaar war bɔrɔ bɩɛl. A ha wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl mɔ̃ awɩ puno hanɩ, sa gba jal kpaar paar.
Dapaara ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ war bɔrɔ yemɔɩ gbaar jalna da-n ƴabɩna, a 'lɛ yemɔɩ a dɛɛnɔ wo.
Mɛ̃ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ war bɔrɔ yenyɔ 'lɛ yenyɔ wo a dɛɛnɔ.
Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ war bɔrɔ bɩɛl dɩbara, a jaal a kpe koru a puu le ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ war faa.
A gɩ ɩ̃ a pʋɔr thɔ̃daraalee kɔ̃tɩna bire ɩ̃, a we wɩ wɩ thera war ɩnɩ-n hɩɩn.
Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ war bɔrɔ yemɔɩɩle tɔr dã na dɛɛnɛ yemɔɩɩkɛ a 'lɛnɩ a so: Kɔ̃tɩn, fɩ kɔɔ pɛ marɛ war bɔrɔ yemɔɩ. Yɛ yemɔɩ phaa mɩ birni 'lɛ a dɛɛnɔ.
Dɩ ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ sʋʋraa: Gɩ bɔrɛ kpɛ, thɔ̃daar bʋɔ ha fɩ na sobɔ cʋʋdaar. Fɩ kɔɔ dor sobɔ cʋʋdaar thɩ̃ fɩɩʋra, nɛnɛ̃ ma pɛ farɛ dɩ fa do hɩɩndaar thɩ̃ jɔjʋɔra. Lona daʋraakɛ dɔnɩ afɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩda.
Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ war bɔrɔ yenyɔ tɔ dã a so: Kɔ̃tɩn fɩ kɔɔ pɛ marɛ war bɔrɔ yenyɔ, yɛ kɛ yenyɔ phaa mɩ birni 'lɛ a dɛɛnɔ wo.
Dɩ ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ sʋʋraa: Gɩ bɔrɛ kpɛ, thɔ̃daar bʋɔ ha fɩ na sobɔ cʋʋdaar. Fɩ kɔɔ dor sobɔ cʋʋdaar thɩ̃ fɩɩʋra, nɛnɛ̃ ma pɛ farɛ dɩ fa do hɩɩndaar thɩ̃ jɔjʋɔra. Lona daʋraakɛ dɔnɩ afɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩda.
Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ war bɔrɔ bɩɛl dɩbara tɔr dã dakha a so: Kɔ̃tɩn, mɩ jɩrɛ fɛr dɔ tibilikɛ afɩda khɩɩrnɩ, dɩ fa-n kha jɔ kãkɛ fa diirnə', dɩ fa-n kha kãkɛ fa kɔɔ jalnɩ woa'.
Gɛr gɩ maar kɔɔ fʋ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ gba afɩ bɔrɔ bɩɛlla a puu thɩɩra. Gɩkɛ gba, gɛr dɔ afɩda.
Dɩ ɔɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ birsee ayɩ: Fɛr thɔ̃daar puu na khãkhal, fɩ kɔɔ jɩrɛ dɩ mɛr dɔ ʋrɛ n khanɩ kãkɛ ma kɔɔ diirnə', dɩ ma-n kha dakha kãkɛ ma kɔɔ jalnɩ thɩ̃a',
dɩ gɩ kɔɔ teenanɛna wɩ yɛ fɩ gbaar ɩ̃ war a 'laa kãkɛ ma 'lɛrɔnɩ khor. A mɩ kɛrrɛ bir ɩ̃, ɩ̃ gba ɩ̃da na khor.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ, nɩ taaraa bɔrɔ bɩɛlɩle a hananɩ, a hana ʋrɛ hananɩ bɔrɔ yʋɔrɩle.
Gɩdonɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ hananɩ thɩ̃ɛ, wa bire na haa na dɛbɩrɔ wo, dɩ na hana gɩ dɩ ga jɩɩ jɔr. Sɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na hananɩ thɩ̃a', wa tiirəərerakɛ phubi gɩrɛ a hananɩ.
Sɩ olela na dɔnɩ bɔ taa thɔ̃daara', nɩ dɔnaa jɩɛra dabirə paar faa, kãkɛ wa bɩnɩ wa-n yɩrna nyɩma.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun na-n ɩnɩ na ɩ̃ i dʋbɩ nakha ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ fɛʋ, ma toore ɩ̃ i dʋbɩ fãga too para.
Dɩ le wa kpa tibil caar fɛʋ na jɛ ɩ̃ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ ma leere wɛ na wɛ, mɔ̃kɛ bana khedaar n leenɩ banaa na bɔ.
Dɩ ma pɛr banaa ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra, sɩ ɩ̃ pɛ bɔ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɩlana.
Le mɛr fãgadaar na so wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra ɩ̃ yɩ: Nɩ ɩna nɛrkɛ ɩ̃ Thɩ bɔnanɩ, a gba fãgadaar dɩɩkɛ wɩ kɔɔ maanɩ gbɛbɩ nar kɛkɛkɛ thɩɩkɛ ti bɔɔ a hɩna.
Gɩdonɩ kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋ mɛr dɩ nɩ kɔɔ ha mɩ dɩkor; yɔlkhaa kɔɔ fʋ mɛr dɩ nɩ kɔɔ ha mɩ nyʋɔn; mɩ kɔɔ dor kpakpal dɩ nɩ kɔɔ tee mɩ;
mɩ kɔɔ hananɛ sãɓɔlɔ̃ dɩ nɩ kɔɔ saa mɩ kɩ̃kɩɩn; gɩ-n kɔɔ kho mer dɩ nɩ kɔɔ pɔ a yɩ mɩ; mɩ kɔɔ har khaɩra dɩ nɩ kɔɔ pɔ a yɩ mɩ.
Le tɩɩ sarasɔ na birse mi nayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ sɩ kɔɔ yɩ fɩ na kɔmɛr a ha fɩ dɩkor, dɩ yɔlkhaa kɔɔ fʋ fɩ dɩ sɩ kɔɔ ha fɩ nyʋɔn?
Ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ sɩ kɔɔ yɩ fɩ dɩ fɩ kɔɔ do kpakpal dɩ sɩ kɔɔ tee fɩ, agɩbo na sãɓɔlɔ̃ dɩ sɩ kɔɔ ha fɩ kɩ̃kɩɩn?
Ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ sɩ kɔɔ yɩ fɩ dɩ ga-n kho fɩ, agɩbo dɩ fɩ kɔɔ ha khaɩra dɩ sɩ kɔɔ pɔ a yɩ fɩ?
Dɩ mɛr fãgadaar na birse wer nayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ nɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ ɩ̃ omi bu fɩɩʋra, mɛrra nɩ kɔɔ cʋʋ.
Agɩpɩ, ma sor wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɩlana: Nɩ hala mɩ jala ƴɔɔ, nɛrkɛ so kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ heennɩ, nɩ jala lona khorr dɔɔraakɛ wɩ gbɛbɩnɩ thɩɩn Satana, na ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔra.
Gɩdonɩ kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋ mɛr sɩ na kɔɔ ha mɩ dɩkora'; yɔlkhaa kɔɔ fʋ mɛr sɩ na kɔɔ ha mɩ nyʋɔna';
mɩ kɔɔ dor kpakpal sɩ na kɔɔ tee ma'; mɩ kɔɔ hananɛ sãɓɔlɔ̃ sɩ na kɔɔ ha mɩ kɩ̃kɩɩna'; gɩ-n kɔɔ kho mer dɩ mɩ kɔɔ har dakha khaɩra, sɩ na kɔɔ pɔ a yɩ ma'.

Dɩ le wa birse mi dakha nayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ sɩ kɔɔ yɩ fɩ na kɔmɛr na yɔlkhaa, agɩbo dɩ fɩ kɔɔ do kpakpal, agɩbo dɩ fɩ kɔɔ hana sãɓɔlɔ̃, dɩ ga-n kho fɩ dakha, agɩbo wo dɩ fɩ ha khaɩra dɩ sa kɔɔ cʋʋ fɩ bɔa'.
Dɩ le ma birse wi nayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ ɩ̃ omi bu fɩɩʋra ga, mɛrra na kɔɔ cʋa'.
Dɩ wɛr, wa jaal khorr so 'lɛ paar, sɩ tɩɩ sara n 'lɛ yire khorr.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju mɩɩnɩ thɩmɩaakɛ fɛʋ dɩɩ pɩ, a sor ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara ayɩ:
Nɩ jɩrɛ wire yenyɔ sɛ sɩ Pakɩ n dã, dɩ wa fʋrɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun na kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Ɔbɔɔlera bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na tɩbɩlaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kpa kha a jɛ Kaɩfɩ gbõdaarɩ gbayara,
a gʋʋr kha mɔ̃ wa cʋʋnɩ sɩ na fʋ Jeju na fɩɩlɛ a na kʋ.
Sɩ wɩ-n sor aa, wa-n do gɩ do bɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla hanɩ fɛtɩ cʋʋrɔ kĩkĩkə̃', a mɛ̃ gaa ga hor khʋ̃ɛ na har tɩbɩlaa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Mɔ̃ Jeju hanɩ Betanɩ Sɩmɔ̃ gbuuluu cɔ,
khɛ bɩɛl pʋɔraarɛ le a fʋrɔ laaso ja bʋlabir, kɛ hananɩ latɩkolo niinikɛ khiinoni the nʋɔ ka. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju hanɩ dɩko kho paar, khɛrɩle lʋʋn le a deer latɩkolookɛ Jejuu yʋra.
Mɔ̃ kpãkpãadara yɩɛnɩ thale, nĩkhii fʋlɛ wɛr dɩ wɩ so ayɩ: Anyee thɩ̃ kʋɛ ca ha gɩrɛ thakɛ?
Ga do wa kɔɔ dolone latɩkolo niinile gɩ khɩɩr, wɩ gba warɩle wɩ ha bɔdara gaa?
Dɩ Jeju jɩrɛ a so war: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n pɛ khɛrɩkɛ nɩwɛ? Thɔ̃ bʋɔ a cʋʋ mar waa gel.
Sɩ ado bɔdara wɛ, wɩ har anɩ pa wire fɛʋ, sɩ ado mɛr gɩ, ga do wire fɛʋ na hana ma'.
Sɩ mɔ̃ a deernɩ latɩkolo niinikɛ ɩ̃ tomɩra, a gbɛbɩ mɛr mɔ̃ wa dʋ mɩnɩ.
Dɩ sobɔr mɩ so nar, paar fɛʋʋkɛ wa-n mɩɩnɩ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ thɩɩraakɛ fɛʋ, wa-n mɩɩrɛ dakha gɩrɛɛkɛ khɛrɩkɛ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ dɩ wa jɩnaa.
Le kpãkpãadaar bɩɛl yʋɔr yenyɔra, kɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Judasɩ, kɛ thɛnɩ Karɩyɔtɩ dɩɩra, jal bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnaa pa a so war ayɩ:
Anye na tu na ha mɩ, ado mɩ liirna Jeju a ha nɩ? Dɩ wɩ haarɛ wire kpelẽ yʋɔr lɩmɩnɛɛ war.
Dɩ a fʋna ɔbɔɔlera, a jɩɛ ma da-n ƴaal hʋɛ waa mɔ̃ a na fʋnɩ sɩ aliirna Jeju a ha wɩ.
Buruukɛ na hananɩ tabɩɩraa caca fɛtɩ wi daan, dɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ pɔr Jejura a bulee ayɩ: Kana fɩ-n ƴaal sɩ jala gbɛbɩrɛ Pakɩ dɩkor fɩ kho?
Dɩ so war: Nɩ jala dɩɩra kũu bɩɛlɩ pa a sʋɔraa ayɛ: Dɩɩrdaar sɔ ayɩwɔɔ aa, ɩnɩ bɔ daan, dɩ afɩ pa ɩna cʋʋ Pakɩ nakha ɩnɩ kpãkpãadara.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara cʋʋrɛ gɩrɛ Jeju kɔɔ so warnɩ a jal gbɛbɩ Pakɩ dɩkor.
A dɩɩ dʋɔr, Jeju pɔr na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ, dɩ wɩ too dɩko kho paar.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ dɩko khoro, a so warɛ ayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛra na liirna mɛr.
Dɩ wɩ gbobire jɔɔ ka, sa ma fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl dɩ wa-n bule: Mɛr gɩ ya Kɔ̃tɩn?
Dɩ birse wi: Ʋrɛɛkɛɛ nyɔ̃ n 'lɔɔnɩ kha na mɛrɛ tasa bɩɛl, ɔr gɩɩkɛ na lirena mɩnɩ.
Mɛr tibili Bikuun wer n jaal mɔ̃ gɩ khere marnɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra, sɩ ga puure tibil ʋrɛraakɛ na lirenanɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun. A wa kɔɔ kɔ̃ tibil ca olelaka', gɩ ka baar.
Dɩ Judasɩɩkɛ na lirenaanɩ bulee: Dɩ mɛr gɩ ya Dɩɩrdaar? Dɩ Jeju birsee: Gɛrra fɩ so gele.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ dɩko khoro Jeju gbaar buru, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba pɛr pɩ, a kuure a ha ɔɔ kpãkpãadara sa so war: Nɩ gba a khɔ, gɩrɛra dʋɔn ɩ̃ tomɩ.
Agɩpɩ dɩ gba thɩ̃ yɔnanɛ, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a fʋɔrnɩ Thãgba pɛr pɩ, a ha wɛr sa so war: Nɩ gba fɛʋ a yɔ.
Gɩdonɩ gɛrra dɔ ɩ̃ tɔmɩ̃, Thãgbaa nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ tɔmɩ̃ gɩɩkɛ deerenɩ gɩ faa tɩbɩla bərəəm sopugo.
Mɩ so narɛ ma bir na yɔ dɩvɛ̃ɛkɛ bã, phaphapha gɩ dana wireekɛ ma birni na yɔ daphaa wo na nɛrɛ ɩ̃ Thɩɩ fãgadaar dɩra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ khɩnɩ nɩɛ pɩ, wɩ ther jal gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ hananɩ olɩvɩ thɩra.
Le Jeju so war ayɩ: Nĩ dɩtɩnɔɔkɛ ɩ̃da na dor nɔɔ dɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ na kɛrna khiru, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Mɛr Thãgba na bɩɩrɛ bana khedaar, dɩ banaasɔɔkɛ gbɛbanɩ kha na bɩ̃bɩlanɛ paar fɛʋ.”
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɛr Jeju na ɩɩrnɩ na the khirera na pɩ, ma kʋʋl nɛr ƴɩɛ na jal Galile.
Dɩ Pɩɛr sʋʋraa: Ado afɩda na dor nɔɔ dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na kɛrna khirurakɛ, sɩ me wer ma kɛrna khiru kpɩɩraka'.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Sobɔr mɩ so far, fɛrɛ, nĩ dɩtɩnɔɔkɛra yɔl kʋʋ na 'lɛ na khɩɩ pa', sɩ balãther fa bana nayɩ fa jɩ ma'.
Pɩɛr bir birsee: Adorakɛ wɩ yɩ foo sɩ khe kha, sɩ ma puno na bana nayɩ ma jɩ faa ga. Dɩ ɔmɛna kpãkpãadara fɛʋ so wer.
Dɩ Jeju kpar ɔɔ kpãkpãadara dɩ wɩ jal da paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jɛcɛmanɛ, dɩ a so warɛ ayɩ: Nɩ tɔɔ kɩɛr ɔbɔɔkɛ ma jalnɩ ma-n bɩɛl Thãgba.
Dɩ a kɔɔ kpar Pɩɛr na Jebedee bikona yenyɔ, sɩ a mar da-n gbobi dɩ haar kʋɛsʋʋ.
Dɩ a so warɛ: ɩ̃ ha gbobire khikhi gbobire waa gel. Nɩ tɔɔ kɩɛr a na jʋrɛ na mɛrɛ.
Sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ tɔ jal gbe, a ji thɩɩra a sumo, da-n bɩɛl Thãgba thakɛ ayɩ: ɩ̃ Thɩ, ado hʋɛ na hale, hʋnɔnɛna mɩ thɩ̃ yɔnanɛɛkɛ, sɩ ga-n do mɔ̃kɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ ga, sɩ mɔ̃kɛ fɛrɛ n pɛrnɩ haar gɩ hana.
Dɩ agɩpɩ dɩ ɩɩr a bir pɔ kpãkpãadaraa pa a yɩ wɩ dɩ wa-n daar, dɩ so Pɩɛrra: Na kɔɔ puno toorakɛ gbe a jʋʋr hɩɩn na mɛrɛaa koe?
Na-n jʋrɛ a na bɩɛlna Thãgba, dɩ mɛ̃ na lõ fifiləlela ga. Tuur wer n har haarra gel, sɩ tibili tibil do pa fãga 'lee.
Dɩ a bire jal balanyɔ wo da-n bɩɛl Thãgba thakɛ ayɩ: Ɩ̃ Thɩ, ado hʋɛ na hale, dɩ thɩ̃ yɔnanɛɛkɛ na hʋnɔna mɩ sɩɩ do ma yɔ ga, dɔ gɩ ha mɔ̃ fɩ tuni.
Sɩ a bire pɔ wo a yɩ wɩ dɩ wa-n daar wo, gɩdonɩ dayuur fʋ wɛr a kar.
Dɩ a faa wɛr sa bir jal da-n bɩɛl Thãgba gɩ do balãther; dɩ mɔna a-n bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba, thɩmɩɩ nɔ bɩɛlɩlera a bir da-n 'loro.
Agɩpɩ dɩ bir pɔ kpãkpãadaraa pa a so war: Nɩ daarɛ dɩphã a hɩrɛ. Nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã bɔɔ daan dɩ wa fʋ mɛr tibili Bikuun na ha sopugodara.
Nɩ ɩrɛ sɩ jal, sɩ nɩ hɩnɛ ʋrɛra lirena mɩnɩ n ɩnɛ.
Dɩ mɔna Jeju hanɩ mɩɩrɔ, Judasɩɩkɛra dɔnɩ bɩɛl kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔra daan, na tibil jɔjʋɔɔkɛ fɔrɔnɩ bajɩnasɔ, na gbolasɔ, kɛ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na tɩbɩlaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kɔɔ thɔnɩ.
Sɩ lĩlir kɔɔ nɩ warɛ gɩrɛ a na cʋʋnɩ aa, ʋrɛɛkɛ ɩna palnɩ, ɔr gɩ, wɩ fʋɔnɛɛ.
Dɩ dapaara a tɔr dã Jeju sa so: Dɩɩrdaar, gba fʋɔrɛ; sa palʋʋ.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Ɩ̃ kuun, gɩrɛ fɩ ɩnɩ fɩ cʋʋ, cʋɛ bɛɛ. Le tɩbɩlaale kpa Jeju a fʋ.
Dɩ bɩɛl wɩrɛraakɛ hananɩ kha Jeju hal ɔɔ bajɩna, a phe a cɩna gbõdaarɩ thɔ̃daar nũu a kur.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Birəna afɩ bajɩna tʋɔr khal kpara, gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na gbaannɩ bajɩna, bajɩnana wa gba na kʋʋrna wɩ.
Fa jɩ dɩɩ do mɩ hananɛ hʋɛ na bɩɛl ɩ̃ Thɩra da thɔna mar dapaara ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ, dɩ wa ka gbɩlanɩ kpalãther yʋɔr yenyɔra gaa?
Sɩ a mɩ cʋʋ mɛ̃, mɔ̃ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sonɩ ayɩ: Gɩ dana thakɛra, mɔ̃ ga fʋ sɩ na dã na ha oti?
Ga bɔɔlera Jeju so tibil jɔraale: Nɩ ɩnanɛ bajɩnasɔ na gbolasɔ, nɩ fʋ mɩ mɔ̃ wɩ-n fʋnɩ yu hɔ̃hʋɔldaar koe. Wire fɛʋ mɩ-n kɔɔ toore Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna dɩ ma-n dɩɩr thɩ̃ɛ, sɩ na kɔɔ fʋ ma'.
Sɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ thakɛ fɛʋ daan, dɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgbaa bobona kɔɔ kherenɩ na dã na ha oti. Le ɔɔ kpãkpãadarasɔ fɛʋ fagʋʋ sa fuule.
Dɩ wɩrɛ fʋɔnnɩ Jeju, wɩ kpaarɛ jalna Kaɩfɩ gbõdaarɩ pa, ka jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ kpanɩ kha a jɛ.
Sɩ Pɩɛr n kɔɔ kpar Jejura nɔ bɩɛl nɔ bɩɛl, a ba dana gbõdaarɩ gbaya, a lõ a too le na gardɛsɔ a hɩɩn mɔ̃ ga pɩnɩ.
Dɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na so gʋʋrdara fɛʋ kɔɔ kpɛr sɔ dɩ wa-n pɛ Jejura, wɩ yɩrɔ hʋɛ wɩ kʋʋ.
Sɩ wa kɔɔ yɩ ga, sɩrakɛ tibil jɔ kɔɔ pɔr a kuur sɔ̃sɔ dɩ wa-n pɛ Jejura. Pɩpɩɩ paar yenyɔ pɔr a so ayɩ:
Kuunikɛ sor ayɩ, ɩna punone na wɩɛr Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, sɩ ɩnɩ-n bir ɩnɩ-n mɩ wo wire balãther.
Dɩ gbõdaar pal ɩɩr a bule Jeju: Fa hana nʋɔ na birsena gaa? Anyee so ha gɩrɛ tɩbɩlaakɛra n pɛ farnɩ thakɛ?
Sɩ Jeju pɩr pɔbɩ, dɩ gbõdaar bir sʋʋraa: Na Thãgba yidaarɩ i, sɔ sar ado fɛr dʋɔn Kirisiti Thãgbaa Bikuun.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Gɛrra ha gele fɩ sonɩ, sɩ wo mɩ so narɛ, a fʋna nɛnɛ̃kɛ na yɩrɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun dɩphã dɩ ma too Thãgbaa nyɔ̃bɔra, dɩ ma ther dakha thãgbara ƴũ ma-n ɩ̃ ndɔlɔ̃panana.
Le gbõdaar ɓəər ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ sa so: A kʋɛrɛ Thãgbaa i. Anye hale dɩ sa bir na ƴaal so jɩdara 'lo? Mee nɩ nɩɛrɛ mɔ̃ a kʋɛnɩ Thãgbaa i, mɔ̃ nɩ-n kpɩɛr?
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Khir a teena.
Sɩ agɩpɩ wɩ mar a cɩɩr nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ dɩ wa-n pɩɛraa ƴɩɛra, sɩ dɩ wa-n thʋʋrʋʋ na nyɔ̃ po, sɩ ɩkhasɔ na-n ɓaalɛɛ sɩ dɩ wa-n so:
Kirisiti, jɛ ntɛsɔ n bɛ fɩnɩ sa sɔ sar.
Sɩ Pɩɛr kɔɔ hale a too le phiilo gbayara. Dɩ thɔ̃daar khɛ bɩɛl tɔr pʋɔraa a sʋʋraa: Fɛrɛ dakha, mee fɩ kɔɔ har kha na Galile Jejuukɛra.
Sɩ a bananɛ awɩ ƴɛra fɛʋ ayɩ: Ma jɩ gɩrɛ fɩ-n ƴaalnɩ fɩ so tɔra'.
Sɩ agɩpɩ a tɔr thɔɔ lõfonʋɔ, dɩ khɛ kpɩɩ yɩɩ a so wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩle ayɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛ dakha, a-n kɔɔ har kha na Najarɛtɩ Jejura.
Sɩ a bire bana wo da-n ʋlfɛna ɓoɓo ayɩ: Ma jɩ kuunile kpɩɩraka'.
Bɔɔ gbe dɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ hanɩle tɔr pɔ Pɩɛrra wo a bir sʋʋraa: Sobɔr gɩ gel, fɛrɛ dakha fɛr dɔ waa tibil ca bɩɛl, gɩdonɩ afɩ nɔ mɩɩ wɩ-n jɩna fɩ.
Le a ma dɩphã da-n wɩɩr thɩ̃ɛsɔ da-n ʋlfɛna ayɩ: Ma jɩ kuunile kpɩɩraka'. Dɩ dapaara yɔl kʋʋ khɩɩ,
dɩ Pɩɛr jɩnanɛ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ Jeju kɔɔ sʋʋraanɩ: Yɔl kʋʋ na 'lɛ na khɩɩ pa', sɩ fa bananɛ balãther nayɩ fa jɩ ma'. Dɩ le a the khuirə da-n bɩ sɔsɔsɔ.
A dɩɩ wɩl duuro phiphi, bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ fɛʋ na tɩbɩlaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kpar kha a gʋʋr sɩ wɩ kʋ Jeju.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ liini pɩ, wɩ kpaarɛ jalna a ha Pɩlatɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ gobanɛr.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Judasɩɩkɛ lirenaanɩ yɩnɩ mɔ̃ wɩ pɩɛraanɩ so kʋnanɛ, ɔɔ ha fɛʋ kʋɛrɛ, dɩ gba wire kpelẽ yʋɔr thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ warɩle, a jalna bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnaa pa na tɩbɩlaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ pa a so ayɩ:
Sopugo mɩ cʋʋ, mɔ̃ mɩ liirnanɩ tibilikɛra na hananɩ dɩ paara' a pɛ khirrə. Dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa: Ga ba sa', fɛr gɩ ba.
Dɩ Judasɩ gba warɩle a jalna dʋna Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, sa gba jal a ju pɔ̃ɔ.
Dɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna gbaar warɩle sa so: Ga tee kha dɩ sa gba warɩkɛra na pɛ Thãgba mũsumona ga, gɩdonɩ tibil tɔmɩ̃ the nʋɔ gɩ;
ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ gʋʋrnɩ khasɔ pɩ, wɩ gbaar warra a thena bʋla mɩdaarra lɩɛ gɩ do kpakpal khi dʋ paar.
Gɛr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ wa-n we lɩɛɛle tɔmɩ̃ lɩɛ a dana nĩkɛ.
Le gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgbaa bobon Jeremɩ kɔɔ sonɩ dã ayɩ: “Wɩ gbaar wire kpelẽ yʋɔr thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ war, kɛ dɔnɩ lɩmɩ nʋɔɔkɛ ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsana gʋʋrnɩ kha dɩ wa thenaa;
Wɩ kɔɔ gba gɛr a thena bʋla mɩdaarra lɩɛ, mɔ̃kɛra Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ so marnɩ.”
Dɩ Jeju jɩɩlɛ gobanɛrɩ ƴɛra, dɩ gobanɛr bulee thakɛ ayɩwɔɔ: Fɛr dʋɔn Juifi fãgadaarɩ? Dɩ Jeju birsee: Gɛrra ha gele fɩ sonɩ.
Sɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na kɔ̃tɩnasɔɔ sookɛ wɩ-n pɩɛraanɩ, aa dee war nʋɔa'.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ sʋʋraa: Fa nɩɛ sɔsɔɔkɛra fɛʋ wɩ-n pɛ farnaa?
Sɩ Jeju na deeraarakɛ nʋɔ thɩ̃ bɩɛlla ga, dɩ gɩ kɔɔ kpaarɛ gobanɛr nʋɔ ka.
Sɩ fɛtɩra fɛʋ gobanɛr mɩlna gɛr dɩ faa khaɩdaar dɔɔkɛ tibil jɔ n ƴaalnɩ.
Sɩ kũu ca ʋkha gɩ a kɔɔ hale khaɩra, kɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Barabasɩ.
Mɔ̃ tibil jɔ kpanɩ kha a jɛ, Pɩlatɩ bule wer ayɩ: Ʋmɔ̃ nɩ-n ƴaal gɩrɛra ɩ̃ faa, Barabasɩ gɩ yaa, Jejuukɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Kirisiti gɩ?
Gɩdonɩ a jɩrɛ dɩ gbugi dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ wɩ fʋ Jeju a haa.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a toonɩ ɔɔ kɩɩl too pa, ɔɔ khɛr thʋɔn sʋʋraa: Fa-n lõ tɩɩ sarʋʋlee sora ga, gɩdonɩ ɔɔda dor nɔɔ nĩkɛ dɩ ɩ̃ yɩ gaarɛ dəəlela ka.
Dɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ n yɩrnanɛ tibil jɔɔle wɩ bɩɛlnɛɛ a faa Barabasɩ sa kɔ Jeju.
Dɩ gobanɛr bire ɩɩrna gɩ wo a bule wi: Wɛr yenyɔraakɛ, ʋmɔ̃ nɩ-n ƴaal ɩ̃ faa ha nɩ? Dɩ wɩ birsee, Barabasɩ ɩnɩ-n ƴaal.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ bir bule wi: Sɩ anye ma cʋʋna Jejuukɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Kirisiti? Dɩ wɛr fɛʋ so ayɩ: Gbanɛɛ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Dɩ gobanɛr bir bule wi: Anyee puu ca a cʋʋ? Dɩ wɩ bir jɩɩ hulẽ wo dɩɩ khɩɩr ka a jɔ mɛ̃ ayɩ: Gbanɛɛ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Mɔ̃ Pɩlatɩ yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ do aa-n ma gara' sɩ dɩ khʋ̃ɛ bo dɩ ga-n jɔr ka, a gbaar nyʋɔn a hul nyɛ̃ɛ tibil jɔɔlee ƴɛra fɛʋ, sa so ayɩ: Aɩ, tɩɩ sarʋʋ tɔmɩ̃ɩkɛ na-n ma maa koe, nɛr gɩ ba.
Dɩ tɩbɩlaale fɛʋ so: Ɔɔ, ɔɔ khi thɩmɩɩra n 'le sɩ le na asɩ bɩsãsɔ.
Le Pɩlatɩ faa Barabasɩ a ha wɩ, sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a ciilni Jeju na khasa pɩ, a fagʋʋrɛ wɩ gbaanɛɛ a kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Dɩ gobanɛr sɔrasɩsɔ kpar Jeju a lona gobanɛrɩ cɔ, dɩ sɔrasɛsɔ fɛʋ jɛ a kpalalaa.
Dɩ wɩ thʋbʋʋrɛ ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ sa gba darã sɩɛ kpɩ̃kpɩ̃kpɩ̃ a tʋʋ,
sa gba uu a kɛr dɩɩ ho fãgadaar kpɩɛr dɩ wɩ subuu yʋɔ, sa gba ɓalʋʋ a haa dɩ fʋrɔ na nyɔ̃bɔɔ. Sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ wɩ gulẽga ɔɔ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn sɩ wa-n maanʋʋ ayɩ: Gba fʋɔrɛ Juifi fãgadaar.
Sɩ dɩ wɩ cɩɩrna nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ a na pɩɛraa sa tee ɓalʋʋlera dɩ wa-n bɩɩrnaa yʋʋ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ maanʋʋnɩ pɩ, wɩ thʋbʋʋrɛ daraana, sa bir gba ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ a tʋʋ, sa kpaa dɩphã wa-n jalna wɩ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Mɔ̃ wɩ-n thenɩ, wɩ caananɛ kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ thɛnɩ Sɩrɛn, ɔɔ i n dʋɔn Sɩmɔ̃. Dɩ wɩ cʋgʋʋrɛ na fãga dɩ gba Jejuu kʋkʋ thɩr a heen.
Dɩ mɔ̃ wɩ danɩ paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Gɔlgɔta, kɩrʋ dʋɔn Yʋ khubu,
wɩ gbaar dɩvɛ̃ a nyanyaana tomɩ dibi thɩɩ a haa a yɔ. Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a 'lɛnɩ hɩɩn, a bor yʋɔr.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ gbaanɩ a kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra pɩ, wɩ gbaar ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ a tɩnɛ na lɩ lɩr.
Agɩpɩ wɩ toore le dɩ wa-n bɛrʋʋ.
Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ kherere sɛbɛ a ɓã le kʋkʋ thɩrʋra ƴũ ɔɔ yʋɔ, gɩ nɩna ɔɔ so heen kɩr, gɩ sor aa: Ʋrɛɛkɛra dʋɔn Juifi fãgadaar.
Yu hɔ̃hɔla yenyɔ kɔɔ hale dɩ wɩ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra nakha Jejura, bɩɛl ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔra, bɩɛl ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɩlana.
Wɩrɛ n thɛnɩ le sɩ dɩ wa-n ka, wɩ-n nɩɩrʋʋrɛ, dɩ wa-n didiəna yʋʋ, sɩ dɩ wa-n so aa:
Fɛrkɛra kɔɔ yɛnɩ, fa wɩɛrɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ sɩ fɩ bir fɩ mɩ wire balãther, taa afɩbara bɛɛ. Ado Thãgbaa Bikuun fɩ do, gbuno kʋkʋ thɩrʋrara.
Mɛ̃ dakha bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ n ɓoɓororaa, dɩ wa-n sona ayɩ:
A kɔɔ taarɛ wɩ̃ tibilsɔ, sɩ aa puno na taa dɩbara ga. Dɔ ɔrkɛ dɔnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldaraa fãgadaar n gbũ nɛnɛ̃ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra sɩ pɩɛ haar.
Mee Thãgba ayɩ, ɩnɩ faarɔrɛ ɩnɩbara, dɩ Thãgbara ado a naarɛ a tagaa nɛnɛ̃ bɛɛ. Gɩdonɩ a-n sor dɩ yɩ: Ɩnɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun.
Dɩ yu hɔ̃hɔlaakɛ wɩ kpanaanɩ kha n nɩɩrʋʋrɛ dakha wer.
A fʋna ʋlkhɔɔ a dana dʋɔrɔ, dɩɩ koo kɔɔ birəre tĩtĩtĩ.
Dɩ dʋɔr khʋra Jeju hulene nʋɔ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ: Elɩ, Elɩ lama sabakɩtanɩ, kɩrʋ dʋɔn: Ɩ̃ Thãgba, ɩ̃ Thãgba, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fɩ bo mɩ faa?
Dɩ ɩkhasɔɔkɛ kɔɔ hanɩle a nɩɛ, wɩ sor aa: Elɩ a-n we.
Dɩ dapaara tibil bɩɛl wɛrra ca, a gba thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hɔnɩ tabɩhʋɛ, a mʋʋ ta ƴʋɔna, a gar ɓalʋʋ a 'laaraa a yɔ.
Sɩ ɩkhasɔ so ayɩ: Nɩ dɔ sɩ hɩɩn, ado Elɩra na ɩnɛ na tagʋʋ.
Sɩ Jeju bire hulẽ wo dɩɩ khɩɩr ka, sa gba ɔɔ thu a ha Thãgba.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, kẽkẽ nɩɩkɛ varanɩ le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna ɓəəre a tɩnɛ yenyɔ a fʋ ƴũ a ba dana thɩɩ; dɩ dakha thɩɩ jɩɩn kɔɔ hale, dɩ boka kɔ̃tɩnasɔ lɩɛr;
dɩ kaasɔ dakha khɛr, dɩ tɩɩ phuusɔ jɔɔkɛ kɔɔ khireni ɩɩr a thɩɩr khirera.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ ɩɩrnɩ a the khirera pɩ, wɩ thɩɩrɛ kaʋ, a lõ dɩ phuurə a nɩna awɩbara tibil jɔjʋɔ.
Dɩ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ na wɩrɛ kɔɔ hanaanɩ kha, kɛ jɩlɛnɩ le dɩ wa-n bɛr Jejura, mɔ̃ wɩ yɩnɩ mɔ̃ thɩɩ jenɩ na gɩrɛ dananɩ, maar fʋlɛ wɛr ka dɩ wɩ so: Sobɔr gɩ, kuunikɛra Thãgbaa Bikuun a do ger.
Dɩ khɛra jɔɔ kɔɔ hale dakha a jɩɩl ƴɔɔ dɩ wa-n hɩɩn. Wɛr dɔ khɛraakɛ n kɔɔ kpaannɩ Jejura dɩ wa-n buluu, a fʋna Galile.
Khɛrasɔraale, Magɩdala Marɩ kɔɔ hale na Marɩ ʋrɛ dɔnɩ Jakɩ na Jojɛfɩɩ nɩ, na Jebedee bikuunsɔɔ nɩ.
A dɩɩ dʋɔr lẽle kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jojɛfɩ, kɛ thɛnɩ Arɩmate pɔr. Jejuu kpãkpãadaar a do dakha.
Dɩ a kɔɔ jaal Pɩlatɩɩ pa a bɩɛlaa Jejuu for, dɩ Pɩlatɩ 'laa hʋɛ wɩ hanaa.
Dɩ Jojɛfɩ gbaar Jejuu for a parna kẽkẽ ɓɔ̃ bulo phaa,
a jalna dʋ ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ ka phaaraakɛ wɩ kɔɔ thelnɩ gɔ̃gʋɔna. Agɩpɩ dɩ kpuro boka kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ tə̃ə a khaanna ka nʋɔ sa jal kɔ̃.
Marɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Magɩdala, na Marɩ kpɩɩ hale a too ka nʋɔra.
A dɩɩ wɩl a thɩɛna gaa gbɛbɩ cɔ wire, bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ kpar kha a jɛ Pɩlatɩɩ pa,
a sʋʋraa ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, sɩ jɩnanɛ fɩfɩɩldaarɩkɛra mɔ̃ a kɔɔ sonɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ yire ayɩ, a wire yẽther ka, ɩna ɩɩrɛ na the khirera.

Gɛr gɩ, sɔ wa-n bɛr kaa gɩ dana wire yẽther wireelera, a mɛ̃ gaa ɔɔ kpãkpãadara na jaal na yu Jejuu forra na ti, sɩ na so tɩbɩlala nayɩ: A ɩɩrɛ a the khirera. Dɩ pɩpɩɩ fɩɩlɛɛkɛ na puurore na jɔ cacadaa.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ so war: Mee mɩ ha nɛr bɛbɛra, nɩ jala na bɛra mɔna nɩ yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ ha.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ jal a pɛr dɩ wa-n bɛr kaa, sɩ jɩɩn wɩ pɛr ka nʋɔra, sɩ dɩ bɛbɛra jɩɩl dɩ wa-n bɛr.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ hɩɩr wire pɩnɩ, ga cʋɔ wi duuro phiphiphi, kɛ dɔnɩ wire makonyɔɔ caca wi, Marɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Magɩdala, na Marɩ kpɩɩlera jaal wɩ hɩɩn kaa.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, thɩ jẽ kɔ̃ɩĩɩ kɔɔ hale, gɩdonɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bɩɛl kɔɔ ther Thãgbaa dʋɔ a gbũ, a kpuro bokaar faa sa tooro.
Ɔɔ thɛthɛ n carbararɛ a ho mɔ̃ thãgba n lenɩ dɔɔ, dɩ ɔɔ kẽkẽ bulole phɩphɩphɩl a ho mɩlɛ.
Dɩ maar kɔɔ fʋlɛlɛ gardɛsɔɔle dɩɩ ka, dɩ wɩ ma dɩ wa-n jẽ a thʋ̃ debi a ho khe.
Sɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thurə sor khɛraraale ayɩ: Ado ne wer gɩ, na-n do maar n fʋ na', gɩdonɩ mɩ jɩrɛ Jejuukɛ wɩ kɔɔ kpanɩ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra nɩ-n ƴaal;
aa haka', a ɩɩrɛ a the khirera mɔna a kɔɔ sonɩ. Nɩ ɩna hɩnɛ kãkɛ wɩ kɔɔ pɩɛnɩ,
sa jala kɔrɔ a sɔ ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara ayɛ, a ɩɩrɛ a the khirera, dɩ a kʋʋl nɛr ƴɩɛ gɩrɛ da-n jal Galile, le na yɩɩ. Nɩ hɩnɛ, gɛr mɩ jɩ a so nar.
Dɩ dapaara wɩ faarɛ kaa sa gba wa-n jal na jẽu na da kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, sɩ kpãkpãadara wɩ ca jal a mɩɩ thɩ̃ɛɛlera.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, Jeju pɔr a caan wɩ a so: Mɩ fʋɔr nɛr. Dɩ khɛraale tɔr wɔrɔ̃ɔ a palʋʋ nɛɛ, dɩ wa-n fʋɔrʋʋ.
Dɩ Jeju so warɛ ayɩ: Na-n do maar n fʋ na', sɩ nɩ jala sɔ ɩ̃ omisɔra wa-n jala Galile, le wa yɩ mɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ khɛraale kɔɔ hanɩ hʋɛra wa-n jal, wɩ̃ kũusɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ bɛbɛraale kɔɔ jaal dɩɩra a mɩɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋle kɔɔ dananɩ.
Dɩ wɛr, ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kpanɩ kha na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ a gʋʋr pɩ, wɩ gbaar war jɔɔ a ha sɔrasɛɛle sa so war ayɩ:
Nɩ sɔ ayɛwɔɔ: Ɔɔ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ pʋɔn dɩtɩnɔ, ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ-n daarnɩ, a yuu ti.
Dɩ ado gobanɛr nɩɛ, sa dor bʋɔ na cʋgʋʋ da tu gɩ do nɔɔ na 'lɛ sora'.
Dɩ sɔrasɛsɔ gbaar warɩle, sa cʋʋ mɔna wɩ kɔɔ so warnɩ wɩ cʋɛ. Dɩ thɩmɩɩ ca gelera kpaarɛ Juifisɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn a dana nĩkɛ.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara yʋɔr bɩɛl jaal Galile, gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ Jeju kɔɔ yɩnɩ wɩ caanɛ nɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩɩnɩ, wɩ gburõkure dɩ wa-n fʋɔrʋʋ. Sɩ ɩkhasɔ wɛrra bor sɩ wa-n baalɔ.
Dɩ Jeju tɔr pɔ war sa so war thakɛ ayɩwɔɔ: Fãga fɛʋ, mɛr Thãgba ha, thãgbara ƴũ a gbana thɩɩra.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ jala caarra fɛʋ a na cʋɛ tɩbɩla wɩ do kpãkpãadara. Nɩ gba Thɩrɛ, na Bikuun, na Thu Phuu i a na kpɛana wɩ nyʋɔnɔ;
dɩ na-n dɩrɛ wɩ wa-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ mɩ kɔɔ so narnɩ. Sɩ hɩnɛ, mɛrɛ ma-n har kha na nɛrɛ wire wo wire fɛʋ, gɩ dana thɩɩkɛ pɩ wi.
Kɩɛr gɩ fʋ dɩ a-n mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ dʋɔnnɩ Thãgbaa Bikuun Jeju Kirisitiida,
mɔ̃kɛ Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩ kɔɔ kherenɩ ɔɔ sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Hɩnɛ, mɛr Thãgba thɔna ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃, dɩ na kʋʋl fɩ ƴɩɛ, a gbɛbɩ afɩ hʋ.
Tibil wire gɩ dɩ ga-n hulẽ bəənnə ayɩ: Na-n gbɛbɩrɛ hʋɛ Kɔ̃tɩnna, na-n wɛbɩrɛ ɔɔ hʋ bisɔ gɩ pɔlɔ.”
Mɛ̃ Jã ɩɩr bəənnə da-n kpɛɛ tɩbɩla nyʋɔnɔ da-n sona war ayɩ: Nɩ deba haar sa 'lɛ yɔ kpɛɛrɛ sɩ Thãgba n faa nɩ sopugosɔ.
Dɩ tɩbɩla n kɔɔ ther Jude dɩɩra fɛʋ na Jerujalɛm dɩ wa-n pʋɔraa, dɩ wɩ cã awɩ sopugosɔ sɩ dɩ Jã na-n kpɛɛ wɩ nyʋɔnɔ Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩrra.
Nyɔɔmɛɛ sũu wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋna Jãa kẽkẽekɛ a-n tonɩ dɩ linə lophɛrɛ pelela, sɩ toosõo na thʋʋr n kɔɔ dɔ ɔɔ dɩko.
Sɩ da-n mɩɩ tɩbɩla ayɩ: Bɩɛl hale na kpa mar, a hana fãga a jɔ mɩ, dɩ ma hɩɩrʋʋrakɛ a na thʋbʋʋ nɛfaa pɛ̃a'.
Me wer nyʋɔnɔ mɩ kpɛɛ nɩ, sɩ ɔr, Thu Phuurə a na kpɛɛ nɩ.
Ɔbɔɔlera Jeju kɔɔ the Najarɛtɩɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ Galile dɩɩ a pɔ, dɩ Jã kɔɔ kpɛgʋʋ nyʋɔnɔ Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩrra.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ a-n thenɩ nyʋɔnɔ, a yɩrɛ thãgbara ƴũ dɩɩ phubi bə̃, dɩ Thu Phuu gbũ a ho puusɩ̃ɛ a lʋʋnaa.
Dɩ nʋɔ the thãgbara ƴũ a so: Fɛr dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, fɩ lõ mer haar kpɛ.
Dɩ dapaara Thu Phuu cʋʋ Jeju dɩ jal bəənnə;
a too le wire kpalanyɔ dɩ Satã na-n fifiləə, hɔ̃ nʋma a kɔɔ hana kha le, dɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ n pɔ dɩ wa-n haa gɩrɛ n danaanɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ fʋnɩ Jã a to khaɩra pɩ, gɛr Jeju jaal Galile da-n mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara da-n so ayɩ:
Wire daan dɩ Thãgba na-n gba fãga. Nɩ deba haar sa pɩɛr tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haar.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jejura n jalnɩ na Galile mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔ, a yɩrɛ Sɩmɔ̃ na Ãdire, Sɩmɔ̃ɔ õkuunna dɩ wɩ ha dɩ wa-n dʋna thʋ̃ pherdaakɛ n hɔnɩ jɔ̃ mɩɩr nɔɔra, gɩdonɩ thʋ̃ pherdara ha wɩ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju so war: Na-n kpa mar ɩ̃ cʋʋ nɩ na-n ƴaal tɩbɩla thʋ̃ khaa.
Dɩ dapaara wɩ faarɛ awɩ thʋ̃ pherdasɔ sɩ dɩ wa-n kpaaraa.
Dɩ bir gba na jal gbe, a yɩ Jakɩ na ɔɔ õkuun Jã, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ Jebedee bikona, dɩ wɩ ha gboroona dɩ wa n gbɛbɩ awɩ thʋ̃ pherdasɔ.
Dɩ dapaara a we wer, dɩ wɩ faa awɩ thɩ Jebede gboroona na thɔ̃dara sɩ dɩ wa-n kpaaraa.
Dɩ wɩ jaal dã Kapɛrnayʋm dɩɩra, dɩ hɩɩr wire Jeju lõ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra a ma da-n dɩɩr wɩ.
Dɩ nʋɔ kpaa tɩbɩla ɔɔ dɩɩrra gɩdonɩ a-n dɩɩr wɛr mɔ̃ a hananɩ hʋɛ, ga ho mɔ̃ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ n dɩɩrnɩ tɩbɩla ga.
Dɩ le wɩ yɩ kũu bɩɛl Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, kɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl hananɩ, dɩ a hulene ayɩ:
Ee, anye sɩ ha kha na fɛr Najarɛtɩ Jeju? Fɩ ɩnɛ fɩ kʋɛ sɩ ya? Mɩ jɩrɛ ntɛ fɩ donɩ: Thãgbaa Tɩɩ phu fɩ do.
Sɩ Jeju manaanɛ ayɩ: Pɩra, sa thɛ kuunnaale.
Mɔ̃kɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔlɩle cʋʋnɩ kuunile dɩ ji da-n laan, a hulene sa the dɩphã.
Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩ wa-n bule khasɔ bɩɛlbɩɛl aa: Anye gɩ ya fɛ? Dɩɩr kpɩɩ gɩ; a-n mar kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔlasɔrarakɛ dɩ puno wi, dɩ wa-n nɩɩ nũu.
Dɩ ɔɔ i kpaar dapaara Galile dɩɩra fɛʋ.
Ɔbɔɔle wɩ kɔɔ thenɩ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, wɩ jaal dapaara na Jakɩ na Jã, a lõ Sɩmɔ̃ na Ãdiree cɔ.
Dɩ Sɩmɔ̃ɔ khɛrɩ nɩ gɩ, a ji tomɩ kporre, dɩ dapaara wɩ sor Jejura.
Dɩ Jeju pɔ fʋʋ nyɔ̃ɔ, a khəi dɩ ɩɩr, dɩ dapaara tomɩ kporre ɩɩraa dɩ cɛ wɩ nyʋɔn.
Dʋɔrɔ ɔbɔɔkɛ wire lonɩ pɩ, tɩbɩla kɔɔ gbaar khodara fɛʋ na kpãkpũdara dɩ wa-n pɔna Jejura,
dɩ dɩdara fɛʋ kɔɔ gbɛbɩrɛ kha dɩ wa-n der cɔ lõfonʋɔra.
Dɩ a kpɛɛrɛ khodara jɔɔkɛ kho caar dɩɩdɩɩ fʋnɩ dɩ wa-n gaar, sa weena dakha kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ jɔɔ a faa, sɩ aa-n tu kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ n mɩa nʋɔa', gɩdonɩ wɩ jɩɩrɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ yɔl ko khɩɩ bɔɔ na kɔɔ danɩ pa', gɛr Jeju mãa ɩrɛrɔ a the jal dɩ khuirə, dɩ le a too dɩbara da n bɩɛl Thãgba.
Dɩ Sɩmɔ̃ na ɔɔ 'walãkhasɔ the jal dɩ wa-n ƴaalʋʋ;
ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩɩnɩ wɩ sʋʋraarɛ ayɩ: Tɩbɩla fɛʋ n ƴaal fɛr.
Sɩ Jeju so war: Nɩ ɩna sɩ jal dɩkhãa pa dɩɩraakɛ maanɩ gbe, ɩ̃ mɩɩ le dakha Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ, gɩdonɩ gɛr mɩ ɩnɔ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ a jal paar fɛʋ Galile dɩɩra, da-n mɩɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, da-n weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ da-n faa.
Gbuuluu gɩ, a pɔ Jejura, a gulẽgaraa da-n phʋʋrʋʋ ayɩ: Ado fɩ ture fɩ punone cʋʋ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ gbuul pɩ.
Dɩ bʋɔ fʋ Jeju dɩ 'laa nyɔ̃ɔ a thaaraa sa so: Mɩ ture afɩ gbuul n pɛ.
Dɩ dapaara gbuule pɩɩraa dɩ kpɛɛ.
Sɩ Jeju sʋʋraarɛ a kɔna sɩ a jɩɛ kpãkpaanaa na sobɔr ayɩ:
Jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ fa-n so tibillə ga, sɩ jala nɛna Thãgbaa bonɩ jidaar mɔ̃ fɩ hanɩ, sa 'laanɛ phɔphʋɔl thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sonɩ, gɩ nɩna tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩ fɩ kpɛɛrɛ.

Sɩ kuunile jaal, a ma a be da-n wɩɛl paar fɛʋ gɩrɛ kɔɔ danaanɩ; gelela dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ Jeju na-n puno dɩ lõ dɩ bɩnɔ bã; sɩ dɩ khuirə a-n too kãkɛ tɩbɩla na-n hana', dɩ tɩbɩla n ther paar fɛʋ dɩ wa-n pʋɔraa.
A wire gbe kɔɔ ka, Jeju bire pɔ Kapɛrnayʋm, dɩ wɩ nɩɛrɛ a hale cʋɔrɔ.
Dɩ tibil jɔ kɔɔ gbɛbɩ kha der le dɩ a do too paar na yɩrɛ bã, dɩ phiilo gɩrakɛ lõfonɔa'. Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ a-n mɩɩ wɩnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ,
tɩbɩla pɔr na gbãgbaʋʋkɛ tɩbɩla yenã heennɩ.
Sɩ ga do wa punone na dana Jejuu thɛtha', gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla jɔrɛ ka, gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ hɩɩnɔ ka Jeju hanɩ sa cu kaar le nãsʋrɔ, sa gba gbãgbarʋra na ɔɔ jɔ̃ a tona kaarra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju yɩnɩ awɩ ha pɛ, a sor gbãgbarʋra ayɩ: Ɩ̃ kuun, afɩ sopugosɔ hɛl farɛ.
Sɩ wɩ̃ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔɔkɛ hanɩle n sor na awɩ bɩ̃ aa:
Anyee tibil ca ha ʋrɛ a mɩɩ da-n kʋɛna Thãgbaa i thakɛ? Amɛ n punone dɩ faa sopugo saagado Thãgba gɩ dɩbara ga?
Dɩ dapaara Jeju jɩ na ɔɔ ha mɔ̃ wɩ-n kpɩɛrnɩ awɩ bɩnɔ a so war: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ nɩ hana kpɩɛr caar thale anɩ bɩnɔ?
Gɩmɔ̃ yɔɔnɛ sorra gbãgbarʋra: Sopugo hɛl farɛ gɩ yaa, agɩbo: Ɩrɛ, gba afɩ jɔ̃ na jala gɩ?
Sɩ mɩ ƴaalɛ nɩ jɛ dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun hananɛ hʋɛ thɩɩra dɩ ɩ̃ faana sopugo, sa bir so gbãgbarʋra:
Mɩ so farɛ, ɩrɛ gba afɩ jɔ̃ na kɔna.
Dɩ dapaara dɩ ɩɩr gba ɔɔ jɔ̃, dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ yɩɩ dɩ sa da-n the, dɩ nʋɔ kpaa wɩ dɩ wa-n khɩɩ Thãgba dɩ wa-n sona ayɩ: Sɩ kɔɔ thenɩ dɩɩra, sa kɔɔ yɩ thɩ̃ɛ thakɛ kpɩɩa'.
Dɩ Jeju bire kɛr bir mɩɩr nɔɔra, dɩ tibil jɔ na-n pʋɔraa da-n dɩɩr wɩ.
Sɩ a-n kar a yɩ Levɩ, Alfee bikuun dɩ too war gba paar da-n tee war, dɩ sʋʋraa: Na kpa mar; dɩ ɩɩr da-n kpaaraa.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju toonɩ dɩko kho paar Levɩɩ cɔ, war gbadara na sopugodara jɔɔ toonaanɛ na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara dakha, gɩdonɩ wa tibil casɔɔle n kpaaraanɩ wɩ jɔrɛ.
Dɩ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ a bir dona jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ kɔɔ yɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ Jeju n khonɩ dɩkor na sopugodara na war gbadara, wɩ sor ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara: Mɔ̃gɩdo da-n kho dɩkor na war gbadara na sopugodara?
Dɩ Jeju nɩɛ mɔ̃ wɩ-n sonɩ a so war: Ga do tɩɩ khena n kɔɔ ƴaalɛ dɔtɔrɔa', sɩ wɩrɛ gɩ-n khonɩ gɩ. Ga do tɩɩ sara mɩ ɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴaala', sɩ sopugodara wɛ.

Wi bɩɛl mɔ̃kɛ Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ kpãkpãadara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ kɔɔ lini nʋɔ, tɩbɩla jaal a bule Jeju: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ kpãkpãadara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraa kpãkpãadara na-n li nʋɔ, sɩ afɩ kpãkpãadara wer na-n li nʋɔa'.
Dɩ Jeju tu wi: Nɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ dɩ wɩrɛ wɩ wenɩ herra na punone na li nʋɔ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ kha na khɛr he ya? Kpei. Bɔɔ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ toonanɩ kha khɛr he wa puno na li nʋɔa'.
Sɩ wire na hale wa hɛl warnɩ khɛr he, dawiile wa li nʋɔ dɩphã.
Tibil na gba kẽkẽ phaa na coorna kẽkẽ tɩ̃ɩ na bɛba'. A a cʋʋ mɛ̃, daphaa na-n haalɛ datɩ̃ɩ gɩ ɓəər gɩ puuro ga-n pɛr.
Tibil na gba thʋʋrɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ daphaa na pɛr bʋla tɩɩna ga. A a cʋʋ mɛ̃ thʋʋr na wɩɛlɛ bʋla tɩ̃ɩle, gɩ do thʋʋr na bʋlaa kʋɛrɛ fɛʋ, sɩ dɔ fɩ pɛ thʋ phaa bʋla phaara oti.
Hɩɩr wi bɩɛl Jeju n kɔɔ kar a lõ jʋ lɩɛra, dɩ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ-n jalnɩ na hʋɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara 'laarɛ a kha jɔ a kho.
Dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara sʋʋraa: Fa yɩ mɔ̃ afɩ kpãkpãadara n cʋʋnɩ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ yɩnɩ gɩ-n sãsɩrɛ hɩɩr wirəə?
Dɩ Jeju tu wi: Na kɔɔ yɩɛ sɛbɛra gɩrɛɛkɛ Davɩdɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ ƴaalnɩ dɩkor gɩdonɩ kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋʋrɛ na wɩrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ kha gaa?
Mee a kɔɔ lʋʋn Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɔ ɔbɔɔkɛ Abɩataar kɔɔ donɩ Thãgbaa gbõdaar, a gba buruukɛ wɩ-n hanɩ Thãgba kɛ n sãsɩnɛnɩ tɩɩ khɩnana a kho, a ɩɩr wo a ha tɩbɩlaakɛ a hananɩ.
Sɩ Jeju bire so war: Tibil Thãgba cʋʋ hɩɩr wire a ha, aa ti tibil a ha hɩɩr wirə'.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun do Kɔ̃tɩn hɩɩr wirerarakɛ.
Agɩpɩ Jeju bir lõ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra wo; dɩ le a yɩ kuunikɛ nyɔ̃ɔ khini.
Dɩ wɩrɛ hanɩle jʋʋr Jeju dɩ wa-n hɩɩn ado a na kpɛɛrɛ kuunile hɩɩr wire, gɩdonɩ wɩ-n ƴaalɛ wɩ pɛr Jejura sor.
Dɩ Jeju so kuunnaale nyɔ̃ɔ khini ayɩ: Ɩrɛ jɩlɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Sa bir bule wi: Hɩɩr wire teana bɔ cʋʋrɛ yaa puu cʋʋrɛ, agɩbo fɩ taa tibil yaa, fɩ kʋ tibil? Sɩ wɩ pɩrrɛ pɔbɩ.
Dɩ haar n heluule gɩdonɩ awɩda khɩɩrɛ, dɩ hɩɩn wɩ na nĩkhii da-n finə sa bir so kuunna: 'Laanɛ afɩ nyɔ̃; dɩ 'laa dɩɩ do gɩ kpɛɛrɛ.
Dɩjɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara the, a gbɛbɩ kha dapaara na Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ too dɩ wa-n gʋʋr mɔ̃ wa fʋnɩ sɩ wɩ kʋ Jeju.
Sɩ Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara gbaar jal mɩɩr nɔɔra, dɩ tibil jɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃ kɔɔ kpaaraarɛ. Ɩkhasɔ ther Galile, na Jude,
na Jerujalɛm, na ldume dɩɩra, na Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩr iiro, na Tɩɩr na Sɩdɔ̃ dɩ khʋra. Tibil jɔɔle pɔr Jejura thale gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ a-n cʋʋnɩ wɩ nɩɛ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ Jeju so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara wɩ gbɛbɩrɛ nar too paar gboroona a thɩnɛ, dɩ mɛ̃ tɩbɩla na yɩ nɩ gbʋɔr paara'.
Gɩdonɩ a-n kpɛɛrɛ khodara jɔɔ, gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩrɛ gɩ-n khonɩ n hiirəə ɩna-n thaaraa.
Dɩ bɔɔ wo bɔɔkɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔla n yɩɩnɩ, wɩ-n jire thʋnɔ ɔɔ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn dɩ wa-n be hulẽbe dɩɩ khɩɩr ka, dɩ wɩ yɩ: Fɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun.
Sɩ Jeju n kpãkpãa warɛ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka dɩ wa-n so ntɛ ɩnɩ dona'.
Agɩpɩ Jeju jʋʋn gɔ̃gʋɔna, sa we tɩbɩlaakɛ a-n ƴaalnɩ dɩ wɩ pʋɔraa.
Dɩ a phiire yʋɔr yenyɔ wa-n ha kha na ɔr a thɔ̃ wɩ wɩ jal wa-n mɩɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ;
a ha wɛr dakha punone dɩ wa weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ.
Yʋɔr yenyɔɔkɛ ha wɩrɛ a phiirni: Sɩmɔ̃ ɔr a dʋ ire Pɩɛr,
Jakɩ na ɔɔ õkuun Jã, Jebedee bikona wɛ; wɛr Jeju ha ire Boanɛrjɛsɩ, kɩrʋ dʋɔn wɩrɛ n phaanɛnɩ oro'oro thãgba phɛɛ khaa;
Ãdire, Filipi, Bartelemɩ, Matiə, Tomasɩ, Jakɩ Alfee bikuun, Tade, Sɩmɔ̃ɔkɛ dʋɔnnɩ gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ tibil,
na Judasɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Karɩyɔtɩ dɩɩra, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ lirenanɩ Jeju.
Agɩpɩ Jeju kɛr bir kɔ̃ cʋɔrɔ, dɩ tɩbɩla bir wo a gbɛbɩ kha le, dɩ ga do Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara na ba yɩrɛ ƴɩɛrakɛ na kho dɩkora'.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ɔɔ too nɩɛnɩ wɩ kɔɔ pɔr wɩ kpaa, gɩdonɩ a thɩɛna gaa wɩ yɩ: Yʋʋ buure.
Dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Jerujalɛm a pɔ so ayɩ: Bɛljɛbulikɛ dʋɔnnɩ Satã lʋʋnaanɛ, wo: Ɔrkɛra dɔnɩ yʋʋ kɔ̃tɛɛbiirə n hanaa fãga dɩ weena kɔ̃tɛɛbii.
Dɩ Jeju we wɩ a so war sokpaakɛ thakɛ ayɩ: Mɔ̃ Satã na puno na wee dɩbara?
A fãgadaarɩ dɩ bɩɛl tɩnɛ a na ke kha, fãgadaarɩ dɩ dɔɔle na jɩɩla'.
A cɔ bɩɛl gɩɩkɛ tɩnɛnɛnɩ a na ke kha, cɔ dɔɔle na jɩɩla'.
A Satã na kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ na ɔɔbara dɩ tɩnɛ paar har ɔɔ fãga dɩra, ɔɔ puno na jal bã sɩ ga pɩrɛ.
Tibil na puno na lõ na fãga kũu khɩɩ cɔ na taaraa thɩ̃ɛ, saagado ɔr a kɔɔ li ɓoaa ga, a a punoo ɓo dɩphã gɛr a na taaraa thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ cʋɔrɔ.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar gel: Thãgba na faarɛ tɩbɩlaa sopugosɔ fɛʋ na ɔɔ i kʋɛɛkɛ wɩ-n kʋɛnɩ.
Sɩ tibilikɛ na kʋɛanɩ Thu Phuu i, Thãgba na faa ga sopugo caale yuuraka', sɩ sor na heenuune khorr.
Jeju mɩɩrɛ thakɛ gɩdonɩ wɩ yɩ: Kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl lʋʋnaanɛ.
Le Jejuu nɩ na ɔɔ õkũu bɩnɔsɔ dã, a jɩɩl phiilo sa thɔ̃ wɩɩ.
Sɩ tibil jɔ kɔɔ toore a diirəə dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa: Pɛ nũu, afɩ nɩ na afɩ õkona har phiilo dɩ wa-n bule fi.
Dɩ tu wi: Amɛ n dʋɔn ɩ̃ nɩ, na ɩ̃ õkona?
Sɩ a mar a hɩɩn wɩrɛ tɔɔnɩ a diirəə da-n finə sa so: Wɩrɛɛkɛ dʋɔn ɩ̃ nɩ na ɩ̃ õkona;
gɩdonɩ ɩibilikɛ n cʋɛɩɩɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ, wa tibilile dʋɔn ɩ̃ õkuun, na ɩ̃ õkhɛr, na ɩ̃ nɩ.
Jeju bire a ma wo da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ mɩɩr nɔɔra, dɩ tibil jɔ gbɛbɩ pʋɔraa a der, gɛr hɩna dɩ jʋʋn a too gboroona mɩɩr nɔ nyʋɔnɔ, sɩ dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ too thɩɩra mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔra.
Dɩ a dɩɩr wɛr thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ na sokpaa, a so warɛ ɔɔ dɩɩrra ayɩ:
Nɩ pɛ nũu: Bi jaldaar gɩ, a the da-n jal be.
Mɔ̃kɛ a-n jalnɩ yɛ̃ bi jire hʋɛra, dɩ 'lominə pɔ uul.
Yɛ ji wo bokanana ka thɩ nʋʋn na jɔrna', a phu dapaara kɔrɔ gɩdonɩ ga jɩɩ mʋʋ a hulõə';
sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wire phanɩ dɩ ɩtʋɛ hẽ, gɩ ɔ̃'ɔlɔnɛ a khi, gɩdonɩ nɛɛ na hala'.
Yɛ ji wo ka u nɛɛ hanɩ, dɩ uu ɩɩr a sɩlã gɩ dɩ ga se bə'.
Yɛ ji thɩ bʋɔra, a phu, a khɔ̃, a bɩ̃, bi bɩɛl n bɩnɛ dɩ hana be kpelẽ yʋɔr, ɩkha kpalãther, ɩkha tamaa.
Sɩ Jeju so warɛ ayɩ: Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu dɩ nɩna, dɔ a na-n pɛ nũu.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ aa kɔɔ hanɩ kha na tibil jɔɔle bã, wɩrɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ totoosɔ na kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ wɩ buleele sokpaa kɩrra.
Dɩ so war: Nɛr Thãgba kɔɔ ha nɩ jɛ thɩ̃ gbulikɛ dʋɔnnɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar do, sɩ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ tɩɩ khina, sokpaa thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ do war,
dɩ mɛ̃, “Wa-n hɩɩn sɩ wa yɩ ga, wa-n nɩɛ dakha sɩ wa jɩ kɩrʋa', a mɛ̃ gaa, ga hor wa kɛrrɛ na bir Thãgbara a na 'lɛ sopugo faarɛ.”
Sɩ Jeju bire so war wo: Dɩ a na jɩ sokpaakɛ kɩrʋa', mɔ̃ na fʋ sɩ na jɩ gɩ̃ sokpasɔ fɛʋ kɩrʋ?
Thãgbaa so bi jaldaar n jal.
Ɩkhaa tibilsɔ hʋrɛ hʋ nʋɔ ka sor kɔɔ jalnɩ. Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n nɩɛnɩ, Satã n pɔr dapaara dɩ tiir sorɩkɛ kɔɔ direni awɩ hara.
Mɛna gɩ ha na wɩrɛ hɔnɩ boka thɩɩ ka be kɔɔ jalnɩ. Wɛr dɔ wɩrɛ n nɩɛnɛnɩ Thãgbaa so dɩ wɩ tu na daʋ dapaara,
sɩ wa-n sɩrɔ Thãgbaa so dɩɩ yɩ nɛ gɔ paar awɩ hara ga. Bɔɔ gbe wɩ-n pər gar dɩbara, sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩwɛ na kpoore n danɩ, dɩɩ do Thãgbaa soolera dɔ nɔɔ, dɩɩ do dapaara wɩ faarɛ ha pɛrɛ.
Wɛ n nɩɛrɛ Thãgbaa so, sɩ dɩ wɩ ho ka uu hanɩ sɩ be jallɔ;
sɩ dɩɩ do dɛr bɔɔraakɛra na lẽle thɩ̃ kpɩɛr fifiləle na gɩ̃ ha pɩɛrsɔ, gele n ɩrɛ dɩɩ sɩlã Thãgbaa soolera dɩ ga-n puno na se bə'.
Wɩrɛ n nɩɛnɛnɩ Thãgbaa so dɩ wɩ tu, wɛr hʋɔn thɩ bʋɔ, ka be kɔɔ jalnɩ dɩɩ do wɩ-n ser be: Bɩɛl n ser kpelẽ yʋɔr, dɩkha kpalãther, dɩkha tamaa bi bɩɛlla.
Sɩ Jeju bire bule wi wo: Wɩ-n gbaar lãphã pɛ a suuro bɩlãkpʋʋn kã? Dɩ agɩbo dɩ wɩ to kakala ballɔ kã? Mee bilela wɩ-n dɛ̃ɛ.
Thɩ̃ɛ na hale na ker sɩ ga do wɩ cʋʋrɛ dɩɩ thaa ga; thɩ̃ɛ na hale na ha gbul sɩɩ do ga yɩraa ga.
Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu dɩ nɩna, dɔ a na-n pɛ nũu.
A bire so war wo: Na-n jɩɛ dʋ gɩrɛraakɛ nɩ nɩɛnɩ bʋrɛ; mɩɛda caakɛ nɩ kɔɔ mɩɛnanɩ thɩ̃ɛ, ɔr wa mɩɛna na ha nɩ sɩ na dɛbɩna nar kɔ̃dɩ̃.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛ hananɩ thɩ̃ɛ, Thãgba na bire na haa na dɛbɩrɔ; sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ thɩ̃a', Thãgba na tiirəərerakɛ phubi gɩrɛɛkɛ a hananɩ.
Jeju bire a so wo: Thãgbaa fãgadaar do, gɩ hʋrɛ tibilikɛ n jalanɩ be lɔɔ;
sɩ a a-n daarɛ, a a-n ɩɩrɛ, dɩtɩnɔ na dɩwɩlʋ yo, sɩ gɩ-n phaan phulole dɩɩ phu, sɩ aa-n jɩ mɔ̃ gɩ fʋna';
faa thɩɩ thɛthɛ n cʋʋ dɩɩ phu ɓo, agɩpɩ dɩɩ pemi sa hana be dɩphã.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ gɩ bɩnɩ pɩ, dapaara dɩɩ do wɩ-n khar gɩdonɩ bɔɔ daan.
Jeju bire a so war wo aa: Anye sa gba na mɩɛna mɔ̃ Thãgbaa fãgadaar do hanɩ, anyee sokpa ca sa gba na mɩɛna?
Gɩ hʋrɛ beekɛ wɩ-n wenɩ seneve wɩ-n diirni, fɩɩʋ a-n ha dɩ jɔ be fɛʋ thɩɩra.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ diiruuni pɩ, a-n ɩɩrɛ dɩ wabɩ dɩ jɔ thɩr bii fɛʋ; a-n hananɛ jɛ̃ kɔ̃tɩna dɩ 'lominə n puno dɩ wa-n tɛllɔ.
Sokpa caar thakɛ jɔɔ a-n kɔɔ mɩɩna tɩbɩla Thãgbaa so mɔ̃ wa punoni na nɩɛ;
aa-n kɔɔ mɩɩna wɩ saagado sokpa gaaga, sɩ a a ha kha na kpãkpãadara dɩbara gɛr a-n mɩɛ war kɩrʋ.
Ga wiilera dʋɔsɛʋ Jeju so war: Nɩ dɔ sɩ iir iiro.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ faa tɩbɩla sa phɛl gborõokɛ a harɔnɩ a jal, sɩ yɛ̃ gborõ kɔɔ hanaanɛ kha.
Dɩ thãgba jɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ ɩɩr na fãga, dɩ nyʋɔn ubi a lõ gboroona, dɩ wa jɩ dɩɩ do gɩ 'lire dɩ ga-n hi gborõo.
Sɩ Jeju ha gborõ sɩkaar, a jəə yʋʋ da-n daar; dɩ wɩ jagʋʋrɛ a sʋʋraa: Dɩɩrdaar fa-n therna asɩ kʋɛra sɩ-n kʋɛnaa?
Dɩ mɛ̃ a jaa a mana jɩɛ aa: Pɩra; a sona mɩɩr nɔ nyʋɔnna aa: Jɩlɛ cɔcɔ; dɩ jɩɛ kur dɩ thɩ̃ɛ na hale dɩɩ tutugo bã.
Sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ so war: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ maar fʋ nɩ thakɛ? Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na pɛr Thãgba haara?
Maar fʋ wɛr na sobɔr sɩ dɩ wa-n bule kha bɩɛlbɩɛl aa: Anyee tibil ca ha ʋrɛ, dɩ jɩɛrakɛ na mɩɩr nɔ nyʋɔn na-n nɩɩ nũu?
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ daan mɩɩr nɔ iiro Jerajedaraa dʋɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju thenɩ gboroona, dapaara kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl ther khi dʋ paar da-n caanʋʋ.
Kuunile khi dʋ paar a-n cɔ dɩ dakha tibil na-n puno dɩ lii 'lo bã, jɔrkɔrakɛ na-n puno dɩɩ liə';
gɩdonɩ wa-n bʋʋ lirə', sɩ wɩ-n kɔɔ baraanɛ na ther dɩ wɩ linəə dakha jɔrkɔ, sɩ a-n kɔɔ hallɛ jɔrkɔ dɩ phʋ̃ dɩ bɛɛna therɩle dɩ khaar, sɩ tibillakɛ na hale dɩ punooə'.
Bɔɔ fɛʋ, dɩtɩnɔ na dɩwɩlʋ, khi dʋ paarsɔ na gɔ̃gʋɔna a-n ha da-n hulẽ, sɩ dɩ gba bokana da-n liirena tomɩr.
Dɩ mɔ̃ a 'laanɩ yɩ Jeju ƴɔɔ, a car a caanʋʋ a gburõkuraa,
sa hulẽ nʋɔ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ: Anye fɛrɛ na mɛrɛ ha kha, fɛr Jeju Thãgba Kəkəədaarɩ Bikuun? Mɩ-n phʋʋr fɛr na Thãgbaa i, fa-n hʋɔl mara'.
A sor thale gɩdonɩ Jeju kɔɔ sʋʋraarɛ: Thɛ kuunnaale, fɛr kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl.
Dɩ Jeju bulee: Mɔ̃ afɩ i n do? Dɩ tu: Ɩ̃ i n dʋɔn dajɔ gɩdonɩ sɩ jɔrɛ.
Sɩ a-n phʋʋrɛ Jeju dɩɩ ka ayɩ, a na-n wee kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔlala a faa dɩ khuirə ga.
Sɩ dabulo sɩthɔ jɔɔ wɛ a kɔɔ hale gɔ̃gɔ̃ khʋra dɩ wa-n khʋʋl.
Dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbiirə phʋʋr Jeju ayɩ: Thɔna sɩ sɩ jal sɩ lõ sɩthɔrara.
Dɩ ha wɩ hʋɛ wɩ jala, dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔla ther a jal a lõ sɩthɔsɔra bɩnɔ, a tinə wi dɩ wɩ ca birbirbir na gɔ̃gɔ̃ horʋ, a jiir mɩɩr nɔɔra; wɩ kɔɔ daan sɩthɔ gbɩlanɩ yenyɔ a kɔɔ mʋʋlɛ nyʋɔnɔ a khiir.
Dɩ wɩrɛ n khɛ wɩnɩ, wɩ kɔɔ caar kɔ̃ a mɩɩ dɩɩra na dɩ biisɔra mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛɛle hanɩ, dɩ tɩbɩla ther jal a hɩɩn mɔ̃ gɩ hanɩ.
Dɩ wɩ pɔr Jejura a yɩ ʋrɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbii kɔɔ harɔnɩ, kɛ kɔɔ hananɩ dajɔ, dɩ too, a to kɩ̃kɩɩn a hanana dakha yʋ bʋɔ, dɩ maar kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr fɛʋ.
Wɩrɛ kɔɔ yɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ cʋɛnɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ wɛr gɩrɛ kɔɔ dananɩ ʋrɛ kɔɔ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbii, na gɩrɛ kɔɔ dananɩ sɩthɔsɔ.
Dɩ le wɩ kɔɔ ma dɩ wa-n phʋʋr Jeju a thɛ wɩ dɩɩra.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju n lonɩ gboroona, kuunile kɔɔ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbii phʋʋrʋʋrɛ a dɔ ɩnɩ-n do ɔɔ totoo.
Sɩ Jeju bor sa sʋʋraa: Kɔna afɩ cɔ afɩ too thɩ̃thɩɩn, a mɩɛnɛ wɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ cʋʋ farnɩ, na mɔ̃ a kɔɔ jɩ fɩnɩ bʋɔra.
Dɩ mɛ̃ a kɔɔ jal a be da-n wɩɛl paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Dekapol gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Jeju kɔɔ cʋʋraanɩ, dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Sɩ Jeju kɔɔ bire iir na gborõo gɩ̃ iiro, dɩ tibil jɔ bir gbɛbɩ wo a pʋɔraa, sɩ mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔra a kɔɔ ha.
Dɩ kuunikɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jaɩrʋsɩ, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ kɔ̃tɩn Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, pɔr a yɩɩ a jiirəə ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn,
sɩ da-n phʋʋrʋʋ ayɩ: Gɩ-n khor ɩ̃ bikhɛr bu da-n ɓɔr; ɩna dɛɛnaa nyɛ̃ɛ a tagaa a le.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju na kuunile jal kha, sɩ tibil jɔ hiirəəre a thʋ̃ dɩ wa-n cʋɔrʋʋ mɔ̃ wɩ-n jalnɩ.
Dɩ khɛ bɩɛl gɩ, a hale a hana tɩ̃ɩ a cʋʋna yɛna yʋɔr yenyɔ.
A kɔɔ gaarɛ bʋɔ jɔɔ ka thɩdara jɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ, dɩ mɛ̃ a kʋɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ a hananɩ, sɩrakɛ ga-n haaraa kpɩa', sɩɩ do gɩ ka dɩ a-n dɛbɩrɔrɛ;
dɩ a sor na ɔɔ bɩ̃: A mɩ puno a thar ɔɔ kẽkenanakɛ dɩbara, ma kpɛɛrɛ.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ a-n kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ Jejuuda, a pɔr a 'lɔɔ tibil jɔraale thɩ̃thɩɩn Jejuu khiro a thaaraa kɩ̃kɩɩnna.
Dɩ dapaara ɔɔ tɔmɩ̃ theele kur, dɩ jɩ ɔɔ tomɩra tue dɩɩ do a kpɛɛrɛ.
Dɩ le Jeju jɩ na ɔɔ ha dɩ fãga the narɛ gbe, a kɩɩl a bule: Amɛ thaan mar kɩ̃kɩɩnna?
Dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara sʋʋraa: Fe yɩ tibil jɔ dɩ wɩ hi far thakɛ sɩ dɩ fɩ yɩ, amɛ thaan farɩ?
Sɩ Jeju borrakɛ sa hɩɩn da-n finə ɩnɩ-n jɩ ntɛ cʋɛnɩ thalera.
Dɩ maar fʋ khɛr da-n jẽ a jɩnɩ gɩrɛ danaanɩ, a pɔr a ji Jejuu ƴɛra sa sʋʋraa casɩ mɔ̃ gɩ haaraanɩ.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Ɩ̃ bikhɛr afɩ ha pɛ taa fɩ, kɔna na ha ɩɩ a tɔɔna tomɩ kheu.
Mɔ̃ a hanɩ mɩɩrɔ, tɩbɩla ther Jaɩrʋsɩ kɔ̃tɩnɩ cɔ a pɔ a so: Afɩ bikhɛr khire, anye fɩ-n vɔɔrɔ Dɩɩrdaar 'lo?
Sɩ Jeju na therna gɩrɛ wɩ sona', sɩ a sor Jaɩrʋsɩra: Fa-n do haar n ubi fa', pɩɛr haar dɩbara.
Sɩ Jeju na tu tibil bɩɛl n ɩhɔaa saagado Pɩɛr na Jakɩ na Jã, Jakɩɩ õkuunna gaaga.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ kɔɔ dã Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩnɩ pa, dɩ Jeju yɩ mɔ̃ khʋ̃ɛ hanɩ, a yɩna tɩbɩla dɩ wa-n bɩ dɩ wa-n bena hulẽbi khena;
dɩ a lʋʋn sa so war: Anye nɩ-n khʋɔn thakɛ, dɩ anye nɩ-n bɩrɔ, bɩsaanɩkɛ na khə', a-n daarɛ.
Sɩ wɩ-n maanʋʋnɛ, dɩ agɩpɩ a tire tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩ wɩ thɩɩr, sɩ dɩ kpa bɩsaanɩlee thɩ na nɩrɛ, na wɩrɛ kɔɔ thɔgɔɔnɩ dɩ wɩ lõ ka bɩsaan hanɩ,
dɩ fʋʋ nyɔ̃ɔ sa sʋʋraa: Talɩta kumɩ; kɩrʋ dʋɔn: Khebir, mɩ so farɛ pala ɩrɛ.
Dɩ dapaara khebir pal ɩɩr a ma da-n sa, gɩdonɩ a hananɛ yɛna yʋɔr yenyɔ; dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Sɩ Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ na sobɔr dɩ wa-n do tibil n jɩ thɩ̃ɛɛla', sɩ a sor wɩ hana khebirile dɩkor a kho.
Sɩ Jeju kɔɔ ther le a jal ɔɔ dʋɔ, dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ thɔgʋʋrɛ.

Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ hɩɩr wire kɔɔ danɩ, a kɔɔ mar da-n dɩɩr wɩ thɩ̃ɛ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra; dɩ nʋɔ kpaa tibil jɔɔkɛ kɔɔ nɩɛnɛnɩ dɩ wa-n so: Ka a yɩ ga thɩ̃ casɔɔkɛ? Anyee kpɛsɛ ca ha gɩrɛ a hananɩ? Dɩ mɔ̃ a fʋ sɩ da-n cʋʋ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ ca gɩrɛ?
Ga do thɩ̃ khaadaar gɩ, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ Marɩɩ bikuunaa? Ga do Jakɩ, na Jojɩ, na Juudi, na Sɩmɔ̃ɔ õkuun a doaa? Dɩ ɔɔ õkhɛrsɔ na ha kha kɛ na sɛrɛaa? Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ-n beesuu.
Sɩ Jeju so warɛ: Wɩ-n cʋrɛ Thãgbaa bobon paar fɛʋ, sɩ ɔɔ dʋɔ na ɔɔ too thɩ̃thɩɩn na ɔɔ cɔ, wa-n cʋa'.
Dɩ Jeju na-n puno dɩ cʋʋ le nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ bɩɛl, saagado ɩkhaa khodaarsɔ gbe a-n dɛɛnɔ nyɛ̃ɛ dɩ wɩ kpɛaa ga.
Nʋɔ kɔɔ kpagʋʋrɛ gɩdonɩ wa-n pɩɛ haara'. Sɩ Jeju kɔɔ kpaarɛ le dɩ khuirəsɔ da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ.
Sɩ agɩpɩ, dɩ we yʋɔr yenyɔ, a ma da-n thɔ̃ wɩ yenyɔ yenyɔ, a ha wɩ punone kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔlala.
Sɩ a so warɛ, wa-n gba thɩ̃ɛ fʋrɔ jalna kpaar paar saagado gbʋʋl dɩbara gaaga; ayɩ, wa-n fʋrɔ buruə', wa-n fʋrɔ kpakpaar lokaara', wa-n fʋrɔ war pɔtɩmana ga,
sɩ wɩ tɔ nɛfaa sɩ wa-n to kẽkena yenyɔa'.
Sɩ dɩ so war: Ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ lonɩ cɔ bɩɛlla, nɩ tɔɔ le gɩ dana wireekɛ na thenɩ pa dɔɔle.
Sɩ ado paar hale kãkɛ tɩbɩla na tee nɩna', wa-n pɛ nɩ dakha nũə', nɩ thɛ pa dɔɔle sa kpɛɛnɛ thɩlãkobeekɛ ma nɩnɩ nɛɛ a faa war, gɩ nɩna wɩ thɩmɩɩr.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara jaal dɩ wa-n so war wa-n deba haar,
dɩ wɩ-n weenanɛ dakha kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ jɔɔ dɩ wa-n faa, sɩ dɩ wɩ pɛr khodara jɔɔ niin dɩ wa-n kpɛɛ.
Dɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ fãgadaar nɩɛrɛ gɩdonɩ Jejuu i kpaarɛ paar fɛʋ, dɩ wɩ so ayɩ: Jã Batɩsɩtɩ gɩ, ɔr ɩrɛ khirera, gɛr gɩ dɩ puno da-n cʋʋ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛɛle.
Ɩkhasɔ n yɩ wo: Elɩ gɩ; wɛ n yɩ: Thãgbaa bobon gɩ mɔ̃kɛ mamadara kɔɔ hanɩ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩ nɩɛnɩ a sor: Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩkɛ mɩ kɔɔ kʋnɩ a kur yʋʋ gɩ, ɔr ɩrɛ khirera.
Gɩdonɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ thɛthɛ yɩ wɩ fɔ Jã a le tɔ khaɩra. A cʋʋrɛ thale gɩ da Ɛrɔdɩadɩraakɛ dʋɔnnɩ ɔɔ õkuun Filipii khɛr a taanɩ a he;
dɩ Jã sʋʋraa ga teena a taa ɔɔ õkuuni khɛr a hea'.
Gɛr hɩna dɩ Ɛrɔdɩadɩ pɛ Jã bɩnɔ da-n ƴaal a kʋʋ, sɩɩ do aa-n mara'.

Gɩdonɩ maar n fʋrɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩ Jana, gɩdonɩ a jɩrɛ dɩɩ do tɩɩ sarʋ gɩ na tɩɩ phuu, dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ na-n ƴaal Jã n yɛ puurə'; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a-n nɩɛnɩ Jãa thɩmɩɩ kpɩɛrɛ nyanyaanɛ, sɩrakɛ gɩ-n daaraarɛ da-n pɩɛ nũu.
Sɩ ga kpaanɛ waa dɩɩ do wireekɛ wa jɩnanɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ kɔ̃ wi daan; dɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ cʋʋ dɩkɔ jɔɔ, a wena ɔɔ khukhusɔ na sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋsɔ na kɔ̃tɩnasɔɔkɛ hanɩ Galile.
Dɩ le Ɛrɔdɩadɩɩ bikhɛr lõ ka wɩ hanɩ da-n sa bɩna, dɩ gɩ kɔɔ dar Ɛrɔɔdɩra na wɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ hanaanɩ kha; dɩ mɛ̃ a so khebirrə: Bɩɛlnɛ mar gɩrɛ fɩ-n ƴaalnɩ dɩ ma ha fɛr;
dɩ thakɛ a ʋlfɛnaa ayɩ: Ma ha fɛr thɩ̃ dookɛ fa bɩɛl marnɩ, adorakɛ ɩ̃ fãga dɩ kho bɩɛl gɩ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ khebir the a bule ɔɔ nɩ ayɩ: Ɩ̃ bɩɛlnɛ anye? Dɩ ɔɔ nɩ tu: Bɩɛlnɛ a ha fɩ Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ yʋ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ khebir phana a kɛr bir fãgadaarɩ pa a sʋʋraa ayɩ: Mɩ-n ƴaalɛ kɔrɔ fɩ pɛ mɩ Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ yʋ kpɛ̃kpɛrɛ̃ biro.
Dɩ haar n helle Ɛrɔɔdɩ, sɩ aa-n ƴaal a tʋ̃ɔa', gɩdonɩ a kɔɔ ʋlfɛnaanɛ dɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ kha nɩɛ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ a thɔ̃ dapaara ɔɔ gardɩ bɩɛl ayɩ, a jala a kuro Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ yʋ a pɔna.
Dɩ gardɩ kuun jal khaɩra, a kur Jã Batɩsɩtɩɩ yʋ, a pɛr kpɛ̃kpɛrɛ̃ biro, a pɔna ha khebir, dɩ khebir gba jalna ha ɔɔ nɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jãa kpãkpãadara nɩɛnɩ, wɩ pɔr gba khire a dʋ.
Dɩ thɔ̃thɔna gbɛbɩ kha na Jeju a mɩɛɛ gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ, na gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ kɔɔ dɩɩrnɩ tɩbɩla.
Dɩ so war: Nɩ dɔ sɩ jal dɩkhãa pa bəənnə nɩ hɩɩr gbe, gɩdonɩ tɩbɩlaakɛ n pɔnɩ Jejura sɩ wa-n kɔ̃ kɔɔ jɔrɛ dɩɩ pho ka, dɩ a do thɔ̃thɔna na ba yɩrɛ ƴɩɛrakɛ na kho dɩkora'.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ kɔɔ lõ gborõo a jal paarɩkɛ tibil na hana'.
Dɩ tibil jɔ yɩ wɛr mɔ̃ wɩ-n jalnɩ a jɩ wɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ the dɩɩsɔra fɛʋ a pɛr nɛpɛla a ka kɔɔ dã paarɩle ɓo.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju na thenɩ gboroona, a yɩrɛ tɩbɩlaale tə̃tə̃tə̃ dɩ wa-n kʋʋ bʋɔ, gɩdonɩ wɩ hʋrɛ banasɔɔkɛ na hananɩ khekha', dɩ mɛ̃ a kɔɔ ma da-n dɩɩr wɩ thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ bɔɔ 'lire kar, ɔɔ kpãkpãadara pʋɔraarɛ a sʋʋraa: Dɩɩ n tɩnɛ sɩɩ do bəənnə sɩ ha;
bɩlanɛ tɩbɩlaakɛ wɩ jal kõgososɔra na dɩ biisɔraakɛ wɔrɔnɛnɩ, wɩ the dɩkɔ.
Sɩ Jeju tu: Nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ n hana wɩ dɩkɔ wɩ kho. Sɩ dɩ wɩ bulee: Fɩ-n ƴaalɛ sɩ gba wire taanyɔ thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ war a thɛna buru a ɛna ha wɩ wɩ kho ya?
Dɩ Jeju bule wi: Buru yemɔ̃ nɩ hana, nɩ jala hɩnɛ. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ jɩnɩ tue wɩ sʋʋraarɛ: Buru yemɔɩ sɩ hana na thʋma yenyɔ.
Agɩpɩ Jeju so war, wɩ cʋɛ tɩbɩlaalera fɛʋ wɩ der dɩɩdɩɩ ka hʋɔn hanɩ vʋɔlvʋɔl.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ der tamaa tamaa, kpalanyɔ yʋɔr yʋɔr.
Agɩpɩ Jeju gba buru yemɔɩɩle na thʋma yenyɔɔle, a gba ƴɩɛ ƴũ a fʋɔr Thãgba, sa kuur buru a ha kpãkpãadara wɩ gba tɩnɛnɛ tɩbɩlala, a tɩnɛna wɩ dakha fɛʋ thʋma yenyɔɔle.
Wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ khor a hi phi.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ gbaar buru na thʋmaakɛ wɩ tɩnɛnɩ sa sɩ dɩɩ hi kpona yʋɔr yenyɔ.
Sɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ khɔnɩ dɩkorɩle kona daan gbɩlanɩ yemɔɩ.
Sɩ agɩpɩ, dapaara Jeju yɩ, ɩnɩ kpãkpãadara na lʋʋn gboroona wɩ kʋʋl nɩ ƴɩɛ wɩ iir iiro Bɛcaɩda dɩ khʋra, bɔɔkɛ ɩna-n bɩlanɩ tɩbɩla.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ fʋɔr wɩnɩ pɩ sa yɩ wɩ jala bɔɔ, a jaal a jʋʋn gɔ̃gʋɔna a bɩɛl Thãgba.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ birəni, gborõo kɔɔ har mɩɩr nɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn, sɩ dɩ Jeju ha dɩbara thɩɩra.
Dɩ a yɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ phɛllɛ n nɩnɩ kpãkpãadara gɩdonɩ jɩɛ wɩ telẽ, sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ n lɔrnɩ wɩllɛ, a ɩɩrɛ mɩɩr nɔ nyʋɔnna ƴũ da-n pɔ war ɩnɩ-n ka wɩra.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩɩnɩ da-n ɩɩr nyʋɔnna ƴũ, wɩ ka jɩna khĩdidaar gɩ, a ma dɩ wa-n hulẽ;
gɩdonɩ wɛr fɛʋ yɩɩrɛ dɩ maar fʋlɛ wɩ dɩɩ ka. Sɩ dapaara Jeju mɩɩna wɛr ayɩ: Nɩ pɩɛr 'lar, mɛr Jeju gɩ, na-n do maar n fʋ na'.
Sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ lõ war le gboroona, dɩ jɩɛ kur, dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa kpãkpãadara dɩɩ pho ka,
gɩdonɩ wa kɔɔ jɩ mɔ̃ buru thɩmɩɩrɩle donɩ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ kɩrʋa', dəbire gɩ ho war dɩ wa pər gara'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ iirni iiro pɩ a dã Jenejarɛtɩ khʋra, le wɩ kɔɔ li gborõo.
Dɩ dabɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ thenɩ gboroona na pɩ, dapaara tɩbɩla jɩrɛ Jeju.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ ca jal paar fɛʋ a gba khodara jɔna, dɩ wa-n pɔnanaa paar wo paar fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ a har.

Dɩ paar fɛʋʋkɛ Jeju n jalnɩ, a dɩ biisɔra gɩ, ado dɩɩsɔra gɩ, a kõgoso gɩrakɛ, tɩbɩla n gbaar awɩ khodaarsɔ dɩ wɩ pɛ ƴatɔɔ, dɩ wa-n phʋʋrʋʋ a dɔ ɩna-n thaaraa ɔɔ kẽkẽ nɔra dɩbararakɛ, dɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n kɔɔ thaaraanɩ n kpɛɛrɛ awɩ kho.
Jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ na ɩkhaa jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Jerujalɛm pɔr a khunə Jeju;
dɩ wɩ yɩrɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadaar ɩkhasɔ dɩ wa-n kho dɩkor na nyɛ̃ bise, a thɩɛna gaa nyɛ̃ɛkɛ wa phʋɔlnaa gɩ.
Gɩdonɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ na wɩ̃ Juifisɔ fɛʋ n cʋʋrɛ mɔ̃ awɩ mama kɔ̃tɩnasɔɔ dɩɩr n sonɩ, wa puno na kho dɩkor sɩ a wa kɔɔ jɩɩ hul nyɛ̃aa ga.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n thenɩ ƴaa, a wa kɔɔ phʋɔl awɩbara na nyʋɔn ɓoa', wa-n kho dɩkora'. Wɩ hananɛ dakha gɩ̃ mama sosɔɔkɛ wɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ, gɛr dʋɔn thɩ̃ yɔnada cɔcɔɔrɛ, na da cɔcɔɔrɛ, na the bʋla cɔcɔɔrɛ.
Dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara bule Jeju: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ afɩ kpãkpãadara na-n gba asɩ mama kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ soa', sɩ dɩ wa-n kho dɩkor na nyɛ̃ bise?
Dɩ Jeju tu: Sobɔr Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩ kɔɔ so anɩdara ger waa: Bɩnɛ yenyɔdara ha nɩ, gɩdonɩ mɛ̃ gɩ khere mɔ̃ Thãgba sonɩ ayɩ: “Nɔfaar tibil ca ƴɩrɛ n cʋna mɩ pɔɩ, sɩ dɩ awɩ ha hʋnɔna mɩ fĩi.
Fʋɔrɛɛkɛ wɩ-n fʋɔr mɩnɩ, mɔlɔ gɩ, gɩdonɩ jɔfʋʋkɛ tɩbɩla pɛrnɩ wɩ-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla.”
Nɩ faarɛ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ sɩ dɩ na-n dʋ mama kɔ̃tɩnaa sora bʋrɛ.
Sɩ Jeju bir so war: Nɩ jɩrɛ gbobi sa hɛbɩ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ a faa, sɩ dɩ nɩ ka na ɔ mama kɔ̃tɩnaa sora.
Gɩdonɩ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sor ayɩ: “Na cɔ afɩ thɩ na afɩ nɩ” dɩ “a ntɛ nɩɩr ɔɔ thɩ, a ɔɔ nɩ gɩ, wɩ kʋɔ.”
Sɩ dɩ ner n so: Ado tibil so ɔɔ ɩhɩra a ɔɔ nɩra gɩ ayɩ: Thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ ma kɔɔ ha fɩnɩna gɩ bul fi, gɛr mɩ gba dɩɩ do Kɔrbã, a thɩɛna gaa, gɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaada;
mɛ̃ na-n haa hʋɛ a bul ɔɔ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ bã.
Mɛ̃ anɩ mama kɔ̃tɩnaa sookɛ nɩ-n kɔɔ dɩɩrnɩ kha bɩɛlbɩɛl cʋʋ Thãgbaa so dɩ ga do thɩ̃ɛ bã. Yɛ̃ thɩ̃sɔ hale wo jɔɔ nɩ-n ɓaannɩ dɩ a-n ho kha na gɩrɛra.
Sɩ Jeju kɔɔ bire we tibil jɔ dɩ wɩ pɔ dɩ so war: Nɛrɛ fɛʋ nɩ pɛ mɩ nũu a jɛ mɔ̃ gɩ hanɩ.
Thɩ̃ɛ na hakɛ jɩɛra na lõ tibili bɩnɔ na cʋgʋʋ da bisə', sɩ gɩrɛ n kanɩ dɩɩ the tibili hara gɛr n bisene tibil.
[Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu dɩ nɩna, dɔ a pɛ nũu.]
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ faanɩ tibil jɔɔle sa lõ cʋɔrɔ, ɔɔ kpãkpãadara buleele sokpaalee kɩrra.
Dɩ so war: Nɛrɛ dakha jɩɩr 'lũ ner dakha wo koe. Na jɩ gɩ dɩ a thɩ̃ɛ kɛ jɩɛra lõ tibil bɩnɔ, ga puno na cʋgʋʋ da bisəə gaa?
Gɩdonɩ ga do haarra gɩ lõa', sɩɩ do bucuurə gɩ-n lõ sɩ dɩɩ the cuu. A sonɩ thale gɛr nɛna dɩ dɩkor na hale na sãsa'.
Sɩ a bire so wo: Gɩrɛ n thɛnɩ tibili hara n bisenee.
Gɩdonɩ bɩnɔ, tibil haarra, le kpɩɛr puu n the, na bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ, na yuur, na tɩɩ kʋr,
na khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaalɛ, na kũu kpɩɩ ƴaalɛ, na ha pɩɛrɛ, na kpallɛ, na tɩɩ fɩɩlɛ, na dakhaba cʋʋrɛ, na yir, na tibil i kʋɛrɛ, na i ƴaalɛ, na də̃bəəle.
Ga thɩ̃ puu ca ƴɩrɛ fɛʋ, tibil haarra gɩ-n the, dɩ gɛr n bisene tibil.
Agɩpɩ Jeju the le a jal Tɩɩr dɩ khʋra a lõ cɔ bɩɛlla, sɩ aa-n ƴaal tibil n ja'; sɩ aa puno a mar dɩ wa jaa ga.
Sɩ khɛ bɩɛl gɩ dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl kɔɔ lõ ɔɔ bikhɛr burə; mɔ̃kɛ khɛrɩle nɩɛnɩ Jejuuda, a pɔr a jii ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Gɩrɛkɩ khɛrɩle do sa the Siri Fenɩsɩ dɩɩra; a kɔɔ bɩɛlɛ Jeju a wea kɔ̃tɛɛbuu ɩnɩ bikhɛrra a faa.
Sɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Dɔ bɩsana n kɔɔ kho dɩkor ɓo, gɩdonɩ ga bɔr dɩ fa gba bɩsanaa dɩko na pɛ bena ga.
Dɩ khɛr tu: Sobɔr gɩ wer Kɔ̃tɩn, sɩ dakurusɔɔkɛ bɩsana na-n khonɩ dɩ ga-ɩɩ ji thʋuɔ, bebe n khor.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju sʋʋraa: Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ fɩ tuni thakɛ kɔna, kɔ̃tɛɛbuu ther afɩ bikhɛr burə.
Dɩ mɛ̃ a kɔ̃ a yɩ ɔɔ bɩsã dɩ phɩ̃, dɩɩ do kɔ̃tɛɛbuu thɩɩraarɛ.
Agɩpɩ Jeju ther Tɩɩr khʋra, a kpãsɛ Sɩdɔ̃ ɔbɔɔkɛ a-n birni Galile mɩɩr nɔɔra, a kar Dekapol khʋra.
Dɩ le wɩ kpa kũu nʋʋr bɩɛlɩkɛ na-n punoneni dɩ mɩɩ thɩmɩa bɔɔbɔa', a pɔna a phʋʋrna Jeju, a dɛɛnaa nyɛ̃ɛ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju faa tɩbɩla sa kpaa, a thena khuirə, a gba nyɛ̃be a tʋʋ nũ kanana, sa phii nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ a thananaa delẽbirera.
Agɩpɩ Jeju gba ƴɩɛ ƴũ a 'wɩɩ sa so kuunna: Efata, kɩrʋ dʋɔn: Khɛra.
Dɩ dapaara kuuni nũ ka khɛr, dɩ gɩrɛ kɔɔ lieni delẽbire thʋbɩ, dɩ puno da-n mɩɩ thɩmɩɩr dɩ a-n yɩr dɩphã.
Sɩ Jeju kɔɔ sor tɩbɩlala fɛʋ, dɩ wa-n gba na mɩɩ tibil n nɩa'. Sɩ mɔ̃ a-n jɩɩnɩ kpãkpãa war jɔɔ wa-n mɩa', gɛr wɩ-n ka mɩɩrɔ dɩ a-n jɔr.
Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ tɩbɩla dɩɩ pho ka dɩ wa-n so aa: Thɩ̃ bɔ haar or n cʋʋrakɛ dɩ thʋ̃ dɩ cʋʋ nʋra ɓoɓo dɩ wa-n nɩ na nɔ masɔ dɩ wa-n mɩɩ.
Ga bɔɔlera tibil jɔ bir gbɛbɩ wo, sɩ wa hana thɩ̃ɛ na khoa'; dɩ Jeju we ɔɔ kpãkpãadara a so war ayɩ:
Bʋɔ fʋ mɛr tɩbɩlalaakɛ, gɩdonɩ wire yẽther ha gɩrɛ wɩ hanɩ kha na mɛrɛ, sɩ wa hana thɩ̃ɛ na khoa'.
Ado mɩ bɩlã wɩ wɩ kɔna sɩ dɩ wa yɩ dɩkora', ga khabɩ wɛr hʋɛra, gɩdonɩ ɩkhasɔ wɛrra ther ƴɔɔ.
Dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara sʋʋraa: Ka sa puno na yɩ dɩkɔ na ha tibil ca ƴɩrɛ kɩɛr bəənnə dɩ wa hi.
Dɩ Jeju bule wi: Buru yemɔ̃ nɩ hana? Dɩ wɩ tu: Makonyɔ gɩ.
Dɩ Jeju so tɩbɩlalaale wɩ dera, sa gba buru makonyɔra a fʋɔr Thãgba pɛr, sa kuur a ha ɔɔ kpãkpãadara, wɩ gba tɩnɛnɛ tibil jɔɔlera; dɩ wɩ gba tɩnɛ wɩ.
Sɩ wɩ hananɛ dakha dɩkhaa thʋ̃ bi, dɩ Jeju fʋɔr Thãgba a pɛr thʋmanaale, sa so wɩ tɩnɛnɛ wɩ dakha.
Wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ khor a hi phi; dɩ kpãkpãadara gbaar dakurusɔɔkɛ sɛnɩ dɩɩ hi kpona makonyɔ.
Sɩ konaale kɔɔ thɔɔrɛ gbɩlanɩ yenã. Agɩpɩ Jeju bɩlã wɩ,
sa lõ dapaara gboroona na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara a jal Dalmanuta khʋra.
Jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara wɛ, a pɔ a ma dɩ wa-n bana kha na Jeju wɩ pɩɛraa pheru, a bulee ayɩ, a nɛ nar na nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ bɩɛl dɩ ɔɔ punona thãgbara ƴũ gɩ the.
Dɩ Jeju 'wɩɩ na bɩnɛ sa so: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ nĩdara na-n ƴaal nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ ya fɛ? Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wa nɩna wɩ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ bɩɛllaka'.
Agɩpɩ dɩ faa wɩ, sa bir lõ gboroona a iir gɩ̃ iiro.
Sɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ diinəne buru gbaar, sɩɩ do bɩɛl dɩbara wɩ hana le gboroona.
Dɩ Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ ayɩ: Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ, na-n tɛ̃tɛna jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ taba'.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara na-n mɩɩ kha bururaakɛ wa kɔɔ gbana'.
Dɩ Jeju jɩ mɔ̃ wɩ-n mɩɩnɩ kha a bule wi: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n mɩɩ kha bururaakɛ na kɔɔ gbana? Na yɩ gaa, dɩ na jɩ kɩrʋ paa? Anɩdara khɩɩrɛ waa gel koe.
Yinəna nɩ hananɩ wo na-n yaa? A hanana nũu wo na-n naa? Dɩ na jɩna gaa?
Ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ kuurni buru yemɔɩ a ha kona gbɩlanɩ yemɔɩ, kpona yemɔ̃ nɩ kɔɔ gba dakuruukɛ sɛnɩ dɩɩ hi? Dɩ wɩ tu: Kpona yʋɔr yenyɔ gɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ kuurni buru makonyɔ a ha kona gbɩlanɩ yenã, kpona yemɔ̃ nɩ kɔɔ gba dakuruukɛ sɛnɩ dɩɩ hi? Dɩ wɩ tu: Makonyɔ gɩ.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Na yɩ gɩ a thʋ̃ jɩ kɩrʋ pɩrakɛ mãa?
Wɩ kɔɔ danɩ Bɛcaɩda le tɩbɩla kpa yaarʋ, a pɔna Jejura dɩ wa-n phʋʋrnaa a thaaraa.
Dɩ Jeju fʋrɛ yaarʋʋle nyɔ̃ɔ, a kpaa thena dɩ khuirə, a phii nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ pɩɛraa yinəna, a dɛɛnanaa nyɛ̃ɛ sa bulee: Fɩ yɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛ ya?
Dɩ yaarʋ gba ƴɩɛ ƴũ sa so: Mɩ yɩrɛ tɩbɩla, sɩ mɩ yɩ wɛr dɩ wɩ ho thɩra dɩ wa-n ɩɩr.
Sɩ Jeju bir thaaraa yinəna wo, dɩ dabɔɔkɛ yaarʋ kponɩ yinə, dɩɩ do a khɛrrɛ da-n yɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ wawawal.
Sɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Kɔna, fa-n kɛr bir lõ dɩɩra sa kɔ̃a'.
Agɩpɩ Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara gba jal Sejare Filipi dɩ khʋra; dɩ le a bule ɔɔ kpãkpãadara hʋɛra: Amɛ tɩbɩla n yɩ mɩ dor?
Dɩ wɩ tu: Ɩkhasɔ n yɩ, Jã Batɩsɩtɩ fɩ do; wɛ n yɩ, Elɩ fɩ do; wɛ n yɩ wo, Thãgbaa bobon fɩ do.
Sɩ Jeju bule wi: Sɩ ner, amɛ nɩ-n yɩ mɩ dor? Dɩ Pɩɛr tu: Kirisiti fɩ do.
Sɩ Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ, wa-n so tibillə ga.

Agɩpɩ Jeju ma da-n dɩɩr ɔɔ kpãkpãadara, da-n sona war ayɩ: Dɔ mɛrkɛ dʋɔnnɩ tibili Bikuun n gaar bʋɔ jɔɔ; dɩ kɔ̃tɩna, na bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na bo mer, sɩ dakha wa kʋ mɛr, sɩ a wire yẽther ka ma ɩɩrɛ khirera.
Casɩ a-n mɩɩ wɩ gele. Sɩ Pɩɛr kpaa kana pa kpɩɩ da-n phaan.
Sɩ Jeju kɛr, da-n hɩɩn ɔɔ kpãkpãadara, sa phã Pɩɛr dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ: Hala mɩ ƴɔɔ Satã, gɩdonɩ fa-n kpɩɛr Thãgbaa kha ga, sɩ tibil khaa fɩ-n kpɩɛr.
Agɩpɩ Jeju we tibil jɔ na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara dɩ wɩ pʋɔraa dɩ so war: A ntɛ pɛr haar ɩna-n kpa mar, dɔ a faa dɩbara yɩrnanɛ, sɩ a gba ɔɔ kʋkʋ thɩr a na-n kpana mar.
Gɩdonɩ tibilikɛ n tɛbanɩ ɔɔ yi, ga ka na buurəəre; sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ yi na bonɩ mɛrɛra, na Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra, ɔr na lɛ waa gel.
Anyee bɔ ga taa tibil, ado a 'lɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ sɩɩ do ɔɔ yi buurəəre.
Anye haankɛ dɩ tibil na gba na debina ɔɔ yi?

A yicuru fʋ tibil mɛrɛra na ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩra nĩdaraakɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn, kɛ na telenenɩ Thãgbara ga, sɩ dɩ wa-n cʋʋ puure, yicuru na fʋrɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun dakha ntɛra, ɔbɔɔkɛ ma ɩnɩ na ɩ̃ Thɩɩ i dʋbɩ nakha thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu phuusɔ.
Dɩ so war wo ayɩ: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ɩkhasɔɔkɛ hanɩ kɩɛr na khiir sɩɩ do wa yɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar do dɩɩ ɩ̃ na fãga gaaga.
A wire maadõ ka pɩ, Jeju kpar Pɩɛr na Jakɩ na Jã a jʋʋnna gɔ̃gɔ̃ gbaana, dɩ wɩ ha kha le dɩbara; dɩ Jejuu tomɩ debi awɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Dɩ ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ debi dɩ a-n hɩl phalphalphal, a bulololakɛ dakha dɩɩ ka, a jɔ mɔ̃kɛ ga donɩ tibil thɩɩraakɛ na punone na cʋʋ dɩ a buloloa'.
Dɩ Elɩ na Mʋɩjɩ the warɛ sɩ Jeju wɩ-n khʋɛna.
Dɩ Pɩɛr so Jejura: Dɩɩrdaar, gɩ bɔrɛ sɩ hanɩ kɩɛr; sa dʋrɛ waa yẽther, bɩɛl n do afɩda, bɩɛl n do Mʋɩjɩɩda, bɩɛl n do Elɩɩda.
Aa jɩ mɔ̃ a na sona', gɩdonɩ maar fʋɔn wɛr kpãkpãadara.
Dɩ ndɔlɔ̃paar gbune a thi war, dɩ nʋɔ the ndɔlɔ̃paarra ayɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛ dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, na-n pɩɛ nũu.
Dɩ dapaara kpãkpãadara hɩɩnɛ khʋʋkhʋʋ, sɩ wa kɔɔ yɩ tibil saagado Jeju gɩ dɩbara na wɛraa ga.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ gbuni gɔ̃gʋɔna, Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ na sobɔr dɩ wa-n so tibillə gɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ kɔɔ yɩna', phaphapha ɩnɛr tibili Bikuun n ɩɩr khirera.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ fʋrɛ thɩmɩɩrɩle awɩ bɩnɔ, sɩ wa-n bule khasɔ aa: Anye n dɔ khi ɩɩrɛ?
Sɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ buleele thakɛ ayɩ: Mɔ̃ gɩ ha dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na-n so ayɩ: Dɔ Elɩ n kɔɔ ɩ̃ caca.
Dɩ tu: Elɩ na kɔɔ ɩna wer eaca na wɛbɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ. Sɩ mɔ̃gɩdo dɩɩ khere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra mɛr tibili Bikuunidara ayɩ: Dɔ ɩ̃ gaar bʋɔ jɔɔ dɩ wa therna ma?
Sɩ mɩ so narɛ, Elɩ kɔɔ ɩnɛ sɩ wɩ kɔɔ cʋgʋʋrɛ mɔ̃ wɩ pɛrnɩ haar, dɩɩ ha mɔna gɩ kɔɔ khereraanɩ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ danɩ wɩ̃ kpãkpãadara, wɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ tibil jɔ dɩ wɩ dii war na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔɔkɛ n bananɛnanɩ kpãkpãadaraale thɩ̃ banaa.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ tibil jɔɔle yɩnɩ Jeju, gɩ phuro wer dɩ wɩ ca pɔ a fʋɔrʋʋ.
Dɩ bule wi: Anye nɩ-n bana kha na wɛr?
Dɩ kũu bɩɛl tibil jɔraale tu: Dɩɩrdaar, mɩ kɔɔ kpar ɩ̃ bikuunikɛ hananɩ nɔ ma kɔ̃tɛɛbuu a ɩna far;
pa dɔɔkɛ a-n fʋʋnɩ thɩɩra a-n kpɛgʋʋ, dɩ bɩsaan na-n the nyɔ̃thɩ̃ khɔrɔ̃ɔ, da-n khona nyɩma, sɩ dɩ tã gõgorõo; dɩ mɩ kɔɔ bɩɛlɛ afɩ kpãkpãadara wɩ wea kɔ̃tɛɛbuurə, sɩ wa kɔɔ punoə'.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Nɛr nĩ babalaakɛɛ; ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ ma thʋ̃ na toona nɩ gɩ dana? Ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ ma thʋ̃ na fʋ nar haarrarakɛ gɩ dana? Nɩ kpaa ɛna mar.
Dɩ wɩ kpaa a pɔna; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbuu na yɩnɩ Jeju, a gbʋ̃gbʋnyanɛ bɩsaan dɩ ji thʋnɔ da-n laan, da-n thena nyɔ̃thɩ̃ khɔrɔ̃ɔ.
Dɩ Jeju bule thɩrɛ: A fʋna ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔrakɛ gekɛra wer kɔɔ hanaa? Dɩ thɩrɛ tu: Ɔɔ bɩsã bu bɔɔ gɩ.
Dɩ wire wire kɔ̃tɛɛbuule n tʋɔrɛ da-n kpɛɛ dɔɔ na nyʋɔnɔ ɩnɩ-n kʋʋra; sɩ ado fa punone na cʋʋ dɩkha, jɛ sɩ bʋɔra sa bulo si.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Fɩ yɩ, ado ma punone ya? Thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ n punone ʋrɛraakɛ pɩɛrnɩ Thãgba haar.
Dapaara bɩsaanɩlee thɩ hulẽ ayɩ: Mɩ pɛrɛ haar, bulo mi ɩ̃ baallala.
Mɔ̃ Jeju yɩnɩ tɩbɩla dɩ wɩ ca pɔ wa-n jɔr, le a mana kɔ̃tɛɛbuu ayɩ: Fɛr nʋʋr nɔ ma kɔ̃tɛɛbuu, mɛr sɔ far: A fɩ jɩ thɛ bɩsaannaakɛ, fa-n lʋʋnaa yuu bã.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ a-n thenɩ a hulene sa gbʋ̃gbʋnyã bɩsaan na fãga, dɩ bɩsaan debi a ho a khire pɔɩ; wɩrɛ wer hanɩlerakɛ yɩ: A khire.
Sɩ Jeju fʋʋ nyɔ̃ɔ a khəi dɩ pal ɩɩr.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju lonɩ cʋɔrɔ dɩ wɩ ha kha na kpãkpãadara dɩbara, wɩ buleele aa: Mɔ̃ gɩ fʋna dɩ ser na kɔɔ puno a wee kɔ̃tɛɛbuule a fa ga?
Dɩ so war: Agado Thãgba bɩɛlɛ ga, kɔ̃tɛɛbu ca ʋrɛ na hana ther na tha'.
Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ ther le a jal a kpãsɛ Galile, sɩ Jeju na kɔɔ ƴaal wɩ jɛ ka a hana';
gɩdonɩ a-n dɩɩrɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara, da-n sona war ayɩ, wa fʋrɛ ɩnɛrkɛ dɔnɩ tibili Bikuun na ha tɩbɩla dɩ wa kʋ nɩ, sɩ a ɩnɩ khi dɩ wire yẽther ka, ɩna ɩɩrɛ khirera.
Sɩ kpãkpãadara na jɩ thɩmɩɩrɩle kɩrʋa', dɩ maar kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr dɩ wa 'la na bulea'.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ daan Kapɛrnayʋm; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ hanɩ cʋɔrɔ, gɛr Jeju bulelo ɔɔ kpãkpãadara ayɩ: Anye nɩ-n kɔɔ bana kha hʋɛrara?
Dɩ wɩ pɩr pɔɔpɔɔ, gɩdonɩ wɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ wɩ jɩ ʋrɛ 'lɛnɩ kɔ̃tɩɩnɛ, gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ kɔɔ bana kha hʋɛra.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju too sa we kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ, dɩ wɩ pɔ dɩ so war ayɩ: Ntɛɛkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩnɩ-n dɔ ƴɛ kʋl, dɔ a do pɩpɩr tɩbɩlala fɛʋ na tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ thɔ̃daar.
Agɩpɩ dɩ kpa bɩsã buu a pɔna awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, sa gbaa fʋrɔ sa so war:
Ntɛɛkɛ na teanɩ bɩsaan thakɛ a na-n hɩɩn, gɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ, mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ a tee. Dɩ ntɛɛkɛ tea mɩnɩ, ga do mɛr a tea', sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ thɔna mɩnɩ a tee.
Jã so Jejura: Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ tibilikɛ na dɔnɩ asɩ kpakpaara', dɩ gba afɩ i dɩ weena kɔ̃tɛɛbii da-n faa, dɩ sa-n kɔɔ pɩɛrʋʋ gɩdonɩ aa do asɩ kpakpaara'.
Dɩ Jeju tu: Na-n ha na pɩɛrʋa', gɩdonɩ tibil na puno na gba ɩ̃ i na cʋʋna nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ, saa kɛr dapaara wo a mɩɩ ɩ̃da puə'.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n ƴaalɛ sɩnɩ sʋa', sɛrra a-n pɛ.
Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ ɩ̃ i na donɩ nɔɔ dɩ na cɛ nyʋɔn na ha nɩ nɩ yɔ, gɩdonɩ Kirisitii too nɩ do, sobɔr mɩ so nar gel, thɩ̃ɛ na hale na pɩɛrʋʋ lɩmɩ 'lɛrra ga.
Nã kɔ̃tɩ̃ tə̃ə lir tibillə fʋɔrɔ wɩ dʋnanaa lanyʋɔnɔ, baar gɩrɛɛkɛ a na kanɩ na cʋʋ dɩ bɩsã biikɛ pɛ mɩnɩ haar dɩ bɩɛl na bara.
Ado afɩ nyɔ̃ do far baradaa, kuro faa. A fɩ 'lɛ yire na nyɔ̃ bɩɛl, gɩ baar nyɛ̃ɛ yenyɔɔkɛ fa hananɩ sɩ wɩ dʋna fɩ bu paar dɔɔraakɛ na dɔnɩ thɩ̃ khiirnənə'.
[Le dɔ na-n khə', dɩ dɔɔ dakha na-n khiir kpɩɩa'.]
Ado afɩ nɔ do far baradaa, kuro faa. A fɩ 'lɛ yire na nɔ bɩɛl, gɩ baar nɛɛ yenyɔɔkɛ fa hananɩ sɩ wɩ dʋna fɩ bu paar dɔɔra.
[Le dɔ na-n khə', dɩ dɔɔ dakha na-n khiir kpɩɩa'.]
Ado afɩ yi do far baradaa, te faa. A fɩ lõ Thãgba fãgadaarɩ dʋɔ na yi khoroo, gɩ baar yinə yenyɔɔkɛ fa hananɩ sɩ wɩ dʋna fɩ bu paar dɔɔra.
Le dɔ na-n khə', dɩ dɔɔ dakha na-n khiir kpɩɩa'.
Gɩdonɩ dɔɔ na cʋʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩ ga hana laanɩ mɩla.
Thɩ̃ bʋɔ laan do, sɩ a laan bir dasɩ a mɩla bã, mɔ̃ wa fʋ sɩ na cʋʋ dɩ a bir na hana mɩlalɛ?
Nɩ hanana laan anɩ bɩnɔ, dɩ nɩ hanana kha ha ɩɩ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Jeju ther le a gba jal Jude khʋra, sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ ɩɩr Jʋrdɛ̃ iiro. Dɩ tibil jɔ n gbɛbɩ dɩ wɩ pɔ na derraa, dɩ ma da-n dɩɩr wɩ thɩ̃ɛ mɔ̃ a mɩlna gɩnɩ.
Ɩkhaa jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara pʋɔraarɛ, dɩ wa-n fifiləə a bulee thakɛ ayɩ: Tibil hananɛ hʋɛ na faa ɔɔ khɛr ya?
Dɩ tu: Anyee jɔfʋ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ ha nɩ?
Dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa ayɩ: Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ 'laarɛ hʋɛ, kuun n khera he kuur sɛbɛ sa wea ɔɔ khɛr a faa.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Anɩdara khiinoni dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ khere nar jɔfʋ caale.
Sɩ fʋ paar, ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ tini thɩ̃ɛ, kuun na khɛr a kɔɔ cʋʋ.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ kuun na lee kha na ɔɔ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ, sɩ a ɓã kha na ɔɔ khɛr,
wɛr yenyɔ n gbɛbɩ wɩ do tibil bɩɛl, mɛ̃ ga do yenyɔ ha bã, sɩ wɩ coore kha a do bɩɛl.
Gɛr gɩ ga teena tibil n lea gɩrɛ Thãgba coornɩ dɩɩ do bɩɛla'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ hanɩ cʋɔrɔ, kpãkpãadara bire bule Jeju ga so caalera,
dɩ so war: A tibil faa ɔɔ khɛr sa bir a he khɛ kpɩɩ, khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaal sopugo a cʋʋ ɔɔ caca khɛrra.
Ado khɛr gɩ a faa ɔɔ ko sa bir he kũu kpɩɩ, kũu kpɩɩ ƴaal sopugo a cʋʋ.
Dɩ tɩbɩla kɔɔ kpar bɩsana a pɔna Jejura, a dɛɛnɛ war nyɛ̃ɛ, sɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ phaanɛ wɩrɛ pɔna wɩnɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju yɩɛnɩ nĩkhii fʋʋrɛ, dɩ so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara: Nɩ dɔ bɩsana na-n ɩ̃ mar, na-n pɩɛr wa', gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ hɔnɩ bɩsana, wɛr Thãgbaa fãgadaar do mana.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n tuonni Thãgbaa fãgadaar do bɩsanaa khaaka', a na puno na lono kpɩɩraka'.
Agɩpɩ dɩ gba bɩsana a fʋrɔ, sa dɛ̃ɛ war fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl nyɛ̃ɛ a bɔna wɩ.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju n gbanɩ hʋɛ, kũu bɩɛl car pʋɔraa a gulẽgaraa a bulee: Dɩɩrdaar bʋɔ, anye ma cʋʋ na 'lɛ yire khorr?
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fɩ we mɩ dabʋɔ? Tɩɩ bʋɔ na hala', Thãgba dɩbara bʋɔnɔ.
Fɩ jɩrɛ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ: “Fa-n kʋ tibilə', fa-n hana khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaala', fa-n hana kũu kpɩɩ ƴaala', fa-n yuə', fa-n sõso pɛ tibilə', fa-n pɛr fɩɩlɛ thɩɛna ga, na cɔ afɩ thɩ na afɩ nɩ.”
Dɩ kuunile tu: Dɩɩrdaar mɩ kɔɔ mãa nɩ ga jɔfʋraale fɛʋ nũu kɛkɛkɛ ɩ̃ daɓol dĩi bɔɔ.
Dɩ Jeju hɩɩnʋʋ na naʋ sa sʋʋraa: Thɩ̃ bɩɛl ɓɔr fɛr, jala dolone thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ fɩ hananɩ a hana bɔdara, dɩ mɛ̃ fa 'lɛ lẽle thɩ̃ɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, agɩpɩ fɩ ɩ̃ fa-n kpa mar.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ kuunile nɩɛnɩ thɩmɩɩ ca gele a gbure ƴɩɛ, sa gba da-n kɔna gbobire, gɩdonɩ lẽledaar gɩ na sobɔr.
Sɩ Jeju hɩɩn ɔɔ kpãkpãadara da-n finə sa so war: Thãgba fãgadaar dɩ lʋʋn khɩɩrɛ waa gel wɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ lɛ̃lɛ.
Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ kpãkpãadara fɛʋ ga thɩmɩɩ caraale; sɩ Jeju bir so war wo: Ɩ̃ bɩsãsɔ, Thãgba fãgadaar dɩ lʋʋn khɩɩrɛ waa gel.
Nyɔɔmɛɛ lõokɛ a na lonɩ mɩsɩmɩ kaarra ka yɔɔrɛ jɔ lẽlee Thãgba fãgadaar dɩ lõ.
Sɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ kpãkpãadara dɩɩ ka thɩmɩɩrraale, dɩ wa-n bule khasɔ bɩɛlbɩɛl aa: Dɩ a mɛ̃ gɩ, amɛ na punone na 'lɛ taarɛ?
Dɩ Jeju hɩɩn wɩ sa so: Ado tɩbɩlala wer gɩ, thɩ̃ punonaa ga; sɩ ga ha mɛ̃ Thãgbara ga, gɩdonɩ Thãgba n punone thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ.
Sɩ Pɩɛr ma da-n sʋʋraa: Hɩnɛ, sɛrɛ sɩ faarɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ sɩ sa-n kpa far.
Dɩ Jeju tu: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ado tibil faa ɔɔ cɔ, a ɔɔ õkona wɛ, a ɔɔ õkhɛrsɔ wɛ, a ɔɔ nɩ gɩ, a ɔɔ thɩ gɩ, a ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ wɛ, a ɔɔ lɛ gɩ, dɩɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ na Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra,
a na 'lɛr thɩ̃ɛ nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔraakɛ tama tama der paar tamaa: Gɔnasɔ, õkonasɔ, õkhɛnasɔ, nɛsɔ, bɩsanasɔ, na lɩɛsɔ, a na 'lɛnanɛ dakha kpoore, sɩ bɔɔkɛ na ɩnanɩ a na 'lɛr yire khorr.
Sɩ tibil jɔjʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ nɛnɛ̃ ƴɛ kʋla, wɛr na fien na do sɩka pɩra, sɩ tibil jɔjʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ nɛnɛ̃ sɩka pɩra, wɛr na fien na do ƴɛ kʋla.

Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ gbaar hʋɛ dɩ wa-n jal Jerujalɛm, dɩ Jeju kʋʋl wɩ ƴɩɛ. Sɩ haar fuure kpãkpãadara dɩ maar fʋ dakha wɩrɛ n kpaaraanɩ. Dɩ Jeju bir kpa kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ dɩ wɩ ha kha, dɩ ma da-n mɩɛ wɩ gɩrɛ na danaanɩ.
A so warɛ ayɩ: Nɩ hɩnɛ, sɩ-n jaal gɩrɛ Jerujalɛm, ka wa fʋnɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na ha bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ, dɩ wa pɛ mar so kʋnanɛ; sɩ na gba mɩ na ha ca kpala;
dɩ wa mãa mɛr, wɩ cɩɩrna nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ wa-n pɛ mar, wa ciil mer dakha na khasa, sɩ wɩ kʋ mɩ, sɩ a wire yẽther ka ma ɩɩrɛ khirera.
Agɩpɩ Jebedee bikonaakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jakɩ na Jã pɔ Jejura, a sʋʋraa: Dɩɩrdaar, cʋɛ sar gɩrɛ sa bɩɛl farnɩ.
Dɩ bule wi: Anye nɩ-n ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋɛ nar?
Dɩ wɩ tu: A fɩ gba afɩ fãga, ha sɩ hʋɛ, bɩɛl n too afɩ nyɔ̃bɔra, bɩɛl afɩ nyɔ̃bɩlana.
Sɩ Jeju so war: Na jɩ gɩrɛ nɩ-n bɩɛlna'; na punone na yɔ thɩ̃ yɔnanɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ bɔ gaarɛɛkɛ ma yɔnɩ ya? Agɩbo wɩ kpɛɛ nɩ bɔ gaarɛraakɛ wa kpɛɛ mɩnɩ yɔ khaa ya?
Dɩ wɩ tu: Ɔɔ, sa punone. Dɩ Jeju so war: Sobɔr gɩ, thɩ̃ yɔnanɛɛkɛ ma yɔnɩ na yɔr, dɩ yɔ kpɛɛrɛɛkɛ ma 'lɛnɩ na 'lɛr dakha.
