Sɩ ga do mɛr na phire ʋrɛ na tɔɔnɩ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra na ʋrɛ na tɔɔnɩ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɩlana ga; wɩrɛ dɩbara Thãgba gbɛbɩrɔnɩ too paa caarɩkɛ, awɩda gɩ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ kpãkpãadara yʋɔr kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ gele, nĩkhii kɔɔ fʋ wɛr Jakɩra na Jã.
Dɩ Jeju we wɩ dɩ wɩ pɔ, dɩ so war: Nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ wɩrɛ wɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ dɩ wɛr dɔ ca kpalaa fãgadara, wɩ-n ʋʋnɛ tɩbɩlala kpɛ, dɩ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩna n cʋʋ warɛ fãga dɩɩ pho ka.
Sɩ ga ha mɛ̃ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩna', sɩ ntɛɛkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩnɩ-n dɔ kɔ̃tɩn, dɔ ɔr n ka a do anɩ thɔ̃daar.
Ado tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛra ƴaal ɩnɩ-n dɔ ƴɛ kʋl, dɔ ɔr n do tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ dee.
Gɩdonɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na ɩ̃ tibil na-n dɔ mar thɔma ga, sɩ mɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ ka ɩ̃ do thɔma sɩ ɩ̃ 'laa ɩ̃ yi gɩ birse tɩbɩla bərəəm.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ daan Jeriko; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara na tibil jɔ na ɩɩrnɩ dɩɩraale na the, bɛ̃bɩɛl yaarʋʋkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Bartɩme, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ Timee bikuun, kɔɔ toore le hʋ nʋɔra.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a nɩɛnɩ dɩ Najarɛtɩ Jeju n pʋɔn, a mar da-n hulẽ aa: Jeju Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun, jɛ mɩ bʋɔra.
Sɩ tibil jɔ kɔɔ manaanɛ ayɩ a pɩra; sɩ a ka jɩɛ bir hulẽ wo aa: Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun, jɛ mɩ bʋɔra.
Dɩ Jeju jɩɩl sa yɩ wɩ wɩɛ. Dɩ wɩ wer yaarʋra a sʋʋraa: Pɩɛr 'lar, ɩrɛ, a-n we fer.
Dɩ yaarʋ dʋna ɔɔ darã a faa, sa pal birbir da-n pɔ Jejura.
Dɩ Jeju bulee: Anye fɩ-n ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋɛ far? Dɩ yaarʋ tu: Dɩɩrdaar, cʋɛ mɩ ma-n yɩ.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Dɩ kɔna, afɩ ha pɛ taa fɩ.
Dɩ dapaara ɔɔ yi khɛr da-n yɩ, a kpa Jejura dɩ wɩ cʋr wa-n jal.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n wɔrɔnɩ Jerujalɛm a ha Bɛtɩfaje na Betanɩ khʋra, wɩ kɔɔ daan gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔɔkɛ hananɩ olɩvɩ thɩra; le Jeju thɔ̃ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yenyɔ,
a so war ayɩ: Nɩ jala dɩɩraakɛ nɩ pɛnɩ ƴɩɛ; a nɩ pɔ na dã na yɩrɛ kũkə̃ ɓolʋʋkɛ tibil na jʋʋnnɩ pa', dɩ wa li; nɩ thʋba a kpa ɛna.
A tibil bule ni: Anye nɩ-n cʋʋ ya, nɩ to: Kɔ̃tɩn n ƴaalɛ sa a bir a thɔna kɔrɔ wɩ ɩna.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ jal a yɩ kũkə̃ ɓolʋ, dɩ wɩ li cɔ lõfonɔɔ hʋ nʋɔra, dɩ wɩ thʋbɩ.
Dɩ ɩkhaa tibilsɔ wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ hanɩle bule wi: Anye nɩ-n cʋʋ, dɩ anyera nɩ-n thʋbɩ kũkə̃ ɓolʋ?
Dɩ kpãkpãadara gbaar mɔna Jeju kɔɔ so warnɩ a so war; dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ sɩ war dɩ wɩ jalna.
Dɩ wɩ pɔnanɛ kũkə̃ ɓolʋ Jejura, a gba awɩ kẽkẽ a dɛbɩ kũkəənə, dɩ Jeju jʋʋn tooro.
Tɩbɩla bərəəm kɔɔ belle awɩ kẽkẽ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ a pɛr hʋɛra, sɩ wɛ cɩ fa huu lɔɔ dɩ wa-n pɛr hʋɛra.
Wɩrɛ kʋlɛnɩ Jeju ƴɩɛ na wɩrɛ n kpaanɛnɩ khiro n hulene aa: Ojana, bɔnanɛ n hana ʋrɛraakɛ n ɩnanɩ gɩrɛ na Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i.
Bɔnanɛ n hana fãga gbaarraakɛ n ɩnanɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ Davɩdɩɩda. Ojana le ƴũ pər.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju danɩ Jerujalɛm, a lʋʋn Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna; ɔbɔɔkɛ a hɩɩnnɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ pɩ, a ther jal Betanɩ na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔ gɩdonɩ dɩɩ kɔɔ 'lire tɩɩn.
A dɩɩ kɔɔ wɩl dɩ wɩ the Betanɩ, kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋrɛ Jeju.
Dɩ mɔ̃ a 'laanɩ yɩ thɩr khonanɛ ƴɔɔ dɩ thɔɔ faa, a gbaar pɔ ɩnɩ-n hɩɩn a ba sɛr yaa? Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ danɩ, fa haar dɩbara a kɔɔ yɩ, gɩdonɩ ga do ɔɔ se bɔ ga.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju so thɩrʋraale ayɩ: Tibil na bir na kho afɩ bi kpɩɩrakɛ bã; dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ.

Agɩpɩ wɩ kɔɔ daan Jerujalɛm, dɩ Jeju lõ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, a ma a weele wɩrɛ n dolonenɩ thɩ̃ɛ na wɩrɛ n thɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛ le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, a tʋɔrna war debaa tabalsɔ a kpɛɛ na kʋlã puu dolõdaraa too pasɔ.
Sɩ aa-n tu tibil n fɔrɔ thɩ̃ɛ a kpãsɛnɛna Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna ga.
Sɩ a dɩɩr wɛr thakɛ aa: Ga do gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Mɛr Thãgbaa cɔ na dor paarɩkɛ tibil caar fɛʋ na-n fʋɔr mɩnaa”? Sɩ dɩ ne wer cʋʋ dɩɩ do yu hɔ̃hʋɔldaraa wɔ̃ pa.
Bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ gele dɩ wa-n ƴaal mɔ̃ wa fʋnɩ sɩ wɩ kʋ Jeju, gɩdonɩ a-n kʋ wɛr maar, gɩdonɩ nʋɔ n kpaarɛ tɩbɩla fɛʋ ɔɔ dɩɩrra.
A dɩɩ birə Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara faarɛ dɩɩ sa the.
Dɩɩ wɩlnɩ duuro dɩ wa ka kpãkpãadara yɩrɛ thɩrʋʋlera dɩ khi na nɛɛ fɛʋ.
Dɩ Pɩɛr jɩna gɩrɛ kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ a so Jejura: Dɩɩrdaar, hɩnɛ thɩrʋʋkɛ fɩ pɛrnɩ sor a khire.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Nɩ pɩɛr Thãgba haar.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar: A tibil so gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔɔkɛ ayɩ: Ǝlə kɩɛr a je lanyʋɔnna, dɩ ado ntɛ na baalɔ ɔɔ hara ga, sa pɛr haar gɩrɛ ɩnɩ sonɩ ga har oti, a na yɩɛrɛ ga cʋʋna gel.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so nar: Thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na bɩɛlnɩ Thãgbara, nɩ pɩɛr haar nɩ 'lɛr pɩ, dɩ na yɩɛrɛ gɩ cʋʋna.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ ɩɩrnɩ jɩɩl na bɩɛl Thãgba, ado nɩ hananɛ sor na tibil, nɩ faa, dɩ mɛ̃ anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ na faa dakha anɩ sopugo.
[Sɩ ado na faa wɩ̃ tibili soa', anɩ Thɩɩkɛ hanɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ na faa dakha anɩ sopugoə'.l
Dɩ wɩ bire jal Jerujalɛm, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju n kpaarnɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na kɔ̃tɩna pʋɔraarɛ,
a bulee: Ka hʋ caakɛra fɩ hananɩ dɩ fa-n cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛɛkɛra the, dɩ amɛ hana fɩ hʋɛ fa-n cʋɛ?
Dɩ Jeju tu: Ma bule ner dakha thɩ̃ bɩɛl, a nɩ puno birse mi mɛrɛ dakha ma so narɛ hʋ ca ʋrɛ mɩ hananɩ dɩ ma-n cʋʋna thɩ̃ ca gɩrɛ.
Jãa yɔ kpɛɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ the yaa, tɩbɩlaa pa gɩ the? Nɩ to ɩ̃ hɩɩn.
Dɩ wɩ mar dɩ wa-n bana khasɔ ayɩ: A sɩ tu ayɩ: Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ the, a na bule ser dɩ anye dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ sa kɔɔ pɛ ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haara';
dɩ a sɩ so wo ayɩ: Tɩbɩlaa pa gɩ... Maar kɔɔ fʋɔn wɩ tɩbɩlala thalee sora, gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa bobon bɔ tɩbɩla fɛʋ kɔɔ gba Jã dɩ do.
Dɩ wɩ tu: Sɩ jɩrɛ ya? Dɩ Jeju so war: Dɩ a thale gɩ, ma-n so nar mer ka mɩ yɩnɩ hʋɛ dɩ ma-n cʋʋna ga thɩ̃sɔɔka'.

Jeju mar da-n mɩɩ wɩ na sokpaa ayɩ: Kũu bɩɛl gɩ, a kɔɔ cʋʋ nãkʋɔr a bã dãgbol diiro, a kpena dakha koru bi der paar, sa mɩ bɛbɛr cɔ gbãa. Agɩpɩ dɩ gba nãkʋɔr hɩɩndara a pɛr wa-n hɩnɛ ɓo, sa jal kpaar paar.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ bi khʋ̃ bɔɔ danɩ, a thʋɔn ɔɔ thɔ̃daar bɩɛl a jala nãkʋɔr hɩɩndararara, wɩ hanaa dɩkhaa nãkʋɔr thɩ̃ a pɔna.
Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ fʋrɛ thɔ̃daar a bɩɩr, sa weguu dɩ kɔna nyɛ̃ khɩɩ.
Dɩ bir thɔ̃ war thɔ̃daar kpɩɩ wo, dɩ wɩ bɩɩrʋʋ yʋʋ cu, sa pɩɛraa yicuru.
Dɩ bir thɔ̃ war thɔ̃daar kpɩɩ wo, dɩ wɩ kʋʋ. Agɩpɩ dɩ thɔ̃ war wɩ̃ thɔ̃dara wo, dɩ wɩ fʋlɛlɛ wɛ a bɩɩr sa kʋʋr ɩkha.
Sɩɩ do ɔɔ bikũu bɩɛlɩkɛ a-n nanɩ sɩɛraa, dɩ pɩɩrɔ thʋ̃ɔ wɛrra sa so wa cʋrɛ ɩ̃ bikuun.
Sɩ nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaraale mɩɩrɛ kha ayɩ: Ʋrɛɛkɛ dʋɔn thɩ̃ hɩn, nɩ dɔ sɩ kʋʋ, sɩɩ do sɛr hɩna thɩ̃ɛ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ fʋʋ, a kʋʋ, a gba dʋna faa nãkʋɔr khuirə.
Anye nãkʋɔr kɔ̃tɩn na cʋʋ dɩphã? A na jaal na kʋʋr nãkʋɔr hɩɩndaraale, sa a gba nãkʋɔr a ha tɩɩ kpɩɩsɔ.
A thɩɛna gaa, na kɔɔ hɩɩn gɩrɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sonaa? Gɩ sor ayɩ: “Bokaarɩkɛ cɔ mɛ kɔɔ bonɩ, debire a do go tɩ bokaar;
sɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ pa thɩ̃ɛɛle the, dɩ sɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ do sar thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ.”
Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ hʋɛ wɩ fʋʋ, sɩɩ do maar n fʋ wɛr tɩbɩlala, gɩdonɩ wɩ jɩrɛ dɩ wɛrra Jeju so sokpaale, sɩ wɩ kɔɔ fagʋʋrɛ sa kɔ̃.
Sɩ wɩ thʋɔnaanɛ ɩkhaa jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ totoo, wɩ nʋɔ thɩmɩɩrraakɛ a na mɩɩnɩ.

Dɩ wɩ pɔr a sʋʋraa: Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sobɔ tibil fɩ do, dɩ fa-n ma tibilə', fa-n hɩɩn dakha tɩbɩla dɩɩdɩa', sɩ dɩ fa-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla Thãgbaa hʋ na sobɔr. Gɩ teere kha dɩ sa lɩmɩ Sejaar lãpho yaa, ga tee kha ga?
Sɩ lɩma yaa, sa-n lɩma? Sɩ gɩdonɩ Jeju jɩrɛ awɩ bɩnɛ yenyɔ fɩl, a so warɛ: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n fifilə mi? Nɩ gba war bi bɩɛl ɛna ɩ̃ hɩɩn.
Dɩ wɩ gba bɩɛl a pɔna, dɩ bule wi: Amɛɛ foto ha ʋrɛ, dɩ amɛɛ khere ha gɩrɛ? Dɩ wɩ tu: Sejaar gɩ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju so war: Nɩ 'laanɛ Sejaarra gɩrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ Sejaarɩda, a 'laanɛ Thãgbara gɩrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaada; dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa wɛr fɛʋ ɔrra.
Dɩ Sadʋsɛ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala', pʋɔraarɛ a bulee thakɛ ayɩ:
Dɩɩrdaar, hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ khere sarnɩ ayɩ: “Ado tibil hana õkuun dɩ khi sa faa khɛr sɩ bɩsaan na hala', ɔɔ õkuun n gba hɛ a kɔna bɩsana wɩ do ɔɔ õkuuni məl.”
Sɩɩ do õkona makonyɔ wɛ a kɔɔ hale; cacadaar kɔɔ her khɛr aa hana bɩsana ga, sa khi.
Dɩ balanyɔdaar gba khikhɛrʋ aa hana bɩsana ga, sa khi wo; mɛna gɩ kɔɔ ha dakha na balãtherdaar.
Sɩ bɩɛl wɛr makonyɔrarakɛ na hana bɩsaana', wɩ pɩnɩ fɛʋ na pɩ dɩɩ do khɛr dakha khire.
Ado khe ɩɩr khirera, ʋmɔ̃ wɛrra na hɩna khɛr? Gɩdonɩ wɛr makonyɔra fɛʋʋ khɛr a kɔɔ do.
Dɩ Jeju tu: Nɩ buure waa fu yə̃ə? Na jɩnɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ na Thãgbaa fãga ga, gɛr gɩ.
Ado khe na ɩɩr khirera, kona na he khɛra bã, khɛra dakha na he kona bã, sɩ wa hʋrɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ le Thãgbaa dʋɔ.
Sɩ ado gɩrɛ dɔnɩ khee ɩɩr gɩ, na kɔɔ yɩɛ Mʋɩjɩɩ sɛbɛra thɩr bu thɩmɩɩrra gaa? Mee Thãgbaa sʋʋraarɛ ayɩ: “Ɩnɛr dʋɔn Abɩrahamɩ Thãgba, na Ɩjakɩɩ Thãgba, na Jakɔbɩɩ Thãgba.”
Thãgba na do khee Thãgba ga, sɩ wɩrɛ hananɩ yiree Thãgba a do; nɩ bure waa vʋ̃ʋ.
Jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaar bɩɛlɩkɛ kɔɔ nɩɛnɛnɩ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ-n bananɩ thɩ̃ banaa, a jɩna dakha mɔ̃ Jeju jɩɩnɩ tu, a pɔr a bulee ayɩ: Ʋmɔ̃ dɔ caca jɔfʋ jɔfʋsɔra fɛʋ?
Dɩ Jeju tu: Gacadaa dʋɔn: “Ɩjɩrayɛl na pɛ nũu, Kɔ̃tɩn asɩ Thãgba, Kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ a do,
dɩ dɔ fa-n na Kɔ̃tɩn afɩ Thãgba na afɩ bɩ̃ fɛʋ, na afɩ ha fɛʋ, na afɩ kpɩɛr fɛʋ, na afɩ fãga fɛʋ.”
Balanyɔdaa dʋɔn: “Dɔ fa-n na afɩ 'walãkha tibil mɔ̃kɛ fɩ-n nanɩ afɩbara.” Jɔfʋ na hale a kɔ̃tɩ̃ jɔ jɔfʋ ca ƴɩrɛ bã.
Dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaar sʋʋraa: Gɩ bɔrɛ Dɩɩrdaar, sobɔr fɩ so, dɩ bɩɛl Thãgba do 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ, dakpɩɩ na hale saagado ɔr gaaga,
dɩ ɔɔ naakɛ fa-n naanɩ na bɩnɛ fɛʋ, na kpɩɛrɛ fɛʋ, na fãga fɛʋ, fa-n nana dakha 'walãkha tibil mɔ̃ fɩ-n nanɩ afɩbara, gɩ jɔr nʋmaakɛ wɩ-n jinəni bonɩɛ Thãgbara sa thii, na gɩ̃ bonɩ ji fɛʋ.
A Jeju yɩ mɔ̃ a tuni thale na kpɛsɛrɛ, a sʋʋraarɛ: Fa hʋnɔ dɩ Thãgba na do far fãgadaara'. Dɩ tibil na 'la na bule Jeju thɩ̃ɛ bã.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju hanɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna da-n dɩɩr wɩ, a sor ayɩ: Mɔ̃ gɩ fʋ sɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na-n so ayɩ: Davɩdɩɩ Bikuun Kirisiti do?
Davɩdɩɩ thɛthɛ Thu Phuu kɔɔ cʋʋ dɩ so ayɩ: “Thãgba sor ɩ̃ Kɔ̃tɩna ayɩ: Tɔɔ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra, phaphapha ɩ̃ cʋʋ afɩ lãlaardara wɩ do afɩ nɛ jəəda.”
Davɩdɩɩ thɛthɛrakɛ n wɩɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn, dɩ mɔ̃ a na fʋ sɩ na do ɔɔ bikuun? Tibil jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ pɛr Jeju nũu na daʋ.
Dɩ a-n dɩɩrɛ tɩbɩla ayɩ: Na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔɔkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩnɩ-n tɔ kẽkẽ gbana na kpaarna ƴatɔɔ tɩbɩla na-n fʋɔrɛ nɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ fʋɔrʋʋ;
ɩnɩ-n phiirna ƴɛ kʋʋl too paar Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɔ, na caca too paar dɩko kho paar;
ɩna-n phʋʋna khikhɛra, sɩɩ do fɩɩlɛ wɩ-n bɩɛlna Thãgba dɩ wa-n pʋɔrna wa-n yɛ nɩ; wele, so kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ na heen wer na khɩɩr na ka.
Jeju toore a pɛ ka wɩ-n pɛnɩ Thãgba mũsumo ƴɩɛ, da-n hɩɩn mɔ̃ tibil jɔɔle n pɛrnɩ war Thãgba mũsũ pɛ paar. Lẽledara bərəəm pɛrɛ war jɔɔ.
Dɩ khikhɛr bɔdaar pɔ a pɛr tama be yenyɔɔkɛ na dananɩ war birə'.
Dɩ Jeju we ɔɔ kpãkpãadara a so war: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, khikhɛrʋʋkɛ pɛrɛ war dɩɩ jɔ gɩrɛɛkɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋ pɛrnɩ Thãgba mũsũ pɛ paar.
Gɩdonɩ war harra wɩrɛ fɛʋ pɛr, sɩ ɔr, ɔɔ bɔdaar warɩkɛ a hananɩ koo, kɛ na haanɛɛnɩ a pɛr.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju n thenɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, ɔɔ kpãkpãadaar bɩɛl sʋʋraarɛ: Dɩɩrdaar, yɛ boka ɓɔnanakɛ, dɩ hɩnɛ mɔ̃ wɩ thʋnɩ mɩ gʋʋsɔ ɓoɓo.
Dɩ Jeju birsee ayɩ: Fa yɩ mɔ̃ wɩ thʋnɩ mɩ go kɔ̃tɩnasɔɔkɛ ɓoɓoaa? Boka bɩɛl na bir na sɩ kɩɛr na dɛ̃ɛ ʋ̃ bokara ƴũ bã, fɛʋ na derre.
Mɔ̃ Jeju toonɩ gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ hananɩ olɩvɩ thɩra a pɛ ƴɩɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, Pɩɛr na Jakɩ na Jã na Ãdire kɔɔ buleele hɛllɩ:
Sɔ sar bɔɔkɛ gelela na danɩ, dɩ anye dɔ jɩɩnɩkɛ na nɛnanɩ bɔɔkɛ gelesɔra na-n danɩ.
Dɩ Jeju ma da-n so war ayɩ: Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ, na-n do tibil n fɩɩl na'.
Gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla bərəəm na gbaar ɩ̃ i na ɩna wa-n so, ɩnɛr dʋɔn mɛrɛ; dɩ mɛ̃ wa fɩɩl tɩbɩla jɔɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ nɩɛnɩ kʋʋr hale na mɔ̃ na-n nɩɛnɩ ko thɩmɩasɔ, na-n do maar n fʋ na', dɔ gele n kɔɔ dã sɩ ga do thɩ pɩ paar pa'.
Ʋ ca na ɩɩrɛ a na-n kena ʋ̃ ca, ʋ̃ fãgadaarɩ dɩ bɩɛl n ɩɩr a na-n kena ʋ̃ fãgadaarɩ dɩ kpɩɩ. Thɩ jɩɩnsɔ na har paar dɩɩdɩɩ, kɔmɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ na jire dakha; sɩ gɩrɛ wallɛɛ tɔ̃tʋ̃ɔ pa gɩ.

Sɩ na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ dɩbara, gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla na fʋ nɛr na jalna kɩɩl paar; wa bɩɩr nɛr dakha Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔ; wa kpa nɛr na jalna dɩ na jɩɩl gobanɛrsɔ na fãgadarasɔɔ ƴɛra, gɩ do mɛr dɔ nɔɔ, dɩ ga mɩɩ warɛ anɩ ha pɛda.
Dɔ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ n kɔɔ mɩɩ tibil caarra fɛʋ ɓo.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ fʋ nɩnɩ a jalna kɩɩl paar, na-n kɔɔ ma na dɛ anye na so yaa ga, sɩ dawiilera thɩmɩɩr na the ner nɔɔ dɩ na so, gɩdonɩ ga do anɩ pa ga tha', sɩ Thu Phʋʋ na hana nɩ.
Õkuun na liirnanɛ ɔɔ õkũu bɩnɔ dɩ wa kʋ, ɔmɛ̃ thɩrɛ na cʋʋ na ɔɔ bɩsã; bɩsana na ɩɩrɛ na lã thɩrɛ na nɩrɛra.
Tɩbɩla fɛʋ na laar nɛr gɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na yɩranɩ a na dana khu paar, ɔr na 'lɛ taarɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ na yɩnɩ thɩ̃ thuurnəneekɛ na kʋɛanɩ thɩ̃ɛ da ha kãkɛ na teananɩ a hana ga (dɔ ʋrɛɛkɛ n hɩnɛnɩ sɛbɛɛkɛ n dʋ gar bʋrɛ), le wɩrɛ hanɩ Jude n fuo ca jala gɔ̃gʋɔna;
ʋrɛɛkɛ na hanɩ nãsʋrɔ a na-n gbũ lõ cʋɔrɔ ɩnɩ-n gba thɩ̃a';
dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ dakha na hanɩ lɔɔ a na-n kɛr bir ɩnɩ-n gba ɩnɩ kẽkẽ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bã.
Ga wisɔɔle ga puurore khɛ pɛmɛdarara na wɩrɛ n mamanɩ bibɔrɔsɔ.
Na-n bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba dɩ thɩ̃ɛ thale na-n dã yʋʋrɔa'.
Ga wisɔɔle bɔ gaarɛ na jɔrɛ na ka, bɔ gaar caale na kɔɔ hale ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ tini thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ dana nɛnɛ̃ka', dɩ ga bir na halerakɛ kpɩɩ bã.
Ado Kɔ̃tɩn na kɔɔ tɔ ga bɔɔle dɩɩ gburoə', tibil na mar na ta ga, sɩ tɩbɩlaakɛ a kɔɔ phiirni wɩ dɔ ɩnɩ too dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ tɔ ga bɔɔle dɩɩ gburo.
Liir ado tibil na so nar: Nɩ hɩnɛ Kirisiti har kɩɛr, agɩbo: Nɩ hɩnɛ pal a ha, na-n pɛr haara'.
Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ n sõsonenɩ dɩ wɩ yɩ Kirisiti ha nɩ, agɩbo bobona ha nɩ, na ɩɩrɛ wa-n nɩna tɩbɩla nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛsɔ na ma kʋ thɩ̃ɛsɔ, wa-n fɩɩlnanakɛ tɩbɩlaakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ phiirni adora wa punone.
Sɩ nɛrɛ, na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ koe; mɩ kɔɔ maanɛ dɩ ma-n so nar gɩrɛ fɛʋ.
Ga bɔɔlera a bɔ gaarɛ ka na pɩ, wire na birəre, por dakha na hɩrɛ bã.
Yepələ̃be na ther thãgbara ƴũ ga-n jiir thɩɩra, dɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ fãgaakɛ hanɩ thãgbara ƴũ ga gbugbuyore.
Le wa yɩ tibili Bikuun a na-n ɩ̃ na ndɔlɔ̃pana na fãga jɔɔ ka na carbararɛ jɔɔ.
Le a na thɔ̃ ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ dɩ wa kpa wɩrɛ a phiirni, kɛ hanɩ kɩrrɔ, na gananɔ, na gɛla yenyɔra, na ka thãgbara ƴũ na thɩɩ khuni.
Nɩ dɔ sokpaa thɩr khonanɛdara n dɩɩrnɩ thɩ̃ɛ; ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ yɩnɩ ɔɔ jɛ̃ dɩɩ ɓol a na thɔɔ fa ƴolo, nɩ jɩrɛ ubulo n wɩla.
Mɛ̃ gɩ, nɛrɛ dakha a nɩ yɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ dɩ a dã, nɩ jɛ tibili Bikuuni ɩ̃ bɔ n daan, dɩ lõfonɔɔ a ha.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, nĩdaraakɛ na khiir koo sɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ fɛʋ n dã ga.
Thãgbara ƴũ na thɩɩ na phor na ka, sɩ ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩsɔ na pho na ka kpɩɩraka'.
Ado wi jɩɩrra gɩ, na bɔɔkɛ ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ na danɩ, tibil bɩɛl na ja', thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔrakɛ le Thãgbaa dʋɔ wa ja', mɛr Bikuunnakɛ na ja', sɩ Thɩrɛ dɩbara jɩɛn.
Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ a na jʋrɛna, gɩdonɩ na jɩ bɔɔkɛ ga dana'.
Ga hʋrɛ mɔ̃ tibil n pɛrnɩ haar ɩna jaal dɩkhãa pa, dɩ faa cʋɔr sɩ dɩ 'laa ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔra bɩɛlbɩɛl hʋɛ thɔmanaakɛ wa-n donɩ, sɩ dɩ so lo bɛrdaarra, a na-n jɩɛ jʋʋr.
Na-n jʋrɛ mɛ̃, gɩdonɩ na jɩ bɔɔkɛ cɔdaar kuun na birni na ɩ̃a'; agakpaana dʋɔrɔ ga do, agɩbo dɩnɩrɔ, a mɛ̃ gaa yɔl ko khɩɩ bɔɔ, agɩbo duuro.
Ado a phuro a ɩ̃ na-n do a fʋ nɩ daanɔa'.
Gɩrɛ mɩ so narnɩ, tɩbɩlala fɛʋ mɩ so: A nɩ jɩ na-n jʋrɛ.
Wire yenyɔ sɛra sɩɩ do Pakɩ ɓol bɔɔ na buruukɛ na hananɩ tabɩɩraa kho bɔ daan. Le bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara n ƴaal hʋɛ wɩ fʋ Jeju na fɩɩlɛ wɩ kʋ.
Gɩdonɩ wɩ n sor, ɩna fʋʋ ɓol bɔa', a mɛ̃ gaa khʋ̃ɛ na ɩɩrɛ tibil jɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn.

Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju hanɩ Betanɩ Sɩmɔ̃ gbuuluu cɔ dɩko kho paar, khɛ bɩɛl lʋʋn le, a fʋrɔ laaso ja bulabirikɛ hananɩ latɩkolookɛ n hʋnanɩ daʋ, a khɩɩr the nʋɔ ka; dɩ a cʋɔrɛ bulobirile a deer latɩkolo Jejuu yʋɔ.
Dɩ ɩkhasɔɔkɛ kɔɔ hanɩle nĩkhii fʋ wɛr dɩ wa-n so: Anyee latɩkolo kʋɛ ca ha gɩrɛ thakɛ?
Ga do wa kɔɔ dolonena gɩ dã wire tãatherɩɩ thɔ̃ lɩmɩ wɩ ha bɔdara gaa? Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ cɩ̃cɩma khɛrraale.
Sɩ Jeju so: Nɩ sɩɛraa, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n vɔgʋʋ? Thɔ̃ bʋɔ a cʋʋ mar;
gɩdonɩ bɔdara n har wire fɛʋ anɩ pa, nɩ punone cʋʋ wɩ bɔɔ mɔ̃ nɩ-n ƴaalnɩ, sɩ mɛrɛ na hana mɩ khorra'.
Gɩrɛ a-n punoni ha gɩrɛ a cʋʋnɩ, a kɔɔ mãa a thir mi latɩkolo da-n gbɛbɩ mɩ mɔ̃ wa dʋ mɩnɩ.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, paar fɛʋʋkɛ wa mɩɩnɩ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ thɩɩraakɛ fɛʋ, wa mɩɩrɛ dakha gɩrɛɛkɛ khɛrɩkɛ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ dɩ wa jɩnaa.
Sɩ Judasɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Karɩyɔtɩ dɩɩra, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ kpãkpãadaar bɩɛl yʋɔr yenyɔra, jaal bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnaa pa dɩ a na liirna Jeju.
Dɩɩ da war na sobɔr mɔ̃ a-n mɩɩ wɩnɩ dɩ wɩ yɩ, ɩɩɩa haarɛ war. Dɩ Judasɩ jɩɩ ma da-n ƴaal hʋɛ waa a liirnaa.
Buruukɛ na hananɩ tabɩɩraa caca ɓol wi, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ wireekɛ wɩ-n jinəni Pakɩ bana bire bonɩɛ, Jejuu kpãkpãadara buleele ayɩ: Ka fɩ-n ƴaal sɩ jala gbɛbɩrɛ Pakɩ dɩkor fɩ kho?
Dɩ a thʋɔn ɔɔ kpãkpãadara yenyɔ a so war ayɩ: Nɩ jala dɩɩra, kuunikɛ heenenɩ nyʋɔn na daa na caana nɛr, na-n kpaaraa,
dɩ ka a na lonɩ nɩ sɔ cɔdaar kuunna ayɛ: Dɩɩrdaar yɩ, ka duukɛ ɩna khoronɩ Pakɩ dɩkor na ɩnɩ kpãkpãadara ha?
Dɩ a na nɩ narɛ lɩ̃gã kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ wɩ thɩɩnɔnɩ thɩ̃ɛ, nɩ gbɛbɩrɛ le Pakɩ dɩkor.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara jaal a dã dɩɩra, a yɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩɩ ha mɔna Jeju kɔɔ so warnɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ wɩ gbɛbɩ Pakɩ dɩkor.
A dɩɩ dʋɔr Jeju pɔr na yʋɔr yenyɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ toonɩ dɩ wa-n kho dɩkor Jeju sor: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛraakɛ sɩ-n khonanɩ kha dɩkor na liirna mɛr.
Dɩ wɩ ma dɩ wa-n gbobi, sɩ dɩ wɛr bɩɛlbɩɛl na-n bulee ɩnɛr gɩ kã?
Dɩ birse wi: Tibil bɩɛl nɛr yʋɔr yenyɔraakɛ n 'lɔɔnɩ tasa bɩɛl na mɛrɛ gɩ.
Mɛr tibili Bikuun n jaal mɔ̃kɛ gɩ khere marnɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra, sɩ ga puure ʋrɛraakɛ na lirenanɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun; a wa kɔɔ kɔ̃ tibil ca olelaka', gɩ ka baar.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n khonɩ dɩkor Jeju gbaar buru, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba pɛr pɩ, a kuure a ha wɩ sa so: Nɩ gba gɩrɛra ɩ̃ tomɩ gɩ.
Agɩpɩ dɩ gba thɩ̃ yɔnanɛ, ɔbɔɔkɛ a fʋɔrnɩ Thãgba pɛr pɩ, a ha wɛr, dɩ wɛr fɛʋ gba a yɔ.
Dɩ a so warɛ aa: Gɩrɛ dʋɔn ɩ̃ tɔmɩ̃, Thãgbaa nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ tɔmɩ̃ gɩ, a na deer tɩbɩla bərəəm sora.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ma bir na yɔ dɩvɛ̃ɛkɛ bã, phaphapha gɩ dana wireekɛ ma birni na yɔ daphaa Thãgba fãgadaarɩ dʋɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ khɩnɩ nɩɛ pɩ, wɩ ther jal gɔ̃gʋɔnaakɛ hananɩ olɩvɩ thɩra.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Nɛrɛ fɛʋ na kɛrnanɛ khiru, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Mɛr Thãgba na bɩɩrɛ bana khedaar dɩ banaa na bɩ̃bɩlã paar fɛʋ.”
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ma ɩɩrnɩ na the khirera ma kʋʋl nɛr ƴɩɛ na jal Galile.
Dɩ Pɩɛr sʋʋraa: Ado tɩbɩla fɛʋrakɛ na kɛrnanɛ khiru, sɩ me wer ma kɛrna khiruə'.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Sobɔr mɩ so far, fɛrɛ, nĩ dɩtɩnɔɔkɛ yɔl kʋʋ na khɩɩrakɛ balanyɔa', sɩ balãther fa bana nayɩ fa jɩ ma'.
Sɩ Pɩɛr bir tu na kheu: Adorakɛ wɩ yɩ sɩ khe kha, sɩ ma puno na bana nayɩ ma jɩ faa ga; dɩ mɛ̃ wɛr fɛʋ kɔɔ so dakha.
Agɩpɩ wɩ kɔɔ daan paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jɛcɛmanɛ, dɩ Jeju so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara ayɩ: Nɩ tɔɔ kɩɛr ɔbɔɔkɛ ma hanɩ Thãgba bɩɛllɔ.
Dɩ a kpar Pɩɛr na Jakɩ na Jã, sɩ maar mar dɩ ga-n fʋʋ, dɩ haar haa kũkulõo.
Dɩ a so warɛ: Ɩ̃ ha gbobire khikhi gbobire waa gel, nɩ tɔɔ kɩɛr a na jʋrɛ.
Mɛ̃ a tɔ jal gbe, a ji thɩɩra da-n bɩɛl Thãgba adora hʋɛ hale gɩ dora bɔ̃ gaar bɔɔle khokhɩaraarɛ,
a sor aa: Aba (kɩrʋ dʋɔn Thɩrɛ), fɛr n punone thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ, hʋnɔnɛ mar thɩ̃ yɔnanɛɛkɛ sɩ ga do mɔ̃ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ ga, sɩ mɔ̃ fɛrɛ n pɛrnɩ haar gɩ hana.
Sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ kɛr pɔ war a yɩ wɩ dɩ wa-n daar, dɩ so Pɩɛrra: Sɩmɔ̃, fɛr n daarɛɛ? Fa kɔɔ puno toorakɛ gbe a jʋʋr hɩɩnaa?
Nɩ jʋrɛ a na bɩɛlna Thãgba dɩ mɛ̃ na lõ fifiləlela ga. Tuur wer n har haarra gel, sɩ tibili tibil do pa fãga 'lee.
Dɩ mɛ̃ a kɛr jal wo da-n bɩɛl Thãgba da-n 'loro mɔ̃kɛra a kɔɔ sonɩ.
Sɩ a bire pɔ wo, a yɩ wɩ dɩ wa-n daar, gɩdonɩ dayuur fʋ wɛr a kar, dɩ wa jɩ mɔ̃ wa sʋʋraana'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a pɔ warnɩ dɩɩ dã balãther, a so warɛ: Nɩ daarɛ dɩphã a hɩrɛ; gɩ daan dɩ bɔɔ daan. Nɩ hɩnɛ, wa liirnanɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun sopugodara.
Nɩ ɩrɛ sɩ jal, sɩ hɩnɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ lirena mɩnɩ n ɩnɛ.
Mɔ̃ a hanɩ mɩɩrɔ, dapaara Judasɩɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ bɩɛl kpãkpãadara yʋɔr yenyɔra daan na tibil jɔɔkɛ fɔrɔnɩ bajɩnasɔ na gbolasɔ, kɛ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ kɔɔ thɔnɩ.
Sɩ lĩlir kɔɔ nɩ warɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ a na cʋʋnɩ aa, ʋrɛɛkɛ ɩna palnɩ, ɔr gɩ, wɩ fʋɔnɛɛ jalana sɩ wa-n do a yɩ fuu paara'.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a danɩ, dapaara a tɔ wɔrɔ̃ Jeju sa so: Dɩɩrdaar; sa palʋʋ.
Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ fʋrɛ Jeju.
Sɩ tibil bɩɛl wɛrra pher bajɩna, a cɩna Thãgbaa gbõdaarɩ thɔ̃daar nũu a kur.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Nɩ ɩanɛ bajɩna na gbolasɔ nɩ fʋ mɩ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ-n fʋnɩ yu hɔ̃hʋɔldaar koe.
Mɩ-n kɔɔ har kha na nɛrɛ wire fɛʋ dɩ ma-n dɩɩr nɩ thɩ̃ɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, sɩ na kɔɔ fʋ ma'. Sɩ gɩ har thakɛ gɩ cʋʋ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sonɩ gɩ dã.
Liir wɩ fuule fɛʋ sa fagʋʋ.
Sɩ daɓol bɩɛl gɩ da-n kɔɔ kpa Jejura, a par kẽkẽ nɩɩ, wɩ fʋʋrɛ,
dɩ for kelẽ nɩɩ pɛ war sa cana sãɓɔlɔ̃.
Dɩ wɩ kpar Jeju a jalna gbõdaarɩ pa ka bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ n gbɛbɩnɩ kha.
Sɩ Pɩɛr n kpaar Jejura nɔ bɩɛl nɔ bɩɛl, a ba dana gbõdaarɩ gbaya, a lõ too le na thɔ̃dara da-n ɩɩr dɔɔ.
Bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na so gʋʋrdara fɛʋ, kɔɔ kpɛr sɔ dɩ wa-n pɛ Jeju wɩ yɩrɔ hʋɛ wɩ kʋʋ, sɩ wa kɔɔ yɩ ga.
Sɩ tibil jɔ kɔɔ pɔr a kuur sɔ̃sɔ dɩ wa-n pɛ Jejura, sɩ awɩ so jɩ na ma kha ga.
Dɩ ɩkhasɔ n ɩɩr dɩ wɩ sõso na pɩɛraa ayɩ,
ɩnɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ dɩ so ayɩ, ɩna kʋɛrɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ tɩbɩla mɩnɩ, sɩ ɩnɩ-n bir ɩnɩ-n mɩ dakpɩɩ wire balãther, sɩ ga do tibil nyɛ̃ɛ ma'.
Sɩ gelelakɛ wɩ sonɩ awɩ so jɩ na ma kha ga.
Dɩ gbõdaar pal ɩɩr tɩbɩlaa thɩ̃thɩɩn a bule Jeju: Fa-n hana nʋɔ na birsena gaa? Anyee so ha gɩrɛ tɩbɩlaakɛ n pɛ farnɩ?
Sɩ Jeju pɩr pɔbɩ aa əl nʋɔa', dɩ gbõdaar bir bulee: Sɩɩ do fɛr dʋɔn Kirisiti, Thãgbaakɛ sɩ-n fʋɔrnɩɩ Bikuun bɛ?
Dɩ Jeju tu: Mɛrra gɩ, sɩ na yɩrɛ tibili Bikuun da too Thãgbaa nyɔ̃bɔra, a thena dakha thãgbara ƴũ a na-n ɩ̃ na ndɔlɔ̃pana.
Dɩ gbõdaar ɓəər ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ sa so: Anye hale dɩ sa bir na 'lo dɩkha 'lo?
Nɩ nɩɛnɩ mɔ̃ a kʋɛnɩ Thãgbaa i; mɔ̃ nɩ-n kpɩɛr? Dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ pɩɛraa so kʋnanɛ.
Sɩ ɩkhasɔ wɛrra mar dɩ wa-n cɩɩraa nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ, sa thii ƴɩɛ sɩ dɩ wa-n thʋʋrʋʋ na nyɔ̃ po, sɩ wa-n sʋʋraa a jɛ ntɛ n bɩɛnɩ; sɩ thɔ̃dara gbaarɛ sɩ wa-n ɓaalɛ.
Mɔ̃ Pɩɛr hanɩ gbayara, gbõdaar thɔ̃daar khɛ bɩɛl pɔr
a yɩɩ da-n ɩɩr dɔɔ, dɩ hɩɩnʋʋ kirkirkɩr sa sʋʋraa. Fɛrɛ dakha mee fɩ-n kɔɔ ha kha na Najarɛtɩ Jeju.
Sɩ a bananɛ sa so: Ma ja', ma-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ fɩ ƴaalnɩ fɩ soa'. Agɩpɩ Pɩɛr gba jal thena phel ko lõfonʋɔ.
Dɩ thɔ̃daar khɛrɩle yɩɩ, a bir ma da-n so wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩle aa: Kuunikɛ wa tibil cara bɩɛl gɩ.
Sɩ Pɩɛr bir da-n bana wo. Bɔɔ gbe dɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ hanɩle bir sʋʋraa: Sobɔr gɩ gel, wa tibil ca bɩɛl fɩ do gɩdonɩ Galiledaar ha fɩ.
Sɩ Pɩɛr mar a bana a ʋlfɛ da-n wɩɩrna thɩ̃ɛsɔ aa, ɩna jɩ kuunikɛ wɩ-n sona'.

Dɩ dapaara balanyɔ yɔl kʋʋ bir khɩɩ, dɩ Pɩɛr jɩna Jejuu thɩmɩɩkɛ a kɔɔ sʋʋraanɩ ayɩ, a yɔl kʋʋ na 'lɛ na khɩɩ balanyɔa', sɩ a na bananɛ balãther nayɩ, ɩna jɩ na'. Dɩ mɔ̃ Pɩɛr n kpɩɛrnɩ thale a-n khɩɩrɛ.
A dɩɩ wɩl duuro phiphi, bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna, na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ, na so gʋʋrdara fɛʋ gbɛbɩrɛ kha wɩ gʋʋr mɔ̃ wa donɩ. A wɩ li Jeju pɩ, wɩ kpaarɛ ha Pɩlatɩ.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ bulee ayɩ: Fɛr dʋɔn Juifi fãgadaarɩ? Dɩ Jeju tu: Mɔna fɩ sonɩ gɩ.
Dɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna pɩɛraa sɔ jɔɔjɔɔ.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ bir bulee wo: Fa-n hana nʋɔ na birsena gaa? Hɩnɛ sɔ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ-n pɛ farnɩ.
Sɩ Jeju na kɔɔ so thɩ̃ɛ bã, dɩ gɛr cʋɛ dɩ nʋɔ kpaa Pɩlatɩ.
Sɩ ɓol bɔɔ fɛʋ Pɩlatɩ n faarɛ khaɩdaarɩkɛ tɩbɩla n ƴaalnɩ.
Sɩ tibil bɩɛl hale khaɩra wɩ-n wenɩ Barabasɩ nakha lãlana, gɩdonɩ tibil wɩ kɔɔ kʋ dawiikɛ wɩ kɔɔ ɩɩrnanɩ lãʋ.
Dɩ tibil jɔɔle jʋʋnɛ Pɩlatɩɩ pa, a ma dɩ wa-n bɩɛlʋʋ a cʋɛ nar gɩrɛɛkɛ a-n kɔɔ cʋʋ narnɩ.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ tu: Nɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ faa ʋrɛ dɔnɩ Juifi fãgadaar a ha nɩ ya?
Gɩdonɩ a jɩrɛ dɩ gbugi dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna kɔɔ fʋ Jeju a haa.
Sɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna cʋrrɛ tɩbɩla wa-n pɛr, wɩ sɔ Pɩlatɩra a ka faa Barabasɩ.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ bir bule wi: Sɩ anye nɩ-n ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋɛna ʋrɛ nɩ-n wenɩ Juifr fãgadaar?
Dɩ wɩ tu kheu wɛlɛ wɛlɛ aa: Gbaanɛɛ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ bule wi: Anyee puu ca a cʋʋ? Sɩ wɩ bir tu na kheu wɛlɛ wɛlɛ dɩɩ jɔ mɛ̃ aa: Gbaanɛɛ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Dɩ Pɩlatɩ ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n da tibil jɔ haar a faa Barabasɩ, sa gba Jeju 'laa dɩ wɩ ciil na khasa sɩ dɩ ha wɩ wɩ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Dɩ sɔrasɛ kɔɔ kpar Jeju a lona gobanɛrɩ cɔ gbayara, dɩ wɩ wer wɩ̃ sɔrasɩsɔ fɛʋ.
Sɩ wɩ tor Jeju kẽkẽ sɩɛ, a kɛrna uu dɩɩ ho fãgadaar kpɩɛr, dɩ wɩ tʋʋ yʋʋra,
sa ma dɩ wa-n fʋɔrʋʋ ayɩ: Juifi fãgadaar gba fʋɔrɛ.
Sɩ dɩ wa-n bɩɩrʋʋ yʋʋ na ɓalʋʋ dɩ wa-n cɩɩrnanaa nyɔ̃thɩ̃ɩ, sɩ dɩ wɩ gburõku na fʋɔrʋʋ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ maanʋʋnɩ pɩ, wɩ thʋbʋʋrɛ kẽkẽ sɩɛ sa bir tʋʋ ɔɔ kẽkẽ sa kpaa thena wɩ kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.
Kũu bɩɛl gɩ, a the lɔɔ da-n kɔ̃, dɩ wɩ kɔɔ cʋgʋʋ na fãga dɩ gba Jejuu kʋkʋ thɩr a heen; ɔɔ i n dʋɔn Sɩmɔ̃, Sɩrɛn dɩɩra a the, Alesãdɩɩr na Rufusii thɩ gɩ.
Dɩ wɩ kpa Jeju a jalna paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Gɔlgɔta, kɩrʋ dʋɔn Yʋ khubu.
Dɩ wɩ haarɛ taanɩkɛ nyanyaananɩ thɩɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ mɩɩr, sɩ a kɔɔ bor.
Agɩpɩ wɩ gbaarɛ a kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra, sa gba ɔɔ kẽkẽsɔ a tɩnɛ na lɩ lɩr wɩ jɩ ntɛɛkɛ na 'lɛnɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ kpaanɩ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra, khɛ yɔ kpãa bɔɔ gɩ kɔɔ do.
Kherereekɛ n nɛnanɩ ɔɔ so heen kɩr ha gɩrɛ, gɩ sor: Juifi fãgadaar gɩ.
Wɩ kɔɔ kpar dakha yu hɔ̃hɔla yenyɔ dapaale, bɩɛl ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔra, bɩɛl ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɩlana.
[Mɛ̃ gɩrɛɛkɛ kherenenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Wɩ kɔɔ theruure a ɓã puu cʋʋdarara” dã otirə.]
Wɩrɛ n thɛnɩ le sɩ wa-n ka wɩ-n nɩɩrʋʋrɛ sɩ dɩ wɩ didiə yʋʋ sɩ na so: Mee fɩ kɔɔ yɩ fa wɩɛrɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ sɩ fɩ bir fɩ mɩ wire balãther;
taa afɩbara a gbuno kʋkʋ thɩrʋra bɛɛ.
Mɛ̃ dakha bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara n ɓoɓororaa awɩ ha dɩ wa-n so aa: A kɔɔ taarɛ wɩ̃ tibil sɩ aa puno na taa dɩbara ga.
Dɔ ɔrkɛ dɔnɩ Kirisiti, Ɩjɩrayɛl fãgadaar n gbũ nɛnɛ̃ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra sɩ tor yire sɩ pɛr haar. Wɩrɛ wɩ kɔɔ kpanaanɩ kha n nɩɩrʋʋrɛ dakha wer.
A wire ʋlkha dɩɩ koo kɔɔ birəre tĩtĩtĩ a dana dʋɔr bɔɔ.
Dɩ dʋɔr bɔɔ, Jeju kɔɔ hulene nɔ khɩɩr aa: Eloyɩ, Eloyɩ, lama sabakɩtanɩ; kɩrʋ dʋɔn: Ɩ̃ Thãgba, ɩ̃ Thãgba mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fɩ bo mɩ faa?
Sɩ ɩkhasɔɔkɛ kɔɔ hanɩle dɩ wa-n nɩɛ, wɩ sor: Nɩ hɩnɛ, Elɩ Thãgbaa bobon a-n we.
Dɩ tibil bɩɛl wɛrra car a gba tabɩhʋɛ a mʋʋ ta ƴʋɔna, a gar jʋmuunə a 'laaraa a yɔ, sa so: Nɩ dɔ sɩ hɩɩn ado Elɩra na ɩnɛ na cʋgʋʋ dɩ na gbũ.
Sɩ Jeju hulene nɔ kheu sa khi.
Dɩ kẽkẽ nɩɩkɛ hanɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna kɔɔ fʋrɛ ƴũ a ɓəər yenyɔ a ba dana thɩɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ jɩlɛnɩ Jejuu ƴɛra yɩnɩ khi caale Jeju khini, a sor: Sobɔr gɩ, Thãgbaa Bikuun kuunikɛ do ger.
Khɛrasɔ kɔɔ hale dakha a 'laa yɩɛ; Marɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Magɩdala dɩɩra, Salome, nakha Marɩɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ Jakɩ diine na Jojɩɩ nɩ, wɩrɛ fɛʋ kɔɔ har khɛraalee thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Wɛr n kɔɔ kpaanɛ Jejura dɩ wa-n buluu ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ hanɩ Galile, na wɩ̃ khɛrsɔ bərəəmkɛ n kɔɔ jalanaanɩ kha Jerujalɛm kɔɔ hale wer.
Dɩɩ 'lire dʋɔrɛ sɩ dɩɩ do gbɛbɩ wire gɩ, a thɩɛna gaa gɛr dʋɔn hɩɩr wi dɛɛsɩ wire.

Jojɛfɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Arɩmate kɔɔ pɔr, ɔr dʋɔn tibilikɛ dɔnɩ so gʋʋr kɔ̃tɩn dakha kɛ wɩ-n cʋnɩ, ɔɔ thɛthɛ dakha n pɩɛrɛ bɔɔkɛ Thãgbaa fãgadaar do na ɩnɩ; a kɔɔ ɩɩrɛ a pɛr kũu fɩlɛ sa jal Pɩlatɩɩ pa a bɩɛlaa a ha nɩ Jejuu for.
Sɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ Pɩlatɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a nɩɛnɩ dɩɩ do a 'lire khir, dɩ mɛ̃ a we sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ a bulee ado Jeju kɔɔ mãa khir.
Mɔ̃ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ mɩɛɛnɩ, gɛr a harɔ Jojɛfɩ hʋɛ dɩ gba Jejuu for.
Dɩ Jojɛfɩ ther kẽkẽ bulo ɓʋ̃ɔ, sa gbũ Jejuu for a par kɩ̃kɩɩnna, sa dʋʋ kaaraakɛ wɩ kɔɔ thelnɩ gɔ̃gʋɔna, agɩpɩ dɩ kpuro bokaar a khaanna ka nʋɔ.
Sɩ Marɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Magɩdala na Marɩ ʋrɛ dɔnɩ Jojɩɩ nɩ kɔɔ hɩɩnɛ ka wɩ kɔɔ pɩɛnɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ hɩɩr wire kanɩ pɩ, Marɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Magɩdala, Salome, na Marɩɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ Jakɩɩ nɩ kɔɔ ther niinikɛ n hʋnanɩ daʋ, a jalna wɩ thir Jejuu forra.
Sɩ duuro phiphi wire makonyɔɔ caca wi, wɩ kɔɔ jaal kaara wi phã bɔɔ.
Sɩ wɩ-n mɩɩrɛ khasɔ ayɩ: Amɛ na ba kpurone sar bokaar ka nʋɔra na faa ya fɛ?
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ gbanɩ wɩ hɩɩn, wɩ yɩrɛ bokaar dɩɩ kpuro a khokhɩa, sɩ ga do bokaar gɩ a wabɩ kpãkpalã ga.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ lʋʋn kaʋ a yɩ daɓolbir dɩ too mɔ̃ wa-n lonɩ a pɛr nyɔ̃bɔɔ, a to kẽkẽ gbã bulo, dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa wɛr.
Sɩ a so warɛ: Na-n do nʋɔ n kpaa na'; mee Najarɛtɩ Jejuukɛ wɩ kɔɔ kpanɩ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra nɩ-n ƴaal. A ɩɩrɛ a the khirera, aa ha kɛka'; nɩ yɛ ka wɩ kɔɔ pɩɛnɩ.
Sɩ nɩ jala a sɔ ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara nakha Pɩɛrra ayɛ: A kʋʋl nɛr ƴɩɛ da-n jal Galile, dɩ le na yɩɩ mɔ̃kɛ a kɔɔ so narnɩ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ khɛraale kɔɔ the kaʋ a caalɛ gɩdonɩ nʋɔ kpaa wɛr dɩ wa-n jẽ, sɩ wa kɔɔ so tibillə thɩ̃a', gɩdonɩ maar fʋlɛnɛ wɩ.
[Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ ɩɩrnɩ khirera pɩ, wire makonyɔɔ caca wi duuro phiphi, Magɩdala Marɩɩkɛ a kɔɔ weeronɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbii makonyɔ a faa a kɔɔ nɩna dɩbara ɓo.
Ɔr kɔɔ jala a mɩɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ hanɩ wɩrɛraakɛ n kɔɔ hananɩ kha Jeju, kɛ n bɩɛnnɩ dɩ wa-n khɩɩna.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ Jeju hananɛ yire dɩ ɩnɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ yɩɩ, wa kɔɔ pɛr haara'.
Agɩpɩ tɩbɩla yenyɔ wɛrra kɔɔ ha hʋɛra dɩ wa-n jal kõgoso, dɩ Jeju kɔɔ nɩna wɩ dɩbara a ha kpɩɩ.
Dɩ wɛr dakha kɔɔ jaal a mɩɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ sɛnɩ, sɩ wa kɔɔ pɛr haar dakha wera'.
A gele pɩ, a kɔɔ nɩnanɛ ɔɔbara kpãkpãadara yʋɔr bɩɛl, ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ dɩko kho paar, a kɔɔ phaan wɛr awɩ ha pɛ ɓɔrra na mɔ̃kɛ awɩda khɩɩrnɩ, gɩdonɩ wa kɔɔ pɛr wɩrɛɛkɛ yɩɛnɩ na yireeda haara'.
Agɩpɩ a so warɛ: Nɩ jala thɩɩra fɛʋ a na mɩa Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ tɩbɩlala fɛʋ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar dɩ wa kpɛgʋʋ nyʋɔnɔ a na 'lɛr taarɛ, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na pɩɛrnɩ haara', sor na heenuune.
Nɩ yɛ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ jenaakɛ na kpaanɛnɩ wɩrɛraakɛ na-n pɩɛrnɩ haar: Wa gbaar ɩ̃ i wa-n weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ, wa-n mɩɩrɛ thɩmɩɩ kpɩɩsɔ;
wa fʋrɛ siisɔ; a wɩ yɔ kpalʋ, ga pɛ war thɩlkɩɩr fɩɩʋraka'; wa dɛɛnɛ khodarara nyɛ̃ɛ dɩ wa kpɛɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ mɩɩ wɩnɩ pɩ, Thãgba kɔɔ khəsuure da-n jʋʋn Thãgbaa dʋɔ a too ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔra.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara jaal dɩ wa-n mɩɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ paar fɛʋ, dɩ Kɔ̃tɩn n dona wɛr kha thɔma, dɩ gba jenaakɛ n kpaanɛnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩra da-n nɩna dɩ sobɔr gɩ do.]
Tιbιl jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ 'lire dʋʋr bʋɔ, a khere thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ cʋɛnι asι thɩ̃thιιn,
mɔ̃kɛ tιbιlaakɛ dɔnι sobɔ so jιdara gbanι mιι sι dιι ha, kɛ dɔnι wιrɛ kɔɔ yɛ gιnι na yire dιι fʋna ga fʋ bɔɔ, wι dor dakha Thãgbaa thιmιι mιιdara.
Mɛrɛ dakha, mι jιɛ 'lo bɔɔbɔɔ, a jι mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛɛlera kɔɔ ιιrnι fʋ paarrakɛ kɛkɛkɛ, dι mι yιɛrɛ dιι do gι bɔrɛ dι ɩ̃ khere gιrɛ kpa kha kpa kha, dι ma-n mιɛ fι, fɛr Teofιl bʋɔ,
fι puno fι jιι jι, dι sobɔr dιιrɛɛlera fι kɔɔ 'lɛnι do.
Dabɔɔkɛ Ɛrɔɔdι donι fãgadaar Jude dιιra, Thãgbaa bonι jidaar bιɛl kɔɔ hale wι-n wenι Jakarι, Abιaa too gι. Ɔɔ khɛr, kɛ wι-n wenι Elijabɛtι, dɔ Aarɔ̃ɔkɛ dɔnι gbõdaarι məl.
Dι wɛr yenyɔ fɛʋ dor tιbιlaakɛ saranι Thãgbaa ƴɛra. Dι wι-n hιιnɛ Kɔ̃tιnι jɔfʋsɔ na ɔɔ so fɛʋ, wa hana so paara'.
Sι wa hana bιsaana', gιdonι Elijabɛtι dor khɛr kʋ̃bʋʋ, wɛr yenyɔ fɛʋ tιnɛ.
Dι wi bιɛl, Jakarι n dor ɔɔ bonι ji thɔ̃ Thãgbaa ƴɛra, gιdonι ɔɔ too dea mɛ̃.
Mɔ̃kɛ bonι jidara n cʋʋnι, wι lιrɛ lιι dιι do ɔɔda gι, dι na lõ Kɔ̃tιnι fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tιιna an thii thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n hʋnanι daʋ.
Sι tibil jɔ derre phiilo, dι wa-n bιɛl Thãgba, dabɔɔkɛ Jakarι n thiini thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n hʋnanι daʋ.
Le Kɔ̃tιnι thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bιɛl the Jakarιra a jιιl nyɔ̃bɔɔra, paarιkɛ wι-n thiini thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n hʋnanι daʋ.
A Jakarι yιι, haar fuguure dι maar fʋʋ.
Sι Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu sʋʋraa ayι: Jakarι, fa-n do maar n fʋ fa', gιdonι Thãgba ture afι bιɛl. Afι khɛr Elijabɛtι na kʋɔn kũubir, dι fa dʋʋ ire Jã.
A na do farɛ dadaa na kãkadaa, dι daʋ na fʋrɛ tibil jɔjʋɔ ɔɔ kɔna.
Gιdonι a na dor tibil kɔ̃tɩ̃ι Kɔ̃tιnι ƴɛra, a na yɔ dιvɛ̃ dι ta khaa ga, a na hinəne Thu Phuu dabɔɔkɛrakɛ a hanι ɔɔ nιι kɔ̃lora.
Dι ɔr na cʋɛ Ɩjιrayɛl bιsana jɔɔjɔɔ, dι wa kɛr na bir Kɔ̃tιn awι Thãgbara.

Dι ɔr na kʋlɛ Kirisiti ƴιɛ, a hanana Elι Thãgbaa bobonι thu ca na ɔɔ puno, a cʋʋna thɛɛ ha gι bir gι ha awι bιsãsɔra, sɩ a kpa nũ nʋʋrdara a pɛr wɩ hana tɩɩ saraa kpɛsɛ, gɩ do mɛ̃ a gbɛbɩ tɩbɩla dɩ wɩ too Kɔ̃tɩnɩ too.
Dɩ Jakarɩ bule Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thurə: Mɔ̃ ma jɩ dɩ sobɔr thɩ̃ɛɛlera na do, gɩdonɩ mɩ tɩnɛ dɩ ɩ̃ khɛr dakha tɩ̃?
Dɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bir birsee: Mɛr dʋɔn Gabɩrɩɛlɩkɛ n jɩlɛnɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra. A thɔ̃ mɛr ayɩ, ɩ̃ sɔ far a mɩana fɩ dakha tutugo bʋɔɔkɛra.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, gɩdonɩ fa kɔɔ pɛr haar ɩ̃ thιmιιsɔraakɛ na dananι a ga bɔ dã ga, fa dor nɔ madaar, fa puno a na mιι thιmιιra' phaphapha gι dana wireekɛ gιrɛɛkɛra na danι.
Sι tιbιla har dι wa-n pιɛr Jakarι, dι nʋɔ kpaa wɛr mɔ̃ a-n pʋɔrnι le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bιnɔ.
Sι ɔbɔɔkɛ Jakarι thenι aa-n puno na mιιna wι thιmιιra'. Dι mɛ̃ wι jι thɩ̃ɛ a yι le Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bιnɔ. Dι a mar da-n mιιna wι na nyɛ̃be, dιι do nɔ marra a toona thalera.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ Jakarιι thɔ̃ do wi pιnι, a bire kɔ̃ ɔɔ cɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ ga toonι gbe, dιι do ɔɔ khɛr Elijabɛtι hananɛ pɛmɛr da-n toona cɔ haar dιι cʋʋna pora yemɔι, sι dι so ayι:
Hιnɛ gιrɛɛkɛ Kɔ̃tιn cʋʋ marnɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ a hɩɩn mɩnɩ sa ti gɩrɛɛkɛ dɔ marnɩ yicuru tɩbɩlala.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Elijabɛtɩ hananɩ pɛmɛr dɩɩ cʋʋ pora maadõ, Thãgba bire thɔ̃ ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu Gabɩrɩɛl Galile, dɩ bɩɛllakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Najarɛtɩ,
khɛ biireraakɛ na jɛnɩ kuun pa'. Sɩ a hananɛ wɛdaar, kɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jojɛfɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ Davɩdɩɩ tibil. Dɩ khɛ biireelee irə n dʋɔn Marɩ.
Le Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu pɔ Marɩɩ pa, a sʋʋraa: Mι fʋɔr fɛr, fɛrɛɛkɛ Thãgba jιnι bʋɔra, Kɔ̃tιn har kha na fɛrɛ.
Sι mɔ̃kɛ Marι nιɛnι ga thιmιιle, haar fuguure ka dι bule ɔɔbara: Anye dɔ fʋɔr caakɛɛ kιr ya fɛ?
Dι Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu sʋʋraa: Marι, fa-n do maar n fʋ fa', gιdonι Thãgba jɩɛn fι bʋɔra.
Dι hιnɛ, fa hananɛ pɛmɛr a na kɔ̃ kũubir a na dʋʋ ire Jeju.
A na dor tibil kɔ̃tɩ̃ι, dι ɔɔ i na-n dɔ Kəkəədaarι Bikuun, dι Kɔ̃tιn Thãgba na haarɛ ɔɔ mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃ Davιdιι fãga too pa.
Dι mɛ̃ a na do fãgadaar khorr Jakɔbιι toora, dι ɔɔ fãgadaar do na hana khu paara'.
Dι Marι so Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thurə: Mɔ̃ ga do sι na ha thale gιdonι ma jι kuun pa?
Dι Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu birsee: Thu Phuu na ιna na ha far, dι Kəkəədaar na ɔɔ fãga na kɛɛ farɛ ιtιιr. Gɛr gι bιsaanιkɛ fa kɔnι, wa-n wιιrɛ daphuu, Thãgbaa Bikuun.
Dι hιnɛ, Elijabɛtι afι tibil, a hananɛ pɛmɛr dakha ɔɔ tɩ̃ bɔra, dι kũubir a na kɔ̃, ɔrkɛ wι-n kɔɔ wenι khɛr kʋ̃bʋʋ hana gɛr pora maadõ gι cʋʋ nɛnɛ̃.
Gιdonι thɩ̃ bιɛl na hale kpιιkɛ Thãgba na-n punonaa ga.
Dι Marι birsee: Hιnɛ, mι dor Kɔ̃tιnι thɔ̃daar, dɔ gι dã mι mɔ̃kɛra fι sonι. Dι Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu fagʋʋ sa jal.
Dawiilera Marι ιιr a gba hʋɛ na phananɛ, da-n jal gɔ̃gɔ̃ khʋra Juda dι bιɛlla,
a lõ Jakarιι cɔ a fʋɔr Ehjabɛtι.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ Elijabɛtι nιɛnι Marιι fʋɔr, ɔɔ bi ubire le ɔɔ kɔ̃lora, dι Elijabɛtι hinə Thu Phuu,
a hulẽ na nɔ kheu ayι: Thãgba bɔna fɛr a jɔ khɛra fɛʋ, dι biilera afι kɔ̃lora 'lɛr bɔnanɛ.
Mɔ̃ gι fʋ sι ɩ̃ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ι nι ɩ̃ a yι mι?
Gιdonι hιnɛ, dapaara afι fʋɔr lõ mιnι nũ kaar, ɩ̃ bi ubire na kãkar kɛ ɩ̃ kɔ̃lora.
Gι da fɛrkɛra pιɛrnι haar, gιdonι gιrɛ thɛnι Kɔ̃tιnι pa dι wι mιι fι, ga daan oti.
Dι Marι so ayι: Ɩ̃ ha n khιιrɛ Kɔ̃tιn,
dι ɩ̃ ha na-n kãka Thãgba ɩ̃ Taadaarra,
gιdonι a hιιnɛ ɔɔ hɛlɛlɛ thɔ̃daar khɛr. Gιdonι hιnɛ, a fʋna nɛnɛ̃kɛ, thɩ kɔ̃ caar fɛʋ na so marɛ anayι, Thãgba bɔna mɛr.
Gιdonι Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋ Punodaar cʋʋ marɛ thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩna; dι ɔɔ i n dʋɔn daphuu.
Dɔ ɔɔ bɔ dona n hale wιrɛraakɛ n maanɛɛnι məlle wo məllela fɛʋ.
A nιnanɛ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ fãga nyɔ̃ hanι, a bɩ̃bιlanɛ wιrɛɛkɛ hananι i ƴaal kpιɛrɛsɔ haarra.
A tɔr fãgadara awι fãga too para kpɛɛ, sa cʋʋ hɛlɛlɛ fιldara dι wι pal ιιr.
A cʋʋrɛ kɔmɛdara dɩ wɩ hi na thɩ̃ bʋɔ, sa faa lɛ̃lɛ na nyɛ̃ biire dɩ wɩ jal.
A bulle Ɩjɩrayɛl ɔɔ thɔ̃daar, gɩdonɩ ɔɔ bɔ donana a jɩna
Abɩraham na ɔɔ məlsɔ khorr, mɔ̃kɛ a kɔɔ sonɩ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔra.
Dɩ Marɩ too nakha Elijabɛtɩ pora yẽthersɔ. Agɩpɩ dɩ kɛr bir kɔ̃ ɔɔ cɔ.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ Elijabɛtιι bi kɔ̃ bɔ danι, a kʋɔn kũubir.
A Elijabɛtιι cɔ khudara na ɔɔ toosɔ nιɛ dι Kɔ̃tιn kɔɔ donaanɛ bʋɔ dιι kar, wι-n kãkarɛ kha na ɔr.
Dι wire makõther wirera, wι pɔr a kur biile khʋ̃ʋ, sa ƴaal wι haa ire Jakarι, kɛ dɔnι ɔɔ thιι irə wo.
Sι ɔɔ nι so: Kpei, Jã wa-n wιι.
Dι wι sʋʋraa: Tibil na hale afι toora a hana ire thala';
sa mιιna ɔɔ thι nyɛ̃be wι hιιn mɔ̃kɛ a-n ƴaalnι a na-n wιι.
Dι Jakarι bιɛl sɛbɛ a khere pɛr ayι: Jã wa-n wιι. Dι nʋɔ kpaa wι fɛʋ.
Dι dapaara Jakarιι nɔ khɛr, dι delẽbire lιmι dι puno wo da-n mιι thιmιa, da-n khιιna Thãgba.
Dι maar fʋlɛ cɔ khudara fɛʋ, dι Jude gɔ̃gɔ̃ dιdara fɛʋ kɔɔ mιιrɛ kha ga thɩ̃sɔɔlera.
Dι wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ kɔɔ nιɛnɛnι thɩmɩɩrɩle, wι fʋ gɛr le awι bιnɔ sι wa-n so aa: Dι mɔ̃ biilera na ha ya fɛ? Sι Kɔ̃tιnι nyɔ̃ kɔɔ kɛɛraarɛ.
Dι ɔɔ thι Jakarι hinə Thu Phuu, a ma da-n ti Thãgba tukιrʋ thakɛ ayι:
Kɔ̃tιnιkɛ dɔnι Ɩjιrayɛl Thãgba hιna khιιrɛ, gιdonι a ιnɛ a kher ɔɔ too sa birse wi.
A pɛ sarɛ Taadaar kɔ̃tɩ̃ι ɔɔ thɔ̃daar Davιdιι toora,
mɔ̃kɛ a kɔɔ mιιnι dιι the ɔɔ bobon phusɔɔ nɔɔ kɛkɛkɛ;
taarɛ gι dι ga-n taa sι asι sodarara, na wιrɛraakɛ fɛʋ n laarɛ sιnιι nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Mɛ̃ a kɔɔ dona asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ bʋɔ, a jɩnana ɔɔ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ phu.
Gɛr dʋɔn nʋɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ sonɩ na asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ Abɩraham,
dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba na ha sɩ fãga, ɔbɔɔkɛ a na taa sɩnɩ asɩ sodaraa nyɔ̃kɔɔ na pɩ, sa-n dʋʋraa thɔma na 'lar,
na phur, na fɩl sarʋ ɔɔ ƴɛra wire fɛʋ asɩ yi hanana.
Sɩ fɛrɛ bɩsã buu, wa we fer Kəkəədaarɩ bobon, gɩdonɩ fɛr na kʋlɛ Kɔ̃tɩn ƴɩɛ, fa-n gbɛbɩrɩ ɔɔ hʋsʋnɔ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ a na nɩna ɔɔ too taa jɩɩr, dɩ ga ther awɩ sopugosɔɔ faara,
gɩdonɩ asɩ Thãgba hinəne bɔ donanɛ, gɛr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ƴũu dahɩrɛ phã a ɩ̃ a kher sɩ;
a na-n hɩrɛ wɩrɛɛkɛ hanɩ dabirəra, na khi jəərera, a thɔɔ asɩ nɛ a na-n pɛ ha ie hʋɛra.
Dɩ bɩsaanna n khʋɔn, dɩ ɔɔ thu na-n 'lɛ fãga. Sɩ bəənnə a-n cɔ, phaphapha dɩɩ dana wireekɛ a nɩnanɩ ɔɔbara Ɩjɩrayɛldaraa ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Ɔbɔɔlera, Sejaar Ogusiti fãgadaar kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ kɔɔ 'laa jɔfʋ ayɩ, wɩ thera tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Dɩ caca therreele kɔɔ har ɔbɔɔkɛ Kiriniyusi donɩ gobanɛr Siri dɩɩra.
Dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ jaal wɩ ther wɩ awɩ dɩraakɛ wɩ thenɩ.
Dɩ Jojɛfɩ dakha kɛ thɛnɩ Galile Najarɛtɩ dɩɩra, a jaal Jude Davɩdɩɩ dɩraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Bɛtɩlɛhɛm, gɩdonɩ Davɩdɩɩ tibil gι a do ɔɔ ca.
A jaal dakha na Marι, ɔɔ wɛdaarιkɛ hananι pɛmɛr wι ther wι.
Dι mɔna wι hanιle, Marιι bi kɔ̃ bɔ daan,
dι kɔ̃ ɔɔ biir bi dι do kũubir, dι parʋʋ bibɔrɔ kɩ̃kιιn a pɛ bekolela, gιdonι phɩ̃ paar na hale kãkɛ kpakpala n cɔnι dι wa ha wa'.
Dι khuirəəle bana khedara hale hʋɔnɔ, dι wa-n bɛr awι banasɔ dιtιnɔ.
Dι le Kɔ̃tιnι thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu bιɛl the war, dι Kɔ̃tιnι carbara hιrɛrɛ a dii war. Dι maar fʋlɛ wι jɔɔ ka.
Dι Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuulera so warɛ ayι: Na-n do maar n fʋ na', gιdonι tutugo bʋɔ mι-n mιι nι kɛ na dɔnι da kɔ̃tɩ̃ι Ɩjιrayɛldarara fɛʋ.
Nĩkɛ nι 'lɛr Taadaar bιɛlιkɛ dʋɔnnι Kirisiti, Kɔ̃tιn gι, kɛ wι kɔnι Davιdιι dιra.
Dι gιrɛɛkɛ na dɔ narnι jιιn dʋɔn: Na yιrɛ bibɔrɔ, dι wa parʋʋ bibɔrɔ kɩ̃kιιn na pɛ bekolela.
Le dapaara ƴũ ko kena tə̃tə̃tə̃ the Thãgbaa dʋɔ a caan Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuule, dι wa-n khιι kha Thãgba awι ha, dι wa-n sona aa:
Thãgbaa i n dʋbarɔ le thãgbara ƴũ pər, sι ha ιι n dɛɛnɛ tιbιlala thιιra, kɛ n lonaanι haar.

Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔle faa wɩnɩ, sɩ wa-n bir Thãgbaa dʋɔ, bana khedaraale mɩɩrɛ kha bɩɛlbɩɛl ayɩ: Dɩ a mɛ̃ gɩ, nɩ ɩna sɩ jal phaphapha sɩ dã Bɛtɩlɛhɛm sɩ hɩɩn gɩrɛ dananɩ le, kɛ dɔnɩ gɩrɛra Kɔ̃tɩn cʋʋ sɩnɩ dɩ sɩ jɩ.
Dɩ wɩ jaal khə̃khə̃ a ƴaal Marɩ, na Jojɛfɩ, na bibɔrɔɔle wɩ pɛnɩ bekolela a yɩ wɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩɩnɩ pɩ, wɩ gbaar thɩmɩa fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ bɩsã buudaraale a mɩɩ.
Dɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ kɔɔ nɩɛnɛnɩ, nʋɔ kpaa wɛr bana khedaraa thɩmɩɩraale.
Sɩ Marɩ fʋrɛ ga thɩ̃sɔɔle fɛʋ ɔɔ bɩnɔ da-n kpɩɛrna gɩ.
Dɩ bana khedara kɛrrɛ a dʋbɩ Thãgbaa i dɩ wa-n birnə, dɩ wa-n khɩɩnaa dakha gɩrɛraakɛ fɛʋ wɩ nɩɛnɩ a torna yire, gɩdonɩ gɩ har mɔna Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuulera kɔɔ so warnɩ.
A wire makõther dã, wɩ kurre biile khʋ̃ʋ sɩ wa-n wɩɩ Jeju, ireekɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ 'laanɩ sɩ ɔɔ nɩ na hana ɔɔ pɛmɛ pa'.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jojɛfɩ na Marɩɩ phʋɔl wi danɩ, mɔ̃kɛ Mʋɩjɩɩ jɔfʋ hanɩ, wɩ gbaar Jeju a jalna Jerujalɛm wɩ ha Kɔ̃tɩn.
Gɩdonɩ mɛ̃ gɩ khere Kɔ̃tɩnɩ jɔfʋra ayɩ: “Caca kuuminə fɛʋʋkɛ wa kɔnɩ, Kɔ̃tɩnɩda wa do.”
Dɩ Jojɛfɩ na Marɩ 'laarɛ bonɩ jirrə, mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ jɔfʋra, “kʋlãpuo yenyɔ agɩbo puusɛ̃ ɓɔla yenyɔ.”
Dɩ hɩnɛ, kũu bɩɛl gɩ, a hale Jerujalɛm dɩ wa-n wɩɩ Sɩmɛ̃ʋ. Kuunile dor tibil sarʋ, da-n cʋna Thãgba. A-n pιɛrɛ dakha ʋrɛɛkɛ Ɩjιrayɛl na 'lɛrɔnι taarɛ, dι Thu Phuu haaraa.
Thu Phuu kɔɔ khιιraarɛ gιrɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara, dɩ a na yɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ Kirisiti na yire sɩ na khi.
Dɩ Thu Phuurə thɔɔrɛ Sɩmɛ̃ʋ a jalna Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna. Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju bɩsã buulee thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ pɔnaanɩ, wɩ cʋʋnaa mɔ̃kɛ jɔfʋ sonɩ,
Sɩmɛ̃ʋ teguure a pɛ ɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ sa khɩɩ Thãgba ayɩ:
Nɛnɛ̃kɛ Kɔ̃tɩn, sɛ afɩ thɔ̃daarra a kɔ̃ na ha ɩɩ mɔna fɩ kɔɔ sonɩ;
gɩdonɩ mɩ torre afɩ taara yire,
kɛ fɩ gbɛbɩnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ ƴɛra.
Taarɛɛle na dor dahɩrɛ a na hɩrɛ tibil caar fɛʋ, sɩ gɩ do i dʋbɩrɛ Ɩjɩrayɛl afɩ toora.
Nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaarɛ Jojɛfɩ na Marɩ gɩrɛraakɛ n mɩanɩ Jejura.
Dɩ Sɩmɛ̃ʋ bɩɛlɛ Thãgba a pɛ war, sa so Jejuu nɩ Marɩra ayɩ: Hɩnɛ, Thãgba cʋʋrɛ bɩsaanɩkɛ a dɔ ji paar na pal ɩɩr paar Ɩjɩrayɛldara jɔjʋɔra, na jɩɩnɩkɛ tɩbɩla na bananɩ;
dɩ mɛ̃ tibil jɔjʋɔɔ kpɩɛr gbulsɔ na yɩr, sɩ fe wer, khalghãa na gɔ fɛr haarra.
Thãgbaa bobon khɛ bιɛl gι, a kɔɔ hale dakha dι wa-n wιι An Panʋɛlι bikhɛr gι, a do Ajɛɛrι ca. A thʋnɛ tɩ̃ ka. A fʋna ɔɔ biir bɔɔ yɛna makonyɔ a kɔɔ cʋʋ na ɔɔ ko,
dι ɔɔ ko khi, sι dι too do khikhɛrʋ. Yɛna kpalanã yenã a hana, dι aa-n 'lee Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tιιna ga; Thãgbaa thɔ̃ a-n do dιtιnɔ na dιwιlʋ, dι li nʋɔ da-n bιɛlna Thãgba.
Dι bɔ bιɛllaalera, ɔr dakha pɔr da-n khιι Thãgba a mιιna Jejuuda tιbιla fɛʋraakɛ n pιɛrɛnι ʋrɛɛkɛ na birseneni Jerujalɛmdara.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jojɛfι na Marι cʋʋnι thɩ̃ɛsɔ fɛʋ dιι pι, mɔ̃kɛ Kɔ̃tιnι jɔfʋ sonι, wι kɛrrɛ bir kɔ̃ Galile Najarɛtι awι dιra.
Dι bιsaan na-n khɔ̃ da-n 'lɛ fãga, dι ɔɔ kpɛsɛ dakha na-n jɔr da-n 'lɛna dakha Thãgbaa bɔna.
Bɔɔ fɛʋ ɔɔ thι na ɔɔ nι n jaal Jerujalɛm yɛna yɛna fɛtιιkɛ wι-n wenι Pakι.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ a hananι yɛna yʋɔr yenyɔ, wι jaal mɔ̃kɛ wι yιnι wa-n cʋɛ fɛtιra.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ fɛtι pιnι dι wι bir dι wa-n kɔ̃, Jeju bιsaanιlera toore le Jerujalɛm, sɩ ɔɔ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ na kɔɔ ja'.
Dɩ wɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ Jeju hale na awɩ kpakpaarsɔ, a ɩɩr waa dɩɩ na tɩ̃ɩ, sɩ wa-n ƴaalʋʋ awɩ too na awɩ jɩ jɩnaa pa.
Mɔ̃kɛ wa-n yɩɩna', wɩ kɛrrɛ bir Jerujalɛm dɩ wa-n jɩɩ ƴaalʋʋ.
A wire yẽther ka pɩ, wɩ yɩɩrɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna dɩ too dɩɩrdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn, da-n pɛ wɩ nũu da-n bulena wɩ thɩ̃ɛ.
Dɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n kɔɔ pɩɛnɩ nũu, nʋɔ kpaa wɛr ɔɔ kpɛsɛra na mɔ̃ a-n birse wini.
A ɔɔ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ yɩɩ, gɩ kpaa wɛr nʋɔ, dɩ ɔɔ nɩ bulee: Ɩ̃ bi ya, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fɩ cʋʋ sɩ thakɛ? Hɩnɛ, afɩ thɩ na mɛrɛ, sɩ kɔɔ ƴaal fɛr waa na dɛr.
Dɩ bule wi: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n kɔɔ ƴaal mɩ? Na jɩ dɩ gɩ teenanɛ dɩ ma cʋʋ ɩ̃ Thιι thɔ̃aa?
Sι wa jι thιmιιrιle a so warnι kιrʋa'.
Agιpι Jeju bire kɔ̃ nakha wɛr Najarɛtι dιιra da-n nι wι nũu. Dι ɔɔ nι fʋrɛ thιmιaale fɛʋ ɔɔ bιnɔ.
Sι Jeju n khʋɔn dι ɔɔ kpɛsɛ na-n pɛr, da-n da Thãgba haar na tιbιla.

Ɔbɔɔkɛ Tɩbɛɛr Sejaar kɔɔ donɩ fãgadaar kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ dɩ ga cʋʋ yɛna yʋɔr yemɔɩ, ga bɔɔlera Pɔ̃sɩ Pɩlatɩ do dakha gobanɛr Jude dɩɩra, sɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ do fãgadaar buu Galile dɩɩra, dɩ ɔɔ õkuun Filipi do Ituredara na Tɩrakonɩtɩdaraa fãgadaar bu, sɩ dɩ Lɩjanɩasɩ do Abɩlɛndaraa fãgadaar bu;
dɩ ɔbɔɔlera dakha An na Kaɩfɩ do gbõdara, gɛr Thãgba mɩɩna Jã, Jakarɩɩ bikuun, bəənnə.
Dɩ a jaal da-n kpaar dɩɩ fɛʋ Jʋrdɛ̃ khʋra, da-n so tɩbɩlala aa: Nɩ deba haar sa 'lɛ yɔ kpɛɛrɛ, sɩ Thãgba n faa anɩ sopugosɔ.
Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩɩdaakɛ a kɔɔ kherenɩ ɔɔ sɛbɛra dana mɛ̃ ayɩ. “Tibil wire gɩ dɩ ga-n hulẽ bəənnə ayɩ: Na-n gbɛbɩrɛ hʋɛ Kɔ̃tɩnna, na-n wɛbɩrɛ ɔɔ hʋ bisɔ gɩ pɔlɔ.
Bɛlɛ̃ɛ fɛʋ na hire, dɩ gɔ̃gɔ̃ kɔ̃tɩna na gɔ̃gɔ̃ biisɔ fɛʋ na yɩɩrɛ na mãkha na thɩɩ. Gɩrɛɛkɛ gõgolonenɩ ga bire na telẽ, dɩ hʋɛsɔɔkɛ hanɩ yara yara ga pɔlɔlɛ.
Dɩ tibil caar fɛʋ na yɩrɛ taarɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara.”
Sɩ Jana n sor tibil jɔraale n pʋɔraanɩ wɩ kpɛɛ nyʋɔnɔ dɩ yɩ: Nɛr sikori bisɔ, amɛ sɔ nar nɩ fuo Thãgbaa nĩkhirəəkɛ na ɩnanɩ?

A mɛ̃ gɩ na-n sɛ beekɛ n nɛnanɩ anɩ ha debi, sɩ na-n too na so le anɩ bɩnɔ ayɩ, Abɩraham dʋɔn anɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tã'. Gɩdonɩ mɩ so narɛ: Bokanaakɛrakɛ Thãgba punone a cʋʋ gɩ dɩ gɩ debi a do bɩsana Abɩrahamna.
Dɩrakɛ kpãkpo 'lire leere thɩr nɛ kuur leere. Dɩ thɩr wo thɩrʋʋkɛ na-n sɛnɩ bi bʋɔa', wa kuur ger na dʋna dɔɔra.
Dɩ tibil jɔɔle bulee aa: Dɩ a gɩ ha thale, mɔ̃ sa do?
Dɩ birse wi: Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ kẽkena yenyɔ, a te bɩɛl hana ʋrɛɛkɛ na hana gɩna'; dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ dɩkor, dɔ a cʋʋna ɔmɛna dakha.
Dɩ war gbadaraakɛ pʋɔnnɩ wɩ kpɛɛ nyʋɔnɔ dakha, wɩ bulele Jã: Dɩɩrdaar, dɩ mɔ̃ sa do?
Dɩ so war: Na-n taa tɩbɩlala thɩ̃ɛ gɩ kãasɩ gɩrɛraakɛ wɩ pɛrna'.
Dɩ sɔrasɛsɔ dakha bulee: Sɩ sɛrɛ, mɔ̃ sa do? Dɩ birse wi: Na-n tagɩrɩ tibillə thɩ̃ɛ na fãga bɩa', agɩbo na-n pɛ war so khɩa', sɩ nɩ dɔ gɩrɛ wɩ-n lɩmɩ nɩnɩ na-n da nar.
Mɔ̃kɛ tɩbɩla fɛʋ n pɛnɩ nũu dɩ wa-n kpɩɛr awɩ hara, Jã ba dʋɔn Kirisiti yaa,
Jã so warɛ fɛʋ ayɩ: Me wer nyʋɔnɔ mɩ-n kpɛɛ nɩ, sɩ tibil bɩɛl na ɩnɛ kɛ hananɩ fãga a jɔ mɩ, dɩ ma hɩɩrʋʋrakɛ a na thʋbʋʋ nɛfaa pɛ̃a'. Ɔr, Thu Phuurə na dɔɔra a na kpɛɛ nɩ.
Dɩ jʋ jɛ nyɔ̃kpʋʋn hale dι fʋrɔ ɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ. A na jɛr jɔ a gba jʋ be a pɛ ɔɔ thʋ̃ bιnɔ, sι a thii laagbee dɔɔraakɛ na dɔnι thɩ̃ khiirnənə'.
Thale Jã n kɔɔ mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ tɩbɩlala nakha thɩmɩɩ ƴɩrɛ wo na bulo wini.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ fãgadaar buu kɔɔ gbaar ɔɔ õkuuni khɛr Ɛrɔdɩadɩ, Jã phaanʋʋnɛ ga phaan, na gɩ̃ sopugo jɔjɔraakɛ fɛʋ Ɛrɔɔdɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ.
Ɛrɔɔdɩ cʋʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ puuro ka, sɩ gɩrɛ puuroni a jɔrakɛ dʋɔn mɔ̃ a fʋnɩ Jã a to khaɩra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jã kɔɔ kpɛɛnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ nyʋɔnɔ na pɩ, a kɔɔ kpɛɛrɛ Jeju dakha nyʋɔnɔ. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju hanɩ da-n bɩɛl Thãgba, thãgbara ƴũ phubire.
Dɩ Thu Phuu gbũ puusɛ̃ khaa gbelẽ gbelẽ a lʋʋnaa. Dɩ le nʋɔ the thãgbara ƴũ ayɩ: Fɛr dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, fɩ lõ mer haar kpɛ.
Jeju kɔɔ hananɛ yɛna dɩɩ thɔɔ kpelẽ yʋɔrsɔ, ɔbɔɔkɛ a fʋnɩ ɔɔ thɔ̃. Dɩ tɩbɩla n kpɩɛrɛ Jojɛfɩɩ bikuun a do na Elɩɩ bikuun,
Matatɩɩ bikuun, Levɩɩ bikuun, Mɛlkɩɩ bikuun, Janaɩɩ bikuun, Jojɛfɩɩ bikuun,
Matatɩasɩɩ bikuun, Amɔsɩɩ bikuun, Nahʋmɩ bikuun, Esɩlɩɩ bikuun, Nagaɩɩ bikuun,
Matɩɩ bikuun, Matatɩasɩɩ bikuun, Semeɩɩ bikuun, Jojɛkɩɩ bikuun, Jodaa bikuun,
Joanãa bikuun, Rejaa bikuun, Jorobabɛlɩ bikuun, Salatɩɛlɩ bikuun, Nerɩɩ bikuun,
Mɛlkɩɩ bikuun, Adɩɩ bikuun, Kosamɩ bikuun, Ɛlmadamɩ bikuun, Ɛrɩ bikuun,
Jejuu bikuun, Elɩɛjɛɛrɩ bikuun, Jorɩmɩ bikuun, Matatɩɩ bikuun, Levɩɩ bikuun,
Sɩmɛ̃ʋʋ bikuun, Judaa bikuun, Jojɛfɩɩ bikuun, Jonamɩ bikuun, Elɩakɩmɩ bikuun,
Meleaa bikuun, Menaa bikuun, Matataa bikuun, Natãa bikuun, Davɩdɩɩ bikuun,
Ɩjaɩɩ bikuun, Jobɛɛdɩɩ bikuun, Boajɩɩ bikuun, Salomɔ̃ɔ bikuun, Nasɔ̃ɔ bikuun,
Amɩnadabɩɩ bikuun, Adɩmɛ̃ɛ bikuun, Arnɩɩ bikuun, Ɛsɩrɔmɩ bikuun, Farɛsɩɩ bikuun, Judaa bikuun,
Jakɔbɩɩ bikuun, Ɩjakɩɩ bikuun, Abɩrahamɩ bikuun, Taraa bikuun, Nakɔɔrɩ bikuun,
Serukii bikuun, Ragoo bikuun, Falɛkɩɩ bikuun, Ebɛɛrɩ bikuun, Salaa bikuun,
Kaɩnamɩ bikuun, Arfasaadɩɩ bikuun, Sɛmɩ bikuun, Noee bikuun, Lamɛkɩɩ bikuun,
Matujalaa bikuun, Enɔkɩɩ bikuun, Jarɛɛdɩɩ bikuun, Malelɛlɩ bikuun, Kaɩnãa bikuun,
Enɔsɩɩ bikuun, Sɛtɩɩ bikuun, Adãa bikuun, na Thãgbaa bikuun a do.
A Jeju hinə Thu Phuu, a ther Jʋrdɛ̃ mɩɩrɔ, dɩ Thu Phuu thɔgʋʋ a jalna bəənnə.
Le Satã fifiləə a cʋʋna wire kpalanyɔ. Dɩ Jeju na kɔɔ kho dɩkor ga wisɔraala'; a ga wiile ka pɩ kɔmɛr fʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ le Satã sʋʋraa aa: Ado fɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun, sɔ bokaarraakɛ gɩ debi gɩ do dɩkor.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Ga do dɩkor dɩbara na hana tibil yirə'.”
Dɩ Satã kpaa a jʋʋnna ƴũ, a nɩɩraa dapaara fãgadaar dɩɩsɔ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ thɩɩra,
sa sʋʋraa: Fɛr ma ha fãga fãgadaar dɩɩsɔraakɛ fɛʋ na awɩ nyɔ̃kor bɔ, gɩdonɩ wɩ kɔɔ ha mɛr, dɩ ma har ntɛɛkɛ mɩ pɛrnɩ haar ɩ̃ ha.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ ado fa gburõkure na fʋɔr mɩ, afɩda ga do fɛʋ.
Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Gι kherere ayɩ: “Kɔ̃tɩn, afɩ Thãgba fa fʋɔr, dɩ ɔrra dιbara fa doro thɔma.”
Dɩ Satana kpaa wo, a jalna Jerujalɛm a jʋʋnna Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna ƴũ, sa sʋʋraa: Ado fɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun, bɩna kɩɛr a je thʋnɔ, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere ayɩ:
“A na pɛrɛ ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ dɩ wa hɩɩn fɩ”
dɩ “wa tɛ fɛr, agado mã' fa ber nɔɔ bokaarra.”
Sɩ Jeju birsee: Gɩ kherere ayɩ: “Fa-n fifilə Kɔ̃tɩn afɩ Thãgba a hɩɩna'.”
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Satã kɔɔ fifiləəni na fɩlɛ fɛʋʋle pɩ, a fagʋʋrɛ phaphapha a yɩ hʋ kpɩɩ wo.
Dɩ mɛ̃ Jeju bir na Thu Phuu fãga Galile, dɩ ɔɔ i kpaar dɩ khuirəəle fɛʋ.
Dɩ a-n dɩɩrɛ tɩbɩla awɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnana, dɩ wɛr fɛʋ n dʋbʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ Jeju jal Najarɛtɩ kãkɛ wɩ kɔɔ haanʋʋnɩ; dɩ hɩɩr wire a lʋʋn Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra mɔ̃kɛra a-n kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ a ɩɩrnɩ a so sɛbɛ, Thãgbaa bobon Ejaɩɩ sɛbɛ wɩ haa. Dɩ a phubire sɛbɛra a yɩ kãkɛ gɩ kherenɩ ayɩ:
“Kɔ̃tɩnɩ Thu Phuu ha marɛ, gɩdonɩ a phiir mer ma-n mɩa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ bɔdarara. A thɔ̃ mɛr ma-n mιa deara wɩ 'lɛ taarɛ, na wɩrɛraakɛ na-n yɛna' dɩ wa yɩ. A thɔ̃ mɛr ɩ̃ taa wɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ-n kpooronɩ,
a na mɩana Kɔ̃tɩnɩ bɔ jɩ yɛ.”
Agɩpɩ dɩ khaan sɛbɛ a bir ha thɔ̃daar sa too. Dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩle Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ bɩnɔɔle gaaraarɛ yire.
Dɩ a mar da-n mɩɩ wɩ: Nĩkɛ ga Thãgbaa sɛbɛ thɩmɩɩkɛ nɩ nɩɛnɩ daan pɩ.
Dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ n mɩιrɛ ɔɔda bɔ, dι dakha nʋɔ kpaa wɛr bɔ jɩ thɩmɩɩraakɛ n thɛnɩ ɔɔ nɔra, dɩ wa-n so: Ga do ɔr dʋɔn Jojɛfɩɩ bikuunaa?
Sɩ Jeju so warɛ: Gellakɛ na so marɛ sokpaakɛ anayɩ: Dɔtɔrɔ, kpɛɛnɛ afɩ khora dɩbara bɛɛ, gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ fɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ Kapɛrnayʋm dɩ sɩ nɩɛ, cʋɛ gɩ kɩɛr afɩ dʋɔ.
Dɩ a bire so war wo: Sobɔr mɩ so nar, wa-n bu Thãgbaa bobon bɩɛllakɛ ɔɔ dʋɔ bɔɔbɔa'.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar: Khikhɛra jɔɔjɔɔ kɔɔ hale Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩra Elɩɩ bɔɔ, ɔbɔɔkɛ thãgba kɔɔ kurni yɛna yẽther na pora maadõ, dɩ kɔmɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ ji dɩɩra fɛʋ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔlerakɛ Thãgba na kɔɔ thɔ̃ ɔɔ bobon Elɩ khikhɛraraale bɩɛllakɛ, saagado khikhɛr bɩɛlɩkɛ hanɩ Sarɛpɩta Sɩdɔ̃ dɩɩraa pa gaaga.
Dɩ dakha gbulo bərəəm kɔɔ hale Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩra Thãgbaa bobon Elijee bɔɔ, sι bɩɛl wɛrrarakɛ na kɔɔ kpɛɛ, saagado Naamãakɛ dɔnɩ Siridaar gaaga.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanι Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɔɔle nɩɛnɩ gelela, nĩkhii fʋlɛ wɛr.
Dɩ wɛr fɛʋ ɩɩr a tʋɔrʋʋ dɩ bɩnɔ thena, a jalna phaphapha a dana gɔ̃gɔ̃ horʋ wɩ dʋnaa ɓɛlɛnɔ, gɩdonɩ gɔ̃gɔ̃ yʋɔ awɩ dɩ ha.
Sɩ ɔr thɛthɛ dẽdẽdena a jal awɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn a thena.
Dɩ Jeju jaal Kapɛrnayʋm Galile dɩɩra, da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla hɩɩr wire.
Dɩ nʋɔ kpaa wɛr ɔɔ dɩɩrra gɩdonɩ ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ hananɛ fãga.
Dɩ le kũu bɩɛl kɔɔ ha Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, kɛ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl, dɩ a hulene dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ:
Ee, anye sɩ ha kha na fɛr Najarɛtɩ Jeju? Fɩ ɩnɛ fɩ kʋɛ sɩ yaa? Mɩ jɩrɛ ntɛ fɩ donɩ: Thãgbaa Tɩɩ phu fι do.
Sɩ Jeju manaanɛ ayɩ: Pɩra, sa thɛ kuunnaale. Mɔ̃kɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbuurə baanɩ thʋnɔ tibil jɔɔlee thɩ̃thιιn, a thιιraarɛ dιphã, sι aa cʋgʋʋ dιkharakɛ dιι puurə'.
Dι nʋɔ kpaa tιbιla fɛʋ dι wa-n mιι kha bιɛlbιɛl aa: Anyee thιmιι ca ha ʋrɛ? A-n mar kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔlasɔrarakɛ na fãga dι puno wi dι wa-n the.
Dι ɔɔ i kpaar dι khuirəəle fɛʋ.
Ɔbɔɔle Jeju thenι Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, a jaal a lõ Sιmɔ̃ɔ cɔ. Dι Sιmɔ̃ɔ khɛrι nι gι, a ji tomι kporre, dι wι phʋʋr Jeju dι wa-n pιɛ.
Dι Jeju pɔ gʋɛraa a phaan tomι kporre, dι tomι kporre ιιraa. Dι dapaara dι ιιr a tee wι kpakpaalɛ.
Wi lõ bɔɔ, wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hananι khodaraakɛ kho caar dιιdιι fʋnι, wι pɔna wɛr Jejura dι dɛ̃ɛ war fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl nyɛ̃ɛ, dι wι kpɛɛ.
Dι kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ dakha kɔɔ ther tιbιla bərəəmna, a hulẽ dι wa-n sona aa: Fɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun. Sι Jeju mana wɛr, aa-n tu wι mιa nʋɔa', gιdonι wι jιrɛ ɔr dʋɔn Kirisiti.
A dιι wιl Jeju ther jal khuirə, dι tibil jɔ mar dι wa-n ƴaalʋʋ. Ɔbɔɔkɛ wι yιιnι, wι-n yιrnaanɛ a na-n faa wa'.
Sι Jeju so warɛ: Gι teenanɛ ma-n mιι tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιιkɛ dɔnι Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda gɩ̃ dιsɔra dakha, gιdonι gɛrra Thãgba kɔɔ thɔ̃ mι.
Dι a hale Jude dιιra da-n mιι Thãgbaa thιmιι Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju hanι Jenejarɛtι mιιr nɔ nʋɔra, dι tibil jɔ kpa jιɛraa dι wa-n cɔ kha wι nιɛ Thãgbaa thιmιι,
a yɩrɛ mɩɩr nɔ nʋɔra gborõo yenyɔ, dɩ thʋ̃ phera gbuno wa-n cɔcɔɔ awɩ thʋ̃ pherdasɔ.
Dɩ a lʋʋn gborõ bɩɛllaakɛ dʋɔnnɩ Sɩmɔ̃ɔda, sa bɩɛlɛɛ ayɩ a tɔ gboroona, a hʋnɔnɛna thɩɩ gbe. Agɩpɩ dɩ too le gborõ bɩnɔ da-n dɩɩr tibil jɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a dɩɩr wɩnɩ pɩ, a sor Sɩmɔna: Tɔ jala yɔ hulõ paar, nɩ dʋna anɩ thʋ̃ pherda gɩ fʋ thʋma.
Dɩ Sɩmɔ̃ birsee: Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ kɔɔ dor thɔma na dɩtɩnɛ fɛʋ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka, sɩ sa kɔɔ fʋ thɩ̃a'. Sɩ gɩdonɩ fɛr sɔ, ma dʋnanɛ thʋ̃ pherdasɔra.
A wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋ mɛ̃, wɩ 'lɛr thʋma tə̃tə̃tə̃, dɩ awɩ thʋ̃ pherdasɔ na-n kuur.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ kher awɩ kuunsɔɔkɛ hanɩ gborõ kpɩɩra, wɩ pɔ a bulo ni. Dɩ wɩ pɔ a hi gborõo yenyɔɔle a tha thʋnɔ dɩ wa-n mʋʋ nyʋɔnɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Sɩmɔ̃ Pɩɛr yɩnɩ gele, a jire Jejuu ƴɛra sa sʋʋraa: Hʋnɔnɛna mɩ Kɔ̃tɩn, gɩdonɩ sopugodaar ha mɩ.
Gɩdonɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ kpagʋʋrɛ, ɔr nakha wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ kɔɔ hanaanɩ thʋmanaakɛ wɩ kɔɔ fʋnɩ.
Mɛ̃ gɩ kɔɔ ha dakha na Jakɩ, na Jã Jebedee bikuunsɔɔkɛ n buloni kha thɔma na Sɩmɔ̃. Sɩ dɩ Jeju so Sɩmɔna: Fa-n do maar n fʋ fa'. Nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã tɩbɩla fa-n ƴaal mar thʋ̃ khaa.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ dananɩ gborõo thɩɩ, wɩ faarɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ sɩ dɩ wa-n kpaaraa.
Mɔ̃kɛ Jeju kɔɔ hanɩ dɩ bɩɛlla, hɩnɛ kũu bɩɛl haleekɛ pala teenɩ tomɩr. Ɔbɔɔkɛ a yɩnɩ Jeju, a jire ɔɔ ƴɛra a sumo thɩɩra da-n phʋʋrʋʋ thakɛ ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, ado fɩ ture, fɩ punone cʋʋ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ gbuul pɩ.
Dɩ Jeju 'laa nyɔ̃ɔ a thaaraa sa so: Mɩ ture afɩ gbuul n pɛ. Dɩ dapaara gbuule pɩɩraa.
Agɩpɩ dɩ kpãkpaanaa a na-n so tibillə ga, sɩ a jala nɛna Thãgbaa bonɩ jidaar mɔ̃ a hanɩ, a 'laana phɔphʋɔl thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sonɩ, gɩ nɩna tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩ a kpɛɛrɛ.
Dι Jejuu i n kpaarɛ paar fɛʋ dɩ a-n pɛr, dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ bərəəm pʋɔraarɛ wɩ pɩɛ nũu, wɩ 'lɛna dakha kho kpɛɛrɛ.
Sɩ a sɩ warɛ sa the jal bəənnə a bɩɛl Thãgba.

Wi bɩɛl Jeju kɔɔ hale da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla. Dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaraakɛ thɛnɩ Galile dɩɩra, na Jude dɩɩra, na Jerujalɛm dɩɩra fɛʋ, kɔɔ hale a too. Dɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ fãga n cʋʋrɛ Jeju da-n kpɛɛ khodara.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, tɩbɩla kɔɔ gbaar kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ gbãgbarnɛnɩ na jɔ̃ a pɔna, dɩ wa-n ƴaal wɩ lonaa wɩ pɛ Jejuu ƴɛra.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ wa jɩnɩ ka wa lonaana', gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla jɔrɛ ka, wɩ jʋʋnaanɛ nãsʋrɔ a tona kaar na ɔɔ jɔ̃ Jejuu ƴɛra tɩbɩlaa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju yɩnɩ awι ha pɛ a sor: Ɩ̃ kuun, afɩ sopugosɔ hɛl farɛ.
Dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarasɔ mar dɩ wa-n so na awɩ bɩ̃ ayɩ: Amɛ ha ʋrɛ n kʋɛanɩ Thãgbaa i thakɛ? Amɛ n punone dɩ faa sopugosɔ saagado Thãgba gɩ dɩbara ga?
Dɩ Jeju jɩ mɔ̃ wɩ-n kpɩɛrnɩ awɩ bɩnɔ, a bule wi: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ nɩ hana kpɩɛr caakɛ anɩ bɩnɔ?
Gɩmɔ̃ yɔɔnɛ sorra: Afɩ sopugosɔ hɛl farɛ gɩ yaa, agɩbo: Ɩrɛ a jala gɩ?
Sɩ mɔ̃ na fʋnɩ sɩ na jɩ, dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun hananɛ hʋɛ thɩɩra dɩ ɩ̃ faana sopugosɔ, mɩ so farɛ gbãgbarʋ, ιrɛ gba afɩ jɔ̃ na kɔna.
Dɩ dapaara dɩ ɩɩr awɩ ƴɛra a gba jɔ̃ɔkɛ a-n kɔɔ phɩnɔnɩ, a dʋbɩna Thãgbaa i da-n kɔna.
Dɩ nʋɔ kpaa tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩ wa-n dʋbɩ Thãgbaa i, dɩ maar fʋlɛ wɩ dɩ wa-n sona: Sɩ yɩrɛ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛsɔ nĩ waa.
A gele pɩ, Jeju ther a yɩ war gbadaar bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Levɩ, dɩ too war gba paar da-n tee war. Dɩ Jeju sʋʋraa: Na kpa mar.
Dɩ Levɩ faa thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ sa ɩɩr da-n kpaaraa.
Dɩ Levɩ cʋʋraarɛ fɛtɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ ɔɔ cɔ. Dɩ war gbadara jɔɔjɔɔ kɔɔ hale na wɩ̃ tibilsɔ dɩko kho paarra na wɛr.
Dɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na-n hũhuun sa so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ nɩ kho na-n yɔna na war gbadara nakha sopugodara?
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Ga do tɩɩ khena n kɔɔ ƴaalɛ dɔtɔrɔa', sɩ wɩrɛ gɩ-n khonɩ gɩ.
Ga do fɩl sardara mɩ ɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴaala', sɩ sopugodara wɛ dɩ wa debi haar.
Dɩ tɩbɩlaale sʋʋraa ayɩ: Jãa kpãkpãadara n lire nʋɔ tɔ̃tɔ̃tɔ̃ dɩ wa-n bɩɛlna Thãgba jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaraa kpãkpãadarasɔɔ kha, sɩ dɩ afɩ too wer n kho dɩ wa-n yɔna.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Na punone na cʋʋ wɩrɛ wɩ wenɩ herra dɩ wa li nʋɔ, ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanɩ kha na khɛr he ya?
Sɩ wiresɔ na hale wa hɛl warnɩ khɛr he, dɩ dawisɔɔlera wa li nʋɔ dɩphã.
Dɩ a so warɛ sokpa bɩɛl wo: Tibil na ɓəər kẽkẽ phaa a bɛbɩna kẽkẽ tɩ̃a'. A a cʋʋ mɛ̃, ga dor a ɓəəre kẽkẽ phaale, sɩɩ do dakuruule a ɓəərni a bɛbɩna datɩ̃ɩ, ga ma kha ga.
Dɩ tibil na gba thʋʋrɩkɛ dɔnɩ daphaa na pɛr bʋla tɩɩna ga. A a cʋʋ mɛ̃, thʋ phaa na wɩɛlɛ bʋlaa sɩ na deer, gɩ do bʋlaale kʋɛrɛ mɛ̃.
Sɩ dɔ fɩ pɛ thʋ phaa bʋla phaara oti.
Tibilikɛ n dɛnɩ thʋ tɩ̃ɩ, a na ƴaal daphaa bã, gɩdonɩ a na sor nayɩ, thʋ tɩ̃ɩ n daanɔ.
Hɩɩr wi bɩɛl Jeju n kɔɔ kar a lõ jʋ lɩɛra. Dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara 'laa a kha jɔ a fɔfɔrɔ a kho.
Dɩ wɩ̃ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara bule wi: Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n cʋʋ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ yɩnɩ gɩ-n sãsɩrɛ hɩɩr wire?
Dɩ Jeju birse wi: Na kɔɔ yɩɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra gɩrɛɛkɛ Davɩdɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ kɔmɛr kɔɔ fʋʋnɩ ɔr na wɩrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ kha gaa?
Mee a kɔɔ lʋʋn Thãgba fʋɔr cʋɔrɔ a gba buruukɛ wι-n hanι Thãgba a kho, sa ha wιrɛɛkɛ a hananι kha, sιrakɛ Thãgbaa gbõdara teana dιbara wι khɔ gι.
Sι dι so war: Mɛr tibili Bikuun dor Kɔ̃tιn hιιr wirerarakɛ.
Hιιr wi bιɛl wo, Jeju lʋʋn Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra, a ma da-n dιιr tιbιla. Dι le a yι kũu bιɛlιkɛ ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔ nyɔ̃ khini.
Dι jɔfʋ dιιrdara na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara jʋʋr Jeju dι wa-n hιιn ado a na kpɛɛrɛ tibil khoo hιιr wire, gιdonι hʋɛ wι-n ƴaal wι pιɛraa sor.
Sι a jιrɛ mɔ̃ wι-n kpιɛrnι awι bιnɔ, a so kuunnaakɛ nyɔ̃ɔ khini ayι: Ɩrɛ jιlɛ kιɛr thɩ̃thιιn. Dι pal ιιr jιιl.
Dι Jeju so war: Mι-n bule ner, hιιr wire teana bɔ cʋʋrɛ yaa, puu cʋʋrɛ; agιbo fι taa tibil yaa, fι kʋʋ?
Sι a hιιn wɛr fɛʋ da-n finə sa bir so kuunnana: 'Laanɛ afι nyɔ̃; dι 'laa dιι do gι kpɛɛrɛ.
Dι nĩkhii fʋlɛ wι, dι wa-n gʋʋr kha awι ha mɔ̃ wa cʋʋnɩ Jejura.
Ɔbɔɔlera Jeju kɔɔ ther jal gɔ̃gʋɔna a bɩɛl Thãgba; dɩ a kɔɔ toore le a bɩɛl Thãgba dɩ dɩɩ wɩlna.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩι wιlnι, a wer ɔɔ kpãkpãadara a phiir yʋɔr yenyɔ. Wɛr a ha ire thɔ̃thɔna:
Sιmɔ̃ ɔr a dʋ ire Pιɛr, sι ɔɔ õkuun n dɔ Ãdire, Jakι. Jã, Filipi, Bartelemι,
Matiə, Tomasι, Jakι Alfee bikuun,
na Sιmɔ̃ɔkɛ dʋɔnnι gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ tibil, Juudi Jakιι bikuun, na Judasιιkɛ thɛnι Karιyɔtι, kɛ kɔɔ debanι do lĩlir.
Dι Jeju gbũ nakha wɛr a jιιl gɔ̃gɔ̃ ɓɛlɛ̃ paar, kãkɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara jɔɔ hanι, na tibil jɔjʋɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃əkɛ thɛnι. Jude dιιra fɛʋ na Jerujalɛm, nakha Tιιr na Sιdɔ̃ dι khuirə kɛ hanι lanyɔ̃ nʋɔra.
Wι pɔr wι pɛ Jeju nũu wι 'lɛna kho kpɛɛrɛ. Dι wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbii n hʋɔlɔnι kɔɔ kpɛɛrɛ dakha.
Dι tibil jɔɔle fɛʋ n ƴaalɛ wa-n thaaraa, gιdonι fãga n thιιraarɛ dι a-n kpɛɛ wι fɛʋ.
Dι Jeju gba da-n hιιn ɔɔ kpãkpãadara sa so war ayι: Gι da nɛr bɔdarara, gιdonι Thãgbaa fãgadaar do dor anιda.
Gι da nɛrɛraakɛ kɔmɛr n fʋnι nɛnɛ̃, gιdonι na hire phi. Gι da nɛrɛraakɛ n khιanι, gιdonι na 'lɛr daʋ.
Gι da nar ɔbɔɔkɛ tιbιla na laar nιnι, ɔbɔɔkɛ wa lee nιnι na faa kpιι, wa-n nιιrna nι, wa-n kpɔrɔna nι ire dιι ho thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ dɔnι kpɔ̃kpɔrɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ tibili Bikuuni sora.
Na-n hana daʋ ga wiraalera a na kãkanɛ, gιdonι khaarda kɔ̃tɩ̃ι hale Thãgbaa dʋɔ dι a-n pιɛr nι. Gιdonι thalera awι mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kɔɔ cʋʋ Thãgbaa bobonasɔra.
Sι ga puu narɛ nɛrɛɛkɛ dʋɔnnι lẽledara, gιdonι nι 'lɛr anι ha faa pι.
Ga puu narɛ nɛrɛɛkɛ n hienni, gιdonι kɔmɛr na fʋ nɛr. Ga puu narɛ nɛrɛɛkɛ n mananι nɛnɛ̃, gιdonι na har bιwɛra na yilẽbera.
Ga puu narɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ tιbιla fɛʋ n mιιnι anιda bɔ, gιdonι thale awι mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kɔɔ cʋʋ na wιrɛ kɔɔ dɔnι sõso bobonasɔ.
Sι mι so narɛ nɛrɛɛkɛ n pɛ mιnι nũu: Na-n na anι lãlaardara, na-n cʋɛ wιrɛ n laarɛ nιnι bɔɔ.
Na-n bɔna wιrɛɛkɛ n sɔna nιnι, na-n bιɛlnɛ Thãgba a na pɛ wιrɛraakɛ n hʋɔlɛ narnι.
A tibil ɓa fι gbʋa bιɛl, fe gbʋa kpιι a hanaa dakha. Dι a tibil gbaan afι darã, sιɛraa a gba afι kẽkẽ gburo dakha wo.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ n bιɛlnɛ farnι thɩ̃ɛ, hanaa, dι tibilikɛ gbaan fιnι thɩ̃ɛ, fa-n lʋʋra'.
Gιrɛɛkɛ nι-n ƴaalnι tιbιla na-n cʋɛ nar, na-n cʋɛ ɔmɛ̃ wɛrra dakha.
A na na wιrɛɛkɛ n naan nιnι, anye dɔ gιrɛ teronι a ha kpιι? Gιdonι sopugodara dakha wι-n nar wιrɛɛkɛ n naan wιnι.
Dι a na cʋʋ bɔɔ wɛkɛra n cʋɛ nɩnɩ bɔɔ, anye dɔ gɩrɛ teronɩ a ha kpɩɩ? Gɩdonɩ sopugodara dakha thalera wɩ-n cʋʋ.
Dɩ a wɩrɛɛkɛ nɩ-n pɛrnɩ haar wa yɩ gɛr na ha nɩ nɩ-n pemi thɩ̃ɛ, anye dɔ gɩrɛ teronɩ a ha kpɩɩ? Gɩdonɩ sopugodara dakha wɩ-n pemine kha awɩ ha, sɩ wa-n kpɩɛrna mɔ̃ wa birni na 'lɛ oti.

Sɩ na-n na anɩ lãlaardara, na-n cʋɛ bɔɔ, na-n pema tɩbɩla sɩ na-n kpɩɛr nɩ birə 'lɛrɔ dɩkha ga. Dɩ mɛ̃ na 'lɛ khaarda kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, dɩ na dor dakha Kəkəədaarɩ bɩsãsɔ, gɩdonι a bɔrɛ tɩɩ kʋɛara na tɩɩ puusɔra.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ dɔ bɔ jɩ tɩbɩla, mɔ̃ anɩ Thɩ donɩ bɔ jɩdaar.

Na-n fi do kɩɩldara ga, dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba na do nar Kɩɩldaara'. Na-n heen tibil sora', dɩ mɛ̃ na 'lɛ so heene dakha ga. Na-n faa tɩbɩlaa dɩ pa a na hana wɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba na faa anɩ dɩ pa a na ha nɩ dakha.

Na-n 'laanɛ, dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba na 'laa a na ha nɩ dakha. Ga dor mɩɛda bʋɔɔkɛ wa ɩɩnɩ a na yɛyɛɛ gɩ hi ga-n jal wɩ ha nɩ. Gɩdonɩ mɩɛda ca ʋrɛɛkɛ nɩ-n kɔɔ mɩɛnanɩ thɩ̃ɛ, ɔrra Thãgba na mɩɛna a na ha nɩ oti.
Dɩ Jeju so warɛ sokpaa wo ayɩ: Yaarʋ na punone na thɔɔ yaarʋ ya? Mee wɛr yenyɔ fɛʋ na jiire kõkorro.
Kpãkpãadaar na hale a na kɔ̃tɩ̃ na jɔ ʋrɛ n dιrɛɛna', sι ɔbɔɔkɛ a na dιιrnι na pι, a na har mɔ̃kɛ ʋrɛ dιrɛɛnι hanι.
Mɔ̃gιdo dι fι ka gar yire hɔ̃ phɩɩnaakɛ hanɩ afɩ omii yiro, sɩ fa-n ka dɩ fɩ hɩɩn kparrɛɛkɛ hanɩ afɩ thɛthɛɛ yiroə?

Dɩ mɔ̃ fa fʋ sɩ na so afɩ omina nayɩ: Ɩ̃ omi, jɩlɛ ɩ̃ ti hɔ̃ phɩ̃ɩkɛ ha fɩnɩ yiro, fɛrɛɛkɛ na yɛnɩ kparrɛɛkɛ hanɩ afɩ yiroə? Fɛr bɩnɛ yenyɔdaar, te kparrɛɛkɛ hanɩ afɩ yiro ɓo, le fa jɩɩ yɩ hɔ̃ phɩ̃ɩkɛ hanɩ afɩ omii yiro a na ti.
Thɩr bʋɔ na puno na se bi puə'. Dɩ thɩrʋʋkɛ na bʋɔnɔna' na puno na se bi bʋɔ dakha ga.
Gɩdonɩ be wɩ-n jɩna thɩra fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl. Sobɔr gɩ, wa-n yɛɛ bara usɩɛra ga, dɩ wa-n khʋ̃ ɓãɓar be paabɩrʋra dakha ga.
Tɩɩ bʋɔ n tire dabʋɔɔkɛ hanɩ ɔɔ hara dɩ thena, sɩ tɩɩ puu n tire dapuukɛ hanɩ ɔɔ hara dɩ thena. Gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ n henɩ haarra, gɛr n thɛ nɔɔ.
Mɔ̃gιdo dι na-n we mι Kɔ̃tιn, Kɔ̃tιn, sι na-n cʋʋ gιrɛ mι-n so narna'.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ ιna marnι da-n nιɛ ɩ̃ thιmɩɩ dɩ gbuuro yʋʋ da-n cʋʋ, ma nι narɛ ntɛɛkɛ a honι.
A hʋrɛ tibilikɛ n mɛnɩ cʋɔr, a kpe koru dιι hulono dɩ kpɛɛrɔ go kʋʋ boka nã thɛrɛɛra. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ nyʋɔn phanɩ, dɩ poo be dɩ a-n cɩr cʋɔrɩle, sɩ ga puno cʋʋ thɩ̃a', gɩdonɩ kuunile mɩɩrɛ dɩɩ bɔr.
Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n nɩɛnɛnɩ sɩ aa-n cʋa', a hʋrɛ tibilikɛ thɛnɩ cʋɔr thɩ bʋraara, sɩ aa kpe koru a kpɛɛrɔ go kʋa'. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ poo benɩ dɩ a-n cɩr cʋɔrɩle, dɩɩ do dapaara gɩ derre, dɩ cʋɔrɩle jire ji puure.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ ɔɔ thɩmɩɩsɔɔkɛ fɛʋ tɩbɩlalaakɛ n pɩɛnɩ nũu dɩɩ pɩ, a jaal Kapɛrnayʋm.
Dɩ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl gɩ, a kɔɔ hale dɩ ga-n kho ɔɔ thɔ̃daar bɩɛlɩkɛ a-n nanɩ dɩɩ ka, dɩ dã khir.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩle nɩɛnɩ Jejuuda, a thʋɔnaanɛ wɩ̃ Juifi kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, wɩ jala a bɩɛlnɛɛ a pɔ a kpɛɛnɛ ɩnɩ thɔ̃daar.
Dɩ wɩ pɔ dã Jeju a phʋʋrʋʋ dɩ wa-n gbɛ̃gbɛrɛna thakɛ ayɩ: Kuunikɛ teenanɛ fɩ cʋʋraa gele.
Gɩdonɩ a-n nar asɩ ca, dɩ ɔr gɩɩkɛ kɔɔ mɛnɩ asɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ.
Dɩ Jeju jal nakha wɛr. Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ a-n wɔrɔnɩ cʋɔr, sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩle thʋɔn ɔɔ kuunsɔ wɩ sʋɔraa ayɛ: Kɔ̃tɩn, fa-n thʋ̃ vɔɔ mã', gɩdonɩ ma teena dɩ fa lõ ɩ̃ cɔa'.
Gelela dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ma kɔɔ teena ɩ̃ pɔ dɩbara afɩ pa ga; sɩ sɔ thɩmɩɩ bi bɩɛl dɩbara, ɩ̃ thɔ̃daar na kpɛɛrɛ.
Gɩdonɩ mɛrɛɛkɛ, mɩ hananɛ ɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔkɛ jɔ mɩnɩ, dɩ mɩ hananɛ dakha sɔrasɛsɔɔkɛ mɩ jɔnɩ. A mɩ so bɩɛlla: Jala, dɩ jal. A mɩ so bɩɛlla wo ayɩ, a ɩna, dɩ ɩ̃. A mɩ so ɩ̃ thɔ̃daarra: Cʋɛ gɩrɛ, dɩ cʋʋ.

Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ ga thɩmɩɩle, nʋɔ kɔɔ kpagʋʋrɛ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩdaraale. Dɩ Jeju kɩɩl a so tibil jɔraale n kpaaraanɩ ayɩ: Mɩ so narɛ Ɩjɩrayɛl dɩɩrarakɛ ma kɔɔ yɩ tibil dɩ hana ha pɛrɛ thaka'.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ thɔ̃thɔnaale kɔɔ kɛrnɩ na bir cʋɔrɔ, wɩ yɩrɛ thɔ̃daarɩle dɩ hana tomɩ kheu.
Agɩpɩ Jeju jaal dɩ bɩɛllaakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Naɩn, dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara na tibil jɔ kɔɔ cʋrrɛ kha dɩ wa-n jal.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju n wɔrɔnɩ dɩ lõfonʋɔ, hɩnɛ wɩ gbaar khire dɩ wa-n jalna dʋ paar. Khikhɛr bɩɛlɩ bi bɩɛlla gɩ 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ dɩ hana, dɩ dɩdara jɔɔ kɔɔ har kha na khikhɛrʋʋle.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Kɔ̃tιn yιιnι, bʋɔ fʋʋrɛ dι sʋʋraa: Fa-n khιa'.
Agιpι dι tɔ pɔ a thar khi gbadaara. Dι wιrɛ gbaannι khire jιιl. Dι Jeju so khireraale ayι: Daɓolbir mι so farɛ, ιrɛ.
Dι khire pal ιιr a too a ma da-n mιι thιmιa. Dι Jeju kpaa a ha ɔɔ nι.
Dι maar fʋlɛ tιbιla fɛʋ, dι wa-n dʋbι Thãgbaa i dι wa-n sona: Thãgbaa bobon kɔ̃tɩ̃ bιɛl ιrɛ asι thɩ̃thιιn. Dι Thãgba ιnɛ dakha a kher ɔɔ too.
Dι thιmιιrιle cʋʋrɛ Jejuuda dιι kpaar paar fɛʋ Judera na dι khuirə fɛʋ.
Jã kɔɔ nιɛrɛ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔlera fɛʋ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara mιgʋʋnι, dι a wer ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara yenyɔ,
a thɔ̃ wι Kɔ̃tιnna wι bulenee ayɛ: Fɛr dʋɔn ʋrɛɛkɛ na ιnanι yaa, agιbo dɔ sa-n pιɛr tιι kpιι?
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ tιbιlaale danι Jejuu pa, wι sʋʋraarɛ: Jã Batιsιtι thɔna sι sι bulene fi ayɛ: Fɛr dʋɔn ʋrɛɛkɛ na ιnanι yaa, agιbo dɔ sa-n pιɛr tιι kpιι?
Ga bɔraalera Jeju kpɛɛrɛ khodara jɔɔ na wιrɛɛkɛ hananι taansɔ, a weena dakha kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔla, a khɛrna yarasɔ jɔɔjɔɔ yinə.

Dι Jeju birse wi: Nι kɛra birə a sɔ Janana gιrɛɛkɛ nι yιnι, na gιrɛɛkɛ nι nιɛnι: Yarasɔ n yιrɛ, nɛ kʋɛdara n sar bɔɔbɔɔ, gbulosɔɔ gbuul pιrɛ, dι nʋrasɔ khɛrrɛ, dι khesɔ n ιιrɛ dι wι the khirera, dι bɔdara nιɛrɛ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι.
Sι gι da ʋrɛraakɛ ma doronι nɛ baradaa ga.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wιrɛ Jã thɔnι kɔnι pι, Jeju mar da-n mιι tibil jɔɔle Jãadara: Anye nι kɔɔ jal a hιιn bəənnə? Poo balãsιιkɛ n khəəfəneni gι ya?
Dι anye nι kɔɔ jal yι? Kuunikɛ n tɔnι kẽkẽ ɓʋ̃ɔ gι ya? Nι hιnɛ wιrɛɛkɛ n tʋɔnnι kẽkẽ ɓɔna dι wa-n khona dιko bʋɔ, fãgadaraa cɔ wι-n ha.
Dι anye nι kɔɔ jal yι? Thãgbaa bobon gι ya? Mι so narɛ, sobɔr gι, bιɛlιkɛ jɔnι Thãgbaa bobon gι.
Jã dʋɔn ʋrɛɛkɛ wι kɔɔ khereronι Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Hιnɛ, mɛr Thãgba thɔna ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃, dι na kʋʋl fι ƴιɛ, a gbɛbιrι fι hʋɛ afι ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ.”
Dι mι so narɛ, wιrɛ fɛʋraakɛ khɛra n kɔnιι thɩ̃thιιn, bιɛl na hale a kɔ̃tɩ̃ jɔ Jã ga. Dι ʋrɛ kanι do dabuu fιιʋ Thãgba fãgadaarι dιra, a kɔ̃tιnɛ a jɔ Jã.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ tιbιla fɛʋ na war gbadara nιɛnι Jãa nɔ, wι jιrɛ dι Thãgba sarrɛ, a tu dι Jã kɔɔ kpɛɛ wι nyʋɔnɔ.
Sι jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ wer kɔɔ cʋʋrɛ gɩrɛ Thãgba n ƴaal warnɩ dɩɩ debi a do mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ wɛrra, mɔ̃kɛ wɩ bonɩ Jãa yɔ kpɛɛ.
Ana ma cʋna nĩdaraakɛ dɩphã, dɩ ana wɩ hona ya fɛ?
Wɩ hʋrɛ bɩsanasɔɔkɛ n tɔɔnɩ ƴatɔɔ, dɩ wa-n we kha bɩɛlbɩɛl dɩ wa-n so: Sɩ kɔɔ ʋnɛ bɩɩl nɛrɛra, sɩ na kɔɔ sa ga. Sɩ kɔɔ khɩɩrɛ nɛrɛra, sɩ na kɔɔ dea'.
Gɩdonɩ Jã Batɩsɩtɩ kɔɔ ɩnɛ, aa-n kho dɩkora', aa-n yɔ taan dakha ga, dɩ nɩ so: Kɔ̃tɛɛbuu hanaanɛ.
Dɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun ɩ̃ wo, a thɩ̃ɛ mɩ-n kho, a thɩ̃ɛ mɩ-n yɔ dɩ nɩ so: Hɩnɛ, kũu kɛ̃kɛbɩ gɩ a dona ta yɔn, war gbadara na sopugodaraa kuun gɩ.
Sɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n tuonni Thãgbaa kpɛsɛ n nɩnanɛ dɩ sobɔr har kpɛsɛrɛɛlee pa.
Jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaar bɩɛl gɩ, a we Jeju a pɔ ɩnɩ-n kho kha dɩkor. Dɩ Jeju lõ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaarɩlee cɔra, a too dɩko kho paar.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, khɛ sopugodaar bɩɛl gɩ, a kɔɔ hale dɩ bɩnɔ. Ɔbɔɔkɛ a nɩɛnɩ dɩ Jeju hale jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaarɩ cɔ da-n kho dɩkor, a pɔnanɛ latɩkolo na laaso ja bʋlabir;
a gulẽgana Jejuu nɛ khʋra da-n khɩɩna, sa ma da-n huro Jejuu nɛ na yilẽbe. Agɩpɩ dɩ pɩɩn na ɔɔ yʋsũ sa pal Jejura nɛɛ, da-n thir latιkolola.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaarιle kɔɔ wɛnι Jeju yιɛnι, a sor ɔɔbara ayι: Ado Thãgbaa bobon kuunikɛ do, a na jιrɛ khɛrιkɛ n thaaraanι, ntɛ a donι na mɔ̃kɛ a hanɩ: Khɛr sopugodaar gɩ.
Dɩ Jeju so: Sɩmɔ̃, mɩ hananɛ thɩ̃ɛ a na so far. Dɩ birsee: Dɩɩrdaar, mɩa.
Dɩ Jeju so: Tibil bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n kɔɔ peminoni war kɔɔ hale, dɩ tɩbɩla hanaa helu. Cacadaarɩda daan wire taamɔɩ thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ war; sɩ balanyɔdaarɩda dã wire kpalanyɔ yʋɔr thɔ̃ lɩmɩnɛɛ war.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ wa-n yɩɛnɩ a na lɩmʋa', a faarɛ a ha wɩ fɛʋ yenyɔra. Ʋmɔ̃ wɛr yenyɔraale na naanɛɛ a na jɔ?
Dɩ Sɩmɔ̃ birsee: Mɩ pɛrɛ haar ʋrɛɛkɛɛ hel jʋɔnɔnɩ gɩ. Dɩ Jeju birsee: Sobɔr fɩ so.
Agɩpɩ dɩ kɩɩl da-n hɩɩn khɛrɩle sa bule Sɩmɔ̃: Fɩ yɩrɛ khɛrɩkɛɛ? Afɩ cɔ mɩ lõ sɩ fa kɔɔ ha mɩ nyʋɔn ɩ̃ cɔcɔɔnɛ nɛa', sɩ khɛrɩkɛ hurone mi nɛɛ na ɔɔ yilẽbi sa bir a pɩɩnna ɔɔ yʋsũ.
Fa kɔɔ pal mɩ a fʋɔr ma', sɩ khɛrɩkɛ a fʋna bɔɔkɛ mι lonι a dana nɛnɛ̃kɛ, aa sιrɔrakɛ kpιι ɩ̃ nɛ pala'.
Fa kɔɔ bʋl mι niin yʋʋra ga, sɩ khɛrɩkɛ a kɔɔ bʋl mɛr latιkolo nɛɛ.
Gɛr gι mι so farɛ, Thãgba faarɛ ɔɔ sopugookɛ kɔɔ jʋɔnɔnιnakɛ a haa, gιdonι khɛrιkɛɛ naʋ jɔrɛ; dι ʋrɛɛkɛ Thãgba faanι sopugo gbe a ha, gbera ɔɔ naʋ n ha dakha.
Dι Jeju so khɛrraale: Thãgba faarɛ afι sopugosɔ a ha fι.
Dι wιrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ hananι kha dιko kho paar mar dι wa-n so awιbarara aa: Amɛ ha ʋrɛ dι ba faarakɛ sopugosɔ ya fɛ?
Sι Jeju so khɛrraale: Afι ha pɛ taa fι, kɔna na ha ɩɩ.
Agɩpɩ Jeju kɔɔ jaal da-n kpaar dɩ kɔ̃tɩnana na dɩ biisɔra, da-n dɩɩr tɩbɩla da-n mɩɩna tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda.
Dɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ kɔɔ har kha na ɔr, na wɩ̃ khɛrsɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ weeronɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔlasɔ a faa a kpɛɛna khoosɔ. Marɩɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Magɩdala, kɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbii makonyɔ kɔɔ thɩɩrɔnɩ gɩ,
na Janɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ Kuja, Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ thɔ̃daraa hɩɩndaarɩ khɛr, na Sujan, na wɩ̃ khɛrsɔ bərəəmkɛ n kɔɔ buloni Jeju na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara na awɩ thɩ̃sɔ.
Tɩbɩlaakɛ thɛnɩ dɩɩsɔra fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl pɔr Jejura. Mɔ̃ tibil jɔjʋɔɔle kpanɩ kha a jɛ, a so warɛ sokpaakɛ ayɩ:
Bi jaldaar gɩ, a the da-n jal be. Dɩ mɔna a-n jalnɩ yɛ̃ bi jire hʋɛra, dɩ tɩbɩla saar na nɛɛ, dɩ 'lominə pɔ uul.
Yɛ̃ bi ji gbãgbã nã thɛrɛɛra. Ɔbɔɔkɛ gɩ phuni pɩ, gɩ khire gɩdonɩ ga-n yɩ thɩ mɩ̃a'.
Yɛ ji wo uu thɩ̃thɩɩn a gbɛbɩna uusɔ, a phu dɩ uu sɩlã gɩ.
Yɛ ji thɩ bʋɔra. Ɔbɔɔkɛ gɩ phuni pɩ, gɩ ɩnɛ a bɩ̃ dɩ a-n kakɛ tamaa. Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju sonɩ thale pɩ, a hulene ayɩ: Ntɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu dɩ nɩna, dɔ a na-n pɛ nũu.
Dɩ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara bulee sokpaalee kɩrra.
Dɩ birse wi ayɩ: Nɛr Thãgba kɔɔ ha nɩ jɛ thɩ̃ gbulikɛ dʋɔnnɩ ɔɔ fãgadaar doda. Sɩ ʋkhasɔ sokpaa wɩ-n sona war, dɩ mɛ̃ “wa-n hɩɩn sɩ wa yɩ ga, wa-n nɩɛ dakha sɩ wa jɩ kɩrʋa'.”
Sokpaakɛɛ kιrra ha gιrɛ: Thãgbaa so dʋɔn be.
Wιrɛ hɔnι hʋ nʋɔ wɛr dɔ wιrɛ na-n nιɛnɛnι, agιpι Satã n pɔ dι ti sorιle awι hara, gι do nɔɔ wa pɛr haar wι 'lɛna dakha taara'.

Wιrɛ hɔnι gbãgbã nã thɛrɛɛ wɛr dɔ wιrɛ na-n nιɛnɛnι Thãgbaa so, dι wι tu na daʋ, sι wa-n sιrɔ Thãgbaa so dιι yι nɛ gɔ paara', dιι do bɔɔ gbe wι pɛr haar dιbara. Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ fifiləle n dã wιnι, wι-n kɛrnanɛ khiru.
Sι gιrɛɛkɛ jenι u ballɔ hʋɔn wιrɛɛkɛ n nιɛnɛnι Thãgbaa so, sι mɔ̃ wι-n ιιrnι hʋɛrara, dɛr na ler, na gιrɛ n danι tibil haar n sιlã wɛr, dι wa-n se beekɛ leana'.
Sι gιrɛ jenι thι bʋɔra hʋɔn wιrɛɛkɛ na-n nιɛnɛnι Thãgbaa so dι wι fʋ gι na bɩ̃ bʋɔ, na fιl telẽe a na se be na yιrrɛ.
Tibil na pɛr dɔɔ lãphana sι agιpι a gba a suuro bιlãkpʋʋnna, agιbo a to kakala ballɔa', sι bilela a na dɛ̃ɛ wιrɛ n lonanι n yι dahιrɛ.
Gιdonι thɩ̃ɛ na hale na ker sι ga do wι cʋʋrɛ dιι thaa ga, dι thɩ̃ɛ na hale na ha gbul sιι do wa jι gaaga, gι do dakha wo ga yιraa ga.
Na-n jιɛ dʋ bʋrɛ mɔ̃kɛ nι-n nιɛnι, gιdonι ʋrɛɛkɛ hananι thɩ̃ɛ, Thãgba na bire na haa na dɛbιrɔ; sι ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananι thɩ̃a', Thãgba na tiirəərerakɛ phubi gιrɛɛkɛ a-n kpιɛrnι ιnι hananɛ.
Dι Jejuu õkũu bιnɔsɔ na ɔɔ nι kɔɔ pʋɔraarɛ, sι wa puno a na dãa ga gιdonι tιbιla jɔrɛ.
Dι wι sʋʋraa aa: Afɩ nɩ na afɩ õkũu bɩnɔsɔ hale phiilo dɩ wa-n ƴaal wɩ yɩ fɩ.
Dɩ birse wi: Ɩ̃̃̃ nɩ na ɩ̃ õkona dɔ wɩrɛɛkɛ n pɛnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ nũu, dɩ wɩ yɩr dɩ wa-n cʋʋ.
Wi bɩɛl Jeju kɔɔ lʋʋn gboroona na ɔɔ kpãkpãadara, sa so war ayɩ: Nɩ dɔ sɩ iir iiro; dɩ wɩ jaal.
Mɔ̃kɛ wɩ hanɩ phɛllɔ Jeju daarɛ. Dɩ dapaara jɛkhure ɩɩrɛ na fãga mɩɩr nɔɔra, dɩ nyʋɔn ma dɩ ga-n hi gborõo, dι thɩ̃ɛ na-n bɔ war bã.
Dι wι tɔ dã a jaa Jeju a sʋʋraa: Dιιrdaar, dɩɩrdaar, sι-n buure. Dι mɛ̃ a jaa a mana jιɛ na nyʋɔnιkɛ n uboni dιι pιr, dι thɩ̃ɛ na-n tutugo bã.
Sι agιpι dι bule wi: Kana anι ha pɛ ha? Sι maar kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr dι nʋɔ kɔɔ kpaa wι, dι wa-n bule khasɔ bιɛlbιɛl aa: Anyee tibil ca ha ʋrɛ, dι punonakɛ jιɛ na mιιr nɔ nyʋɔnnakɛ dι ga-n nιι nũu?
Dɩ wι kɔɔ daan dιιkɛ dɔnι Jerajedaraa dʋɔ, kɛ hanι ka Galile dιι pɛnι ƴιɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju gbuni thιιra, dʋɔdaar bιɛlιkɛ hananι kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ caanʋʋnɛ. Gι kɔɔ maanɛ kɛkɛkɛ aa-n kɔɔ tonι kɩ̃kιɩna', aa-n cɔ cʋɔrɔa', sι khi dʋ paarsɔ a-n cɔ.
Mɔna a yɩnɩ Jeju, a hulene a jinə ɔɔ ƴɛra sa phã nɔ khɩɩr ayɩ: Anye mɩ ha kha na fɛr Jeju, Thãgba Kəkəədaarɩ Bikuun? Mɩ-n phʋʋr fɛr fa-n hʋɔl mara'.

Gɩdonɩ Jeju kɔɔ sʋʋraarɛ: A fɩ jɩ thɛ. Kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔlɩle kɔɔ mãa hana kuunikɛ kɛkɛkɛ, dɩ wɩ linəə jɔrkɔ a baranaa nɛɛ na ther a na bɛr, sɩrakɛ a-n khaarɛ lidaale sɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbuule n halʋʋ dɩ jalna bəənnəsɔ.
Dι Jeju bulee: Mɔ̃ afι i n do? Dι birsee: Dajɔ gι. Gιdonι kɔ̃tɛɛbi jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ lonanaa.
Dι wι-n phʋʋrɛ Jeju a na-n wee nι a faa kõkorʋra ga.
Sι dabulo sιthɔsɔ kɔɔ hale jɔɔ gɔ̃gʋɔna dι wa-n khʋʋl. Dι kɔ̃tɛɛbiirə phʋʋr Jeju a ha nɩ hʋɛ ɩnɩ-n lõ sɩthɔsɔraale bɩnɔ, dɩ ha wɩ hʋɛ.
Dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ thɩɩr kuunnaale a jal a lõ sɩthɔsɔraale bɩnɔ a tinə wi le gɔ̃gɔ̃ horo, dɩ wɩ caalɛ a jiir mɩɩr nɔɔra a khiir.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩrɛ n khɛ wɩnɩ yɩnɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ dananɩ, wɩ kɔɔ car kɔ̃ a mɩɩ dɩɩra na kõgosora mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛɛle hanɩ.
Dɩ tɩbɩla the jal hɩɩn gɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ dananɩ; dɩ wɩ pɔr Jejura, a yɩ kuunile kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ kɔɔ thɩɩrɔnɩ dɩ too Jejuu kal ƴɔɔ, a to kɩ̃kɩɩn a hanana dakha yʋ bʋɔ. Dɩ maar fʋlɛ wɩ fɛʋ.
Dɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ yɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛɛle cʋɛnɩ mɩɩ wɛr mɔ̃kɛ Jeju taanɩ kuunile kɔɔ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbii.
Dɩ Jerajedara fɛʋ kɔɔ bɩɛlɛ Jeju a thɛ awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn sa faa wɩ, gɩdonɩ maar kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr dɩɩ ka.
Dɩ Jeju lõ gborõo a bir da-n kɔ̃. Dɩ kuunilera kɔ̃tɛɛbii kɔɔ thɩɩrɔnɩ phʋʋrʋʋ a dɔ ɩnɩ-n do ɔɔ totoo. Sɩ Jeju bor sa sʋʋraa:
Birə kɔna afɩ cɔ a mɩa thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ cʋʋ farnɩ. Dɩ mɛ̃ a jal a mɩɩ paar fɛʋ dɩɩraale gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Jeju kɔɔ cʋʋraanɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju kɔɔ kɛrnɩ bir, tɩbɩla fɛʋ teguure, gɩdonɩ wɩ-n kɔɔ pɩɛrʋʋrɛ fɛʋ.
Sɩ hɩnɛ, kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jaɩrʋsɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tιn Juifisɔɔ Thagba fʋɔr cɔra pɔr, a ji Jejuu ƴɛ thɩ̃thιɩn da-n phʋʋrʋʋ a pɔ ιnι cɔ.
Gιdonι a hananɛ khebi bιɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ dι thɔɔ yɛna yʋɔr yenyɔ, kɛ n khenι. Dι mɔ̃ Jeju hanι jaal, tibil jɔɔle thʋnɛ gbʋɔrʋʋ ka.
Dι khɛ bιɛl gι, a hale a hana tɩ̃ι a cʋʋna yɛna yʋɔr yenyɔ, dι a kɔɔ kʋɛrɛ thιdarara ɔɔ thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ a hananι fɛʋ, sι tibil bιɛllakɛ na kɔɔ puno a kpɛsɛa'.
Dι a tɔr pɔ Jejuu khiro a thaaraa kẽkẽ nʋɔra; dι dapaara ɔɔ tɔmɩ̃ theele kur.
Dι Jeju bule aa: Amɛ thaan mar? Mɔ̃kɛ tιbιla fɛʋ n bananι Pιɛr sʋʋraarɛ: Dιιrdaar, tibil jɔ wer hi far thaa dι wa-n cʋɔr fι, sι dι fa-n bule amɛ thaan farι?
Dι Jeju birse: Tibil tha marɛ, gιdonι mι jιrɛ fãga kɔɔ the marɛ gbe.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ khɛrιlera yιɛnι dιι do Jeju jιnaanɛ, a pɔr na jẽu a ji Jejuu ƴɛra, a so tιbιla fɛʋʋ ƴɛ thɩ̃thιιn mɔ̃ dɔnι kιrʋ dι ιnι kɔɔ thaaraa na mɔ̃kɛ ιnι kɔɔ kpɛɛnι dapaara khə̃khə̃.
Dι Jeju sʋʋraa: Ɩ̃ bikhɛr, afι ha pɛ taa fι, kɔna na ha ιι.
Mɔ̃ a hanι mιιrɔ, tibil bιɛl ther Jaιrʋsι kɔ̃tιnι cɔ, a pɔ so Jaιrʋsιra aa: Afι bikhɛr khire. Fa-n vɔɔ Dιιrdaar bã.
Sι mɔ̃ Jeju kɔɔ nιɛnι gele, a sor Jaιrʋsιra: Fa-n do haar n ubi fa', sι pιɛr haar dιbara dι a na ler.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ danι cʋɔr aa tu tibil n lona kha na ɔr, saagado Pιɛr na Jakι na bιsaanιlee thι na ɔɔ nι gaaga.
Tιbιla fɛʋ n khιιrɛ dι wa-n bιna. Dι Jeju so: Na-n khιa' aa khə', sι a-n daarɛ.
Sι wι-n maanʋʋnɛ gɩdonɩ wɩ jɩrɛ a khire.
Sɩ dɩ fʋʋ nƴɔ̃ɔ sa so nɔ khɩɩr: Bɩsaan, pala ɩrɛ.
Dɩ ɔɔ fesu kɛr birəə, dɩ pal dapaara a ɩɩr. Dɩ Jeju so war aa, dɔ wɩ haa dɩkor a kho.
Dɩ nʋɔ kpaa khebiri thɩ na nɩrɛ, sɩ Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ wa-n so tibillə gɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ danana'.
Dɩ Jeju wer yʋɔr yenyɔ a ha wɩ fãga na punone kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔra fɛʋ, wa-n kpɛɛna khodara dakha.
A thɔ̃ wɛr wɩ jala a na mɩa Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda a na kpɛɛna khodara.
Sɩ a so warɛ: Na-n gba thɩ̃ɛ fʋrɔ jalna kpaar paar, dɩ gbʋʋl gɩ, dɩ kpakpaar lokaar gɩ, dɩ buru gɩ, dɩ war ga. Na-n fʋrɔ dakha kẽkena yenyɔa'.
Dɩ cʋɔr wo cʋɔrɩkɛ na lonɩ, nɩ tɔɔ le a kɔnana.
Sɩ ado pa dɔɔkɛ wa tee nɩna', a na the le dɩ dɔɔraale, nɩ kpɛɛnɛ thɩlãkobeekɛ ma nιnι nɛɛ a faa war gι nιna wι thιmιιr.
Dɩ kpãkpãadara jaal dɩ wa-n kpaar dɩɩra dɩɩra, dɩ wa-n mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ, dɩ wa-n kpɛɛna khodara paar fɛʋ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩ fãgadaar buu kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ dɩ wa-n mɩɩ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ fɛʋ n cʋɛnɩ, ɔɔ kpɩɛr nyanyaanɛ fɛʋ, gɩdonɩ wɩ̃ tibil n sor ayɩ: Jã Batɩsɩtɩ gɩ, ɔr ɩrɛ the khirera.
Ɩkhasɔ n yɩ wo: Elɩ gɩ, a nɩna ɔɔbara. Wɛ n yɩ: Mama Thãgbaa bobon bɩɛl ɩrɛ a the khirera.
Dɩ Ɛrɔɔdɩ sor: Mee mɩ kɔɔ kʋrɛ Jã a kur yʋʋ, sɩ amɛ ha ʋrɛ mɩ-n nɩɛrɔnɩ ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ? Dɩ mɛ̃ a ƴaal ɩnɩ-n yɩɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ thɔ̃thɔna kɛrnɩ bir, wɩ mɩɩrɛ Jeju gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnι. Dι kpa wι kana pa kpιι Bɛcaιda dι khʋra.
Sι ɔbɔɔkɛ tibil jɔɔle nιɛnι wι kpaanɛ. Dι Jeju tee wer a mιι wι Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda, a kpɛɛna dakha wιrɛɛkɛ n ƴaalɛnι kho kpɛɛrɛ.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ dιι n dʋɔrnι, yʋɔr yenyɔɔle pɔr a sʋʋraa aa: Bɩlanɛ tibil jɔɔkɛ wι jal dι biisɔra na kõgosoraakɛ wɔrɔnɛnι, wɩ cɔ wɩ ƴaalna dakha dɩkɔ wɩ kho, gɩdonɩ kɩɛrɩkɛ sɩ hanɩ bəənnə gɩ.
Dɩ Jeju so war: Nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ n hana wɩ dɩkɔ wɩ kho; sɩ dɩ wɩ birsee: Buru yemɔɩ dɩbara sɩ hana na thʋma yenyɔ, agado sɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ jala a the dɩkɔ a ha tɩbɩla fɛʋʋka'.
Sɩ tɩbɩlaale kɔɔ thɔɔrɛ gbɩlanɩ yemɔɩsɔ. Dɩ Jeju so ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara: Nɩ cʋɛ wɩ wɩ der der paar kpalanyɔ yʋɔr yʋɔr.
Dɩ wɩ cʋʋ oti a cʋʋ wɩ fɛʋ dɩ wɩ der.
Dɩ Jeju gba buru yemɔɩɩle na thʋma yenyɔɔle, a gba ƴɩɛ ƴũ a bɩɛl Thãgba a pɛr, sa kuur buru a ha kpãkpãadara wɩ gba tɩnɛnɛ tibil jɔɔlera.
Dɩ wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ khor a hi phi; dɩ wɩ kɔɔ gbaar dakuruukɛ wɩ tɩnɛnɩ sa sɩ dɩɩ hi kpona yʋɔr yenyɔ.
Wi bɩɛl Jeju kɔɔ har dɩbara da-n bɩɛl Thãgba, dɩ a kɔɔ bulele ɔɔ kpãkpãadaraakɛ hanɩ kha na ɔr ayɩ: Amɛ tɩbɩla n yɩ mɩ dor?
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Ɩkhasɔ n yɩ Jã Batɩsɩtɩ fɩ do. Wɛ n yɩ Elɩ fɩ do. Wɛ n yɩ wo, mama Thãgbaa bobon bɩɛl ɩrɛ a the khirera.
Sɩ Jeju bule wi: Sɩ ner, amɛ nɩ-n yɩ mɩ dor? Dɩ Pɩɛr birsee: Thãgbaa Kirisiti fɩ do.
Sɩ Jeju kpãkpãa warɛ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka aa, wa-n so tibillə ga.

Dɩ a sor wo a ɓaan ayɩ: Dɔ mɛrkɛ dʋɔnnɩ tibili Bikuun n gaar bʋɔ jɔɔ. Dɩ kɔ̃tɩna, na bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna, na jɔfʋ dɩɩrdarasɔ na bo mer, sɩ dakha wa kʋ mɛr, sɩ wire yẽther wirera ma ɩɩrɛ na the khirera.
Agɩpɩ dɩ so war fɛʋ ayɩ: A ntɛ pɛr haar ɩna-n kpa mar, dɔ a faa dɩbara yɩrnanɛ, sɩ a gba ɔɔ kʋkʋ thɩr dɩwɩlʋ koo a na-n kpana mar.
Gɩdonɩ tibilikɛ n kanɩ dɩ hana bʋ dʋr na ɔɔ yi, ga ka na buurəəre. Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛɛ yi na bonɩ mɛrɛra, ɔr na 'lɛ gɩ waa gel.
Anyee bɔ ca ga taa tibil, ado a 'lɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ sɩɩ do ɔɔ yi buurəəre, agɩbo dɩ kʋɛ ɔɔ dɩbara?
Dɩ a yicuru fʋ tibil mɛrɛra na ɩ̃ thɩmɩιra, yicuru na fʋrɛ mɛr tibili Bikuun ntɛra, ɔbɔɔkɛ ma birni na ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ i dʋbɩɩkɛ dʋɔnnɩ ɩ̃ Thɩɩda na dakha thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu phuusɔɔda.
Sobɔr mɩ so nar, ɩkhasɔɔkɛ hanɩ kɩɛr na khiir sɩɩ do wa yɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar doaa ga.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju mɩɩnɩ thɩmɩaakɛ pɩ dɩ a cʋʋ wire makõther, gɛr a kparɔ Pɩɛr na Jã na Jakɩ a jʋʋnna gɔ̃gʋɔna Thãgba bɩɛl paar.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a hanɩ Thãgba bɩɛllɔ, ɔɔ ƴɛ debire dɩ ɔɔ kẽkẽ bulolo phõphõphõ dɩ a-n hɩl phalphalphal.
Dɩ hɩnɛ, tɩbɩla yenyɔ wɛ dɩ wa-n khʋɛ kha na ɔr. Mʋɩjɩ na Elɩ gɩ,
a the na carbararɛ, dɩ wa-n mɩɩ kha Jejuu khidaakɛ a na khini Jerujalɛm.
Sɩ daan kɔɔ fʋrɛ Pɩɛr na ɔɔ kpakpaarsɔ. Sɩ a wɩ jaa, wɩ yɩrɛ Jejuu carbara na tɩbɩla yenyɔɔle hanɩ kha na ɔr.
Ɔbɔɔle tɩbɩlaale n lɔrnɩ kʋɔn, Pɩɛr sor Jejura: Dɩɩrdaar, gɩ bɔrɛ sɩ hanɩ kɩɛr. Sɩ dɔ waa yẽther, bɩɛl n do afɩda, bɩɛl n do Mʋɩjɩɩda, bɩɛl n do Elɩɩda. Gɩdonɩ aa jɩ gɩrɛ a-n sona'.
Dɩ mɔna a-n mɩɩnɩ thale, ndɔlɔ̃paar gbune a thi tɩbɩla yẽtheraale. Dɩ mɔna ndɔlɔ̃paarɩle n thi warnɩ, maar fʋlɛlɛ kpãkpãadara.
Dɩ nʋɔ kɔɔ ther ndɔlɔ̃paarrara a so: Ʋrɛɛkɛ dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mι phiirni. Na-n pιɛ nũu.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ wι kɔɔ nιɛnι nʋɔɔle, Jeju sɛ dιbara. Dι kpãkpãadara pιrrɔrɛ, wa kɔɔ mιι tibil ga bɔɔle gιrɛ wι kɔɔ yιna'.
A dιι kɔɔ wιl wι ther gɔ̃gʋɔna dι wa-n gbũ, dι tibil jɔjʋɔ caan Jeju.
Dι hιnɛ, kũu bιɛl tibil jɔraale hulene: Dιιrdaar, mι-n phʋʋr fɛr hιnɛ mι bιsaanιkɛ, gιdonι ɔr dɔ ɩ̃ bikũu bιɛl.
Dι bɔɔkɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbuulera ιιrnaanι pι, dιι do dapaara a hulene, dι kɔ̃tɛɛbuurə n cʋgʋʋrɛ da-n laan da-n thena nyɔ̃thɩ̃ khɔrɔ̃ɔ. A ayι, ιnι-n thιιraarɛ kιɛr dιι do gbɔlɔlɔlɔ a sιraa waa dι ha.
Dι mι kɔɔ bιɛlɛ afι kpãkpãadara wι wea kɔ̃tɛɛbuurə, sι wa kɔɔ punoə'.
Dι Jeju so war: Nɛr nĩ babala na puu cʋʋdaraakɛɛ, ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ ma thʋ̃ na toona nι gι dana? Dι ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ ma thʋ̃ na fʋ nar haarrarakɛ gι dana? Kpa afι bikuunna a ɛna kɛ kιɛr.
Dι mɔ̃kɛ a-n wɔrɔnι, kɔ̃tɛɛbuurə gbaarɛ kpɛɛ da-n laan. Dι Jeju mananɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔlιle, sa kpɛɛ bιsaan a kpa ha ɔɔ thι.
Dι nʋɔ kpaa tιbιla fɛʋ mɔ̃ wι yιnι Thãgbaa puno hana. Mɔ̃kɛ nʋɔ kpaanι wɛr fɛʋ gιrɛra fɛʋʋkɛ Jeju cʋʋnι, a sor ɔɔ kpãkpãadarara:
Nι jιɛ pɛ ga thιmιιkɛ nũu bɔɔbɔɔ, gιdonι wa fʋrɛ mɛrkɛ dɔnι tibili Bikuun na ha tιbιla.
Sι ɔɔ kpãkpãadara na kɔɔ jι thιmιιrιle kιrʋa'. Gι kɔɔ ha warɛ gbul dι wa-n puno na jι kιrʋa', dι maar kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr dι wa bir 'la na bule ga.
Thɩ̃ banaa kɔɔ ιιrɛ awι thɩ̃thιιn, dι wa-n bana kha awι ha: Amɛ dɔ kɔ̃tιn gιrɛra asι thɩ̃thɩɩn ya fɛ?
Dɩ Jeju kɔɔ jɩrɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ-n kpɩɛrnɩ awɩ bɩnɔ, a kpa bɩsã buu pɔna dɩ khunəə sɩ dɩ so war:
Ntɛɛkɛ na teanɩ bɩsã buu thakɛ gɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ, mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ a tee, dɩ ntɛɛkɛ tea mɩnɩ, ʋrɛɛkɛ thɔna mɩnɩ a tee dakha. Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ dʋɔnnɩ da'lũu fɩɩʋ nɛrɛ fɛʋʋ thɩ̃thɩɩn, ɔr gɩɩkɛ kanɩ do kɔ̃tɩn.
Dɩ Jã so Jejura ayɩ: Dɩɩrdaar, sɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ tibilikɛ n gbaannɩ afɩ i dɩ weena kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ da-n faa, dɩ sɩ kɔɔ pɩɛrʋʋ gɩdonɩ aa do asɩ kpakpaardaara'.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Na-n pɩɛrʋa', gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n ƴaalɛ nɩnɩ sʋa', nɛrra a-n pɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wireekɛ Jeju teenanɩ a jʋnɛ ƴũ n thɔɔnɩ, Jerujalɛm a ga ƴɩɛ sa yɩ foo ɩnɩ-n thʋ le.
Dɩ a thʋɔn tɩbɩla, dɩ wɩ kɔɔ kʋʋlʋʋ ƴɩɛ a jal lõ Samarɩdaraa dɩ bɩɛlla wɩ gbɛbɩraa cɔ paar.
Sɩ dɩdaraale na kɔɔ tuə', gɩdonɩ Jerujalɛm khʋra a ga ƴɩɛ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ɔɔ kpãkpãadara Jakɩ na Jã yɩnɩ thɩ̃ɛ thale, wɩ buleele ayɩ: Kɔ̃tɩn, fɩ-n ƴaalɛ sɩ wɛ dɔɔ gɩ the ƴũ gɩ gbũ gɩ hɩ̃ wɩ fɛʋ ya?
Dɩ Jeju kɩɩl a hɩɩn wɩ sa phaan wɩ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka [ayɩ: Na jɩɩ jɩ fɩl ca ʋrɛ nɩ hanana';
gɩdonɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na ɩ̃ ɩ̃ cʋʋ tibil a jal bu paara', sɩ mɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ taa tibil.] Sɩ agɩpɩ wɩ kɔɔ jaal dɩ kpɩɩ.
Mɔ̃kɛ wɩ kɔɔ hanɩ hʋɛra, tibil bɩɛl sor Jejura: Ma-n kpa farɛ paar wo paarɩkɛ fɩ-n jalnɩ.
Dɩ Jeju birsee: Bãɓoisɔ hananɛ awɩ ka, dɩ 'lominə hananɛ awɩ tɛl, sɩ mɛr tibili Bikuun na hana kãkɛ ma jəəni yʋa'.
Sɩ a sor tibil bɩɛlla wo ayɩ: Na kpa mar. Dɩ birsee: Ha mɩ hʋɛ ɩ̃ jal ɩ̃ dʋ ɩ̃ thɩ ɓo.
Sɩ Jeju sʋʋraarɛ: Sɛ khesɔra wa-n dʋ awɩ khisɔ, sɩ fɛrɛ jala na mɩa Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda.
Dɩ bɩɛl wo sʋʋraa: Ma-n kpa farɛ Kɔ̃tιn, sι ha mι hʋɛ ɓo ɩ jal ɩ̃ fʋɔr ɩ̃ cɔdara wι tɔɔ bɔɔ.
Dι Jeju sʋʋraa: Tibil wo tibilikɛ fɔnι sũgbure da-n kʋʋl sι da-n hιιn khiro, a na mar na lõ Thãgba fãgadaarι dιra ga.
A gele ka pι, Kɔ̃tιn kɔɔ phiire kpãkpãadara kpalãther yʋɔr wo, a thɔ̃ wι yenyɔ yenyɔ ɔɔ ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ dɩɩra fɛʋ, na paar fɛʋʋkɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ teenanɩ a jala.
Sɩ a so warɛ: Jɔ jɔrɛ, sɩ jʋ kha na jɔra'. Gɛr gɩ na-n bɩɛlnɛ ʋrɛ dɔnɩ Kɔ̃tɩn jʋ kharra, a thɔna thɔ̃dara wa-n kha jɔ.
Nɩ jala, sɩ nɩ hɩnɛ, banaa nɩ ho dɩ ɩ̃ thɔ̃ kpesɔɔ thɩ̃thιιn.
Na-n fʋrɔ pɔtιma ga, na-n fʋrɔ kpakpaar lokaara', na-n fʋrɔ nɛfaa ga, dι na-n fʋɔr tibil hʋɛra ga.
Sι cʋɔr wo cʋɔrraakɛ na lonι, cacara nι kɔɔ sɔ: Ha ιι hana cʋɔrraakɛ.
Dι ado tibilikɛ dɔnι ha iedaar hale cʋɔrraale, anι ha ie na ɓaanaanɛ, a mɛ̃ gaa ga kɛrrɛ na bir nar.
Nι tɔɔ cɔ dɔɔraalera, dι gιrɛɛkɛ wa ha nιnι nι khɔ a na yɔna, gιdonι thɔ̃daar teenanɛ ɔɔ lɩmɩ. Na-n ιιr na kpaar cɔna cɔna ga.
Dι dιι wo dιιraakɛ na lonɩ dɩ wa tee nɩ, na-n khɔ dɩkor wo dɩkorɩkɛ wa ha nɩnɩ.
Na-n kpɛɛnɛ khodaraakɛ na hanɩle a na sɔna war: Bɔɔ n daan dɩ Thãgba na-n gba fãga nɛrɛra.
Sɩ dɩɩ wo dɩɩraakɛ na lonɩ kãkɛ wa tee nɩna', nɩ jala dɩ bɩnɔ a sɔ thakɛ ayɛwɔɔ:
Sɩ-n kpɛɛrɛ anɩ dɩ thɩlãkobiikɛ ma sɩnɩ nɛɛ dɩ sa-n faa nar, sɩ nɩ jɛrakɛ dɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar do n daan.
Mɩ so narɛ wireekɛ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɩ tɩbɩla Sɔdɔmdaraa kɩɩlɩkɛ wa 'lɛnɩ na khɩɩr mɔ̃ dɩɩlee kɩɩl na khɩɩrna'.
