Dɩ bir bule wi: Sɩ anyee yɔ kpɛɛ ca wɩ kɔɔ kpɛɛ nɩ? Dɩ wɩ birsee: Jãa yɔ kpɛɛ gɩ.
Dɩ Pol so war: Wɩrɛ debanɩ haar Jã n kɔɔ kpɛɛ nyʋɔnɔ da-n sona war dɩ yɩ, wɩ pɩɛr ʋrɛɛkɛ na kpa narnɩ haar, a thɩɛna gaa Jeju gɩ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ gele, wɩ kɔɔ gbaar Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i a kpɛɛna wɩ nyʋɔnɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Pol kɔɔ dɛ̃ɛ warnɩ nyɛ̃ɛ, Thu Phuu kɔɔ gbune a lõ war dɩ wa-n mɩɩ thɩmɩɩ kpɩɩsɔ, dɩ wa-n tinə Thãgba tukɩrʋ.
Konaale fɛʋ kɔɔ thɔɔrɛ yʋɔr yenyɔ.
Agɩpɩ Pol kɔɔ lʋʋn Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra da-n mɩɩ na 'lar. Pora yẽther a kɔɔ mɩɩna wɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda, da-n yɩrna wɩ wɩ pɩɛr haar.

Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ ɩkhasɔɔda bonɩ khɩɩr 'lo dɩ wɩ bo ha pɛrɛ, dɩ wa-n mɩɩna thɩmɩɩ puu dɩ wa-n pɛr Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋra tibil jɔɔ ƴɛra, Pol faa wɛr sa lee na kpãkpãadara kpɩɩ, sɩ agɩpɩ dɩ jal kũu bɩɛlɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Tɩranusii lakol cɔra da-n yɩrna wɩ wɩ yɛ kɩrʋ.
Yɛna yenyɔ a kɔɔ cʋʋ, dɩ mɛ̃ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩle Ajɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ Juifisɔ na Gɩrɛkɩsɔ kɔɔ nɩɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɩmɩɩ.
Dɩ Thãgba har Pol punone da-n cʋʋna nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩna.
Dɩ wɩ gba ƴɛ pɩɩndaa na kẽkenaakɛ kɔɔ thaanɩ Pol tomɩra, a pɔna na pɛr khodarara; dɩ mɛ̃ khoo n kpɛɛ wɩ dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔla na-n thɩɩr dakha.

Sɩ wɩ̃ Juifisɔɔkɛ n kpaarɛnɩ mɔlɔ, kɛ dɔnɩ dɔdɔɔdaraakɛ n wɛanɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ n dor bʋɔ, sɩ dɩ wɩ we Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i dɩ wa-n pɛ wɩrɛraakɛ hananɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbi hɔ̃hɔla dɩ wa-n so: Mɩ so narɛ, nɩ thɛ na Jejuu iikɛ Pol n gbanɩ da-n mɩɩ.
Welela n cʋɛnɩ gelela, Sevaakɛ dɔnɩ gbõdaarɩ bikuunsɔ wɛ makonyɔ.
Dɩ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔl birse wi: Mɩ jɩrɛ Jeju, dɩ Pol dakha mɩ jɩɩrɛ, sɩ nɛrɛ, amɛ nɩ do?
Sɩ tibilikɛ kɔ̃tɛɛbu hɔ̃hɔlla harɔnɩ ubire a wu war a puno wi fɛʋ, dɩ wɩ caalɛ thɩɩr cʋɔrɔɔle na sãɓɔlɔ̃ na khoisɔ.
Dɩ Juifisɔ na Gɩrɛkɩsɔɔkɛ hanɩ Efɛjɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ thɩ̃ɛɛle, dɩ maar fʋlɛ wɩ fɛʋ dɩ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i kɔɔ dʋbɩrɔrɛ.
Dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔɔkɛ kɔɔ pɩɛrnɩ haar pɔr a cã so gɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ.
Dɩ wɛ bərəəmkɛ dʋɔnnɩ dɔdɔɔdara, wɩ pɔr na awɩ sɛbɛsɔ, a gbɛbɩ pa bɩɛl a thii tɩbɩlaa ƴɛra. Wɩ therre ga the nɔ dɩɩ thɔɔ war bɔrɔ kpalanyɔ yʋɔr.
Thale dɔ nɔɔ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɩmɩɩ kɔɔ kpaarnɩ dɩ ga-n pɛr jɔɔ, dɩ gɩ cʋʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ ga do kpãkpalã ga.
A ga thɩ̃sɔɔle ka pɩ, Pol kpɩɛrɛ hi ɔɔ bɩnɔ sa yɩ, ɩna jaal Jerujalɛm, sɩ Masedʋan ɩna the na Akaɩ sɩ na jal. A sor ayɩ, ado ɩnɩ dã le dɔ ɩnɩ-n yɩ Rɔm dɩɩ dakha.
Dɩ a thʋɔn ɔɔ bubulsɔ yenyɔ Masedʋan, Timothe na Erasɩtɩ gɩ, sa too Ajɩ gbe.
Ɔbɔɔlera nyanyaanɛ kɔɔ lʋʋn Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋra dakɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ.
Kũu bɩɛl gɩ da-n do Demetiriyusi, dɛ bulo phebɩdaar gɩ; ɔr n pheba dɛ bulona dɩɩ do awɩ thɩl cɔ biikɛ hɔnɩ awɩ thɩl khɛr Artemɩsɩɩda, ga-n 'laa khor wa thɔ̃darasɔra kpãkpalã ga.
Dɩ a kpar wa thɔ̃darasɔra, na wɩrɛ wɩ-n donanɩ kha thɔ̃ bɩɛl a jɛ sa so: Kona, nɩ jɩrɛ ga thɔnaakɛ asɩ thɩ̃ 'lɛ n the,

dɩ nɩ yɩɛrɛ a nɩɛna dɩ ga do Efɛjɩ dɩɩra gɩ dɩbara ga, sɩ gɩ sɩrɛ fɩɩʋ sɩɩ do Ajɩra fɛʋ gɩ, Pol ʋrɛ n yɩrnanɛ tɩɩ jɔɔ dɩ fi wi na gɩrɛ a-n sonɩ dɩ yɩ, thãgbasɔɔkɛ tibil n cʋʋnɩ na nyɛ̃ɛ na do thãgba bɔsɔa'.

Sɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ puure, ga do gɩdonɩ asɩ thɔ̃ɔkɛ na debire na do mɔlɔ gɛr gɩ dɩbara ga, sɩ aa: Artemɩsɩ, thɩl khɛ kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛɛ cɔ na do thɩ̃ɛ 'lo bã, dɩrakɛ Artemɩsɩɩkɛ Ajɩdara ɓibi n fʋɔrnɩ na tɩbɩla thɩɩraakɛ fɛʋ aa, ɔɔ i the dakha na kʋɛrɛ koo.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ gele, nĩkhii fʋlɛ wɛr dɩ wɩ ma dɩ wa-n hulẽ aa: Efɛjɩdaraa Artemɩsɩ thʋnɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ ka.
Dɩ dɩɩraale koo nyanyaanɛ kɔɔ hale. Dɩ wɩ kha fɛʋ giri a lõ ɓol paarɩle a fʋ Gayʋsɩ na Arɩsɩtarkɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ Masedʋandaraakɛ dɔnɩ dakha Polɩ kpakpaarsɔ.
Sɩ Pol kɔɔ ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n lõ ɩnɩ-u yɩ tɩbɩlaale, sɩ kpãkpãadara kɔɔ pɩɛrʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ ɩkha kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ Ajɩdaraakɛ dɔnɩ Polɩ kuunsɔ kɔɔ thʋɔn a sʋʋraa, a na-n lõ ɓol paarɩla'.

Ɩkhasɔ n hulene dɩ wa-n so awɩda kpɩɩ, wɛ n hulẽ dɩ wa-n so awɩda kpɩɩ, gɩdonɩ gɩ kɔɔ har bʋla bʋla bʋla tibil jɔɔlee thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn na jɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ nɔɔ dɩ wɩ kparɔ kha a ja'.
Dɩ wɩ ti Alesãdɩɩrɩkɛ Juifisɔ tɔnɩ dɩ wa-n pɛr ƴɛ bʋrɔ, dɩ ɩɩr tibil jɔɔlee thɩ̃thɩɩn da-n jɛ wɩ na nyɛ̃ɛ, a ƴaalɛ a mɩɩ tibil jɔɔlee thɩ̃ɛ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ jɩnɩ dɩ Juifi gɩ, wɛr fɛʋ hulene nɔ bɩɛl a pʋɔrna dɩɩ thɔɔ lɩɛr yenyɔ dɩ wa-n so: Efɛjɩdaraa Artemɩsɩ thʋnɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ ka.

Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɛbɛ kheredaar punoni tɩbɩla dɩ wɩ pɩr, a sor: Nɛr Efɛjɩdara, ʋmɔ̃ haankɛ na jɩɛnnɩ dɩ Efɛjɩ dɩɩ dʋɔn dɩɩkɛ n hɩnɛnɩ Artemɩsɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ cɔa', na ʋrɛ n hɩnɛnɩ bokaarɩkɛ thɛnɩ ƴũ a ji thɩɩra kɛ n nɛnanɩ dɩ Artemɩsɩ ga.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ɛ gɩɩkɛ na hanɩ bana paara' gɩ teenanɛ nɩ pɩra, na-n ɩɩr na cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ thaa birbirə'.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ kpar tɩbɩlaakɛ a ɩna, sɩ ga do thɩ̃ɛ wɩ kɔɔ yu thɩl cʋɔrɔa', wa kɔɔ kʋɛ dakha wo asɩ thɩl khɛrɩkɛɛ iə'.
Ado Demetiriyusi na ɔɔ thɔ̃daarsɔ wɛr hana sor na ntɛ, kɩɩl wire hale dɩ so kɩɩldara dakha hale, dɔ wɩ we kha kɩɩl paar.
Sɩ ado thɩ̃ kpɩɩ hale dɩ nɩ hana, tɩbɩlaakɛ gobanɛr hanɩ hʋɛ dɩ wɩ kpa na jɛ, wɛr na gʋrɛ gɩ.
A sa hɩɩna', wa pɛ sarɛ sor khʋɛnaakɛra kɔɔ dananɩ nĩ, gɩdonɩ sa jɩ mɔ̃ sa mɩɩnɩ a na nɩna khʋ̃ɛɛkɛɛ kɩra'.
A ga thɩmɩɩle pɩ, a bɩlanɛ tɩbɩlaale kpanɩ a jɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ khʋ̃ɛɛle pɩnɩ, gɛr Pol wer kpãkpãadara a der pa bɩɛl a mɩɩ wɩ wa-n yɩrana ƴɛ kʋʋl jaal, sa fʋɔr wɩ sa gba jal Masedʋan.
Dɩ a kpaarɛ paarɩle a mɩɩ kpãkpãadara thɩmɩa jɔɔ dɩɩ ha wɩ ƴɛ kʋʋl jaal, agɩpɩ dɩ gba jal Gɩrɛsɩ
a too le pora yẽther. Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a ƴaalnɩ a lõ bato a jal Siri, a nɩɛrɛ dɩ Jnifisɔ gʋʋrɛ kha sa nʋɔ, dɩ a kpɩɛrɛ a hɩɩn sa bir na Masedʋan hʋɛ a kɔ̃.
Wɩrɛ kɔɔ thɔgɔɔnɩ ha wɩrɛ: Sopatɛɛrɩkɛ thɛnɩ Bere, Pirusii bikuun gɩ, na Arɩsɩtarkɩ, na Sekɔ̃ɔkɛ thɛnɩ Tesalonɩkɩ, na Gayʋsɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ Dɛɛrbɩ, na Timothe, na Tɩsɩkɩ, na Tʋrofɩmɩkɛ wɩ kɔnɩ Ajɩ.
Wele kɔɔ kʋʋlɛ sɩ ƴɩɛ dɩ wa-n pɩɛr sɩ Tʋrʋasɩ.
Sɩ se wer, ɔbɔɔkɛ Buruukɛ na hananɩ tabɩɩraa bɔ kanɩ pɩ, gɛr sɩ gbaar bato Filipi, dɩ wire yemɔɩ wire sɩ kɔɔ caan wɛr Tʋrʋasɩ a too le wire makonyɔ.
Sɩ wire makonyɔɔ caca wi, sɩ kɔɔ kpar kha a jɛ sɩ kho Kɔ̃tɩnɩ dɩko. Sɩ gɩdonɩ, a dɩɩ wɩl gɛr Pol na jaal, a kɔɔ mɩɩrɛ thɩmɩɩr kpãkpãadarara sɩ a mɩɩna wɛr waa dɩ dɩɩ nɩrɔna.
Dɩ lãphã jɔɔ kɔɔ hale lɩ̃ganaale sɩ-n kpanɩ kha a jɛ.
Dɩ daɓol bɩɛl gɩ da-n do Etikusi a too fɛnɛtɩrɩra, a daar khi kper ɔbɔɔkɛ Pol mɩɩnɩ thɩmɩa da-n pʋɔrna ƴɛrr, dɩ daan tʋɔrɛ dɩ the le lɩ̃gã yẽtherdaara a təə ji thʋnɔ, dɩ wa gbaa dɩɩ do a khire.
Sɩ Pol gbune a dɛɛnaa a palʋʋ sa so: Na-n do haar n uu na', gɩdonɩ ɔɔ fesu hale.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Pol birni jʋʋn, a khor Kɔ̃tɩnɩ dɩko sa bir fʋ thɩmɩa dɩ dɩɩ wɩlna; agɩpɩ dɩ gba jal.
Sɩ wɩ kpar daɓolbirile a jalna na yire, dɩ gɩ kɔɔ do warɛ ha faa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ.
Sɩ se wer, sɩ kɔɔ kʋʋlɛ Pol ƴɩɛ a lõ bato a jal Asɔsɩ, ka sɩ kɔɔ gʋʋrnɩ kha sa caanɛ na gbaa, gɩdonɩ hʋɛ or ƴaal a pɔna.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ caan sɩnɩ Asɔsɩ, a lʋʋn batookɛ sɩ harnɩ dɩ sɩ jal Mɩtɩlɛn.
Le sɩ jal na bato waa, dɩ dɩɩ na wɩl dɩɩ do sɩ daan ka Kɩyɔsɩ dɩɩ pɛnɩ ƴɩɛ. Dɩ ʋ̃ dɩ bir na wɩl dɩ sɩ dã Samɔsɩ, dɩ wireekɛ na kpaanɛnɩ dɩɩ do sɩ daan Mɩle.
Sɩ Pol kpɩɛrɛ hi ɔɔ bɩnɔ sa yɩ, ɩna kpãasɛrɛ Efɛjɩ sɩ ɩna jɩɩla', dɩ mɛ̃ ɩna dĩdĩə Ajɩ dɩɩra ga; gɩdonɩ a-n phananɛ adora punone hale a dã Jerujalɛm Pãtɩkotɩ wire.
Sɩ Pol toore Mɩle, sa thɔ̃ Efɛjɩ a we we gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ pɔnɩ dã a so warɛ ayɩ: A fʋna wireekɛ mɩ lonɩ Ajɩ dɩɩra, nɩ jɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ ɩ̃ fɩl hanɩ bɔɔ fɛʋ na nɛrɛ,
dɩ ma-n dona Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃ na dɩbara jor koo, nakha yilẽbe, na gaarɛraakɛ mɩ-n yɩnɩ Juifisɔɔ gʋʋrraakɛ wɩ-n gʋʋrnɩ sɩ wa-n nɔ mɩ.
Nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ ma kɔɔ ker nar thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na bɔ narnɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ-n mɩɩ nɩnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ dɩ ma-n dɩɩrnanɩ thɩ̃ɛ tibil jɔɔ ƴɛra na cɔnanɔsɔa',
dɩ mɩ-n kpãkpaanɛ Juifisɔra na wɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa', wɩ deba haar a birə Thãgbara a hanana ha pɛrɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitira.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ nɩ hɩnɛ, Thu Phuu hala mɩ gɩrɛ da-n jalna Jerujalɛm, sɩ ma jɩ gɩrɛ na dana mɩnɩ la';
sɩ gɩrɛ mɩ jɩnɩ dɩbara dʋɔn: Dɩɩ wo dɩɩraakɛ mɩ-n kpaarnɩ, Thu Phuu n nɩ marɛ dɩ khaɩ lʋʋn na bɔ gaarɛ n hale dɩ ga-n pɩɛr mɩ.
Sɩ ma-n ɩherna ĩ yi dɩɩ do mar thɩ̃ ɓʋ̃ɔa', sɩ gɩrɛ mɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ dʋɔn ado mɩ puno pɩ ɩ̃ kɔlɔ̃kɔɔ ca na dakha thɔmaakɛ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ ha mɩnɩ ayɩ, ɩ̃ mɩa Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ.
Dɩ nɩ hɩnɛ nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã, na yɩ mɩ ƴɛ bire bã nɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ mɩ kɔɔ kpaarɔnɩ a mɩɩ Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ma-n so nar nĩ gɩrɛ casɩ, ado nɩ buu anɩ so na heen ma',
gɩdonɩ mɩ mɩɩ nɛr gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa ƴaal fɛʋ sɩ ma ker nar dɩkha ga.
A nɩ jɩ na-n dɔ bʋrɛ anɩbara na banaa fɛʋʋkɛ Thu Phuu kɔɔ pɛ narnɩ nɩ dɔrɔ hɩɩndara ayɩ, na-n khɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ we gbɛbɩdaraakɛ a kɔɔ thenɩ na ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ tɔmɩ̃.
Mɩ jɩrɛ a mɩ kɔ̃ na pɩ, kpe hɔ̃hɔla na lʋʋn anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn dɩ wa sɩ banaanaaka';
wo, tɩbɩla na ɩɩrɛ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn wa-n dɩɩr thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ gõgolonenɩ wɩ kɛr kpãkpãadara wa-n kpa war.
Gɛr gɩ na-n jʋrɛ a jɛna gɩ, dɩ yɛna yẽther biləni mɩ kɔɔ cʋʋ, sɩ ma-n kɔɔ sɩrɔ fɩl dɩɩrɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛlla na yilẽbe dɩtɩnɔ na dɩwɩlʋa'.
Dɩ nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã Kɔ̃tɩnɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ mɩ faa nɩ na ɔɔ bɔ jɩ thɩmɩɩra, kɛ hananɩ punone a na cʋʋ nɩ dɩ na khɔ̃, kɛ na hana nɩnɩ dakha anɩdaakɛ na hɩnɩ na wɩrɛ Thãgba leenɩ kpɩɩ.
Ma kɔɔ ƴaal tibillə war, dɩ dɛ gɩ, dɩ kẽkena ga.
Nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ jɩrɛ dɩ mɩ-n dor thɔma na ɩ̃ nyɛ̃ɛkɛ, dɩ ma-n 'lɛ gɩrɛ n ɓɔra mɩnɩ nakha wɩrɛɛkɛ n kɔɔ hana mɩnɩ kha.
Dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra mɩ kɔɔ nɩ narɛ na-n dɔ thɔma thale a na bulo wɩrɛ yɔɔnɛnɩ, a na jɛnana Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɩmɩɩkɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ sonɩ ayɩ: 'Laarɛ n hananɛ Thãgba bɔnanɛ dɩɩ jɔ 'lɛr.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a mɩɩnɩ thale pɩ, a gulẽgarɛ dɩ wɩ bɩɛl kha Thãgba fɛʋ.
Dɩ wɛr fɛʋ n khɩɩrɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ a palna Pol dɩ wa-n fʋɔrʋʋ
sa gbobi; sɩ gɩrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ so warnɩ ayɩ, wa yɩ nɩ ƴɛ bire bã dɔ war sor. Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ thɔgʋʋrɛ a dana bato.
Sɩ sɛrɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ leenɩ kha, sɩ gbaar bato a jal dẽdẽdẽ Kɔsɩ; a dɩɩ wɩl sɩ jaal Rɔɔdɩ a the le a jal Patara.
Dɩ mɔ̃ sɩ yɩnɩ bato bɩɛlɩkɛ na jalanɩ Fenɩsɩ, sɩ lʋʋn a jal
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ 'laanɩ yɩ Sɩpɩr yɔ dɩɩ, sɩ faa gɛr nyɔ̃bɩlana sa gba asɩ hʋ a jalna Siri khʋʋ a dã Tɩɩr; liir wɩ tiir thɩ̃ɛsɔ batora.
Dɩ sɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ kpãkpãadara a too le wire makonyɔ. Dɩ kpãkpãadara sor Polla dɩɩ do Thu Phuu pa gɩ the ayɩ, a na-n jal Jerujalɛmna ga.
A wiresɔɔle ka pɩ, sɩ ɩɩrɛ a gba asɩ kpaar pa hʋ, dɩ kona fɛʋ, na khɛra, na bɩsana kɔɔ thɔɔ sɛr a thena dɩ khuirə. Dɩ sɩ kɔɔ gulẽgarɛ le lanyɔ̃ gẽgerẽ nʋɔra a bɩɛl Thãgba.
Agɩpɩ dɩ sɩ fʋɔr kha bɩɛlbɩɛl sa lõ batora, sɩ wɛr wɩ kɛrrɛ bir awɩ cɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ thenɩ Tɩɩr, sɩ gbaar asɩ hʋ a jal dã Pʋtolemaɩsɩ, liir asɩ kpaar lanyʋɔnna khu, dɩ le sɩ bule kha bɔɔ na omɩna sa too kha wi bɩɛl.
A dɩɩ wɩl sɩ kɔɔ ɩɩrɛ jal Sejare a lõ Filipiikɛ dɔnɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩdaarɩ cɔ, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ tibil bɩɛl tɩbɩla makonyɔraakɛ wɩ kɔɔ phiirni, dɩ le sɩ cɔ.
A hananɛ bikhɛna yenãakɛ na kɔɔ jɛnɩ kona pa', dɩ wa-n ti Thãgba tukɩrʋ.
Mɔ̃ sɩ toonɩ le a na pʋɔr, Thãgba tukɩr tidaar bɩɛl hale dɩ wa-n wɩɩ Agabusi, Jude a the
a pɔ asɩ pa; dɩ a gbaar Polɩ lophɛrɛ a linə ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ nɛ na nyɛ̃ɛ sa so ayɩ: Thu Phuu sor aa: Kuunikɛ hɩnanɩ lophɛrɛɛkɛra, thakɛ Juifisɔ na fʋʋ na li Jerujalɛm dɩɩra a na ha ca kpala.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ nɩɛnɩ gele, sɛrɛ na wɩrɛ hanɩ paarɩlera kɔɔ phʋʋrɛ Pol a na-n jal Jerujalɛmnana ga.
Dɩ le a birse: Anye nɩ-n cʋʋrɔ thaa dɩ na-n khɩɩ dɩ haar kʋɛ mɩ? Gɩdonɩ mɩ gbɛbɩrɛ pɩ, ga do wɩ to mɩ khaɩra dɩbara ga, sɩ dɩ ma khi Jerujalɛm, gɩ do Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i dɔ nɔɔ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ aa-n ƴaalnɩ a tuə', sa kɔɔ bir jalna gɩ ƴɔɔ bã sɩ sɩ sor: Dɩ dɔ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ tuur n cʋʋ.
A ga wisɔɔle ka pɩ, sɩ gbɛbɩrɛ asɩ thɩ̃sɔ sɩ jal Jerujalɛm.
Dɩ wɩ̃ kpãkpãadaraakɛ dɔnɩ Sejaredara kɔɔ thɔɔ sɛr a jalna Manasɔ̃ɔ cɔ kãkɛ gɩ teenanɩ sɩ tɔɔ; tibil gɩɩkɛ wɩ kɔnɩ Sɩpɩr yɔ dɩɩra, a kɔɔ mãa dʋʋr kpãkpãadaar.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ danɩ Jerujalɛm, omɩna kɔɔ tee ser na daʋ.
A ga dɩ wɩl, Pol kpa sɛr a jalna Jakɩɩ cɔ, kãkɛ we gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ fɛʋ kpanɩ kha a jɛ.
A sɩ fʋɔr wɩ pɩ, a mar da-n mɩɛ wɩ dɩɩdɩɩ thɔmaakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ cʋʋnaanɩ ca kpalaa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ gele, wɩ-n dʋbɩrɛ Thãgbaa i; agɩpɩ dɩ wɩ sʋʋraa: Asɩ omi, fɩ yɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ Juifisɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃ pɛrnɩ haar, dɩ wɛr fɛʋ n pərre jɔfʋra.
Wɩ-n yɩ aa, mɔ̃ fɩ-n dɩɩrnɩ Juifisɔ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ ca kpalaa thɩ̃thɩɩn fɩ-n yɩ, wɩ faa Mʋɩjɩɩ jɔfʋ dɩ fɩ sona war dakha aa, wa-n kur bɩsana khʋ̃a', wa-n hɩɩn dakha mama fɩla'.
Mɔ̃ sa do gɩrɛ, gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na nɩɛrɛ dɩ fɩ ɩnɛ kɛ.
Gɛr gɩ, cʋɛ gɩrɛ sa so farnɩ: Tɩbɩla yenã hakɛ asɩ pa a so nʋɔ.

Kpa wɩ nɩ phʋɔl kha, sa lɩma gɩrɛ wa kɔɔ kʋɛnɩ sɩ wɩ puno wɩ bel yʋʋ. Dɩ mɛ̃ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na jɩ dɩ gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ dɩ wɩ mɩɩ dɩ wa-n pɛ far, sõsor gɩ, sɩ fɛrɛ dakha fa-n jɩɩ ɩɩr bɔɔbɔɔ fa-n hɩɩnna jɔfʋ.
Sɩ ado ca kpalaakɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar gɩ, sɩ kɔɔ gʋʋrɛ hɩɩn sa yɩ, wɩ bɔ bonɩ ji nʋʋn, na tɔmɩn, na nʋmɩkɛ khenɩ sɩ tɔmɩn na tha', na bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ.
Dɩ Pol kpar konaale dɩ wɩ phʋɔl kha, dɩ dɩɩ wɩl dɩ wɩ lõ kha Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna wɩ so tɩbɩlala wireekɛ awɩ phʋɔl na pɩnɩ, na ɔbɔɔkɛ wa jini bonɩɛ a na pɛ war fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wire makonyɔɔle n thɔɔnɩ pɩr, Juifisɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Ãjɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ Pol Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, a tɔ tibil jɔ a pɛr dɩ wɩ fʋʋ,

sɩ wa-n hulẽ: Ɩjɩrayɛldara, nɩ ɩna a bulo si. Ʋrɛ dɔ kuunikɛ n dɩrɛnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ da-n kpaarna paar fɛʋ da-n kpɛna tɩbɩla, na jɔfʋ, na paarɩkɛ. A kparrakɛ Gɩrɛkɩsɔ a lona Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ a ƴɔ̃ƴɔɔna pa phuukɛ.
Gɩdonɩ wi bɩɛl wɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ Tʋrofɩmɩkɛ dɔnɩ Efɛjɩdaar dɩɩra nakha ɔr, a ka jɩna Pol kpaarɛ a lona Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ.
Dɩ dɩɩ fɛʋ tutugore, dɩ tɩbɩla na-n caalɛ dɩɩdɩɩ. Dɩ wɩ fʋrɛ Pol Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ, a hal thena sa khaan loosɔ dapaara.
Mɔ̃ wɩ n ƴaalnɩ wɩ kʋʋ, tutugore daan sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ dɩ nyanyaanɛ har Jerujalɛm dɩɩra fɛʋ.
Dɩ dapaara dɩ kpa sɔrasɛ na sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ, a cana pɔna. Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩnɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ na sɔrasɛsɔ wa-n be Pol bã.
Dɩ le sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ dã a fʋʋ sa so, wɩ lie na jɔrkɔ yenyɔ sa bulee ntɛ a donɩ na gɩrɛ a cʋʋnɩ.
Sɩ tibil jɔɔlee thɩ̃thɩɩn, wɛ n hulene dɩ wɩ yɩ aa: Gɩrɛ gɩ; wɛ n hulẽ aa: Thakɛ gɩ; sɩ mɔ̃kɛ aa punoni na jɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ sobɔra' gɩdonɩ khʋ̃ɛ jɔrɛ, a sor wɩ kpaa a jalana sɔrasɛɛ cɔ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Pol kɔɔ danɩ jʋʋn paar, sɔrasɛ thar thʋnɔ sa gbaa, gɩdonɩ nĩkhii thʋnɛ fʋlɛ tɩbɩlaale ka ɔrra.
Gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla bərəəm n kpaanɛ dɩ wa-n hulẽ aa, wɩ dɔ kuunikɛ n khi.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ hanaanɩ wa-n lona sɔrasɛɛ cɔ, Pol bulele sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ aa: Mɩ hananɛ hʋɛ a na so far thɩ̃ɛ ya? Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ birsee: Fɩ-n nɩrɛ gɩrɛkɩ thɩmɩɩr ya?
Ga do fɛr dɔ Ejipitidaarɩkɛ kɔɔ ɩrɛnanɩ lãʋ kɩɛr delẽ delẽ, a kpana tɩɩ kʋdara gbɩlanɩ yenã a jalna bəənnə gaa?
Dɩ Pol birsee: Mɛrɛ, Juifi ha mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ the Silisi, Tarsɩ dɩɩraakɛ na hanɩ gbə' wɩ kɔ̃ mɩ; mɩ-n bɩɛl fɛr, ha mɩ hʋɛ ɩ̃ mɩɩna tɩbɩlaakɛ.
Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ haa hʋɛ, dɩ Pol ɩɩr jɩɩl jʋʋn paar sa jɛ tɩbɩla na nyɛ̃ɛ. Dɩ wɩ pɩrrɛ dĩi, dɩ Pol gba thɩmɩa na ebirə thɩmɩɩr da-n mɩɩ wɩ ayɩ:
Nɛr omɩna na thɛsɔ, nɩ pɛ nũu ĩ so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ thɩmɩɩraakɛ mɩ hananɩ nɛnɛ̃.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ nɩɛnɩ da-n mɩɩna wɩ ebirə thɩmɩɩr, wɩ jɩɛ pɩr dɩphã cɩcɩcɩ. Dɩ Pol so war:

Juifi ha mɩ, Silisi Tarsɩ wɩ kɔ̃ mɩ, sɩ kɩɛr dɩɩraakɛ wɩ kɔɔ haan mɩ, dɩ Gamalɩɛlɩ kal ƴɔɔ mɩ kɔɔ too a dɩɩr thɩ̃ɛ a jɩ mɔ̃kɛ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ jɔfʋ hanɩ ɓibi. Mɩ-n kɔɔ gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛ Thãgbaadara mɔ̃kɛra nɛrɛ fɛʋ hanɩ gɩrɛ nĩ.
Mɩ kɔɔ kpoore wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋraakɛ, dɩ ma n kʋʋrna wɩ, dɩ ɩ̃ fʋlɛna kona na khɛra a li a na to khaɩra.
Gbõdaar na kɔ̃tɩnasɔɔkɛ punone mɩɩ nɩ ɩ̃da mɔ̃ gɩ hanɩ. Wɛr thɛthɛrarakɛ mɩ kɔɔ tee sɛbɛ ɩ̃ jalnana ɩ̃ ha omɩnaakɛ hanɩ Damasɩ, sɩ ɩ̃ fʋlɛ wɩrɛɛkɛ hanɩle ɩ̃ ɩnana Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ heen wɩ sor.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ mɩ kɔɔ hanɩ hʋɛra dɩ ma-n wɔrɔ̃ Damasɩ, ʋlkhɔɔ gɩ kɔɔ do, dɩ dapaara dahɩrɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ kɔɔ ther ƴũ a carã dii mar;
dɩ ɩ̃ təə ji thʋnɔ sa nɩɛ wire dɩɩ so mar aa: Sɔl, Sɔl, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fa-n kpoo mar mɛ̃?
Dɩ ɩ̃ birsee: Kɔ̃tɩn, fɛr amɛ gɩ? Dɩ birse mi: Mɛr dʋɔn Najarɛtɩ Jejuukɛra fɩ-n kpooronɩ.
Wɩrɛ kɔɔ hanɩ kha na mɛrɛ wɩ yɩrɛ dahɩrɛ bɔɔbɔɔ, sɩ wa kɔɔ nɩ wireekɛ mɩana mɩna'.
Dɩ le mɩ bulee, ɩ̃ cʋɛ anye ya, Kɔ̃tɩn? Dɩ Kɔ̃tɩn birse mi ayɩ, ɩ̃ ɩrɛ jala Damasɩ; le wa so mar gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Thãgba thɩɩn marnɩ ɩ̃ cʋɛ.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ dahɩrɛ caranɛɛle cʋʋ mɛr dɩ ma-n ya', wɩrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ hana mɩnɩ kha fʋ mɛr nyɔ̃ɔ a hal dɩ ɩ̃ dã Damasɩ.
Sɩ kũu bɩɛl gɩ da-n do Ananɩasɩ; a-n cʋrɛ Thãgba da-n hɩɩnna ɔɔ jɔfʋ, dɩ Juifisɔ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ dɩɩraale n mɩɩrɛ ɔɔda bɔ,
a pɔr a jɩɩl mar sa so mar: Sɔl ɩ̃ omi, birə na yɛ. Dɩ liirrə dapaara ɩ̃ yi khɛr dɩ ɩ̃ yɩɩ.
Dɩ so: Asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ Thãgba thɩnɛ fɩ fɩ jɛ ɔɔ tuur, a yɛ Tɩɩ sarʋ, a nɛ ɔɔ nɔ thɩmɩɩ;
gɩdonɩ fɛr na dɔ ʋrɛ na-n mɩanɩ ɔɔda tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ ƴɛra, mɔ̃kɛra fɩ yɩɛnɩ a nɩɛna dɩɩ ha.
Dɩ nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã, anye sɛ fɩ 'lo? Ɩrɛ, wɩ kpɛɛ fɩ nyʋɔnɔ, dɩ dɔ dakha afɩ sopugo n cɔcɔɔ mɔ̃ fɩ wenɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i.
Dɩ mɔ̃ mɩ kɛrnɩ bir dã Jerujalɛm dɩ ma-n bɩɛl Thãgba Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, mɩ yɩrɛ thɩ̃ yɩr dɩɩ do daphuronaa.
Kɔ̃tɩn mɩ yɩ dɩ so mar ayɩ: Phana kɔrɔ a thɛ Jerujalɛm, gɩdonɩ wa tu ɩ̃daakɛ fa mɩɩnɩ a na pɛ mara'.
Dɩ ɩ̃ so: Kɔ̃tɩn, wɛr thɛthɛ jɩrɛ dɩ mɛr n kɔɔ fʋlɛnɛ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔ wɩrɛ kɔɔ pɛ fɩnɩ haar dɩ ɩ̃ ciil, sa to wɩ khaɩra.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ-n kʋnɩ Etɩɛn afɩ sobɔ so jɩdaar, mɩ kɔɔ harrɛ a tu awɩda dɩ ma-n hɩɩn wɩrɛ n kʋɔnɩɩ kẽkẽsɔ.
Dɩ Kɔ̃tɩn so marɛ ɩ̃ jala aa, ƴɔɔ ɩna thɔ̃ mɩ ca kpalaa pa.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ pɩɛrɛ nũu phaphapha a dana thɩmɩɩrɩle sa hulẽ ayɩ: Cʋɛ tibil ca ʋrɛ a khi, aa teena yi hara'.
Dɩ wɩ hulene dɩ wa-n dʋʋrna kẽkena, dɩ wɩ kpɩɩrna thɩn na dʋʋrna ƴũ.
Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ sor wɩ kpa Pol a lonana sɔrasɛɛ cɔ a ciilee na khasa sa bulenee, a jɛ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ kɩrʋ dɩ wɩ hulẽ thale na pɩɛraa.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ liini na lɔ pɩ sɩ wɩ ciil, a bulele sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ jɩlɛnɩ bɛrrɔ ayɩ: Nɩ hananɛ hʋɛ na ciil kuunikɛ dɔnɩ Rɔmɛ̃ na khasa, kɛ wa heennɩnakɛ sora ya?
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ nɩɛnɩ gele, a jaal so sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋra: Mɔ̃ fa do gɩrɛ? Kuunikɛ Rɔmɛ̃ gɩ.
Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ pɔr a so Polla: Sɔ mar Rɔmɛ̃ ha fɩ gerɩ? Dɩ birsee: Ɔɔ.
Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ bir so: War mer kʋɛ jɔɔ sa debi a do gɩ. Dɩ Pol birsee, sɩ me wer mɛ̃ wɩ kɔɔ kɔ̃ mɩ.
Dɩ dapaara wɩrɛ kɔɔ gbɛbanɩ pɩ wɩ ciil Pol, wɩ fagʋʋrɛ; dɩ mɔ̃ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ do Rɔmɛ̃ Pol do, maar fʋʋrɛ gɩdonɩ a kɔɔ liire.
A dɩɩ wɩl, sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ ƴaalɛ a jɩɩ jɩ bɔɔbɔɔ gɩrɛra dɔnɩ kɩrʋ dɩ Juifisɔ pɩɛraa sor; a thʋbʋʋrɛ sa we bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na so gʋʋrdara fɛʋ, dɩ wɩ kpa kha a jɛ sɩ dɩ kpaa gbuno awɩ ƴɛra.
Sɩ Pol na-n hɩɩn so gʋʋrdara kirkirkir sa so: Omɩna, ɩ̃ fɩlɩkɛ mɩ hananɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra a dana nɛnɛ̃kɛ na hana sɩ paara'.
Dɩ Ananɩasɩ gbõdaar so wɩrɛraakɛ wɔrɔnɛɛnɩ aa, wɩ bɩɛ nʋɔra.
Dɩ Pol sʋʋraa: Thãgba na be fer, fɛrkɛ hɔnɩ go biseekɛ wɩ calnɩ mɩlɛ. Fɩ ka toore fa-n kɩɩlna mɩ mɔ̃ jɔfʋ sonɩ, sɩɩ do jɔfʋ fɩ ka fa-n kʋɛ a 'laa hʋɛ wɩ bɛ mɩ.
Dɩ wɩrɛ wɔrɔnaanɩ sʋʋraa: Thãgbaa gbõdaar fɩ nɩɩrɩɩ?
Dɩ Pol so: Omɩna, ma kɔɔ jɩ dɩ gbõdaar ga, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: Fa-n mɩɩ puure afɩ tibilsɔɔ kɔ̃tɩna ga.

Mɔ̃ Pol jɩnɩ dɩ tɩɩ jɔɔle wɩrɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala' har kho bɩɛl, jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara kho bɩɛl, a hulene so gʋʋrdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn aa: Omɩna, jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaar ha mɩ, dɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara kɔna mɩ, nũu pɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ hananɩ khi ɩɩrɛra dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ wa-n kɩɩlna mɩ gɩrɛ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a sonɩ gele, thɩ̃ banaa kɔɔ ɩɩrɛ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdarara na wɩrɛraakɛ n yɛnɩ khi ɩɩrɛ na hala', dɩ tibil jɔɔle lee kha.
Gɩdonɩ Sadʋsɛ̃ɛsɔ n yɩ: Khi ɩɩrɛ na hale, dɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu gɩ, dɩ thue ga; sɩɩ do jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara wer n ture gelela fɛʋ.
Dɩ khʋ̃ɛ ɩɩr dakɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, dɩ ɩkhaa jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaraakɛ dɔnɩ bɩɛl na jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdara ɩɩrɛ, a lã dɩɩ khɩɩr ka sa yɩ: Sa yɩ puure kuunnaaka'; agakpaana gɩ do thue, agɩbo thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ mɩanaa.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ khʋ̃ɛ bonɩ dɩ a-n pɛr, maar fʋrɛ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ dɩ kpɩɛr agakpaana tɩbɩlaale na cɛcɛbɛrɛ Pol. Dɩ a sor sɔrasɛra wɩ jala a taa Pol awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn a lonanaa sɔrasɛɛ cɔ.
Ga dɩtɩnɔɔlera, Kɔ̃tɩn pɔr a jɩɩl Pol gɛllɔ sa sʋʋraa: Pɩɛr 'lar, gɩdonɩ mɔ̃kɛ fɩ mɩɩnɩ ɩ̃ sobɔ so jɩ thɩmɩɩr Jerujalɛm dɔ fɩ mɩɩ gɩ mɛ̃ dakha Rɔm dɩɩra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ wɩlnɩ, Juifisɔ n gʋʋrɛ kha sɩ wɩ nɔ Pol a ʋlfɛ awɩbara ayɩ, dɩkor na lõ nɩ nɔɔ dɩ nyʋɔn ga phaphapha ɩnɩ-n kʋʋ.
Wɩrɛ kɔɔ gʋʋrɛnɩ kha wɩ nʋɔ, wɩ kar tɩbɩla kpalanyɔra;
dɩ wɩ jaal a yɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ a so war: Sɩ ʋlfɛrɛ ʋlfɛrɛ a pɛ asɩbara ayɩ: Dɩkor na lõ sɩ nɔa' phaphapha sɩ kʋ Pol.
Gɛr gɩ nɛrɛ dakha nɛnɛ̃kɛ, nɩ dɔ bɩɛl na so gʋʋrdara sa so sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋra a kpaa a ɛna anɩ ƴɛra, gɩ ho nɩ-n jɩɛ ƴaal nɩ gʋʋr ɔɔ sora bɔɔbɔɔ; sɩ sɛrɛ, sɩ gbɛbɩrɛ pɩ sɩ kʋʋ sɩ a na dã kɛ pa'.
Sɩ Polɩ õkhɛrɩ bikuun kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ mɔ̃ wɩ gʋʋrnɩ sɩ wɩ nʋɔ, a jal sɔrasɛɛ cɔ a lõ a so Polla.
Dɩ Pol we sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl a sʋʋraa: Kpa daɓolbirikɛ a jalana sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋra, gɩdonɩ a hananɛ thɩ̃ɛ a na sʋʋraa.
Dɩ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ kpa daɓolbirile a jalna sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋra a sʋʋraa: Pol khaɩdaar kɔɔ we mer a bɩɛl mɩ ɩ̃ kpa daɓolbirikɛ a ɛna far aa: A hananɛ thɩ̃ɛ a na so far.
Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋʋle fʋ daɓolbirile nyɔ̃ɔ a kpaa kana pa kpɩɩ, a bulee: Anye fɩ hana dɩ fa-n so mar?
Dɩ birsee: Juifisɔ kɔɔ gʋʋrɛ kha, sɩ ɩnɩ-n bɩɛl fɩ fɩ kpa Pol fɩ pɔna cʋɔ so gʋʋrdaraa ƴɛra, gɩ ho thɩ̃ɛ fɩ-n ƴaal fɩ jɩɩ bulee bɔɔbɔɔ.

Fa-n pɛ wɩ nũə', gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla kpalanyɔ na dɛbɩrɛ awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn nɔr dɩ wa-n pɩɛrʋʋ; wɩ kɔɔ ʋlfɛrɛ a pɛ awɩbara ayɩ, dɩkor na lõ nɩ nɔɔ dɩ nyʋɔn ga phaphapha ɩnɩ-n kʋ Pol; wɩ gbɛbɩrɛ gɩrɛ pɩ sɩɩ do afɩ tuur wɩ-n pɛ nũu.
Dɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ faa daɓolbirile a kɔna sa sʋʋraa, a na n so tibillə dɩ a mɩɛ nɛr thɩ̃ɛɛla'.
Dɩ le sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ we sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ yenyɔ a so war ayɩ: Nɩ gbɛbɩrɛ a te sɔrasɛ taanyɔ, na sɔrasɩ gãgodara kpalãther yʋɔr, na kpɩladara taanyɔ, nɩ jal Sejare phɩɩn bɔɔ.
A sor, wɩ hana Pol dakha gãgʋʋsɔɔkɛ a na jʋʋnnɩ, wɩ kpaa pɔlpɔlpɔl wɩ jalna Felɩsɩ gobanɛrɩ pa.
Dɩ a kherere sɛbɛ thakɛ ayɩ:
Mɛr, Kʋloodɩ Lɩjɩasɩ khera sɛbɛɛkɛ fɛr Felɩsɩ gobanɛr bʋɔra, dɩ ma-n ha fɩ fʋɔrɛ.
Kuunikɛ Juifisɔ fʋɔnɛɛ wɩ kʋra, sɩɩ do mɩ pɔnanɛ sɔrasɛsɔ a tagʋʋ na pɩ gɩdonɩ mɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ Rɔmɛ̃ a do.
Dɩ mɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ jɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ kɩrʋ dɩ wɩ pɩɛraa sor; gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ kpaa a jalna awɩ so gʋʋrdarasɔɔ ƴɛra.
Dɩ le mɩ yɩɛ dɩɩ do sorɩkɛ wɩ-n pɩɛraanɩ, awɩ jɔfʋ gɩ-n hɩɩn, sɩɩ do aa cʋʋ thɩ̃ bɩɛllakɛ kɛ teananɩ khir dɩ khaɩ tʋʋr ga.
Mɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ dakha dɩ Juifisɔ kɔɔ gʋʋrɛ kha sɩ wɩ nʋɔ; gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ thɔnaa dapaara sa so ɔɔ so pɛdarara wɩ pɔ far le a pɩɛraa sorra. Nɩ tɔɔ bɔɔ.
Mɛ̃ sɔrasɛsɔ kpa Pol dɩtɩnɔ a jalna Ãtɩpatɩrɩsɩ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ kɔɔ so warnɩ.
A dɩɩ wɩl, wɩ sɩrɛ sɔrasɩ gãgodarara wɩ kpaa jalana, sa kɛr bir sɔrasɛɛ cɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɔrasɩ gãgodara danɩ Sejare, wɩ gbaar sɛbɛɛle a ha gobanɛr a kpana Pol dakha a haa.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ gobanɛr hɩɩnnɩ sɛbɛɛle pɩ, a bulele Pol dɩ ʋrɛra a thenɩ; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a jɩnɩ dɩɩ do Silisi a the,
a sʋʋraarɛ ayɩ: Ado afɩ so pɛdarasɔ ɩ̃, gɛr ma bule far thɩ̃ɛ. Sɩ a sor wa-n hɩnɛɛ Ɛrɔɔdɩɩ cɔ kɔ̃tɩna.
A wire yemɔɩ ka, Ananɩasɩ gbõdaar pɔr na wɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ, na kuunikɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Tɛrtul, kɛ n heenenɩ tɩbɩla sor mɔ̃ awɩ jɔfʋ hanɩ. Dɩ wɩ pɛrɛ Pol sor gobanɛrɩ yɛra.
Dɩ wɩ wer Pol, dɩ pɔ dã dɩ Tɛrtul ma da-n pɩɛraa sor thakɛ ayɩ: Felɩsɩ bʋɔ, fɛr n cʋɛ sɩ dɩ sɩ toona ha ie bʋɔ; afɩ kpɛsɛ thɔ̃ɔkɛ fɩ donɩ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ thɩ̃ɛ bir debi dɩphã a bɔr asɩ cara.
Sɩ-n fʋɔr fɛr ka gɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ sɩ-n 'lɛnɩ thakɛ paar fɛʋ.
Sa-n ƴaal sɩ vɔɔ fa', gɛr gɩ sɩ-n bɩɛl fɛr pɛ sɩ nũu bɔɔ fɩɩʋ gɩrɛraakɛ sɩ hananɩ sɩ so far, gɩdonɩ tɩɩ bʋɔ fɩ do.
Sɩ yɩrɛ kuunikɛ dɩɩ do khaakhaardaar gɩ; ɔr n ɩrɛna nyanyaanɛ Juifisɔra fɛʋ thɩɩra ɓibi, ɔr dʋɔn dakha kɔ̃tɩn wɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ Najarɛtɩdara awɩ ƴɛra kpɩɩ.
Dɩ a kɔɔ ƴaalɛlakɛ dakha a ƴɔ̃ƴɔ̃ɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, gɛr gɩ dɩ sɩ fʋʋ. [Dɩ sɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛla sɩ kɩɩlnaa mɔ̃ asɩ jɔfʋ hanɩ.
Sɩ Lɩjɩasɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ pɔr a taa sar na fãga,
sa so ɔɔ so pɛdarara wɩ ɩna afɩ ƴɛra. Fɩ punone bule kuunikɛra dɩbara a jɩɩ jɩ gɩrɛra dɔnɩ kɩrʋ dɩ sɩ pɩɛraa sor.
Dɩ Juifisɔ kɔɔ ture so pɛrɛɛle aa: Mɛna gɩ ha.
Dɩ gobanɛr 'laa Polla nyɔ̃ɔ a mɩa, dɩ Pol sʋʋraa: Mɩ jɩrɛ dɩ fɛr dʋɔn so kɩɩldaar ga caraakɛ yɛna jɔɔ; gɛr gɩ mɩ hananɛ 'lar a na mɩɩna ɩ̃ so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ thɩmɩɩ afɩ ƴɛra.
Jaalɩkɛ mɩ kɔɔ jalnɩ Jerujalɛm a fʋɔr Thãgba, ga ka wire yʋɔr yenyɔa', fɩ punone a jɩ gɩ.
Sɩ wa kɔɔ yɩ mɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna dɩ ma-n bana thɩ̃ banaa na tibilə', dɩ wa yɩ mɩ wo dɩ ɩ̃ bɛɛ tibil jɔ Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔnanɔ, dɩ le dɩɩra ga.
Gɩrɛ dɔnɩ kɩrʋ wɩ pɛ marnɩ sor gɩrɛ, wa puno na ti kɩrʋ kpɩɩrakɛ a na nɩna fa'.
Ma mʋ̃ fara', asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ Thãgba mɩ-n fʋɔr, dɩ ma-n kpana Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ sõso hʋɛ, a pɛrna haar gɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ kherenenɩ Mʋɩjɩɩ jɔfʋra na Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔ sɛbɛra.
Dɩ mɩ hananɛ nũ pɛrɛ Thãgbara mɔ̃kɛ wɛr thɛthɛ hana gɩnɩ wer, dɩ tɩɩ sara na wɩrɛ na sarana' na ɩɩrɛ na the khirera.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ma-n do bʋɔ bɔɔ fɛʋ, dɩ ma-n hana kpɩɛrnɔɔkɛ na heene mɩnɩ sor Thãgbaa ƴɛra dɩ tɩbɩlala ga.
Yɛna jɔɔ kɔɔ kar sɩ ma kɔɔ jal Jerujalɛma', sɩ bubul mũsumo mɩ gba jalna a ha ɩ̃ too sa ji bonɩɛ Thãgbara.
Dɩ thale wɩ yɩ mɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ phʋɔlnɩ pɩ, sɩ ga do tɩɩ jɔ wɩ kɔɔ yɩna ma', dɩ khʋ̃ɛ na kɔɔ hale dakha woa'.
Ɩkha Juifisɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Ajɩ, wɛr teana wɩ jɩlɛ afɩ ƴɛra a pɛ mar sor, ado wɩ hana mɛr sor.
A mɛ̃ gaa, wɛr n sɔ dɩbara gɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ yɩnɩ dɩɩ do dɩ paar, ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ jɩɩlnɩ so gʋʋrdaraa ƴɛra,
saagado huleneekɛ dɩbara mɩ kɔɔ huleni awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn ayɩ, khi ɩɩrɛ dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ wa-n kɩɩlna mɩ afɩ ƴɛra gɩrɛ nĩ gaaga.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ Felɩsɩ jɩɛ jɩ bɔɔbɔɔ mɔ̃ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋra n mɩɩnɩ, a so warɛ wɩ tɔɔ, a Lɩjɩasɩ sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋ ɩ̃ gɛr ɩna gʋʋrɔ awɩ so.
Dɩ a sor sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩna a na-n hɩnɛ Pol sɩ a hanaa hʋɛ, dɩ a na-n pɩɛr dakha ɔɔ too wa-n pɔ a na buluu na thɩ̃aa ga.
A wire gbe kɔɔ ka, Felɩsɩ pɔr nakha ɔɔ khɛr Durusilikɛ dɔnɩ Juifi, a thɔ̃ a we Pol dɩ pɔ a mɩɩ ha pɛrɛɛkɛ tibil na hananɩ Jeju Kirisitira, dɩ wɩ pɛ nũu.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ Pol n mɩɩnɩ fɩl sardaa, na dɩbara fʋdaa, na Thãgbaa kɩɩlɩkɛ na ɩnanɩ, maar fʋrɛ Felɩsɩ dɩ so aa: Kɔna mɛ̃ nɛnɛ̃; a mɩ yɩ hʋɛ, ma bire na we fɩ.
A-n kpɩɛrɛra Pol na ha nɛr war, gɛr gɩ dɩ thɔ̃ tɔ̃tɔ̃tɔ̃ dɩ wɩɩ dɩ wa-n khʋɛ kha.
Sɩ a yɛna yenyɔ ka pɩ, Pɔrsiyusi Fɛsɩtusi kɔɔ deere Felɩsɩ. Sɩ gɩdonɩ Felɩsɩ ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n da Juifisɔ haar, gɛr gɩ dɩ sɩrɔ Pol le khaɩra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Fɛsɩtusi danɩ le, balãther a cɔ sa the le Sejare a jal Jerujalɛm.
Dɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ na Juifi kɔ̃tɩna gbaar Polɩda a mɩgʋʋ sa phʋʋr Fɛsɩtusi,
a jɛ wɩ bʋɔra sa cʋɛ Pol a pɔ Jerujalɛm; sɩ jaa wɩ gbɛbɩrɛ pɩ sa nʋɔ hʋɛra wɩ kʋʋ.
Sɩ Fɛsɩtusi birse, Pol hale khaɩra Sejare, dɩ ɩnɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ na birə na jal dɔdɔ.
Dɔ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩna anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn n jal kha na mɛrɛ, dɩ ado dɩkhaa thɩ̃ puu kuunile cʋʋ, nɩ pɩɛraa sor.
Sɩ Fɛsɩtusi toore Jerujalɛm wire makõther wire yʋɔrsɔ dɩbara, sa gba jal Sejare. Dɩ dɩɩ wɩl dɩ too ɔɔ kɩɩl too pa sa yɩ, wɩ kpa Pol a pɔna.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a danɩ, Juifisɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Jerujalɛm diirəəre dɩ wa-n pɩɛraa sɔ bərəəm dɩɩ puuro ka. Sɩ ga do wɩ-n marɛ wo dɩ wɩ jɩɩ mɩɩ dɩ sobɔr n yɩra'.
Dɩ Pol fʋrɛ ɔɔ so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ thɩmɩɩ ayɩ: Ma dɩ Juifisɔɔ jɔfʋra ga, dɩ ma dɩ dakha Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna ga, dɩ Sejaar fãgadaar kɔ̃tɩɩna gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ da'.
Dɩ Fɛsɩtusiikɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ a da Juifisɔ haar birsere Pol: Fa ture na jal Jerujalɛm dɩ wa kɩɩlna fɩ le ɩ̃ ƴɛra ya?
Dɩ Pol birsee: Mɩ jɩɩlɛ Sejaarɩ kɩɩl pa, le gɩ teena wɩ kɩɩlna mɩ. Ma dɩ Juifisɔra thɩ̃ bɩɛlla ga, fɛrɛ yɛrɛrakɛ fɩ jɩ gɛr bɔɔbɔɔbɔɔ.

Ado mɩ cʋʋrɛ dɩkhaa puu, dɩ a dɩkhaa sopugo gɩɩkɛ teananɩ khir ma bo na yɩ ma khəə ga; sɩ ado sorɩkɛra wɩ-n pɛ marnɩ na do sobɔra', tibil na hana hʋɛ a na fʋ mɩ na ha wa'; foo thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ n dã Sejaarɩ pa.
Le Fɛsɩtusi gʋʋr kha na so gʋʋrdara sa so: Sejaarɩ iikɛ fɩ wenɩ, Sejaarɩ pa fa jal.
A wire gbe kɔɔ ka, Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar na Berenɩsɩ pɔr le Sejare wɩ fʋɔr Fɛsɩtusi.
Sɩ mɔ̃ wɩ toonɩ le a na pʋɔr gbe, Fɛsɩtusi gbaar Polɩda a mɩɛ fãgadaarra a so aa: Kũu bɩɛl hakɛ Felɩsɩ faanɩ khaɩra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ hanɩ Jerujalɛm, bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnasɔ nakha Juifi kɔ̃tɩnasɔ kɔɔ pɩɛraarɛ sor sa bɩɛl mɩ ɩ̃ heenee sor.
Sɩ mɩ kɔɔ so warɛ Rɔmɛ̃sɔ na mɩlna tibil gba 'laarɛ, sɩɩ do wa haa hʋɛ dɩ jɩɩl wɩrɛ n pɩɛraanɩ sorɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn na so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛɛkɛ a na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɩ gɩrɛraakɛra wɩ pɩɛraanɩ sor ɓoaa ga.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ ɩ̃ kha na mɛrɛ; ma kɔɔ pʋɔra', sɩ ga dɩ wɩlla mɩ kɔɔ toore kɩɩl paar sa yɩ wɩ kpa kuunilera a ɛna.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩrɛɛkɛra n pɩɛraanɩ sor kɔɔ pɔnɩ, wa kɔɔ pɩɛraa ga so puu caakɛ mɩ kɔɔ pɛrnɩ haar gɛr wa pɩɛraa ga.
Sɩ wɩ kɔɔ hananɛ sor dɩɩ do awɩ Thãgba fʋɔrda gɩ-n hɩɩn dɩbara dɔrɔɔm, na tibil bɩɛllaakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jejuukɛ kɔɔ khenɩ, sɩ dɩ Polla n so dɩ yɩ aa: Gel, a hananɛ yire.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ ma jɩɩ jɩ mɔ̃ ma 'lonɩ ga so caala', mɩ kɔɔ bulele Pol ado a na ture na jal Jerujalɛm dɩ wa kɩɩlnaa le ga soolera.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ Pol wer Sejaarɩ i, a ƴaal wɩ sɛ nar ɔr fãgadaar kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ n gʋʋr ɩnɩ so, dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so wa-n bɛraa phaphapha ɩ̃ thɔnaa Sejaarɩ para.
Dɩ Agɩrɩpa so Fɛsɩtusira: Mɛrɛ dakha, mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ pɛ kuunilee thɩmɩɩra nũu. Dɩ Fɛsɩtusi birsee: Cʋɔ fa nɩɛrɛ ɔɔ nɔ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ dɩɩ wɩl dɩ Agɩrɩpa na Berenɩsɩ pɔ dakpɛ pʋɔ, a lõ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩ cʋɔrɔ na sɔrasɛɛ sɛfʋsɔ na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ dɩɩra. Dɩ Fɛsɩtusi so wɩ kpa Pol a pɔna.
Le Fɛsɩtusi so aa: Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar, na nɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩkɛ gɩrɛ na sɛrɛ, nɩ yɩrɛ kuunikɛ Juifisɔ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ Jerujalɛm na kɛkɛdara bɩɛl mɩnɩ dɩ wa-n hulena: Ga teena a hana yire bã.
Ado mɛrra gɩ, mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ do aa cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ teananɩ khirə', sɩ gɩdonɩ ɔɔ thɛthɛ wɛ Sejaarɩ i, mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ bɔr dɩ a na jal le.

Ma jɩɩ jɩ bɔɔbɔɔ gɩrɛɛkɛ ma kherenɩ ɔɔdarara a na ha fãgadaar kɔ̃tɩ̃a'. Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ɩ̃ kpaa ɩna anɩ ƴɛra, sɩ caca afɩ ƴɛra, fɛr Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar, dɩ mɛ̃ ma jɩ gɩrɛ ma kherenɩ ado fɩ gʋʋr ɔɔda a hɩɩn.
Gɩdonɩ, ado mɛrra gɩ, ga tee kha a mɩ thɔna Sejaarra khaɩdaar sɩ ma so sorɩkɛ wɩ pɩɛraanaa ga.
Dɩ Agɩrɩpa so Polla: Wɩ ha fɛr hʋɛ dɩ fa mɩɩ afɩ so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ ɩhɩmɩɩ. Dɩ Pol 'laa nyɔ̃ɔ da-n mɩɩ ɔɔ so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ thɩmɩɩ thaa ayɩ:
Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar, mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ do ɩ̃ nɔbɔ gɩ dɩ ma-n kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ na hɛl afɩ ƴɛra nĩ ɩ̃ so fɛʋʋkɛra Juifisɔ pɛ marnɩ gɩrɛ,
gɩdonɩ fɩ jɩɛ jɩ bɔɔbɔɔbɔɔ Juifisɔɔ mama fɩl fɛʋ na awɩ thɩ̃ banasɔ; gɛr gɩ mɩ-n bɩɛl fɛr dɩ fa pɛ mɩ nũu na ha fʋrɛ.
A fʋna caca fʋ paar ɩ̃ daɓol dĩi bɔɔ, Juifisɔ fɛʋ jɩrɛ mɔ̃ ɩ̃ fɩl hanɩ gɩdonɩ Jerũjalɛm mɩ kɔɔ ha ɩ̃ caa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Wɩ kɔɔ mãa jɩ mar kɛkɛkɛ, ado wɩ-n ƴaalɛ wɩ so sobɔr, dɩ mɛr dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ hananɩ jɔfʋ bʋ dʋ fɩlɛ a ɓã wɛkɛra hanɩ awɩ ƴɛra kpɩɩ, kɛ n jɩɛnnɩ hɩɩn bɔɔbɔɔ asɩ Thãgba fʋɔr fɩl.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ wɩ-n kɩɩlna mɛr gɩrɛ, gɩdonɩ mɩ hananɛ nũ pɛrɛ ʋlfɛrɛraakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanɩ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ,
ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ asɩ ca ƴʋɔr yenyɔ n yɩrrɔnɩ dɩ wa-n fʋɔr Thãgba dɩtɩnɔ na dɩwɩlʋ, dɩ wa-n pɩɛrna mɔ̃ ʋlfɛrɛɛlera na danɩ na ha oti. Fãgadaar, ga nũ pɛɛlera dɔ kɩrʋ Juifisɔ pɛ marnɩ sor gɩrɛ.
Mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ na-n pɛr haar dɩ Thãgba na cʋʋrɛ khe dɩ wa ɩɩr na the khirera ga?
Ado mɛrra kɔɔ gɩ, mɩ kɔɔ kpɩɛrɛ sa bãba a cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ gɩ kʋɛara Najarɛtɩ Jejuu i.
Thale mɩ kɔɔ cʋʋ Jerujalɛm. Mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ khaanɛ tɩɩ phuusɔ jɔɔ khaɩra, gɩdonɩ mɛ̃ mɩ kɔɔ bɩɛl hʋɛ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩnaa pa; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ yɩnɩ wɩ kʋrɛ wɩ, mɩ kɔɔ ture ayɩ: Gɩ hana mɛ̃.
Mɩ-n kɔɔ heen wer sor Juifisɔɔ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔra bɔɔ fɛʋ, dɩ ma-n yɩrna wɩ wɩ kʋɛa Jejuu i. Sɩ gɩdonɩ nɩ̃khii thʋnɛ ka mɩ, mɩ-n kɔɔ kpoo warɛ na wɩrɛ hanɩ bə̃ kpɩɩrarakɛ.
Gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ mɩ-n kɔɔ jaalnɩ Damasɩ, gɩdonɩ bonɩ jidaar kɔ̃tɩna kɔɔ ha mɛr hʋɛ.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ mɩ hanɩ hʋɛra, fãgadaar, ʋlkhɔɔ gɩ kɔɔ do, dɩ dahɩrɛ kɔɔ ther ƴũ a thʋ̃ carã a jɔ wi hɩrɛrɛ, a dii mar na wɩrɛ sɩ-n kɔɔ jalnanɩ kha.
Dɩ sɩ jiir fɛʋ thʋnɔ sɩ dɩ ɩ̃ nɩɛ wire dɩɩ so mar na ebirə thɩmɩɩr ayɩ: Sɔl, Sɔl, mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ fa-n kpoo mar mɛna? Dɩbara fɩ-n cʋʋ puure mɔ̃ na na-n banɩ na gɔdaa na nɔɔ.
Dɩ ɩ̃ birsee: Kɔ̃tɩn, fɛr amɛ gɩ? Dɩ Kɔ̃tɩn so: Mɛr dʋɔn Jejuukɛ fɩ-n kpooronɩ.
Sɩ ɩrɛ jɩlɛ. Mɛr gbaan dɩbara a nɩna fɩ. Mɩ thɩɩn fɛr fɩ do ɩ̃ thɔ̃daar na ɩ̃ sobɔ so jɩdaar gɩrɛraakɛ fɩ yɩnɩ mɛrɛra, na gɩrɛraakɛra fa yɩnɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ma birni na gba dɩbara a na nɩna fɩ wo.
Dɩ ma taa fɛr tɩbɩlaakɛɛ nyɔ̃kɔɔ na ca kpalaa nyɔ̃kɔɔ kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ ma thɔ̃ farnɩ,

fɩ khɛr wɩ yinə, wɩ the dabirəra wɩ lõ dahɩrɛra, wɩ the Satãa fãgara wɩ kɛr wɩ pɛ Thãgba haar, wɩ 'lɛ sopugo faarɛ na awɩdaakɛ wa hɩnɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgba leenɩ kpɩɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn ha pɛrɛraakɛ wa hananɩ mɛrɛra.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ, Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar, ma kɔɔ nʋʋr nũu thɩ̃ yɩrraale thɛnɩ Thãgbaa pa ga.
Sɩ Damasɩdara mɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ ɓo, agɩpɩ dɩ ɩ̃ mɩɩ Jerujalɛmdara na Judedara fɛʋ nakha ca kpala, wɩ deba haar sa kɛra na kpa Thãgbara, a cʋɛ dakha thɔmaakɛ na nɛnanɩ dɩ wɩ debire haar.
Gelela dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ Juifisɔ kɔɔ fʋ mɩ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩnɔ a yɩrna mɩna wɩ kʋ.
Sɩ Thãgba taa mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ hana yire a dana nĩkɛ, dɩ ma-n mɩɩ sobɔ so jɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ tɩɩ mɔlɔsɔra na tɩɩ kɔ̃tɩnana, sɩ ma-n golõ thɩ̃ bɩɛllaakɛrakɛ Thãgbaa bobona na Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sonɩ ayɩ ga daana';
gɛr dɔ mɔ̃ Kirisiti na gaarnɩ bʋɔ sɩ na do cacadaarɩkɛ na kɔɔ ɩrɛnɩ na the khirera a na mɩɩ dahɩrɛɛda Juifisɔra na ca kpalala.
Mɔ̃kɛ Pol n mɩɩnɩ ɔɔ so hɛl kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ thɩmɩɩ thakɛ, Fɛsɩtusi sor na nɔ kheu aa: Pol, yʋʋ kʋɛa fɩ, afɩ jɩ jɔjɔra kʋɛa fɩ yʋʋ.
Dɩ Pol birsee: Fɛr, Fɛsɩtusi bʋɔ, yʋʋ na kʋɛ ma', sobɔ thɩmɩɩr na yʋ bɔ thɩmɩɩr mɩ ka ma-n mɩɩ.
Mɩ mɩɩrɛ Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar na 'lar gɩdonɩ a jɩrɛ ga thɩ̃sɔɔle; gɩdonɩ mɩ jɩrɛ dɩ thɩ̃ bɩɛl na hale aa jɩnaa ga, gɩdonɩ ga do gelela kɔɔ wolone dã ga.
Fɩ pɛrɛ Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔ thɩmɩɩ haar ya, Agɩrɩpa fãgadaar? Mɩ jɩrɛ fɩ pɛrɛ haar.
Dɩ Agɩrɩpa so Polla: Gɩ do fɩ yɩrna mɛr bɔɔ gberaakɛ dɩ ɩ̃ do Kirisitiida bɛɛ?
Dɩ Pol birsee: A nɛnɛ̃ gɩ, a dɩkhõo gɩ yoo, mɩ-n bɩɛlɛ Thãgba dɩ ga-n do fɛrɛ dɩbara ga, sɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n pɛ mɩnɩ nũu nĩ n deba a hana mɔ mɩ hanɩ, sɩ jɔrkɔ lir na-n hala'.
Dɩ fãgadaar, na gobanɛr, na Berenɩsɩ, na wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ tɔɔna wɩnɩ ɩɩr
a thɩɩr dɩ wa-n mɩɩ khasɔ aa: Sa yɩ kuunnaakɛ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ a cʋʋnɩ dɩɩ teena khir agɩbo khaɩ pɛra'.
Dɩ Agɩrɩpa so Fɛsɩtusira: Wɩ kɔɔ punone faa kuunikɛ adora aa kɔɔ we Sejaarɩ iə'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ gʋʋrnɩ sa yɩ sɩ lona bato a jala Ɩtalɩ, wɩ gbaar Pol na wɩ̃ khaɩdara a pɛ Juliyusii nyɔ̃kɔɔ; ɔr dɔ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ Ogusitii sɔrasɩsɔra.
Sɩ kɔɔ gbaar batookɛ thɛnɩ Adɩramɩtɩ da-n jal dɩɩraakɛ hanɩ Ajɩ lanyɔ̃ gẽgerena; dɩ mɛ̃ sɩ lõ jal, sɩ Arɩsɩtarkɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ Masedʋandaar, kɛ thɛnɩ Tesalonɩkɩ sɩ kɔɔ hana kha.
Dɩ dɩɩ na wɩl dɩɩ do sɩ daan Sɩdɔ̃. Juliyusiikɛ n hɩnɛnɩ Pol na fɩl bʋɔ kɔɔ haarɛ hʋɛ dɩ jal ɔɔ kuunsɔɔ pa wɩ buluu.
Dɩ sɩ the le a gba bato a kana Sɩpɩr yɔ dɩ gɛlʋ, gɩdonɩ jɩɛ thʋnɛ telẽ sɩ ka.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ ɩɩrnɩ lanyʋɔnɩkɛ n celanɩ da-n pɛ Silisi na Pãfɩlɩ dɩɩra, sɩ kɔɔ daan Mɩraakɛ dɔnɩ Lisi dɩ bɩɛl.
Le sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ yɩ batookɛ thɛnɩ Alesãdɩɩrɩ da-n jal Ɩtalɩ dɩ sɩ lõ.
Sɩ kɔɔ jaal hɛlɛlɛ a cʋʋna wire jɔɔ; gɩ khɩɩ sarɛ ka dɩ sa lõ Kiniidi, gɩdonɩ jɩɛ na ha sɩ jalʋa'. Sɩ kɔɔ kananɛ tɩɛr Kɩrɛtɩ yɔ dɩɩ Salmɔn khʋra.
Mɛna gɩ khe sar dɩ sɩ fʋ gẽgerẽ nʋɔ phaphapha a jal dã paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Bopɔɔr, ka Laje dɩɩ wɔrɔnɩ.
Bɔ jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ kar sɩ dɩ jaal debi a puuro ka, gɩdonɩ bɔɔkɛ sopugo hɛl bonɩ ji bɔɔ kɔɔ kanɩ gɩ do. Gɛr gɩ dɩ Pol kpãkpãa war ayɩ:
Kona, mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩ asɩ jalla na nɩ sɛr na ka, dɩ ga dor thɩ̃ kʋɛrɛ na ka; ga do bato gɩ na thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hanɩle bɩnɔ dɩbara ga, sɩ asɩ thɛthɛrakɛ dakha.
Sɩ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ kɔɔ pɛr ʋrɛ n cananɩ bato na bato hɩ̃daarɩ thɩmɩɩ nũu, sa ka bo Polɩda.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ jɩɩl paarɩle na bɔr dɩ bato na tooro yʋʋrɔa', ɩkhasɔ jɔɔ sor: Sɩ thɛ le a dɔ bʋɔ a dana Fenɩsɩ, Kɩrɛtɩ bato jɩɩl pa ka 'weenenɩ gananɔ, dɩ le sa too yʋʋrɔ.
Sɩ jɩɛ kɔɔ ther wi phã paar nyɔ̃bɩlana da-n phʋ̃ fɛlɛlɛlɛ, dɩ wɩ ka jɩna ɩnɩ punone dɩbara, a ɩɩr hal bato fʋ ther a ti sɩ dɩɩ fʋ Kɩrɛtɩ yɔ dɩ gẽgerẽ nʋɔ dɩ ga-n jal.
Ga pʋɔra', sɩ jɛ kʋkʋʋlʋʋkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Erakɩlɔ̃ kɔɔ ɩɩrɛ yɔ dɩɩraale,
a gba bato dɩ ga-n jalna dɩ ga-n puno dɩɩ telẽ jɩɛ bã, gɛr gɩ dɩ sɩ faa bɔ dʋʋr dɩɩ gba sɩ a jalna.
Dɩ sɩ kana tɩɛr yɔ dɩ buurəəkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Kʋloda, ka sɩ 'lɛnɩ puɩɩone gbe, mɔ̃ gɩ nɩ sɩnɩ mɛna sɩ sɩ marrɛ bato buu a gba pɛ batora.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ khəini bato buu a pɛ batora, wɩ gbaar pɔ̃ɔ a parna bato dɩɩ ma. Gɩdonɩ maar fʋ wɛr dɩ agakpaana wa jaal na ti Sɩrtɩ gbalãkothɩnna, gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ ti jɛ kɩ̃kɩɩn. Thale jɩɛ kɔɔ gba wɩ a jalna.
Mɔ̃kɛ jɛkhureele n bɩɩr sɩnɩ na fãga mɛ̃, gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ tiir thɩ̃ɛ ga dɩ wɩlla a dʋʋrna lanyʋɔnɔ;
dɩ balãther wire, wɛr thɛthɛ gbaan bato thɩ̃ɛ na awɩ nyɛ̃ a dʋʋrna faa.
Wire na ƴepələ̃be na kɔɔ yɩr wi jɔjʋɔraala'; mɔ̃ jɛkhureele n be sɩnɩ na fãga mɛna sa-n kpɩɛr sa taarɛ 'lo bã.
Gɩ pʋɔrɛ sɩ tibil na kɔɔ kho dɩkora'. Le Pol ɩɩr awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn a jɩɩl a so war ayɩ: Kona, adora nɩ kɔɔ pɛr mɛr nũu ga dor sa kɔɔ the Kɩrɛtɩ yɔ dɩɩra a na yɩ nɩ caakɛ na thɩ̃ kʋɛ caaka'.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ mɩ-n bɩɛl nɛr, nɩ pɩɛr 'lar gɩdonɩ tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛra na buə', sɩ bato dɩbara na kʋɛa.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaakɛ hɩna mɩnɩ dɩ ma-n dʋʋraa thɔma, ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ the marɛ dɩtɩnɔɔkɛ
a so mar ayɩ: Pol; aa, ma-n do maar n fʋ ma', dɔ ɩ̃ jal ɩ̃ jɩɩl Sejaarɩ ƴɛra aa, sɩ ɩ̃ hɩnɛ, Thãgba ha mɛr wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ batoraakɛ na mɛrɛ.
Gɛr gɩ kona, nɩ pɩɛr 'lar gɩdonɩ mɩ hananɛ tu jɩɩr Thãgbaa pa dɩ ga har mɔna a so marnɩ.
Sɩ jɩɛ wer na gba sɛr na jalna yɔ dɩ bɩɛlla.
Dɩtɩnɛ yʋɔr yenãdaara ɔbɔɔle sɩ-n kpaar bababa Adɩrɩatɩkɩ lanyʋɔnɔ, dɩnɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn batodara ka jɩna sɩ-n wɔrɔnɛ thɩɩ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ mɩɛ yɔ hulone a hɩɩn na pɔ̃ɔkɛ wɩ linəni ther a yɩɛ dɩɩ thɔɔ mɛtɛrɛ kpalanyɔ; a wɩ jal gbe wo, wɩ bire mɩɛ yɔ hulone a hɩɩn a yɩɛ dɩɩ thɔɔ mɛtɛrɛ kpelẽ yʋɔr.
Sɩ maar fʋ wɛr agakpaana bato na thʋrɛ bokaar, gɛr gɩ dɩ wɩ dʋna bato fʋ thɛ yenã bato sɩkaar, gɩ fɔ bato gɩ jɩɩl sɩ wa-n jɩ ʋmɔ̃ bɔɔ dɩɩ na wɩlna'.
Sɩ batodara kɔɔ ƴaalɛ wɩ faa bato sɩ wɩ caalɛ a gba bato buu a kpɛɛ nyʋɔnɔ, sɩ jaa wɩ-n ƴaalɛ wɩ caalɛ sa cʋʋ dɩɩ ho wɩ yɛ, bato fʋ ther ɩnɩ-n kpɛɛ ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ gɩ fɔ bacto.
Dɩ Pol sor sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩna na sɔrasɛsɔra ayɩ: Ado tibil yɩrɛ na too kɛ bato bɩnɔa', na puno na yɩ taa paara'.
Le sɔrasɛ kuur pɛ̃ɛkɛ fɔnɩ bato buu a faa dɩɩ ji nyʋɔnɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ n thɔɔnɩ wɩllɛ, Pol sor tɩbɩlala fɛʋ ayɩ wɩ khɔ dɩkor; a so warɛ wo: Wire yʋɔr yenã ha gɩrɛ nĩ nɩ toonɩ pɩɛrɔ a bona dɩkor.
Gɛr gɩ mɩ-n phʋʋr nɛr, nɩ khɔ dɩkor gɩdonɩ gɛr na bulo ni dɩ na taa, gɩdonɩ tibil bɩɛllakɛ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩnɩ yʋsũ na buə'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ a mɩɩnɩ thale pɩ, gɛr a gbaar buru a bɩɛl Thãgba a pɛr wɛr fɛʋʋ ƴɛra; agɩpɩ dɩ kur a ma da-n kho.
Dɩ fɛʋ kɔɔ pɛrɛ 'lar a kho wer oti.
Sɛrkɛ fɛʋ kɔɔ hanɩ bato bɩnɔɔle, sɩ kɔɔ har taanyɔ na kpalãther yʋɔr maadõ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ khonɩ dɩkor a hi, wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋrɛ bato dɩɩ haba, gɩdonɩ wɩ dʋʋrnanɛ bile lanyʋɔnɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩɩ wɩlnɩ, wa kɔɔ jɩ bəən bã, sɩ wɩ kɔɔ 'laarɛ yɩ paarɩkɛ nyʋɔn n lonanɩ thɩɩra, kɛ na dɔnɩ dahulõ paara'; dɩ wɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n tɔna bato a jalana le ado ɩna punone.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ thʋbɩrɛ bato fʋ thɛ a faa dɩɩ jal lanyʋɔnɔ, dɩ wɩ thʋbɩrɛ pɛ̃ɛkɛ wɩ kɔɔ gbanɩ a linə bato thɔɔdaasɔ, sa khəi ƴɛbʋ kɩ̃kɩɩn a pɛr jɩɛ batora gɩ gba bato gɩ jalna gɩ dana gẽgerẽ nʋɔra.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ danɩ kãkɛ lanyʋɔn n caannɩ dɩ a-n be kha, bato kɔɔ thʋnɔnɛ sa gɔ gbalãkothɩnna dɩ mɩ̃kaar mar kĩkĩkĩ ga-n tutugə'; sɩ sɩkaar ma dɩ a-n kʋɛ, nyʋɔn n cɩr gɩnɩ mɛna.
Dɩ sɔrasɛsɔ ƴaalɛ wɩ kʋʋr khaɩdara, gɩdonɩ wɩ kpɩɛrɛ ʋkha na pher na fuu.
Sɩ sɔrasɛ tamaa kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ ƴaalɛnɩ a taa Pol a pɩɛr wɛr wa-n cʋa'. Dɩ a so warɛ ayɩ: Wɩrɛ jɛnɩ phɩɩr, wɛr n kɔɔ je nyʋɔnɔ caca a phɛ thɛ;
sɩ wɩrɛ sɛnɩ n fɔ thɩra, agɩbo wɩ fʋ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hanɩ batora wa-n phe; mɛ̃ wɛr fɛʋ dã thɩɩ pɔlpɔlpɔl.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ taanɩ pɩ, gɛr sɩ jɩrɔ dɩɩ do yɔ dɩɩlera wɩ-n we Maltɩ.
Dɩdaraale kɔɔ dona sɛr bʋɔ ka; wɩ kɔɔ kpa sɛr fɛʋ dɩ sɩ ɩɩr dɔ jɔjʋɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ gbɔɔnɩ, gɩdonɩ thãgba n daan dɩ ɩɩr thʋ̃ kar.
Dɩ Pol kɔɔ paalɛ sɔ̃sʋɔnɛ a pɛ dɔɔ, dɩ dɔ kporre tire dɔ̃phaanʋ dɩ the a maa nyɔ̃ɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ dɩdaraale yɩnɩ siile dɩ juu nyɔɔna, wɩ-n mɩɩrɛ kha bɩɛlbɩɛl aa: Sobɔr gɩ, kuunikɛ tɩɩ kʋ gɩ, a taarɛ lanyʋɔnna wer pɩ, sɩ thãgbaakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ dasarʋ na sɩɩraa da la'.
Sɩ Pol jɛbɩrɛ siile dɔɔra sɩ aa kɔɔ nɩ khoo fɩɩʋraka'.
Dɩ tɩbɩlaale n pɩɛrɛ mɔ̃ ga bʋnɩna, agɩbo mɔ̃ a na təəni na ji na khi dapaara; sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ pɩɛrnɩ ƴɛrr sɩ wa yɩ thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ puurəə ga, wɩ debire kpɩɛrɛ wo a so aa: Dɩ thãgba haarakaa ya?
Kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl hale ga yɔ dɩraalera dɩ wa-n wɩɩ Pubiliyusi a hana lɩɛ; ɔr tea sɩ na fɩl bʋɔ dɩ sɩ too ɔɔ cɔ wire yẽther;
sɩ khoo kɔɔ fʋrɛ Pubiliyusii thɩ, tomɩ kporre gɩ na khʋɔnɛ. Dɩ Pol lõ a yɩɩ a dɛɛnaa nyɛ̃ɛ sa bɩɛl Thãgba a pɩɛraa dɩ kpɛɛ.
A gele ka pɩ, wɩ̃ khodaarsɔɔkɛ hanɩ yɔ dɩɩraale pɔr a kpɛɛ awɩ khosɔ.
Wɩ-n cʋ sɛr dɩɩ pho ka, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ-n thenɩ le wɩ kɔɔ ha sɛr gɩrɛɛkɛ n ɓɔra sɩnɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ toonɩ le dɩ pora yẽther ka, sɩ lʋʋn batookɛ wɩ-n wenɩ thãgba bi ƴɔna, kɛ thɛnɩ Alesãdɩɩrɩ, kɛ kɔɔ tɔɔnɩ le yɔ dɩɩraale yʋʋrɔ.
Mɔ̃ sɩ danɩ Sɩrakusi, sɩ kɔɔ toore le wire yẽther.
Dɩ le sɩ kɔɔ jalna gẽgerẽ nʋɔ a dã Rejiyo. A ga dɩ wɩl, jɩɛ kɔɔ ther wi phã paar nyɔ̃bɩlana a gba sɩ, dɩ ga cʋʋ wire yenyɔ dɩɩ do sɩ daan dapaara Pujɔl,
kãkɛ sɩ kɔɔ yɩnɩ omɩna, dɩ wɩ bɩɛl sɩ sɩ tɔɔ le a cʋɛ wire makonyɔ. Thale sɩ kɔɔ dã Rɔm.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ omɩna nɩɛnɩ dɩ sɩ har hʋɛra, wɩ kɔɔ caan sɛr paarsɔɔkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Apiyusi ƴatɛ na Kpakpal cɔna yẽther; dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Pol hanɩ na yɩ wɩ a pɛrɛ 'lar sa khɩɩ Thãgba.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ danɩ Rɔm, wɩ har Pol hʋɛ a na-n cɔ dɩbara na sɔrasɩ bɩɛlɩkɛ n hɩnɛɛnɩ.

A wire yẽther ka, Pol wer Juifi kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ gbɛbɩnɩ kha a so warɛ thɩmɩaakɛ ayɩwɔɔ: Omɩna, ma kɔɔ cʋʋ tɩbɩla puurə', dɩ ma dɩ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ fɩlla woa', sɩ wɩ kɔɔ fʋ mɛr a to khaɩra Jerujalɛm sa gba mɩ ha Rɔmɛ̃sɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ bule mini thɩ̃ɛ pɩ, wɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛla wɩ faa mɩ gɩdonɩ wa yɩ mar thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ teananɩ khirə'.
Sɩ Juifisɔ n kɔɔ yɩrna mɛr dɩ ɩ̃ tha thʋnɔ sa yɩ: Foo dɩ thɩmɩɩrra Sejaarɩ pa ga dã, sɩrakɛ ga do sor mɩ hana dɩ ma-n pɛ ɩ̃ cara ga.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ɩ̃ we nɩ ɩ̃ mɩɛ nɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ, gɩdonɩ Ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsanaa nũ pɛ dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ wɩ li mi na jɔrkɔɔkɛ.
Dɩ wɩ birsee: Sa kɔɔ 'lɛ sɛbɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ Jude dɩɩra afɩ sora ga, dɩ omine gɩ a gba fɩ ɩna kɛ a mɩɩ thɩmɩɩ puu a pɛ fara'.
Sɩ sɩ-n ƴaalɛ sɩ nɩ afɩ nɔ sɩ jɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ fɩ-n kpɩɛrnɩ, gɩdonɩ sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ paar fɛʋ tɩbɩla n kɛ̃kɛrɛnanɛ dɩɩr caakɛra hanɩ kpɩɩ.

Dɩ wɩ dʋrɛ wire dɩ tɩbɩla jɔɔ pɔ ka a-n cɔnɩ a ƴɩɩ. Dɩ Pol mɩɩ wɛr Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda dɩ wɩ hɩɩn, a mɩɩna wɛr sobɔ so jɩ thɩmɩɩr a gbana Mʋɩjɩɩ jɔfʋ na Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔda dɩ yɩrna da-n mɩɛ wɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Jejuuda. Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ toore kha duuro a dana dʋɔrɔ.
Dɩ ɩkhasɔ n ture gɩrɛɛkɛ a sonɩ, sɩ ɩkhasɔ na-n tuə'.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ nʋɔ na-n mãkha wɩnɩ kha ga dɩ wa-n bɩlã, Pol so warɛ thakɛ dɩbara ayɩ: Gɩrɛɛkɛra Thu Phuu kɔɔ gbanɩ Ejaɩ Thãgbaa bobonɩ nɔ a mɩɩna anɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ, dor sobɔr waa gel ayɩ:
“Jala tɩbɩlaakɛɛ pa a sɔ war ayɛ: Na-n nɩɛrɛ na anɩ nũ wer bɔɔbɔɔ, sɩ na jɩ kɩrʋa'; na-n hɩɩnɛ na anɩ yi wer bɔɔbɔɔ, sɩ na yɩ ga.
Gɩdonɩ tɩbɩlaakɛɛ ha dibire; wɩ sɔbɩrɛ awɩ nũ ka, a khaan dakha awɩ yi, a mɛ̃ gaa, ga hor wa yɩ gɛr na awɩ yi, a na nɩɛna awɩ nũ, a na jɩna kɩrʋ, a na kɛr na bir mar dɩ mɛr Thãgba na kpɛɛ wɩ.”
Gɛr gɩ nɩ jɛna, dɩ Thãgbaa taakɛ ca kpalala a thɔna, dɩ wɛr na pɩɛn nũu.
[Ɔbɔɔkɛ a sonɩ gele, Juifisɔ n kʋɔn na thɩ̃ banaa jɔjʋɔ awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn.]
Sɩ Pol toore yɛna yenyɔ biləni cʋɔrraakɛ a-n lɩmɩnɩ; a-n teere wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n pʋɔnnɩ dɩ wa-n yɩɩ,
da-n mɩɩna war Thãgbaa fãgadaar doda, da-n dɩɩrna gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩnɩda na 'lar, sɩ tibil na-n pɩɛrʋa'.
Mɛr Polɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃daar thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ; Thãgba kɔɔ wɛ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ do thɔ̃thɔn, dɩ thɩɩn mɩ kpɩɩ ma-n mɩa tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara.
Tutugo bʋɔɔkɛra dɔ gɩrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ maanɩ ʋlfɛrɛ dɩ ɩna thɔnanɛ, dɩ ɔɔ bobonasɔ kɔɔ gba a pɛr ɔɔ sɛbɛ phurə.
Dɩ ɔɔ Bikuunida gɩ mɩɩ; ado kʋɔnnaakɛ tibil kʋɔnɩ gɩ, gɛr a dʋʋr Davɩdɩɩ məl,
sɩ ado Thãgba dʋʋrra gɩ, na mɔ̃ a donɩ ʋrɛ phonɩ, khireraakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ɩɩrʋʋnɩ na fãga gɛr nɛna dɩ Thãgbaa Bikuun a do.
Jeju Kirisitiilera dɔnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃, ɔr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ Thãgba jɩ sɩ bʋɔra dɩ sɩ doro gɩrɛ thɔ̃thɔna, gɩ do nɔɔ sɩ gba ɔɔ i sɩ kpana tibil caar fɛʋ sɩ ɩna wɩ pɛr haar wa-n nɩ nũu.
Dɩ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ harrɛ ner, nɛrɛɛkɛ Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ wenɩ dɩ nɩ do ɔɔda.
Mɛr Pol thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ hanɩ Rɔm dɩɩra, kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ Thãgba n nanɩ a we wɩ dɩ wɩ do tibil phuusɔ. Thãgba asɩ Thɩ na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩn n hana nɩ ha ɩɩ, a jɛ nɩ dakha bʋɔra.
Caca thɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ Thãgba mɩ-n khɩɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋʋ sora dɩɩ do Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the, gɩrɛraakɛ wɩ-n mɩɩnɩ anɩ ha pɛda thɩɩraakɛ koo.
Thãgbaakɛ mɩ-n doronɩ thɔma na haar fɛʋ, ɔɔ Bikuuni tutugo bɔ thɩmɩɩra, torre yire mɔ̃ mɩ-n jɩna nɩnɩ
ɩ̃ Thãgba bɩɛlla wire fɛʋ, dɩ ma-n phʋʋrʋʋ ado a na ture na ha mɩ hʋɛ ɩ̃ pɔ dɩphãakɛ ɩ̃ yɩ nɩ.
Gɩdonɩ mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ka ɩ̃ yɩ nɩ, ɩ̃ ha nɩ dɩkhaa Thu Phuu khaarda nɩ 'lɛ fãga;
kɩrʋ dʋɔn gɩ do bul kha gɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ma hanɩ anɩ pa, anɩ ha pɛ n ha mɩ 'lar, ɩ̃da n ha nɩ 'lar oti.

Omɩna, ma-n ƴaal na-n jɩ mɔ̃ gɩrɛ hanaa ga; nɩ jɛ dɩ mɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ ƴaalƴaal ɩ̃ pɔ anɩ pa, sɩ thɩ̃ɛ kɔɔ pɩɛr mɛr a dana nɛnɛ̃kɛ dɩ ma kɔɔ yɩ hʋɛa'. Gɩrɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ dʋɔn ɩ̃ yɛ tɩbɩla wɩ pɛr Kirisiti haar anɩ pa, mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kɔɔ hanɩ ca kpɩɩsɔɔ pa.
Mɩ hananɛ wɩrɛ phuoni yire na wɩrɛ na phuoni yirə' helu, na wɩrɛ jɛnɩ sɛbɛ na wɩrɛ na jɛnɩ sɛba' dakha.
Gɛr gɩ mɩ-n ƴaalɛ na sobɔr ɩ̃ mɩɩ nɩ dakha tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ nɛrɛɛkɛ hanɩ Rɔm.
Gɩdonɩ yicuru na-n fʋ mι tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmɩɩra ga, Thãgbaa fãga gɩ a do taadaa tibil wo tibilləəkɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar, dɩ Juifisɔ wɛ cacaca agɩpɩ wɩrɛ na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa'.

Gɩdonɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ n nɛna mɔ̃ Thãgba na cʋʋnι dι sor na hɛl tιbιlala ɔɔ ƴɛra, dι ha pɛrɛra gι the fʋ paar a dana pιpιι paar, a ha mɔ̃kɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sonι ayι: “Ʋrɛ Thãgba hɛllɔnι sor dιι do ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ, ɔr na hana yire.”
Thãgba n nιnanɛ mɔ̃ a ιιrnanι nĩkhii le ƴũ dιι gbũ a heen Thagba so beesire, na puu cʋʋrɛɛkɛ tιbιla hananι a pιɛrna sobɔr ga-n yιra'.
Gιdonι gιrɛ tibil na jιnanι Thãgba gι yιr warɛ casι; Thãgba kɔɔ cʋɛ wι wι jɛ gι.
A fʋna bɔɔkɛ Thãgba tini thɩ̃ɛ, ɔɔ khorr fãga na ɔɔ Thãgba dookɛ na dɔnι dayιnana', gι yιrrɛ casι dι tibil na puno na yι gι, dι gι ther thιɛnaakɛ a tini, dι ga hana tibil n puno a yιrɔ phʋɔl paara'.
Mɔ̃ wι jιnιnakɛ Thãgba sι wa-n dʋbʋʋ mɔ̃ a donι Thãgba ga, dι wo wa-n fʋɔrʋa', sι awι kpιɛrnɔ debire a do mɔlɔ kpιɛrɛ, dι awι haakɛ dɔnι də̃bəəl haar gι birə warɛ.
Sι wι-n mιιrɛ mɔ̃ wa donι fιl jιna kpãkpalã ga, sιι do də̃bəəl yire wι debi do.

Thãgbaakɛ hιnanι i dʋbιrɛ, kɛ na dɔnι dakhinənəə fʋɔr wι ka bo, sι wa-n fʋɔr thιlaakɛ wι cʋʋnι dιι ho tibilikɛ dɔnι dakhinəne, dι wa-n fʋɔrna thιlaakɛ wι-n cʋʋnι dιι ho 'lominə, na nɛɛ yenã thɩ̃ɛ, na thɩ̃ ƴιrɛ n puuloneni.
Gɛrra dɔ kιrʋ dι Thãgba sι war le awι thɩ̃ bise cʋʋraakɛ n kɔ wιnι thue, dι mɛ̃ wι-n ƴɔ̃ƴɔ̃ɔ awι thɛthɛɛ tomι dιbara ʋ na ʋ.
Wɛr dɔ wιrɛ fenι Thãgbaa sobɔ dιι do sõsor, sι dι wι fʋɔr a na cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛ thɩ̃ tinənena sa ka faa thɩ̃ Tidaar, kɛ teananι khιιrɛ waa khorr. Amɛn.
Gɛrra dɔ kιrʋ dι Thãgba sι war le yicur thɩ̃ cʋʋ thueraakɛra n danι awι tomιra ka, dι awι khɛrsɔrakɛ thʋ̃ fi dι wa-n phɩ̃ kha khɛ haar, sι ga do thalee ti Thãgba kɔɔ ti khɛra'.

Mɛna gι ha dakha na kona, wι faarɛ mɔ̃ Thãgba tini kuun da cʋʋna khɛr, sι thue n fʋ ʋ̃ kuun na ʋ dιι ho ga hərə wer; dι wɛr kũu haar n bir gbãga na cʋʋ kha yicur thɩ̃ɛ, dι wι-n 'lɛr lιmιnɛɛkɛ teananι awι puu cʋʋra.
Dɩ mɔ̃ wa yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ teena dɩ wa hana Thãgba jɩɩra', Thãgba sɩ warɛ na awɩ kpɩɛr sɔna dɩ wa-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na teananι cʋʋra'.
Puu cʋʋ caar fɛʋ hi wer haarra, na kpallɛ, na ha pɩɛrɛ, na puu cʋʋrɛ; wɩ jɔrɛ gbugi ka, na tɩɩ kʋr, na kɩla, na fɩɩlɛ, na dakhaba cʋʋrɛ; wɩ dor lĩlirə,
na tɩɩ phiiledara, wɩ dor Thãgbaa lãlaardara, na tɩɩ nɩɩrdara, na i ƴaaldara, na nɔfa mɩɩdara, na sopugo pha cʋʋdara, na thɛ na nɛɛ nũ nʋʋrdara;
wa hana bɩ̃ kuurə', awɩ thɩmɩɩ na ha gbaarra ga, wa hana pərre dɩ wɩ jɩ tibil bʋɔra ga.

Sɩrakɛ wɩ jɩɛ jɩ dɩ Thãgba na kɩɩlnanɛ wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ ga thɩ̃sɔɔle, a jɩna dakha dɩ wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ ga thɩ̃sɔɔlera khir wɩ teena, sɩ ga do gɩdonɩ wɩ-n cʋʋ gɛr dɩbara ga, sɩ wo wɩ n khɩɩrɛ wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ ga thɩ̃sɔɔlera.

Dɩ fa hananakɛ thɩ̃ɛ a na ther bã, a fɩ harakɛ mɔ̃, fɛrkɛ n 'laanɛnɩ dɩ fa-n yɩ haanɩda; gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ fɩ-n 'laanɩ dɩ fa-n yɩ haanɩda, dɩbara fɩ-n heen sor, gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ fɩ-n 'laanɩ fa-n yɩɛ awɩ khara fɩ-n cʋʋ fer.
Sι jιrɛ dι Thãgbaa kιιlιkɛ a na kιιlnanι wιrɛ n cʋɛnι thɩ̃ɛ thale gι teere kha.
Fι-n kpιɛrɛ dι fɛrkɛ n 'laanɛnι dι fa-n yι wιrɛ n cʋɛnι thɩ̃ɛ thaleeda, sιι do dakha awι khara fι-n cʋʋ fa fuure Thãgbaa kιιlla gaa bɛ?
Agιbo mɔ̃ a buloni haar, a hanana jʋʋrɛ na ha fʋrɛ dιι thʋ̃ kar, fa gbarakɛ dιι do far thɩ̃a', sι fa-n ka jι dι Thãgbaa ha bulola n tɔ fι dι ga-n pɛ ha debirera ga.
Sι mɔ̃ afιda khιιrnι dι fa-n tu ha debira', Thãgbaa nĩkhi fι-n kpa fa-n thιιn gι dana nĩkhi wire, kɛ dɔnι wireekɛ Thãgbaa kιιl telẽ na ιιrnι,
dι na lιmι tιbιla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl mɔ̃ ntɛɛ thɔ̃ hanɩ.
Yire khorr a na ha wɩrɛɛkɛ n yɩranɩ dɩ wa-n cʋʋ bɔɔ, dɩ wa-n ƴaalna i dʋbɩrɛ na cʋʋrɩkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbaa pa, na gɩrɛɛkɛ na dɔnɩ dakʋɛnaa ga.
Sɩ nĩkhii na ha helle a na lɩmɩ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ dɩbara nadara dɩ wɩ ka na bo sobɔr sɩ na tu dapuu.
Bɔ gaarɛ na ha dɩr na dɔ tɩbɩla ɓibiikɛ n cʋɛnɩ puureeda, Juifisɔ na dɔ cacadara, agɩpɩ wɩrɛ na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa'.
l dʋbιrɛ, na cʋʋr, na ha ɩɩ na dɔ tibil wo tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ bɔɔda, Juifisɔra na dɔ cacadara, agɩpɩ wɩrɛ dakha na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa'.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba na-n hɩɩn tɩbɩla dɩɩdɩa'.
Ca kpala fɛʋʋkɛ n cʋɛnι sopugo sι wa jι Mʋιjιι jɔfʋa', wa bũburone na jɔfʋ 'leerera; sι Juifisɔɔkɛ hananι jɔfʋ sι wa-n cʋʋ sopugo, gιrɛ jɔfʋra n sonι na kιlɛna wι.
Gιdonι ga do wιrɛ n pɛnι jɔfʋ nũu dɔ tιι sara Thãgbara ga, sι wιrɛ n cʋɛnι gɩrɛ jɔfʋ sonι sor na hɛllɔ.
Ca kpalaakɛ na hananɩ Mʋιjιι jɔfʋa', sι awι ti para wι-n cʋʋrɛ gιrɛ jɔfʋ sonι, wa hana jɔfʋ wera', sɩ awɩ thɛthɛ dɔ awɩ jɔfʋ.
Wι-n nιnanɛ dι gιrɛ jɔfʋ n ƴaalnι gι kherere awι hara, dι thalera awι kpιɛrnɔ n nιrɔ gι har, gιdonι awι kpιɛr n so warɛ aa, dapuu ha gɩrɛ aa, dabʋɔ ha gɩrɛ.
Gɛr na yɩra wireekɛ Thãgba na pɛrnɩ Jeju Kirisiti da kɩɩlna tɩbɩla awɩ thɔnaakɛ wɩ cʋʋnι wolonena, dι ga har mɔ̃kɛra tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ mι-n mιιnι sonι.
Fɛrkɛ yɛnι Juifi ha fι, dι fι bo dι fa-n ιι jɔfʋʋdara, dι fa-n məbi Thãgbaada dʋʋrra,
a jι dakha gιrɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnι, jɔfʋ kɔɔ dιιr fɛr dι fι jι gιrɛ bʋɔnɔnι kpιι;
fɛrkɛ yɛnι fa marrɛ fa-n nιrɔ yara hʋɛ, aa wo, dahιrɛ fι do wιrɛraakɛ hanι dabirəra,
aa wo, də̃bələə dιιrdaar ha fι, na sikpuloosɔɔ dιιrdaar, gιdonι jɔfʋra fι jιι hana jιιr na gιrɛ dɔnι sobɔr.
Dι a mɛ̃ gι fɛrkɛ n dιrɛnι wɩ̃ tibil, fa-n dιιr afιbara gaa? Fɛrkɛ n mιanι dι fι yι wa-n yuə', fɛr n yuon?
Fɛrkɛ n sɔnι dι fι yι, tibil na-n ƴaal khɛ kpιa', tibil na-n ƴaal kũu kpιa', fɛr n ƴaalɛ khɛ kpιι? Fɛrkɛ n kpɛnι thιla, fɛr n yuon thιl du thɩ̃ɛɛ?
Fɛrkɛ n məbəni Thãgbaa jɔfʋ hananɛna, fɛr n bɔ jɔfʋ hιιnɛ dι ga-n kʋɛ Thãgbaa ii?
Mɛ̃ gι khere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Nɛr Juifisɔra n cʋɛ dι ca kpala na-n kʋɛ Thãgbaa i.”
Sobɔr gι wer, khʋ̃ kurre bɔrɛ ado fa cʋʋ gιrɛ jɔfʋ sonι, sι ado fa kʋɛ jɔfʋ afι khʋ̃ kur bire debi a ho fa kur khʋ̃a'.
Ado ʋrɛ wa kurni khʋ̃a' na cʋʋ gιrɛ jɔfʋ sonι, ga do Thãgba na-n hιιnʋʋnɛ mɔ̃ a donι khʋ̃ kurdaaraa?
Ʋrɛɛkɛrakɛ tomι nʋʋnnaakɛ na kuroni khʋ̃a', sι da-n cʋʋ gιrɛ jɔfʋ sonι na heen fι sor fɛrkɛ hananι jɔfʋ sɛbɛ na khʋ̃ kurre sι fa-n kʋɛ jɔfʋaa?
Gιdonι ga do Juifi dʋʋr tomιrra wι-n we Juifi dʋʋra', dι khʋ̃ kurre ga do tomι khʋ̃ kurreekɛ wι soa';
sι Juifi dʋʋr, bιnɔ gι ha, dι khʋ̃ kurre dʋɔn hadaa, a the Thu Phuu pa, ga do jɔfʋ sɛbɛra ga. Juifi ca olee khιι na-n the tιbιlala ga, sι Thãgbara gι-n the.
Anye Juifi dʋʋr n hana? Dɩ anyee bɔ ca khʋ̃ kurre n taa?
Thɩ̃ɛ gɩ wer waa gel. Caca thɩ̃ɛ gɩdonɩ Juifisɔ Thãgba kɔɔ dʋ ɔɔ so nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Dɩ mɔ̃, ado ɩkhasɔ wɛrra na kɔɔ pɛr haara', mɔna wa pɛrnɩ haara' na kʋɛrɛ Thãgbaa sobɔdaar do ya?

Kpɩɩraka'. Tɩbɩla fɛʋ donɩnakɛ sõsodara, sɩ Thãgba wer sobɔ sodaarra a do, dɩ gɩ har mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ ɔɔ sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Wa yɩ fɛr dɩ fa telẽ afɩ thɩmɩɩra, fɛr na-n dɔ hʋ hanadaar kɩɩlɛlaakɛ wa-n kɩɩlna fɩnɩ.”
Dɩ ado asɩ fɩl gõgolõ na-n nɛna mɔ̃ Thãgba sarnɩ, anye sa so 'lo? Dɩ ado Thãgba gbana sɛr nĩkhii ga dor ɔɔda na saraa gaa? Tibiile mɩ mɩɩ gɩrɛ wer.
Ga ha thale kpɩɩraka'. A gɩ ha thale, mɔ̃ Thãgba na kɩɩlna tɩbɩla fɛʋ thɩɩra?
Gɩdonɩ ado ɩ̃ sõso dɔ nɔɔ dɩ Thãgbaa sobɔ jɩɩ yɩr, a cʋʋna dakha dɩ ɔɔ i dʋbɩrɔ, mɔ̃ na dɔ nɔɔ dɩ wa kɩɩlna mɩ sopugoda dʋʋrra?
Anye na tɔna sɩ dɩ sa so nayɩ, sa-n cʋɛ puure ga-n ɩna bɔa? Thale asɩ i kʋɛdara n mɩɩ aa, sɩ sor. Wɩrɛ n mɩanɩ thale, sor na heen wer a na teena wɩ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ gɩ ha? Sɛr Juifisɔ sɩ baar wɩ̃ tibil ya? Kpei. Sɩ kɔɔ 'lire yɩ gar dɩ Juifisɔ a gbana wɩrɛ na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa', fɛʋ sopugo n pɔtɔrɔnɛ wɩ.
Dɩ gɩ har mɔna gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Tibilikɛ saranɩ na hala', bɩɛllakɛ na hala';
tibilikɛ jɛnɩ fɩlɛ na hala', tibil bɩɛl na hale dɩ ƴaal Thãgba ga.
Fɛʋ faarɛ hʋɛ sa debi do tɩɩ kʋɛsʋsɔ ɓibi; bɩɛl na halerakɛ dɩ cʋʋ thɩ̃ bʋɔa', bιɛl 'lẽ'lenakɛ na hala'.
Awι nɔ hor mɔ̃ wι-n phuuni kaa, wι gbaar awι delẽbi dιι do fιιldaa, thιmιιrιkɛ n thɛnι awι nɔfara sikor kpalʋ gι.
Tιι nιιrɛ na thιmιι ƴʋ̃ɔ hi wer nɔɔ.
A wa ca vuu dιι do tibil wι yι ιnι-n kɔ;
awι ka pa fɛʋ, ʋʋnɛ na gaarɛ gι-n pɛ;
wa jɩ hʋɛɛkɛ n 'laanɛnɩ ha ɩɩ kpɩɩraka',
Thãgba maar na ha awɩ hara ga.”
Sɩ sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ jɔfʋ sonɩ wɩrɛ hanɩ jɔfʋra a so, dɩ tibil bɩɛllakɛ na yɩ nɔ ha paara', sɩ gɩ do tɩbɩla fɛʋ sor heen wer Thãgbaa ƴɛra.
Gɩdonɩ sor na hɛl tibil bɩɛllalakɛ jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra ga, gɩdonɩ jɔfʋ n ka ɩna sopugo jɩɩr.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ mɔ̃ Thãgba na hɛlnɩ tɩbɩlala sor, sɩ ga do jɔfʋra gɩ tha', gɩ yɩrrɛ; jɔfʋra na Thãgbaa bobonasɔ kɔɔ mɩa gɩ,
dɩ Thãgbaa so hɛlla tɩbɩlaakɛ n pɩɛrnɩ Jeju Kirisiti haar sorra n hɛllɔ, sɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar na 'lɛ, gɩdonɩ dɩɩdɩɩ hɩɩn paar na hala'.
Tɩbɩla ɓibi dʋɔn puu cʋʋdara a 'lee i dʋbɩrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaada.
Sɩ khaar sor na hɛl war ɔɔ bɔ jɩra gɩ the birsereraakɛ Jeju Kirisiti birse wini.
Dɩ ɔr Thãgba gba a jinə bonɩɛ dɩ ɔɔ tɔmɩ̃ na do sopugo hɛldaa wɩrɛraakɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar, gɩ nɩna ɔɔ fɩl sar, gɩdonɩ aa kɔɔ therna sopugookɛ tɩbɩla kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ mamara ɔɔ ha fʋ bɔra ga.
Sɩ a ƴaalɛ a nɩna ɔɔ fɩl sar nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔraakɛ, gɛr na nɛna dɩ ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ saranɩ da-n hɛl ʋrɛ n pɩɛrnɩ Jeju haar sor.
Dɩ kana gɩrɛ tibil na məbironi ha? Ga hala'. Anye dɔ nɔɔ? Jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛ dɔ nɔɔ ya? Kpei. Ha pɛrɛra gɩ the.
Gɩdonɩ sɩ yɩ gɛr dɩ ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ tibil n 'lɛrɔ so hɛllɛ, ga do jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra ga.
Dɩ Thãgbara, Juifisɔɔ Thãgba a ba do dɩbara ya? Ga do ca kpalaa Thãgba a do dakha gaa? Ɔɔ, ca kpalaa Thãgba a do dakha.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba bɩɛlla a do, dɩ cʋʋ sor dɩ ga-n hɛl khʋ̃ kurdarara dɩɩ the awɩ ha pɛra, dɩ cʋʋ sor dɩ ga-n hɛl wɩrɛraakɛ na kuroni khʋ̃a', dɩɩ do ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ.
Dɩ ha pɛrɛ ba dor nɔɔ dɩ sɩ cʋʋrɔ jɔfʋ dιι debi a do mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ ya? Kpιιraka'. Jɔfʋ sι ka jιι cʋʋ dɩɩ do jɔfʋ.
A mɛ̃ gɩ, mɔ̃ sa so Abɩrahamnaakɛ dɔnɩ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃? Anye a kɔɔ 'lɛ na ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ fãga?
Ado sor kɔɔ hɛllɛ Abɩrahamna dɩɩ the thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛra a hananɛ gɩrɛ a na məbironi, sɩ ga do Thãgbaa ƴɛra ga.
Gɩdonɩ anye Thãgbaa sɛbɛ so? Gɩ sor: “Abɩraham kɔɔ pɛr Thãgba haar dɩɩ do gɛr Thãgba hɩɩn sa wɩɩ tɩɩ sarʋ.”
Mee ʋrɛ dɔnɩ thɔma wɩ-n lɩmʋʋnɛ, ga do khaardaa wa hɩɩn gɩ gɩ dora', sɩ helu gɩ dɩ wɩ lɩmʋʋ.
Sɩ ʋrɛ na-n cʋɛnɩ thɩ̃a', sɩ dɩ pɛr haar ʋrɛraakɛ n hɛlanɩ sopugodaarra sor, Thãgba na thernanɛ ɔɔ ha pɛɛle dɩ sor na hɛllaa.
Mɛ̃ Davɩdɩ mɩɩ mɔ̃ ga danɩ tibilləəkɛ Thãgba n hɛllɔnɩ sor sɩ ga-n the thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra ga, ayɩ:
“Gɩ-n dar wɩrɛraakɛ Thãgba faanɩ awɩ dakhaba do, kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ dakha a hɛllɔnɩ sopugo.
Gɩ-n dar tibilləəkɛ Kɔ̃tɩn na-n thernɩ ɔɔ sopugo da-n ha ga.”
Dɩ ga kãka caakɛra khʋ̃ kurdaraada gɩ do dɩbara yaa, agɩbo wɩrɛ na kuroni khʋ̃aada gɩ do dakha? Gɩdonɩ sɩ kɔɔ sor ayɩ: “Abιrahamι ha pɛ dɔ nɔɔ dι Thãgba wιι tιι sarʋ.”
Dι bɔ ʋmɔna gι? Ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ kurni khʋ̃ʋ gι yaa, agιbo ɔbɔɔkɛ aa kɔɔ kurni khʋ̃ʋ paa gι? Ɔbɔɔkɛ aa kɔɔ kurni khʋ̃ʋ paa gι, dι a dor ʋrɛ na kɔɔ kuroni khʋ̃a'.

A kɔɔ 'lɛr jιιnιkɛ dɔnι khʋ̃ kurdaa dɩɩ do gɛr n nɛna so hɛllɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ ha pɛrɛra, ɔbɔɔkɛ aa kɔɔ kurni khʋ̃a'; dɩ mɛ̃ a do thɩrɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar, kɛ na kuroni khʋ̃a', dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba n hɩɩn wɩ dɩ wɩ do fɩl sardara.
Abɩraham dor thɩrɛ dakha khʋ̃ kurdarara, sɩ ga do khʋ̃ kurdara ha wɩ dɩbara ga, sɩ wɛr dɔ wɩrɛɛkɛ n kpaannɩ asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ Abɩrahamɩ ha pɛraakɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ aa kɔɔ kurni khʋ̃ʋ pa'.
Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛrɛ ayɩ, Abɩraham na ɔɔ məlsɔ na hɩna thɩɩkɛ; dɩ ga do jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ Thãgba ʋlfɛnaa thala', sɩ ha pɛrɛɛkɛ a hananɩ a 'lɛrɔ so hɛllɛ dɔ nɔɔ.
Gɩdonɩ ado jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ wɩ do thɩ̃ hɩna, ga dor ha pɛrɛ wer mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ gɩ, dɩ ʋlfɛrɛ dakha kʋkʋʋlɛ.
Gɩdonɩ jɔfʋ n ɩrɛna Thãgbaa nĩkhi, dɩ ka jɔfʋ na-n hana', jɔfʋ kʋɛrɛ na-n hale dakha ga.

Mɛ̃ thɩ̃ hɩ̃ 'lɛrɩle the ha pɛrɛra gɩ do bɔ jɩɩrra gɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ ʋlfɛrɛɛle na puno phubi a na do Abɩrahamɩ məl fɛʋʋda, sɩ ga do ɔɔ məlikɛ dɔnɩ jɔfʋdara dɩbara ga, sɩ gɩ do wɩrɛ fɛʋ hananɩ Abɩrahamɩ ha pɛɛda; gɩdonɩ Abɩraham dʋɔn sɛrɛ fɛʋʋ thɩ.

Dɩ gɩ har mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Mɩ thɩɩn fɛr fɩ do ca jɔɔ thɩ.” A do sarɛ thɩrɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ a pɛrnɩ haar, kɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaakɛ n cʋɛnɩ khe dɩ wɩ bir hana yire, dɩ gɩrɛ na hanɩle pa' sɩ a-n therna gɛr mɔ̃kɛ gɩ hanɩle.
Abɩraham hananɛ ha pɛrɛ Thãgbara gɛr gɩ dɩ hana nũ pɛrɛ gɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ dacʋʋnaa ga, dɩ mɛ̃ a debi a do “ca jɔɔ thɩ”, dɩ gɩ har mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba sonɩ ayɩ: “Thale afɩ məl na ha.”
Ɔɔ ha pɛɛkɛ a hananɩ ga wurə', sɩrakɛ yɛna tamaa a kɔɔ thɔɔ a dã khir, dɩ Saraa bi kɔ̃ bɔ dakha 'li kar.
Sɩ ha pɛrɛ na ɓɔrʋa', dɩ aa-n baal Thãgbaa ʋlfɛra woa', sɩ ha pɛrɛ cʋgʋʋrɛ dɩ 'lɛ fãga da-n khɩɩ Thãgba.
A hananɛ tu jɩɩr gel dɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba ʋlfɛnɩ ɩna cʋʋrɛ a na puno ger a na cʋʋ;
dɩ gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ dɩ “Thãgba wɩɩ tɩɩ sarʋ.”
Thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ kherenenɩ ayɩ, “Thãgba wɩɩrɛ tɩɩ sarʋ”, ga do ɔr dɩbara gɩ soa'.
Sɩ sɩ harrɛ ser tɩɩ sar dʋʋrraale, sɛrkɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar ʋrɛraakɛ ɩrɛnɩ Jeju asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ dɩ the khirera.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ wɩ kʋnɩ asɩ sopugora sɩ dɩ ɩɩr a the khirera sor n hɛl sar.
Dɩ mɔ̃ Thãgba hɛl sarnɩ sor thakɛ dɩɩ do ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ, sɩ hananɛ ha ɩɩ na ɔr dɩɩ the Jeju Kirisiti asɩ Kɔ̃tɩna.
Ɔr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ sɩ ba yɩrɔ ha pɛrɛra lõ paar bɔ jɩ caarraakɛ sɩ jɩɩlɔnɩ gɩrɛ kɩbɩ, dɩ sa-n kãka nũ pɛrɛraakɛ sɩ hananɩ a na bul kha na Thãgbaa i dʋbɩ.
Dɩrakɛ wo sɩ-n kãkarɛ bɔ gaarɛra gɩdonɩ sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ bɔ gaarɛ n ɛna ha fʋrɛ,
dɩ ha fʋrɛɛle na cʋɛ sɩ dɩ sa for a na bɩ̃, dɩ bɩɩnɩle n 'laanɛ nũ pɛrɛ.
Dɩ nũ pɛrɛɛle na pɛ sar yicuruə', gɩdonɩ naʋʋkɛ Thãgba na sɩnɩ gɩ və̃viəne a hi asɩ hara, dɩ Thu Phuu pa gɩ the, kɛ Thãgba ha sɩnɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sa-n kɔɔ yɩrɔnɩ fɛfɛɛ paar kpɩɩa', gɛr Kirisiti khiro sɛr sopugodarara, bɔɔkɛ Thãgba pɛrnɩ danɩ.
Dɩ fa tee tɩɩ sarʋʋ khi a na khi gɩ khɩɩrɛ, sɩ anaa ʋkha na ture a na tee tɩɩ bʋɔɔ khi a na khi.
Sɩ yɛ gɩrɛ n nɛnanɩ mɔ̃ Thãgbaa naʋʋkɛ a na sɩnɩ hanɩ: Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ donɩ sopugodara 'lo gɛr Kirisiti ka khiro asɩ sora.
Dɩ mɔ̃ ga ka na ha gɩrɛ dɩphã ɔɔ tɔmɩ̃ hɛl sɩnɩ sor, gɩ do aa ka taa sɩ Thãgbaa nĩkhirə ga.
Gɩdonɩ ado ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ donɩ lãlaardara na Thãgba, ɔɔ Bikuuni khi cʋʋ sɛr dɩ sɩ bir kũu kha na Thãgba; dɩ mɔ̃ ga ka na ha gɩrɛ dɩphã sɩ birni kũu kha na Thãgba gɩ do Kirisitii yi na taa sa'.
Sɩ ga do gele gɩ dɩbara ga, sɩ dakha sɩ-n kãkarɛ Thãgbara dɩɩ the asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitira ʋrɛɛkɛra sɩ 'lɛrnɩ bir kuune dɩphã.
Nɩ yɛ mɔ̃ gɩ hanɩ: Tibil bɩɛl dɔ nɔɔ dɩ sopugo ba lona thɩɩra, dɩ sopugorara khir the, dɩ khirrə mar tɩbɩla ɓibi, gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla ɓibi n cʋɛ sopugo.
Sopugo kɔɔ 'lire hakɛ thɩɩra sɩ dɩ jɔfʋ pɩɩrɔ 'laa, sɩ kãkɛ jɔfʋ na hana', sopugo therre na hala'.
Dɩ a fʋna Adãa bɔɔ a dana Mʋɩjɩɩ bɔɔ khir n punone tɩbɩla fɛʋ, narakɛ wɩrɛ na kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ sopugo Thãgbara dɩɩ ho Adãada ga; dɩ Adana hʋɔn ʋrɛ na ɩnanɩ.

Sɩ bʋɔraakɛ Thãgba n jɩnɩ tibil dɩɩ do khaardaa gɩ do, gɩ har kpɩɩ na sopugo. Gɩdonɩ tɩɩ bɩɛlɩ sopugo dor nɔɔ dɩ tɩɩ jɔjʋɔ khiir, sɩ bʋɔraakɛ Thãgba n jɩnɩ tibil na khaardaakɛ a-n 'laanɩ pɔɩ dɩɩ do tɩɩ bɩɛlɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ, gɩ kɔ̃tɩnɛ a jɔ gele fɩ̃i a ƴɛr a dã tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Thãgbaa khaarda na gɩrɛ tibili sopugo cʋʋnɩ gɩ har dɩɩdɩɩ: Sopugo bɩɛl dɩbara gɛr ɩrɛna kɩɩlʋ dɩ sor heen tɩbɩla gɩrɛ, sɩ sopugo jɔjʋɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla cʋʋnɩ sor ka hɛl warɛ dɩɩ do bɔ jɩ khaardaa dɔ nɔɔ.

Ado tibil bɩɛlɩ sopugo do nɔɔ dι khir na-n puno tɩbɩla fɛʋ dɩɩ the tɩɩ bɩɛllaalera, mɔ̃ gɩrɛ tɩɩ bɩɛlɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ cʋʋnι na thʋ̃ na ha? Gɛr dʋɔn wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ 'lɛnι Thãgbaa bɔ jι jɔɔ na khaardaakɛ dɔnι so hɛllɛ, na dor punodara awι yi hanana gι do Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.
Gɛr gι mɔ̃kɛ tιι bιɛlι sopugo donι nɔɔ dι so heene dã tɩbɩla fɛʋ, ɔmɛna tɩɩ bɩɛlι fιl sar thɔ̃ na cuu tɩbɩla fɛu dɩ sor na hɛl war dɩ wa 'lɛ yire.
Mɔ̃kɛ tɩɩ bɩɛlɩ nũ nʋʋr cʋʋnɩ tɩbɩla jɔɔ dɩ wɩ do sopugodara, mɛ̃ tɩɩ bɩɛlɩ nũ nɩ na cʋʋ tɩbɩla jɔɔ dɩ sor na hɛl war.
Jɔfʋ 'lɔɔrɔrɛ gɩ cʋʋ sopugo gι jɔr, dι ka sopugo jɔrnι le Thãgbaa bɔ jι n jιι jɔr.
Mɛ̃ gɩɩ, mɔna sopugo punoni tɩbɩla fɛʋ da-n 'laa khir, mɛ̃ Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ dakha hana punone dɩ ga-n hɛl tɩbɩlala sor gɩ kpa sɩ gɩ pɛ yire khorra, gɩ do Jeju Kirisiti asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ pa gɩ the.
Dɩ mɔ̃ sa so gɩrɛ? Sa-n cʋɛ sopugo bɔ jɩɩrra na-n jɩɩ jɔr ya?
Kpɩɩraka'. Sɛrkɛ khenɩ sopugo cʋʋrɛra, anyee yi ca sa hana sopugo cʋʋrɛra 'lo?
Na jɩ dɩɩ do sɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ kɔɔ kpɛɛnɩ nyʋɔnɔ bɩɛl dʋʋrra nakha Jeju Kirisiti, bιɛl dʋʋrra nakha ɔɔ khi wɩ kɔɔ kpɛɛ saa?
Mɛ̃ gι yɔ kpɛɛrɛ dʋɔn wι dʋ sɛr kha na ɔr mɔ̃ sι khini kha, dι mɔ̃kɛ Thιrɛɛ fãga kɔɔ ιιrnι Kirisiti dι the khirera, sɛrɛ dakha yi phaara sa-n ιιrna oti.
Gιdonι ado sι debire a do kha bιɛl na ɔr khirraakɛ hɔnι ɔɔda, sa debire dakha a na do bιɛl na ɔr ɔɔ khi ιιrra.
Sι jι gɛr dι tιι tɩ̃ dʋʋrιkɛ sι kɔɔ donι wι kɔɔ kpaarɛ kʋkʋ thιrʋra nakha Kirisiti, gι do nɔɔ asι mɛrɛ puurə n kʋkʋʋl, dι mɛ̃ sa do sopugoo deesɔ bã.
Gιdonι ʋrɛ khenɩ a ther sopugoo nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Dɩ ado sɩ kɔɔ khire ger nakha Kirisiti, sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sa hananɛ kha yire na ɔr.
Gɩdonɩ sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ Kirisiti kɔɔ ɩɩrɛ a the khirera dɩ khir na punoo bã.
Khirikɛ a kɔɔ khini sopugo a kɔɔ khiro babɩɛl dɩbara dɩɩ do gɩ daan, sɩ yireekɛ a hananɩ nɛnɛ̃ Thãgbara a hana gɩ.
Mɛ̃ gɩ, nɛrɛ dakha, na-n hɩnɛ dɩbara mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ khe sopugo cʋʋrɛra sa do yidara Thãgbara dɩɩ the anɩ bɩɛl dora na Jeju Kirisiti.
Na-n do sopugo na-n puno anɩ tomɩ khinəəkɛ nɩ nɩɩ nũu na-n cʋʋ gɩrɛ n kʋɔnɩ thueə'.

Na-n gba anɩ tomɩ ɓãsɔ 'lo a faa sopugo cʋʋrɛra gɩ do fɩl gõgolõ thɔ̃ dodaa ga; sɩ nɩ faa anɩbara Thãgbara mɔ̃kɛ nɩ donɩ wɩrɛ khenɩ sa ɩɩr a the khirera, nɩ gba anɩ tomɩ ɓãsɔ a na hana Thãgba a na-n cʋʋna gɩrɛ saranɩ.
Gɩdonɩ sopugo na-n pɔtɔrɔ nɩ bã, gɩdonɩ ga do jɔfʋra nɩ ha ga, sɩɩ do Thãgbaa bɔ jɩra gɩ.
Dɩ mɔ̃ ga ha? Sa-n cʋɛ sopugo gɩdonɩ ga do jɔfʋra sɩ ha ga sɩɩ do bɔ jɩɩrra gɩ ya? Kpɩɩraka'.
Na jɩ dɩɩ do a fɩ faa afɩbara tibillə a do dee fa-n nɩɩ nũu, ga do ʋrɛɛkɛɛ nũ fɩ-n nɩnɩ ɔɔ dee fɩ doaa, a sopugo fɩ-n nɩ nũu khirrə ga jalna fι, a Thãgba fι-n nι nũu sor a na hɛl far.
Thãgba hιna fʋɔrɛ. Nɛrɛɛkɛ mamara kɔɔ dɔnι sopugoo deesɔ, nι bire a nι nũu na haar fɛʋ dιιr caaraakɛ nι kɔɔ 'lɛnι.
Nɛnɛ̃ Thãgba birse ner sopugo dee dʋʋrra dι nι debi a do Thãgbaa deesɔ dι na-n cʋʋ gιrɛ saranι.

Tibiile mι mιι gιdonι ka nι hanι gιrɛ nι yɔɔrɛ; mɔ̃ nι kɔɔ faanι anι tomι ɓãsɔ a do dea thɩ̃ bise cʋʋrɛra na sopugora gι jιι jɔr, nɛnɛ̃ nι faa anι tomι ɓãsɔ ɔmɛ̃ a dɔ Thãgbaa deesɔ a na cʋɛ gιrɛ saranι a dana kpιι leere.
Gιdonι ɔbɔɔkɛ nι kɔɔ donι sopugoo deesɔ na ha kha dιkha na fιl sarʋa'.
Gιmɔ̃ dɔ khor nι kɔɔ 'lɛrnι ɔbɔɔraalera? Gɛr dɔ gιrɛ cʋɛnι dι yicuru na-n fʋ nι nɛnɛ̃kɛ, gιdonι ga khu pa dʋɔn khir.
Sι nɛnɛ̃kɛ Thãgba birse ner sopugo dee dʋʋrra a cʋʋ nι dι nι do ɔɔ deesɔ, dι kpιι leere dʋɔn anιda sι khu paar n do yire khorr.
Gιdonι lιmιnɛɛkɛ sopugo n lɩmɩnɩ khir gɩ, sɩ khaardaakɛ Thãgba n 'laanɩ pɔɩ, gɛr dʋɔn yire khorr, kɛ hanɩ Jeju Kirisiti asɩ Kɔ̃tɩna.
Nɛr omɩnaakɛ dɔnɩ jɔfʋ jɩna mɩ-n mɩɩna, na jɩ dɩɩ do bɔɔ fɛʋʋkɛ tibil hananι yire gɛr jɔfʋ n punonaa dιbara gaa?
Mɛ̃ jɔfʋ n li khɛr na ɔɔ ko bɔɔ fɛʋʋkɛ kuun hananι yire, sι a kuun khi pι, khɛr n ther jɔfʋraakɛ lieni kha na ɔɔ ko.

Sι ado bɔɔkɛ ɔɔ ko hananι yire, gɛr khɛr biro a ma kũu kpιι, kũu kpιι ƴaaldaar wa-n we khɛrιle; sι ado ɔɔ ko khe, khɛrιle na ha kha dιkha na jɔfʋ bã, a a debi do kũu kpιι khɛr ga do kũu kpιι ƴaaldaar a doa'.
Mɛ̃ gι ha na nɛrɛ ɩ̃ omisɔ; nɛrɛ dakha nι kɔɔ khire jɔfʋdaara dιι the anι bιɛl dora na Kirisiti nι fi nι do tιι kpιιda, ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ ιrɛnι a the khirera gι, sι puno sa-n se be Thãgbara.
Gιdonι ɔbɔɔkɛ sι-n kɔɔ ιιrnι a ho tibil ba, sopugoo ƴaalιkɛ jɔfʋ cʋʋnɩ dɩɩ hale n kɔɔ dor thɔma asɩ tomɩ ɓãsɔra dɩɩ do khir gɩ-n ɩna sar.

Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ sɩ ther jɔfʋraakɛ kɔɔ le sɩnɩ mɔ̃ sɩ khini gɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ fɔ sɩnɩ ɩɩrɔ, gɩ do nɔɔ sa-n do thɔma Thãgbara na fɩl phaakɛ Thu Phuu n thɔɔna sɩnɩ, ga ha mɔ̃ datɩ̃ɩ hanɩ kɛ dɔnɩ jɔfʋʋdaakɛ kherenena'.
Dɩ mɔ̃ sa so gɩrɛ? Jɔfʋ dʋɔn sopugo ya? Kpɩɩraka'. Sɩ jɔfʋ cʋɛ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ jɩ thɩ̃ doo n dɔnɩ sopugo; gɩdonɩ ma kɔɔ jɩ thĩ doo n dɔnɩ ha pɩɛrɛ ado jɔfʋ na kɔɔ so ayɩ, fa-n Pɩɛr hara gaaga.
Dɩ jɔfʋ dor nɔɔ dɩ sopugo yɩrɔ hʋɛ a cʋʋ ha pɩɛr caar fɛʋ dɩɩ ɩɩr mar, gɩdonɩ ado jɔfʋ na hala', ga dor thĩ khire sopugo do.
Mɛrɛ mɩ kɔɔ hananɛ yire bɔɔraakɛ ma kɔɔ hananɩ jɔfʋ pa', sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ jɔfʋ ɩnɩ, gɛr sopugo ɩɩrɔ vuu dɩɩ do mɩ khire.
Dɩ jɔfʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ yi 'laadaa fire a do mar khi 'laadaa.
Gɩdonɩ sopugo yɩrɛ hʋɛ da-n fɩɩl mɩ dɩɩ do jɔfʋʋ pa gɩ the, dɩ a gbaar jɔfʋʋlera a kʋna mɩ.
Thãgbaa jɔfʋsɔ wer phure, dɩ jɔfʋ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl phure, a sar, a bɔrna.
Dɩ gɩrɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ fire a do mar khir kɛ? Kpɩɩraka', sɩ sopugo gɩ; mɛ̃ sopugo nɩna mɔ̃ a jɩɩnɩ do sopugo mɔ̃ a gbanɩ gɩrɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ dɩɩ fi do mar khir; mɛ̃ jɔfʋ do nɔɔ dɩ sopugo debi a jɩɩ puuro a pɛr.
Sɩ jɩrɛ wer dɩ thudaa jɔfʋ do, sɩ mɛrɛ tibil ha mɩ na tomɩr dɩ ɩ̃ dona sopugoo dee.
Ma jɩ ɩ̃ cʋʋ pa tɔrrakɛ mɔ̃ gɩ hana', ga do gɩrɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ ɩ̃ cʋɛ gɛr mɩ-n cʋa', sɩ gɩrɛ mɩ-n laarnɩ khələlələ gɛr mɩ-n ka cʋʋ.
Ado gɩrɛ ma-n ƴaalnɩ ɩ̃ cʋa' gɛr mɩ-n cʋʋ, thale n nɛna dɩ mɩ ture dɩ jɔfʋ bɔrɛ.
Dɩ a thɩɛna gaa ga do mɛr n cʋ ga, sɩ sopugookɛ hanɩ ɩ̃ hara n cʋɛ.
Gɩdonɩ mɩ jɩrɛ thɩ̃ bʋɔ na ha ɩ̃ bɩnɔa', a thɩɛna gaa ɩ̃ tibil do para; thɩ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛɛ ƴaal wer har ɩ̃ hara, sɩ punone na hala'.
Ma-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ bʋɔɔkɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ ɩ̃ cʋa', sɩ puureekɛ ma-n kanɩ ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋa' dɩɩ do gɛr mɩ-n cʋʋ.
Dɩ ado ma cʋʋ gɩrɛ ma-n ƴaalnɩ ɩ̃ cʋa', ga do mɛr ɩ̃ eʋ ga sɩ sopugookɛ hanɩ ɩ̃ hara n cʋɛ.
Gɛr gɩ gɩrɛ mι yιnι ɩ̃ pa dʋɔn: A mι yι bɔɔ mι ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋʋ sι puure na-n ha mι thɩ̃ thaa ga.
Ado bιnɔ wer gι, Thãgbaa jɔfʋ da marɛ haar ka,
sι a mι gba na hɩɩn ɩ̃ tomɩ ɓãsɔ dɩɩ do thɩ̃ kpɩɩ hale n kɛ̃kɛrɛnanɩ gɩrɛ ɩ̃ ha yɩnɩ dabʋɔ gɩ, dɩ thɩ̃ɛɛlera dʋɔn sopugoo jɔfʋ a pɛrnɩ dɩɩ ha ɩ̃ tomι ɓãsɔra dι ɩ̃ fi do dee.
Pha, mɛr bɔ kʋ tibilikɛ, amɛ na taa mι na ti mi tomɩ khinənenaakɛ?
Thãgba hɩna fʋɔrɛ, gɩdonɩ Jeju Kirisiti asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ pa taarɛ na the. Gɛr gɩ, me wer haarra Thãgbaa jɔfʋʋ dee mɩ do, sι ɩ̃ tibil do para dee mι do sopugoo jɔfʋra.
Nɛnɛ̃ gɩrɛ so heene na hale kpɩɩrakɛ wɩrɛraakɛ hanɩ Jeju Kirisitira ga.
Gɩdonɩ Thu Phuu fãgaakɛ n 'laanɛnɩ yire dɩɩ the asɩ bɩɛl dora nakha Jeju Kirisiti, gɛr birsene mi a ti mi sopugoo fãgara na khiri fãgara.

Gɩrɛ jɔfʋ na kɔɔ punoni a cʋa', gɩdonɩ tibili tibil do pa a 'leere fãga, Thãgba kɔɔ cʋʋ gɛr, gɩdonɩ a kɔɔ thʋɔn ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ Bikuun dɩɩ do sopugo dɔ nɔɔ, dɩ gba tibil tomɩr dɩɩ hona asɩ sopugo tomɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgba heen sopugookɛ hanɩ tibili tibil do para sor.
Thãgba cʋʋrɛ gele dι mɛ̃ sɛrɛɛkɛ na-n ιrɛnι mɔ̃kɛ asι tibil do pa n ƴaalna', sιι do mɔ̃ Thu Phuu n ƴaalnι sι-n ιιr, na cʋʋ datelẽekɛ jɔfʋ n ƴaalnι ga-n cʋɛ.
Gιdonι wιrɛ n ιrɛnι na tibil dʋʋrιkɛ fãga 'leenι, awι kpιɛr koo tibili tibil do padara gι-n jal; sι wιrɛ n ιrɛnι mɔ̃kɛ Thu Phuu n so warnι, awι kpιɛr koo Thu Phuudarara gι-n jal.
Kpιɛr faarɛ koo tibili tibil do padara khir gι, sι kpιɛr faarɛ koo Thu Phuudara yire gι na ha ιι.
Gιdonι kpιɛr faarɛ koo tibili tibil do padara, gι-n ιnanɛ laarɛ nakha Thãgba; gιdonι tibili tibil do pa na-n wur dιbara Thãgbaa jɔfʋra ga, dι a na puno gιrakɛ dakha ga.
Dι wιrɛɛkɛ n ιrɛnι na tibil dʋʋrɩkɛ fãga 'leenɩ wa puno na da Thãgba haarra ga.
Sɩ ne wer na-n ɩɩr na tibil dʋʋrιkɛ fãga 'leena', sι mɔ̃kɛ Thu Phuu n so narnι nι-n ιιr, adora Thãgbaa Thu har anι bιnɔ. Ado tibil na hana Kirisitii Thuə', aa do Kirisitiida ga.
Ado Kirisiti har anι bιnɔ, sιrakɛ dιι do anι tomι khire dιι do sopugo dɔ nɔɔ, sι thue na hananɛ yire gι do so hɛllɛ dɔ nɔɔ.
Ado Thãgbaa Thuukɛ kɔɔ cʋɛnι Jeju dι ιιr a the khirera ha anι bιnɔ, ʋrɛɛkɛra cʋɛnι Jeju Kirisiti dι ιιr a the khirera, ɔrra na 'laanɛ yire anι tomι khinəna, gι the ɔɔ Thurəəkɛra hanι anι bιnɔ.
Gɛr gι omιna, sι hananɛ helu sι ga do asι tibil do pa sι hana helu sa-n ιιr mɔ̃kɛ a-n ƴaalna'.
Ado na ιιr mɔ̃kɛ tibili tibil do pa n ƴaalnι khir nι fʋ fʋrɔ, sι ado Thu Phuu nι-n ka gba dι na-n kʋna gιrɛ tibili tibil do pa n cʋʋnι ga dor na hananɛ yire.
Gιdonι wιrɛɛkɛ n pɛnι Thãgbaa Thu nũu, wɛr dɔ Thãgbaa bikuunsɔ.
Gιdonι Thu Phuukɛ nι 'lɛnι ga cʋʋ nɩ nɩ ho dea nɩ bir nɩ lõ maarra ga, sɩ Thu Phuukɛ cʋɛ nɩnɩ dɩ nɩ do Thãgbaa bikuunsɔ gɩ, dɩ sa-n wero: Aba, ɩ̃ Thɩ.
Thu Phuu thɛthɛ n gbɛba kha na asɩ thu sɩ da-n nɩrɔ dɩ sɩ dor Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔ.
Dɩ ado ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ sɩ do, sɩ dor dakha thɩ̃ hɩna; Thãgbaa thɩ̃ hɩ̃dara ha sɩ, dɩ sɩ bul kha na Kirisiti thɩ̃ɛ a hɩ̃, adora sɩ-n gaarɛ bʋɔ na ɔr gɩ do nɔɔ sɩ gbɛbɩ kha na ɔɔ i dʋbɩ.
Mɩ jɩrɛ tue dɩ bʋɔɔkɛ sɩ-n gaarnɩ nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ, ga hɩɩr kha na i dʋbɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgba na ha sɩna'.
Thɩ̃ tinəne koo n pɩɛrɛ gɩrɛ na ƴaal kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ ka bɔɔkɛ Thãgba na nɩrɔnɩ ɔɔ bikuunsɔ.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛ fɔnɩ thɩ̃ tinəne a ɩɩrɔ dɩɩ debi a do mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ, ga do gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ tinəne ƴaalɛ gɛr a cʋʋrɔ mã';
sɩ gɩ do nũ pɛrɛ hale, dɩ thɩ̃ tinənee thɛthɛra na ther kʋɛ dee dʋʋrra a na lõ Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔɔ wa doraakɛ na ɓɔnanɩ na ka.
Gɩdonɩ sɩ jɩrɛ a dana nɛnɛ̃kɛ thɩ̃ tinəne ɓibi n ser da-n gaarna a ho mɔ̃ wallɛ n fʋnɩ khɛr.
Ga do thɩ̃ tinəne bɩɛl gɩ dɩbara ga, sɩ na sɛrɛ dakharakɛ, kɛ hananɩ Thu Phuu dɩ do caca khaardaa ɓo, sɩ-n ser ser na bɩnɛ, dɩ sa-n pɩɛrna bikũu dʋʋr na asɩ tomɩ birse.
Gɩdonɩ asɩ taakɛ sɩ 'lɛnɩ nũ pɛrɛra gɩ do; sɩ a sɩ yɩ gɩrɛ sɩ-n pɛnɩ nũu pι na yire, ga do nũ pɛrɛ gι bã; gιdonι amɛ na-n pɛ nũu gιrɛraakɛ a yιnι pι?
Sι ado sa pɛ nũu gιrɛraakɛ sa yιna', mee ha fʋrɛ sa-n pιɛrna thɩ̃ doole.
Mɛ̃ dakha Thu Phuu n bul si asι yɔɔra, gιdonι sa-n jιι jι mɔ̃ sa bιɛlnι na gιrɛ teananι bιɛla', sι Thu Phuu thɛthɛ har da-n phʋʋr Thãgba na 'wιιrɛɛkɛ na hanι mιιrɛra ga.
Dι ʋrɛɛkɛ n bəəreni tibili bɩ̃ dι jι, ɔr jιɛn gιrɛ dɔnι Thu Phuu kpιɛrnɔ, gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ Thãgba tuni a-n phʋʋr Thãgba da-n pɛr tibil phuusɔ.
Sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ Thãgba n cʋɛ dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ n kpalmã dɩɩ fi, a do dabʋɔ wɩrɛraakɛ n naanɛɛnɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ a kɔɔ wenɩ mɔ̃ ɔɔ ƴaal hanɩ.
Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ a kɔɔ maanɩ jɩɩr a kɔɔ mãa phiir war dɩ wa debi na ha mɔ̃ ɔɔ Bikuun hanɩ, gɩ do mɛ̃ Bikuunile do cacadaar omɩna bərəəmna.
Dɩ welela a kɔɔ maanɩ phiire, wɛr dɔ wɩrɛ a wenɩ, dɩ wɩrɛra a wenɩ wɛr dɔ wɩrɛ sor hɛllɔnɩ, dɩ wɩrɛ a hɛllɔnɩ sorra wɩ lʋʋn dakha ɔɔ i dʋbιra.
Dι thɩ̃ɛ hanι thakɛ anye sa so 'lo? Ado sɛr Thãgba hana amɛ na punone na ma sar?
Ɔrkɛ na kɔɔ tɔnanι ɔɔ Bikuuna' sιι do a fagʋʋrɛ sɛrɛ fɛʋʋ sora, dɩ mɔ̃ ga fʋ sɩɩ do aa ka ha sɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ khaar a ɓaana?
Amɛ na pɩɛr wɩrɛ Thãgba phiirni sor? Mee Thãgba n hɛla sor.
Dɩ amɛ na heene tibil sor? Wa bɩɛl na hala'. Jeju Kirisiti ka kɔɔ khire sɩ ga do gele gɩ koa', a ɩɩrɛ a the khirera, a ha dakha gɩrɛ Thãgbaa nyɔ̃bɔra, da-n phʋʋr Thãgba da-n pɛ sar.
Dɩ amɛ na lea sɩ na Kirisitii naʋʋkɛ a-n na sɩnɩ? Bɔ gaarɛ na punone ya? Sɩ nɩwɛ, agɩbo kpoore, sɩ kɔmɛr, sɩ bʋɔ, sɩ khi phuronaa, sɩ bajɩna? Kpɩɩraka'.
Sɩ gɩ har mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Fɛr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ sɩ too khikhi togʋʋ dɩwɩlʋ koo; wɩ-n hɩɩn sɛr mɔ̃ sɩ donɩ banaakɛ wa kʋʋrnɩ.”
Sɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋraakɛ sɩ kəə garɛ fii dɩɩ the ʋrɛ kɔɔ naan sɩnɩɩ pa.

Gɩdonɩ mɩ jɩɛ jɩ tue dɩ thɩ̃ɛ na hale a na puno na lee sɩ kha na ɔɔ naʋa': A khir gɩ, a yi hananɛ gɩ, a thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ wɛ, a fãga hɩ̃darasɔ wɛ ƴũ, a thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hanɩ nɛnɛ̃ gɩrɛ gɩ, a gɩrɛ na ɩnanɩ gɩ,
a punoneekɛ thɛnɩ ƴũ a tɩɛr gɩ, thɩ̃ bɩɛl na halerakɛ thɩ̃ tinəne fɛʋra a na puno kpɩɩrakɛ a na lee sɩ na Thãgbaa naʋʋkɛ a na sɩnɩ dɩɩ the Jeju Kirisiti asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ pa ga.
Sobɔr mɩ-n so mɔ̃ mɩ donɩ Kirisitiida, ma-n sõsoa'. Ɩ̃ kpɩɛrnɔɔkɛ n pɛnɩ Thu Phuuda nũu yɩ gɛr dɩ sobɔr mɩ-n so,
dɩ gbobire jɔɔ na ha helle n har ɩ̃ hara wire fɛʋ.
Dɩ mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ ka nar sʋɔn n 'le mɩ gɩ lee mɩ kpɩɩ nakha Kirisiti ɩ̃ omisɔɔ sora, kɛ dɔnɩ ɩ̃ ca bɩnɔ,

kɛ dɔnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldara, kɛ Thãgba cʋʋnɩ dɩ wɩ do ɔɔ bikuunsɔ, a dona wɩrɛ a cʋʋnɩ dɩ wɩ jɩ mɔ̃ ɔɔ i dʋbɩ hanɩ, na wɩrɛ a kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanɩ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛ, na wɩrɛ a kɔɔ hanɩ jɔfʋ, na Thãgba fʋɔr bʋɔ, na wɩrɛ Thãgbaa ʋlfɛsɔ telenɩ,
kɛ dɔnɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩnaa məlsɔ. Kirisitii tibil dora wɛrra a the, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ kəəneni thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra gɩrɛ, Thãgba gɩ a hɩ̃ khɩɩrɛ waa khorr. Amɛn.
Sɩ ga do Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ debire a do mɔlɔ thɩ̃a', gɩdonɩ ga do wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛlɩ məl dʋɔn Ɩjɩrayɛldara ga.
Dɩ ga do wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ Abɩrahamɩ məl dʋɔn Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔa'. Sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ sor Abɩrahamna ayɩ: “Ɩjakɩɩ bɩsãsɔ wɛr na dɔ afɩ məl.”
Kɩrʋ dʋɔn, ga do bιsanaakɛ wι-n kɔnι wɛɛ kha wɛr n dɔ Thãgbaa bιsãsɔa'; sι ɔɔ məl dɔ bιsanaakɛ wι kɔnι mɔ̃ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnι ga har.
Hιnɛ gιrɛ dɔnι ʋlfɛ thιmιιrra gι sor ayι: “Wa bɔ caraakɛra ma birni ma-n ɩ̃ Sara na kʋɔn kũubir.”
Sι ga do gιrɛ dιbara ga, sι Rebekaa bιsãsɔ thι bιɛlι bisɔ wɛ, kɛ dɔnι Ɩjakι asι mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃.
Gɩdonɩ bɩsanaale na thenɩ dɩɩra pɩ a na eʋʋ bɔɔ dɩ puure ga,
Thãgba kɔɔ sor Rebekara ayɩ: “Diine na dɔ kɔ̃tɩn cacadaarra.” Dι thɩ̃ɛ thakɛ daan gι nιna dι Thãgba n phire ʋrɛ a-n ƴaalnι dι wιι, sι ga do tibili thɩ̃ cʋʋra gι tha'.
Dι gι har mɔ̃ gι kherenι Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Jakɔbι mι na sa bo Ejayʋ.”
Dι mɔ̃ sa so gιrɛ? Thãgba na-n cʋʋ gιrɛɛkɛ telenenaa yaa? Kpιιraka'.
Gιdonι a sor Mʋιjιra ayι: “Ʋrɛ mι-n ƴaalnι ɩ̃ jι bʋɔra, mι-n jιιrɛ bʋɔra, dι ʋrɛ mι-n ƴaalnι bʋɔ n fɔ mι ɔrra, bʋɔ n fʋ mɛr ɔrra.”
Dι gɛr gι ga do gele ther ʋrɛraakɛ n ƴaalɛnιι pa, agιbo ʋrɛraakɛ na cʋɛnι thɩ̃ɛɛ pa ga, sι gι ther Thãgbaraakɛ n jιɛnnι tibil bʋɔra.
Gι sor Thãgbaa sɛbɛra aa, Thãgba sor Eaarɔna ayι: “Mɛr ιrɛ fι mɛna fι do nɔɔ ɩ̃ nιna ɩ̃ fãga, gι do nɔɔ dakha ɩ̃ i n kpaar thιιraakɛ koo.”
Gɛr gι a-n jιrɛ ʋrɛ a-n ƴaalnι a jι bʋɔra, sι dι cʋʋ ʋrɛ a-n ƴaalnɩ dɩ ɔɔda n khɩɩr.
Dɩ anaa fa bule mer: Dɩ a thale gɩ, anye Thãgba hana na so tibilidara, gɩdonɩ ʋmɔ̃ hale na lã gɩrɛraakɛ a-n ƴaalnɩ?
Ɩ̃ kuun, amɛ fɛrkɛ do a na banana Thãgba thɩ̃ banaa? Bʋlaakɛ wɩ-n mɩnɩ na bulele ʋrɛ n mɩɛnɩ, anyera a-n cʋʋ nι thalera ya?
Ga do mιmι n dɔ kɔ̃tιn jaarra gaa? Ja bulo bιɛlla a-n gba dι mιna bʋlaa yenyɔ, bιɛl n do bʋla ɓʋ̃ɔ, dι bιɛl n do thɔ̃ pɔι cʋʋdaa.

Dι ga do gιrɛ Thãgba cʋʋnι thalera gι ha gaa? A kɔɔ ƴaalɛ wer a nιnana ɔɔ nĩkhi a cʋʋna tɩbɩla wɩ jɩ mɔ̃ ɔɔ fãga hanɩ, sɩɩ do a fʋrɛ haar jɔɔ bʋlaasɔraakɛ teananɩ a ɩrɛna gar ɔɔ nĩkhirə, kɛ dɔnɩ gɩrɛ dananɩ kʋɛrɛ.
A kɔɔ ƴaalɛ dakha a nɩna bʋlaasɔɔkɛ a jɩnɩ bʋɔra mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ i dʋbɩrɔnɩ a thʋ̃ kãasɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ bʋlaasɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ maanɩ thɩɩnɛ gɩ 'lɛ ɔɔ i dʋbɩ;
dɩ sɛr wɛ, kɛ a kɔɔ wenɩ sɩ ga do Juifi caarra ɩkha the dɩbara ga, sɩ ca kpal ɩkha harrɛ.
Gɛr dʋɔn gɩrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ sonɩ Ojee sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Wɩrɛɛkɛ na kɔɔ dɔnɩ ɩ̃ toa', ma we wer ɩ̃ too. Dɩ ʋrɛ na kɔɔ dɔnɩ ɩ̃ nadaara', ma wɩɩrɛ ʋrɛ mɩ nanɩ.
Dɩ pa dɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ so warnɩ ayɩ: Na do ɩ̃ toa', liir wa we wɩ Thãgba yidaarɩ bikuunsɔ.”
Ejaɩ dakha hulene Ɩjɩrayɛldara ayɩ: “Adorakɛ Ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsana jɔr a ho lanyɔ̃ gbalãkothɩn, sɩ gbe dɩbara na 'lɛ taarɛ;
gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ sonɩ, koo a na cʋʋ gɩ dɩ ga dã kɔrɔ thɩɩraakɛ.”
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ Ejaɩ kɔɔ 'laanɩ yɩɛ a sor ayɩ: “Ado Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ dɔnɩ fãga koo hɩ̃daar na kɔɔ sɩ sar məl ɩkha gbə', sa kɔɔ honanɛna Sɔdɔm dɩɩ, sa kɔɔ horra Gɔmɔɔr dɩɩ.”
Dɩ mɔ̃ sa so gɩrɛ? Ca kpalaakɛ na-n kɔɔ dɔnɩ bʋɔ sor n hɛla war Thãgbaa ƴɛra ga, wɩ 'lɛr so hɛllɛ, sɩ so hɛllɛ gɩɩkɛ thɛnɩ ha pɛrɛra;
sɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldara wer kɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ so hɛl jɔfʋ, wa kɔɔ yɩ jɔfʋ thala'.
Mɔ̃ dɔ kɩrʋ? Gɩdonɩ ga do ha pɛrɛra wɩ kɔɔ ƴaal ga, sɩ awɩ thɔ̃ cʋʋra wɩ kɔɔ ƴaal gɩ. Nɛ bara bokaarra wɩ kɔɔ be nɔɔ,
dɩ gɩ har mɔ̃kɛra gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Hɩnɛ mɩ thɩɩnɛ nɛ bara bokaar Sɩyɔna, nɛ bara gbãgbaan gɩ, dɩ ʋrɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar ɔrra, ga ɩ̃ kpɩɩrakɛ a na dʋʋraa yicuruə'.”
Ɩ̃ omisɔ gɩrɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ na haar fɛʋ na gɩrɛ mɩ-n bɩɛllɔnɩ Thãgba dʋɔn ɩ̃ ca n 'lɛ taarɛ.
Mɩ jɩrɛ tue awɩdara dɩ wɩ hananɛ gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛ wer Thãgbaadara, sɩ wa hana jɩɩrɩkɛ teanana'.
Wa jɩnɩ kɩrʋ mɔ̃ Thãgba n hɛlnɩ tɩbɩlala sora', wɩ-n ƴaalɛ gɩ dɔ awɩ thɛthɛɛ bɔ dora sor hɛl war, dɩɩ do mɛ̃ wɩ bo so hɛllɛɛkɛ n thɛnɩ Thãgbara.
Gɩdonɩ Kirisitii pa liir jɔfʋ khu, dɩ mɛ̃ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na pɩɛrnɩ haar na 'lɛ so hɛllɛ.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ kherenɩ mɔ̃kɛ sor na hɛlnɩ tibillə jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛna ayɩ: “Tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ sonɩ a na hana garɛ yire.”
Sɩ so hɛllɛɛkɛ n thɛnɩ ha pɛrɛra sor ayɩ: Fa-n so afɩ hara “amɛ na jʋnɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔa'“, a thɩɛna gaa gɩ cʋʋ Kirisiti a gbũ;
dɩ agɩbo “amɛ na gbuno tɩɛr dɩɩra ga”, a thɩɛna gaa gɩ cʋʋ Kirisiti a ɩɩr a the khirera.
Dɩ mɔ̃ gɩ so? Gɩ sor: “Thɩmɩɩrra na hʋnɔna fa', nɔɔ gɩ ha fɩ na haarra”, dɩ ha pɛ thɩmɩɩr gɩɩkɛ sɩ-n mɩɩnɩ.
Ado fɩ cã na afɩ nɔ ayɩ: Jeju dʋɔn Kɔ̃tɩn, dɩ ado fɩ pɛr haar na afɩ bɩ̃ dɩ Thãgba kɔɔ cʋgʋʋrɛ dɩ ɩɩr a the khirera, fa 'lɛr taarɛ.
Gɩdonɩ ha pɛrɛ Jejura na bɩnɛ tibil n 'lɛrɔ so hɛllɛ, sɩ caan na nʋɔ tibil n 'lɛrɔ taarɛ.
Gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛhɛra ayɩ: “Tibil wo tibilikɛ pιɛrnι haar ɔrra, ga ɩ̃ kpιιrakɛ a na dʋʋraa yicuruə'.”
Dι Juifi na ha kpιι, na wιrɛ na dɔnι Juifisɔa ha kpιa', wɛr fɛʋ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ bιɛlla wι hana, kɛ ɔɔ bɔna jɔɔ n danι wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n wιɛnι.
Gιdonι Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayι: “Tibil wo tibilikɛ na wɛnι Kɔ̃tιnι i a na 'lɛr taarɛ.”
Dι mɔ̃ wa fʋ sι na wιι agado haar wι kɔɔ pɛr ɔrra boa? Dɩ mɔ̃ wa fʋ sι na pɛr haar ʋrɛraakɛ wa kɔɔ nιnι ɔɔ thιmιa? Dι mɔ̃ wa fʋ sι na nι ɔɔda ado mιmιι na hala?
Dι mɔ̃ mιmιa na fʋ sι na hale agado wι thɔ̃ wɛra? Gι kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Wιrɛ n ιnanι na tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι, awι ɩ̃ n daarɛ ka.”
Sι ga do fɛʋ kɔɔ tuon tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιa'; Ejaιɩ thɛthɛrakɛ kɔɔ mɩɩrɛ ayɩ: “Kɔ̃tɩn, amɛ pɩɛr haar gɩrɛraakɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ?”
Mɛ̃ ha pɛrɛ n the gɩrɛraakɛ tibil n nɩnɩ, dɩ gɩrɛra tibil n nɩnɩ Kirisitii thɩmɩɩra gɩ the.
Dɩ mɩ-n bulele: Wa ba nɩa yaa? Ɔɔ, wɩ nɩɛrɛ kɛ, mee Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “Awɩ nɔ kpaarɛ thɩɩraakɛ fɛʋ, dɩ awɩ thɩmɩɩ jaal a dã thɩɩ khu pa.”
Mɩ bire ma-n bule wo: Ɩjɩrayɛldara na kɔɔ jaa yaa? Mʋɩjɩ dɔ cacadaarɩkɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ: “Ma cʋʋrɛ dι gbugi na fʋ nι caarraakɛ na dɔnι caara'; Caarιkɛ na jɛnι thɩ̃a', ma cʋʋrɛ nĩkhii dɩ ga fʋ nɩ wɛrra.”
Dɩ Ejaɩ 'larrakɛ ɓoɓo a so: “Wɩrɛ na kɔɔ hana mɩnɩ ƴaala', wɩ yɩ mɛr; mɩ kɔɔ nɩnanɛ dɩbara wɩrɛɛkɛ na-n kɔɔ buleneni thɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃dara ga.”
Sɩ Ɩjɩrayɛldaraadara wer, a sor ayɩ: “Dɩwɩlʋ koo mɩ-n kɔɔ 'laa nyɛ̃ɛ caarraakɛ dɔnɩ nũ nʋra wa-n gba ɩ̃da ga.”
Dɩ gɛr gɩ mɩ-n bulele ayɩ: Thãgba bor ɔɔ too yaa? Kpɩɩraka', gɩdonɩ mɛrɛ dakha Ɩjɩrayɛldaar ha mɩ, Abɩrahamɩ məl mɩ do, a do Bɛ̃jamɛ̃ɛ ca.
Thãgba na bo ɔɔ tookɛ a kɔɔ maanɩ jɩɩra'. Na jɩ thɩmɩɩ gɩrɛ kherenenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra, ka Elɩ mɩɩnanɩ Thãgba da-n pɛ Ɩjɩrayɛldara soraa, ayɩ:
“Kɔ̃tɩn wɩ kʋʋrɛ afι bobonasɔ a tʋɔrna afι bonι ji pasɔ a kpɛɛ, sιι do mɛr bιɛl sɛ gιrɛ 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ dι wι-n ƴaalɛ dakha ɩ̃ yʋ.”
Sι anye Thãgba sʋʋraa? “Mι tire kona gbιlanι makonyɔ wι dɔ ɩ̃da, kɛ na gulẽganɛnι a fʋɔr Baala'.”
Mɛna gι ha dakha nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ, wɛ hale sɛnι gbe kɛ Thãgba phiirni ɔɔ bɔ jιra.
Dι ado bɔ jιιrra gι, ga the thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra bã; ado thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra gι the, ga dor bɔ jιιr na do bɔ jιιr bã.
Dι mɔ̃ ga ha dɩphã? Gɩrɛ Ɩjɩrayɛldara n ƴaalnɩ wa kɔɔ 'lɛ ga, sɩ wɩrɛ Thãgba phiirni wer kɔɔ 'lɛ gɛr; sɩ wɩrɛ sɛnɩ awɩ ha dibire.
Dɩ gɩ har mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Thãgba kɔɔ hana wɩ haar thirfirii, na yinəəkɛ na dɔnɩ ga yɩra', na nũukɛ na dɔnɩ ga nɩra', a dana nĩkɛ.”
Dɩ Davɩdɩ sor ayɩ: “Awɩ dɩko kho pa n dɔ war waya na pheru, na ji paar, na so heeneekɛ na teana wɩnɩ.
Awɩ yi n hana thũu wa ya', dɩ cʋɛ wɩ wa-n gũguun wire koo.”
Dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ bule ayɩ: Nɔɔra Juifisɔ benɩ a ji, khorr wɩ ba ji yaa? Kpɩɩa'. Awɩ jirə dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ca kpala 'lɛ taarɛ gɩ cʋʋ gbugi gɩ fʋ wɛr Juifisɔ awɩdara.
Dɩ ado awɩ ji dor tɩbɩla fɛʋ thɩɩraa bɔna 'lɛ pa, dɩ ado awɩ dɩ pa dor ca kpalaa bɔna 'lɛ pa, mɔ̃ awɩ nɔ dã na thʋ̃ na ha?
Sɩ nɛr ca kpala mɩ-n so gɩrɛ: Gɩdonɩ mɩ dor thɔ̃thɔn ca kpalala, mɩ-n gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛ ɩ̃ thɔna,
anaa ma yɩrɔrɛ fʋ paar ɩ̃ cʋʋ ɩ̃ ca gbugi n fʋ wɩ, ɩkhasɔ wɛrra n puno wɩ 'lɛ taarɛ.
Gɩdonɩ ado borɩkɛ Thãgba bo wɩnɩ dor tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ bir kũu kha na Thãgba, mɔ̃ awɩ bir gba na cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ na pɔna, ga dor khe birə a 'lɛ yirəə?
A wɩ ha Thãgba caca mɩ̃ bolookɛ wɩ khenɩ, koo dɔ daphuu, dɩ a thɩr nɛɛ do daphuu mɛ̃ jɛ̃ɛ na ha dakha.
Sɩ ado Thãgba kɔɔ kurre ɩkhaa olɩvɩ thɩr jɛ̃sɔ a faa sɩɩ do fɛrkɛ dɔnɩ hɔ̃ olɩvɩ thɩrʋ a gba fɛr a cooro, dɩɩ do ɔɔ nɛ na ɔɔ ƴɔ̃ fɩ bullo,
fa-n məbi jɛɛnaala'; sɩ ado fa məbi jɛ gɩ do ga do fɛr fʋɔn nɛa', sɩ nɛɛ fɔ fɩ jɩɩlna.
Sɩ fa sor nayɩ: Mee, jɛ̃ɛle kurre a faa sɩ ɩ̃ fi ɩ̃ cooro.
Sobɔr gɩ wer, gɩ kɔɔ kuurre a faa gɩdonɩ ga hana ha pɛra', sɩ fɛrɛ ha pɛrɛɛkɛ fɩ hananɩ gɛr dʋɔn afɩ too. Fa-n ti gunə', sɩ dɔ maar n ka fʋ fɩ.
Gɩdonɩ ado Thãgba na kɔɔ sɩ thɩr thernaa jɛna ga, a na sι far dakha ga.

Yɛ mɔ̃ Thãgba bɔrnι na wo mɔ̃ ɔɔda na-n wurnə': Wιrɛraakɛ jenι a-n nιna wɛr mɔ̃ ɔɔda na-n wurnə', sι fɛrɛra wer a-n nιna fɛr mɔ̃ a bɔrnι adora fι jιɛ too bɔɔbɔɔ ga bɔ caraalera, agado mɛ̃ ga fɛrɛ dakha a na kur fer na faa.
Wɛr Juifisɔ dakha wer, ado wa bo too awι baalla ga, Thãgba na coor wer kãkɛ wι kɔɔ hanι, gιdonι Thãgba hananɛ punone a na cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛ thale.

Ado nɛr ca kpalaakɛ dɔnι hɔ̃ olιvι thιr jɛ̃ɛ, kɛ Thãgba kɔɔ kurni a coor olιvι thιr thernanɛna sιι dorakɛ ga teena gι hana mã', mɔ̃ ga fʋ sιι do Juifisɔɔkɛ gbonι do olιvι thιr thernanɛ Thãgba na coor wι awι thɛthɛɛ olιvι thιrra ga?

Gɩdonɩ ma-n ƴaal nɩ omɩna na-n jɩ thɩ̃ gbulikaa ga, gɩ do nɔɔ na-n kpɩɛr waa gɩ ho thɩ̃ jɩna hana'; a thɩɛna gaa ga do Ɩjɩrayɛldaraa yaarra ƴɛrr ga jala', sɩ bɔɔkɛ ca kpala fɛʋ lonɩ na pɩ, dɩ nʋɔ dã, gɛr ga khuro;
mɛ̃ Ɩjɩrayɛl ɓibi na 'lɛ taarɛ, gɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Sɩyɔna Taadaar na the, a na tire Jakɔbɩɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn thɩ̃ gõgolõ;
gɛr na dɔ ɩ̃ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ na wɛr, ɔbɔɔkɛ ma faanɩ awɩ sopugosɔ.”
Ado tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra gɩ, sobɔr gɩ wer, Juifisɔ dor lãlara na Thãgba, sɩ dɩ nɩ fi a ka yɩrɔ bɔɔ; sɩ ado phiirera gɩ, Thãgba na wɛr dɩɩ do awɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ dɔ nɔɔ.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba na do dadebinaa ɔɔ khaarda 'laara na ɔɔ wera ga.
Mamara nɩ kɔɔ nʋʋrɛ nũu Thãgbara, sɩ nɛnɛ̃ Thãgba jɩ nɛr bʋɔra dɩɩ do Juifisɔɔ nũ nʋʋr dɔ nɔɔ.
Mɛna dakha Juifisɔ nʋʋr nũu nɛnɛ̃ gɩ do nɔɔ bʋɔraakɛ Thãgba jɩ nɩnɩ wɩ 'lɛrɔ dakha bɔ jɩɩr wer.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba tor tɩbɩla fɛʋ nũ nʋʋrɛra gɩ do nɔɔ a jɩ wɩ fɛʋ bʋɔra.
