Anyee gbɛbι ca Thãgbaa cɔ na gbɛbι na thιla? Gιdonι sɛr dʋɔn cʋɔr Thãgba yidaarra, mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba kɔɔ sonι ayι: “Ma toore awι bιnɔ, ma-n kpaarɛ awι thɩ̃thιιn. Ma dor awι Thãgba, dι wa dor ɩ̃ too.”
Gɛr gι, “Nι thɛ awι thɩ̃thιιn, nι lea hana kpιι, Kɔ̃tιn sɔ. Na-n tha gιrɛraakɛ bisenenə', dι mɛrɛ ma tee ner,
dι ma do narɛ Thιrɛ, dι nɛrɛ na do marɛ bikona na bikhɛna, mɛr Kɔ̃tιn fãga fɛʋʋ hɩ̃daar sɔ.”
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mι-n nanι, mɔ̃kɛ sι hananι ʋlfɛ ca gιrɛ, sι phʋɔlɛ khorr gιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n biseneni tomιr na thue, a na bãbanɛ na asι kpιι lee Thãgba maarra.
Nι tea sι na haar. Sa dι tibillə ga, sa kʋɛ tibilə', sa phʋʋn tibil woa'.
Ga do sor mι-n heen nι mι mιιnι thakaa koe. Gιdonι mι kɔɔ 'lire sor ayι: Sι fʋ nɛr na haar, a sι har kha kɛ na yire, a sι-n khire kha.
Mι hana narɛ ha pɛrɛ jɔɔ ka. Mι hananɛ məbidaa ka nɛrɛra, ha ƴɔllɛ ha marɛ vʋ̃ʋ, daʋ thʋnɛ ka mar asι bɔ gaar fɛʋʋ thɩ̃thιιn.
Gιdonι a fʋna bɔɔkɛ sι kɔɔ danι Masedʋan sa kɔɔ yι hιιrɛ fιιʋraka', sι sι kɔɔ gaarɛ bʋɔ thɩ̃ɛ dιιdιιra. Kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ jιɛra, maar bιnɔ.
Sι Thãgbaakɛ n cʋɛnι wιrɛ kpιɛrɛ nyanyaanι dι wa-n faa haar, ɔr kɔɔ cʋɛ dι Tιtɩɩ ɩ̃ do nɔɔ dɩ sɩ faa haar.

Sɩrakɛ ga do ɔɔ ɩ̃ιle dɔ nɔɔ dɩbara ga, sɩ gɩdonɩ Tɩtɩɩ thɛthɛ 'lɛr ha faarɛ anɩdara, a mɩɛ sɛr mɔ̃ nɩ-n ƴaal mɩnɩ ka, a mɩɛna anɩ gbobi, na mɔ̃ anɩ gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ mɛrɛra hanɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ daʋ fʋ mɩ dɩphã waa a ka.
Sɩrakɛ ɩ̃ sɛbɛ cʋʋ nɩnɩ dɩ nɩ gbobi sɩ ma so a ma ja', gɩdonɩ mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩ sɛbɛɛle cʋʋ nɛr dɩ nɩ gbobi, sɩ bɔɔ gbe gɩ.

Dɩ adorakɛ mɩ kɔɔ sor a ma jɩ, sɩ nɛnɛ̃kɛ gɩ da marɛ, ga do gɩdonɩ nɩ gbobire ga, sɩ gɩdonɩ anɩ gbobi thɔɔ nɛr pɛ ha debirera. Gιdonι mɔ̃ Thãgba ƴaalnɩ nɩ kɔɔ gbobi, dɩ mɛ̃ ga do sɛr pɛ nar ga soole fɩɩʋraka'.
Gɩdonɩ gbobire mɔ̃ Thãgba tuni n ɩnanɛ ha debire, kɛ n thɔɔnɩ tibil dɩ pɛ taarɛra, dɩ ha debi ca ole na hana tibil n soro a ma ja'; sɩ gbobireekɛ dɔnɩ thɩdaa khir gɩ-n ɩna.

Gbobi ca ʋrɛ hanɩ mɔ̃ Thãgba tuni, nɩ hɩnɛ gɩrɛ gɩ cʋʋ narnɩ ɓoɓo dɩ nɩ pər waa gel, na mɔ̃ nɩ gbuuni thɩmɩɩrraale yʋʋ, na mɔ̃ gɩ hel nɩnɩ haar, na mɔ̃ maar fʋ nɩnɩ, na mɔ̃ anɩ ƴaal kɔ̃tɩ̃ hanɩ, na mɔ̃ anɩ gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ hanɩ, na mɔ̃ anɩ thɩ̃ naar hanɩ. Dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋraakɛ nɩ nɩna dɩ na hana dɩɩ thɩmɩɩrraala'.
Ado mɩ kɔɔ khere narɛ ga do ʋrɛ cʋɛnɩ puureele, agɩbo dɩ ʋrɛ wɩ cʋʋrɔnɩ puureele mɩ khereroa', sɩ gɩ do nɔɔ nɩ jɩ anɩbara Thãgbaa ƴɛra mɔ̃ anɩ pər sɛrɛra hanɩ.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ sɩ kɔɔ faa haar; sɩ asɩ ha faara kãkar n pɛrɛ jɔɔ, dɩɩ the daʋraakɛ kɔɔ fɔnɩ Tɩtɩ, gɩdonɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ kɔɔ cʋgʋʋrɛ dɩ daʋ fʋʋ.
Sɩ ado anɩda dɩkha kɔɔ dor nɔɔ dɩ ɩ̃ məbiro Tɩtɩɩ ƴɛra, ƴicuru na kɔɔ fʋ ma', gɩdonɩ mɔ̃kɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ nɩnɩ donɩ sobɔr, mɛ̃ asι məbi Tɩtɩɩ ƴɛra ha, dɩ sobɔrra wɩ yɩ gɩ dɩɩ do.
Naʋʋkɛ a hananɩ nɛrɛra n pɛrɛ jɔɔ, mɔ̃ a-n jɩnanɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋʋ nũ nι, na teereekɛ nι kɔɔ teguuni na maar na jẽu.
Gɩ da marɛ mɔ̃ mɩ hana narnɩ tu jɩɩr thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
Omɩna, sɩ cʋʋ nɛr nɩ jɛna Thãgbaa bɔ jɩɩkɛ yɩranɩ Masedʋan we gbɛbɩdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Bɔ gaarɛɛ mɩɛ kɔ̃tɩnaakɛ wɩ kɔɔ hanɩ, awɩ daakɛ jʋɔnɔnɩ na awɩ bɔdaar do phuphuphul, pɛ warɛ ha bulo thɩ̃ 'laarɛ dɩɩ kãasɩ.
Mɩ punone so wɩ kɔɔ 'laarɛ na haar kpẽgelẽ mɔ̃ awɩ puno hanɩ, wɩ kɔɔ 'laarɛrakɛ dɩɩ ka jɔ mɔ̃ awɩ puno hanɩ.
Wɩ kɔɔ bɩɛl sɛr na haar fɛʋ aa, hʋɛ n hanale ɩnɩ-n puno iner ɩnɩ-n har tɩɩ phuusɔɔ bul thɔnana.
Wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋrɛ dɩɩ jɔ gɩrɛ sɩ kanɩ kɔɔ kpɩɛr, sɩ awɩbara wɩ kɔɔ faa a ha Kɔ̃tɩn ɓo, dɩ mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba tuni wɩ kɔɔ faa awɩbara dakha a ha sɩ.
Gɛr gɩ sɩ kɔɔ bɩɛlɛ Tɩtɩ dɩ na pɩɩr anɩ pa ga ha bulo thɔ̃ caale mɔ̃kɛ a kɔɔ ɩɩrna gɩnɩ.
Mɔ̃kɛ gɩdonɩ thɩɛna fɛʋ nɛr n jɔ, ha pɛrɛra, thɩmɩɩrra, jɩɩrra, na pərre dɩɩdɩɩra fɛʋ, na anɩ naʋraakɛ thɛnɩ asɩ pa, ɔmɛ̃ nɩ dɔ wɩrɛ na jɔnɩ ga ha bulo thɔ̃ caraale.
Mɩ sonɩ thakɛ ga do jɔfʋ mɩ-n pɛ nara', sɩ ɩkhasɔɔ pər mɩ gba a bena nɩ bɩnɛ dɩ ma-n hɩɩn ado anɩ naʋra sobɔr gɩ do.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩrɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii bɔ jɩ, mɔ̃ a kɔɔ donɩ lẽledaar sa tu a do bɔdaar anɩ sora, dɩ ɔɔ bɔdaar dora na cʋɛ nɩ dɩ na le.
Ɩ̃ kpɩɛrnɔ mɩ ha nɩ dɩbara dɔrɔɔm gɩdonɩ gɩ teere kha, gɩdonɩ a fʋna ƴakhɛrɔ nɛr kɔɔ kʋlɛ ƴɩɛ, ga do thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra dɩbara ga, sɩ ƴaalɛla dakha.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ pɩrɛ gɩrɛra nɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnι, dι mɔ̃kɛ nι kɔɔ gʋʋrnι na haar fɛʋ gι hana, nι cʋɛ gι gι pι mɔ̃kɛ anι puno hanι.
Ado tibil 'laa thɩ̃ɛ na haar fɛʋ mɔ̃ ɔɔ puno hanι, gɛr n da Thãgba haar, sι ga do gιrɛ ntɛ na hananaa wι soaa dɛ.
Ga do dι ga pɛ nar bʋɔ sι gι ba ιkhasɔra ga, sι gι cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ gɩ mãkha kha.
Nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ anɩ thɩ̃ jɔ hana n bulle awɩ thɩ̃ ɓɔr, dɩ mɛ̃ dakha awɩ thɩ̃ jɔ hana na bul anɩ thɩ̃ ɓɔr, dɩ mɛ̃ mãkhar na hale,
mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ khɩanɩ jɔɔ na hana thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ kara', dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ khɩanɩ gbe thɩ̃ɛ na ɓɔrʋa'.”
Thãgba hɩna fʋɔrɛ, gɩrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ pɛrnɩ Tɩtɩɩ hara dɩ hana nar ga pər ca bɩɛlɩkɛra.
Gɩdonɩ a ture asɩ bɩɛl, sɩ ɔɔ ƴaalla gɩ kɔɔ therakɛ mɔ̃ a-n pərni jɔɔ ka dɩ a na pɔ le na yɩ nɩ.
Sɩ-n thɔnaanɛ kha omineekɛ hananɩ i bʋɔ we gbɛbɩdara fɛʋʋ thɩ̃thɩɩn tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra.
Wo, we gbɛbɩdara kɔɔ phiiruure a dɔ asɩ kpakpaar ga ha bulo thɔ̃ cʋʋraakɛra sι-n cʋʋnι, ga-n dʋba Kɔ̃tιnι thɛthɛɛ i, ga-n nιnana dakha mɔ̃ asι ƴaal bɔ hanι.
Gιdonι sa ƴaal tibil n pɛ sar sor mũsũ jɔraakɛ wι dʋ sιnι nyɔ̃kɔa'.
Gιdonι sι-n ƴaalɛ gιrɛ bʋɔnɔnι, ga do Kɔ̃tιnι ƴɛra dιbara ga, sι dakha tιbιlaa ƴɛra.
Sι-n thɔna wɛr dakha asι omi ʋrɛ sι kɔɔ jιιnι jʋʋr ɔɔ pər thɩ̃ɛ dιιdιιra a hιιn, kɛ n nɛnanι nɛnɛ̃ dakha mɔ̃ ɔɔ pərra jɔɔ hanι, dιι the ha pɛrɛraakɛ a hananι nɛrɛra.
Sι ado Tιtι gι, ɔr dʋɔn ɩ̃ bubul na ʋrɛ sι-n donanι kha thɔma anι pa. Sι ado asι omisɔ wɛ, we gbɛbιdaraa thɔ̃thɔna ha wι na Kirisitii i dʋbιdara.
Dι gɛr gι nι nɛna wι we gbɛbιdaraa ƴɛra mɔ̃ anι naʋ hanι, na hʋɛɛkɛ sι kɔɔ hananι anιdara dι sa-n məbi.
Ado gιrɛraakɛ dɔnι tιι phuusɔɔ bul thɔ̃ gι, ma laar 'lo na khere nar sɛba'.
Gιdonι mι jιrɛ anι ƴaal bɔ, dɩ gɛr mɩ-n məbiro anιdara Masedʋandaraa thɩ̃thιιn a so war ayι: Akaιdara kɔɔ gbɛbιrɛ pι kɛkɛkɛ ƴakhɛrɔ. Dι anι gbɛ̃gbɛrɛna kɔɔ jaa tibil jɔjʋɔ.
Mι-n thʋɔn omιna dι mɛ̃ anιdaakɛ mι-n məbironi gelelala na do mɔlɔa', dι dakha wι yι nι nι gbɛbιrι nι pι mɔna mι kɔɔ sonι.
Ado mɛ̃ ga, sι dι sι pɔ kha na Masedʋandara dι na gbɛbι a pa', ga dor mɔ̃ sι yιnι sι jιrɛ anι ti, na dor asι yicur na anιda.
Mι kɔɔ kpιɛrɛ gι bɔrɛ gɛr gι dι ɩ̃ kɔɔ bιɛl omιna wι kʋʋl nι ƴιɛ wι pɔ anι pa, wι kɔɔ gbɛbι ha bulo khaardaakɛ nι kɔɔ 'lini sor na 'laarɛ; mι-n ƴaalɛ gι dɔ ha bulo khaardaa ga-n ho bɩ̃ puudaa ga.
Nι jɛ ʋrɛ direni fιιʋ, fιιʋra a na kha, sι ʋrɛ direni jɔɔ, jɔɔra a na kha.
Tιbιla fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl na-n 'laanɛ mɔ̃ ntɛɛ bɩ̃ kpιɛr hanι, wa-n 'laa na gbobira', ga-n ho tɔ pɛr gι woa'; gιdonι Thãgba n nar ʋrɛɛkɛ n 'laanɛnι na kãkar.
Thãgba hananɛ punone a na bɔna nι na bɔna caar fɛʋ dιιdιι, dι mɛ̃ na-n hana wire fɛʋ gιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na-n dana nιnι, na hana gɛr dι a jɔr na ka, na-n cʋʋna thɔ̃ bʋɔ fɛʋ,
mɔ̃kɛ gι kherenι Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Ha bulole a-n 'laana khaardaa jɔɔ bɔdarara, ɔɔ fιl sar khorr gι too.”
Ʋrɛ n 'laanɛnι be bi jaldaarra na dιkɔ a khɔ, ɔr na 'laanɛ be na ha nι dι a dɛbιrɔ, dι ɔr na cʋɛ dι ha bulo be na se nar ga-n pɛr.
Dι mɔ̃ nι hananι thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ na punone na-n 'laa thɩ̃ɛ na ha bulole, dɩ anι khaardasɔɔkɛra sι-n 'laanι ga 'laarɛ Thãgba khιιrɛ.
Gιdonι bul thɩ̃ɛɛkɛra n 'laanɛnι, ga do tιι phuusɔ gι-n bul thɩ̃ ɓɔrɛra dιbara ga, sι dakha ga tɔr Thãgba khιιrɛ jɔɔ ga-n pɛr.
Ga bul thɔ̃ɔkɛ n nɛna mɔ̃ nι hanι, dι wa-n khιι Thãgba anι nũ nιra mɔ̃kɛ nι tuni Kirisitii tutugo bɔ thιmιι, na ha bulo thɩ̃ 'laarɛraakɛra n nɛnanɩ anɩ kũu bɩnɔ do na wɛr, na tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Dɩ wɩ-n bɩɛlɛ Thãgba dɩ wa-n pɛ nar gɩdonɩ nɩ lõ wer haar, dɩɩ the bɔ jɩɩrraakɛ thʋnanɩ kar, kɛ Thãgba jɩ nɩnɩ.
Thãgba hɩna khɩɩrɛ ɔɔ khaardaraakɛ na hanɩ mɩɛrɛra ga.
Mɛr Pol, mɩ-n phʋʋr nɛr na hɛlɛlɛ fιlɛ na bɩ̃ bʋɔraakɛ dɔnι Kirisitiida, mɛrkɛ n hanι hɛlɛlɛ a mι ha anι thɩ̃thιιn, sι a mι hʋnɔ ma-n 'la nι kpãkpalã ga.
Mι-n ƴɛɛ nɛr dι na-n do ɔbɔɔkɛ ma hanι anι pa, ma ιιrna narɛ 'larιkɛ mι hananι a kpιɛr ma ιιrnanɛ ιkhasɔraakɛ n kpιɛrɛnι aa, mɔ̃kɛ tibili tibil do pa hanι sι-n ιιra'.
Tibil sι do wer, sι ga do mɔ̃kɛ tibili tibil do pa hanι sι-n kɛ̃kɛrã'.
Gιdonι ko ke thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ sι-n kɛ̃kɛrɛnanι ga do tibildaa ga, sι Thãgba dɔ nɔɔ dιι hana fãga ka, a na puno gɩrɛ na dɔnɩ datutugonaa ga a na wɩɛl. Sɩ-n bũburonanɛ mɔlɔ kpɩɛrɛsɔ,
na gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n ɩrɛnɩ na gũ tir dɩ a-n kɛ̃kɛrɛna Thãgba jɩɩr, sɩ-n fʋrɛ kpɩɛrɛ fɛʋ dɩ sɩ khɩmɩnɔ ga-n nɛ Kirisiti nũu.
Sɩ gbɛbɩrɛ pɩ dɩ sa heen nũ nʋra sor ɔbɔɔkɛ anɩ nũ nɩ danɩ.
Nɩ hɩnɛ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ hanɩ. A tibil n kpɩɛrɛ Kirisitiida ɩnɩ do, dɔ a bir a kpɩɛr ɔɔ bɩnɔ a hɩɩn, mɔ̃ a donɩ Kirisitiida, sɛrɛ dakha Kirisitiida sɩ do ser.
Gɩdonɩ adorakɛ ma məbire dɩ a kãasɩ gbe hʋ hananɛnaakɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ ha sɩnɩ, gɩ cʋʋ nɩ nɩ khɔ̃ na-n pɛr ga do gɩ kʋɛ na', yicuru na fʋ ma'.
Ga do mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ ho mɩ-n phərə ner na ɩ̃ sɛba'.
Wɩ-n sor dɩ wɩ yɩ, ɔɔ sɛbɛ khɩɩrɛ ka, ga-n gɔ kpãkpalã ga, sɩ a fɩ yɩ ɔɔ thɛthɛ, sʋmʋmʋ̃ a ha dɩ ɔɔ nɔ thɩmɩɩ mɔlɔ thɩmɩa yɛ.
Dɔ ntɛɛle n mɩanɩ thale n jɩ: Mɔ̃ asɩ thɩmɩɩ n hanɩ sɛbɛra ado sa hala', mɛ̃ dakha asɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ n ha ado sɩ hale.
Sa 'la na gba asɩbara na mɩɛna tibil ɩkhasɔɔkɛ n kpãganɛnɩ dɩbara ga, agɩbo sɩ yɩ sɩ jɛ ʋrɛ jɔna', mɔ̃ wɩ-n mɩɛnɩ dɩbara na awɩ mɩɛda awɩ ha wɩ jɩ ʋrɛ jɔnɩ, fɩlɛ ɓɔra wɩ.
Sɩ sɛrɛ, asɩ məbi na kãasɩ gɩrɛraakɛ sɩ kɔɔ cʋʋna', sι ka Thãgba yιnι sι dɔ asι thɔ̃ kho, le sι khu, dι anι pa gι khu.
Sa-n kãasι asι pɛla', gι ho sa kɔɔ pɔ a dã anι pa gaaga, gιdonι sɛr dɔ wιrɛ kɔɔ dana nιnι waa gel na Kirisitii tutugo bʋɔ.
Asι məbi na kãasι gιrɛraakɛ sι cʋʋna', dι sa məbi haanι thɔna ga, sι sɩ hananɛ nũ pɛrɛ anɩ ha pɛ n khɔna pɩɛr, sɩ yɩ hʋɛ asɩ thɔ̃ pɛl n tɔ gɩ pɛr,
dɩ sa mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔ anɩ billo, sɩ sa too sa-n məbi thɔmanaakɛ ʋkha kɔɔ 'lini cʋʋra', gɩ ha mɔna gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ:
“Dɔ ʋrɛ n məbəni, a na-n məbi gɩrɛraakɛ Kɔ̃tɩn cʋʋnɩ.”
Gɩdonɩ ga do ʋrɛ n kpãganɛnɩ dɩbara ɔr wɩ-n we tibilə', sɩ ʋrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn n kpãganɩ gɩ.
Ga da marɛ ado na punone na fʋ haar ɩ̃ mɩɩ də̃bəəle fɩɩʋ, sɩ nɩ-n fʋrɛrakɛ haar.
Gɩdonɩ gbugiikɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara fʋ mɛr anɩ sora, gɩdonɩ mɩ kɔɔ gba nɛr a ha kũu bɩɛl dɩ Kirisiti gɩ, dɩ nɩ dʋʋraa khɛ biir phuukɛ na jɛnɩ kuuna'.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ sii kɔɔ fɩɩlnɩ Ɛvɩ na ɔɔ fɩɩlla, maar n fʋ mɛr dɩ anɩ kpɩɛr na kʋɛrɛ, gɩ kɛr sɩ gɩ faa sobɔr na phur Kirisitira.
Gɩdonɩ a tibil pɔ nar na mɩɩ nar Jeju kpɩɩ na ʋrɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ narnɩ, dɩ agɩbo nɩ 'lɛr Thue dɩ ha kpɩɩ na ʋrɛɛkɛ nɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ, agɩbo tutugo bɔ kpɩɩ gɩ na gɩrɛɛkɛ nɩ kɔɔ teenɩ, nɩ-n fʋrɛ haar bɔɔbɔɔ.
Mɩ pɛrɛ haar ma 'lũ thɩ̃ bɩɛllalakɛ a jɔ wa thɔ̃thɔnaale bʋɔnɔnɩ ka ga.
Dɩ ado mɩ hor tibil ba thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛra, sɩ jɩɩr wer na ɓɔr ma', dɩ sɩ kɔɔ nɩna gɛr anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn tɩbɩlala fɛʋ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
Sopugo mɩ ba cʋʋ gɩrɛraakɛ mɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ nɩnɩ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔ khaar yaa? Mɛr wuro mɛ̃ sɩ ner n ka nɩ ɩɩr.
Ɩkhaa we gbɛbɩdarara mɩ kɔɔ 'lɛ bulle, wɛrra mɩ-n 'lɛ loka nɔɔ dɩ ma-n dona nar thɔma.

Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ hanɩ anɩ pa dɩ bʋɔ kɔɔ fʋ mɩ, ma kɔɔ do heendaa tibillə ga; gɩdonɩ omɩnaakɛ thɛnɩ Masedʋan n kɔɔ hana mɩ gɩrɛ n ɓɔra mɩnɩ. Dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra mɩ kɔɔ fʋrɛ dɩbara dɩ ma do nar heendaa ga, dɩ ma fʋrɛ dɩbarararakɛ 'lo.
Sobɔrraakɛ n thɛnɩ Kirisitiraakɛ ha marnɩ, mɩ sor ayɩ: Thɩ̃ɛ na hale na tɔ̃ mɩ məbire ga thɩnaakɛ Akaɩ dɩɩra ga.
Mɔ̃ dɔ nɔɔ? Gɩdonɩ a thɩɛna gaa ma na naa ya? Thãgba jɩ gɛr.
Gɩrɛra mɩ-n cʋʋnɩ ma cʋʋrɛrakɛ ma-n jalna, dι mɛ̃ ga khaan hʋɛ wιrɛraakɛ n ƴaalɛnι hʋɛ wι yɛ sι mãkhanɛ kha gιrɛraakɛ wι-n məbironi.
Tιbιlaale sõso thɔ̃thɔna wɛ, dι fιfιιl thɔ̃ dona wɛ, dι wι debi ho Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔ̃sɔ.
Sι gele ga do nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ ga, gιdonι Satãa thɛthɛ n debire dι ho thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu hιrɛ.
Dι ga do nɔ kpaarɛ gι ado ɔɔ thɔ̃ dodaarsɔɔle debi a ho fιl sar thɔ̃ dona ga. Awι khu pa na har mɔ̃ awι thɔ̃ hanι.
Mι bire 'loro wo, tibil na-n hιιn mι ɩ̃ ho də̃bələ', dι a gι harakɛ mɛ̃, sι nι tea mι ɩ̃ dole də̃bəllə, dι mɛ̃ ma məbi dakha gbe.
Gιrɛ mι sonɩ gɩrɛ, ga do mɔ̃ Kɔ̃tɩn n ƴaalnɩ mɩ soa', sɩ gɩ hor mɔ̃kɛ də̃bəəle n ɩɩrnanɩ tibil dɩ mɩɩ thɩ̃ɛ, dɩ gɩrɛra mɩ-n məbironi tu jɩɩr harrɛ.
Gɩdonɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ hale n məbəni sɩɩ do awɩ məbira məbire gɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ tibili tibil do pada, mɛrɛ dakha ma-n məbire.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ-n fʋrɛ haar də̃bələla ka nɛrkɛ jɛnɩ fɩlɛ.
Ado tibil na pɔtɔrɔ nɩ, ado tibil na kho nɩ, ado tibil na tagɩrɩ nɩ, ado tibil na so nar kuune, ado tibil be nɩ ƴɩɛ, nɩ-n fʋ garɛ haar.
Yicuru fʋ mɛr dɩ ma so nayɩ: Sɩ kɔɔ nɩna nɛr mɔ̃kɛ asɩda na khɩɩrna'. Sɩ gɩrɛ tibil n kpãgarɔnɩ dɩbara, mɩ punone cʋʋ mɛ̃ mer, də̃bəəlela mι mɩɩ.
Ebirəsɔ ha wɩ ya? Mɛrɛ dakha Ebirəra ha mɩ mer. Ɩjɩrayɛldara ha wɩ ya? Mɛrɛ dakha. Abɩrahamɩ məl ha wɩ ya? Mɛrɛ dakha.
Kirisitii thɔ̃dara ha wɩ ya? Mɩ do ger dɩɩ jɔ mɛ̃, sɩ də̃bəəlela mɩ mɩɩ wo. Thɔ̃ khe dʋʋrra mɩ jɔ wɛr, khaɩ pɛrra mɩ jɔ wɛr, bɩɩrɛra mɩ jɔ wɛr fĩi, bɔɔ jɔɔjɔɔ mɩ-n thɔɔ khir.
Balamɔɩ Juifisɔ kɔɔ bɩɩr mɩ be nʋɔ kpalanyɔ phe bire.
Balãther wɩ kɔɔ ciil mi na khasa, babɩɛl wɩ kɔɔ dʋʋr mι na bokana, balãther gborõo kɔɔ mʋʋna mι, dι wi bιɛl na dιtɩ̃ bιɛl nyʋɔn kɔɔ gba mι dι ɩ̃ cʋʋ.

Ɩ̃ kpaarιkɛ mι-n kpaarnι gι jɔrɛ ka, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr mιιrra, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr yu hɔ̃hɔlaa pa, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr ɩ̃ caa pa, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr ca kpalaa pa, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr dιιra, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr bəənnə, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr lanyʋɔnna, nιwɛ nɔ mɛr wιrɛ n cʋɛnι wι yɛ omιna hanιι thɩ̃thιιn.
Mι jιrɛ gιrɛ n dɔnι thɔ̃ dʋʋr, na vɔɔrɛ, na yi cɔnanɛ bɔɔ jɔɔjɔɔ, na kɔmɛr na yɔlkhaa fʋʋr, na kɔmɛr cɔnanɛ bɔɔ jɔɔjɔɔ, na ie fʋʋr na kẽkẽ 'leere.
Thɩ̃ jɔjʋɔ hale na mιana', sι gιrɛɛkɛ heene mιnι a jɔrakɛ fɛʋ dʋɔn dɛrιkɛ mι-n hananι wire fɛʋ we gbɛbιdarara fɛʋ.
Ʋmɔ̃ na yɔɔnɛ sιι do ma yɔɔ mera? Ʋmɔ̃ na baranɛ na ji sιι do haar na hel ma?
Ado gι dor ɩ̃ məbə, ɩ̃ yɔɔda ma məbiro.
Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι Jeju Kɔ̃tιnι Thι, kɛ hιnanι fʋɔrɛ khorr, jιrɛ dι ma-n kur sõsora'.
Aretasι fãgadaarι gobanɛr kɔɔ pɛrɛ wa-n bɛra Damasι dιι a fɔ mι,
sι wι kɔɔ gbũ mer kpʋʋnɔ a tona fɛnɛtιrι dι ɩ̃ gbũ sortoto, dιι do mι taarɛ ɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Gι teenanɛ ɩ̃ məbi sιrakɛ ga-n hana khora', sι ma mιɛ nɛr thɩ̃ yιr na thɩ̃ nιrɔrɛɛkɛ Kɔ̃tιn kɔɔ cʋʋ mιnι dι ɩ̃ yι.
Mι jιrɛ tibil bιɛlιkɛ hanι Kirisitira, kɛ Thãgba kɔɔ vəni a jʋʋnna a dana balãther thãgbara ƴũ, yɛna yʋɔr yenã gι gιrɛ, ado tomιr a kɔɔ hana ya, ado tomιr gaa ya, ma ja', Thãgba jιɛn.
Dι tibilile ado tomιr a kɔɔ hana ya, ado tomιr gaa ya, ma ja', Thãgba jιɛn.
Mι jɩrɛ dɩ Thãgba kɔɔ gbaarɛ a lona hɩɩr paar Thãgbaa kal ƴɔɔ, dɩ a kɔɔ nɩrɛ thɩmɩaakɛ tibil na marnɩ na mɩa', kɛ tibil na hananɩ dakha hʋɛ a na mɩɛa'.
Ma məbire tibil caarra thale, sɩ ado mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛra wer, ma məbi saagado ɩ̃ yɔɔda gaaga.
Sɩ ado mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ məbi, ga do də̃bəl ma doa', gɩdonɩ sobɔr ma so, sɩ ma-n cʋa', dɩ mɛ̃ tibil na hana mar kpɩɛrɛ gɩ kãasɩ gɩrɛraakɛ wɩ-n yɩnɩ mɛrɛra, agɩbo gɩrɛraakɛ wɩ-n nɩnɩ mɛrɛra ga.
Mɔ̃ na dɔnɩ nɔɔ sɩ thɩ̃ nɩrɔ caale na hanɩ mɩɛrɛra ga na cʋʋ mɩ dɩ ma ti gunə', gɛr gɩ dɩ uu ga mar tomɩrra, kɛ dɔnɩ Satãa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar a na-n ʋ̃ʋ mar gɩ do nɔɔ ma ti gunə'.
Gelelala mɩ kɔɔ bɩɛl Kɔ̃tɩn balãther a cʋɛ gɩ gɩ hʋnɔ mar.
Sɩ a so marɛ ayɩ, bʋɔraakɛ ɩnɩ-n jɩ mɩnɩ gɩ daan, gɩdonɩ yɔɔrɛra ɩnɩ-n jɩɩ nɩna ɩnɩ fãga. Dɩ gɛr gɩ ma-n ka jɩɛ məbi na daʋ ɩ̃ yɔɔra, gɩdonɩ liir Kirisitii fãga n ha mar.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ma-n kãka yɔɔrɛra, na nɩɩrɛra, na nɩwɛra, na kpoorera, na bɔ gaarɛra Kirisitii sora; gɩdonɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ-n yɔɔnɩ, liir mɩ-n ka 'lɛ fãga.
Də̃bəl mɩ debi do, sɩ nɛr kɔɔ tɔ mɩ pɛr dɩ ɩ̃ ha mɛ̃. Gɩdonɩ anɩ pa gɩ kɔɔ teenana gɩ thɛ nɩ yɩ ɩ̃ tɩɩ teena do. Gɩdonɩ ma 'lũ fɩɩʋrakɛ a jɔ wa thɔ̃thɔnaale bʋɔnɔnɩ ka ga, sɩrakɛ ma do thɩ̃a'.
Gɩrɛ n nɛnanɩ ɩ̃ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar do, gɩ yɩrrɛ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn na ha fʋrɛɛkɛ jʋɔnɔnɩ ka, na jẽ thɩ̃ɛsɔ, na ma kʋ thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ, na nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ.
Anye kɔɔ ɓɔra nɩ sɩ dɩ wɩ̃ we gbɛbɩdara hana gɩ a jɔ nɩ, saagado gekɛ ma kɔɔ do narnɩ heendaa gaaga. Dɩ nɩ faa ɩ̃ dɩɩdɩɩ hɩɩnna ha mɩ.

Hɩnɛ, mɩ gbɛbɩrɛ gɩrɛ pɩ ɩ̃ pɔ anɩ pa balãther pʋɔr, sɩ ga do heendaa ma do nara', gɩdonɩ ga do anɩ thɩ̃ mɩ-n ƴaala', sɩ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ gɩ. Gɩdonɩ ga do bɩsana teana wa-n thɩnɛ thɩ̃ɛ a hana thɩrɛ na nɩra', sɩ thɩrɛ na nɩrɛ teana wa-n thɩnɛ thɩ̃ɛ a hana awɩ bɩsãsɔ.
Sɩ ado mɛr gɩ, mɩ ture na haar ɩ̃ 'laa gɩrɛ mɩ hananɩ, ɩ̃ 'laana dakha dɩbara koo gɩ do anɩda thuerə dɔ nɔɔ. Dɩ mɔna mɩ-n na nɩnɩ mɛna dɩɩ thʋ̃ kar, gɩ dor nɔɔ dɩ anɩ naʋ na-n wurəə bɛ?
Sɩ anaa na sor wo nayɩ, ma kɔɔ do nar heendaa wera', sɩ mɔ̃ mɩ donɩ tɩɩ fɩɩl tibil, gɛr mɩ kɔɔ fɩɩl nar sa 'li ni.
Tɩbɩlaakɛ mɩ kɔɔ thɔnɩ anɩ pa, mɩ ba phiro sɩ ma-n kho nɩ yaa?
Tɩtɩ mɩ kɔɔ bɩɛl a jala anɩ pa, dɩ mɩ kɔɔ thɔnaanɛ dakha omi bɩɛl. Dɩ Tɩtɩ ba khɔ nɩ yaa? Ga do kpɩɛr bɩɛlla sɩ ha kha na ɔraa? Ga do nɛ ka bɩɛlla sɩ-n 'loro kha gaa?
Nɩ kɔɔ mãa kpɩɛrɛ kɛkɛkɛ dɩ sor sɩ-n hɛl dɩbara nɛrɛra. Kirisitira sɩ ha dɩ sa-n mɩɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra. Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ wei, gelela fɛʋ anɩ khɔ̃ pɛ sɩ-n ƴaal.

Gɩdonɩ maar fʋ mɛr dɩ anaa a ma dã le, ma yɩ nɛr dɩ na ha mɔ̃ ma-n ƴaalna', nɩ yɩ mɩ dakha ɩ̃ ha mɔ̃ na-n ƴaalna'. Maar fʋ mɛr dɩ anaa kɩla, na gbugi, na nĩkhii, na dɩbara na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ, na tibil kuere, na wɩ yɩ mɩɩrɛ, na i kaar, na nyanyaanɛ na har anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn.

Maar fʋ mɛr dɩ a ma dã le, ɩ̃ Thãgba na cʋʋ mɛr dɩ yicuru na bir na fʋ mɩ anɩ sora, ĩ tha ɩ̃ thʋnɔ sɩ ma-n bɩ wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ maanɩ cʋʋrɛ sopugo, sɩ ɩkhasɔ wɛrra na kɔɔ debi haar thɩ̃ bise cʋʋrɛraalera, na bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛra, na dakhaba cʋʋrɛra ga.
Balãther ha gɩrɛ mɩ-n pɔnɩ anɩ pa. “Sɔ ɓibi na gʋʋrɛ mɔ̃kɛ sobɔ so jɩdara yenyɔ agɩbo yẽther yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ ha”, thale gɩ khere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra.

Balanyɔ pʋɔrɩkɛ mɩ kɔɔ pɔnɩ anɩ pa, mɩ kɔɔ 'lire so gar, na ninəkɛ ma hanɩ gɩrɛ anɩ pa ga, mɩ maanɛ gɩrɛ dɩ ma-n so wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ maanɩ cʋʋrɛ sopugo, dɩ mɩ-n sor dakha tɩbɩla fɛʋra ayɩ: Ado mɩ bir na pɔ anɩ pa, na-n yɩ ma pɩrrɛ fɩɩʋrakaa koe.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ-n ƴaalɛ nɩ jɩ gɩrɛ n nɛnanɩ dɩ Kirisiti n mɩana mɩ, ɔrkɛ na yɔɔnɛ narna', sɩ a-n nɩnanɛ ɔɔ fãga anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn.

Sobɔr gɩ wer, wɩ kɔɔ kpaarɛ thɩrʋra ɔɔ yɔɔra, sι a hananɛ yire gιrɛ dιι the Thãgbaa fãgara. Dι sɛrɛ dakha ɔɔ khara sι yɔɔ, sι sa hananɛ kha yire na ɔr gι the Thãgbaa fãgara, dι mɛ̃ sa puno sa-n do nar thɔma.
Nι mιɛnɛ anιbara na hιnɛ ado nι har ha pɛrɛra, nι jʋrɛ dιbara na hιnɛ. Na jι gι anιbara dι Jeju Kirisiti har anι bιnɔaa? Agado nɛr jʋrɛ dιbara a yιɛ dιι do nι 'leera'.
Sι mι pɛrɛ haar nι jιɛ jι dι asι dιbara jʋʋr wer na do sar 'leera'.
Sι sι-n bιɛlɛ Thãgba dι na-n cʋʋ dιkha gι puuro fιιʋraka', sι ga do sι-n ƴaalɛ sι yιra gι ho wι yɛ sɛr 'la', sι asι bιɛl dʋɔn na-n cʋɛ gιrɛɛkɛ bʋɔnɔnι adorakɛ asι 'li bire ho 'leere.
Gιdonι sa hana sobɔ pιɛr fãga ga, sι sobɔrι dabɔ ha sι hana.
Sι-n kãkarɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ sι hanι yɔɔrɛra, sι ne wer khιιr. Dι gιrɛ sι-n bιɛlnι Thãgbara dʋɔn mɔ̃ na jιιnι bɔr.
Gɛr dɔ nɔɔ dι ɩ̃ khere nar gιrɛ sι sa ha kha ga, dι mɛ̃ ɔbɔɔkɛ sa hanι kha ga teena ɩ̃ cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ na fãga ga. Kɔ̃tιn kɔɔ ha mɛr hʋɛ ɩ̃ cʋɛ nι nι khɔ̃ na-n pɛr, ga do nι kʋɛa ga.
Sι gιrɛ sɛnι dʋɔn wɔɔ omιnaa, na-n hana daʋ, na-n yιrana bɔrɛ ka, na-n ƴɔla kha haar, na-n hana kpιɛr bιɛl, na-n tɔɔ kha na ha ιι, dι Thãgbaakɛ naʋ na ha ιι n thernι, na-n har kha na nɛrɛ.
Na-n fʋɔrɛ kha bιɛlbιɛl na ha lõ fʋɔrɛɛkɛ dʋɔnnι daphuu. Tιι phuusɔ fɛʋ fʋɔr nɛr.
Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tιn na-n jɛ nι bʋɔra, Thãgba n cʋɛ nι na-n jι ɔɔ naʋ, Thu Phuu n cʋʋ nɩ kũu kha na ɔr ga-n pɛr; thale mɩ-n ƴaal gɩ hana nar fɛʋ.
Mɛr Pol thɔ̃thɔn, sι ga do tιbιla kɔɔ pɛ mara', dι tibili pa gι the woa', sι Jeju Kirisitii pa gι the, na Thãgba Thιrɛɛ pa kɛ kɔɔ ιrɛɛnι khirera;
mɛrɛ na omιna fɛʋʋkɛ sι hananι kha thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ Galasι we gbɛbιdarara.
Thãgba asι Thι na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tιn, n hana nι ha ιι a jɛ nι dakha bʋɔra.
Ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ 'laanɛnι dιbara asι sopugosɔra a puno a ti si nɛnɛ̃ bɔ puurəəkɛ mɔ̃ Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι asι Thι tuni;
ɔɔ i n dʋbarɔ na jala waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Nʋɔ kpaa mɛr mɔ̃kɛ nι faanι dapaara ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ wɛ nιnι dιι the Kirisitii bɔ jιra, sa bir kɛr na-n hιιn tutugo bɔ kpιι,
sιι dorakɛ tutugo bɔ kpιι na hala'; sι tιbιla haanle dι wa-n bũburõ ni kpιɛrɛ, dι wι-n ƴaalɛ ιnι-n deba Kirisitii tutugo bʋɔ.
Dι ado sɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ gιrakɛ, dι ado Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu gιιkɛ thɛnι ƴũ n mιa nar tutugo bʋɔ dιι ha kpιι na gιrɛɛkɛ sι kɔɔ mιιnι, dɔ sʋɔn n 'lii.
Sι kɔɔ mãa sor, sι dι mι birrakɛ ma-n 'loro gιrɛ wo, ado tibil na mιι nι tutugo bʋɔ dιι ha kpιι na gιrɛɛkɛ nι kɔɔ 'lɛnι, dɔ sʋɔn n 'lii.
Dι nɛnɛ̃ tιbιla mι-n ƴaal wa-n khιa mι yaa, Thãgba mι-n ƴaal a na-n khιa mι? Agιbo tibil mι-n ƴaal ɩ̃ da haar kã? A ma ƴaal 'lo ma-n da tιbιla haar ma do Kirisitii dea'.
Mι so narɛ gιrɛ omιna, dι tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ mι kɔɔ mιιnι, ga do tibildaa ga;
gιdonι ga do tibili pa mɩ kɔɔ 'lɛ ga, dɩ tibil kɔɔ dιrɛ mι woa', sι Jeju Kirisitii nιrɔra mι kɔɔ 'lɛ gι.
Gιdonι nι kɔɔ nιrɛ mɔ̃kɛ ɩ̃ fιl kɔɔ hanι mamara ɔbɔɔkɛ mι-n kɔɔ fʋɔrnι Juifi Thãgba fʋɔrɛ, dι ma-n kpoo gbõgolonena Thãgbaa we gbɛbιdarara dιι ho ma hərə wer,
na mɔ̃kɛ mι-n kɔɔ fʋɔrnι Juifi Thãgba fʋɔrɛ a jɔ tibil jɔjʋɔɔkɛ dɔnι ɩ̃ 'walãkhasɔɔkɛ sι donanι kha ca bιɛl, na mɔ̃ mι kɔɔ hananι dakha gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛ ɩ̃ mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔ sora.
Sι Thãgbaakɛ kɔɔ thιnɛ mιnι kpιι ɩ̃ nιι kɔ̃lora a we mι dakha ɔɔ bɔ jιra, dι ɔbɔɔkɛra gι kɔɔ daaraanι haar,
a gbaar ɔɔ Bikuun a nιna mι ɩ̃ gbaanɛɛ na mιa ca kpala, gɛr gιrakɛ dapaara ma kɔɔ therna tibilə',
dι ma kɔɔ jal dakha Jerujalɛm a yι wιrɛ kɔɔ kʋlɛ mιnι ƴιɛ a do thɔ̃thɔna ga, sι Arabι mι kɔɔ jal, agιpι dι ɩ̃ kɛr bir Damasι wo.
A yɛna yẽther ka, gɛr mι kɔɔ jaal Jerujalɛm sι jι kha na Pιɛr, dι mι kɔɔ cɔr le ɔɔ pa wire yʋɔr yemɔι;
sι tιι kpιιsɔɔkɛ dɔnι thɔ̃thɔna ma yι bιɛllakɛ saagado Jakι Kɔ̃tιnι õkuun gaaga.
Gιrɛ mι khere narnι gιrɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra gι, ma sõsoaa koe.
Sι a gι pιrɔ, mι gbaar jal Siri dιιra na Silisi dιιra.
Sι Jude we gbɛbιdaraakɛ hanι Kirisitira na kɔɔ to mar yirə';
dιbarara wι nιɛ ayι: Ʋrɛɛkɛ n kɔɔ kpoone sarnι mamara hale nɛnɛ̃ da-n mιι ha pɛrɛɛkɛra a-n kɔɔ yιrnanι kʋɛrɛ;
dι wι-n kɔɔ khιιrɛ Thãgba ɩ̃ sora.
A yɛna yʋɔr yenã ka, mι bire jal Jerujalɛm nakha Barnabasι, dι mι kɔɔ kpar dakha Tιtι dι sι ha kha.

Sι thɩ̃ nιrɔrɛɛkɛ thɛnι Thãgbara mι kɔɔ yι, gɛr gι dι ɩ̃ kɔɔ jal. Dι mι kɔɔ gbaar tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ mι-n mιιnι ca kpala a mιɛ wι dι wι hιιn; sι wιrɛ dɔnι yʋʋ wɛr mɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ hɛllɩ, agado mɛ̃ gaa, ga hor thɔmaakɛ mɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnι, na gιrɛ mι hanι cʋʋrɔ gιrɛ, na dor mɔlɔ thɔma.
Dι Tιtιιkɛ sι kɔɔ hananι kha Gιrɛkι gι, sι tibil na kɔɔ fɛrɛɛrakɛ a kuro khʋ̃a'.
Dι ka kpιɛrɛɛle the, wιrɛ n yɛnι omιna hanιι pa gι, kɛ kɔɔ wolonenι a lõ asι thɩ̃thιιn dι wa-n gιιl asι waʋ do Jeju Kirisitira, dι awι ƴaal dʋɔn sι birə dɔ dea.
Sι sa kɔɔ tha thʋnɔ a 'larrakɛ sa tu awιda fιιʋa', gι do nɔɔ tutugo bʋɔ na-n jalna ɔɔ sobɔra ƴɛrr anι thɩ̃thιιn.
Wιrɛ wι-n hιιnnι dι wɛr dɔ yʋʋ, a wι kɔɔ har mɔ̃ wɩ hanɩ yo, ga do gele mɩ-n hɩɩna', Thãgba na-n hɩɩnnɩ tɩbɩla dɩɩdɩa', wɩrɛ wɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ dɩ wɛr dɔ yʋʋ, wa kɔɔ hana dakpɩɩ na dɛbɩ ɩ̃ dɩɩrra ga.
Sɩ mɔ̃ wɩ kanɩ yɩɛ dɩɩ do mɛr Thãgba pɛr ma-n mɩa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ wɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa', mɔ̃ Thãgba pɛrnɩ Pɩɛr a na-n mɩa Juifisɔra,
gɩdonɩ ʋrɛra hananɩ Pɩɛr punone dɩ do thɔ̃thɔn Juifisɔra, ɔrra dakha hana mι punone dι ɩ̃ do thɔ̃thɔn ca kpalala,

dɩ mɔ̃ wɩ yɩnɩ bɔ jɩɩrɩkɛ Thãgba jɩ mɩnɩ bʋɔra hanɩ, Jakɩ na Sefasɩɩkɛ n dɔnɩ Pɩɛr, na Jã, kɛ wɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ dɩ wɛr dɔ thɩkara, wɩ kɔɔ fʋɔrɛ mɛrɛ na Barnabasɩ bɩɛl do fʋɔrʋʋ, mɔ̃ sι donι kha kũu bιnɔ, sι puno sa-n jal ca kpalaa pa, sι wɛr wa-n jal Juifisɔɔ pa.
Gιrɛ wι so sarnι dιbara dʋɔn sa-n jɛna nι bɔdara, dι mι kɔɔ ture na haar fɛʋ dι ma-n cʋʋ.
Sι ɔbɔɔkɛ Pιɛr kɔɔ pɔnι Ãtιyɔsι, mι kɔɔ bor ɔɔda kpei ma mʋʋnaa ga, gιdonι a heene sor dɩbara.

Gιdonι ɔbɔɔkɛ ιkhaa tibilsɔɔkɛ thɛnι Jakιι pa na kɔɔ pɔnι pa', ca kpala a-n kɔɔ khona dιkɔ, sι bɔɔkɛ wι danι, a-n mə̃mə̃ləne dι tɔ dι khokhιa, gιdonι maar n fʋɔnɛɛ wιrɛraakɛ n bɔnι dι wa-n ιι khʋ̃ kurrera.
Dι wɩ̃ Juifisnɔ phɛl a wolõ dι wa-n cʋʋ, dι awι bιnɛ yenyɔ fιlla ba hal Barnabasι dι lʋʋn.

Dι mɔ̃ mι yιɛnι dιι do wa-n ιιr dιι telẽ mɔ̃kɛ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnι sobɔr hana', mι kɔɔ sor Pιɛrra tιbιla fɛʋʋ ƴɛra ayι: Ado fɛrkɛ dɔnι Juifi hana ca kpalaa fιl, sι fa hana Juifi fιla', mɔ̃gιdo dι fa-n fɛrɛ ca kpala wɩ hanana Juifi fιlɛ?
Ado se wer, Juifi dʋʋr wι kɔna sι, sa do sopugodara mɔ̃kɛ ca kpala hana'.

Sιrakɛ sι jιrɛ dι ga do jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra tibil na 'lɛr so hɛlla', sι ha pɛrɛ Jeju Kirisitira gι; sɛrɛ dakha sι kɔɔ pɛr Jeju Kirisiti haar sor n hɛla sar, gι the ha pɛrɛraakɛ sι hananι Kirisitira, ga-n do jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra gι tha', gιdonι tibil bιɛllakɛ na 'lɛ so hɛllɛ jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra ga.
Sι mɔ̃ sι-n ƴaalnι sor n hɛla sar Kirisitira, sopugodarara sι do ser, dι Kirisiti ba cʋɛ sι dι sι do sopugodara kã? Kpei.
Gιdonι ado mι bir na mι gιrɛɛkɛ mι kɔɔ wιɛlnι, ɩ̃ sopugodaar do mι-n nιna.
Me wer, jɔfʋʋ sora mι khirore, gι do nɔɔ ɩ̃ hana yire Thãgbara.

Wι kɔɔ kpa mɛr kʋkʋ thιrʋra nakha Kirisiti, dι ga do mɛr gιιkɛ hananι yire gιrɛ bã, sι Kirisitiikɛ hanι ɩ̃ bιnɔ dɔ ɩ̃ yi; sι yireekɛ mι hananι gιrɛ, ha pɛrɛra mι hana gι Thãgbaa Bikuunnaakɛ n naan mιnι a ba faana dιbara ɩ̃ sora.
Ma bo bɔ jιιrιkɛ thɛnι Thãgbara ga, gιdonι ado jɔfʋra so hɛllɛ n the ga dor khaar Kirisiti kɔɔ khi pɔι.
Nɛr Galasι də̃bələ amɛ ka li ninakɛ tɔr? Nɛrɛɛkɛ wι mιɛnι casι Jeju Kirisitii thιr kpa dιι ho nɛr tʋɔr yire.
Thĩ bɩɛl dιbara hale mι-n ƴaalnι ɩ̃ jι nar: Jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra nι kɔɔ 'lɛ Thu Phuu yaa, ha pɛ thιmιιrraakɛ nι kɔɔ nιnι gι?
Ãyaal dι nι thʋ̃ də̃bəəl mɛ̃, a ka 'li fʋʋr na Thu Phuu sι na-n ƴaal nɛnɛ̃ nι pɩɩr na anι thɛthɛɛ fãgaa?
Gι do khaar nι thʋ̃ gaar bʋɔ thale bɛɛ? Dι gι hor khaar khʋʋra gι-n jalna.
Dι ʋrɛɛkɛ n hana nιnι Thu Phuu, kɛ n cʋɛnι dakha nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛ anι thɩ̃thιιn, jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛra gɩ the yaa, ha pɛ thɩmɩɩ nɩɩrra gɩ?
Mee gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Abɩraham kɔɔ pɛr Thãgba haar dɩɩ do gɛr Thãgba hɩɩn sa wɩɩ tɩɩ sarʋ.”
Nɩ jɛ gɩ do wɩrɛ hananɩ ha pɛrɛ Thãgbara wɛr dɔ Abɩrahamɩ bɩsãsɔ.
Mɔ̃ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ kɔɔ 'laanɩ yɩɛ dɩ Thãgba na cʋʋrɛ sor dɩ ga-n hɛl ca kpalala ha pɛrɛra, gɛr gɩ dɩɩ kɔɔ mãa mɩɩrɛ tutugo bʋɔ Abɩrahamna ayɩ: “Fɛr na dɔ nɔɔ dɩ tibil caar fɛʋ na 'lɛ bɔnanɛ.”
Dɩ mɛ̃ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar n 'lɛ bɔnanɛ na Abɩraham ha pɛdaar.

Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n bɔnɩ dɩ wa-n yɩrna jɔfʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋrɛ, sʋɔn n 'li wer; gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Sʋɔn n 'le tibil wo tibilikɛ na-n hɩnɛnɩ da-n nɩna nũu gɩrɛra fɛʋʋkɛ sɔnɩ jɔfʋ sɛbɛra ga.”
Wo, tibil bɩɛllakɛ na 'lɛ so hɛllɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra jɔfʋra ga, dɩ sobɔr gɩ, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere wo ayɩ: “Ʋrɛ Thãgba hɛllɔnɩ sor dɩɩ do ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ, ɔr na hana yire.”
Dɩ jɔfʋ na ha kha dɩkha na ha pɛra', sɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “Ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n cʋɛnɩ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ sonɩ, a na hana garɛ yire.”
Kirisiti birse ser sɔ̃ 'lirrə jɔfʋra, gɩdonɩ sɛr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ firo 'lɛ sʋɔn, gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Sʋɔn gɩ do tibil wo tibilləəkɛ wɩ-n juni kʋkʋ thɩrʋra.”
Dɩ mɛ̃ bɔnanɛɛkɛ Abɩraham kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ na do dakha ca kpalaada, dɩ Jeju Kirisitira gɩ-n the, dɩ dakha ha pɛrɛra sa 'lɛ Thu Phuukɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛna sɩnɩ.
Omɩna wei, tibiile mι-n mιι gιrɛ, a tιbιla ƴɛrɛrakɛ ʋlfɛ ʋlfɛrɛ, tibil na hale na puno na phii agιbo a dɛbιrɔ dιkha ga.
Sι Abιraham ʋlfɛrɛɛle kɔɔ telẽ na ɔɔ məl, ga so ɔɔ məlsɔ dιι ho wι jɔra', sι bιɛl gι so, gιdonɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “afɩ məl”, a thɩɛna gaa Kirisiti gι.
Nɩ yɛ gɩrɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ ɩ̃ so: Nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ 'lini ʋlfɛrɛ, jɔfʋʋkɛ pɩrɔnɩ kpaan yɛna taanã na kpelẽ yʋɔr na puno gi na phii, gɩ do gɛr cʋɛ ʋlfɛrɛɛle dɩɩ kʋkʋʋla'.
Gɩdonɩ ado jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛ na dɔ nɔɔ dɩ sa 'lɛ gɩrɛ Thãgba thɩɩn sarnɩ, ga do ʋlfɛrɛra gɩ the bã, sɩ mee Thãgba kɔɔ ha gɛr Abɩraham dɩɩ do ʋlfɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ.
Sɩ jɔfʋ anyera gɩ hale? Wɩ pɩrɔrɛ 'laa dɩɩ do sopugo cʋʋrɛ dɔ nɔɔ, phaphapha məlleele n ɩ̃, ʋrɛɛkɛ ʋlfɛrɛɛle kɔɔ telenι; dι jɔfʋʋle thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ kɔɔ gbaan a dʋ thιmιι gʋʋrdaar nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Dι thιmιι gʋʋrdaar na-n hale tιι bιɛlla ga, sι ado Thãgba wer gι, ɔr bιɛl gι.
Dɩ jɔfʋ n ba kɛ̃kɛrɛnanɛ Thãgbaa ʋlfɛsɔ yaa? Kpɩɩraka'. Ado jɔfʋ kɔɔ hale dɩ wɩ 'laa dɩɩ 'laa yire, ga dor jɔfʋra so hɛllɛ na the bɔɔbɔɔ.
Sɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ n nɩnanɛ dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ sopugoo nyɔ̃kɔɔ wɩ ha, dɩ mɛ̃ ga dor wɩrɛɛkɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar n 'lɛr ʋlfɛrɛ, ga-n the ha pɛrɛraakɛ wɩ hananɩ Jeju Kirisitira.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ ha pɛrɛ na kɔɔ ɩnɩ pa', jɔfʋ khaɩdara sɩ kɔɔ do, sa-n pɩɛrna ha pɛrɛɛkɛ na yɩranɩ phubi.
Mɛ̃ jɔfʋ kɔɔ do thɔthɔɔkɛ na thɔɔ sɩnɩ na dana Kirisiti, sor n puno gɩ hɛl sar ha pɛrɛra.
Dɩ ha pɛrɛ ιnɩ sa ha kha dɩkha na thɔthɔɔdaarɩle 'lo bã.
Gɩdonɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ Thãgbaa bikona nɩ do ha pɛrɛraakɛ nɩ hananɩ Jeju Kirisitira;
nɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ wɩ kpɛɛnɩ nyʋɔnɔ bɩɛl dʋʋrra nakha Kirisiti, Kirisitira nɩ to.
Juifi dʋʋr na hale dι wιrɛ na dɔnι Juifisɔ waa ga; dee na hale dι waι ga; kuun na hale dι khɛr ga; gɩdonɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛl nɩ do Jeju Kirisitira.
Dɩ ado Kirisitiida nɩ do, ga dor nɛr dʋɔn Abɩrahamɩ məlsɔ, dɩ thɩ̃ hɩna hanɩ mɔ̃kɛ ʋlfɛrɛ sonɩ.
Gɩrɛ mɩ sonɩ dʋɔn wɔɔ, ɔbɔɔkɛ thɩ̃ hɩn donɩ bɩsaan, gɛr aa-n har kpɩɩ na dea', sɩɩ dorakɛ ɔr dʋɔn kɔ̃tɩn thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra;
sɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ n hɩnɛɛnɩ na kɔ̃tɩnasɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ a-n ha, phaphapha bɔɔkɛ thɩrɛ pɛrnɩ n dã.
Sɛrɛ dakha mɛna gɩ ha sar, ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ honɩ bɩsana, sɩ kɔɔ dor dea dɩɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ bɔ taa dɩɩra', kɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ tinəneeda.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ bɔɔ kɔɔ danɩ, Thãgba kɔɔ thɔnanɛ ɔɔ Bikuun, khɛr kɔɔ kɔnaa, jɔfʋ hʋɛra wɩ kɔɔ kʋ̃ɔ,
dɩ mɛ̃ a na puno na birse wɩrɛ hanɩ jɔfʋ hʋɛra, gɩ do nɔɔ a gba sɩ sɩ do ɔɔ bikuunsɔ.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ bikona ha nɩ, Thãgba thʋɔn ɔɔ Bikuuni Thu dɩ lõ anɩ hara da-n wɩɩ: Aba; kɩrʋ dʋɔn: Thɩrɛ.
Mɛ̃ gɩ fa do dee bã, sɩ bikuun fɩ do, dɩ ado bikuun fɩ do, fɛr dʋɔn thɩ̃ hɩn, dɩɩ do Thãgba dɔ nɔɔ.
Mamara na kɔɔ jɩnɩ Thãgba ga, nɩ kɔɔ dor dea dɩkhasɔraakɛ na dɔnɩ thãgba ga.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ nɩ jɩrɛ Thãgba, dɩrakɛ Thãgba ka kɔɔ jɩ nɩ, sɩ mɔ̃ gɩ fʋ dɩ nɩ bir kɛr na-n bir dɩɩrɛraalera na-n taanɩ bʋɔa', kɛ n kɔnɩ bʋɔ; anye hale dɩ nɩ ƴaal nɩ birə dɔ gar dea wo?
Nɩ hananɛ pərre wi hɩɩnɛnasɔ, na porasɔra, na bɔɔsɔra, na yɛnasɔra.
Maar fʋ mɛr dɩ agakpaana ɩ̃ thɔ̃ɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ donɩ jɔɔ nɛrɛra ga dor mɔlɔ gɩ.
Mɩ-n phʋʋr nɛr omɩna, nɩ hana mɔ̃kɛ mɩ hanɩ, gɩdonɩ mɛrɛ dakha mɩ har mɔ̃kɛ nɩ hanɩ.
Na kɔɔ cʋʋ mɩ puure fɩɩʋraka'; nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ caca bɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ nɩnɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ, ɩ̃ tomɩ sɩ kɔɔ dɔ nɔɔ.
Ɩ̃ kho kɔɔ do narɛ nɩwɛ, sɩ na kɔɔ ƴʋɔn ma', ma kɔɔ yaa nɩ dakha woa'; nɩ kɔɔ tee mer dɩ ɩ̃ ho Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu a ho Jeju Kirisiti.
Kana ga kãka caalera jal gɩrɛ kper? Gɩdonɩ mɩ-n mɩɩrɛ anɩda ayɩ: Ado hʋɛ kɔɔ harrɛra ga dor na kɔɔ tire anɩ yi a na ha mɩ.
Mɩ debire do nar lãlaardaar nɛnɛ̃ sobɔrraakɛ mɩ-n so narnɩ yaa?
Gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ ca gele tibil ca wele hana narnɩ, ga do gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ bʋɔ ga, wɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n lea sɩ kha nɩ bir nɩ ma wɩ.
Gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ hananɛ wer bɔɔ fɛʋ thɩɛnaakɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ, gɩ bɔrɛ, sɩ ga-n do bɔɔkɛ mɩ hanɩ kha na nɛrɛ dɩbara ga.
Ɩ̃ bɩsãsɔ wei, anɩ wal birə gɩrɛ fʋ mɩ wo, phaphapha Kirisiti n jɩɩ ɩɩr anɩ bɩnɔ.
Mɩ narra a ho wɩ yɛ nɛnɛ̃ ɩ̃ birə hana anɩ pa a jɛ mɔ̃ ma mɩɩnɩ, gɩdonɩ ma thʋ̃ jɩ gɩrɛ ma cʋʋnι anιdarara bã.
Nɩ sɔ mar, nɛrkɛra n ƴaalɛnɩ nɩ birə hana jɔfʋra, na nɩ gɩrɛ jɔfʋ sonaa?
Mee gɩ kherere ayɩ: Abɩraham kɔɔ hananɛ bikona yenyɔ, bιɛl do deekhɛrι bi, bιɛl do wa khɛrι bi.
Sι deekhɛrι bi wer, birə gι dι wι kɔ̃ mɔ̃ wɛ n kɔnι; sι wa khɛr wer, Thãgbaa ʋlfɛ bi a kɔ̃.
Thɩ̃ɛɛle sokpaa gι, gιdonι khɛra yenyɔɔle n nɛna nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛrɛ yenyɔ. Agaar n nɛna mɔ̃ ʋlfɛ bιɛl hanι, kɛ dɔnι Sιnaι gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔɔda, ɔr kɔna dee bi.
Gιdonι Agaar hʋɔn Sιnaι gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔɔkɛ hanι Arabι dιιra, a hona dakha nɛnɛ̃ Jerujalɛmkɛ gιrɛ, kɛ hanι dee paar na ɔɔ bιsãsɔ.
Sι ƴũ Jerujalɛm waʋ gι, dι ɔr dɔ asι nι.

Gιdonι gι kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Na kãkanɛ fɛr kʋ̃ʋbʋʋkɛ na kɔɔ kɔnanɩ bə', mana na bɛna hulẽbe, fɛrɛɛkɛ wallɛ na kɔɔ fʋnɩ kpɩɩa', gɩdonɩ khɛrɩkɛ wɩ faanɩɩ bisɔ jɔrɛ ka, a ka jɔ khɛr ʋrɛ hananɩ kuun.”
Sɩ ado nɛr wɛ omɩna, nɛr dʋɔn ʋlfɛ bɩsana Ɩjakɩɩ kha.
Dɩ mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kɔɔ hanɩ dɩɩ do biikɛra wɩ kɔnɩ wɛɛ kha n kɔɔ kpoone ʋrɛraakɛ wɩ kɔnɩ dɩɩ do Thu Phuu pa gɩ the, mɛna gɩ ha gɩrɛ nĩ.
Sɩ anye Thãgbaa sɛbɛ so ayɩ: “Wea deekhɛr na ɔɔ bikuun a faa, gɩdonɩ deekhɛrɩ bi na do thɩ̃ hɩna', sɩ wa khɛrɩ bi na dɔ thɩ̃ hɩn.”
Gɛr gɩ omɩna wei, sa do deekhɛrɩ bisɔa', sɩ wa khɛrɩ bisɔ sɩ do.
Wa dʋʋrra Kirisiti kɔɔ birse si, gɛr gɩ nɩ fɔ gɩ ma, na-n do dee dʋʋr n bir gɩ 'li ni bã.
Nɩ hɩnɛ mɛr Pol mɩ so narɛ ayɩ, ado na kur khʋ̃ʋ ga dor Kirisiti na taa nɩ bʋɔ bã.
Dɩ mɩ-n kpãkpãa narɛ wo ayɩ, ado tibil kur khʋ̃ʋ, jɔfʋ ntɛ yɩ ɩna-n hɩɩnɛ fɛʋ.
Nɩ leere na Kirisiti nɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ sor n hɛla nar jɔfʋ cʋʋrɛra, nι 'leere dakha Thãgbaa bɔ jι.
Ado se wer so hɛl nũ pɛrɛ sι-n pιɛr, kɛ Thu Phuu na cʋʋnι dι sa 'lɛ ha pɛrɛra.
Gιdonι a fι ha Jeju Kirisitira a fι kurre khʋ̃ʋ yo, a fa kur khʋ̃a yo, ga-n cʋʋ thɩ̃a', sι ha pɛrɛɛkɛ hananι naʋʋkɛ n cʋɛnι thɩ̃ɛ, gɛr dɔ thɩ̃ɛ.
Nι kɔɔ car waa gel, sι amɛ jιlɛ nι a pιɛr nι na-n nι sobɔr nũə?
Kpιɛr ca gele na the ʋrɛraakɛ kɔɔ wɛ nιna'.
Tabιιr fιιʋ n cʋʋrɛ buru mɩ̃ boloo fɛʋ dιι bʋ̃.
Mι hana narɛ ha pɛrɛ Kɔ̃tιnna, dι na hana kpιɛr kpιa', sι ʋrɛɛkɛ nyanyaanɛ nιnι ado a ha mɔnakɛ, sι sor na heenuune.
Sι ado me wer omɩna, ado ɩ̃ Thãgba thɩmɩɩ mɩɩra mɩ yɩ wa-n kuro khʋ̃ʋ, anyera ma-n yɩ kpoore 'lo? Gιdonι Kirisitii kʋkʋ thιr thιmιιkɛ n dɔnι nɛ baradaa, gι bure mɛ̃.
Dι wιrɛra n pιɛrnι nyanyaanɛ anι thɩ̃thιιn wι yιra kuro kpɔ khorr.
Omιna wei, wa dʋʋrra Thãgba kɔɔ we nι, sι na-n gba wa dʋʋrra a phiro sι na cʋʋ gιrɛɛkɛ anι tibil do pa n ƴaalna', sι nι ka dɔ kha dea bιɛlbιɛl naʋra.
Gιdonι jɔfʋ fɛʋ, thιmιι nɔ bιɛllaakɛ gι ha ayι: “Fa-n na afι 'walãkha tibil mɔ̃kɛ fι-n nanι afιbara.”
Sι ado nι-n dʋɔnɛ kha a na phʋʋna khasɔ, na-n jιɛ hιιn na-n kʋɛ khasɔa koe.
Gɛr gι dι ɩ̃ so nar ayι: Na-n jala mɔ̃kɛ Thu Phuu n so narnι, ga cʋʋ nɛr dι na cʋʋ gιrɛ anι tibil do pa n ƴaalna'.

Gιdonι gιrɛ tibili tibil do pa n ƴaalnι, ga-n 'li kha fιιʋrakɛ na gιrɛ Thu Phuu n ƴaalna'; dι gιrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n ƴaalnι, ga-n 'li kha fιιʋrakɛ na gιrɛ tibili tibil do pa n ƴaalna'; wɛr yenyɔ wι-n kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ kha, dι gɛr gι na-n puno na cʋʋ gιrɛɛkɛ nι pɛrnι haara'.
Sι ado Thu Phuuda nι-n pɛ nũu jɔfʋ na puno na'.
Dι gιrɛra tibili tibil do pa n cʋʋnɩ gɩ yɩrrɛ gbelẽ gbelẽ, gɛr ha gɩrɛ: Bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ, thɩ̃ bise cʋʋrɛ, dakhaba cʋʋrɛ,
thɩl jir, dɔɔrɛ, tɩɩ laarɛ, kɩla, gbugi, nĩkhii, dɩbara na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ, dɩɩdɩɩ leere, thʋ̃ kha,
ha pɩɛrɛ, ta laarɛ, gbõgolõ dɩko khor, na yɛ̃ thĩsɔɔkɛ n hɔnɩ kha na gɩrɛra. Mɩ maanɛ dɩ ma-n so nar gɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛra mɩ kɔɔ sonɩ, dɩ wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ wa lõ Thãgba fãgadaarɩ dʋɔa'.
Sɩ beekɛ Thu Phuu n senɩ dʋɔn: Naʋ, daʋ, ha ɩɩ, ha fʋrɛ, ha bulo fɩlɛ, bɔ cʋʋrɛ, sobɔ cʋʋrɛ,
hɛlɛlɛ fιlɛ, dιbara fʋrɛ; jɔfʋ na hale dιι pιɛr ga thɩ̃sɔɔka'.
Dι wιrɛ hanι Jeju Kirisitira wι gbaar tibili tibil do pa na gιrɛ na-n kʋɔnι thue kpãkpalã ga, na dakha ɔɔ ƴaal a kpa kʋkʋ thιrʋra.
Dι Thu Phuu donι ʋrɛ n hana sιnι yire, sa-n ιrɛ mɔ̃kɛ Thu Phuurə n so sarnι.
Sa-n ƴaal mɔlɔ i ka thɩ̃ɛ ga-n ιna sar nãbɛɛrɛ, sa-n gba kha gbugisɔa'.
Omιna wei, ado nι yι tibilikɛ hanι sopugo cʋʋrɔ, nɛrɛɛkɛ dʋɔnnι Thu Phuudara nι naarɛɛ na hɛlɛlɛ fιlɛ, sι jιɛ hιιn afιbara a mɛ̃ gaa fa 'lɛr fifiləle fer.
Na-n dea kha heendaasɔ, thale dɔ Kirisitii jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛ.
Ado tibil na kpɩɛr dɩ ɩnɩ dor thɩ̃ɛ sɩɩ do aa do thɩ̃a', dɩbara a-n fɩɩl.
Tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl n jʋrɛ awɩ thɛthɛɛ thɔ̃ a na hɩnɛ, dɩ mɛ̃ tibil na hana ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ məbida dɩbara, sɩ a na-n too na barana haanɩda ga;
gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ telenenɩ tibil, dɔ a na-n hɩɩn gɛr.
Dɔ ʋrɛ wɩ-n dɩɩrnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ na-n bɔna ʋrɛ n dɩrɛɛnɩ na ɔɔ thɩ̃sɔ fɛʋʋkɛ a hananɩ.
Na-n fɩɩl dɩbara ga; wa-n ɓoɓoro Thãgbara ga, gɩrɛ tibil n diirni gɛrra a na kha.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ direni dɩɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ tibili tibil do pa n ƴaalnɩ, tibili tibil do padara a na kha gɩ do kʋɛrɛ, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ direni dɩɩ do Thu Phuudaa gɩ, Thu Phuudaara a na kha gɩ do yire khorr.
Sa-n do nyɛ̃ɛ n khiir si bɔ cʋʋrɛra ga, gιdonι ado bɔɔ dã sa khar ado sa kɔɔ pɛr dokhʋʋra'.
Mɛ̃ gι nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ sι yιnι hʋɛ, sa-n cʋɛ tιbιla fɛʋ bɔɔ, sι cacaca wιrɛ dɔnι ha pɛdara.
Nι hιnɛ mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ khera nar sɛbɛ beekɛ gbõgbõo na ɩ̃ nyɛ̃.
Wιrɛ n ƴaalɛnι i bɔ wer gιrɛraakɛ tibil yinə n yιnι, wɛr n yιrana nι nι kuro khʋ̃ʋ, kιrʋ dʋɔn kpoore wa-n ƴaal Kirisitii kʋkʋ thιrdara ga.
Gιdonι welela yɛnιnakɛ khʋ̃ʋ ιnι kur, sι wa-n hιιn jɔfʋa', sι wι-n ƴaalɛ nι kuro khʋ̃ʋ wι yι hʋɛ wa-n məbi jιιnnaale wι pɛ narnι tomιrra.

Sι ado merra wer, thɩ̃ kpιι na hale ma-n məbironi saagado asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii kʋkʋ thιrdara gaaga. Kʋkʋ thιrʋra dʋɔn gιrɛ cʋɛnι dιι do thιιkɛɛda do marɛ thɩ̃ khire dι mɛrɛ dakha mι khire gιrɛraakɛ dɔnι thιιkɛɛda.
Gιdonι a fι kurre khʋ̃ʋ yo, a fa kur khʋ̃a yo, ga-n cʋʋ thɩ̃a', gιrɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ɛ gɛr dʋɔn tιι pha dʋʋr.
Wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na tuonni dιιrɛɛkɛ kɛ dɔnι Thãgbaa Ɩjιrayɛlιda, Thãgba na-n hana wι ha ιι a na-n dɔna wι dakha bʋɔ.
Nɛnɛ̃ dιphã tibil na-n thʋ̃ na pɛ mar nιwɛra bã, Jejuu i dɔ nɔɔ mι 'lɛrɔnι pɔnaakɛ ɩ̃ tomιra.
Omιna wei, asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na-n jɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bʋɔra. Amɛn.
Mɛr Polιkɛ dɔnι Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔn mɔ̃ Thãgba tuni, thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha tιι phuusɔɔkɛ dɔnι sobɔ omιnaakɛ Jeju Kirisiti hιnι, dι wι ha Efɛjι.
Thãgba asι Thι na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tιn n hana nι ha ιι a jɛ nɩ dakha bʋɔra.
Thãgbaakɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii Thɩ hɩna khɩɩrɛ, kɛ kɔɔ bɔna sɩnɩ na bɔna caar dɩɩdɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ thudaa, kɛ thɛnɩ ƴũ dιι do Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.
Thale Thãgba phiir si dιι do Jeju Kirisitii pa gι the, sι aa kɔɔ ti thιιkɛ pa' ayι, sι pho a 'lea dι paar ɔɔ ƴɛra. Ɔɔ naʋra
a kɔɔ mãa phiir sar dι sa dʋʋraa bιsana, gι do Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the, mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kɔɔ daaraanɩ haar dɩ ƴaal,
sɩ puno sa-n khɩsʋʋ ɔɔ nɔ kpaa bɔ jɩ hananaakɛra a kɔɔ jɩ sɩnɩ dɩɩ do ɔɔ Bikuunikɛ a nanɩ dɔ nɔɔ.
Ɔrra sɩ 'lɛ birsere na sopugo faarɛ dɩɩ the ɔɔ tɔmɩna, a ha mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ bɔ jɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ
ɔr Thãgba kɔɔ jɩ sɩnɩ jɔɔ hanɩ, a hanana sɩ kpɛsɛrɛ na jɩɩr fɛʋ.
Ɔr cʋɛ sɩ dɩ sɩ jɩ ɔɔ tuurikɛ keranɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ ƴaal bɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ hananɩ ɔɔ hara kɛkɛkɛ,
gɛr dʋɔn ado bɔɔ dã ɩna gbɛbɩrɛ gɩrɛ fɛʋ hanɩ ƴũ na thɩɩra dɩ ga do bɩɛl Kirisiti n do gar yʋʋ.
Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ dɩ Thãgba kɔɔ phiir si dɩ sa ha kpɩɩ mɔ̃ a kɔɔ maanɩ ƴaalɛ, gɩdonɩ ɔr n cʋɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩ ga-n ha mɔ̃ a-n ƴaalnɩ gɩ hana,
sɩ puno sa-n khɩsʋʋ ɔɔ i dʋbɩ hanana, sɛrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ kɔɔ kʋlɛnɩ ƴɩɛ a hana nũ pɛrɛ Kirisitira.
Nɛrɛ dakha nɩ kɔɔ pɛrɛ haar ɔrra ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ sobɔ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ dɔnɩ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ hananι taarɛ, dι ɔrra dakha dɔ nɔɔ dι Thãgba dʋ nar jιιnιkɛ dɔnι Thu Phuukɛ a kɔɔ ʋlfɛnι ιna ' laarɛ,
ɔr dɔ barã paar gιrɛraakɛ sa 'lɛnι, a cʋʋ sɛr dɩ sɩ jɩ tue dɩ Thãgba na taarɛ dɩphã waa vʋ̃ʋ wιrɛ a hɩnɩ, wɩ puno wɩ do wɩrɛ na-n khɩsaanɩ ɔɔ i dʋbɩ hanana.
Gɛr gɩ mɛrɛ dakha mɔ̃kɛ mɩ nɩɛnɩ anɩ thɩmɩɩ ha pɛrɛraakɛ nɩ hananɩ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnna, na anɩ naakɛ nɩ-n nanɩ tɩɩ phuusɔ fɛʋ.
Ma-n pɩr Thãgba khɩɩrɛ kpɩɩ anɩdara ga. Mɩ-n wer anɩ i dι ma-n bιɛlna
asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι Thιrɛɛkɛ hιnanι i dʋbιrɛ, a hana nι Thu Phuu a na-n ha nι kpɛsɛrɛ a na-n nιnana nι nι jιι jιι;
a phuo ni dakha yire nι jι mɔ̃ nũ pɛrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ we narnι hanι, nι jιna mɔ̃ ɔɔ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ ɓɔ̃ɔkɛ a thιιnnι ɔɔ tιι phusɔra hanι,
nι jιna dakha ɔɔ fãga kʋkʋʋkɛ hanιle sɛr ha pɛdaraa ha, ga fãga caalera wabanι thale;
gɛr a kɔɔ ιιrna Kirisiti dι the khirera a cʋʋnaa dι too gιrɛ ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔra le Thãgbaa dʋɔ,
a kəə fãgadarara fɛʋ, na punodarara fɛʋ, na dakpɛna yʋʋsɔra fɛʋ, na kɔ̃tɩnasɔra fɛʋ, a kəəna thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩɛna fɛʋʋkɛ hananɩ ire dɩ wɩ we, ga do nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔraakɛ gɩ dɩbara ga, sɩ bɔɔraakɛ na ɩnanɩ dakha.
Dɩ Thãgbara gbaar thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩ jəəro nɛɛ, a pɩɛraarɛ dɩ do yʋʋ we gbɛbɩdarara.
We gbɛbɩdarara dɔ ɔɔ tomɩɩkɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ hironi phi ɔrkɛ henɩ thɩɩkɛra a gbana ƴũ koo.
Anɩ dɩ pa na anɩ sopugo dor nɔɔ dɩ nɩ kɔɔ khi mamara;
dabɔɔlera nɩ kɔɔ ha garnɩ dɩ na-n kpaan na fɩlɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ thɩɩkɛɛda, dɩ na-n nɩ nũu ʋrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩn fãgadarasɔraakɛ dɔnɩ thudaakɛ hanɩ jɩɛra le ƴũ, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ n dɔnanɩ gɩrɛ nũ nʋʋrdara thɔma.
Sɛrɛ fɛʋ dakha thalera sɩ kɔɔ ha dɩ sa-n kɔɔ ɩɩr mɔ̃kɛ asɩ tibil do pa n ƴaalnɩ, dɩ sa-n cʋʋna dakha gɩrɛ n kɔnɩ asɩ tomɩ na asɩ kpɩɛr thue, dɩ asɩ ti parakɛ Thãgbaa nĩkhi too sɩ too ɩkhasɔɔ kha.
Sɩ Thãgbaakɛ ɔɔ bɔ dona na wabɩnɩ kpãkpalã ga, na ɔɔ naʋ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ a kɔɔ na sɩnɩ,
sɩɩ dorakɛ sɛr dɔ wɩrɛ kɔɔ khenɩ dɩɩ do asɩ dɩ pa dɔ nɔɔ a bire ha sɩ yire na Kirisiti. Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ nɩ 'lɛ taarɛ.
A kɔɔ ɩɩr sɛr kha dɩ sɩ gbɛbɩ too Thãgbaa dʋɔ nakha Kirisiti, dɩɩ the asɩ bɩɛl dora na Jeju Kirisiti.
Gɩ do nɔɔ a nɩna bɔɔraakɛ n ɩnanɩ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ bɔ jɩ thʋnɩ wabɩ, dɩɩ the bɔɔraakɛ a bɔ sarnɩ dɩɩ do Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa bɔ jɩra nɩ kɔɔ 'lɛ taarɛ dɩɩ the ha pɛrɛra, ga do anɩ pa gɩ tha', Thãgbaa khaarda gɩ.
Məbi paar na ha liir tibil n məbiroə', gɩdonɩ ga do anɩ dɩkha cʋʋra gι tha'.
Gιdonι sɛr dɔ Thãgbaa nyɛ̃ thɔ̃; a kɔɔ ti ser dιι do Jeju Kirisitii pa gι the, sa-n cʋɛ thɔ̃ bʋɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ maanι gbɛbιrɛ sa-n cʋɛ.
Gɛr gι nι jɛna gιrɛ nɩ kɔɔ donɩ mamara, nɛr kɔɔ dɔ ca kpalaakɛ Juifisɔ n hɩɩnnɩ mɔ̃ na donɩ khʋ̃ kurdara ga, sɩɩ do mɔ̃ wι donι khʋ̃ kurdara jιιn gιιkɛ tibil nyɛ̃ɛ pɛrnι.
Ɔbɔɔraalera na kɔɔ hana Kirisita', na kɔɔ hana lõ paar Ɩjιrayɛldaraa thɩ̃thιιna', nι kɔɔ dor kpakpala nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛrɛraakɛ kɔɔ ʋlfɛnɛnι, na kɔɔ hana nũ pɛra', na kɔɔ hana Thãgba thιιraaka'.
Sι nɛnɛ̃ dιphã nɛrkɛ kɔɔ hʋnɔnɛnι mamara, Kirisitii tɔmɩ̃ cʋʋ nɛr dι nι tɔ wɔrɔ̃ gιrɛ, dιι the anι bιɛl dora na Jeju Kirisiti.
Gιdonι ɔr dʋɔn asι ha ie, ɔrkɛ cʋɛnι Juifisɔ na ca kpala dι wι do bιɛl, mɔ̃ a wιɛlnι laarɛɛkɛ dɔnι gʋʋkɛ lea wɩnɩ kha.
Ɔɔ tomɩ a gba a kʋkʋʋlna jɔfʋ na gιrɛ jɔfʋ n yιnι foo gι cʋɛ, na sɔsɔɔkɛ gι hananι, a cʋʋrɛ mɛ̃ gɩ do nɔɔ caar yenyɔɔle n gbɛbɩ wɩ do tɩɩ pha bɩɛl, gɩ do thale dɔ ha ɩɩ a pɛrnɩ.
Ɔɔ khi kʋkʋ thɩrʋra a kʋna laarɛ, a cʋʋna dakha caar yenyɔ dɩ wɩ bir kũu kha na Thãgba a do tomɩ bɩɛl.
A kɔɔ ɩnɛ a mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ ha iedaa nɛrɛraakɛ hʋnɔnɛnɩ na Thãgba, na wɩrɛraakɛ wɔrɔnɛnɩ.
Ɔr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ sɛrɛ bɩɛlbɩɛl yɩ lõ paar Thɩrɛra na Thu Phuu bɩɛl.
Gɛr gɩ dɩphã na do kpakpala na hʋ ka bã, sɩ bɩɛl nɩ do na tɩɩ phuusɔ a dona Thãgbaa cɔ too.
Nɛr dɔ cʋɔrɩkɛ mɛnɩ, sɩ thɔ̃thɔna na Thãgba tukɩr tidara kɔɔ kpɛa gʋʋ ɓo, dɩ Jeju Kirisitii thɛthɛ dɔ go tɩ bokaar.
Bɩɛl dʋʋr na ɔr thɛthɛ na dɔ nɔɔ dɩ cʋɔrra fɛʋ na cõcool na khɔ̃ a na do cɔ phuu Kɔ̃tɩnna.
Bɩɛl dʋʋrrara na ɔr wɩ gba nɩ a ɓaan a gbɛbɩ mι dι nι do cʋɔr Thãgbara, kɛ Thu Phuu n cɔrɔnι.
Gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ dι mɛr Polιkɛ dɔnι khaɩdaar Jeju Kirisitii sora dɩɩ do nɛr ca kpala dɔ nɔɔ, n bɩɛl Thãgba dɩ ma-n pɛ nar.
Mɩ pɛrɛ haar nɩ nɩɛrɛ bɔɔbɔɔ mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba pɛ marnɩ thɔma dɩ ma-n cʋʋ nɛrɛra, dɩɩ do ɔɔ bɔ jɩra gɩ the.
Thãgba kɔɔ nɛ mar thɩ̃ɛ a cʋʋ mɩ dɩ ɩ̃ jɩ thɩ̃ gbulikɛ keranɩ, gɛr ha gɩrɛ mɩ kherenɩ a cʋɩ nar gbe;
dɩ mɔ̃ nɩ-n hɩɩnnɩ sɛbɛɛkɛ na punone na jɩ dɩ mɩ jɩɛ jɩ Kirisitii thɩ̃ gbulilera.
Bɔɔkɛ kɔɔ kanɩ mamara tɩbɩla na kɔɔ jɩ thɩ̃ gbulikɛ mɔ̃kɛ Thu Phuu nɩna gɩnɩ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar phusɔra na ɔɔ tukɩr tidarara ga.
Gɛr dɔ mɔ̃ ca kpala na bulni kha na Juifisɔ gɩrɛ wɩ hananɩ, a na debi dakha a na do tomɩ bɩɛlɩ ɓãɓã na wɛr, a na bulnə kha Thãgbaa ʋlfɛɛkɛ tibil na 'lɛnɩ Jeju Kirisitira gɩ do tutugo bʋɔra gɩ the,
kɛ mɩ doronɩ gɩrɛ thɔ̃thɔn dɩɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ khaardaakɛ Thãgba ha mɩnɩ ɔɔ fãgara hanɩ, sɩ dɩɩ do ɔɔ bɔ jɩra gɩ the.
Mɛrkɛ dɔnɩ dabuu a jɔ tɩɩ phuusɔ fɛʋ, sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ jɩ mɛr bʋɔra a pɛ mar ma-n mɩa ca kpala tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnι Kirisitii thɩ̃ ɓɔ̃ɔkɛ na hanι mιɛrɛra ga,
ɩ̃ cʋɛ tιbιla fɛʋ wι jιι yι mɔ̃ thɩ̃ gbullə yιrnι, gιrɛ Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋ Tidaar kɔɔ maanι kerre kɛkɛkɛ.
Mɛ̃ dιphã we gbɛbιdara na cʋʋ fãgadara na punodara Thãgbaa dʋɔ dι wa jι Thãgbaa kpɛsɛɛkɛ jʋɔnɔnι.
Thãgba cʋʋrɛ mɛ̃ dιι nιna ɔɔ kpιɛrιkɛ dɔnι khorrdaakɛ yιranι dιι do asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitira gι the,
kɛ sι yιrɔnι hʋɛ na ha pɛrɛɛkɛ sι hananaanι a na ba wɔrɔna Thãgba na 'lar.
Mɛ̃ gι mι-n bιɛl nɛr na-n do nyɛ̃ɛ n khiir ni bɔ gaarɛraakɛ mι-n yιnι anι sora ga, anι dabɔ ga kɛr na do.
Gɛr dɔ kιrʋ dι ma-n gulẽga Thιrɛɛ ƴɛra,
kɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanι thιιra na ƴũ n 'lɛrnι ire,
dι a na gba ɔɔ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ ɓɔ̃ a cʋʋna nι nι 'lɛ fãga gι jɔr anι hara, gι do ɔɔ Thu Phuurə gι the;
Kirisiti n tɔɔ dakha anι hara gι the ha pɛrɛra, nι puno nι gɔ nɛɛ gι hulõ naʋra;
nι puno na-n jι na tιι phuusɔ fɛʋ mɔ̃ Kirisitii naʋ pɛrnι, a gbaanna, a hulona, a gbaanna dakha ƴũ;
nι jιι jιna ɔɔ naʋʋkɛ kanι jιιr fɛʋ, nι puno nι hi phi na Thãgbaa hi fɛʋ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananι punone dι cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛ, dɩɩ do ɔɔ fãgaakɛ n dɔnɩ thɔma asɩ hara gɩ-n the, a-n cʋʋrɛ dɩɩ jɔ gɩrɛ fɛʋ sɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ na sɩ-n kpɩɛrnɩ;
ɔɔ i n dʋbarɔ we gbɛbɩdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ, gɩ do Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the. Amɛn.
Gɛr gɩ mɩ-n bɩɛl nɛr, mɛrkɛ dɔnɩ khaɩdaar Kɔ̃tɩnɩ sora, na-n ɩrɛ ga-n mɩɛ kha na werɩkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ we nɩnɩ.
Nɩ jɔ dɩbara, a hana hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ, a hanana dakha ha fʋrɛ. Na-n fɔ kha haar bɩɛlbɩɛl na naʋ.
Na-n gbuoro yʋʋ Thu Phuu bɩɛl do n hale gɩ too anɩ pa, gɩ do lidaakɛ dɔnɩ ha ɩɩkɛ le nɩnɩ dɔ nɔɔ.
Tomɩ bɩɛl hale, na Thu Phuu bɩɛl, mɔ̃kɛ nũ pɛ bɩɛl hanɩle dakha kɛ Thãgba we narnɩ.
Kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl dɩbara haanle, na ha pɛ bɩɛl, na yɔ kpɛɛ bɩɛl,
na Thãgba bɩɛl, kɛ dɔnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ Thɩ, ɔr kəəne thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra, ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ pɛnɩ paar fɛʋ, a har dakha sɛrɛ fɛʋʋ bɩnɔ.
Sɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl 'lɛr bɔ jɩ khaardaa dɩɩ do asɩda, mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti n 'laanɩ jɔɔ dɩ ha sɩ.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sonɩ ayɩ: “Mɔ̃ a-n kɔɔ jʋʋnnɩ ƴũ, a khɩɩrɛ dea a jʋʋnna, a har tɩbɩla dakha khaardaa.”
A jʋʋnɛɛ kιr dʋɔn mɔ̃? Mee gι nιnanɛ a kɔɔ gbune a dã thɩ thɛrɛɛ ɓo.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ gbunoni ɔr thɛthɛra jʋnɛ a kəə thãgbara ƴũ fɛʋ, dι mɛ̃ ga do ɔr he thιιkɛra a gbana ƴũ koo.
Ɔr pιɛr ιkhasɔ wι dɔ thɔ̃thɔna, ιkhasɔ n do Thãgba tukιr tidara, ιkhasɔ n do tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι mιιdara, ιkhasɔ n do khɛkhɛ na dιιrdara,
gι do nɔɔ tιι phuusɔ n gbɛbιrι wι 'li wa-n jιι cʋʋ ɔɔ thɔ̃, gι cʋʋ dakha Kirisitii tomɩ gɩ khɔ̃ ga-n pɛr,
phaphapha sɛrɛ fɛʋ n do bɩɛl ha pɛdaara, na Thãgbaa Bikuuni jɩra, sɩ khɔ̃ sɩ bɩ̃, sɩ mãkhana Kirisitiikɛ dananɩ thu;
dɩ mɛ̃ sa do bɩsana 'lo, dɩ dɩɩrɛɛkɛ n phʋnanɩ jɛ khaa na cʋʋ sɩ sa-n kpaar baba ga; dɩɩrɛɛle tɩɩ fɩɩl tɩbɩlaa pa gɩ the, kɛ n gbaannɩ fɩɩlɛ dɩ wɩ cʋʋna tɩbɩla wɩ lona hʋ puurə.
Sɩ sobɔ mɩɩrɛ na naʋ sa ka na khɔnɔ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra ʋrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ yʋʋ, a thɩɛna gaa Kirisiti gɩ.

Ɔr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ tomɩ ɓaanʋsɔ dɩɩdɩɩ n coor kha a do bɩɛl dɩɩ the ƴɔɔpasɔraalera tomɩrra n hananɩ, mɛ̃ gɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ tomɩ ɓaanʋ dɩɩdɩɩlera n donɩ awɩ thɔ̃ mɔ̃kɛ gɩ teenanɩ, tomɩrra koo n khʋɔn dɩ ga-n pɛr na naʋ.
Gɛr gɩ gɩrɛ mɩ-n sonɩ dɩ ɩ̃ bo dɩ ma-n kpãkpaanɔ mɔ̃ mɩ donɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda dʋɔn wɔɔ: Na-n hana fɩlɛ 'lo a ho thɩldaraakɛ hananɩ mɔlɔ kpɩɛra'.
Awɩ kpɩɛr pa gɩ birəre, wa hana Thãgbaa yiikɛ a-n 'laana', dɩ gele awɩ kpɩɛr 'leeraakɛ wɩ hananɩ na awɩ ha dibirə gɩ the.
Awɩ puu cʋʋ na-n thʋ wɩ haar fɩɩʋraka'; wɩ gbaar dɩbara a faa dakhaba cʋʋrɛra, dɩ wa-n cʋʋna thɔ̃ bisesɔ fɛʋʋkɛ n kɔ wɩnɩ thue.
Sɩ nɛrɛ, ga do thale gɩ dɩɩr nɩ Kirisitii pa ga.
Sɩ mee mɩ pɛrɛ haar nɩ nɩɛrɛ bɔɔbɔɔ mɔ̃ ɔɔda mɩɩnɩ, dɩ wɩ dɩɩr nɛr sobɔrɩkɛ hanɩ Jejura,
gɛr dʋɔn a thɩɛna gaa dɔ nɩ faa cʋʋ pa tɩ̃ɩkɛ nɩ kɔɔ hananɩ mamara, kɛ dɔnɩ tɩɩ tɩ̃ dʋʋrιkɛ hananι thɩ̃ ƴaal kpãkpãa kheuukɛ na-n hiennə', dιι tʋɔ dι ga-n jalna kʋɛ paar.
Dɔ nι debi nι do daphaa haarra na kpιɛrɛra.
Nι tɔ tιι pha dʋʋrιkɛ Thãgba tini da-n hʋʋ fιl sarrɛra na phurrəəkɛ thɛnι sobɔrra.
Gɛr gι dɔ nι faa sõsor sι nɛrɛ fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl na-n mιι gιrɛ dɔnι sobɔr 'walãkha tibillə, gιdonι tomι ɓãasɔ sι do a dona tomι bιɛl.
A nĩkhii fʋ nι na-n cʋʋ sopugoə'; na-n do wire n lõ sι nĩkhii n cι nara',
dι na-n faa Satã a yι lõ paara'.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ dʋɔnnι yudaar a na-n yu bã, sι a ka na dɔ thɔ̃ bʋɔ na ɔɔ nyɛ̃ a hanana dakha gɩrɛ a na-n 'laanɩ wιrɛraakɛ thɩ̃ɛ n ɓɔrnι.
Na-n do thιmιι puu bιɛllakɛ na-n the anι nɔa', sι na-n mιa thιmιι bʋɔ tιbιlala mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ ha warnι gι cʋʋ wι wι khɔ̃ wa-n pɛr, gι dɔ thιmιaakɛ na bʋɔnɔnι wιrɛraakɛ n nιɛnɛnι.
Na-n cʋʋ haar ga-n hel Thãgbaa Thu Phuə'; ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ dɔnι jιιn Thãgba dʋ narnι dιι nιna dι taarɛ na 'lɛr dιphã waa vʋ̃ʋ, wireekɛ na ιnanι.
Nι dɔna bɩ̃ gbur fɛʋ a faa, na nĩkhii, na nĩkhi khιι, na so kιιr, na tibil i kʋɛrɛ, na bɩ̃ kpallɛsɔ fɛʋ.
Sι nι ka na bɔ khasɔ a na jɛ kha bʋɔra, a faa sopugosɔ na hana kha mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti donι nɔɔ dι Thãgba kɔɔ faarɔ anι sopugosɔ a ha nι.
Gɛr gι mɔ̃kɛ nι donι Thagbaa bιsãsɔɔkɛ a-n nanι, na-n dɔ ɔɔ phɛldara.
Na-n ιrɛ naʋra mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti kɔɔ na sιnι a faa ɔɔbara asι sora, a do khaardaa na bonι jir Thãgbara, kɛ hɔnι thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n hʋnaanι daʋ.
Sι ado bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ gɩ, na thɩ̃ bise cʋʋrɛ, na ha pιɛrɛ, na-n dorakɛ thιmιι ca gele n too nι nɔɔ fιιʋraka', gele na teena tιι phuusɔa';
mɛna gι dakha na yicur thιmιa, na folo folo mιιrɛ, agιbo na nɔ jι thιmιaakɛ dɔnι thιmιι bise, sι dɔ nι ka na-n mιι Thãgbaa khιι thιmιa.
Gιdonι nι jιɛ jι dι bɔdɛl cʋʋdaar, na thɩ̃ bise cʋʋdaar, na ha pιɛrdaarιkɛ mãkhananι thιl jir, na hana dιkha Kirisiti na Thãgba fãgadaarι dʋɔa'.
Na-n do tibil n gba mɔlɔ thιmιa a na-n fιιlna na', gιdonι gele n dɔ nɔɔ dι Thãgba n ιιrna nĩkhii nũ nʋʋrdarara.
Gɛr gι na-n bɔ kha fιιʋrakɛ na wele hanι thala'.
Mamara dabirə nι kɔɔ do, sɩ nɛnɛ̃kɛ mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda dahɩrɛ nɩ do. Na-n hana fɩlɛɛkɛ dahɩrɛdara n hananɩ,
gɩdonɩ ka dahɩrɛ hanɩ liir bɔ cʋʋrɛ dɩɩdɩɩ, na fɩl sarʋ, na sobɔr n ha.
Nɩ mɩɛnɛ na hɩnɛ a jɛ gɩrɛ n danɩ Kɔ̃tɩn haar;
sɩ na-n bɔ kha fɩɩʋrakɛ na dabirəə thɔ̃a', gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ bʋɔ na-n the la', sɩ nɩ ka tɔ gɩ thɛna na pɛ dahɩrɛra.
Gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ tɩbɩlaale n cʋʋnι wolonena, gι-n kʋrɛrakɛ yicuru mιιrɛra.
Sι a ga thɩ̃ fɛʋʋle the dahιrɛra pι gι-n yιrrɛ mɛ̃ gbelẽ gbelẽ,
gιdonι gιrɛ dahιrɛ n caranι gι-n hιrɛrɛ. Gɛr dɔ kιrʋ dι gι so ayιwɔɔ: “Fɛrkɛ n daarɛnι, jaga, ιrɛ kherə a thɛ, Kirisiti na carã fɛr.”
Gɛr gɩ na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ anɩ ɩɩr para, na-n ɩɩr də̃bəəl khaa ga, sɩ na-n ɩrɛ dakpɛsɛ khaa.
Ƴɩɛɛkɛ nɩ yɩnɩ na-n faa gɩ ka fɩɩʋraka', gɩdonɩ bɔɔra nɛnɛ̃ waa ga bɔra'.
Gɛr gɩ na-n do jɩ 'leedara ga, sɩ na-n jɛ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ tuur.
Na-n do taan na-n kʋ na', dakhaba thɔma yɛ, sɩ nɩ ka dɔ Thu Phuu n hi ni.
Nɩ gba Thãgbaa khɩkhɩɩ nɩ, na fɔfʋɔr nɩɛ, na Thu Phuu nɩɛsɔ a na khʋɛana khasɔ. Na-n khɩna na anɩ ha fɛʋ na wireekɛ na danɩ Kɔ̃tɩn haar.
Wire fɛʋ na-n fʋɔrɛ Thãgba Thɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra, gɩ do asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii irə gɩ the.
Kirisitii cʋ dɔ kɩrʋ nɩ wuro khasɔ bɩɛlbɩɛl na jɔ.
Khɛra, na-n jɔ anɩbara anɩ kora mɔ̃ nɩ-n jonɩ anɩbara Kɔ̃tɩnna.
Gɩdonɩ kuun dʋɔn yʋʋ khɛrra, mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti donɩ yʋʋ we gbɛbɩdararaakɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ tomɩ, kɛ a doronɩ gɩrɛ Taadaar.
Mɔ̃kɛ we gbɛbɩdara n jonɩ dɩbara Kirisitira, khɛra teenanɛ wɩ jɔ dɩbara ɔmɛ̃ awɩ kosɔra thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
Kona, na-n na anɩ thɛthɛɛ khɛr mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti kɔɔ nanɩ we gbɛbɩdara a faa ɔɔbara awɩ sora,
dɩ mɛ̃ a na lee wɩ kpɩɩ mɔ̃ a cɔcɔɔ wɩnɩ na nyʋɔn na ɔɔ thɩmɩɩ,
gɩ do nɔɔ a cʋʋ we gbɛbɩdaraalera ɓɔnanɩ wɩ jɩɩlʋʋ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn, wa hana jiine na tɔtɔɔ paar dɩ dɩkhaa thɩ̃ ga, sɩ wa phure a na 'lee dɩ paar.
Mɛ̃ gɩ kona teenanɛ wa-n na awɩ thɛthɛɛ khɛr mɔ̃kɛ wɩ-n nanɩ awɩ thɛthɛɛ tomɩ. Ʋrɛ naannɩ ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ khɛr, dɩbara a na.
Gɩdonɩ tibil bɩɛl na hale n laarɛnɩ ɔɔ toma', sɩ a-n haan gɛr da-n jɩɩ tɛbɩrɩ gɩ, mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti n cʋʋnι gιrɛ we gbɛbιdara,
gιdonι sɛr dɔ ɔɔ tomι ɓã.
“Gɛr gι dι kuun na lee kha na ɔɔ thι na ɔɔ nι sι a ɓã kha na ɔɔ khɛr, wɛr yenyɔ n gbɛbι wι do tibil bιɛl”, thale gι khere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra.
Sobɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ι gιιkɛ huloneni dι mɔ̃ mι yιɛnι, thale Kirisiti ha gιrɛ na ɔɔ we gbɛbιdara.
Sι ado nɛrɛ fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl gι, kuun na-n na ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ khɛr mɔ̃kɛ a-n nanι ɔɔbara, sι khɛr na-n cɔ ɔɔ ko.
Bιsana, anιda Kɔ̃tιnι ƴɛra dʋɔn, na-n nɛ anι thι na anι nι nũu, gɩdonɩ gɛr telene.
“Na cɔ afɩ thɩ na afɩ nɩ”, gɛr dɔ caca jɔfʋʋkɛ hananɩ ʋlfɛrɛ ayɩ:
“Thɩ̃ɛ na bɔ farɛ fɩ hana dakha yire fɩ pʋɔr thɩɩra.”
Sɩ nɛr thɛsɔ, na-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ gι thʋ̃ ga-n fʋ anι bιsãsɔ nĩkhiə', sι na-n haanɛ wι a na dιrɛna wι, a na naarna wι mɔ̃kɛ Kɔ̃tιn n ƴaalnι.
Dea, na-n nɛ nũu anι kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔraakɛ nι donanι kha tibil kɛ thιιra, na maar na jẽu, sι na-n cʋɛ na ha bʋɔ gι ho Kirisitira nι-n cʋʋ,
sι ga-n do awι ƴɛra dιbara gι ho tιbιla nι-n ƴaal nι da haara', sι mɔ̃kɛ nι donι Kirisitii deesɔɔkɛ n cʋɛnι gιrɛ dɔnι Thãgbaa tuur na haar fɛʋ.
Na-n dɔ war thɔma na ha bʋɔ mɔ̃ gι donι Kɔ̃tιnna nι-n do, ga do tιbιlala ga;
na-n jιnana dι tιbιla fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl, a dee ntɛ do, a waʋ ntɛ do, a na 'lɛr Kɔ̃tιnna mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ bɔ cʋʋ hanι.
Sι nɛr kɔ̃tιnasɔ, na-n cʋɛ ɔmɛ̃ na anι deesɔ; nι sɛrɔ mɔ̃ nι-n mιι warnι thιmιɩ khena, na-n jɩnana dɩ nɛrɛ na anɩ deesɔ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl nɩ hana dɩ hale ƴũ, aa-n hɩɩn tɩbɩla dɩɩdɩa'.
Gɩrɛ sɛnɩ dɩphã dʋɔn wɔɔ, nɩ dɔ anɩ puno na-n the anɩ bɩɛl dora na Kɔ̃tɩn na dakha ɔɔ fãga kʋkʋra.
Nɩ gba Thãgbaa ko ke thɩ̃ fɛʋ a tɔ, a punone jɩlɛ kɩbɩ a na pɩɛrɛ Satãa fɩɩl thɔ̃ɔkɛ a-n cʋʋnɩ.
Gɩdonɩ ga do lãlaardaraakɛ dɔnɩ tɩbɩla sɩ-n kɛ̃kɛrɛna ga, sɩ fãgadara sɩ-n kɛ̃kɛrɛna, na punodara, na wɩrɛ dɔnɩ dabirə fãgadara kɛ, nakha kɔ̃tɛɛbi puusɔɔkɛ hanɩ thãgbara ƴũ.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ nɩ gba Thãgbaa ko ke thɩ̃ fɛʋ, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ wi puu na phanɩ nɩ puno nɩ pɩɛr lãlaardaar kĩkĩ, a nɩ kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛnakɛ a dana khu paar sɩ nɩ bo nɩ jɩɩl kɩbɩ.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ fɔ gɩ ma. Nɩ gba sobɔr gɩ do lophɛrɛ nɩ khɩmɩ pelela; nɩ gba fɩl sarʋ gɩ do kũkũ kɛɛ ther;
nɩ tɔ ha ie tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩ ƴaalɛ gɩ do nɛfaa anɩ nɛra;
bɔɔ fɛʋ nɩ gba ha pɛrɛ gɩ do tomɩ phɩdaakɛ na punoneni a na khiir puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarɩ dɔ sõ fɛʋ;
nɩ subo dakha taarɛ gɩ do the kpɩɛr, nɩ gbana dakha Thu Phuu bajɩnaakɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa so.
Na-n bɩɛlna Thãgba na-n phʋʋrnaa anɩ bɩɛlla bɔɔ fɛʋ ga-n the Thu Phuurə; na-n jʋrɛna na yɩrrɛ, nɩ bɩɛlnɛ na pɛ tɩɩ phuusɔra fɛʋ,
na mɛrɛra dakha dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ma-n hanɩ nʋɔ ɩ̃ mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩ̃ gbullə, ɩ̃ yɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ ma gbanɩ na mɩɩna na 'lar, gɩ do gɩ yɩrrɛ casɩ.
Ga tutugo bɔɔlera mɩ doro ʋrɛ wɩ pɛrnɩ sɩ dɩ ɩ̃ bir gbãga ha gɩrɛ khaɩra; nɩ bɩɛlnɛ na pɛ mar ɩ̃ puno ma-n mɩɩ na 'lar mɔ̃kɛ gɩ teenanɩ ma-n mɩa.
Tɩsɩkɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ omineekɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ sobɔ tibil Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔna, ɔr na mɩɛnɛ nɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ hanɩ ɩ̃ pa na gɩrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n cʋʋnι.
Gɩrɛ mɩ thʋɔnaanɩ anɩ pa dʋɔn nɩ jɛ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ hanɩ asɩ pa, gɩ cʋʋ nɩ nɩ faa haar.
Ha ɩɩ, na naʋ, na ha pɛrɛ n thɛ Thãgba Thɩrɛɛ pa na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩnɩ pa a na dana omɩna fɛʋ.
Wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n naannɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na naʋʋkɛ na dɔnɩ dapɩnana', Thãgba na-n jɛ wɩ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Pol na Timothe, sɛrkɛ dɔnι Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃dara, thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha Jeju Kirisitii tɩɩ phusɔɔkɛ hanɩ Filipi, na we gbɛbɩdaraa hɩɩndara, na we gbɛbɩdaraa thɔ̃ dodara.
Thãgba asɩ Thɩ na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩn n hana nɩ ha ɩɩ a jɛ nɩ dakha bʋɔra.
Bɔɔ fɛʋʋkɛ ma-n jɩna nɩnɩ mɩ-n khɩɩrɛ ɩ̃ Thãgba.
Bɔɔ fɛʋʋkɛ mɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ Thãgba, daʋ mɩ-n bɩɛlna dɩ ma-n pɛ nar fɛʋ.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ-n bulle tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛ, dɩɩ fʋna caca wire a dana nɛnɛ̃kɛ.
Mɩ jɩrɛ tue dɩ ʋrɛ fɔnɩ anɩ hara thɔ̃ bɔ caakɛ da-n cʋʋ, a na jalna gɛr waa na ba pɩɩr Jeju Kirisitii wirə.

Gɩ teere kha ɩ̃ hana kpɩɛr caar thakɛ nɛrɛra, gɩdonɩ mɩ fʋ nɛr na ɩ̃ ha, gɩdonɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ nɩ bulle kha na mɛrɛ bɔ jɩɩrɩkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ jɩ mɩnɩ, a khaɩra mɩ ha, a ɩ̃ kɛ̃kɛrɛnaakɛ mɩ-n kɛ̃kɛrɛnɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ n jɩlɛ kɩbɩ gɩ.
Thãgba dɔ ʋrɛ tɔ garnɩ yire dɩ ɩ̃ ha hor dɔɔ nɛrɛ fɛʋʋ sora, naʋraakɛ mɩ hana narnɩ ɓoɓo dɩɩ do Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the.
Dɩ gɩrɛ mɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ Thãgbara dʋɔn, anɩ naʋ n khɔna na pɩɛr wire wire na jɩɩr na kpɛsɛ hulone,
nɩ puno na-n jɩ gɩrɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ a jɔ fɛʋ, gɩ do nɔɔ nɩ phu nɩ 'lee dɩ paar Kirisitii wirə;
nɩ hinə fɩl sar beekɛ Jeju Kirisiti n cʋʋnɩ dɩ ga-n se, ga-n dʋbɩ Thãgbaa i ga-n khɩɩnaa.
Omɩna, mɩ ƴaalɛ nɩ jɛ dɩ gɩrɛ kɔɔ dana mɩnɩ ka cʋʋrɛ dɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ ka dɩ ga-n jal ƴɔɔ.
Gɩdonɩ fãgadaarɩ gardɩsɔ fɛʋ na wɩ̃ tibilsɔ paar fɛʋ jɩrɛ dɩ Kirisitiida dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ɩ̃ ha khaɩraakɛ.
Dɩ ɩ̃ khaɩ lona cʋʋrɛ dakha omɩna jɔɔ dɩ wɩ faa haar a ha Kɔ̃tɩn, a hanana 'lar a pɛr dɩ wa-n mɩɩna Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ, sɩ maar na-n fʋ wa'.
Sobɔr gɩ, ɩkhasɔ n mɩɩrɛ Kirisitiida na gbugi na nɔkhaa, wɛ na-n mɩɩ na ha bʋɔ kpẽgelẽ;
sɩ ha bɔdaraakɛ wer n mɩanɩ naʋra gɩ the, gɩdonɩ wɩ jɩrɛ dɩ Thãgba pɛ marɛ ɩ̃ tea na pɛ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra.
Sɩ nɔkhadaraale wer n mɩanɩ Kirisitiida, awɩ dɩbara na kpɩɛrra gɩ the, ga do bɩ̃ bʋɔra gɩ tha'. Wɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n birə na pɛ mar bɔ gaarɛ ɩ̃ khaɩdaar dora.
Anye ga cʋʋ? Gɩdonɩ a gɩ ha mɔ̃ gɩ hanɩ, gɩ dɔ bɩ̃ puu agɩbo bɩ̃ bʋɔ, sɩ Kirisitiida n mɩɩrɛ, dɩ gɩ da marɛ, sɩ ga da marɛrakɛ ga-n jalna.
Gɩdonɩ mɩ jɩrɛ tue dɩ ɩ̃ taadara gele na do fɛʋ, gι the anι Thãgba bιɛlla, na bullelaakɛ Jeju Kirisitii Thu n bulni,

mɔ̃kɛ mι-n pιɛrnι gιrɛ na haar fɛʋ, dɩ ma-n pɛna nũu, dɩ yicuru na fʋ ma', sɩ mɩ ka hananɛ 'lar a jɩ dɩ mɔ̃kɛ gɩ-n kɔɔ hanɩnakɛ wire wire mɛna ga ha nɛnɛ̃kɛ, Kirisiti na 'lɛr cʋrɛ ɩ̃ tomɩra, ado ɩ̃ yi hanana gɩ, ado ɩ̃ khirə gɩ.
Gɩdonɩ ado mɛrra gɩ, Kirisiti dɔ ɩ̃ yi hana, dɩ khir dɔ khor 'lɛdaa.
Sɩ ado ɩ̃ yi hana kɛ thɩɩra na dor nɔɔ ɩ̃ thɔ̃ na-n jal ƴɔɔ, ga dor ma jɩ gɩrɛ ma phiirni bɔɔbɔa'.
Jɛ paar yenyɔ mɩ-n jɛ: Mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ka ɩ̃ thɛ jala tɔɔ kha na Kirisiti, gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ baannɩ;
sɩ mɔ̃ ga bɔ narnɩ dɔ kɩrʋ gɩ teere kha ɩ̃ hana yire kɛ tomɩrra.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ mɩ jɩnɩ tue dɩɩ do sobɔr gɩ, mɩ jɩrɛ dɩphã ma toore, ma sɩrɔrɛ sɩ ɩ̃ toona nɩ fɛʋ gɩ cʋʋ nɩ na-n bãba ha pɛrɛɛ da hanana;
dɩ mɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ ma birni wo na ha anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, ɩ̃dara na dor nɔɔ na-n khɩɩrɔ Jeju Kirisiti jɔɔ.

Sɩ thɩ̃ bɩɛl, nɩ hanana fɩlɛ gɩ tee kha na Kirisitii tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ ado ma pɔr na yɩ nɩ ado ma-n pɔa', sɩ ɩ̃ nɩɛ wa-n mɩɩ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ tɩnɩ kɩbɩ kpɩɛr bɩɛl hananɛna, dɩ na-n kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ na ha bɩɛl ha pɛ kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ tutugo bʋɔra.
Na-n do maar na-n fʋ nɩ anɩ lãlaardarasɔɔ phərəra thɩ̃ bɩɛllalaka', gɛr na nɛ war dɩ wɛr na ka na bũburõ, sɩ gɩ nɩna nɛr dɔ wɩrɛ 'lɛnɩ taarɛ dɩɩ do Thãgbara gɩ the.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba kɔɔ jɩ nɛr bʋɔra, ga do dɩ na pɛ Kirisiti haar dɩbara ga, sɩ na-n gaarɛ bʋɔ ɔɔ sora.
Gɛrrara nɩ-n kɛ̃kɛrɛnɔ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ ca bɩɛlɩkɛra nɩ kɔɔ yɩ mɩnɩ dɩ ma-n kɛ̃kɛrɛna, dɩ nɩ nɩɛrɛ dɩ kɛ̃kɛrɛnɔna mɩ harakɛ gɩrɛ 'lo.
Anɩ bɩɛl do na Kirisiti dor gɩrɛ n thɔɔ nɩnɩ bɛ? Dɩ naʋ n ma narɛ bɛ? Dɩ Thu Phuu kuune n hale bɛ? Dɩ bɔ jɩ kpɩɛrɛ na bɔ fʋʋr n hale bɛ?
Nɩ cʋɛ thale daʋ n hi mar phi, mɔ̃ nɩ-n hananɩ kpɩɛr bɩɛl, na naʋ ca bɩɛl, nɩ dɔ bɩnɛ n donɩ kha bɩɛl, nɩ hanana dakha kpɩɛr ƴɛ bɩɛl.
Na-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ bɩɛllakɛ na dɩbara na kpɩɛrɛ na i ƴaala', sɩ nɩ dɔ dɩbara jor n cʋʋ nɩ, ʋ na-n hɩɩn ʋ, mɔ̃ a kɔ̃tɩnɩ a jʋɔ.
Na-n ƴaalɛ gɩrɛ na bɔnɩ ʋkhasɔra, ga do gɩrɛ dɔnɩ anɩda dɩbara ga.
Nɩ hanana ha caakɛ Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ hananɩ:
“Kɛkɛkɛrarakɛ bɩɛlla a do na Thãgba, sɩ aa kɔɔ hɩɩn ɔɔ Thãgba doole dɩɩ do thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ a na fʋnɩ na khɩmɩnɔ kĩkĩkə̃'.
Sι ɔɔ thɛthɛ kɔɔ faa ɔɔbara sa debi a gba dee dʋʋr, a hana tomιr tibil khaa, dι mɔ̃ a debini a do tibil,
a wurre ɔɔbara a nι nũu a dana khir, kʋkʋ thιrʋra a khirakɛ ɓoɓo.
Gɛrra gɩ dɩ Thãgba thʋ̃ ɩɩrʋʋ dɩ do dakpɩɛ, a hanaa ire dɩɩ kəə iera fɛʋ.
Dɩ ireelera a hananɩ da-n do Jeju, na dor nɔɔ, nɛkhilə fɛʋ thãgbara ƴũ, na thɩɩra, a gbana tɩɛrdara fɛʋ, na gulẽgaraarɛ,
dɩ delẽbe fɛʋ na caan phasɩ nayɩ: Jeju Kirisitira dor Kɔ̃tɩn, dɩ Thãgba Thɩrɛ na 'lɛr i dʋbɩrɛ.”

Mɛ̃ gɩ ɩ̃ omisɔɔkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, mɔ̃kɛ nɩ-n kɔɔ nɩ mɩnɩ nũu wire fɛʋ, na-n dɔ thɔma anɩ taarara na cʋrɛ na jẽu, ga-n do bɔɔkɛ mɩ-n hanɩ kha na nɛrɛ dɩbara ga, sɩ nɩ ka na cʋɛ ga-n jɔ mɛ̃ bɔɔraakɛ ma hanɩ kha na nɛrɛ bã.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba dɔ ʋrɛ n pɩɛrnɩ ƴaalɛ anɩ hara na punone dɩ na-n cʋʋna gɩrɛ a-n ƴaalnɩ ga-n cʋɛ.
Na-n cʋɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ sɩ na-n ƴɛa', na-n bana thɩ̃ banaa dakha ga;
mɛ̃ na 'lee dɩ paar, na hana sɩ paara', nɩ do Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔɔkɛ 'leanɩ sor tɩbɩlaakɛ golonenɩ a kʋɛna dakhaa thɩ̃thɩɩn, kãkɛra nɩ-n caranɩ dahɩrɛ khaa thɩɩra,
dɩ na-n 'laana yi thɩmɩɩr; thale na dɔ ɩ̃ məbida Kirisitii wi, dɩ ga do mɔlɔ mɩ kɔɔ ca ɩ̃ kɔlɔ̃kɔa', ga do mɔlɔ mɩ kɔɔ do dakha thɔma woa'.
Anɩ ha pɛ dor bonɩ ji thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ nɩ-n hanɩ Thãgba, sɩ ado gɩ teenanɛ ɩ̃ tɔmɩ̃ n deere ga bonɩ jirəəle dakha, gɩ da marɛ, dɩ gɩ da marɛrakɛ wo na nɛrɛ.
Nɛrɛ dakha nɩ dɔ ga-n da nar ɔmɛ̃, dɩ nɛrɛ na mɛrɛ nɩ dɔ ga-n da sar kha.
Mɩ pɛrɛ haar ado Jeju Kɔ̃tɩn tu, kɩɛr na gbe ma thɔ̃ narɛ Timothe, ɩ̃ puno ɩ̃ nɩ anɩ tutugo ɩ̃ faa haar mer.
Gɩdonɩ ma hana tibilikɛ sɩ-n 'linəni kha ɔɔ kha, kɛ n kpɩɛrna nɩnɩ na haar vʋ̃ʋa'.
Gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ gɩrɛ na bɔ warnɩ dɩbara wɩ-n ƴaal, sɩ wa-n ka ƴaal Jeju Kirisitiida ga.
Nɩ jɩrɛ mɔ̃ jʋʋrɛ kɔɔ nɩnanɩ Timothee tιι bɔ do, dι mɔ̃kɛ bιsaan n hanι na ɔɔ thɩ, mɛ̃ a kɔɔ ha na mɛrɛ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɔna.
Mι pɛrɛ haar ɔr ma thɔ̃ dapaara ado mι jιι jɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ na ha marnɩ.
Sɩ mɩ hananɛ ha pɛrɛ gel Kɔ̃tɩnna, dɩ mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ na pɔr le kɩɛr na gbe.
Mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ bɔr dɩ ma thɔ̃ nar Epafʋrɔdɩtɩra ɩ̃ omi, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ sɩ kɔɔ donanɩ kha thɔma, na ʋrɛ sɩ kɔɔ kɛ̃kɛrɛnanɩ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ bɩɛl, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ nɩ kɔɔ thɔnɩ dɩ bul mi.
Gɩdonɩ anι thu fʋʋrɛ ka, dι gι pιɛraarɛ dɛr nιɛrɛraakɛ nι nιɛnι ɔɔ khora.
Sobɔr gι, gι kɔɔ khʋʋrɛ waa dɩ thɔɔ khir, sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ jɩɩrɛ bʋɔra, sɩ ga do ɔr dɩbara Thãgbara kɔɔ jɩ bʋɔra ga, sɩ mɛrɛɛkɛrakɛ dakha, dɩ mɛ̃ ma hana gbobire na bir na dɛbɩ gbobirera ga.
Gɛr gɩ mɩ thʋɔnɛ kɔrɔ dɩ mɛ̃ ga da nar mɔ̃ na birni na yɩɩ, gɩ do nɔɔ dakha ɩ̃ gbobi n ba gbe.
Dɩ nɩ teaa na daʋ vʋ̃ʋ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ tee, na-n cɔ tibil ca wele.
Gɩdonɩ Kirisitii thɔ̃ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ danɔ khir, fɩɩʋ sɛra sɩ ɔɔ yi n bu, mɔ̃ a gbanɩ thɔmaakɛ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ na kɔɔ punoni a cʋʋ mara', da-n cʋʋ.
Gɩrɛ sɛnɩ ɩ̃ omisɔ, na-n hana daʋ mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda. Ga-n yaa mɩ fɩɩʋrakɛ dɩ ma bir na 'loro gɩrɛ mɩ kɔɔ khere narnɩ mamara ga, dɩ gelela anɩ bulda gɩ do.
Na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn benasɔ, na-n jɩɛ hɩιn thɔ̃daar puusɔɔlera, na-n jιɛ hιιn wιrɛɛkɛ n ƴaalɛnι na-n liirene tomιr.
Gιdonι wιrɛ n kuroni khʋ̃ kur bʋɔ, sɛr wɛ, kɛ n fʋɔrɛnι Thãgba dιι do Thu Phuu pa gι-n the, kɛ Jeju Kirisiti donι nɔɔ dι sa-n məbi, a dona wιrɛ na-n bɔnι dι wa-n ιι gιrɛraakɛ tibil yinə n yɩna'.
Mɛrɛ dakha mι punone pɛr haar mer gιrɛraakɛ tibil yinə n yιnι, dι ado gιrɛ tibil yinə n yιnι wι yι wι bɔ na ιarɔ, ga dor mɛr ka jɔ:
Wι kɔɔ kur mer khʋ̃ʋ wire makõther wirera, Ɩjιrayɛl bire ha mι, dι ɩ̃ do Bɛ̃jamɛ̃ɛ ca, Ebirə kɔna mι dι ɩ̃ do Ebirə bʋɔ; ado jɔfʋ hιιnɛna gι, jɔfʋ bʋ dʋdaar ha mι,
ado gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃daara gι, we gbɛbιdaraa kpoodaar ha mι, ado fιl sar 'lɛrra gι jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛna, sι paar na ha mar gɛrra ga.
Sι ga thɩ̃sɔɔlera kɔɔ dɔ marnι khor, mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ mι-n hιιn gι gιrɛ dιι do, dιι do Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.

Thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋrakɛ mɩ-n hιιn dιι do mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ, gι do gιrɛ baannι fĩi, kɛ dɔnι jɩɩrɩkɛ ma jɩnɩ Jeju Kirisiti ɩ̃ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ ma-n pɛr, dɔ nɔɔ; ʋrɛra dɔnɩ nɔɔ dι ɩ̃ faarɔ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋlera. Mι-n hɩɩn gɛr dιι do puuyʋ thιn ɩ̃ puno ɩ̃ 'lɛ Kirisiti,
ɩ̃ haaraa sι ga do na ɩ̃ thɛthɛɛ fιl sarιkɛ mι 'lɛnι jɔfʋ hιιnɛna gι tha', sɩ gɩ do gɩrɛ mɩ 'lɛnɩ ha pɛrɛraakɛ mɩ hananɩ Kirisitira gɩ, kɛ dɔnι fɩl sarʋʋkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara, kɛ tibil n 'lɛnɩ ha pɛrɛra.
Mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ jɩ Kirisiti na mɔ̃ ɔɔ khi ɩɩr fãga hanɩ, ɩ̃ bul kha dakha na ɔɔ bɔ gaar, ma-n khinə khirikɛ dɔnι ɔɔda,
ma-n pɛna nũu ado ma punone a na 'lɛ khi ιιrɛ.
Ga do mι yι mι 'lɛr pa', dɩ agɩbo mɩ bɔrɛ ka pa', sɩ mɩ-n yɩrrɛ ɩ̃ 'lɛ gɩ, gɩdonɩ gɛrra Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ 'lɛ mι.
Omιna, ado mɛrra gι, ma-n kpιɛr mι 'lɛr pa'; sι thɩ̃ bιɛlιkɛ mι-n cʋʋnι dʋɔn: Mι-n diinəne gιrɛ hanι khiro, sι dι ma-n yιrna gιrɛ hanι ƴɛbʋrɔ.
Khu paar mι-n yιr ɩ̃ ca ɩ̃ dã ɩ̃ 'lɛ khorιkɛ Thãgba n we mιnι ɩ̃ 'lɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, gɩ do Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.
Sɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ khɔnanɩ pɩ a bɩ̃, sɩ hanana ga kpɩɛr caalera, sɩ ado anɩ kpɩɛr har kpɩɩ, Thãgba na cʋɛ gɩ dɩ ga hɩrɛ nar.
Sɩ ka sɩ danɩ gɩrɛ, sɩ fɔ ɔmɛna a ɩrɛ na jalana.
Omɩna, nɛrɛ fɛʋ nɩ dɔ ɩ̃ phɛldara, na-n hɩnɛ dakha bɔɔbɔɔ wɩrɛɛkɛ n ɩrɛnɩ mɔ̃kɛ asɩ fɩl hanɩ.
Gɩdonɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ hale awɩ ɩɩr para wɩ dor Kirisitii kʋkʋ thɩr lãlaardara; mɩ-n kɔɔ mɩɛ nɛr bɔɔ jɔɔjɔɔ awɩda, na nɛnɛ̃kɛrakɛ mɩ-n mɩɩ gɛr 'lo na bɩwɛ dɩ ɩ̃ yɩ:
Awɩ khu pa na dor bũburone, gɩrɛ n danɩ awɩ tomɩra dɔrɔɔm dʋɔn awɩ thãgba, awɩ yicur cʋʋ wι-n khιι, wa-n kpιɛrna thɩ̃ɛ saagado thɩɩkɛɛ thɩ̃ gaaga.
Sɩ se wer, asɩ dɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ ha, le Taadaarɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tιnɩkɛ sɩ-n pɩɛrnɩ na the na ɩ̃.
Ɔr na deba asɩ tomɩɩkɛ yɔɔnɩ a cʋʋ gɩ hona ɔɔ tomɩɩkɛ ɓɔnanɩ, gɩ the ɔɔ fãgaraakɛ a hananɩ a cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩ gɩ jʋʋraa.
Mɛ̃ gɩ, ɩ̃ omisɔɔkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, kɛ n kɔ mɩnɩ thue, nɛrkɛ dɔnɩ ɩ̃ kãkada na ɩ̃ məbida, nɩ tɛ kɩbɩ gɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋra, nɛrkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ.
Mɩ-n bɩɛlɛ Evodɩ, mɩ-n bɩɛlɛ Sɛ̃tɩsɩ dɩ wa 'li kha mɔ̃ wɩ donɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda.

Dɩ fɛrɛ dakha, kɛ dɔnɩ yʋ gbuu tibil thɔmana, mɩ-n bɩɛl fɛr dɩ fa bul wi, gɩdonɩ wɛr kɔɔ tɛrɔ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛ nakha mɛrɛ, na Kilemã na wɩ̃ tibil ɩkhasɔɔkɛ kɔɔ dɔna mɩnɩ kha thɔma, kɛ awɩ i hanɩ yi sɛbɛra.
Na-n hana daʋ wire fɛʋ mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda, ɔɔ mɩ bire so wo na-n hana daʋ.
Dɔ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na-n yɩ mɔ̃ nɩ hananɩ hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ. Kɔ̃tɩn wɔrɔnɛ dɔdɔdɔ.
Na-n jẽ haar thɩ̃ bɩɛllalaka', sɩ thɩɛna fɛʋ na-n sɔ Thãgbara gɩrɛ n ɓɔra nɩnɩ na bɩɛlɛ, na phʋʋrɛ, na fʋɔrɛ.
Dɩ Thãgbaa ha ieekɛ kəəneni dɩ tibil na-n jɩ kɩrʋa', na-n bɛra anɩ ha na anɩ kpɩɛr mɔ̃ nɩ hanɩ Jeju Kirisitira.

Gɩrɛ sɛnɩ omɩna, nɩ dɔ gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔnι sobɔr, na gιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ teananι cʋʋr, na gιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ telenenι, na gιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ phonɩ, na gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ danananɛ, na gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ thɛnɩ ire, na thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ thʋnanɩ ɓɔ̃ ka a teena khɩirɛ, n do anɩ kpɩɛrnɔ.
Gɩrɛɛkɛ nɩ kɔɔ dɩɩrnɩ, kɛ nɩ 'lɛnɩ ɩ̃ pa, na gɩrɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ a yɩna gɩ ɩ̃ pa, na-n cʋɛ gɛr, dɩ Thãgbaakɛ ha ɩɩ n thernɩ na ha kha na nɛrɛ.
Mɩ-n khɩɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn na daʋ ka gɩrɛraakɛ nɩ birni a kpɩɛrna mɩ wo. Nɩ kɔɔ mãa kpɩɛrna gar wer, sɩɩ do fʋ paar ɓɔra nɩ.
Ga do ɩ̃ thɩ̃ ɓɔra dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ma-n mɩɩ thaka', gɩdonɩ a mɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ mɩ hanɩnakɛ, sɩ gɩ-n da marɛ.
Mɩ-n marrɛ dɩ ɩ̃ too na thɩ̃ 'leere, mɩ-n marrɛ dɩ ɩ̃ too ado mɩ hana thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ; thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra na paar fɛʋ, mɩ jɩrɛ thɩ̃ doo n dɔnɩ hiir na thɩ̃ doo n dɔnɩ kɔmɛr, a jɩ thɩ̃ jɔ hananɛ na thɩ̃ ɓɔrɛ.
Mɩ-n punone thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋ cʋʋ dɩ gɩ the fãgaraakɛ Kirisiti n pɛ marnɩ;
sɩ gɩ bɔrɛrakɛ nɩ kɔɔ bul mini ɩ̃ bɔ gaarra.
Nɛr Filipidara nɩ jɩrɛ bɔɔbɔɔ dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ma kɔɔ thenɩ Masedʋan caca bɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ, nɛr dɔ we gbɛbɩdaraakɛ dɩbara kɔɔ bulo mini na war thɩmɩɩr.
Gɩdonɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ hanɩ Tesalonɩkɩ, nɩ kɔɔ thɔnanɛ khaardaa balanyɔsɔ a ha mɩ dɩɩ bul mi ɩ̃ thɩ̃ ɓɔrra.
Ga do khaardaa mɩ-n ƴaala', sɩ gɩrɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ dʋɔn khorɩkɛ gelela n ɩna narnɩ.

Mɩ 'lɛr thɩɛna fɛʋ dɩ thɩ̃ jɔdaar ha mɩ, nyɔ̃korʋ hi mer phi na khaardaakɛ Epafʋrɔdɩtɩ kɔɔ thenanɩ anɩ pa a ɩna ha mɩ; thɩ̃ɛ gɩɩkɛ n hʋnanɩ Thãgba daʋ latɩkolo khaa, a dʋʋraa bonɩ ji thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ daaraanɩ haar dɩ tee.
Ɩ̃ Thãgba na ha nɛr thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n ɓɔra nɩnɩ, mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ leekɛ a lenɩ dɩɩ və̃vĩə hanɩ, gɩ do Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.
Thãgbaakɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Thɩ ɔɔ i n dʋbarɔ na jala waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ.
Nɩ fʋɔrɛ tɩɩ phuusɔ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl, kɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisitii too. Omɩnaakɛ hanɩ kha na mɛrɛ wɩ fʋɔr nɛr.
Tɩɩ phuusɔ fɛʋ fʋɔr nɛr, sɩ cacara Sejaarɩ cɔdara wɛ.
Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩn na-n jɛ nɩ fɛʋ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Polιkɛ dɔnι Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔn mɔ̃ Thãgba tuni na Timothe asι omi,
thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha tιι phuusɔɔkɛ dɔnι sobɔ omιna, kɛ Kirisiti hιnι dι wι ha Kolosι. Thãgba asι Thι n hana nι ha ιι a jɛ nι dakha bʋɔra.
Wire koo sι-n khιι Thãgba asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii Thι dι sι bιɛlnaa dι sa-n pɛ nar,
gιdonι sι nιɛrɛ mɔ̃ nι pɛnι Jeju Kirisiti haar na naʋʋkɛ nι hananι tιι phuusɔra fɛʋ.

Gιdonι ɔbɔɔkɛ sobɔ thιmιιrιkɛ dɔnι tutugo bʋɔ kɔɔ danι anι pa gι cʋʋ nɛr dɩ nɩ jɩ nũ pɛrɛɛkɛ gɩ-n 'laanɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ anɩ ha pɛ na anɩ naʋ jɩɩl gɩrɛraakɛra nɩ-n pɛnɩ nũu, kɛ dɔnɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba thɩɩn narnɩ le ƴũ.
Dɩ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛra ƴɛrrɛ a pɩ paar fɛʋ thɩɩraakɛ, a ha mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kɔɔ danɩ anɩ pa dabɔɔkɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ cacara Thãgbaa bɔ jɩda, dɩ nɩ kɔɔ jɩ gɛr dɩɩ do gɛr dɔ sobɔr.
Epafɩrasɩɩkɛ sɩ-n nanɩ, kɛ sɩ donanɩ kha thɔ̃ dona ɔr kɔɔ dɩrɛ nɩ, sobɔ tibil gɩ Kirisitii thɔna anɩ sora;
ɔr mɩɛnɛ sɩ naʋ caakɛ Thu Phuu kɔɔ pɛ narnɩ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ sɛrɛ dakha a fʋna wireekɛ sɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ, sa-n pɩr kpɩɩ sa-n bɩɛl Thãgba sa-n pɛ naraa ga. Sɩ-n bɩɛlɛ dɩ na 'lɛ kpɛsɛrɛ na jɩɩrɩkɛ dɔnɩ Thu Phuuda, a na jɩna gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa tuur bɔɔbɔɔ.
Mɛ̃ na hana fɩlɛ na-n ɩɩr mɔ̃ Kɔ̃tɩn n ƴaalnɩ na-n cʋʋ gɩrɛ n daaraanɩ haar wire fɛʋ, na-n cʋʋna thɔ̃ bɔ caar dɩɩdɩɩ, anɩ Thãgba jɩ n kɔ̃tɩ̃ dakha ga-n pɛr.
Ɔɔ fãgaakɛ na hanɩ mɩɛrɛra ga n cʋɛ nɩ nɩ 'lɛ punone thɩɛna fɛʋ dɩɩdɩɩ, gɩ do nɔɔ na-n yɩr na ha fʋrɛ na daʋ.
Na-n fʋɔrɛ Thɩrɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ hana nɩnɩ punone dɩ na 'lɛ anɩda na tɩɩ phuusɔ ɔɔ fãga dɩ hɩrɛra.
Ɔr kɔɔ taa sɩ dabirəə fãgara, sa gba sɩ a pɛ ɔɔ Bikuunikɛ a nanɩɩ fãga dɩra.
Ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ birsene sini a faa asɩ sopugosɔ a ha sɩ.
Kirisitiikɛ dɔnɩ dayɩnanɛ ɔr n nɛ sar mɔ̃ Thãgbaakɛ na dɔnɩ dayɩnana' hanɩ. Ɔr dɔ cacadaarɩkɛ Thãgba kɔnɩ dɩ do yʋʋ thɩ̃ tinənena fɛʋ;

gɩdonɩ ɔɔ pa thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ tenɩ the, gɩrɛ hanɩ thãgbara ƴũ na thɩɩra, kɛ dɔnɩ dayɩnanɛ na gɩrɛ na dɔnɩ dayɩnana', a thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ dakpɛna yʋʋsɔ wɛ, na kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, na fãgadarasɔ, na punodarasɔ. Ɔr Thãgba tinə thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ, dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ ɔɔ ti gɩ ti.
Ɔr kɔɔ haanle sɩ thɩ̃ bɩɛllakɛ na kɔɔ ti pa'; ɔr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ ha dapa a too.
Ɔr dɔ yʋʋ tomιrraakɛ dɔnι we gbɛbιdara; ɔr dɔ caca fʋ paar, cacadaarɩkɛ Thãgba kɔnɩ gɩ, kɛ kɔɔ ɩrɛnɩ a the khirera, gɩ dɔ nɔɔ ɔr n do cacadaar thɩɛna fɛʋ.
Gɩdonɩ gɩ dar Thãgba haar dι mɔ̃kɛra a hanɩ ɔmɛna ɔɔ Bikuun na ha gbelẽ gbelẽ.

Gɩ daaraarɛ dakha haar dɩ gba ɔɔ Bikuun a cʋʋna thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩ gɩ bir kũu kha na ɔr Thãgba, ado gɩrɛ hanɩ thɩɩra gɩ, ado gɩrɛ hanɩ thãgbara ƴũ gɩ; ɔɔ Bikuuni tɔmɩ̃ɩkɛ kɔɔ deerenɩ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra dɔ nɔɔ dɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ bir 'lɛrɔ ha ɩɩ na Thãgba.
Nɛrɛ dakha mamara nɩ kɔɔ dor kpakpala Thãgbaadara na ɔɔ lãlaardara, dɩɩ the anɩ kpɩɛrra na anɩ puu cʋʋra.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ Thãgba cʋʋ nɛr dɩ nɩ bir kũu kha na ɔr, dɩι the ɔɔ Bikuuni khirə mɔ̃ a debini a do tibil, gι cʋʋ nι nι jιιl ɔɔ ƴɛ thɩ̃thιιn nι phu, nι 'lee dι paar, na hana sι paara';

ado nι fʋrɔrɛ ha pɛrɛ dι na-n jalna a jιιllɔ a ma kĩkĩ, dι ga do nι kɛrrɛ sa faa nũ pɛrɛɛkɛ nι hananι dιι the tutugo bʋɔraakɛ nι kɔɔ nιɛna', kɛ dɔnι gιrɛ wι kɔɔ mιιnι tιbιlala fɛʋ thιιra, kɛ mɛr Pol doronι gιrɛ thɔ̃ don.
Nɛnɛ̃ daʋ fʋ mɛr ka ɩ̃ bɔ gaarraakɛ mι-n gaarnι nɛrɛra; bʋɔɔkɛra mι-n gaarnι ɩ̃ tomιra, Kirisitii we gbɛbιdaraa sora, kɛ dɔnι ɔɔ tomι, gι ɓaanɛ dι ga-n pιιr Kirisitiidaakɛ a kɔɔ gaarnι awι sora;
dι we gbɛbιdaraa thɔ̃ dodaarra mι do gιrɛ, dιι ha mɔ̃ thɔmaakɛ Thãgba pɛ marnι ma-n dɔ nar hanι, gɛr dʋɔn ma-n mιa ɔɔ thιmιι koo,
kɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ gbulikɛ kɔɔ keranι kɛkɛkɛ tιbιlala fɛʋ, sι Thãgba cʋʋ gι dι gι yιr nɛnɛ̃ ɔɔ tιι phusɔra.
Thãgbaa ƴaalla gι the dι cʋʋ wι wι jɛ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ gbullə donι thɩ̃ ɓʋ̃ɔ ka a kpaa nʋɔ tibil caarra fɛʋ, gɛr dʋɔn: Kirisiti ha anι bιnɔ, kɛ dɔnι nũ pɛrɛɛkɛ nι hananι mɔ̃ na 'lɛnι i dʋbιrɛ na Thãgba.
Ɔr dɔ Kirisitira sι-n mιιnι. Sι-n kpãkpaanɛ tιbιlala fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl dι sa-n dιιrna wι na kpɛsɛrɛ fɛʋ, gι cʋʋ tιbιla fɛʋ wι bɔr wι ka Thãgbaa ƴɛra, gι the awι bιɛl dora na Kirisiti.
Gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ dι ma-n gbũgbulõ thɔmana dι ma-n kɛ̃kɛrɛna gι, na Kirisitii fãga kʋkʋʋkɛ a ha mιnι dι ga-n do thɔma ɩ̃ pa.
Gιdonι mι-n ƴaalɛ nι jɛ mɔ̃ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ιkɛ mι-n kɛ̃kɛrɛnι anι sora hanι, na wιrɛraakɛ hanι Laʋdιse, na wιrɛraakɛ na yɛ mιnι ƴɛbiro pa',
gι do nɔɔ wɩ yɩ ha ƴɔllɛ, wɩ gbɛbɩ wɩ do bɩɛl naʋra, wι hana tu jιιrιkɛ thɛnι jι bʋɔra, wι puno wa-n jιna Thãgbaa thɩ̃ gbulikɛ dɔnι Kirisitii thɛthɛ.
Ɔr cʋɛ Thãgbaa kpɛsɛ na jιιrιkɛ hɔnι tιι ko thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ keranι dιι yιr.
Mι-n mιιrɛ thakɛ gι do nɔɔ tibil na fιιl nι na nɔ da thιmιa ga.
Mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ na hanɩ anɩ parakɛ gɩra', sɩ ɩ̃ thu har kha na nɛrɛ, dɩ daʋ fʋ mɛr mɔ̃ mɩ yɩnɩ fɩl bʋɔ dɩɩ ha anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, na mɔ̃ anɩ ha pɛɛkɛ nɩ hananɩ Kirisitira tɩnɩ kĩkĩ.
Mɛ̃ gɩ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ 'lɛnɩ Jeju Kirisiti dɩ do Kɔ̃tɩn, na-n ɩrɛ kha na ɔr na wa fɩl,
a gɔ nɛɛ gɩ hulono ɔrra; nɩ jɩlɛ ɔrra kɩbɩ, nɩ tɛ ha pɛrɛraakɛ nɩ hananɩ mɔ̃kɛ dɩɩrɛɛkɛ wɩ kɔɔ dɩɩr nɩnɩ hanɩ. Nɩ dɔ Thãgba khɩɩrɛ n too nɩ nɔɔ.

Na-n jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ, na-n do tibil n fʋ nɩ a ɩɩrɔ na tibil jɩɩrɩkɛ dɔnɩ mɔlɔdaa wɩ-n fɩɩlna nɩna', gele fɛʋ kpamna gɩ the na dɩɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ bɔ taa dɩɩra', kɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ tinəneeda, ga do Kirisitii pa gɩ tha'.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba dʋʋr koo har Kirisitii tomɩra.
Dɩ anɩ yi hanana na Kirisiti, dɩkha na ɓɔr nɩ fɩɩʋraka'. Ɔr dɔ yʋʋ kɔ̃tɩnasɔra fɛʋ na fãgadarasɔra fɛʋ.
Mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ kha bɩɛl na Kirisiti wɩ kɔɔ kur nar khʋ̃ʋ, sɩ ga do tibil nyɛ̃ɛ kuro ga, sɩ Kirisiti n kuro gɩ; a thɩɛna gaa gɛr dɔ taarɛ tɩɩ tɩ̃ dʋʋrra.
Yɔ kpɛɛrɛra wɩ kɔɔ dʋ nɩ kha na Kirisiti, sɩ Thãgba ɩɩr nɩ kha dakha khirera wo na ɔrra, dɩɩ the ha pɛrɛraakɛ nɩ hananɩ Thãgbaa fãgaraakɛ kɔɔ cʋgɛɛnɩ dɩ ɩɩr a the khirera.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mamara anɩ sopugo na mɔ̃ na kɔɔ kurni khʋ̃a' dɔnɩ nɔɔ dɩ nɩ kɔɔ khi, sɩ nɛnɛ̃ Thãgba bire ha nɩ kha yire na Kirisiti a faana asɩ sopugosɔ fɛʋ.
Jɔfʋʋkɛ kɔɔ kheranɩ asɩ so heen khere dɩɩ do a thɩɛna gaa sor heene sɩ asɩ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ kʋɛrara, Thãgba bũburõ ger a faa mɔ̃ a gba gɩnɩ a kpa thɩrʋra.
Kʋkʋ thιrʋʋ pa gι the dι Kirisiti puno kɔ̃tιnasɔ na fãgadarasɔɔ fãga a tagιrι, sa nιna tιbιla fɛʋ dι ɔr punone wi.
Gɛr gι na-n do tibil n yι hʋɛ a na-n yι nar dιι gιrɛraakɛ nι-n khonι dι na-n yɔna ga, agιbo gι do fɛtι thιmιιrra, na sιpo pha hιιndaara dι hιιr widaara gι woa'.
Gelesɔ fɛʋ dʋɔn gιrɛ na ɩnanɩɩ jəər, sι gιrɛ dɔnι sobɔ bire Kirisiti gι.

Na-n do tibil n fιιl nι na sõso dιbara jor, na thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔ fʋɔrda, gι cʋʋ nι nι 'lee khorιkɛ na 'lɛna'. Tibil ca ole ire a-n ka thιɛnaakɛ a yιnι ιnι yɩrɛ, gɩdonι ɔɔ kpɩɛrra aa-n kpιɛrna Thãgba ga;
sι aa-n ka dι ma Kirisitiraakɛ dɔnɩ yʋa', kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ n cʋɛnɩ tomɩr fɛʋ dɩ ɔɔ ƴɔɔ pa na cela fɛʋ n li gi dɩɩ coor a do bɩɛl, a khɔ̃ dɩɩ do Thãgbaa pa gɩ the.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ kɔɔ khire kha na Kirisiti, na ha kha dιkha na dιιrɛɛkɛ na dɔnι bɔ taa dιιra', kɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ tinəneeda ga, mɔ̃gιdo dι na hana fιlɛ 'lo gι ho thιιkɛɛda nι do, nι sιrɔ wa-n ha nι jɔfʋ wι yι:
Fa-n gba ga, fa-n 'lɛ hιιna', fa-n thara'.
Sι gelesɔ fɛʋ thɩ̃ kʋɛna gι do a fι yι fι gba gι a na cʋɛna thɩ̃ɛ, dιrakɛ wo tibil jɔfʋ gι na tibil dιιrɛ.

A fι yιɛ wer gι-n hʋrɛ kpɛsɛrɛ, mɔ̃ gι-n hananι dιbara fɛrɛ Thãgba fʋɔrɛ, na dιbara jor, na tomι hʋɔlɛ dιbara, sιι dorakɛ ga do bɔ taa thɩ̃ɛ ha gela', sι tomιrιkɛ gι-n kʋnɩ thue dɔrɔɔm, dɩɩ do gɩ daaraarɛ gɩ.
Mɔ̃ nɩ ɩɩrnɩ khirera nakha Kirisiti, na-n ƴaalɛ ƴũ thɩ̃ɛ, ka Kirisiti hanɩ gɩrɛ a too Thãgbaa nyɔ̃bɔra.
Na-n kpɩɛrna ƴũ thɩ̃ɛ, na-n kpɩɛrna gɩrɛ hanɩ thɩɩra ga.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ kɔɔ khire dɩ anɩ yi ha Kirisitira dɩphã a ker Thãgbaa pa.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Kirisitiikɛ dɔnɩ anɩ yi hana na yɩrnɩ, le na yɩr kha dakha na ɔr ɔɔ i dʋbɩra.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ kɔ anɩ thɩ thɩ̃ ƴaal, kɛ dɔnɩ bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ, na thɩ̃ bise cʋʋrɛ, na thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛ, na thɩ̃ puu kpɩɛrɛ, na ha pɩɛrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ bɩɛl na thɩl jir.
Gɛrra n cʋɛ nĩkhii dɩɩ fʋ Thãgba.
Dɩ nɛrɛ dakha nɩ kɔɔ hananɛ ga fɩlɩlera mamara ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ kɔɔ ha garnɩ.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃kɛ nɩ dɔna gelesɔ fɛʋ a faa: Nĩkhii, nĩkhi khɩɩ, kpallɛ, tibil i kʋɛrɛ na khaakhaar thɩmɩaakɛ n thɛnɩ anɩ nɔra.
Na-n kuur sɔ̃sɔ na pɛ khasɔa', gɩdonɩ nɩ kɔɔ thʋbɩrɛ tɩɩ tɩ̃ dʋʋr na ɔɔ thɔ̃ a faa,
sa to tɩɩ pha dʋʋrɩkɛ n dʋɔnnɩ daphaa da-n pɛr, da-n hona Thãgbaakɛ tieni dɩ a na jɩɩ hananaa jɩ bʋɔ.

Liir Juifi na ha kpɩɩ dɩ wɩrɛ na dɔnɩ Juifisɔa ha kpɩa', dɩ ʋrɛ wɩ kurni khʋ̃ʋ gɩ dɩ ʋrɛ wa kurni khʋ̃aa ga, dɩ hɔ̃ baldara wɛ dɩ wɩrɛ na phuoni yire paa ga, dɩ dee gɩ dɩ waʋ ga; sɩ Kirisiti dʋɔn thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ a har dakha thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
Gɛr gɩ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ donɩ wɩrɛ Thãgba phiirni dɩ nɩ phu, a dona dakha wɩrɛ a-n nanɩ, nɩ hanana bɔ jɩɩr gɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ gɩ ka, na ha bulo fɩlɛ, na dɩbara jor, na hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ, na ha fʋrɛ.
Ado tibil hana sor na ʋ̃ tibil, nɩ hanana kha ha fʋrɛ a faa na hana kha; mɔ̃kɛ Kirisiti kɔɔ faanι anι sopugosɔ, nɛrɛ dakha nι faa sopugosɔ na hana kha.
Sι gιrɛ jɔnιnakɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dʋɔn nι hanana naʋʋkɛ dʋɔnnι bιɛl do lidaakɛ n cʋɛnι tibil dι bɔr dι ka.
Ha ιιkɛ n thɛnι Kirisitira, kɛ Thãgba we narnι nι 'lɛ mɔ̃ nι donι tomι bιɛl, nι dɔ ha ιιra n do kɔ̃tιn anι hara, na-n hana dakha fɔfʋɔr haar.

Nι dɔ Kirisitii thιmιιkɛ ɓɔnanι ka n too anι hara jɔɔ. Na-n dιrɛ kha thɩ̃ɛ a na kpãkpaana khasɔ bιɛlbιɛl na kpɛsɛrɛ fɛʋ. Na-n khιna Thãgbaa khιkhιι nι, na ɔɔ fɔfʋɔr nι, na Thu Phuu nιɛsɔ; na-n khιna gιsɔ na fɔfʋɔr haar ga-n khιι Thãgba.
Dι thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ nι-n cʋʋnɩ, a thɩmɩɩr nɩ-n mɩɩ, a thɔma nɩ-n do, na-n cʋɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnɩda, a na khɩana Thãgba Thɩrɛ gɩ do ɔɔda dɔ nɔɔ.
Khɛra, na-n jɔ anɩbara anɩ kora mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda.
Kona, na-n na anɩ khɛr, na-n hananaa fɩl khɩa'.
Bɩsana, na-n nɛ anɩ thɩ na anɩ nɩ nũu thɩɛna fɛʋ, gɩdonɩ gɛr n da Kɔ̃tɩn haar.
Thɛ, na-n gba bɩsanana fɩl khɩɩ awɩ kpɩɛr n kʋɛa'.
Dea, na-n nɛ nũu thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra anɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔraakɛ nɩ donanɩ kha tibil kɛ thɩɩra, sɩ ga-n do awɩ ƴɛra dɩbara gɩ ho tɩbɩla nɩ-n ƴaal nɩ da haara', sɩ na-n cʋɛ na ha bʋɔ gɩdonɩ Kɔ̃tɩn nɩ-n ma.
Thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ nɩ-n cʋʋnɩ na-n cʋɛ na haar fɛʋ, gɩ ho Kɔ̃tɩnna nɩ-n cʋʋ ga-n do tɩbɩlala ga;
na-n jɩnana dɩ Kɔ̃tɩn na ka nɩ na thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ a thɩɩnnɩ gɩ dɔ anɩda. Gɩdonɩ Kirisiti dʋɔn Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ nɩ-n doronɩ thɔma.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n cʋɛnɩ puure a na 'lɛr lɩmɩnɛ ɔɔ puu cʋʋrara, dɩɩdɩɩ hɩɩnɛ na hala'.
Kɔ̃tɩna, nɩ telene a bʋɔnɔ anɩ deesɔra, na-n jɛna dɩ nɛrɛ dakha nɩ hananɛ bɩɛl dɩ do Kɔ̃tɩn a ha ƴũ.
Na-n yɩra Thãgba bɩɛlɛla, nɩ hanana gar pərre a na khɩa Thãgba.
Nɩ jɩɛ bɩɛlna dakha Thãgba na pɛ sar, Thãgba n khɛr sɩ loo Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ Kirisitii thɩmɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ gbul, kɛ dɔnɩ nɔɔ dɩ ɩ̃ ha gɩrɛ khaɩra,
ɩ̃ puno ma-n jɩɩ mɩɩ gɩ gɩ yɩr casɩ mɔ̃kɛ gɩ teenanɩ.
Na-n hana kpɛsɛrɛ wɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ ha pɛdara ga. Ƴɩɛɛkɛ nɩ yɩnɩ na-n faa gɩ ka fɩɩʋraka'.
Wire fɛʋ nɩ dɔ anɩ thɩmɩɩ na-n do gɩrɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ, gɩ dɔ thɩmɩɩ daa, nɩ jɩ mɔ̃ na birseni tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Tɩsɩkɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ omineekɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ sobɔ tibilikɛ sɩ donanɩ kha thɔ̃ dona Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔna, ɔr na mɩɛnɛ nɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ hanɩ ɩ̃ pa.
Gɩrɛ mɩ thʋɔnaanɩ anɩ pa dʋɔn nɩ jɛ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ hanɩ asɩ pa, gɩ cʋʋ nι nι faa haar.
Mι thʋɔnɛ nakha Onejιmιkɛ dɔnι sobɔ tibil, a dona omineekɛ mι-n nanι, kɛ dɔnι dakha anι tibil. Wɛr na mιɛnɛ nι mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ hanι kɛkɛ.
Arιsιtarkιιkɛ sι hananι kha khaιra a fʋɔr nɛr, na dakha Markιιkɛ dɔnι Barnabasιι omi, kɛ dɔnι ʋrɛɛkɛ mι kɔɔ so narnι ayι: Ado a pɔ anι pa nι teaa.
Jejuukɛ wι-n wenι Jusitusi a fʋɔr nɛr dakha. Khʋ̃ kurdaraa thɩ̃thιιn, wɛr yẽther dιbara dɔ tιbιlaakɛ n dɔna mιnι kha Thãgbaa fãgadaar do thɔma; wɛr dɔ wιrɛ n kɔɔ ƴɔla mιnι haar.

Epafιrasιιkɛ dɔnι anι tibil a fʋɔr nɛr; Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃daar a do; bɔɔ fɛʋ a-n kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ Thãgba bιɛlɛla da-n pɛ nar, gι dɔ nɔɔ nι jιιl kιbι mɔ̃ nι donι ha pɛdaraakɛ bιnanι, a hana tu jιιr dɩ na-n cʋʋ gιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Thãgba tuni.
Mι punone so ɔɔdara ayι: Tibil gιιkɛ n gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛnι thɔmana anι sora, na wιrɛraakɛ hanɩ Laʋdɩse na Yerapolɩsɩ.
Luki dɔtɔrɔ kuunikɛ sɩ-n nanɩ na dakha Demasɩ n fʋɔr nɛr.
Nɩ fʋɔrɛ omɩnaakɛ hanɩ Laʋdɩse na Nɛ̃fasɩ na we gbɛbɩdaraakɛ n gbɛbanɩ kha ɔɔ cɔ.
Ado sɛbɛɛkɛ hɩɩn anɩ pa pɩ, nɩ dɔ dakha wɩ hɩɩn gɩ Laʋdιse we gbɛbιdarara, nɛrɛ dakha n hιιn ʋrɛ na thɛnι Laʋdιsedaraa pa.
Sι nι sɔ Arsιpιra ayɛwɔɔ, a na-n jιɛ hιιn thɔmaakɛ a kɔɔ 'lɛnι Kɔ̃tιnι pa, a cʋɛ gι ga-n dã bɔɔbɔɔ.
Mɛr Polι thɛthɛ khera fʋɔrɛɛkɛ na ɩ̃ nyɛ̃. Na-n jɛna mɔ̃ mι hanι khaιra. Thãgba na-n jιɛ nι bʋɔra.
Mɛr Pol na Sιlvɛ̃ na Timothe thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha we gbɛbιdaraakɛ hanι Tesalonιkι, kɛ Thãgba Thιrɛ na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tιn hιnι. Thãgba n hana nι ha ιι a jɛ nι dakha bʋɔra.
Wire fɛʋ sι-n khιι Thãgba nɛrɛ fɛʋʋdara, dι sι bιɛlna Thãgba dι sa-n pɛ nar na anι i.
Bɔɔ fɛʋ sɩ-n jɩna asɩ Thɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra, anɩ ha pɛ thɩ̃ cʋʋ, na anɩ naʋ thɔ̃ cʋʋ, na anɩ kɩbɩ jɩɩl, nũ pɛrɛraakɛ nɩ hananɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitira.
Sɩ jɩrɛ tue omɩna dɩ Thãgba naan nɩ a kɔɔ phiir ni.

Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩkɛ sɩ kɔɔ pɔnanɩ, ga do nʋɔ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩna dɩbara ga, sɩ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ gɛr dɩɩ ha phãphãphã, na Thu Phuu, na tu jɩɩr vʋ̃ʋ; gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩrɛ fɩl caakɛ sɩ kɔɔ hananɩ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn gɩ do nɔɔ thɩ̃ɛ n bɔ nar.
Dɩ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛrakɛ debire a do asɩ ph ɛldara na Kɔ̃tɩnɩ phɛldara kpoore jɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn, kɛ nɩ-n yɩnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩraakɛ nɩ-n 'lɛnɩ na daʋʋkɛ n thɛnɩ Thu Phuurə,
a thʋ̃ debi waa a do thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ ha pɛdarara fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ Masedʋan na Akaɩ.
Sɩ ga do Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɩmɩɩ kɔɔ ther anɩ pa dɩ ga-n kpaar dɩ Masedʋandara na Akaɩdara nɩɛ dɩbara ga, sɩ paar fɛʋ wɩ nɩrɛ mɔ̃ anɩ ha pɛ Thãgbara hanɩ, dɩ ga do gɩ thʋnɛ harakɛ mɩɩrɛra dɩ sa mɩɩ bã.
Gɩdonɩ wɩ-n mɩɩrɛ asɩda teereraakɛ nɩ kɔɔ tee sɩnɩ ɓoɓo, na dakha wo mɔ̃kɛ nɩ kɔɔ kɛrnɩ a pɛr Thãgba haar sa faa thɩla, sɩ nɩ do thɔma Thãgba yidaarraakɛ dɔnɩ Thãgba bɔ,
na-n pɩɛrna dakha ɔɔ Bikuunikɛ na thɛnɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, kɛ dɔnɩ Jejuukɛ a kɔɔ ɩɩrnɩ dɩ the khirera, kɛ dɔnɩ asɩ tataa Thãgbaa nĩkhirəəkɛ n ɩnanɩ.
Omɩna, nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ jɩrɛ dɩ asɩ pɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ pɔnɩ anɩ pa na kɔɔ do mɔlɔa'.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ gaarnɩ bʋɔ a 'lɛna kpoore jɔɔ Filipira pɩ, mɔ̃kɛ nɩ jɩ gɩnɩ dɩɩ kɔɔ ha, sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ ha sɛr 'lar mɔ̃kɛ sɩ pɔnɩ dɩ sa-n mɩɩ nɩ Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ bãbaranɛ jɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn.
Asɩ wewe Thãgba thɩmɩɩkɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ nɩnɩ na kɔɔ the dədirrə dɩ kpɩɛr puurə ga, dɩ ga kɔɔ do dakha fɩɩl thɩmɩa ga.
Gɩ ka har mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba kɔɔ jʋʋr sɩnɩ hɩɩn dɩ sɩ teena dɩ heen sɩ tutugo bʋɔɔle, mɛ̃ sɩ-n mɩɩ gɩ, ga do dɩ sa da tɩbɩla haara', sɩ dɩ sa da Thãgba haar, kɛ n bəəreni asɩ bɩ̃ dɩ jɩ mɔ̃kɛ gɩ hanɩ.
Nι jιrɛ mɔ̃kɛ gι kɔɔ hanι, ga do fιιl thιmιιr sι kɔɔ mιι nι kpιιraka', dι sa kɔɔ phɩ̃ nar dakha fιlɛ thʋnɔ, sι sa-n ƴaal nar dιkha ga, Thãgbaa thɛthɛ torre yire;
dι dakha sa kɔɔ ƴaal i dʋbιrɛɛkɛ thɛnι tιbιlaa pa, dι anι pa gι, dι ʋkhasɔɔ pa ga.
Mɔ̃kɛ sι donιnakɛ Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔna, sι kɔɔ punone a na nιna asι kɔ̃tɩ̃ do, sι sι ka har hɛlɛlɛlɛ anι thɩ̃thιιn. Mɔ̃kɛ nιrɛ n haannι ɔɔ bιsã bisɔ hɛlɛlɛlɛ,
mɛ̃ sι kɔɔ ha nar ha lʋʋnna, a ƴaal ga-n do Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι sι-n ha nι dιbara ga, sι sι faa asι thɛthɛɛ yi anι sora, gιdonι nι lõ ser haar ka.
Omιna, mee nι jιnanɛ asι thɔ̃ do na asι vɔɔ; dιtιnɛ na dιwιlʋ sι-n kɔɔ do thɔma dι sa do heendaa tibil bιɛllalakɛ anι pa ga, thale sι kɔɔ mιι nar Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι.
Nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛrakɛ kɔɔ to garɛ yire, na Thãgba dakha, dι nɛrɛɛkɛ pιɛrnι haar, sι hana narɛ cʋʋ pa bʋɔ, na fιl telẽe na dι pa 'leere.
Dι nι jιrɛ dakha mɔ̃kɛ thιrɛ n fʋnι ɔɔ bιsãsɔ, mɛ̃ sι kɔɔ fʋ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl bɔɔbɔɔ,
dι sa-n wɛ nι, dι sa-n ƴɔlna nι haar, dι sa-n fɛrɛna nι ayι: Na-n ιrɛ ga-n da Thãgbaraakɛ kɔɔ wɛ nιnι nι lona ɔɔ fãgadaar dora, a bulo kha na ɔɔ i dʋbι.

Gɛr dɔ kιrʋ dι sa-n khιι Thãgba wire fɛʋ, gιrɛraakɛ nι kɔɔ tuni Thãgbaa thιmιιkɛ sι kɔɔ mιι narnι, mɔ̃kɛ ga donι tibil thιmιιra', sιι do Thãgbaa thιmιι bʋɔ gι na sobɔr, dι ga-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ nɛrɛraakɛ pιɛrnι haar.
