Gιdonι, nɛr omιna, nι debire a ha mɔ̃kɛ Thãgbaa we gbɛbιdaraakɛ dɔnι Jeju Kirisitii too, kɛ hanι Jude dιιra hanɩ, gaarɛraakɛ anɩ too n kɔɔ gaar nɩnɩ dɩɩ do bɩɛlla gɩ na gaarɛɛkɛ wɩrɛ dɔnɩ Juifisɔ n kɔɔ gaar wɩnɩ.
Juifisɔɔlera wɛr kɔɔ kɔ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩn, na Thãgbaa bobonasɔ, wɛr kɔɔ kpoone sar dakha, awɩda na-n da Thãgba haara', wɩ-n laarɛ dakha tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Wɛrra n pɩɛrɛ sɩ aa, sa-n mɩɩna ca kpala wɩ 'lɛ taara', dɩ thalera wɩ-n cʋʋ dɩ awɩ sopugo thʋ̃ ɩ̃ waa a dã thu, dɩɩ do waa Thãgba gbana wɛr nĩkhii khorr.
Sɩ ado sɛr wɛ omɩna, mɔ̃kɛ sɩ 'lee nɩnɩ gɩrɛ bɔɔ gbe tomɩrra sɩ ga do haarra ga, anɩ thu thʋnɛ fʋ sɩ waa ka, dɩ sa-n ƴaal ka sɩ yɛ nɩ kɔrɔ.
Mɛ̃ sɩ-n ƴaal gɩrɛ dɩphã sɩ pɔ anɩ pa, dɩ mɛr Polɩ thɛthɛ ƴaalɛlakɛ balanyɔ fɛʋ, sɩ Satã kɔɔ pɩɛr sɛr dɩ sa kɔɔ yɩ hʋɛa'.
Gɩdonɩ ʋmɔ̃ dɔrakɛ gɩrɛ asɩ nũ pɛ, agɩbo asɩ kãkada na asι khookɛ dɔnι i dʋbιdaa, ga do nɛr gι asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jejuu bir ɩ̃ bɔaa?
Ɔɔ, nɛr dɔ asι i dʋbιda na asι da.
Dι mɔ̃ sa-n marnι dιphã na too sa-n pιɛr mã', gɛr gι dι sι kɔɔ kpιɛr hιιn sa too dιbara Atɛn dιιra,
sa thɔ̃ Timothe asι omiikɛ dɔnι Thãgbaa thɔ̃ dodaar Kirisitii tutugo bɔ thιmιι mιιrɛra, a cʋɛ nɩ nɩ tɩ kɩbɩ, na-n yɩr anɩ ha pɛra.
Dɩ mɛ̃ tibil na hale a na jẽ kpooreraakɛ nɩ hanɩ gɩra', gɩdonɩ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ jɩrɛ sɩ hananɛ daa ser kpoorera.
Gɩdonɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ hanɩ anɩ pa, sɩ kɔɔ mãa so nar dɩ sa yɩrɛ kpoore, dɩ gɩ kɔɔ daan otirə mɔ̃kɛ nɩ yɩɛnɩ.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ mɔ̃ ma-n punoni dɩ ɩ̃ mar dɩ ɩ̃ toa', gɛr mɩ thʋɔn ɩ̃ jɩ mɔ̃ anɩ ha pɛ hanɩ, gɩdonɩ mɩ-n kɔɔ dɛr dɩ anaa Satãakɛ dɔnɩ fifilədaar na ba fɩɩl nɛ̃r gɩ ho mɔlɔ thɔma sɩ kɔɔ do.

Sɩ Timotheekɛ thɛnɩ anɩ pa a ɩ̃ gɩrɛ dɩ ga pʋɔra', ɔr mɩɛnɛ sɩ mɔ̃ anɩ ha pɛ hanɩ na anɩ naʋ dɩɩ da sar. A so sarɛ dakha dɩ wire fɛʋ nɩ-n hana jɩnanɛɛkɛ daanɔnɩ sɛrɛra, dɩ na-n ƴaal nɩ yɩ sɩ mɔ̃kɛ sɩ-n ƴaalnɩ sɩ yɩ nɩ.
Gɛr gɩ, omɩna, asɩ nɩ na kpoore fɛʋʋkɛ sɩ-n yɩnɩ, anɩ ha pɛ dor nɔɔ dɩ sɩ faa haar.
Nɛnɛ̃ mɩ fer waa fə̃ə, gɩdonɩ nɩ tɩrɛ kɩbɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋra.
Mɔ̃ khɩɩrɛɛkɛ sa khɩɩnɩ Thãgba na thʋ̃ na ha kper anɩ sorara, na daʋ fɛʋraakɛ n fɔ sɩnɩ asɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra nɛrɛra.
Dɩtɩnɛ na dɩwɩlʋ sɩ-n bɩɛlʋʋ phãphãphã a hana sɩ hʋɛ sɩ yɩ nɩ, dɩ ka anɩ ha pɛ ɓɔrnɩ gɩ tɔ gɩ pɛr.
Thãgbaa thɛthɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Thɩ, na asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju n phɛla sɩ hʋɛ sɩ pɔ anɩ pa.
Sɩ ado nɛr gɩ, Kɔ̃tɩn n dɛ̃ɛ nar anɩ naʋʋkɛ nɩ hananɩ kha bɩɛlbɩɛl na tɩbɩla fɛʋra, gɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ ga-n pɛr gɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ asɩ naʋʋkɛ sɩ hana narnɩ hanɩ.
A cʋʋ nɩ nɩ tɩ, nɩ phu, na hana dɩ paar Thãgba asɩ Thɩɩ ƴɛra fɩɩʋraka', bɔɔkɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju na birni na ɩ̃ nakha ɔɔ tɩɩ phusɔ.

Ado gɩrɛ sɛnɩ gɩ omɩna, nɩ nɩɛrɛ mɔ̃ sɩ-n dɩɩr nɩnɩ dɩ gɩ teenanɛ na-n ɩrɛ ga-n da Thãgba haar, dɩɩ dorakɛ gɛr nɩ-n cʋʋ gɩrɛ, sɩ-n bɩɛl nɛr dɩ sa-n phʋʋrna nɩ na Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i, dɩ na-n ɩrɛ hʋɛrara na bãbar.
Nɩ jɩrɛ dakha mɔ̃ so ca ʋrɛ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ ha sɩnɩ dɩ sɩ ha nɩ hanɩ.
Gɩrɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ gɛr dʋɔn anɩ kpɩɩ lee sopugora; gɛr dʋɔn nι hʋnɔnɛ na bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛ;
gɛr dʋɔn nɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl n jɛ mɔ̃ na fʋnι anιbara, anι tomι n do daphuu, na thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na hananɔnι cʋrɛ.
Dι na-n do thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛkɛ n hərəneni tibil na-n fʋ nι, mɔ̃kɛ gι-n hanι thιldararaakɛ na jɛnι Thãgba gaaga;
gɛr dʋɔn tibil na-n tagιrι ɔɔ omi, agιbo a na-n pιɛraa hara thιɛna ga, gιdonι Kɔ̃tιn na tiire helu ga thɩ̃sɔraale fɛʋ mɔ̃kɛ sι kɔɔ maanι so nar a kpãkpaanɔ.
Gιdonι Thãgba na kɔɔ we sι thɩ̃ bise cʋʋrɛra ga, sι sι pho.
Gɛr gι ʋrɛ bɔnι sorιkɛ ga do tibil a boa', sι Thãgba a bo, ʋrɛɛkɛ hana sιnι ɔɔ Thu Phuu.
Sι ado gιrɛ dɔnι omi naar gι, ma laar na khere nar dιkha bã, gιdonι Thãgbaa thɛthɛ dιrɛ nι ayι, na-n na khasɔ bιɛlbιɛl.
Dι gɛrra dɔrakɛ gιrɛ nι-n cʋʋnι gɩrɛ omɩnasɔra fɛʋʋkɛ hanι Masedʋan dιιra koo, sι sι-n phʋʋr nɛr omɩna, dɩ na jɩɩ bãba gɩ jɔ mɛ̃.
Nɩ yɩra a tɔɔ mʋmʋr, na-n jɩɛ ɔ anɩ thɩ̃sɔra bɔɔbɔɔ, na-n gbuo yʋʋ anɩ nyɛ̃kɩɛr thɔna, mɔ̃kɛ sɩ kɔɔ dɩɩr nɩnɩ.
Dɩ mɛ̃ na hana fɩlɛɛkɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ wɩrɛ na dɔnɩ ha pɛdara gaa thɩ̃thɩɩn, gɩ do nɔɔ dakha na too na-n therna tibilə'.
Omɩna, ado wɩrɛ daarɛnɩ daanɩkɛ dɔnɩ khir gɩ, sa-n ƴaal na-n jɩ mɔ̃ gɩ hanaa ga, na-n bɩ nɩ ho wɛkɛ na hananɩ nũ pɛraa ga.
Gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ sɩ pɛrnɩ haar gel dɩ Jeju kɔɔ khire sa bir a ɩɩr a the khirera, mɛ̃ sɩ jɩ dakha ga har na wɩrɛ pɩɛrnɩ Jeju haar sa daar, Thãgba na kpa wɛr dɩ wa ɩ̃ kha na Jeju.
Nɩ yɛ gɩrɛ sɩ-n mɩɩ nɩnɩ mɔ̃kɛ Kɔ̃tɩn sonɩ, sɛr yidaraakɛ na sɛnɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ ɩ̃ bɔɔ, wɩrɛɛkɛ daarɛnɩ daanɩkɛ dɔnɩ khir sa kɔɔ kʋʋl wɩ ƴɩɛ a na jʋʋna'.

Gɩdonɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɛthɛ na ther Thãgbaa dʋɔ a na-n gbũ, dɩ nɔ khɩɩr na phaan, wa nɩrɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ nɔ, dɩ dakha Thãgbaa tutuu na ʋnɛ, le wɩrɛ pɩɛrnɩ Kirisiti haar sa khiir na kɔɔ ɩɩr cacaca a na the khirera.
Agɩpɩ dɩphã sɛr yidaraakɛ na sɛnɩ, Thãgba na və̃ ser kha na wɛr dɩ sa gbɛbɩ kha kãkɛ ndɔlɔ̃pana hanɩ, gɩ do le sɩ caan Kɔ̃tɩn thãgbara ƴũ. Mɛ̃ na dɔ asɩ too sa toonɩ kha waa khorr na Kɔ̃tɩn.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ gba thɩmɩaakɛra a na ƴɔlana kha haar bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Sɩ omɩna, ado bɔɔkɛ ga donɩ wer na wireekɛ ga donɩ, ma laar na khere nar ga thɩmɩa',
gɩdonɩ nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛrakɛ jɩɛ jɩ dɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ wi na daan mɔ̃ yu n ɩnɩ dɩtɩnɔ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ tɩbɩla na sonɩ nayι: Ha ιι hale; wo: Thɩ̃ɛ bɔrɛ dιphã waa. Liir bũburone na phuro wi dapaara mɔ̃ wallɛ n phũroni khɛ pɛmɛdaar, gι do wa yι for paar bã.
Sι ne wer omιna, na ha dabirəra Wi caale n phuroni mɔ̃ yu n phuronə'.
Nɛrɛ fɛʋ, nɛr dʋɔn dahιrɛdara na dιwιldara, sa ha kha dιkha na dιtɩnɛ dɩ dabirə ga.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ sa-n daar wɛɛ kha ga, sɩ sa-n jʋrɛ a hanana dakha dɩbara fʋrɛ.
Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ n daarɛnɩ dɩtɩnɔ wɩ-n daar, dɩ wɩrɛ taan n kʋnɩ dɩtɩnɔ gɩ-n kʋ wɩ.
Sɩ sɛrkɛ dɔnɩ dɩwɩldara sɩ hanana dɩbara fʋrɛ, a dɔ wɩrɛ tʋɔnnɩ ha pɛrɛ na naʋ kũkũ kɛɛ the khaa, a subo dakha taa 'lɛ nũ pɛrɛ the kpɛ khaa.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba na kɔɔ thɩɩn sɩ sɩ lona ɔɔ nĩkhirə ga, sɩ sɩ 'lɛ taarɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitira,
kɛ kɔɔ khe sarnɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ ado sɩ hananɛ yire, ado sɩ daarɛ, sɩ sa hananɛ kha yire na ɔr.
Gɛr gɩ na-n mɩa kha yɩr thɩmɩa bɩɛlbɩɛ̃l, ʋ n tɔ ʋ a na-n jalna ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ-n cʋʋnɩ gɩrɛ.
Omɩna, sɩ-n bɩɛl nɛr dɩ na hana cʋrɛ wɩrɛraakɛ n gbũgbuloneni anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, kɛ dɔnɩ anɩ ƴɛ kʋʋldara, dɩ wa-n dɩɩr nɩ fɩlɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ hʋra.
Na-n cɔ wɩ dakɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ na naʋʋkɛ hanɩ phãphãphã gɩ do awɩ thɔ̃ dɔ nɔɔ. Na-n tɔ̃ɔ kha na ha ɩɩ.
Sɩ-n phʋʋr nɛr dakha omɩna, na-n kpãkpaanɛ khãkhalala, na-n hana ha phaadara 'lar, na-n bulo wɩrɛ yɔɔnɩ, na-n hana ha fʋrɛ na tɩbɩla fɛʋ.
Na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn dɩ a tibil cʋʋ ʋ̃ tibil puure a na-n bir lɩmʋʋ puurə', sɩ bɔɔ fɛʋ anɩ hara na tɩɩ kpɩɩsɔra fɛʋ, na-n yɩrana bɔ cʋʋrɛ.
Na-n hana daʋ wire fɛʋ.
Na-n bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba tɔ̃tɔ̃tɔ̃.
Na-n fʋɔrɛ Thãgba thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra a gɩ ha mɔ̃, gɩdonɩ gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ anɩ pa, nɛrkɛ hanɩ Jeju Kirisitira.
Na-n khiir Thu Phuu dɔa'.
Na-n beesi Thãgba tukɩr tirə',
sɩ nɩ mɩɛnɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ na hɩnɛ, sɩ na fʋɔr gɩrɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ.
Nɩ hʋnɔnɛ na thɩ̃ puu caar dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ.

Thãgbaakɛ ha ɩɩ n thernɩ, ɔɔ thɛthɛ n lea nɩ kpɩɩ koo nɩ phu, dɩ anɩ thɛthɛɛ tɩɩ dorakɛ koo: Thue, na haar, na tomɩr n jɩɩ too gɩ 'lee dɩ paar, gɩ dana wireekɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na birni na ɩ̃.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ wɛ nɩnɩ sobɔdaar a dõ, dι ɔrra dakha na cʋɛ gι.
Omιna, nι bιɛlnɛ Thãgba na pɛ sar.
Nι fʋɔrɛ omιna fɛʋ na ha lõ fʋɔrɛ.
Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i mι gba dɩ ma-n kpãkpaana nar, nɩ sɔ sɛbɛɛkɛ omɩna fɛʋ n nɩɛ.
Asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na-n jɛ nɩ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Pol na Sɩlvɛ̃ na Timothe thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha we gbɛbɩdaraakɛ hanɩ Tesalonɩkɩ, kɛ Thãgba asɩ Thɩ na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩn hɩnɩ.
Thãgba Thɩrɛ na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩn n hana nɩ ha ɩɩ a jɛ nɩ dakha bʋɔra.
Omιna, asιda dʋɔn dɔ sa-n khιι Thãgba wire wire anιdara, dι gι teenanɛ dι sa cʋʋ mɛ̃ gιdonι anι ha pɛra kɔ̃tιnɛ dι ga-n pɛr, dι anι naʋʋkɛ nι-n nanι kha bιɛlbιɛl dakha gι-n dɛɛnɔnɛ.
Dι gι dor nɔɔ dι sɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ na-n məbi anιdara, Thãgbaa we gbɛbιdarasɔɔ thɩ̃thιιn, gιdonι anι kιbι jιιl dɔ nɔɔ, na anι ha pɛɛkɛ nι hananιnakɛ kpoore na bɔ gaarɛra fɛʋʋkɛ nι-n yιnιι thɩ̃thιιn.
Gɛr n nɛna Thãgbaa kιιl sar, gι do nɔɔ gι do nι teenanɛ lʋʋn Thãgbaa fãgadaar dora, kɛra nι-n gaarɔnι bʋɔ mɛ̃.
Gιdonι Thãgba sarrɛ gɛr a na gbaar bɔ gaarɛ ana lιmι wιrɛ n gaarɛ nιnι,
dι nɛrɛɛkɛ wι-n gaarnι gιrɛ, a na gbaar hιιrɛ a na ha nι nakha sɛrɛ dakha, ɔbɔɔkɛ Jeju Kɔ̃tιn na thenι Thãgbaa dʋɔ a na-n ɩ̃ gbelẽ gbelẽ na ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ na fãga,
na dɔlιnanɛ. A na tiire helu wιrɛraakɛ na jɛnι Thãgba ga, na wιrɛraakɛ na-n nɛnι asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jejuu tutugo bɔ thɩmɩɩ nũə'.
Awɩ so heen na dor bũburone khorr, wɩ hʋnɔnanɩ Kɔ̃tɩn a 'leena ɔɔ fãgaakɛ thɛnɩ ɔɔ puno hanana.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Wireelera na danɩ a na-n ɩ̃ kpãgarɛ na-n ther ɔɔ tɩɩ phusɔɔ pa, wɩrɛ fɛʋ pɩɛrnɩ haar na hananaanɛ cʋʋr, dɩ nɛrkɛ pɩɛrnɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ nɩnɩ haar na harrɛ ner.
Gɛr gɩ dakha dɩ sɩ bɩɛl Thãgba bɔɔ fɛʋ dɩ sa-n pɛ nar, asɩ Thãgba n cʋɛ nɩ nɩ teena ɔɔ wera, a gba ɔɔ fãga a cʋʋna nɩ nɩ puno na-n cʋʋ bɔɔkɛ nι-n ƴaalnι, a cʋʋna anι ha pɛ thɩ̃ cʋʋ ga-n dã otirə.
Dι mɛ̃ na do nɔɔ dι asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jejuu i na 'lɛ kpãgarɛ, dι na 'lɛr dakha kpãgarɛ gι do ɔr dɔ nɔɔ, gι the asι Thãgba na asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii bɔ jιra.
Sι-n bιɛl nɛr omιna, ado gιrɛ dɔnι asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii bir ɩ̃da gι, na asι gbɛbι kha na ɔr,
na-n do kpιɛrɛ nyanyãa nι kɔrɔa', dι na-n do dakha haar na-n jɛ̃ nι gιrɛraakɛ tibil na yιnι aa, Thu Phuu mιana nɩ agɩbo thɩmɩɩr ɩnɩ nɩ agɩbo aa, sɛbɛ thɛ asɩ pa ayɩ, Kɔ̃tɩnɩ wi daan pa'.
A gɩ ha mɔnakɛ na-n do tibil n fɩɩl na', gɩdonɩ dɔ Thãgba so bʋʋrɛ n kɔɔ ɩ̃ ɓo wɩ yɩ Sopugo tibilile a yɩr, kɛ wɩ thɩɩnnɩ bũburõ thɩɩnʋʋ,
Thãgbaa vardaar gɩɩkɛ na ɩrɛnɩ na yʋ bʋʋn gɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Thãgba na gɩrɛraakɛ tibil n fʋɔrnɩ, a ba toorakɛ Thãgba fʋɔr cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna sɩ ayɩ, ɩnɛrɛɛ thɛthɛra dɔ Thãgbara.
Na jιna mɔ̃ mι-n kɔɔ mιɛ nιnι ga thɩ̃ιlera ɔbɔɔkɛ mι kɔɔ hanι anι pa gaa?
Dι nɛnɛ̃ nι jιrɛ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ pιɛrɛɛnι dι agado bɔɔ dana ga hʋɛ na yιr da tha'.
Gιdonι fãga gbulikɛ dɔnι sopugodaa 'lire har dι ga-n do thɔma, foo ʋrɛ pιɛrɛɛnι nɛnɛ̃ n tɔ a khokhιa ɓo dιphã.
Liir Sopugodaarιlera na yιr dι wa yιι, kɛ Jeju Kɔ̃tιn na phʋʋnι na kʋ, a na hɛlʋʋlɛ dι ɔɔda na ther mɔ̃ a na-n ιnι ga-n carbara.
Sopugodaarι ɩ̃ιle Satãa fãgara ga the, na nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛsɔ, na jιιnsɔ, na ma kʋ thɩ̃ɛsɔ, dι gelesɔ fɛʋra na jɔrɛ na ka a na do tιι fιιldaa.
A na gbaar gιrɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ puu caar dιιdιι fɛʋ a na-n fιιlna wιrɛ n buureni, gιdonι wa na sobɔr a na 'lɛ taara'.
Gɛrra dɔ kιrʋ dι Thãgba thɔna war fãga ga-n fιιl wι wa-n pɛr sõsor haar.
Dι mɛ̃ wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na pιɛrnι sobɔr haara', sιι do thɩ̃ puu ka da war, na 'lɛ kιιlʋ.

Sι ado sɛr wɛ, omιnaakɛ Kɔ̃tιn n nanι, sι teenanɛ sa-n khιa Thãgba wire wire anι sora, gιdonι Thãgba kɔɔ phire ni caca fʋ paar dι na 'lɛ taarɛ, gι the Thu Phuurəəkɛ lea nιnι kpιι, gι the dakha ha pɛrɛraakɛ nι pɛrnι sobɔr haar.
Gɛr dɔ gιrɛ a gbarɔnι tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ sι-n mιιnι a wena nι, nι puno nι bul kha na asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii i dʋbɩ.
Gɛr gɩ gɩrɛ omɩna, nɩ fɔ gɩ ma, nɩ fɔ dɩɩrɛɛkɛ nɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ, ado na asɩ nɔ gɩ, ado na asɩ sɛbɛsɔ gɩ.
Dɔ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii thɛthɛ, na Thãgba asɩ Thɩ, kɛ kɔɔ naan sɩnɩ, kɛ kɔɔ hana sɩnɩ khorr ha faarɛ na nũ pɛ bʋɔ bɔ jɩɩrra,
n cʋʋ nɩ na-n faa haar, a cʋʋ nι dakha nι 'lɛ fãga thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛra fɛʋ na thιmιι bɔιra fɛʋ.
Gιrɛ sɛnɩ omɩna, nɩ bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba na pɛ sar Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɩmɩɩ n puno gɩ ca ga-n kpaar ga-n 'lɛ cʋʋr, mɔ̃kɛ gɩ hanɩ gɩrɛ anɩ pa;
gɩ do nɔɔ dakha Thãgba n taa sɩ gõgolõdarara na tɩɩ puusɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ, gɩdonɩ ga do tɩbɩla fɛʋ hana ha pɛra'.
Sɩ sobɔdaar Kɔ̃tɩn do, ɔr gɩɩkɛ na cʋɛ nɩnɩ dɩ na tɩ kɩbɩ, a na bɛr nɛr dakha puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarra.
Dɩrakɛ sɩ hana narɛ ha pɛrɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ Kɔ̃tɩnna, dɩ gɩrɛ sɩ kɔɔ so narnɩ nɩ-n cʋʋrɛ, dɩ thalera na cʋʋrakɛ na-n jalna.
Kɔ̃tɩn n thɔɔ anɩ ha a na pɛ naʋraakɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaada na Kirisitii ha fʋra.
Asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii i sι gba dι sa-n kpãkpaana nar omιna, dι na hʋnɔ kha na omine wo omineekɛ dɔnι khãkhal, kɛ na-n ιrɛnι mɔ̃kɛ dιιrɛɛkɛ nι kɔɔ 'lɛnι asι pa hana'.
Nɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ jιrɛ anιbara mɔ̃kɛ gι teenanι nι phɛla sι, gιdonι ɔbɔɔkɛ sι kɔɔ hanι anι pa sa do khãkhala ga.
Sa kɔɔ kho tibili dιko sι sa lιmaa ga, sι dιtιnɛ na dιwιlʋ sι-n kɔɔ do thɔ̃ khena na vɔɔrɛ dι sa do heendaa tibil bιɛllalakɛ anι pa ga.
Sɩ ga do hʋɛ sa kɔɔ hana gaaga, sɩ thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ sɩ ƴaal sɩ do nar na-n phɛl sɩ.
Gɩdonɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ hanɩ anɩ pa sɩ-n kɔɔ kpãkpãa narɛ ayɩ: Tibilikɛ n bɔnɩ thɔ̃ dʋʋr aa hana hʋɛ na kho dɩkor dakha ga.
Sɩ sɩ nɩɛrɛ dɩ ɩkhasɔ har anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn a do khãkhala, wa-n do thɔma ga, sɩ dɩ wa-n hɩɩn gɩrɛ na ba wɩna'.
Ado wa tibil casɔɔle wɛ, sɩ gba Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩnɩ i a na kpãkpaana wɩ a tɔna wɩ na pɩɛr wa-n dɔ awɩ thɔ̃ mʋmʋr, a yɛ awɩ nyɛ̃kɩɛr thɩ̃ɩkɛ na-n haanɛ wɩnɩ.
Sɩ ado nɛr wɛ omɩna, na-n vɔɔ bɔ cʋʋrɛra ga.
Sɩ ado tibil na-n nɩ thɩmɩaakɛ sɩ kherenɩ sɛbɛraakɛ nũə', nɩ dʋɔraa bʋrɛ, na-n bɔ kha na tibil ca ola', gɩ do nɔɔ yicuru n fʋʋ.
Sɩ na-n hɩɩnʋʋ lãlaar hɩɩnʋa', sɩ na-n dɩrɛɛ omi dɩɩrɛ.
Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ ha ɩɩ n thernɩ, ɔɔ thɛthɛ na-n ha nɩ ha ɩɩ bɔɔ fɛʋ, thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra. Kɔ̃tɩn na-n hana kha na nɛrɛ fɛʋ.
Mɛr Pol khera fʋɔrɛɛkɛ na ɩ̃ nyɛ̃. Gɛr dɔ jɩɩn ɩ̃ sɛbɛsɔra fɛʋ, thale dɔ ɩ̃ khere.
Asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na-n jɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Polɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔn, dɩɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ Thãgbaakɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Taadaar pɛrnɩ gɩ hana, na Jeju Kirisitiikɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ sɩ-n pɛnɩ nũu,
thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha Timotheekɛ dɔ marnι bikuun na sobɔr ha pɛdaara: Thãgba Thιrɛ, na asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na-n jɛ fɩ bʋɔra, a na-n dɔna fɩ dakha bʋɔ, a na-n hana fɩ dakha ha ɩɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ-n gbanɩ hʋɛ ɩ̃ jal Masedʋan, mɩ kɔɔ so farɛ fɩ tɔɔ Efɛjɩ a vara kĩkĩ tibil ɩkhasɔra wa-n dɩɩr sõso dɩɩra'.
Wa-n bo na pɛ dakha kpuro nɩɛsɔ nũə', na thɩ kɔ̃ jɔfʋsɔa', kɛ ga thɩmɩɩ na-n hananɩ khu paara ga, sɩɩ do kɩla gɩ-n ɩɩr, sɩ ga-n ka cʋʋ gɩrɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ ga-n cʋɛa', gɩdonɩ ha pɛrɛra gele n cʋʋ.
Gɩrɛ Thãgbaa so 'laa n ƴaalnɩ ga-n cʋɛ dʋɔn gɩ dɔ naʋ a na thɛ ha phuurə, na kpɩɛrnɔraakɛ 'leanɩ dɩ paar, na ha pɛrɛraakɛ na hananɩ fɩɩla'.
Ɩkhasɔ kɔɔ dɩrɛ hʋɛra, a lɛ̃, a lõ mɔlɔ thɩ̃ banaana;
sɩ wɩ-n ƴaalɛ ɩnɩ-n dɔ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdara, sɩrakɛ gɩrɛ wɩ-n sonɩ wa-n jɩ ga kɩra', dɩ thɩmɩɩ nɔ ʋrɛ wɩ-n bonɩ wa-n ɩɩrɔ, wa jɩ ɔɔ kɩr dakha ga.
Sɩ sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ jɔfʋ bɔrɛ a fɩ jɩ mɔ̃ na mɔ̃ gɩ teenanɩ fɩ cʋɛnaa,

a fɩ jɩ dɩɩ do ga do tɩɩ sarʋra jɔfʋ kɔɔ pɛra', sι jɔfʋ 'leedarara wɛ, na nũ nʋʋrdarara, na wɩrɛraakɛ na-n therananɩ Thãgba ga, na sopugodarara, na Thãgba fʋɔr bodarara, na Thãgba so ƴɔ̃ƴɔ̃ɔdarara, na thɩ kʋdarara, na nɩ kʋdarara, na tɩɩ kʋdarara,
na bɔdɛl cʋʋdarara, na konanaakɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ kuun khɛr khaa, na khɛraraakɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ khɛr kũu khaa, na tɩɩ dolõdarara, na sõsodarara, na sõso ʋlfɛdarara, na gɩrɛ fɛʋraakɛ n varanɩ dɩɩr bɔ.
Dɩɩrɛɛlera tutugo bʋɔraakɛ Thãgba pɛ marnɩ dɩ ma mɩɩ, le gɩ the; dɩ tutugo bʋɔ gɩɩkɛ n nɛnanɩ mɔ̃ Thãgbaakɛ hɩnanɩ i dʋbɩrɛ a hɩna bɔnanɛ hanɩ.
Mɩ-n khɩɩrɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ hana mɩnɩ fãga, kɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisiti asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃, na gιrɛraakɛ a we mɩnɩ sobɔ tibil a gba mɩ pɛ thɔmana,
mɛrkɛ mamara kɔɔ dɔnɩ ɔɔ i kʋɛdaar, na kpõkpoodaar, na nĩkhi khedaar, sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ jɩ mɛr bʋɔra, gɩdonɩ yʋ 'leerera na ha pɛ 'leerera mι kɔɔ cʋʋ gelela.
Asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ nɩna mɛr ɔɔ bɔ jɩ dɩɩ thʋ̃ kãasɩ, a hanana mɩ ha pɛrɛ na naʋʋkɛ thɛnɩ Jeju Kirisitira.
Sobɔr thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ do a teena tuur koo, gɛr dʋɔn Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ ɩnɛ kɛ thɩɩra a taa sopugodara, kɛ mɛrɛ donɩ cacadaar.
Sɩ Thãgba kɔɔ jɩ mɛr bʋɔra, gɩ do mɛr dɔ cacadaarɩkɛ Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ nɩrɔnɩ ɔɔ ha fʋ koo, ɩ̃ do thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ wɩrɛraakɛ na pɩɛnɩ haar a na 'lɛ yire khorr.
Ʋrɛ dɔnι bɔɔ khorr fãgadaar, kɛ na dɔnι dakhinənə', aa do wo dayιnana', kɛ dɔnι Thãgba bιɛl dιbara 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ, ɔr teana a hιna cʋrɛ na i dʋbιrɛ bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Mι gbaar sorɩkɛ dɩ ma-n ha fɛr Timothe ɩ̃ bikuun, mɔ̃kɛ Thãgbaa bobonaa thɩmɩɩkɛ telene fɩnɩ kɔɔ maanɩ sor, gba gɩ a na kɛ̃kɛrɛna kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ bʋɔ,
a jɩɛ hanana ha pɛrɛ na kpɩɛrnɔɔkɛ na heene fɩnɩ sora'; ga kpɩɛrnɔ caalera ɩkhasɔ kɔɔ dʋna gɛr a faa a kʋɛ awɩ ha pɛ;
Imene na Alesãdɩɩr kɔɔ harrɛ, dɩ mɩ kɔɔ faa wɛr a ha Satã gɩ dɩɩr wɩ fɩlɛ wɩ faa Thãgbaa i kʋɛrɛ.
Dɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ caca thɩ̃ɛ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ dʋɔn, phʋʋrɛ, na bɩɛlɛ, na ƴɛɛrɛ, na Thãgba khɩɩrɛ, sa-n pɛ tɩbɩlala fɛʋ.
Sɩ bɩɛlnɛ a na pɛ fãgadarara fɛʋ na wɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩnasɔ, dɩ mɛ̃ sa too dɩɩra cɔcɔcɔ na ha ɩɩ, sɩ hana Thãgba fɩlɛ na fɩl bʋɔ;
thale bʋɔnɔ, gɛr n da dakha Thãgbaraakɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Taadaar,
kɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ n 'lɛ taarɛ a jɛ gɩrɛ n dɔnɩ sobɔr.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba bɩɛl dɩbara haanle, na dakha so ƴɛɛdaar bɩɛl tɩbɩlala na Thãgba, Jeju Kirisitiikɛ dɔnɩ tibil gɩ.
Ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ faanɩ dɩbara a birse tɩbɩla fɛʋ, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ ga bɔɔlera kɔɔ danɩ gɩ har mɔna gɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Thãgba pɛ marnɩ dɩ ɩ̃ do ga mɩmɩɩ na thɔ̃thɔn, ma-n dɩɩr ca kpala ha pɛrɛ, na gɩrɛ dɔnɩ sobɔr, dɩ sobɔr mɩ-n so ga do sõsor mɩ kurə'.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ mɩ-n ƴaalɛ kona n 'laanɛ nyɛ̃ phuu ƴũ a na bιɛlna Thãgba paar fɛʋ, sι wa-n hana nĩkhiə', wa-n hana thɩ̃ banaa ga.
Mι-n ƴaalɛ dakha khɛra na-n tɔ kẽkena mɔ̃kɛ gι teenanι, na fɩl bʋɔ na fιl phuu, wa-n li yʋʋ dι yʋ lιιr gɩ, a gbana dɛ thɩ̃ɛsɔ na lẽbiisɔ na kẽkẽ the nɔ khena ka, a na cʋʋna biirə';
sɩ gɩrɛ na dɔnɩ awɩ biir cʋʋ n ka dɔ thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛ, kɛ dɔnɩ gɩrɛ teananɩ khɛraakɛ n yɛnι Thãgba cʋ khɛra ιnɩ do.
Dɔ khɛra n 'wɩɩ kɩrkɩrkɩr sɩ wa-n pɛ dɩɩrɛ nũu na dɩbara jor.
Ma-n tu khɛr n dɔ dɩɩrdaara', agɩbo a do yʋʋ kuunna ga, sɩ a teenanɛ a 'wɩa kɩrkɩrkɩr.
Gɩdonɩ Adã Thãgba kɔɔ ti ɓo sa pιιrɔ Ɛvɩ.
Sɩ ga do Adã kɔɔ telene a 'lɛ fifiləla', sι khɛr kɔɔ 'lɛ fifiləle a lõ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ kʋɛrɛra.
Sɩrakɛ Thãgba na tagʋʋrɛ mɔ̃ a donɩ bi kɔn, ado a too a hana fɩl phuu ɔɔ ha pɛra, na naʋra, na kpɩɩ leerera.
Sobɔr thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ do gɩ yɩ: Ado tibil na ɩnɩ-n dɔ we gbɛbɩdaraa hɩɩndaar thɔ̃ bʋɔ a-n ƴaal.

Dɩ gɛr gɩ we gbɛbɩdaraa hɩɩndaar teenanɛ a dɔ ʋrɛ tibil na punoni na pɛr sora' a hanana khɛ bɩɛl, a dɔ dɩbara fʋdaar, a dɔ yʋ bɔ tibil, a hanana fɩl bʋɔ, a dɔ kpakpal tee tibil, a punone a na dɩrɛ tibil thɩ̃ɛ;
a na-n do ta laardaara', a na-n do kɩl ƴaal tibilə', sɩ a dɔ bɩ̃ bɔ tibil, na ha ie ƴaal tibil, a na-n do war laardaara'.
Dɔ a do tibilikɛ n punoneni da-n ma ɔɔ cɔra, dɩ jɩɩ fʋ ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ dɩ wa-n nɩ nũu dɩ wɩ hananaa cʋʋr.
Gɩdonɩ ado tibil na puno a na ma ɔɔ cɔra ga, mɔ̃ a na fʋ sɩ na ma Thãgbaa we gbɛbɩdarara?
Sɩ wo ntɛ na-n do Thãgbadaar phaa ga, anaa a na kar ire a na ba lõ so heen ca bɩɛlla na Satã.
Sɩ a dɔ tibilikɛ hananɩ i bʋɔ wɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ ha pɛdara ga, dɩ mɛ̃ tibil na yɩɩraa so paara', a na ji dakha Satãa pherra ga.
Mɛna gɩ ha dakha na wɩrɛ dɔnɩ we gbɛbɩdaraa thɔ̃ dodara, wɩ teenanɛ wɩ dɔ tɩɩ cʋnanɛ, wa-n do khalƴιɛ yenyɔdara ga, wa-n do ta laardara ga, wa-n phʋʋn tɩbɩla na fãga bɩɩ awɩ war ƴaalla ga,
wɩ jɩɛ ma thɩ̃ gbulləəkɛ dɔnɩ ha pɛrɛɛda, a hanana kpɩɛrnɔɔkɛ 'leanɩ dɩ paar.
Wa jʋʋr wɛr ɓo na hɩɩn ado wa hana so paara' wa-n do awɩ thɔ̃.
Ɔmɛna gɩ dakha na khɛra, wɩ teenanɛ wɩ dɔ tɩɩ cʋnanɛ, wa-n do i kʋɛ tibilə', wɩ hana dɩbara fʋrɛ, wɩ dɔ sobɔ cʋʋ tɩbɩla thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
We gbɛbɩdaraa thɔ̃ dodara teenanɛ wɩ hanana khɛ bɩɛl, wɩ jɩɛ ma awɩ bɩsãsɔra na awɩ thɛthɛɛ cɔra.
Gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ n jɩɛnnɩ do awɩ thɔ̃ bɔɔbɔɔ, wɩ-n tɔr awɩ thɛthɛɛ cʋ dɩ wa-n pɛr, dɩ wɩ hananɛ dakha 'lar ha pɛrɛraakɛ wɩ hananɩ Jeju Kirisitira.
Mι khere farɛ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ sι mι pɛrɛ haar kιɛr na gbe ma pɔr afι pa.
Dι ado ma pʋɔr sι fι jι mɔ̃ tibil teenanι ɔɔ fιl n hana Thãgbaa too thɩ̃thιιn, kɛ dɔnι dakha Thãgba yidaarι we gbɛbιdara, a dona thιkarʋ ka sobɔr dɛɛnι.

Tibil na puno na bana mɔ̃ Thãgba fʋɔrɛ donι thɩ̃ hulõo a ka ga, gɛr dʋɔn: Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ gbaar tibil tomιr a debi do tιι yιnanɛ, Thu Phuu kɔɔ nιrɔrɛ dι tιι sarʋ a do; thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ kɔɔ yιιrɛ. Ɔɔda kɔɔ mιιrɛ casι tibil caarsɔra; wι kɔɔ pιɛrɛ haar thιιraakɛ, Thãgba kɔɔ khəsuure dι 'lɛ i dʋbιrɛ le ƴũ.
Thu Phuu sor casι ayι: Pιpιι bɔɔ ιkhasɔ na-n pɛr kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔɔda nũu, kɛ na cʋɛ wιnι wι buur, wι faana ha pɛrɛ gι the kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔɔ dιιrraalera.
Sõsodaraakɛ daanɔnι nʋɔ, kɛ haar dibini mɔ̃ wι-n fɔfɔrɔnι haar na the phʋɛ, na fιlɛ wι nayι,
tibil na-n he khɛr dι kuun ga; aa, wa-n sãsιnɛ dakha thɩ̃ khonanɛɛkɛ Thãgba tini, dι wιrɛ dɔnɩ ha pɛdara a jɩna sobɔr na kho na fɔfʋɔr haar.
Gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ Thãgba tini gɩ bɔrɛ, thɩ̃ bonanɛ na hala', sɩ gɩ dor gɩrɛ tibil na fʋɔrɔnɩ Thãgba sɩ a na-n tee;
gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ na Thãgba bɩɛlɛ n cʋʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩɩ phu.
Ado fɩ gba ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ a na dɩɩr omɩna, ga dor fɩ dor Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃daar bʋɔɔkɛ ha pɛ thɩmɩɩr n haannɩ na dɩɩr bʋɔ, kɛ dakha fɩ kparɔnɩ bɔɔbɔɔ.
Bɔ mama sɔɔkɛ hɔnɩ kpuro nɩɛ, sɩ na gbuoro yʋʋ Thãgba fɩlɛla.
Gɩdonɩ tomɩ gbʋ̃gbʋnyanɛ wer, dabʋɔ harrɛ gbe, sɩ Thãgba fɩl hananɛ, dabʋɔ harrɛ a thʋ̃ kãasɩ, gɩdonɩ gɩ-n ɩnanɛ nɛnɛ̃ yire na yireekɛ na ɩnanɩ ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ.
Sobɔr thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ do a teena tuur koo.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ sa-n gbũgbulõ thɔmana dɩ sa-n kɛ̃kɛrɛna gɩ, gɩdonɩ asɩ nũ pɛ Thãgba yidaarra gɩ ha, kɛ dɔnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ Taadaar, sι ha pɛdaraa Taadaar a do cacaca.
Na kpãkpaanɛ war ga thɩ̃ιkɛ a na dιrɛna wɩ.
Tibil na-n beesi lι daɓol dʋʋrra ga, sɩ ka dɔ thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ ha pɛdarara, thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛra na cʋʋ paarra, na naʋra, na ha pɛrɛra, na phurrə.
Gɩ dana bɔɔkɛ ma pɔnɩ le, gbuoro yʋʋ a na sɔ sɛbɛ, a na mɩa Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ, a na dɩrɛna tɩbɩla.
Fa-n hɛbɩ bɔ jɩ khaardaakɛ ha farnɩ, kɛ fɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ dɩɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba tukɩr tidara kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ bɔɔraakɛ we gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kɔɔ dɛ̃ɛ farnɩ nyɛ̃a'.
Na jɩɛ tɩrɔ ga thɩ̃ɩle; faa afɩbara gɛrra, dɩ mɛ̃ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na yɩ mɔ̃ fɩ-n bãbanɩ.
Na jɩɛ hɩɩn afɩbara, na afɩ dɩɩr, na yɩrana ga thɩ̃ɩle; gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ fa-n cʋʋnɩ thalera fa taarɛ afɩbara na wɩrɛɛkɛ n pɛ fɩnɩ nũu.
Fa-n phaan kũu kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ na fɩlɛɛkɛ khiinona', sɩ mɩanaa mɔ̃ a donɩ thɩrɛ; fɔ daɓola õkũu khaa,
na khɛ kɔ̃tɩna nɩ khaa, na khɛ biirə õkhɛ̃ khaa, sɩ dɔ gɩ do na fɩl phuu.
Wɩrɛ dɔnɩ khikhɛra na sobɔr, na jɩɛ hɩɩn wɩ.

Sɩ a khikhɛrʋ gι a hana bɩsana, agɩbo ɔɔ bii bɩsãsɔ gɩ, dɔ wɩ jɩ dɩ caca thɩ̃ɛ Thãgba fʋɔrɛra dʋɔn awɩ cɔdaraa hɩɩn, dɩ wa tiir dakha helu wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ haanɛ wɩnɩ, gɩdonɩ gɛr dʋɔn thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n danɩ Thãgba haar.
Sɩ ʋrɛ dɔnɩ khikhɛrʋ na sobɔr, aa hana tibil bã, Thãgba a-n pɛ nũu; dɩtɩnɔ na dɩwɩlʋ a-n yɩr da-n phʋʋr Thãgba da-n bɩɛlnaa.
Sɩ khikhɛrʋʋkɛ n faanɩ dɩbara da-n 'lɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ n daaraanɩ khaakhaar cʋʋrɛra, fɩ-n yɩɩrɛ na yire wer sɩ a khire.
Na kpãkpaanɛ war thɩ̃ɛsɔra thakɛ, dɩ mɛ̃ tibil na puno na pɛ war sora'.
Ado tibil na-n hɩɩn ɔɔ toa', dɩ ado aa-n hɩɩn ɔɔ cɔdara da-n jɔa', ha pɛrɛ a bo, a ka puurore a jɔ ʋrɛɛkɛ na dɔnɩ ha pɛdaara'.
Khikhɛrʋʋkɛ kanɩ yɛna kpalãther, ɔɔ i punone khere sɛbɛra, sɩ dɔ a do khɛrɩkɛ kɔɔ hɛnɩ kũu bɩɛl,

a dɔ khɛrɩkɛ hananɩ i bʋɔ thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛra, a dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ haanɛnɩ bɩsana, a dɔ dakha kpakpal tee khɛr, a dɔ ʋrɛ n kɔɔ tuonni da-n cʋʋ sikpulo thɔma tιι phuusɔra, na ʋrɛ n kɔɔ buloni wιrɛ n gaarɛnι, a dɔ dakha ʋrɛ n kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ thɔ̃ bɔ caar dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ.
Fa-n khere khikhɛraakɛ na tɩnanaa iə', gɩdonɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ thue n fʋ wɩnɩ gɩ-n cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wɩ hʋnɔna Kirisiti, dι wι-n ƴaalɛ ιnι-n birə hɛ kona,
dιι do wι hananɛ dιι gιrɛraakɛ wι phiini awι caca ʋlfɛɛkɛ wι kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanι Kirisiti.

Dɩ wo, wa hananɩ thɩ̃ɛ a na cʋa', wɩ-n ɩɩrɛ dɩ wa-n kpaar cɔna cɔna, sɩ gɩrɛ puuroni a jɔ dʋɔn mɔ̃ wɩ donɩ wɩrɛ n kpaarnanɩ sɔ, dɩ wa-n 'lɔɔ gɩrɛraakɛ na ba wɩna', dɩ wa-n mɩɩna thɩmɩaakɛ na teananɩ mɩɩra'.
Gɛr gɩ mɩ-n ƴaalɛ dɩ wɩrɛ na tɩnana' n birə hɛ kona, a hanana bɩsana, a jɩɛ fʋ awɩ cɔ, dɩ wa-n 'laa hʋɛ lãlaardaarra a na-n kʋɛ sɩ irə'.
Gɩdonɩ ɩkhasɔ kɔɔ 'lire kɛrrɛ gɩrɛ dɩ wa-n kpa Satana.
Ado ha pɛdaar hale, a kuun gɩ, a khɛr gɩ, a hana khikhɛra, ntɛsɔ na-n hɩnɛ wɩ, ga-n do we gbɛbɩdaraa heenda ga, dɩ mɛ̃ we gbɛbɩdara na puno na jɩɩ hɩɩn wɩrɛ jɩɛnnɩ do khikhɛra na sobɔr.
We gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔɔkɛ jɩɛnnɩ gba ƴɛ kʋʋlɛ wɩ teenanɛ cʋ dɛbɩnaa, sɩ wɩrɛ n gbũgbuloneni Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛra na tibil dɩɩrɛra, wɛr teana gɩ a jɔ.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “Nakɩɩrɩkɛ na-n sanɩ jɔ, fa-n lii nʋɔa'.” Wo: “Thɔ̃daar teenanɛ ɔɔ lɩmɩ.”
Fa-n pɛ nũu sorιkɛ wa pɛnɩ we gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩna saagado gɩrɛ tɩbɩla yenyɔ dɩ yẽther gɩ tornɩ yirəə ga.
Wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ sopugo, phaanɛ wɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ ƴɛra, ga cʋʋrɛ dakha maar dι ga fʋ wɩrɛ sɛnɩ.
Mɩ-n kpãkpãa farɛ kheu Thãgbaa ƴɛra, na Jeju Kirisitii ƴɛra, na thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔkɛ Thãgba phiirnii ƴɛra dɩ fa jɩɩ hɩɩn ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ, sɩ fa-n do tibil bo pɛrɛ na-n hale na dɩɩdɩɩ hɩɩna'.
Fa-n phana kɔrɔ a na dɛ̃ɛ tibillə nyɛ̃ɛ Thãgba thɔmana ga, dɩ fa-n do tibili sopugo n ma fa'. Jɩɛ fʋ dɩbara a 'lea dɩɩ.
Fa-n yɔ yɔ haar dɩbara bã, sɩ na 'lɛ taan gbegbe afɩ bɩ̃ khorara na afɩ tomɩraakɛra n sɛ fɩnɩ tɔ̃tɔ̃tɔ̃.
Ʋkhasɔ sopugo n yɩrrɛ sɩ dɩ kɩɩlʋ n pɩɩrɔ dɩɩ adã wɩ, sɩ ɩkhasɔɔda wer pɩpɩɩ paar gɩ-n yɩr.
Mɛna dakha thɔ̃ bʋɔ n yɩr, sɩ gɩrɛ na yɩrana' ga puno na too thale gɩ do gɩ kerra'.
Wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔnι dea teenanɛ wa-n hɩnɛ awɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ teenanɩ cʋʋr na sobɔr, dɩ mɛ̃ Thãgbaa i na kʋɛ dɩ dɩɩrɛɛkɛ sɩ-n dιιrnι ga.

Dι dee ƴιrɛ hananι kɔ̃tιna dι wι do ha pɛdara, wa-n 'lar õkũu dʋʋrra sι na beesi wa', sι wι ka na jιɛ do war thɔma gιdonι wιrɛ awɩ thɔ̃ɔle n bulni dɔ ha pɛdaraakɛ wɩ-n nanɩ. Na dɩrɛ ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ dɩ na kpãkpaanɛ gar.
Ado tibil na dɩɩr dɩɩr kpɩɩ, dɩ ado aa-n tu thɩmɩɩ bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitiida ga, na dɩɩrɛɛkɛ n jalanɩ kha na Thãgba fɩla',
ire ntɛ n ka mɔlɔ, aa jɩ thɩ̃a'; thɩ̃ bana tibil gɩ, na tɩɩ khɩɛsɩdaar, gɛr n ɩrɛna gbugi, na kɩla, na i kʋɛrɛ, na so jɩɩr na yinə,
na sɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃. Gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ har tɩbɩlalaakɛ fɩlɛ gõgolonɩ, wa-n mar dɩ wɩ jɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ sobɔr bã, dɩ wɩ-n kpɩɛrɛ Thãgba fɩl hananɛ dor lẽle thɩ̃ 'lɛ paar.
Sobɔr gɩ wer Thãgba fɩl hananɛ dor lẽle thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ tibillə ado a tu dɩ gɩrɛ ɩnɩ hananr dã nɛr mɛ̃.
Gιdonι sa kɔɔ hana thɩ̃ɛ a ιna kɛ thιɩra ga, dι a sa the sa puno a na gba thɩ̃ɛ dakha ga.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ ado sɩ hana dιkor na kẽkena, gele dã sɛr.
Sɩ wɩrɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩnɩ-n dɔ lẽledara, wɩ-n təəre ji fifiləlela, na pheruraakɛ dɔnι də̃bəəl thɩ̃ ƴaal jɔɔkɛ kpalanι ka, gɛr n hala tιbɩla dɩ wι mʋʋ kʋɛrɛra na bũburonena.
Gιdonι war naʋ dʋɔn sopugo jɔjʋɔɔ fʋ pa; dɩ ɩkhasɔɔkɛ kɔɔ ƴaalɛ gɩnɩ dɩ wa-n kpãkpaanɔ, wɩ faarɛ ha pɛrɛ sa gba dɩbara a mʋʋ ha hellela.
Sɩ fɛr Thãgbaa tibil, fe khiru pɛ ga thɩnaakɛ, sɩ na ƴaalɛ fɩl sarʋ, na Thãgba fɩlɛ, na ha pɛrɛ, na naʋ, na ha fʋrɛ, na hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ.
Na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ ha pɛ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ bʋɔ. Fɔrɔ yire khorr gɩrɛraakɛra Thãgba kɔɔ we fɩnɩ na gɩrɛraakɛ fɩ kɔɔ canɩ afι ha pɛ pasι tibil jɔjʋɔɔ ƴɛra.
Mɩ-n kpãkpãa farɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra, ʋrɛɛkɛ n 'laanɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra yire, na Jeju Kirisitii ƴɛra, ʋrɛ kɔɔ cananι ɔɔ ha pɛ pasι Pɔ̃sι Pιlatιι ƴɛra,
dι fa jιι hιιn ga soolera ga hana sι paara', tibil na yιrɔ dakha dιa', phaphapha asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti n ɩna,
kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ̃ bɔɔ na danɩ dɩ Thãgba na nɩrɔ, Thãgbaakɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ hɩnanɩ bɔnanɛ, ɔr bɩɛl dʋɔn Fãga hɩ̃daar, ɔr dʋɔn Fãgadaar kpɩɛ fãgadarara, na Kɔ̃tɩ̃ kpɩɛ kɔ̃tɩnana,
ɔr dɩbara na dɔ dakhinənə', ɔr haan dahɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ dadanana'; tibil bɩɛllakɛ na kɔɔ yɩa', dɩ tibil bɩɛllakɛ na puno na yɩa'. Ɔr teana a hɩna cʋrɛ na fãga khorr. Amɛn.

Kpãkpaanɛ nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛɛ lẽledarara wa-n ti gunə', wa-n gba awɩ nũ pɛ faa lẽle thɩɛnaakɛ na dɔ̃nɩ dapʋɔrnaa gaaga, sɩ wɩ faa Thãgbaraakɛ n 'laanɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛ̃ʋ dɩɩ dã sɩ thu, sɩ puno sɩ gba gɩ gɩ do asɩ kãkada.
Sɔ war wa-n cʋɛ bɔɔ, wɩ dɔ lẽledara thɔ̃ bɔ cnʋrɛra, wa-n 'laanɛ thɩ̃ɛ na haar, wa-n bulo tɩbɩla;
gɩ do mɛ̃ wɩ khɩɩ lẽle thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ dapʋɔrnaa a thɩɩn dɩɩ do bɔɔkɛ na ɩnanɩɩda, gɩ do yireekɛ wa 'lɛnɩ mɛ̃ gɩ jɩɩ do yi hana bɔ.
Timothe wei, jɩɛ fʋ gɩrɛ wɩ kɔɔ gbanɩ a dʋ fɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ. Golone folo folola na khaakhaar thɩmɩara, na thɩ̃ banaasɔraakɛ thɛnɩ jɩɩrraakɛ tɩbɩla n wenɩ jɩɩr sɩ ga do jɩɩr ga;
dɩ ɩkhasɔɔkɛ yɛnɩ ɩnɩ hana gɛr wɩ kɔɔ dɩrɛ hʋɛra, a lɛ̃, sa faa ha pɛrɛ. Thãgba na-n jɛ nɩ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Polɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirιsitii thɔ̃thɔn mɔ̃ Thãgba tuni dɩ ma-n mɩɩ yidaakɛ hanɩ Jeju Kirisitira, kɛ Thãgba yɩnɩ ɩna 'laarɛ,
mɛr thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha Timotheekɛ dɔ marnɩ bikuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ: Thãgba Thιrɛ, na asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na-n jɛ fι bʋɔra a na-n dɔna fι dakha bʋɔ, a na-n hana fι dakha ha ιι.
Mι-n khιɩrɛ Thãgbaakɛ mɩ-n doronɩ thɔma ɩ̃ thɩthɩsɔɔ kha na kpɩɛrnɔ phuu; bɔɔ fɛʋʋkɛ mɩ-n jɩna fɩnɩ ɩ̃ Thãgba bɩɛlla dɩtɩnɛ na dɩwɩlʋ, mɩ-n khɩɩrɛ Thãgba.
A ma jɩna afɩ yilẽbi mɩ-n ƴaalɛ ka ɩ̃ yɛ fɩ daʋ n fʋ mɩ vʋ̃ʋ.
Mɩ-n jɩnanɛ dakha afɩ ha pɛɛkɛ na hananɩ fɩɩla'; dɩ afɩ nɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ Lʋιsι na afι nι Enɩsɩ kɔɔ hana gɩ ɓo, dɩ mɩ jɩrɛ fι hana gɛr dakha.
Gɛr gι dɩ ma-n so far dι fa cʋʋ Thãgbaa khaardaakɛ fι kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ ɩ̃ nyɛ̃ dɛɛna ga-n jɩɩ le dɔ khaa.
Gɩdonɩ Thueekɛ Thãgba ha sɩnɩ na pɛ sar ha phaarɛ kpɩɩraka', sɩ fãga a na-n ha sɩ, na naʋ, na dɩbara fʋʋr.
Gɛr gɩ fa-n do yicuru na-n fʋ fɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ sobɔ so jɩ thɩmɩɩra ga, dɩ mɛrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ khaɩdaar ga, sɩ gaarɛ bʋɔ na mɛrɛ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra, gɩ the Thãgbaa fãgara.
Ɔr gɩɩkɛ kɔɔ taa sɩnɩ a we sɩ sɩ pho, sɩ ga do asɩ thɔ̃ cʋʋra gɩ tha', sɩ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ ƴaal hanɩ gɩ, na ɔɔ bɔ jɩɩkɛ a kɔɔ maanɩ thɩɩn sar kɛkɛkɛ dɩɩ do Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ yɩranɩ nɛnɛ̃ Jeju Kirisiti asɩ Taadaarɩ ɩna, kɛ kɔɔ bũburoneni khir, sa gba tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ a nɩnana yireekɛ na dɔnɩ dapɩnana', dɩɩ yɩr dɩphã.
Ga tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra Thãgba pɛ mar dɩ ɩ̃ do ga mɩmɩɩ na thɔ̃thɔn na dɩɩrdaar.
Gɛr dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ma-n gaar bʋɔ thakɛ sɩ yicuru na-n fʋ ma', gɩdonɩ mɩ jɩɛ jɩ ntɛɛkɛ mɩ pɛrnɩ haar, dɩ mι jɩrɛ tue gel dɩ a hananɛ punone a na hɩɩnna gɩrɛ a kɔɔ gbanɩ a dʋ mɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ gɩ dana ga Wiile.
Gba thɩmɩɩ bʋɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ ha fɩnɩ gɩ do far thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ fɩ jɩɩllɔ ha pɛrɛra, na naʋraakɛ sɩ hananɩ dɩɩ the asɩ bɩɛl dora na Jeju Kirisiti.
Thu Phuukɛ hanɩ asɩ bɩnɔ, jɩɛ fʋrɔ na ɔɔ fãga thɩ̃ bʋɔɔkɛ Thãgba dʋ fɩnɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Fɩ jɩrɛ dɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ Ajɩ kɔɔ faa mɛr, ɩkhasɔ wɛrra dʋɔn Fɩjɛl na Ɛrmojɛn.
Kɔ̃tɩn n jɛ Onejɩfɔɔrɩ cɔdara wer bʋɔra, gɩdonι bɔ jɔjʋɔra ɔr n kɔɔ ƴɔla mɩ haar, dɩ yicuru na kɔɔ fʋʋ ɩ̃ khaιdaar dora ga;
sι ɔbɔɔkɛ a hanι Rɔm dιιra a ka kɔɔ ƴaal mɛr jɔɔ ka sa yι mι.
Kɔ̃tιn n jιɛnɛɛ bʋɔra ga Wirəəle gι the Kɔ̃tιnι pa. Fι jιrɛ bɔɔbɔɔ mɔ̃kɛ a kɔɔ bul mini jɔɔ Efɛjι dιιra.
Sι fɛr ɩ̃ bikuun, hanana fãga gι the bɔ jιιrraakɛ hanι Jeju Kirisitii pa.
Gιrɛ fι nιɛnι dι ɩ̃ mιιna tibil jɔjʋɔɔ ƴɛra, gba hana sobɔ tιbιlaakɛ na punoneni na dιιr dakha wɩ̃ tibil.
Gaarɛ bʋɔ nakha mɛrɛ a hɔ Jeju Kirisitii sɔrasι bɔ.
Tibil na ha sɔrasι cʋʋ paar sι a bir a faa ɔɔ kpιɛr nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛɛ thιna, ado a-n ƴaalɛ a da ɔɔ sɔrasι kɔ̃tɩ̃ haara'.
Kɔlɔ̃kɔɔ can na 'li khor cacadaar dʋʋrra ado aa kɔɔ ca mɔ̃kɛ ga jɔfʋ sonaa ga.
Dɔ kokol n kɔɔ gbʋʋ yʋʋ kʋʋlɛla ɓo sɩ khar na-n kpaan.
Kpɩɛrɛ gɩrɛ mɩ sonɩ a hɩnɛ; Kɔ̃tɩn na hana fɩ kpɛsɛrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
Na jɛna Jeju Kirisitiikɛ dɔnɩ Davɩdɩɩ məl, ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ ɩrɛnɩ a the khirera mɔ̃kɛra tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ mɩ-n mɩɩnɩ sonɩ,
kɛ mɩ-n gaarɔnɩ bʋɔ gɩrɛ dɩ wɩ ba linə mi dɩ ɩ̃ ho puu cʋʋ tibil, sɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ wer na ha li paara'.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ hana yɩrrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra, wɩrɛ Thãgba phiirni n puno wɩ 'lɛ taarɛɛkɛ hanɩ Jeju Kirisitira na i dʋbɩrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ khorrdaa.
Sobɔr thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ do gɩ yɩ: “Ado sɩ kɔɔ khire kha na ɔr, sa hananɛ kha dakha yire na ɔr.
Ado sa yɩr, sa bulle kha na ɔr ɔɔ fãgadaar dora. Ado sɩ bʋʋ, oti a na bo sɩ.
Ado sa do sobɔ tibilə', sobɔ tibillə or na dorakɛ 'lo, gɩdonɩ a na puno na debi ɔɔ fɩl dɩ ga ha kpɩɩ na gɩrɛ a dona'.”
Cʋɛ tɩbɩla wɩ jɩna ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ, dɩ na kpãkpaanɛ war kheu Thãgbaa ƴɛra wa-n bana mɔlɔ thɩ̃ banaa ga, ga do thɩ̃ bʋɔ ga, kʋɛrɛ gɩ-n do wɩrɛraakɛ n pɛ gɩnɩ nũu.
Gbuoro yʋʋ na jɩlɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra mɔ̃ fɩ donɩ thɔ̃daarɩkɛ daaraanɩ haar sɩ yicuru na fʋ fa', sɩ fɩ do ʋrɛ n 'laanɛnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ dẽdẽdẽ.
Golone folo folola na khaakhaar thɩmɩara, gɩdonɩ wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ ga thɩ̃ɩle gɩ-n cʋʋ wɛr dɩ awɩ Thãgba fɩl 'lee n puuro dɩ ga-n pɛr.
Awɩ thɩmɩɩ dakha n ƴɛrrɛ nɔr khaa, mɛ̃ gɩ ha na Imene na Fɩlɛtɩ,
kɛ kɔɔ dɛnɩ hʋɛra a lɛ̃ sa faa sobɔr dɩ wa-n mɩɩ ayɩ: Khi ɩɩrɛ mãa kpãsɛrɛ; dɩ wɩ cʋʋrɛ ɩkhasɔɔ ha pɛ dɩɩ kʋɛ.
Sɩrakɛ Thãgbaa gookɛ a kpɛɛnɩ gɩ jɩɩlɛ kɩbɩ, a hana thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ dɔnɩ jɩɩn dɩɩ so ayɩ: “Kɔ̃tɩn jɩrɛ wɩrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔda.” Wo: “Tibil wo tibilikɛ yɛnɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩda ɩnɩ do, dɔ a hʋnɔna sopugo.”
Cɔ kɔ̃tɩɩna, ga-n do bʋlaakɛ wɩ cʋʋnanɩ dɛ na gɩrɛ wɩ cʋʋnanɩ dɛ bulona n haanle dɩbara ga, sɩ thɩrdaa n hale dakha na jadaa, dɩ yɛ n dor bʋla ɓʋ̃ɔ sɩ yɛ n do thɔ̃ pɔɩ cʋʋdaa.
Dɩ ado tibil fʋ dɩbara a phu ga sopugosɔraale, ɔr na dɔ bʋla ɓʋ̃ɔ, kɛ Thãgba thɩɩnnɩ kpɩɩ, dɩɩ do bɔ taa thɩ̃ɛ Kɔ̃tɩnna, a too ga too a na-n do thɔ̃ bɔ caar dɩɩdɩɩ fɛʋ.
Gɩrɛ n kɔnɩ daɓola thue, fe khiru pɛ gar, sɩ na ƴaalɛ fɩl sarʋ, na ha pɛrɛ, na naʋ, na ha ɩɩ, nakha wɩrɛɛkɛ n fʋɔrɛnɩ Kɔ̃tɩn na ha phuu.
Bɔ də̃bəəl thɩ̃ bananɛɛkɛ na hananɩ kɩrʋa', gɩdonɩ fɩ jɩrɛ gɛr n ɩrɛna kɩla.
Dɩ ga teena Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɔ̃daar na-n ɩrɛna kɩla ga, a ka teenanɛ a hanana hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ na tɩbɩla fɛʋ, a dɔ dakha tibilikɛ n punoneni da-n dɩɩr tibil thɩ̃ɛ; a dɔ ha fʋ tibil,
a hanana ha bulole mɔ̃ a-n narnɩ wɩrɛ na-n tuonni dɩɩra', a na pɛna nũu mɔ̃ ga donɩ Thãgba cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wɩ debi haar a jɩ gɩrɛ n dɔnɩ sobɔr,
gɩ cʋʋ dakha kpɩɛrɛ gɩ lõ war wɩ taa Satãa pherra, kɛ fɔ wɩnɩ ɩɩrɔ wa-n cʋɛ ɔɔ tuur.
Jɛna dɩ pɩpɩɩ wiresɔra bɔ puu na hale.
Gɩdonɩ tɩbɩla na dor dɩbara nadara, war nadara, nɔfa mɩɩdara, i yaaldara, Thãgbaa i kʋɛdara, thɛ na nɛɛ nũ nʋʋrdara, wa jɩ fɛr hɩna fʋɔra', wa dor Thãgba bodara,
wa hana pərrə', wa dor nɔ ɓaar tɩbɩla, tibil i kʋɛdara, dɩbara fʋ 'leedara, ha khedara, fɩl bɔ bodara,
tibil liirdara, wolo wolodara, i kadara, gɩrɛ n kɔnɩ tibil thuee ƴaal na har awɩ hara a na jɔ Thãgba ƴaalɛ;
sɩrakɛ wɩ hor Thãgba fʋɔrdara sɩɩ do wɩ bor ga fãgaale. Hʋnɔnɛna wa tibil casɔɔle.
Wɛ n hale awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn dɩ wɩ wolõ a lõ tɩbɩlaa cɔ a fʋlɛ khɛr surosɔɔkɛ sopugo doronɩ dɛr a ɩɩrɔ, kɛ dɔnɩ khɛ ƴɩrɛ thɩ̃ caar dɩɩdɩɩ n kʋnɩ thue ka,
kɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ wa-n dɩɩr thɩ̃ɛ wire koo, sι wa-n mar kpɩɩrakɛ a na dã a na jɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ sobɔra'.
Mɔ̃kɛ Janɛsɩ na Jãbɩrɛsɩ kɔɔ bãbaranɩ Mʋɩjɩ, mɛna wa tibil casɔɔle n bãbarã sobɔr. Tɩbɩla wɛɛkɛ awɩ kpɩɛr na telena', dɩ wa do bɔ taa tɩbɩla ha pɛdaara ga.
Dɩ wa puno na jal ƴɔɔ bã, gɩdonɩ awɩ də̃bəəl na yɩrrɛ tɩbɩlala fɛʋ mɔ̃kɛ kona yenyɔɔleeda kɔɔ yɩrnɩ.
Sɩ fe wer, fɩ kpaanɛ ɩ̃ dɩɩrra dɔdɔdɔ, na ɩ̃ cʋʋ para, na gɩrɛ mɩ jɩɩllɔnɩ, na ɩ̃ ha pɛra, na ɩ̃ ha fʋra, na ɩ̃ naʋra, na ɩ̃ yʋ gbuurə,
na ɩ̃ kpoora, na ɩ̃ bɔ gaarra. Fɩ jɩrɛ gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ kɔɔ dana mɩnɩ Ãtɩyɔsɩ, na Ɩkɔn, na Lisitiri, kpoore mɩ kɔɔ yɩ gɩmɔ̃, sɩ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ taa mɛr gelela fɛʋ.
Dɩrakɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n ƴaalɛnɩ ɩna-n ɩrɛ na Thãgba fɩlɛ awɩ bɩɛl dora na Jeju Kirisiti, wa yɩrɛ kpoore.
Sɩ tɩɩ puusɔ na tɩɩ fɩɩldara wa puurore wa-n pɛr, wa dor tɩɩ fɩɩldara wɩ dona dakha wɩrɛ n fɩlɛnɩ dɩbara.
Sɩ fɛrɛ, jɩɛ jɩɩl gɩrɛraakɛ fɩ kɔɔ dɩɩrnɩ, kɛ fɩ jɩnɩ tue dɩɩ do gɛr dɔ sobɔr, gɩdonɩ fɩ jɩrɛ dakha tibil ʋrɛ kɔɔ dɩrɛ fɩnɩ.
Dɩ a fʋna afɩ bɩsã bu bɔɔ, fɩ jɩrɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ phu, gɛr na punone na ha fɩ kpɛsɛrɛ taa 'lɛrraakɛ fa 'lɛnɩ gɩ the ha pɛrɛraakɛ fa hananɩ Jeju Kirisitira.
Thãgbaa sɛbɛɛ thɩmɩɩ fɛʋ dɔ gɩrɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbaa nɔɔ, dɩ gɩ dor dabʋɔ ka a na dɩɩr tibil thɩ̃ɛ, a na nɩna tibil dι paar, a na naar tibil, a na dιιr tibil a na pɛ dateleena,
gι do nɔɔ Thãgbaa tibil n 'li dιbara, a gbɛbι a ma thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛra fɛʋ.
Mɩ-n kpãkpãa farɛ gɩrɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra na Jeju Kirisitii ƴɛra, na mɔ̃ gɩ donɩ Kirisitira na bire na ɩ̃ a na kɩɩlna yidara na khe, saa gba ɔɔ fãga, mɩ so farɛ gɩrɛ ayɩ:
Na mɩa Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ, na yɩrana gɩ, a fɩ yɩrɛ fʋ paar a fa yɩ fʋ paara'; na nɛna tɩbɩla awɩ dɩ pa, na naarɛ wɩ, na kpãkpaanɛ war, sɩ na cʋɛ gele na ha fʋrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɩɩrdaar teenanɩ a hanana.
Gɩdonɩ bɔ bɩɛl na daan kɛ tɩbɩla na tuni dɩɩr bʋɔ bã, sɩ mɔ̃kɛ awɩ bɩ̃ n nanɩ dɩ awɩ nũ na-n hʋʋl wɩ thɩ̃ kpɩɩ nɩɩrra, wa ƴaalɛ dɩɩrdara wa-n ɓã dɩɩrdarara.
Wa kpʋʋ garɛ nũu sobɔ nɩɩrra, sɩ wa-n pɛ kpuro nɩɛsɔ nũu.
Sɩ fe wer, a gɩ ha mɔ̃ na fɔ haar, fa-n hə̃jə̃ə bɔ gaarɛra ga, dɔ thɔ̃ don tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛra, na dɔ afɩ thɔ̃ ga-n pɩ ɓibi.
Gɩdonɩ ado me wer gɩ, bɔɔ daan dɩ ɩ̃ tɔmɩ̃ na deer, ɩ̃ kɔ̃ bɔ wɔrɔnɛ dɩphã.
Mɩ kɔɔ kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ bʋɔ; mɩ car ɩ̃ kɔlɔ̃kɔɔ pɩ, mɩ fʋrɛ ha pɛrɛ kĩkĩ.

Nɛnɛ̃ dɩphã khorɩkɛ ma 'lɛnɩ cacadaar dʋʋrra n pɩɛrɛ mɩ mɛ̃, gɛr dʋɔn so hɛl khaardaakɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ n kɩlɛnɩ kɩɩl telẽe na ha mɩnɩ ga Wirəəle, sɩ ga do mɛr dɩbara a na ha ga, sɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n naannɩ ɔɔ bir ɩ̃.
Dɔ bʋɔ sa ɩna ɩ̃ pa kɔrɔ,
gɩdonɩ Demasɩ faa mɛr dɩ gɩ ther naʋraakɛ a-n nanɩ nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛɛ thɩna, Tesalonɩkɩ a jal, dɩ Kiresã jal Galasɩ, Tɩtɩ jal Dalmasɩ;
Luki dɩbara haan kha na mɛrɛ; kpa Markɩ nɩ ɩ̃ kha gɩdonɩ a do marɛ bɔ taa tibil thɔmana.
Tɩsɩkɩ wer mɛr thɔnaa Efɛjɩ.
A fa ɩ̃ gba ɩ̃ delkeba jakparaakɛ mɩ faanɩ Tʋrʋasι Karpusii pa, a gbana dakha sɛbɛsɔ, sι caca thɩ̃ɛ dʋɔn ɩ̃ lo sɛbɛ.
Phube Alesãdɩɩr kɔɔ cʋʋ mɛr puure ka; Kɔ̃tɩn na lɩmaa mɔna ɔɔ thɔna hanɩ.
Fɛrɛ dakha na jɩɛ dʋʋraa bʋrɛ dɛ, gɩdonɩ a bana mɛr waa gel ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩsɔraakɛ mɩ kɔɔ mɩɩnɩ.
Caca bɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ jɩɩlnɩ ɩ̃ hɛl ɩ̃ so, tibil bɩɛllakɛ na kɔɔ jɩɩl mara', sɩ fɛʋ kɔɔ faa mɛr. Thãgba na-n gba gele wɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ a heen wa'.
Kɔ̃tɩn dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ jɩlɛna mɩnɩ a ha mɩ fãga dɩɩ do nɔɔ dɩ ɩ̃ kɔɔ mɩɩ tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ waa dιɩ dã thu, dɩ ca kpala fɛʋ nɩɛ. Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ taa mɩ sidũ'ũ gbuokhorə.
Kɔ̃tɩnna na-n taa mɩ thɔ̃ puu caarra fɛʋ, dɩ a na fʋ marɛ na cʋʋ mɩ dɩ ma lõ ɔɔ ƴũ fãga dιra. Ɔɔ i n dʋbarɔ na jala waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Fʋɔrɛ Pirisika na Akɩlasɩ na Onejɩfɔɔrɩ cɔdara.
Erasɩtɩ wer toore Korɛ̃tɩ, sɩ gɩ-n khor Tʋrofɩm dɩ ɩ̃ sɩɩraa dɩ too Mɩle.
Bãbanɛ a dana kɛ sɩ yʋʋr n yo. Ebulusi, Pudãsɩ, Linusi, Kʋlodιa na omɩna fɛʋ wɩ fʋɔr fɛr.
Kɔ̃tɩn n hana kha na fɛrɛ. Thãgba na-n jɛ nɩ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Polιkɛ dɔnι Thãgbaa thɔ̃daar na Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔn, gι cʋʋ wιrɛ Thãgba phiirni wι 'lɛ ha pɛrɛ, wι 'lɛna dakha sobɔ jιιrιkɛ n cʋranι kha na Thãgba fιlɛ,
wa-n pɛna nũu yire khorrιkɛ Thãgbaakɛ na-n sõsonena' kɔɔ maanι ʋlfɛrɛ kɛkɛkɛ ιna 'laarɛ,
dι ɔbɔɔkɛ bɔɔkɛ a pɛrnι danι, a kɔɔ nιnanɛ ɔɔ thιmιιkɛra ɔr Thãgba asι Taadaar yιnι ma-n mιa;
mι thɔnanɛ sɛbɛɛkɛ ɩ̃ ha fɛr Tιtɩɩkɛ dɔ marnι bikuun ha pɛrɛraakɛ sι bulni kha. Thãgba Thιrɛ, na Jeju Kirisiti asι Taadaar na-n jɛ nι bʋɔra, a na-n hana nι dakha ha ιι.
Mι kɔɔ faa fɛr Kιrɛtι fι gbɛbι thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ sɛnι gɩ telẽ, dɩ fɔ mɔ̃ mɩ kɔɔ so farnɩ sa pɩɛr we gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ dɩɩdɩɩsɔra;
sɩ dɔ ntɛ n do kuunikɛ na hananɩ so paara', a hanana khɛ bɩɛl, a hanana bɩsanaakɛ dɔnɩ ha pɛdara, kɛ tɩbɩla na pɛrnɩ sor dakhaba dʋʋrra dɩ nũ nʋʋrɛra ga.

Gɩdonɩ we gbɛbɩdaarɩ hɩɩndaar teenanɛ a dɔ ʋrɛ na hananɩ so paar mɔ̃ a donɩ Thãgbaa thɩ̃ hɩɩndaara', a na-n do tibilikɛ na-n wuronəə ga, a na-n gba nĩkhii kɔrɔa', a na-n do ta laardaar na kιl ƴaal tibilə', a na-n phʋʋn tιbɩla na fãga bɩɩ ɔɔ war ƴaalla ga,
sɩ a dɔ kpakpal tee tibil, a dɔ tibilikɛ n naannɩ gɩrɛ telenenɩ, a dɔ yʋ bɔ tibil, a dɔ tɩɩ sarʋ, a hanana fɩl phuu, a dɔ dɩbara fʋdaar.
A teenanɛ a jɩɛ ma bɔɔbɔɔ sobɔ thɩmɩɩrraakɛ n thɛnɩ dɩɩrɛra, dɩ mɛ̃ a na mar a gba dɩɩr bʋɔ a na-n dɩɩr tibil, a na-n punona dakha thɩ̃ banadara.
Gɩdonɩ jɔɔ hale khʋ̃ kurdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn, kɛ na-n tuonni thɩmɩɩra', kɛ dɔnɩ mɔlɔ thɩ̃ banadara na tɩɩ fɩɩldara,
kɛ teananɩ sɩ khaanɛ wɩ nʋɔ; a wɩ lõ cɔ dɔɔra wɩ-n nyanyãa gɛr koo, wɩ-n dɩɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na teananɩ dɩɩra' wɩ puno wa-n 'lɛ yicur war.
Awɩ thɛthɛɛ bobon bɩɛl yɛrɛrakɛ sor ayɩ: “Kɩrɛtɩdara wer, sɔ̃sɔ wɩ-n kuur wire fɛʋ, hɔ̃ nʋ̃ puunə ha wɩ, khãkhalaakɛ n kɛbanɩ wɩ do.”
Dɩ sobɔrra gɩ do ger; gɛr gɩ phaanɛ wɩ dakɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ wɩ jɩɛ hana ha pɛ bʋɔ,
dɩ wa-n bo na pɛ nũu Juifisɔɔ kpuro nɩra ga, dɩ jɔfʋraakɛ tɩbɩlaakɛ faanɩ sobɔr pɛrnɩ ga.
Thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ phure wɩrɛraakɛ phonɩ, sɩ thɩ̃ bɩɛllakɛ na phu wɩrɛraakɛ bisenenə', kɛ dɔnɩ ha pɛ 'leedara ga; awɩ fɩl na awɩ kpɩɛrnɔ bisere.
Sɩ nʋɔ wer n mɩɩrɛ ɩnɩ jɩrɛ Thãgba, sɩ awɩ cʋʋ pa na-n jal kha na gιrɛ wι-n sona'. Tιι sʋ̃ɔ ha wι na nũ nʋra, wa-n puno thɩ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛ fιιʋraka'.
Sɩ ado fɛr gɩ, na dɩrɛ ga-n jal mɔ̃kɛ dɩɩr bʋɔ hanɩ.
Sɔ kũu kɔ̃tɩnana dɩ wa hana dɩbara fʋrɛ, wɩ dɔ dakha tɩɩ cʋnanɛ, a dɔna yʋ bɔ tɩbɩla, wɩ tɛ ha pɛrɛra, na naʋra, na ha fʋrɛra.
Sɔ dakha khɛ kpɛɛnana wɩ dɔ awɩ cʋʋ pa na-n nɩna gɩrɛ n dɔnɩ phur; wa-n do i kʋɛ khɛra ga, wa-n do taanɩ dea', sɩ wɩ dɔ khɛraakɛ hananɩ dɩɩr bʋɔ,
dɩ mɛ̃ wa puno a na dɩɩr khɛ bɩsana wa-n na awɩ ko, nakha awɩ bɩsãsɔ,
wɩ do dakha khɛraakɛ hanɩ hɛlɛlɛ, wɩ hanana fɩl phuu, wɩ dona dakha wɩrɛ n jɩɛnnɩ do awɩ cɔka thɔ̃, wɩ dona dakha khɛraakɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ, wɩ jo dakha awɩ kora gɩ do nɔɔ tibil na puno na kpɛ Thãgbaa soa'.
Sɔ daɓolala dakha dɩ wa fʋ dɩbara;
sɩ fɛrɛ dakha fɩ do thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛra mɔ̃ fɩ-n dɩɩrnɩ tɩbɩla na fɩl bʋɔ na cʋ hananɛ,
ga-n dɔ thɩmɩɩ bʋɔɔkɛ tibil na yɩnɩ kpɛ paara', dɩ mɛ̃ yicuru na fʋ asɩ lãlaardaar a na yɩ asɩ dapuu mɩɩ pa ga.
Sɔ deara dɩ wa jo dɩbara awɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔra, a na da war haar thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra, wa-n bana wɩ thɩ̃ banaa ga,
wa-n yu thɩ̃a', sɩ wa-n nɛna wɩ wire fɛʋ awɩ sobɔdaar do, gɩ do thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩɛna gɩ cʋʋrɛ Thãgba asɩ Taadaarɩ dɩɩr dɩ ga hana cʋrɛ.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa bɔ jɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ taa 'lɛ pa gɩ yɩrrɛ dɩphã;
gɩ-n dɩɩr sɛr dɩ sa faa thɩ̃ gõgolõ na thɩɩkɛɛ ha pɩɛr, sɩ sɩ too nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔraakɛra sɩ hana dɩbara fʋrɛ, na fɩl telẽe, na Thãgba fɩlɛ,
sa-n pɩɛrna kãka wireekɛ sa tornɩ yire gɩrɛra sɩ-n kɔɔ pɛnɩ nũu, kɛ dɔnɩ mɔ̃ asɩ Thãgba Kɔ̃tɩ̃ na Taadaar Jeju Kirisiti na-n ɩnɩ na i dʋbɩrɛ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ faanɩ ɔɔbara asɩ sora, dɩ mɛ̃ a birse si a ti si sopugosɔra fɛʋ, sa phʋɔl sɩ sɩ dɔ caarɩkɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ thɛthɛɛda, kɛ thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛ n kʋnɩ thue.
Na mɩa ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ, na kpãkpaanɛ tɩbɩlala, na nɛna wɩ awɩ dɩ pa, gɩdonɩ Kɔ̃tɩn ha fɛr hʋɛ. Fa-n do tibil na-n beesi fa'.
Na khɛ war wa-n jɔ dɩbara fãgadarasɔra na kɔ̃tmasɔra, wa-n nɛ nũu, wɩ tɔɔ thɔ̃ bʋɔ fɛʋʋ cʋʋ too,
wa-n mɩɩ thɩmɩɩ puu tibillə ga, sɩ wɩ dɔ ha ie ƴaal tɩbɩla, na bɩ̃ bɔ tɩbɩla, na hɛlɛlɛ fɩldara tɩbιlala fɛʋ.

Gιdonι sɛrɛ dakha thalera sι kɔɔ ha, sι kɔɔ dor də̃bələ, na nũ nʋra, sι kɔɔ buure, a dona dakha ha pιɛr dea thɩ̃ɛsɔraakɛ n kɔ sɩnɩ thue; sι kɔɔ hananɛ bɩ̃ puu na gbugi, dι sι kɔɔ teenanɛ laarɛ dι dakha sι-n laarɛ khasɔ.
Sι ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι asι Taadaarι ha bulo fιl na ɔɔ naʋ tιbιlala yιrnι,
gɛr a kɔɔ taa sar, sι ga do fιl sar thɔ̃ dιkha sι kɔɔ cʋa', sι ɔɔ bɔ jιra gι, mɔ̃ a cɔcɔɔ sιnι a cʋʋ sɩ dι sι kɔ̃ daphaa, kɛ dɔnι tibil pha dʋʋrιkɛ Thu Phuu cʋʋ sιnι dι sι do;
dι Jeju Kirisiti asι Taadaar dɔ nɔɔ dι sι 'lɛ Thu Phuulera dιι və̃vĩə,
gι do nɔɔ gιdonι sor hɛl sarɛ bɔ jιιrra pι, sι debi sι do wιrɛ na 'lɛnι yire khorrιkɛra sι-n pɛnι nũu.
Sobɔr thιmιιrιkɛ do, dι mι-n ƴaalɛ fι bɔ na ιa gar, dι mɛ̃ wιrɛ pιɛrnι haar Thãgbara na gbuuro yʋʋ wa-n cʋʋ thɔ̃ bʋɔ; gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ telenenι a bɔr tιbιlala dι wa cʋʋ.
Sɩ golone də̃bəəl thɩ̃ bana bananɛna, na thɩ kɔ̃ jɔfʋ thɩmɩɩrra, na kɩlasɔ, na thɩ̃ banaa jɔfʋdaara, gɩdonɩ ga do bɔ taa thɩ̃ɛ ha gela', mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ gɩ.
A fɩ kpãkpãa ʋrɛraakɛ n pɩɛrnɩ leere dɩɩ dã babɩɛl na balanyɔ dɔrɔɔm, fa-n do nɩ ha kha dɩkha bã.
Jɛna dɩ tibil ca ole kʋɛrɛ koo, sopugo a-n cʋʋ da-n heen sor dɩbara.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ ma thɔ̃ farnɩ Artemasɩ agɩbo Tɩsɩkɩ bãbanɛ sa caanɛ mɩ Nɩkopolɩsɩ, gɩdonɩ mɩ kpɩɛrɛ sa yɩ le ma too yʋʋrɔ.
Gʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔnɩ Jenasɩ jɔfʋ dɩɩrdaar na Apolɔsɩɩ kpaarda a pɛ wɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ thɩ̃ɛ na ɓɔr wa'.
Dɔ asɩ too dakha n dɩɩr wa-n do thɔ̃ bʋɔ wɩ puno wa-n bul wɩrɛ gɩ-n ɓɔrnɩ ɓɔr bʋɔ, wa-n too gɩ do ga do bɔ taa tɩbɩla ha waa ga.
Wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ kha na mɛrɛ wɩ fʋɔr fɛr. Fʋɔrɛ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ n naan sɩnɩ, kɛ sɩ donanɩ kha ha pɛdara. Thãgba na-n jɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bʋɔra.
Mɛr Polιkɛ dɔnι khaιdaar Jeju Kirisitii sora, na asι omi Timothe, thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha fɛr Filemɔ̃ɔkɛ sι-n nanι, kɛ sι-n donanι kha thɔma,
a hana dakha asι õkhɛr Afιa na Arsιpιιkɛ sι-n kɛ̃kɛrɛnanι kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ bιɛl, na we gbɛbιdaraakɛ n gbɛbanι kha afι cɔ.
Thãgba asι Thι na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tιn na-n jɛ nι bʋɔra a na hana nι dakha ha ιι.
Wire fɛʋ mι-n khιι ɩ̃ Thãgba dι ma-n bιɛlna dι ma-n pɛ far,
gιdonι mι nιɛrɛ mɔ̃ afι naʋʋkɛ fι hananɩ Jeju Kɔ̃tɩnna na tɩɩ phuusɔra fɛʋ hanɩ, na mɔ̃ afɩ ha pɛ hanɩ.
Mɩ-n bɩɛlɛ Thãgba dɩ afɩ ha pɛ hana n dɔ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hananɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ gι do Kirisitiida dɔ nɔɔ, gι cʋʋ tιbιla wa-n yι sar thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋ caar dɩɩdɩɩ.
Daʋ fʋ mɛr jɔɔ ka dɩ afɩ naʋ dor nɔɔ dɩ ɩ̃ faa haar; gɩdonɩ fɛr dɔ nɔɔ, ɩ̃ omi, dɩ mãthɩ̃ɩ na-n the tɩɩ phuusɔɔ nɔɔ.
Kirisiti ha mɛr hʋɛ gbobi dɩ ma puno na so far nayɩ: Fɩ teenanɛ;
sɩ naʋ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ ma-n phʋʋr fɩ, mɛr Polɩkɛ dɔnɩ kũu kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, a dona dakha nɛnɛ̃ khaɩdaar Jeju Kirisitii sora.
Mɩ-n phʋʋr fɛr ɩ̃ bɩsã Onejɩmɩdara, kɛ debanɩ a do ɩ̃ bikuun bɔɔraakɛ mɩ hanɩ khaɩra,
kɛ mamara na kɔɔ dɔ farnɩ bɔ taa tibilə', sɩ nɛnɛ̃ bɔ taa tibil a do, sɩ ga do fɛrɛra dɩbara ga, sɩ na mɛrɛra dakha.
Mɩ bire thɔnaa ma-n ha fɩ sɩ ɩ̃ yi bi a do.
Mɩ kɔɔ ƴaalɛla dɩ na toona mɩ a na-n do mɩ thɔmaakɛ fa kɔɔ do mɩnɩ bɔɔraakɛ mɩ hanɩ khaɩra tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩra.
Sɩ ma ƴaal ɩ̃ cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ sɩ ga do fɛr hana mɩ hʋɛa ga, dɩ mɛ̃ ga-n do afɩ bɔ cʋʋ dor fɛrɛ pɛra', sɩ gɩ do afɩ ƴaalla gɩ the.
Anaa gɛr a kɔɔ faa far bɔɔ gbe, sɩ fɩ bir fɩ 'lɩɛ waa khorr;
sɩ ga do dee khaa bã, sɩ a ba dee, omineekɛ fa-n nanɩ a na do. Mɩ naarɛ ka, sɩ fɛr na naanɛɛnakɛ na ka na jɔ, mɔna a donɩ dee na Kɔ̃tɩnɩda.
Dɩ gɛr gɩ ado fɩ-n hɩɩn mɛr dɩ ɩ̃ do afɩ kuun, teaa mɔ̃ fa tee mɩnɩ.
Dɩ ado a cʋʋ fɛr puu dɔɔ mɔnakɛ, dɩ a helu gɩ dɩ hana fɩ, dɔ gɩ ha ɩ̃ yʋɔ.
Mɛr Pol khera gɩrɛ na ɩ̃ thɛthɛɛ nyɛ̃ ayɩ: Mɛr na lɩma fɛʋ. Sɩ ma so far nayɩ, yireekɛ fɩ hananɩ helu gɩ dι fι hana ma'.
Mɛ̃ gι ɩ̃ omi, cʋɛ mι bɔ ca ʋrɛ gι do Kɔ̃tιn dɔ nɔɔ; cʋɛ mãthɩ̃ι n the mι nɔɔ Kirisitiida dʋʋrra.
Mɔ̃ mι jιnι dι fa pɛ mɛr nũu mι khere farɛ sɛbɛɛkɛ, mι jιrɛrakɛ dι fa cʋʋrɛ dι ga jɔ gιrɛɛkɛ mι sonι.
Sι wo, gbɛbιrɛ mar cɔ paar gιdonι mι pɛrɛ haar anι Thãgba bιɛlla na dor nɔɔ dι wa faa mι.
Epafιrasιιkɛ sι hananι kha khaιra dιι do Jeju Kirisitiida dɔ nɔɔ, a fʋɔr fɛr.
Wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ sι-n donanι kha thɔma, Markι na Arιsιtarkι na Demasι na Luki, wι fʋɔr fɛr dakha.
Asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na-n jɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bʋɔra.
Mamara Thãgbaa bobonaa nɔ Thãgba kɔɔ gba bɔɔ dɩɩdɩɩra na thɩmɩɩ ƴιɛ dɩɩdɩɩ a mɩɩna asɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ,
sɩ pɩpɩɩ bɔɔraakɛ Bikuun a gba a mɩɩna sɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ a pɛrnɩ dɩ do thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋ hɩ̃hɩ̃, ɔrra dakha a gba a tinə thɩɩ na ƴũ.

Ɔɔ pa Thãgbaa i dʋbɩɩkɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ n yɩr; ɔɔ pa tibil na yɩ gbelẽ gbelẽ mɔ̃ Thãgba dʋʋr hanι; ɔɔ nɔ thιmιιkɛ hananι fãga ka a fʋna thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dιι jιιl. Ɔr kɔɔ cʋɛ sopugo hɛl thɔma sa too gιrɛ Thãgba dawabʋʋ nyɔ̃bɔra le ƴũ pər.
Mɛ̃ Bikuun kɔ̃tɩ̃ a jɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ fĩi, mɔ̃ a 'lɛnι ireekɛ kɔ̃tιnanι dιι jɔ awιda.
Gιdonι ʋmɔ̃ɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu Thãgba kɔɔ sor ayι: “Fɛr dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuun, mɛr Thãgba kɔna fɩ nĩ gɩrɛ.” Wo: “Ma dʋʋraarɛ Thɩrɛ a do mar Bikuun.”
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a birni thɔ̃ ɔɔ caca Bikuun thɩɩraakɛ a sor ayɩ: “Dɔ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ fɛʋ n gburõku wa-n fʋɔrʋʋ.”
Sι thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔdara wer a sor ayι: “A-n cʋʋrɛ ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ dι wι do jɩɛ, dɩ cʋʋ dakha ɔɔ thɔ̃dara dι wι do dɔlιnanɛ.”
Sι Bikuunida wer a sor ayι: “Afι fãga too pa ya Thãgba, khorrdaa gɩ waa vʋ̃ʋ. Afɩ fãgadaar do, fɩl sar fãgadaar dʋʋr gɩ.
Fɩ nar fɩl sarʋ sa laar fιl gõgolõ, gɛr gι Thãgbaakɛ dɔnι afι Thãgba phiir fi, mɔ̃ a bʋl fιnι niin, kɛ dɔnι da niin, dι fι jɔr gιrɛ afι kuunsɔ fɛʋ.”
Wo: “Fɛr Kɔ̃tɩn, kɛkɛkɛra fɛr kɔɔ te thɩɩ, dɩ thãgbara ƴũ dɔ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ fɩ cʋʋnɩ na afɩ nyɛ̃.
Gelesɔ ga kʋɛrɛ, sɩ fe wer fɩ toonɩ fɩ toore, ga tɩnɛsɔ fɛʋ kẽkẽ khaa.
Fa pur gersɔ kʋla kʋla dɛbɛ khaa, dɩ ga debire kẽkẽ khaa. Sɩ fe wer ɔmɛna fer toorakɛ a ha, afɩ yɛ na hana ga pɩra'.”
Dɩ ʋmɔ̃ɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu Thãgba kɔɔ sor ayɩ: “Tɔɔ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra phaphapha ɩ̃ cʋʋ afι lãlaardara wι do afι nɛ jəəda.”
Ga do thuesɔ wι do fɛʋ a ha Thãgbaa thɔna, dι thɔ̃ wι wa-n bulo wιrɛ teananι wι 'lɛ taaraa?
Gɛr dɔ kιrʋ gι teenanɛ sa-n bãbanɛ a jιɛ mar yʋʋ gιrɛraakɛ sι kɔɔ nιɛnι, a ga ha mã', sa tɔr na khokhιa gar.
Gιdonι ado thιmιιrιkɛ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ kɔɔ mιιnι gι kɔɔ nιnanɛ dι sobɔr gι do, dι ado jɔfʋ kʋɛrɛ fɛʋ na nũ nʋʋrɛ fɛʋ kɔɔ 'lɛr sor dιι tee kha,
sɛrɛ mɔ̃ sa fuu ado sa-n pər taarɛraakɛ kɔ̃tιnanι thaka? Kɛ dɔnι gιrɛ Kɔ̃tιn kɔɔ ιιrnanι a mιι, dι wιrɛ kɔɔ nιɛnɛnι bir gba a mιι sι dι sobɔr gι do.
Thãgba kɔɔ gbaar jιιnsɔ, na ma kʋ thɩ̃ɛsɔ, na nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ɛsɔ dιιdιι, na Thu Phuu khaardasɔɔkɛ a-n tιnɛnι mɔ̃ a-n ƴaalnι, a gba gɛr a nιnana dι gιrɛra wι-n mιιnι sobɔr gι.
Gιdonι ga do thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔra Thãgba kɔɔ jo thιιkɛ na ιnanι, kɛ sι-n mιιnι gιra'.
Mee ʋkha ka kɔɔ mιιrɛ dιkhãa pa Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ga thιmιι ayι: “Anye tibil do dι fι jιnaa dι tibil bιsaan gι dι fa hιιn?
Fι kɔɔ wuruure bɔɔ gbe dι 'lũ a jɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ. Fι kɔɔ haarɛ i dʋbιrɛ na cʋrɛ.
Fι cʋʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩɩ jʋʋraa dɩ jəəro nɛɛ.” Gɩdonɩ mɔ̃ Thãgbara cʋʋnι thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dιι jʋʋraa, thɩ̃ɛ na hale kpιιrakɛ sιι do ga jʋʋraa gaaga. Sιrakɛ sa yιɛ nɛnɛ̃ pι mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra jʋʋraana'.

Sι Jeju sι yι, kɛ dɔnι ʋrɛɛkɛra Thãgba kɔɔ wurni bɔɔ gbe dι 'lũ a jɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ, dι mɛ̃ a na puno na khi tιbιla fɛʋʋ sora, gɩ do Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ dɔ nɔɔ, sɩ nɛnɛ̃ sɩ yɩɩrɛ mɔ̃ a 'lɛnɩ i dʋbɩrɛ na cʋrɛ, dɩɩ do khirikɛra a kɔɔ khini dɔ nɔɔ.

Mɔ̃ Thãgba na fʋnɩ sɩɩ do a cʋʋrɛ bikona jɔɔ dɩ wɩ 'lɛ i dʋbɩrɛ, gɛr gɩ dɩɩ tee kha dɩ ɔrkɛra tenɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ, kɛ fɔnɩ dakha thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dɩɩ jɩɩl, kɔɔ gba bɔ gaarɛ a leena khal khaa ʋrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ wa 'lɛrɔnɩ taarɛ.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n cʋɛnɩ tibil dɩ phu, na wɩrɛɛkɛ phonɩ, Thɩ bɩɛlla wɩ the fɛʋ, gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ yicuru na-n fʋ Jeju mɔ̃ a na we wɩnɩ õkona ga.
Dɩ gɩ har mɔna a sonɩ ayɩ: “Ma-n mɩɩrɛ ɩ̃ õkuunsɔ afɩda, ma-n khɩɩ fɛr kpa jɛdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn.”
Wo: “Mɛrɛ ma faarɛ ɩ̃ ha a na ha Thãgba.” Wo: “Mɛr ha ʋ na bɩsanaakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ha mɩnɩ.”
Gɛr gɩ gɩrɛ gɩdonɩ tɔmɩn na tomɩr bɩsana n hana, mɛ̃ Jeju kɔɔ hana gɩ dakha a puno a khi gɩ kʋkʋʋl ʋrɛ hιnanι fãgaakɛ dɔnι khidaa, ɔr dɔ Satã;
dι mɛ̃ Jejura na-n taa wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ khir n kʋnι maar dιι do dee paar gι pɛ wι awι yi hanana fɛʋ.
Gιdonι sobɔr gι, ga do thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ dɔ wιrɛ a na-n bulnə', sι gι kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “Abιrahamι məlsɔ dɔ wιrɛ a na-n bulni.”
Gɛr dɔ kιrʋ dιι tee kha dι kɔɔ debi a ho ɔɔ õkuunsɔ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra, dι mɛ̃ a do gbõdaarιkɛ na-n jιɛnnι tibil bʋɔra, kɛ dɔnι sobɔdaar Thãgbaa thɔna, a na-n do sopugo hɛl thɔma tιbιlala.
Gιdonι mɔ̃kɛ a kɔɔ yιnι gaarɛ fifiləlela fɛʋʋkɛ a kɔɔ yɩnɩ, a hananɛ punone a na-n bulnə wιrɛ n yɛnι fifiləle.
Gɛr gι, omi phuusɔ, nɛrɛɛkɛ dakha Thãgba wenι, na-n hιnɛ Jejuukɛ a thɔnι dι do gbõdaar asι ha pɛdara,
kɛ dɔnι sobɔ cʋʋ tibil Thãgbaraakɛ kɔɔ pιɛraanι mɔ̃kɛ Mʋιjι dakha kɔɔ donι sobɔ cʋʋ tibil Thãgbaa cɔra fɛʋ.
Gιdonι gι teenaanɛ mɔ̃ a 'lɛnι i dʋbιrɛ a jɔ Mʋιjι mɔ̃kɛ cɔ mι n 'lɛnι ire dι jɔ cʋɔr thɛthɛ.
Cʋɔr wo cʋɔr sι mιmι n hale, dι ʋrɛ mɛnι thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ Thãgba gι.
Sι Mʋιjι wer mɔ̃ a donι thɔ̃ don, a dor sobɔ cʋʋ tibil Thãgbaa cɔra fɛʋ, gι do gιrɛ n nɛnanι gιrɛ teananι gι mιa.
Mɛ̃ Kirisiti ha dakha ɔɔ cɔ, sι Bikuun or do; dι ɔɔ cɔra sɛr gι, ado sι jιɛ fʋrɔ tu jιιrιkɛ sι hananι dιι ma, na nũ pɛrɛɛkɛ sι-n kãkarɔnι.
Gɛr gι, gι har mɔ̃kɛ Thu Phuu sonι ayι: “Nĩ, ado nι nιɛ ɔɔ wi,
na-n do anɩda n khɩɩr mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kɔɔ hanɩ bɔɔraakɛ nɩ kɔɔ ɩɩrnanaanɩ cɩ̃cɩmanɛ, na bɔɔraalera nɩ kɔɔ fifiləəni bəənnə a hɩɩna'.
Liir anɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ kɔɔ fifilə mi a hɩɩn, wɩ kɔɔ jʋʋr mer a hɩɩn, sɩ wɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ mɔ̃ ɩ̃ thɔ̃ hanɩ a cʋʋna yɛna kpalanyɔ.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ nĩkhii kɔɔ fʋ mɩ wa bɔɔ tibil casɔraale, dɩ ɩ̃ so ayɩ: Kpɩɛrɛ lɛ̃ wɛr waa khorr; wa kɔɔ jɩ ɩ̃ hʋa'.
Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ kɔɔ ʋlfɛ mɔ̃ nĩkhii fʋ mɩnɩ ayɩ: Wa lõ ĩ hɩɩrra kpɩɩraka'.”
Omɩna, na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn dɩ tibil anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn na-n hana ha puukɛ dɔnɩ so bo haar, a ba kɛr a bir sa faa Thãgba yidaara'.
Sɩ na-n kpãkpaanɛ kha bɩɛlbɩɛl wire wire, mɔ̃ na punoni na so nayɩ: “Nĩkɛ”, gɩ do mɛ̃ tibil na ha anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn sopugo n fɩɩlʋʋ ɔɔda n khɩɩra'.
Gɩdonɩ sɩ debire a do wɩrɛ hɩnanɩ kha na Kirisiti gɩrɛ a hananɩ, ado sɩ jɩɛ fʋ kĩkĩ a dana khu paar tu jɩɩrɩkɛ sɩ kɔɔ hananɩ caca fʋ paar,
mɔ̃kɛra gɩ kherenɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Nĩ, ado nɩ nɩɛ ɔɔ wi, na-n do anɩda n khɩɩr mɔ̃kɛ gɩ kɔɔ hanɩ bɔɔraakɛ nɩ kɔɔ ɩɩrnanaanɩ cɩ̃cɩmana'.”
Gɩdonɩ ana dɔ wɩrɛɛkɛra kɔɔ nɩɛnɛnɩ sa ɩɩrnanaa cɩ̃cɩmanɛ? Ga do wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛra Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ kpanɩ dɩ wɩ the Ejipiti dɩɩra gaa?
Dɩ anara nĩkhii kɔɔ fʋ Thãgba yɛna kpalanyɔ saagado wɩrɛ kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ sopugo a thii le bəənnə ga?
Dɩ anara a kɔɔ ʋlfɛ ayɩ, wa lõ ɩnɩ hɩɩrra ga, ga do wɩrɛ kɔɔ nʋrɛnɩ nũu gaa?
Mɛ̃ sɩ yɩɛ dɩ wa kɔɔ puno a lõa' gɩdonɩ wɩ 'leere ha pɛrɛ.
Nɛnɛ̃ gɩrɛ, ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛna sɩnɩ sɩ lona ɩnɩ hɩɩrra, gɩ hale 'lo, gɛr gɩ dɔ maar na-n fʋ sɩ tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛra na-n 'lee ga hɩɩrɩla'.
Gɩdonɩ wɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ sɛr tutugo bʋɔɔ thɩmɩɩ mɔ̃kɛ wɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ wɩnɩ, sɩ thɩmɩɩrɩlera wɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ ga kɔɔ cʋʋ wɩ thɩ̃a', gɩdonɩ ga kɔɔ caanna ha pɛrɛ wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ nɩɛnɛna'.

Sɩ ado sɛrkɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar gɩ, sɩ lʋʋn ɔɔ hɩɩrra, mɔ̃kɛra a sonɩ ayɩ: “Gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ kɔɔ ʋlfɛ mɔ̃ nĩkhii fʋ mɩnɩ ayɩ: Wa lõ ɩ̃ hɩɩrra kpɩɩraka'.” Sιι dorakɛ a fʋna bɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ tini thιι ɔɔ thɔ̃ kɔɔ mãa pιrɛ.
Gιdonι gι mιιrɛ pa bιɛl ɔɔ sɛbɛra wire makonyɔɔda ayι: “Wire makonyɔra Thãgba kɔɔ hιιr ɔɔ thɔnaakɛra fɛʋ a kɔɔ cʋʋnι.”
Dι a bire so ga thιmιιra ayι: “Wa lõ ɩ̃ hιιrra kpιιraka'.”
Hʋɛ phιnɛ dιphã casι ιkhasɔra dι wa puno na lõ ga hιιrraale, dι gιdonι wιrɛ kɔɔ dɔnι cacadaraakɛ kɔɔ nιɛnɛnι tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι, nũ nʋʋrɛ kɔɔ dor nɔɔ dι wa lõa',
Thãgba bire gιrɛ dιphã a pɛr wi kpιι wo, kɛ ɔɔ i n donι “Nĩkɛ”, dι gι ιnι na pʋɔr a cʋʋrɛ Davɩdɩ dɩ mɩɩ ga thɩmɩɩkɛ kɔɔ sɔnɩ ayɩ: “Nĩ, ado nɩ nɩɛ ɔɔ wi, na-n do anɩda n khɩɩra'.”
Gɩdonɩ ado Jojue kɔɔ ha wɛr hɩɩrɛ, gele pɩrɔnɩ Thãgba na bir na mɩɩ wi kpɩɩda bã.
Sɩ hɩɩrɛ hale wire makonyɔ wire Thãgba thɩɩnnɩ ɔɔ toora.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛ lonanɩ Thãgbaa hɩɩrra, a-n hɩɩrɛ dakha ɔɔ thɔna mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba hɩɩrnɩ ɔɔdara.
Gɛr gɩ sɩ yɩra a lona hɩɩrɛraale, dɩ tibil bɩɛl na-n lõ ga nũ nʋʋr caraale a 'lea'.

Gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa so hananɛ yire, gɩ-n cʋʋrɛ dakha thɩ̃ɛ, gɩ-n kher a jɔ bajɩna wo bajɩnaakɛ n khɛnɩ ƴɩɛ yenyɔ, gɩ-n gɔr phaphapha dɩɩ tɩnɛ haar na thue, dɩɩ tɩnɛ ƴɔɔ pa na khuu niin, gɩ-n pəlle tibili bɩ̃ na ɔɔ ha kpɩɛr.
Thɩ̃ bɩɛl na hale a ker dɩ aa yɩ gaaga, sɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ toore gbelẽ gbelẽ a yɩr casɩ ɔɔ ƴɛra, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ sa mɩɩrɔnɩ asɩda.
Mɛ̃ gɩ gɩdonɩ sɩ hananɛ gbõdaar kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛlɩkɛ kɔɔ kpãsɛnɛnɩ thãgbara ƴũ, kɛ dɔnι Jeju Thãgbaa Bikuun, sι jιɛ jιιl kιbι ha pɛrɛraakɛ sι canι.
Gιdonι gbõdaarιkɛ sι hananι, ga do gbõdaar gιιkɛ na-n punoneni a na-n pər asι yɔɔra gaaga, sι ɔr, a kɔɔ yɩrɛ fifiləle asɩ kha thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra, sɩ aa cʋʋ sopugoə'.
Gɛr gɩ sa-n wɔrɔnɛ na tu jɩɩr Thãgbaa fãga too pa, ka bɔ jɩɩr hanɩ, mɛ̃ sa 'lɛ bɔ donanɛ, sa-n 'lɛna dakha bulle thɩ̃ ɓɔr bɔɔ ga-n the ɔɔ bɔ jɩra.
Gɩdonɩ gbõdaar wo gbõdaarɩkɛ wɩ-n phiirni tɩbɩlaa thɩ̃thɩɩn, wɩ-n pɩɛraarɛ a na-n dɔ tɩbɩlala Thãgbaa thɔ̃, a na 'laana khaardaasɔ a na jenə bonɩɛ tɩbɩlaa sopugosɔra.
A-n dor ʋrɛ na-n hananɩ hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ yʋ 'leedarara, na wɩrɛraakɛ lɛnanɩ hʋɛra, gɩdonɩ a dor tibil dakha a yɔɔ.
Dɩ yɔɔrɛɛlera dɔ nɔɔ dɩɩ teena a je bonɩɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ sopugosɔra dakha mɔ̃kɛ a-n jini tɩbɩlaadara.
Tibil bɩɛl na hale na ti dɩbara nayɩ, ɩnɛr na cʋɛ thɔ̃ caale saagado Thãgba wɩɛ mɔ̃ a wenɩ Aarɔ̃ dɩ ha gaaga.
Mɛ̃ gɩ ha na Kirisiti. Ga do ɔr kɔɔ te ire dɩbara ɩnɩ-n dɔ gbõdaara', sɩ a 'lɛ gɛr ʋrɛraakɛ kɔɔ sʋɔraanɩ ayɩ: “Fɛr dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuun, mɛr Thãgba kɔna fɩ nĩ gɩrɛ.”
Mɔ̃kɛ a sonɩ dakha pa kpɩɩ wo ayɩ: “Fɛr dʋɔn bonɩ jidaar khorr mɔ̃kɛ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩɩ kpam hanɩ.”
Ɔɔ yi hana bɔɔ kɛ thɩɩra, khɩɩ khena na yilẽbe a kɔɔ bɩɛlna Thãgba da-n ƴɛɛnaa, ɔrkɛ hananɩ punone na taanaa khirrə, dɩ ɔɔ dɩbara jo dor nɔɔ dɩ Thãgba kɔɔ tu ɔɔ bɩɛl.
A donɩnakɛ Bikuun sɩ a kɔɔ dɩɩrɛ nũ nɩɩr dɩɩ the gɩrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ gaarɔnɩ bʋɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ a danɩ waa thu pɩ, a debire do khorr taa 'lɛ paar wɩrɛraakɛ n nɩɛnɛɛnɩ nũu;
dɩ Thãgba kɔɔ pɩɛrɛ a dɔ gbõdaar mɔ̃kɛ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩɩ kpam hanɩ.
Ga thɩmɩɩra sɩ hananɛ thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ a na mɩɩ, sɩ thɩ̃ɛ gɩɩkɛ khiinoni mɩɛrɛra gɩdonɩ anɩ nũ ka hulone.
Gɩdonɩ nɛrɛɛkɛ kɛkɛkɛ kanɩ teena nɩ deba dɔ tɩbɩlaa dɩɩrdara, nɛr ha wɩrɛ 'lo n ƴaalɛnɩ wɩ birə na dɩrɛ nɩ Thãgbaa so tɔ̃tʋ̃ɔ pa, dɩɩ do ɩlɛ̃ nɩ-n ƴaal 'lo na-n ƴaal dɩko khena ga.
Dɩ tibilikɛ n bɔnɩ da-n jɩɩl ɩlɛna, aa-n jɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ dasarʋ kpɩa', gɩdonɩ bɩsã buu a do.
Sɩ dɩko khena wɩrɛ bɩnanɩ hɩna, kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ mɩlananɩ bɩ̃ kuure, dɩ wɩ puno dɩ wa-n jɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ na gɩrɛ puuroni.

Gɛr gɩ dɔ sɩ sɩrɔ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ Kirisitii thɩmɩɩ tɔ̃tʋ̃ɔ pa, sɩ sɩ bãba sa-n ƴaal dɩɩrɛɛkɛ na cʋɛ sɩnɩ dɩ sa bɩ̃; sa-n bir 'lo a na jɩɩl gɩrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ tɔ̃tʋ̃ɔ paar, kɛ dɔnɩ thɔ̃ khi faarɛ, na ha pɛrɛ Thãgbara ga,
na dɩɩrɛ yɔ kpɛɛrɛsɔra na nyɛ̃ dɛɛna', na khee ɩɩr na khorr kɩɩla'.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ sa cʋʋnɩ a Thãgba tu.
Gɩdonɩ ado wɩrɛ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ Thãgbaa dahɩrɛ gɩ, kɛ 'lɛnɩ khaardaakɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ a hɩɩn, kɛ 'lɛnɩ dakha awɩda Thu Phuurə,
a 'lɛna dakha Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩkɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ a hɩɩn, na fãgaakɛ dɔnɩ bɔɔkɛ n ɩnanɩɩda;
a tibil ca wele kɛr bir, wa puno na bir na debi haar bã, gɩdonɩ we wer wɩ bire gba Thãgbaa Bikuun dɩ wa-n kpa kʋkʋ thɩrʋra, dɩɩ do yicuru wɩ-n pɩɛraa tɩbɩlaa ƴɛra.
Thɩɩkɛ thãgba nyʋɔn n sɛnɩ wire wire dɩ phu thɩ̃ khonanɛ wɩrɛraakɛ kʋlɛɛnɩ, Thãgba bɔnanɛ a 'lɛ.
Sɩ ado a phu uu na sɩkajɩɩl, bɔ taa thɩɩ gι bã, sɔ̃ togʋʋ a too dɩ pɩpɩɩ paar dɔɔ a na caanna.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, sɩ-n mɩɩnɩnakɛ thakɛ sɩ sɩ hana narɛ tu jɩɩr dɩ nɩ har hʋ bʋɔraakɛ dɔnɩ taa hʋɛ.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba na gõgolõ a na diinə anɩ thɔ̃ na naʋʋkɛ nɩ-n nɩnanɩ ɔɔ irə, mɔ̃kɛ nɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnι thɩ̃ɛ ɔɔ tιι phusɔra a ba harakɛ cʋʋrɔ gιra'.
Sι-n ƴaalɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl n hanana ga gbɛ̃gbɛrɛ̃ ca gι dana khu paar; dι mɛ̃ gιrɛ nι-n pɛnι nũu na dã na ha otirə.
Sa-n ƴaal dokhʋʋr n fɔ na', sι na-n phɛla wιrɛ 'lɛnι gιrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛna wιnι ιna ha wɛr, gι the awι ha pɛra na awι ha fʋra.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanι Abιraham, gι hʋrɛ nʋɔ gι dι so, dι ire na hanιle a kɔ̃tɩ̃ jɔ ɔɔda dι na wa', ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ i a we a sona nʋɔɔle,
ayι: “Sobɔr gι, ma bɔna fɛr dι a kɔ̃tɩ̃, dι ma cʋʋrɛ afι məl dι wa ler na jɔr.”
Thale Abιraham n kɔɔ pιɛr na ha fʋrɛ a 'lɛ gιrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnaanι ιna haarɛ.
Tιbιla ireekɛ kãasιnɛnι awιdara wι-n soro nʋɔ, dι thɩ̃ banaa fɛʋʋkɛ hanι awι thɩ̃thιιn ga pιrɛ nɔ sorraale.
Dι gɛr gι mɔ̃ Thãgba n ƴaalnι a jιι nιna ɔɔ ʋlfɛ 'lɛdara dι gιrɛ a pɛrnι haar ιna cʋʋrɛ na do daphιlanaa ga, gɛr gι dι ɓaan nɔ sor.
Dι mɛ̃ thɩ̃ɛ yenyɔɔkɛ na dɔnι daphιlanaa ga, kɛ Thãgba na punoni na kuro sõsora', na cʋʋ sι dι sa hana 'lar dι a jɔr na ka, sɛrkɛ asι phι pa donι nũ pɛ hananɛ gιrɛraakɛ thιnɛ sarnι ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ.
Ga nũ pɛ caakɛ sι hananι gι hʋrɛ gborõ fʋ therιkɛ n fɔnι gborõo dιɩ ma, gɩ-n kpãsɛrɛ kɩ̃kɩɩnna dɩɩ lõ a dã bɩnɔ,
ka Jejn do sarnɩ ƴɛ kʋl a lõ mɔ̃ a donɩ gbõdaar khorr mɔ̃kɛ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩɩ kpam hanɩ.
Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩ ʋrɛra Salɛm fãgadaar gɩ, a dona Thãgba Kəkəədaarɩ bonɩ jidaar, ɔr kɔɔ caanɛ Abɩraham ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ punoni fãgadara sɩ da-n ɩ̃, dɩ a kɔɔ bɔnanɛ Abɩraham;
dɩ Abɩraham haarɛ bɩɛl yʋɔrra ɔɔ thɩ̃sɔra fɛʋ. “Fɩl sar fãgadaar” a do mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ i kɩr hanɩ, wo Salɛm fãgadaar a do dakha, a thɩɛna gaa “ha ie fãgadaar” gɩ.
Aa hana thɩra', aa hana nɩra', aa hana məllə'; ɔɔ yi na hana fʋ paara', ga hana pɩ paara'; Thãgbaa Bikuun a ho, a too khorr a do bonι jidaar.
Hιnɛ mɔ̃kɛ kuunile kɔ̃tιnι, ʋrɛɛkɛra asι mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃ Abιraham kɔɔ tini bιɛl yʋɔr ɔɔ thιna a ha, kɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ a thenanɩ kʋʋrra.
Levɩɩ bɩsã ɩkhaakɛ n dɔnɩ bonɩ ji thɔma, jɔfʋ ha wɛr hʋɛ dɩ wa tee bɩɛl yʋɔr tɩbɩlala, a thɩɛna gaa awɩ omisɔra wɛ, kɛrakɛ dɔnɩ Abɩrahamɩ məlsɔ.
Sɩ ɔrkɛra na thɛnɩ awɩ thɩ kɔna ga, a teere Abɩraham bɩɛl yʋɔrra, dɩ a kɔɔ bɔnanɛ ʋrɛ ʋlfɛrɛ telenɩ.
Dɩ bananɛ na hala', ʋrɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ n bɔna ʋrɛ 'lunoni.
Mɔ̃ gɩ-n hanɩ gbõdaraa pa, tɩbɩlaakɛ dɔnɩ wɩ-n khire, wɛr n tea bɩɛl yʋɔrra, sɩ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩ wer, kɛ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ yɩnɩ aa do dakhinənə', ɔr tea kɩɛr bɩɛl yʋɔrra.
Levɩɩkɛ n 'lɛnɩ bɩɛl yʋɔrra, sɩ punone so dɩ Abɩraham bɩɛl yʋɔrraakɛ a 'laanɩ ɔr 'laanɛ,
dɩ gɩdonɩ ɔɔ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ Abɩraham na kɔɔ kʋ̃ɔ sɩ dɩ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩ caanʋa'.
Levɩtɩɩ bonɩ ji thɔna jɔfʋʋkɛ tɩbɩla 'lɛnɩ kɔɔ ɩɩr, dɩ ado gɩ dor thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ a dã thu, anyera bonɩ jidaar kpɩɩ bir hale mɔ̃kɛ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩɩ kpam hanɩ, sɩ ga do wo mɔ̃kɛ Aarɔ̃ɔ kpam hanɩ ga?
Dɩ gɩdonɩ bonɩ ji thɔma debire, dɔ jɔfʋ n debi dakha.
Sɩ ʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ mɩɩrɔnɩ ca kpɩɩ gɩ, kɛrakɛ wa bɩɛl na-n kɔɔ donɩ thɔma bonɩ ji paara'.
Gɩ yɩrrɛ casɩ dɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Judaa cara a the, kɛ dɔnɩ caarɩkɛ Mʋɩjɩ na kɔɔ mɩɩnɩnakɛ dɩkha dɩɩ ɩɩna bonɩ jidaraada ga.
Gɩ jɩɛ yɩr casɩ dɩphã, gɩdonɩ bonɩ jidaar kpɩɩ ɩɩrɛ kɛ hɔnɩ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩ.
Ɔɔ bonɩ jidaar do, ga do mɔ̃ tibil jɔfʋ n pɛrnɩ gɩ hana mɛ̃ gɩ ha ga, sɩ yireekɛ na dɔnɩ dapɩnana', ga fãga a dona.
Gɩdonɩ gɩ mɩɩrɛ ɔɔda Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Fɛr dʋɔn bonɩ jidaar khorr mɔ̃kɛ Mɛlkɩsɛdɛkɩɩ kpam hanɩ.”
Mɛ̃ gɩ dɩ mama jɔfʋ hɛllɔ, gɩdonɩ ga hana fãga ga, ga-n taa bʋɔ dakha ga,
jɔfʋ na-n cʋʋnɩ tibil dɩ bɔr dɩ dã thuə', sɩ nũ pɛrɛɛkɛ baannɩ ɩnɛ dɩphã, gɛr dʋɔn gɩrɛ sɩ-n wɔrɔnanɩ Thãgba.
Dɩ gɩdonɩnakɛ thɩ̃ɛ thale na kɔɔ dã sɩ ga do nɔ so ʋlfɛrɛ haanɔaa ga, sɩ Levɩtɩsɔ wer dor bonɩ jidara sɩ nɔ so ʋlfɛrɛ na hala'.
Sɩ Jeju wer dor bonɩ jidaar na nɔ so ʋlfɛrɛ dɩ gɩ ther Thãgbaraakɛ sʋɔraanɩ ayɩ: “Mɛr Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ ʋlfɛrɛ na nɔ sor, sɩ ma debi kpɩɛra' ayɩ: Fɛr dʋɔn bonɩ jidaar khorr.”
Nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ baannɩ a jɔ fĩi, Jeju doro ga barãda.
Dɩrakɛ wo bonɩ jidaraale wɩ-n jɔrɛ gɩdonɩ khir n dor nɔɔ dɩ wa-n pʋɔra'.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ o wer khorrdaar a do, a hɩnɛ bonɩ ji thɔmaakɛ na seerenɩ na ka tɩɩ kpɩɩra ga.
Gɛr dɔ nɔɔ da puno na taa waa vʋ̃ʋ wιrɛ na kanι ɔɔ pa sι na yι hʋɛ a na wɔrɔ̃ Thãgba, gιdonι yidaar a do khorr dι ƴɛɛna Thãgba da-n pɛ war.
Dι gι teere kha sι hananι gbõdaar caa thale dι phu, a do dι pa 'leedaar, aa hana jiinə', a leere kpιι na sopugodara; thãgbara ƴũukɛ gbaanɛnι sι ɔɔda kãasι garɛ.
Aa hana ƴaalɛ wɩ̃ gbõdaraa kha a na-n ji bonιɛ wire koo ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ sopugosɔra ɓo sι a ji a na-n pɛ tιbιlala ga, gιdonι babιɛl a kɔɔ jinə dιbara bonιɛ mɔ̃ a kɔɔ 'laanι ɔɔbara.
Gιdonι jɔfʋ n pɛrɛ tιbιlaakɛ dɔnι yɔyɔa dι wι do gbõdara, sι Thãgbaa ʋlfɛ nɔ sookɛ pιrɔnι a kpa jɔfʋra kɔɔ pιɛr Bikuun waa khorr, kɛ dɔnι ʋrɛ dananι thu.
Gιrɛ dɔnι thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ι gιrɛraakɛ sι-n sonι gɛr dʋɔn, sι hananɛ le Thãgbaa dʋɔ gbõdaar caalera tɔɔnι Thãgba dawabʋʋ fãgadaar too para nyɔ̃bɔɔra,
da-n do thɔma Thãgba fʋɔr paarιkɛ dɔnι kẽkẽ wa bɔɔkɛ Kɔ̃tιnι thɛthɛ kɔɔ dʋnι, ga do tibil doa'.
Gbõdaar wo gbõdaarιkɛ wι-n pɛrnι, wι-n pιɛrɛ a na-n 'laanɛ khaardaa Thãgbara a na jenə bonιɛ, dι gɛr gι gι teenanɛ asι gbõdaar n hanana dakha thɩ̃ɛ a 'laanɛ.
Ado thιιra a kɔɔ ha, a na kɔɔ do bonι jidaara', gιdonι wɛ hale n 'laanɛnι khaardaa mɔ̃ jɔfʋ sonι.

Dι bonι jidaraale gιrɛ wι-n cʋʋnι gι hʋrɛ gιrɛ hanι Thãgbaa dʋɔ dι ga jəər gi; mɛ̃ gι kɔɔ ha na Mʋιjι ɔbɔɔkɛ a-n dʋnι kẽkẽ waa, Thãgba sʋʋraarɛ ayι: “Jιɛ hιιn, sa cʋɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ gι ho gιrɛ fι kɔɔ yιnι gɔ̃gʋɔna.”
Sι nɛnɛ̃ Kirisiti 'lɛr thɔmaakɛ kɔ̃tιnanι a jɔ awιda fɛʋ, mɔ̃kɛ a donι ƴɛƴɛɛ dιι do nɔɔ dι nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ baannι hale, kɛ jιlɛnι ʋlfɛ thɩmɩɩrraakɛ baannɩ dakha.
Gɩdonɩ ado caca nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛ 'leere dɩ paar, anyera wa ƴaal balanyɔdaa 'lo?
Sɩ dɩɩkɛ Thãgba yɩ warnɩ a soro thakɛ ayɩ: “Mɛr Kɔ̃tɩn sɔ ayɩwɔɔ: Wire hale na dã, dɩ ma ʋlfɛ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ phaa na Ɩjɩrayɛl ca na Judaa ca dakha;

ga ho nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ ƴιrɛ mɩ kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanɩ awɩ mama thɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ, bɔɔraalera mɩ kɔɔ fʋ wɩnɩ na nyɛ̃ɛ a ti Ejipiti dɩɩra ga. Dɩ gɩdonɩ wɛr thɛthɛ na kɔɔ bãba ɩ̃ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛra a jιι fʋ ga, mɛrɛ dakha ma kɔɔ pər wara', mɛr Kɔ̃tιn sɔ.
Kɔ̃tιn sɔ ayɩwɔɔ: A ga wiile dã, nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ ma ʋlfɛnanɩ Ɩjɩrayɛl ca, thakɛ ga ha: Ma pɛrɛ ɩ̃ jɔfʋsɔ awɩ kpɩɛrra, ma khere ger awɩ hara; ma dor awɩ Thãgba, wɩ do ɩ̃ too.
Tibil na hana a dɩɩr ʋrɛ wɩ khunəni kha, dɩ õkuun gɩ a na-n dɩɩr õkuun a so ayɩ: Jɛ Kɔ̃tɩna'. Gɩdonɩ fɛʋ na jɩ mɛr, gɩ fʋna tɩɩ pɔɩ gɩ gbana tɩɩ kɔ̃tɩna.
Gɩdonɩ ma jɩ wɛr bʋɔra awɩ thɩ̃ gõgolona, dɩrakɛ ma jɩna awɩ sopugosɔ kpɩɩ bã.”
Mɔ̃ a-n wenɩ ʋlfɛrɛɛle daphaa, a cʋʋrɛ cacadaa dɩɩ do datɩ̃ɩ. Dɩ gɩrɛ tɩnanɩ a kpɔrɔ n jaal gɩrɛ bũburõ paar.
Dɩ caca nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛra dakha kɔɔ hananɛ jɔfʋsɔ mɔ̃kɛ tɩbɩla na fʋɔrnɩ Thãgba, a hanana dakha Thãgba fʋɔr paar kɛ thɩɩra.
Gɩdonɩ kẽkẽ waa kɔɔ dʋrɛ, dɩ ka wɩ-n kɔɔ lonɩ dã caca le wɩ-n we pa phuu; liir dɔ carã dɛ̃ɛ paar kɔɔ ha, na tabal, na buruukɛ wɩ-n hanɩ Thãgba.
Sɩ balanyɔ kẽkẽ billo liir dɔ paarɩkɛ wɩ-n wenɩ sãsɩ pa phuu,

dɛ bʋlaa hale kɛ dɔnɩ latɩkolo 'wii paar, na nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ khɛɛsʋʋkɛ wɩ kolnɩ koo na dɛ kãkɛ dɛ bʋlaakɛ wɩ pɛrnɩ maan hanɩ, na kãkɛ Aarɔ̃ɔ gbolɩkɛ kɔɔ phɛnɩ phɩ̃ɩ hanɩ, na bokanaakɛ wɩ khereronɩ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ thɩmɩɩr.
Nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ khɛɛsʋʋra ƴũule thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ hale kɛ n nɛnanɩ Thãgbaa i dʋbɩ, dɩ awɩ jəər n kɔɔ kɛa so hɛl paar; sɩ ga do ga thɩmɩɩsɔ sɩ-n ƴaal sɩ mɩɩ nɩ nɛnɛ̃ kɩrʋ n yɩra'.
Dɩ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔlera hanɩ thale, bonɩ jidara n lʋʋn bɔɔ fɛʋ caca paar waaraale dɩ wa-n do awɩ thɔ̃.
Sɩ balanyɔ paar gbõdaar dɩbara n lona babɩɛl yɛ bɩɛl. Tɔmɩnɩkɛ a jinəni bonɩɛ a pɛ ɔɔbara na tɩbɩlaa sopugosɔra a-n lona.
Gɛr dɔ gɩrɛ Thu Phuu nɩnanɩ dɩ sãsɩ pa phu hʋɛ na khɛr pɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ caca kẽkẽ waa hanɩle 'loa'.
Sokpaa gɩ dɩ ga-n nɩ sar mɔ̃kɛ thɩ̃ɛ hanɩ nɛnɛ̃ bɔɔkɛ, dɩ khaardaasɔ na bonɩɛɛkɛ wɩ-n jini, ga puno na cʋʋ tibilikɛ n fʋɔrɛnɩ Thãgba thale, gɩ do ɔɔ kpɩɛrnɔ bɔrɛ waa a dã thuə'.
Gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ khonanɛ gɩ, na dayɔnanɛ, na phʋɔl caarsɔ dɩɩdɩɩ dɩbara, kɛ tɩbɩla pɛrnɩ dɩɩ do jɔfʋ phaphapha gɩ dana bɔɔkɛ Thãgba na gbɛbɩnɩ thɩ̃ɛ dɩ ga jɩɩ bɔr.
Sɩ Kirisiti ɩnɛ a do gbõdaar thɩ̃ bʋɔraakɛ hanɩkɛ gɩrɛ; a kɔɔ kpãsɛrɛ waaraakɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ ka, kɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ dakha ka, kɛ na dɔnɩ tibili nyɛ̃ thɔ̃a', kɩrʋ dʋɔn, ga do thɩɩkɛɛda ga.
A kɔɔ lʋʋn babιɛl khorr sãsɩ pa phuurə sɩ ga do bʋ tɔmɩn na na ɓol tɔmɩn a kɔɔ lona ga, sɩ ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ tɔmɩ̃ gɩ, dɩɩ do babɩɛl a kɔɔ birse si waa khorr.
Gɩdonɩ ado bʋ tɔmɩn, na nake tɔmɩn, na naphɩɩ thookɛ wɩ-n gbanɩ a jɛbɩ wɩrɛraakɛ biseneni dɩɩ do gɩ phʋɔl wɛr dɩ wɩ phu gɩdonɩ wɩ lɩrɛ,

mɔ̃ ga ka na ha na gɩrɛ Kirisitii tɔmɩ̃ n cʋʋnι, kɛ dɔnι ʋrɛ kɔɔ 'laanɛnι ɔɔbara Thãgbara a do bonι jirikɛ na hananι sι paara', dιι do Thu Phuukɛ dɔnι khorrdaarι pa gι the. Kirisitii tɔmɩ̃ιlera na phʋɔlɛ asι ha a na ti mɔlɔ thɔmaakɛ sι kɔɔ cʋʋnι sι sι puno dιphã sa-n fʋɔr Thãgba yidaar.

Gɛr gι dι Kirisiti do ƴɛƴɛɛ dιι do nɔɔ dι nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛ phaa hale, dι mɛ̃ wιrɛ Thãgba wenι na puno na 'lɛ bɔnanɛɛkɛ dɔnι khorrdaa, kɛ Thãgba yιnι ιna 'laarɛ. Gι punone ha mɛ̃ gιdonι bιɛl kɔɔ khire dι khirile na birsene tιbιla dι wa the puureraakɛ wι kɔɔ cʋʋnι caca nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛ bɔɔ.
Gιdonι a thɩ̃ gba sɛbɛ hale, dɔ tue n jι dι ʋrɛ kheranι sɛbɛɛlera khire.
Gιdonι thɩ̃ gba sɛbɛɛle na-n taa bʋɔ ɔbɔɔkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ kheranι hananι yirə', sι gι-n taarɛ bʋɔ bɔɔkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ kheranι khini pι dιphã.
Gɛr dɔ kιrʋ dι caca nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛrɛ na kɔɔ puno na jιɩ do ʋlfɛrɛ sɩɩ do tɔmɩn na kɔɔ halaa ga.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Mʋɩjɩ kɔɔ sonɩ jɔfʋ sɛbɛra jɔfʋ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ ƴɛra pɩ, a gbaar bana sũu sɩɛ, na ɩjopɩ faa, a ɓɛna na ɓol tɔmɩn na bʋ tɔmɩn, na nyʋɔn a jɛbɩ sɛbɛraale na tɩbɩlala fɛʋ sa so ayɩ:
“Tɔmɩnɩkɛ dʋɔn nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ jɩɩn nɛrɛra na Thãgba.”
Ɔmɛna a jɛbɩ dakha tɔmɩn kẽkẽ waara, na Thãgba fʋɔr thɔ̃ do thɩ̃ɛsɔra fɛʋʋkɛ hanιle.
Ado jɔfʋra gι, gι sɩrɛ fɩɩʋrakɛ sɩɩ do thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ tɔmɩn n phʋɔlɛ gɩ, dɩ ado tɔmɩn na deera', sopugo faarɛ na hala'.
Thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛra fɛʋ dɔnɩ gɩrɛ n nɛnanɩ mɔ̃ ƴũ thɩ̃ɛsɔ hanι, gι teenanɛ phʋɔlɛ thakɛ, dɩ gɩrɛɛ thɛthɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ ƴũdaa bonɩ jirikɛ baannι gɩ-n ƴaal.
Gɩdonɩ Kirisiti na kɔɔ lõ pa phuurəəkɛ tibil nyɛ̃ɛ cʋʋna', kɛ n kporonanɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ bire, sɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔɔ thɛthɛ a lõ, dɩ mɛ̃ a na-n jɩɩl gɩrɛ Thãgbaa ƴɛra asɩ jɩɩl.
Dɩ dakha wo aa-n kɔɔ lõ le da-n jinə ɔɔ dɩbara bonɩɛ bɔɔ fɛʋ, mɔ̃kɛ gbõdaar n lonɩ pa phuurə yɩɛr koo na thɩ̃ kpɩɩ tɔmã'.
Agado mɛ̃ ga, ga dor bɔɔ fɛʋra a na-n kɔɔ gaar bʋɔ gɩ fʋna thɩɩ ti bɔɔ; sɩ nɛnɛ̃kɛ dɩphã pɩpɩɩ bɔɔraakɛ babɩɛl a kɔɔ ɩ̃ sopugo hɛl ɩɩn, gɩ the gɩrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ gbanɩ ɔɔbara a jinə bonɩɛ.
Tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛlɩda dʋɔn babɩɛl wa khi, agɩpɩ Thãgba n kɩɩlna wɩ.
Mɛ̃ dakha Kirisiti kɔɔ jinə dɩbara bonɩɛ babɩɛl a heen tibil jɔjʋɔɔ sopugo, sɩ balanyɔdaa a na bire na ɩ̃, ga do sopugodaara gɩ bã, sɩ wɩrɛ n pɩɛrɛɛnɩɩ taa pa gɩ mɛ̃.
Jɔfʋ na do thɩ̃ biree thɛtha', sɩ thɩ̃ ɓʋ̃ɔɔkɛ na ɩnanɩɩ jəər gɩ, dɩ a na puno kpɩɩrakɛ na bonɩ ji ca bɩɛlɩlera n jenɩsɔ wire wire yɩɛr koo, a na cʋʋ wɩrɛ n pɔnɩ Thãgbara dɩ wa bɔr na dã thuə'.
Gɩdonɩ ado wɩrɛ n fʋɔrɛnɩ Thãgba thale awɩ sopugosɔ kɔɔ hɛl warɛ sobɔr, ga dor sopugoo so heen fɩɩʋrakɛ na bo na too awɩ hara bã, dɩ wa sɩrɔrɛrakɛ dakha bonɩ jir.
Sɩ ga bonɩ jiile n ka cʋʋrɛ tɩbɩla yɩɛr koo dɩ wa-n jɩna awɩ sopugosɔ.
Gɩdonɩ nake tɔmɩn na bʋ tɔmɩn na puno na hɛl sopugosɔ kpɩɩraka'.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ mɔ̃ Kirisiti n lonɩ kɛ thɩɩra a sor Thãgbara ayɩ: “Ga do bonɩ jir fɩ-n ƴaal dɩ khaardaa ga, sɩ tomɩr fɩ mɩ mɩ.
Nʋ̃ thii bonɩ jir, na sopugo hɛl bonɩ jir na-n da fara';
dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ so: Hɩnɛ mɛr ha ʋ, ɩ̃ cʋʋ afɩ tuur ya Thãgba, gɩ ha mɔ̃kɛ ɩ̃dara kherenɩ lo sɛbɛra.”
Gɩrɛ a sonɩ caca dʋɔn: “Ga do bonɩ jir fɩ-n ƴaal, dɩ khaardaa gɩ, dɩ nʋ̃ thii bonɩ jir gɩ, dɩ sopugo hɛl bonɩ jir ga, ga-n da fara'.” Sɩɩ do mɔ̃ jɔfʋ pɛrnɩ ga bonɩɩle n ji.
Agɩpɩ a sor wo: “Hɩnɛ mɛr ha ʋ ɩ̃ cʋʋ afι tuur.” Mɛ̃ a hɛllɔ caca bonι jir sι Kirisitii bonι ji lõ ga kara.
Gιdonι Jeju Kirisiti cʋʋrɛ gιrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ƴaalnι a cʋɛ a 'laa ɔɔ tomι babιɛl khorr, sι phu sι lee kpιɩ.
Bonɩ jidara fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl ƴũ jιιlɔ wι-n jιιl dι wa-n do awι thɔ̃ dι wa-n ji bonι ji ca bιɛlsɔra wire wire, kɛ na-n punoneni na ti sopugo kpιιraka'.
Sι o wer bonι ji bιɛl a kɔɔ ji sopugora sa too gιrɛ khorr Thãgbaa nyɔ̃bɔra,
da-n pιɛr dιphã phaphapha Thãgba n cʋʋ ɔɔ lãlaardara wɩ dʋʋraa ɔɔ nɛ jəəda.
Gιdonι bonι ji bιɛl a cʋʋna wιrɛ phonι a lee kpιι dι wι bɔr ka khorr a dã thu.
Dι Thu Phuu cʋʋ sɛr dakha dɩ sɩ jɩ tue. Cacara a sor ayɩ:
“Kɔ̃tɩn sɔ ayɩwɔɔ: A ga wiile dã, nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ ma ʋlfɛna wɩnɩ thakɛ ga ha: Ma pɛrɛ ɩ̃ jɔfʋsɔ awɩ hara, ma khere ger awɩ kpɩɛrra.”
Dɩ a sor wo: “Ma jɩna awɩ sopugosɔ dɩ awɩ thɩ̃ gõgolõ gɩ kpɩɩ bã.”
Dɩ ka sopugo faarɛ n hanɩ bonɩɛ na-n ji sopugora bã.
Mɛ̃ gɩ omɩna, sι jιrɛ tue dι hʋɛ phιnɛ dιphã waa dι sa-n lona sãsι pa phuurə, dιι do Jeju Kirisitii tɔmɩ̃ dɔ nɔɔ.
Hʋɛɛlera a kɔɔ phɛl sarnι hʋ phaa gι, a dona yi hʋɛ, a kpãsɛ kɩ̃kιιnna, a thιɛna gaa ɔɔ tomι gι.
Dι wo sι hananɛ gbõdaarιkɛ Thãgba pɛrnι dι do yʋʋ ɔɔ cɔ.
Mɛ̃ gɩ sɩ jɩɛ tɔ na wɔrɔ̃ Thãgba na ha bʋɔ, na ha pɛrɛɛkɛ dananɩ thu, na haarɩkɛ Thãgba phʋɔlnɩ a ti kpɩɛrnɔ puu a faa, a na wɔrɔnaa dakha na tomɩrɩkɛ cɔcɔɔnɛnɩ na yɔ hɩrɛ.
Sɩ fɔ asɩ nũ pɛɛkɛra sɩ yɩnɩ sɩ hananɛ kĩkĩ, gɩdonɩ sɩ jɩɛ jɩ tue dɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba ʋlfɛnɩ ɩna cʋʋrɛ, gɛrra a na cʋʋ.
Sa-n jɩɛ dʋ kha bʋrɛ gɩ tɔ naʋ ga-n pɛr na dakha thɔ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛ.
Sa-n bo pa bɩɛl gbɛbɩra', mɔ̃kɛ ɩkhasɔ n cʋʋna', sɩ sa-n mɩa kha yɩr thɩmɩa, mɔ̃ nɩ taanɩ yɩ Wireele dɩ ga-n wɔrɔ̃.
Gɩdonɩ a sɩ jɩ gbobi sɩ na cʋʋ sopugo ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ 'lini 'lɛr sobɔ jɩɩr pɩ, bonɩɛ na-n hale sopugora bã.
Sɩ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ ma kʋ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ sɛnɩ dʋɔn kɩɩlʋ na Thãgbaa ha kpor nĩkhiikɛ na thiəni ɔɔ lãlaardara dɔ khaa.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ n kɔɔ kʋɛanɩ Mʋɩjɩɩ jɔfʋ, ado tɩbɩla yenyɔ yẽthersɔ so ɩnɩ torre yire, wɩ-n kɔɔ kʋʋrɛ sι wa-n jιι bʋɔra ga.

Nι kpιɛrɛ hιnɛ mɔ̃ ga puuro na pɔna ʋrɛraakɛ na-n gbaannι Thãgbaa Bikuun dι dʋʋraa thɩ̃a', kɛ dɔnι ʋrɛ n hιnɛnι nɔ bιɛl ʋlfɛ tɔmιnιkɛ phʋɔlɛɛnι dιι dʋʋraa mɔlɔ thɩ̃ɛ, da-n kpɛna dakha Thu Phuukɛ dɔnι bɔ jιdaa.
Gιdonι sι jιrɛ ʋrɛ kɔɔ sɔnι ayι: “Hel tiire dɔ ιnda, dι mɛr dɔ ʋrɛ na lιmanι tibil gιrɛ a cʋʋnι”, wo, “Kɔ̃tιn na kιιlnanɛ ɔɔ too.”
Thɩ̃ɛ gι dι ga-n kʋ maar ka ado fɩ təə ji Thãgba yidaarι nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Na-n jɛna caca wiresɔ, ɔbɔɔkɛ nι kɔɔ 'lɛnι Thãgbaa dahιrɛ pι, nι kɔɔ jιιlɛ kιbι kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ kɔ̃tιιna bʋɔraakɛ nι-n gaarnι.
Kho bιɛl nι dor yι ga thɩ̃ɛ nιιrɛraakɛ wι-n nιιr nιnι na nιwɛraakɛ nι-n yιnι, kho bιɛl wo nι ture a lõ bɔ gaar bιɛlla na wιrɛɛkɛ n gaarɛnι thale.
Dι bʋɔ n kɔɔ fʋ nɛr wιrɛraakɛ dɔnι khaιdara, dι nι ture na daʋ tιbιla n taa nar thɩ̃ɛ, sι dι na-n jιna dι nι hananɛ thɩ̃ ƴιrɛ baannι a do thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ n pʋɔrɛnι khorr.
Gɛr gι na-n dʋna anι tu jιra a fagaa koe, gι hananɛ khorιkɛ kɔ̃tιnanι tə̃ə.
Nι teenanɛ nι hanana yιrrɛ ado nι-n ƴaalɛ na-n cʋɛ gιrɛ Thãgba tuni, a 'lɛna gιrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnι a ha nι.
Gιdonι gι kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Kɩɛr na bɔɔ gbe fɩɩʋ, ʋrɛɛkɛra hanɩ ɩɩn da-n ɩ̃ a na daan a na pʋɔra';
sɩ ʋrɛ mɩ hɛllɔnɩ sor dɩɩ do ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ, ɔr na hana yire, sɩ ado a kɛr bir ɔɔda na da mar haara kpɩɩraka'.”
Sɩ se wer sa do wɛkɛ n kɛranɩ dɩ wɩ bir khiro a na buurə', sɩ sɛr dɔ wɛkɛ hananɩ ha pɛrɛ gɩ taa asɩ thu.
Ha pɛ hananɛ dʋɔn tu jɩɩr dɩ gɩrɛ sɩ-n pɛnɩ nũu sa 'lɛr, na thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na dɔnɩnakɛ dayɩnana', sɩ sɩ jɩrɔ tue dɩ gɩ hale.
Ha pɛrɛɛkɛra kɔɔ cʋɛ dɩ kɔ̃tɩna mamara kɔɔ hana i bʋɔ Thãgbara.
Ha pɛrɛra sɩ jɩ dɩ nʋɔ Thãgba kɔɔ sona dɩ thɩɩ na ƴũ kɔɔ ti, dɩ mɛ̃ gɩrɛ sɩ-n yɩnɩ the gɩrɛraakɛ na dɔnɩ dayɩnana'.

Ha pɛrɛra Abɛl kɔɔ ji bonɩɛ Thãgbara dɩɩ thʋ̃ bɔr ka a jɔ Kayɛ̃ɛda, dɩ gɛrra a kɔɔ 'lɛr i bʋɔ dɩ tɩɩ sarʋ a do mɔ̃ Thãgbara kɔɔ teenɩ ɔɔ khaarda, dɩ ha pɛrɛrara Abɛlɩda hale gɩrɛ 'lo dɩ ga-n mɩɩ sɩɩ dorakɛ a kɔɔ khire.

Ha pɛrɛra dɔ nɔɔ Enɔkɩ na kɔɔ khinə sa jʋʋn Thãgbaa dʋɔ, dɩ tibil na kɔɔ puno a yɩɩ bã, gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa kɔɔ gbaanɛɛ a jʋʋnna. Dι Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayι ɔbɔɔkɛ aa kɔɔ jʋʋnnι Thãgbaa dʋɔ pa', ɔɔda kɔɔ dar Thãgba haar.
Dɩ ado ha pɛrɛ na hala', tibil na puno na da Thãgba haar kpιιraka'; gιdonι ʋrɛɛkɛ n wɔrɔnɛnι Thãgba dɔ a pɛr haar dι Thãgba hale, dι ɔr dʋɔn ʋrɛ n 'laanɛnι khor wιrɛraakɛ n ƴaalɛɛnι.

Ha pɛrɛra Noe kɔɔ pɛ nũu thιɛnaakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ kpãkpaanaanι sι dι ga do a yι gɛr pa'. A kɔɔ pər garɛ a gbɛbιrɔ bato gɩ taa ɔɔ cɔdara. Dɩ gɛrra a kɔɔ heenna tɩbɩla thɩɩra sor, dɩ a 'lɛr Thãgbara fɩl sarʋʋkɛ n thɛnι ha pɛrɛra.
Ha pɛrɛra Abιraham ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ wιιnι, a kɔɔ nιrɛ nũu a the jal paarιkɛ a na 'lɛnι na hɩ̃; dι a kɔɔ ther da-n jal sι aa jι ka a na jalna'.
Ha pɛrɛra a kɔɔ jal too dιιraakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnι ιna haarɛ, dι a toorore kpakpal togʋʋ da-n cɔ kẽkẽ waʋ na Ɩjakι na Jakɔbι, wɛrkɛ dɔnι ʋlfɛ bιɛlιlee hɩ̃hɩ̃sɔra.
Gιdonι dιιkɛ hananι go kpɛɛrɛ dιι tι a-n pιɛr, kɛ Thãgba donι ʋrɛ kheranι mɔ̃ ga mιnι a dona wa mιmι.
Ha pɛrɛra Saraa thɛthɛrakɛ 'lini tιιn sι a kɔɔ 'lɛr punone a kɔ̃ bi, gιdonι a hananɛ ha pɛrɛ dι ʋrɛ kɔɔ ʋlfɛnɛnι ʋlfɛrɛɛle, sobɔ tibil a do.
Gɛr gι tιι bιɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽekɛrakɛ wo 'lenɩ sɛlɛlɛ pɩ, 'lɛ məlle dɩ wɩ jɔr a ho ƴepələ̃be ƴũ, a hona gbalãkothιnιkɛ n hanι lanyɔ̃ nʋɔra, kɛ tibil na punoneni na thera'.
Ha pɛ hʋɛra wele fɛʋ khiir sι wa 'lɛrakɛ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛna wιna', sι wι yι gɛr ƴɔɔ a 'laa fʋɔr gι, dι wι ture dakha kpakpala ha nɩ dɩ ɩnɩ dona kpãkpara thɩɩraakɛ.
Wɩrɛ n mɩanɩ thakɛ nɩnanɛ casɩ dɩ wɩ-n ƴaalɛ dɩɩkɛ na dɔnɩ awɩda.
Ado dɩɩkɛ wɩ kɔɔ thernɩɩda n bor dɩ ga-n too awɩ kpɩɛrɛra, ga dor wa kɔɔ yɩrɛ hʋɛ a na kɛr na biro.
Sɩ dɩɩkɛ baannɩ dɩphã wɩ-n ƴaal ka, a thɩɛna gaa dɩɩkɛ hanɩ ƴũ gɩ. Gɛr gɩ yicuru na fʋ Thãgba wa-n we nɩ awɩ Thãgba gaaga, gɩdonɩ a gbɛbɩ warɛ dɩɩ.
Ha pɛrɛra Abɩraham kɔɔ jinə Ɩjakɩ bonɩɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ bɩɩnɩ bɩnɛ a hɩɩn; ɔrkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanɩ a kɔɔ gbaarra ɔɔ Bikũu bɩɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ a kɔɔ jinəna bonɩɛ,
sɩɩ dorakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ sʋʋraarɛ ɔɔdara ayι: “Ɩjakιra fa 'lɛ məlle wa-n wena afι i.”
A hananɛ kpιɛrɛ dι Thãgba hananɛ punone a na ιιrnaa khirera, dι a thιɛna gaa gι hor khirerara a ιιr dι bir 'lιɛ.
Ha pɛrɛra Ɩjakι kɔɔ bɔna Jakɔbι na Ejayʋ mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ na ha warnι ƴɛ kʋʋlɔ.
Ha pɛrɛra Jakɔbι n kɔɔ khi a bɔna Jojɛfιι bikuunsɔ bιɛlbιɛl a gbuu gbʋʋl a wurõwuro sa fʋɔr Thãgba.
Ha pɛrɛra Jojɛfιι khi bɔ n thɔɔ dι mιι Ɩjιrayɛl bιsanaa theda a mιɛna wι mɔ̃ wa cʋʋnɩ na ɔɔ khubusɔ.
Ha pɛrɛra Mʋɩjɩɩ thɩ na ɔɔ nɩ kɔɔ keruu pora yẽther bɔɔkɛ wɩ kɔɔ kʋɔnɩ, gɩdonɩ wɩ yɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ bɩsaanna thʋnɩ ɓɔ̃, dɩ maar na kɔɔ fʋ wɩrakɛ fãgadaarɩ jɔfʋra ga.
Ha pɛrɛra ɔbɔɔkɛ Mʋɩjɩra kɔɔ khɔnɩ pɩ bo ayɩ, wa-n we nɩ Faarɔ̃ɔ bikhɛrɩ bikuuna';
a ka nar wa-n hʋɔlɛ nar nakha Thãgbaa too sa ka bo sopugo kãkarɩkɛ a na kãkanɩ bɔɔ gbe fɩɩʋ dɩbara.
A hɩɩnɛ beesire na Kirisiti dɩɩ dʋʋraa thɩ̃ ɓʋ̃ɔ a jɔ Ejipiti lẽle thɩ̃ɛ, gɩdonɩ khorɩkɛ a na 'lɛnɩ gɛr a-n hɩɩn kirkirkir.
Ha pɛrɛra a kɔɔ the Ejipiti dɩɩra sɩ maar na kɔɔ fʋʋrakɛ fãgadaarɩ nĩkhirə ga, gɩdonɩ a harrɛ kĩkĩkĩ a ho a yɩrɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ na dɔnɩ dayɩnana'.
Ha pɛrɛra a kɔɔ cʋʋ Pakɩ a jɛbɩna tɔmɩn dɩ mɛ̃ gbõgolõdaar na tha Ɩjɩrayɛldaraa caca birə ga.
Ha pɛrɛra Ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsana kɔɔ ɩɩr lanyɔ̃ sɩɛ dɩɩ ho pa khɩɩ gɩ, sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ Ejipitidara kɔɔ pɛrnɩ haar ɩnɩ-n cʋɛ oti iner, wɩ kɔɔ khiire nyʋɔnɔ.
Ha pɛrɛra Jeriko gʋʋsɔ kɔɔ jiiro ɔbɔɔkɛ Ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsana kɔɔ fini diiro nyẽbe makonyɔ na pɩ.
Ha pɛrɛra Rahabɩ khɛ pɔɩ na kɔɔ khi na nũ nʋra ga, gɩdonɩ a kɔɔ teere gɩgɩla na ha bʋɔ.
Dɩ anye hale 'lo dɩ ma bir na so wo? Gɩdonɩ ma yɩ ƴɩɛ na mɩɩ nɩ Jedeyɔ̃ɔda, na Barakɩɩda, na Sãsɔ̃ɔda, na Jefɩtheeda, na Davɩdɩɩda, na Samʋɛlɩda, na Thãgbaa bobonaada ga.
Ha pɛrɛ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ wɩ kɔɔ puno fãgadarasɔɔ dɩ, wɩ cʋʋrɛ dakha gɩrɛ saranɩ, wɩ kɔɔ 'lɛr gɩrɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛna wɩnɩ, wɩ kɔɔ khaanɛ sidũ'ũ gbuokho,
wɩ kɔɔ kʋkʋʋlɛ dɔɔ fãga, wɩ forre bajɩna kʋrra, wɩ kɔɔ ther yɔɔrɛra a 'lɛ fãga, wɩ dor kũu khaa kʋʋrra, wɩ weelele sɔrasɩ kpala.
Khɛr ɩkha bire 'lɛ awɩ tibilsɔɔkɛ ɩrɛnɩ a the khirera. Tibil ɩkhasɔ n kɔɔ 'wãga dɩ wa-n khinə, sa bo fuure wɩ puno wɩ 'lɛ khi ɩɩrɛɛkɛ baannɩ.
Ɩkhasɔ hire maanɛ na ciile, na jɔrkɔ lir, na khaɩ tʋʋr.

Wɩ kɔɔ dʋʋrɛ ɩkhasɔ na bokana a kʋʋr, a vaar ɩkhasɔ na thɩr khaadaa, a kʋʋr ɩkhasɔ na bajɩna, bana lʋʋ na bʋ lʋʋ ɩkhasɔ n kɔɔ to dɩ wa-n finə bilili, a 'leena thɩ̃ɛ phuphuphul, wɩ-n kpoo warɛ dɩ wa-n ʋ̃ʋ war.
Tɩbɩlaalera na teena thɩɩka'. Wɩ-n kpaarɛ bəənnə, na gɔ̃gɔnana, wɩwɩl kanana na bi kpololo wɩ-n kɔɔ cɔ.
Wele fɛʋʋle wɩ kɔɔ 'lɛr i bʋɔ Thãgbara awɩ ha pɛ hanana, sɩ wa kɔɔ 'lɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ a kɔɔ ʋlfɛna wɩna'.
Thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ a ka Thãgba thɩɩn asɩ thɩɩn, dɩ ga do a-n ƴaalɛ gɩ dɔ wɛr bʋɔnɔ a dã thu sɩɩ do ser na halaa ga.

Gɛr gɩ sɛrɛ dakha mɔ̃ sɩ hananɩ yi tordara dɩ wɩ jɔr tə̃tə̃tə̃ a jɛ kpala sar, dɔ sɩ faa gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ dɔ sarnɩ heendaa na sopugookɛ na-n pʋɔrɛnɩ sɩ dɩɩ barã sa', sɩ sa-n ca na yɩrrɛ kɔlɔ̃kɔɔkɛra phɩnanɩ asɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn,

sa-n hɩɩnna Jeju kirkirkir, kɛ ha pɛrɛ n thernɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ dakha ʋrɛ n cʋɛnɩ ha pɛrɛ dɩɩ jɩɩ do ha pɛrɛ. Daʋʋkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ thɩɩnaanɩ dɔ nɔɔ dɩ kɔɔ gaar bʋɔ na ha fʋrɛ kʋkʋ thɩrʋra, sɩ aa kɔɔ therna yicuruukɛ gɩ-n hanana', dɩ nɛnɛ̃ a toore Thãgbaa fãga too pa nyɔ̃bɔɔra.
Na-n jɩɛ kpɩɛrna ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ fʋɔnnɩ haar bo ca olela ɓoɓo sopugodara kɔɔ bʋʋnɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ na vɔa', dɩ nyɛ̃ɛ na khiir ni dakha ga.
Anɩ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ na sopugo ga jalna nɩ pɩ dɩ tɔmɩn thʋ̃ tha'.
Nɩ diinəne fɩl dɩɩr thɩmɩɩrɩle ya? Mee bikũu dʋʋrra Thãgba so nar ayɩ: “Ɩ̃ bikuun, na pərə Kɔ̃tɩnɩ wɛbɩra; ado a na naar fɩ, fa-n do haar n kʋɛ fa'.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn nanɩ, ɔr a-n wɛbɩ, ʋrɛ a-n wenɩ bikuun ɔr a-n ciil.”
Anɩ wɛbɩ dɔ nɔɔ dɩɩ teena nɩ to gaarɛ. Thãgba n hɩɩn nɛr mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ ɔɔ bikuunsɔ; gɩdonɩ ʋmɔ̃ɔ bikuun haanle dɩ thɩrɛ na wɛbʋa?
Ado Thãgba na-n wɛbι nι bikona fɛʋʋ kha ga, ga dor khɛ pɔɩɩ bιsãsɔ nι do, ga do bikũu bɔ nι doa'.
Dιrakɛ asι thιsɔ kɛ thιιraakɛ n kɔɔ wɛbι sɛr, sι sι-n kɔɔ cʋ wɛr, dι ga ka teena sι wuro jɔ ƴũ Thιrɛra a 'lɛ yirəə?
Bɔɔ gbe asι thιsɔ kɔɔ wɛbι sι mɔ̃kɛ wι yιɛnι dιι bɔr, sι Thãgba n wɛbι sɛr thɩ̃ɛ n bɔ sar sι puno sι phu mɔ̃kɛ a phuni.
Sobɔr gι wer, wɛbιrɛ fɛʋ ga-n do daʋ fʋ paara', gbobire gι-n do, sι pιpιι paar ha ιι gι-n do dιι ιna dakha fιlɛɛkɛ saranι wιrɛraakɛ lonanι wɛbιrɛraalera.
Gɛr gι nι dɔ anι nyɛ̃ɛkɛ ƴʋɔlɛnι n hιl nar, anι nɛkhilikɛ taanɛnι n bir gι sar.
Nι dɔ anι nɛ na-n gba hʋ telẽe dι mɛ̃ gbãgbarʋʋ nɔ na ɓɔra', sι gι ka gι kpɛɛ.
Na-n ƴaalɛ ha ie toore na tιbιla fɛʋ na kpιι leere, gιdonι ado kpιι leere na hala', tibil bιɛllakɛ na yι Kɔ̃tιna'.
Na-n jιɛ dʋ bʋrɛ dι tibil bιɛl na-n 'lee Thãgbaa bɔ ja', thιr nɛ khaa na-n phu dakha a na pɛ nyanyaanɛ anι thɩ̃thιιn gι ho ga mar tibil jɔjʋɔa'.
Na-n jιɛ dʋ bʋrɛ tibil na-n do bɔdɛl cʋʋdaara', dι dakhabaa gι Ejayʋʋ kha ga, kɛ wi bιɛl dιkor donι nɔɔ dι faarɔ ɔɔ hʋ hana mɔ̃ a donι caca bikuuna'.
Nι jιrɛ a gι pιrɔ ɔbɔɔkɛ a ƴaalnι a bir a 'lɛ ɔɔ thιι bɔna, a kɔɔ bʋʋrɛ sιrakɛ a kɔɔ ƴaal gɛr na yilẽbe, sι ga do thɩ̃ɛ na punone na debi bã.
Ga do gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔɔkɛ tibil na punoni na thar nι wɔrɔ̃a', kɛ dɔnι dɔ haara', kɛ hanι kukukulə', dι dabirə ga, dι thãgba jɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃ι ga,
dι tutuu ʋʋn ga, dɩ nɔ khena ga, mɔ̃kɛ wɛkɛ kɔɔ nɩɛnɛnɩ kɔɔ bɩɛlnɩ dɩ ɩna-n bir a nɩ gɩrakɛ bã;
gɩdonɩ wa mar ga thɩmɩɩlera sɔnɩ thaka', gɩ yɩ: “Ado nʋm gɩrakɛ sa thar gɔ̃gʋɔnaale bokana wa dʋʋrnaa a na kʋ.”
Dι thɩ̃ɛɛlera wι garnι yire n kɔɔ kʋrɛ maar ka, dι Mʋιjι ba sona ayι, maar hor ga tɔ nɛr na kpɛɛ dι ιna-n jẽ.
Sι ne wer Sιyɔ̃ gɔ̃gʋ̃ɔ nι wɔrɔ̃, kɛ dɔnι Thãgba yidaarι dι, kɛ dɔnι ƴũ Jerujalɛm, ka thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃ hanι,

a wɔrɔna wιrɛ gbɛbanι kha dι wa-n kãka, kɛ dɔnι Thãgbaa caca bikuunsɔɔ kpa jɛ pa, kɛ awι i kherenι Thãgbaa dʋɔ; nι wɔrɔnɛ dakha kιιldaarιkɛ dɔnι tιbιla fɛʋʋ Thãgba, a wɔrɔna tιι saraakɛ Thãgba cʋʋnι dιphã dι wι bɔr a dã thu,
a wɔrɔna Jejuukɛ dɔnɩ ƴɛƴɛɛ dɩɩ do nɔɔ dɩ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛ phaa hale, a wɔrɔna tɔmɩ̃ jɛbɩrɛɛkɛ n jɩɛnnɩ khe a ba Abɛlɩda.
Na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn, na-n bo ʋrɛɛkɛ n mɩana', gɩdonɩ ado wɛkɛ kɔɔ bɔnɩ Thãgbaadaakɛ ʋrɛ kɔɔ hanɩ thɩɩra n mɩɩ wɩnɩ na kɔɔ puno a fuə', mɔ̃ ser na fʋ sɩ na fuu ado sɩ bo ʋrɛɛkɛ tɔɔnɩ ƴũ sɩ da-n mɩɩ.
Ɔɔ nɔ kɔɔ jɩɩn thɩɩkɛra dabɔɔlera; dɩ nɛnɛ̃ a ʋlfɛrɛ gɩrɛ wo ayɩ, ɩna bire na jẽ thɩɩ babɩɛl wo, sɩ ga do thɩɩ gɩ dɩphã dɩbara ga sɩ na thãgbara ƴũ.
Dɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ: “Babɩɛl wo” n nɩnanɛ dɩ thɩ̃ tinəne na jɩɩn a na hɛllɔ, sɩɩ do gɩrɛ na dɔnɩ dajenana' gɛr jɩlɛ.
Gɛr gɩ mɔ̃kɛ sɩ hanɩ gɩrɛ dɩ sa-n 'lɛ fãga dɩɩkɛ na dɔnɩ datutugonaa ga, dɔ sɩ hana fɔfʋɔr haar sa-n fʋɔrna Thãgba gɩ do fʋɔrɛɛkɛ na daaraanɩ haar, na cʋrɛ nakha maar.
Gɩdonɩ asɩ Thãgba dor dakha dɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ kʋɛ dɔɔ.
Na-n yɩra a na na kha mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ omɩna.
Na-n pərə a na tea kpakpala, gɩdonɩ thalee cʋʋ ʋkhasɔ n kɔɔ teero thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ sɩ wa-n kɔɔ ja'.
Na-n jɛna wɩrɛ hanɩ khaɩra gɩ ho khaɩdarara ha nɩ ner; na-n jɛna wɩrɛ wɩ-n kpooronɩ gɩdonɩ nɛrɛ dakha tomɩrra nɩ hana.
Dɔ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na-n hɩɩn her gɩ do thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hananɩ cʋrɛ, dɩ thɩ̃ bise na-n lõ herraala'. Gιdonι Thãgba na kιιlnanɛ wιrɛ dɔnι bɔdɛl cʋʋdara, na khɛ kpιι ƴaaldara, na kũu kpιι ƴaaldara.
Anι ιιr para na-n do war laarɛ n ho ga hərə nera', sι nι dɔ ga-n da nar na gιrɛ nι hananι, gιdonι Thãgbaa thɛthɛ sɔ ayι: “A gι dʋ mɔ̃ dʋ mɔ̃, sι ma hana faarɛ na faa fa'; ma sι far dιbara kpιιraka'.”
Dι gɛr gι sι punone so na tu jιιr ayι: “Kɔ̃tιn dʋɔn ɩ̃ bubul, maar na fʋ mι thιɛna ga; anye tibil na puno na cʋʋ mɩ?”
Na-n jɛna anɩ thɔthɔɔdaraakɛ kɔɔ mɩa nɩnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ. Nɩ hɩnɛ mɔ̃ awɩ yi khu pa hanɩ, sɩ na phɛla awɩ ha pɛ.
