Mɔ̃ Jeju Kirisiti hanɩ de, mɛna a ha nĩ na bɔɔ khorr.
Na-n do dɩɩr kpɩɩsɔ dɩɩdɩɩ n cʋʋ nɩ nɩ lɛ̃ hʋɛra ga, gɩdonɩ gɩ bɔrɛra gɩ do Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ cʋɛ sɩ dɩ sɩ tɩ, sɩ ga-n do dɩko thɩmɩɩr gɩ, kɛ na kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ wɛkɛ ma garnɩ yʋʋ bɔaa ga.
Sɩ hananɛ bonɩ ji paar, kɛ wɩrɛ n dɔnɩ thɔma kẽkẽ waaraale na hananɩ hʋɛ a na khoro thɩ̃a'.
Nʋmaakɛ gbõdaar n gbanɩ, ga tɔmɩ̃ a lona pa phuurə a jinə sopugo hɛl bonɩɛ, khuirə wɩ-n thena gɩ dɩ wɩ thii dɩɩ hɩ̃.
Gɛrra gɩ dɩ Jeju dakha, mɔ̃ a na fʋnɩ sɩ na gba ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ tɔmɩ̃ a phʋɔlna tɩbɩla wɩ phu, kɔɔ gaar bʋɔ dɩ khuirə.
Gɛr gɩ sɩ thɛ a na jalalaa le khuirə a to beesi ca bɩɛlla na ɔɔda.
Gɩdonɩ sa hana kɛ thɩɩra dɩɩkɛ na jalanɩ ƴɛrra', sɩ dɩɩkɛ na ɩnanɩ sɩ-n ƴaal.
Gɛr gɩ sɩ gba khɩɩrɛ gɩ do bonɩ ji thɩ̃ɛ sa-n khɩɩna Thãgba bɔɔ fɛʋ, gɩ do Jeju dɔ nɔɔ, a thɩɛna gaa khɩɩrɛɛkɛ asɩ delẽbi n khɩɩnɩ ɔɔ i gɩ.
Sɩ na-n diinə bɔ cʋʋrɛ na tibil bullə', gɩdonɩ ga bonɩ ji caale n da Thãgba haar.

Na-n nɛ anɩ thɔthɔɔdara nũu, nɩ wuro war a jɔ, gɩdonɩ wɛr n bɛra anɩ thu mɔ̃ wɩ donɩ wɩrɛ na mɩanɩ Thãgbara mɔ̃ awɩ thɔ̃ hanɩ. A na cʋʋ mɛ̃, wa-n jɩɛ do awɩ thɔ̃ na daʋ ga do war sɩɩra', gɩdonɩ gele thale na ɩna nar bɔɔ fɩɩʋraka'.
Nɩ bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba na pɛ sar. Sɩ jɩɛ jɩ dɩ sɩ hananɛ haarɩkɛ na-n heene sɩnɩ sora', mɔ̃ sɩ-n ƴaalnɩ dɩ sa hana fɩl bʋɔ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra.
Thɩ̃ɛ gɩ dɩ ma-n bɩɛl nɩ na haar fɛʋ nɩ cʋɛ Thãgba n ha mɩ hʋɛ ɩ̃ puno ɩ̃ pɔ anɩ pa kɔrɔ.
Dɔ Thãgbaakɛ ha ɩɩ n thernɩ, kɛ kɔɔ ɩrɛnɩ Jeju asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩkɛ dɔnɩ bana khedaar kɔ̃tɩn khirera, dɩɩ do tɔmɩnɩkɛ n nɛnanɩ nɔ bɩɛl ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ khorrdaara gɩ the,
n ha nɩ thɩ̃ bɔɩ fɛʋʋkɛ dananɩ nɩ puno na-n cʋʋ ɔɔ tuur, a na-n cʋʋ sar dakha gɩrɛ daaraanɩ, ga-n the Jeju Kirisitira; dɔ ɔr n hɩ̃ i dʋbɩrɛ bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Mɩ-n bɩɛl nɛr omɩna dɩ na fʋ haar fɩl dɩɩr thɩmɩɩrraakɛ mɩ khere narnɩ ga donɩ gɩ kpɛra'.
Nɩ jɛna dɩ wɩ tire Timothe asɩ omi khaɩra a faa. Ado a ɩnɛ kɔrɔ sa pɔr kha a na yɩ nɩ.
Nɩ fʋɔrɛ anɩ thɔthɔɔdarasɔ fɛʋ na tɩɩ phuusɔ fɛʋ. Ɩtalɩdara fʋɔr nɛr.
Thãgba na-n jɛ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bʋɔra. Amɛn.
Mɛr Jakɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃daar na Jeju Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩnɩda, thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a fʋɔrna caar yʋɔr yenyɔɔkɛ bɩ̃bɩlanɛnɩ a ha paar fɛʋ.
Ɩ̃ omisɔ, bɔ gaar caar dɩɩdɩɩkɛ nɩ-n yɩnɩ, nɩ gba gɩ ga-n do nar da kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ,
na-n jɩnana, ado anɩ ha pɛ bo jɩɩl ɔbɔɔkɛ nɩ 'lɛnɩ bɩ̃ ber pɩ, ga dor gɩrɛ na hana nɩhɩ ha fʋrɛ;
dɩ nɩ dɔ ha fʋrɛ n do ɔɔ thɔ̃ gɩ jɩɩ dã, nɩ jɩɩ bɔr nɩ ka nɩ dã, na thʋ̃ thɩɛna ga.
Dɩ ado tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛra 'lee kpɛsɛrɛ, dɔ ntɛ n bɩɛl Thãgbaraakɛ n 'laanɛnɩ na haar sɩ phaanɛ na-n hala', dɩ Thãgba na haarɛ.
Sɩ a bɩɛlnɛ gɩ na ha pɛrɛ sɩ a na-n baalɔ fɩɩʋraka', gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n baalɔnɩ a hʋrɛ lanyɔ̃ khɔrɔ̃ɔkɛ jɩɛ n benɩ dɩ ga-n phe bababa.
Tibil ca ole na-n kpɩɛr ɩna 'lɛr dɩkharakɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ pa ga.
Tibil gɩɩkɛ n ƴeƴerenenɩ, aa-n jɩɩl pa bɩɛla'.
Dɔ omineekɛ wa-n thernana' na-n kãka ɔɔ ɩɩrra,
dɩ lẽle dakha na-n kãkanɛ ɔɔ wurrə; lẽle dor ʋrɛ na phɔnɩ na ka hɔ̃ phɩ̃ khaa.
Wireekɛ n phananɩ na kporre phãphãphã a-n khιrɛ hʋɔn, dɩ phɩ̃ɩ n jɛ dɩɩ do ɔɔ ɓɔ̃ kʋɛrɛ koo; mɛ̃ lẽle na ɔ̃'ɔɔlɔ̃ ɔɔ thɩ̃ cʋʋ pa a na jɛ.
Gɩ da tibilləəkɛ n fʋɔnnɩ haar fifiləlela, gɩdonr ado a 'lɛ bɩ̃ ber pɩ, a na 'lɛr khor cacadaar dʋʋrra, kɛ dɔnɩ yidaa, kɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ ʋlfɛnɩ ɩna har wɩrɛ n naan nɩnɩ.
Sɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ tibil n yɩnɩ fifiləle a na-n yɩ, Thãgba n fifiləne na'; gɩdonɩ Thãgba na ha fifilə paar puure n dʋʋraa fifιləla', dɩ ɔɔ thɛthɛrakɛ na-n fifɩlə tibilə'.
Tibil n 'lɛr fifiləle ɔbɔɔkɛ thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛ n kʋʋnɩ thue dɩɩ fʋʋ a ɩɩrɔ.
Dɩ ado thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛlera hana pɛmɛr sopugo a-n kɔ̃, dɩ a sopugo kɔ̃ pɩ dɩɩ do khir a kɔ̃.
Ɩ̃ omisɔɔkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ na-n dədəa koe;
thɩ̃ bɔɩ fɛʋʋkɛ sɩ-n 'lɛnɩ na khaarda ɓɔna fɛʋ ƴũ gɩ the dahɩrɛ Thɩrɛɛ pa, kɛ na dɔnɩ dadebinaa ga, aa-n file mɔ̃ jəəre n filena'.
Ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ ƴaalla gɩ the dɩ kɔ̃ sɩ dɩɩ do sobɔ thɩmɩɩrra gɩ the, dɩ mɛ̃ ga do sɛr hʋɔn cacadara ɔɔ thɩ̃ tinəsɔraakɛ a tini.
Gɛr gɩ ɩ̃ omisɔɔkɛ mι-n nanɩ, dɔ tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl na-n pɛ thɩmɩɩr nũu kɔrɔ, sɩ wa-n phana kɔrɔ a na mɩɩ thɩ̃a', wa-n phana kɔrɔ a na gba nĩkhiə'.
Gɩdonɩ tibil nĩkhii na-n cʋʋ dasarʋʋkɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ ga-n cʋɛa'
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ, nɩ dɔna thɩ̃ bise fɛʋ na bɩ̃ kpallɛsɔ fɛʋ a faa, sɩ na tea na hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ sorɩkɛ n direni anɩ bɩnɔ, kɛ hananɩ fãga a na taa nɩ.
Na-n dɔ Thãgbaa so cʋʋdara, na-n do nũ pɛdara dɩbara gɩ ho dɩbara nɩ-n fɩɩla'.
Gɩdonɩ ado tibil na pɛ Thãgbaa so nũu sɩ aa-n cʋa', a hʋrɛ tibilikɛ n hɩnɛnɩ ɔɔ ƴɛ hɩɩnʋna dɩ jɩ mɔ̃ a hanɩ.
A a hɩɩn sɩ na tɔ gbe dɩɩ do a diinəne dapaara mɔ̃ a hanɩ.
Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ ganɩ ɔɔ yi jɔfʋ ɓʋɔna, kɛ dɔnɩ wa do jɔfʋ da-n yɩrrɔ, dɩ ga-n do aa-n pɛ nũu a bir a diinə ga, sɩ a na-n cʋʋ gιrɛ gι-n sonι, wa tibil caale na 'lɛr bɔnanɛ ɔɔ cʋʋrara a-n cʋʋnι.
Ado tibil yι Thãgba fɔr ha nι, sι aa-n fʋ ɔɔ delẽbi bɔɔbɔa', ɔɔbara a-n fιιl, ntɛɛ Thãgba fʋɔrιle mɔlɔ gι.
Thãgba fʋɔr bʋɔɔkɛ na hananι dι paar Thãgba Thιrɛɛ ƴɛra ga dʋɔn khilə̃bi hιιnɛ na khikhɛra awι bɔ gaarra, fι fʋna dakha dιbara fa bise na thιιkɛɛ thɩ̃ bisə'.
Ɩ̃ omisɔ, nɛrkɛ pɛnι haar asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitiraakɛ dɔnι i dʋbιdaar, na-n hana tibil hιιnɛ dιιdιa'.
Ado tibilikɛ tɔnι dɛ nyɛ̃bi tʋʋ na kẽkẽ ɓʋ̃ɔ, kɛ dɔnɩ lẽledaar lõ anɩ gbɛbɩ pa, dɩ a bɔdaar dakha to ɔɔ kẽkẽ sɛlɛ a lona,
dɩ ado nɩ hɩɩnɛ ʋrɛ tɔnɩ kẽkẽ ɓʋ̃ɔɔle a sʋʋraa ayɩ: Tɔɔ kɩɛr too pa ɓʋɔnaakɛ lee; sa ka so bɔdaarra: Fer n jɩlɛ liir; agɩbo: Tɔɔ kɩɛr thʋnɔ ɩ̃ nɛ ballɔ.
Ga do gele n dɔ tibil hɩɩnɛ dɩɩdɩɩ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩnaa? Dɩ ga do kɩɩl gõgolõ nɩ-n kɩɩlaa?
Ɩ̃ omisɔɔkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, nɩ pɛ nũu: Thãgba na kɔɔ phiir wɩrɛ dɔnɩ bɔdara thɩɩraakɛ dɩ wa debi na do lɛ̃lɛ ha pɛdaara na wɩrɛ na lonanɩ Thãgba fãgadaarɩ dɩraakɛ a kɔɔ ʋlfɛnanɩ wɩrɛ n naanɛɛnaa?
Sɩ ner na-n beesi bɔdaarɩ. Ga do lɛ̃lɛ n hʋɔlɛ nar dɩ wɩ pɛ nar nyɛ̃ kheu a haal nɩ na jalna kɩɩl paarraa?
Ga do wɛr n kpɛ i ɓʋ̃ɔɔkɛ wɩ ha nɩnaa?
Ado ger nɩ-n cʋʋrɛ gɩrɛ Thãgba fãgadaar jɔfʋ sonɩ ɔɔ sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Fa-n na afɩ 'walãkha tibil mɔ̃kɛ fɩ-n nanɩ afɩbara”, ga dor nɩ-n cʋʋrɛ bɔɔ.
Sι ado nι hananɛ tibil hιιnɛ dιιdιι sopugo nι-n cʋʋ, dι jɔfʋ na heen ner sor anι nũ nʋʋrra.
Gιdonι tibil wo tibilikɛ n hιnɛnɩ jɔfʋ fɛʋ sɩ a a dɩ jɔfʋ bɩɛlla 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ, jɔfʋ fɛʋ a dɩrɔ.

Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ: “Fa-n hana khɛ kpɩɩ ƴaala', fa-n hana kũu kpιι ƴaala'”, ɔrra sɔ dakha wo ayι: “Fa-n kʋ tibilə'.” Dɩ ado fa-n ƴaal khɛ kpɩa', fa-n ƴaal kũu kpɩa', sɩɩ do tibil fɩ kʋ, jɔfʋ kʋɛdaarra fɩ do.
Mɛ̃ gɩ na-n mɩa thɩmɩa a na cʋɛna thɩ̃ɛ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ donɩ tɩbɩlaakɛ wa do jɔfʋ na kɩɩlnanɩ.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ bɔ jɩɩra', ɔɔ kɩɩlɩkɛ a na 'lɛnɩ ga hana bɔ jɩɩr dakha ga, dɩ bɔ jɩɩr n punone kɩɩlʋ.
Ɩ̃ omisɔ, anyee bɔ ca ga taa tibil da so nayɩ, ɩnɩ hananɛ ha pɛrɛ, sɩ gɩ do thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ na hala'. A na punone na 'lɛ taarɛ na ha pɛ ca ole ya?
Ado õkona wɛ, a õkhɛna wɛ a 'lee kɩ̃kɩɩn, a 'leena wire fɛʋ dɩkɔ,
dɩ tibil bɩɛl nɛrɛra so war ayɩ: Nɩ kɔna bɔɔ, a tɔ kɩ̃kɩɩn gɩ kpor nar, a khɔna dakha dɩkɔ a he; sɩ na ha wɩ gɩrɛ teananɩ gɩ bul wa', anyee bɔ ca gele na taa?
Mɛ̃ gɩ ha na ha pɛrɛ, ado ga hana thɩ̃ cʋʋra', gɩ khire juu.

Sɩ ʋkha na sor: Fe wer fɛr hana ha pɛrɛ, sɩ mɛrɛ dɩ ɩ̃ hana thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ. Sɩ ma birseere: Dɩ nɛ mar mɔ̃ afɩ ha pɛ fʋnɩ sa hale, sɩ ga hana thɩ̃ cʋʋra'. Sι mɛrɛ ma nιna fɛr na ɩ̃ thɩ̃ cʋʋ mɔ̃ ɩ̃ ha pɛ hanι.
Fι pɛrɛ haar Thãgba bιɛl haanlaa? Gι bɔrɛ. Kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔ n pɛrɛ mɛ̃ haar wer sι dι wa-n jẽ.
Sι fɛr də̃bəəlu, fa-n ƴaal fι jι dι ado ha pɛrɛ na-n hana thɩ̃ cʋʋra', ga do bɔ taa ha pɛrɛ gaagaa?
Thãgba na kɔɔ we asι mama thι kɔ̃tɩ̃ Abιraham tιι sarʋ thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛra, dιι do gιrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ gbanι ɔɔ bikuun Ɩjakι a jinə bonιɛ gι thaa?
Fa yι gaa, ɔɔ ha pɛ na thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ fʋrɛ kha, dι dakha ɔɔ thɩ̃ cʋʋra dor nɔɔ dι ɔɔ ha pɛ thʋ̃ bɔr ka.
Mɛ̃ gιrɛ kherenenι Thãgbaa sɛbɛra dã oti ayι: “Abιraham kɔɔ pɛr Thãgba haar dιι do gɛr Thãgba hιιn sa wιι tιι sarʋ” na Thãgbaa kuun.
Na yι gaa, thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛra Thãgba n hɩɩn tibil dɩ do tɩɩ sarʋ, ga do ha pɛrɛra gɩ dɩbara ga.
Rahabɩ khɛ pɔɩ, ga do ɔr dakha Thãgba hɩɩnʋʋnɛ dɩ do tɩɩ sarʋ gιrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ cʋʋnι, kɛ dɔnι mɔ̃ a teenι thɔ̃thɔna a cʋʋ wι dι wι fuunə hʋ kpιaa?
Gιdonι mɔ̃ tomιr na-n hananι thueə', dιι do gι khire, mɛ̃ gι ha pɛrɛɛkɛ na-n hananι thɩ̃ cʋʋra', ha pɛ khire gι.
Ɩ̃ omisɔ, tibil jɔjʋɔ na-n ƴaal ιnι-n dɔ dιιrdara ga, gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sɛr dɩɩrdara na 'lɛr kɩɩlʋ dɩ ga khɩɩr na ka.
Sɛrɛ fɛʋ sɩ-n dɩrɛ thɩ̃ jɔjʋɔra ka. A tibil na-n dɩ thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛra ga ɔr dɔ tɩɩ bʋɔ ka, a na puno ɔɔ tomɩ na fʋ kĩkĩ.
A sɩ pɛ gãgʋʋ ther nɔɔ wa-n nɛ sɩ nũu, sɩ-n punone dɩ sɩ ma awɩ tomɩra koo.
Nɩ yɛ dakha mɔ̃ bato kɔ̃tɩna n hanɩ; gɩ-n kɔ̃tɩnɩnakɛ thale dɩ jɛ kʋkʋʋlʋ n cʋʋ gɩ dɩ ga-n ca, sɩ fɩɩʋ vɩrdaa n ha, kɛ vɩvɩr n vɩrnanɩ dɩ ga-n jal kãkɛ a-n ƴaalnɩ ga-n jala.
Mɛ̃ dakha delẽbire ha; tomɩ ɓã buu gɩ fɩɩʋ, sɩ a-n punone nɔ fa mɩɩrɛ ka. Nɩ hɩnɛ mɔ̃ dɔkpõbire n thiini bə̃ kʋkʋʋ tə̃ə.
Dɩ delẽbire dakha dɔɔ gɩ. Delẽbire hʋrɛ puureekɛ henɩ gɩrɛ thɩɩra; a har asɩ tomɩ ɓãsɔra da-n bise tomɩr koo. Ɔr n ləbire si asɩ yi hanana koo na dɔɔkɛ bu pa dɔɔ n ləbinaanɩ.
Hɔ̃ nʋ̃ caar ɓibi, na 'lomĩ caarsɔ, na thɩ̃ ƴɩrɛ n puulonenisɔ, na thɩ̃ ƴɩrɛ hanɩ lanyʋɔnna, thɩ̃ɛsɔ gɩɩkɛ tibil na punoni na jo dɩ wɩ 'lire puno wɩrakɛ dɩ wɩ jo.
Sɩ delẽbire tibil na-n puno dɩ maaraa dɩ joa', thɩ̃ puu gɩ aa ha ma paara', khi kpal haar a hinə koo.
Ɔrra sɩ-n khɩɩna Kɔ̃tɩn asɩ Thɩ, dɩ ɔrra wo sɩ-n nɩɩrna tɩbɩlaakɛ Thãgba tini dɩ wɩ hʋʋ.
Nɔ bɩɛllaalera khɩɩrɛ na nɩɩrɛ n the. Ɩ̃ omisɔ ga teena ga-n hana thala'.
Yɔ bu ka bɩɛlla na-n bure yɔ daa wo a bir a na-n bunə yɔ ƴʋ̃ɔ ya?
Barʋ punone se thɩn ya ɩ̃ omisɔ? Dɩ 'lʋɔ punone se baar ya? Mɛ̃ gɩ, yɔ bu kaarɩkɛ n bonɩ lanyʋɔn na puno na bu yɔ yɔnana'.
Ʋmɔ̃ɔ tibil anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn hana kpɛsɛrɛ a dona thɩ̃ jɩn? Dɔ ɔɔ fɩl bɔ na ɔɔ thɔ̃ɔkɛ a-n cʋʋnι na hɛlɛlɛ fιlɛ na-n nιna dι tιι kpɛsɛ haa.
Sι ado nɩ hananɛ gbugi tə̃tə̃tə̃ anι hara na dɩbara na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ, na-n too na məbi khaar a kuur sɔ̃sɔ na pɛ sobɔrra ga.
Kpɛsɛ ca gele ga do ƴũ gι tha', thιdaa gι, a do tibilikɛ na hananι Thãgbaa Thuəəda, kɔ̃tɛɛbiisɔɔ pa gι the.
Gιdonι kãkɛ gbugi n hanɩ na dɩbara na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ, liir nyanyaanɛ na puu cʋʋ caar fɛʋ n the.

Sɩ kpɛsɛrɛɛkɛ thɛnɩ ƴũ mɔ̃ a-n hanɩnakɛ dʋɔn: Aa-n hana dɩ paara', ha ie haar a do, a-n hananɛ bɩ̃ bʋɔ, ɔɔda na-n khɩɩra', bɔ jɩɩr jʋɔraarɛ, a-n hananɛ dakha bɔ cʋʋrɛ, datelẽ haar n thɛ ɔɔ pa, aa hana bɩnɛ yenyɔa'.
Wɩrɛ n cʋɛnɩ gɩrɛ n 'laanɛnɩ ha ɩɩ, ha ɩɩ wɩ-n diirnə, dɩɩ do gɩrɛ gɩ-n senɩ dʋɔn fɩl sarʋ.
Anye n ɩnana kɩla na kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn saagado anɩ thɩ̃ ƴaal kpãkpãa kheekɛra n hərəne nini ga?
Nɩ-n pɩɛrɛ haar sɩ na yɩ ga; tɩɩ kɔ ha nɩ na yeye, sɩ na puno na 'lɛ thɩ̃ɛ kpɩɩraka'. Nɩ hananɛ kɛ̃kɛrɛnɛ na kɩla sɩ na hana dɩkha dɩ ga do anɩda fɩɩʋraka', gɩdonɩ na-n bɩɛl Thãgba ga.
Nɩ-n bɩɛlɛ sɩ na-n 'la' gɩdonɩ kpιɛr puu nι-n bιɛlna, nι gba na-n kʋɛ anι thɩ̃ ƴaal kpãkpãa khera.
Nι hʋrɛ khɛrιkɛ hananι kuun sι da-n ƴaal kũu kpιι. Na jι dιι do a tibil na thιιkɛɛ thɩ̃, gι-n pɛr laarɛ na Thãgba gaa? Tibil wo tibilikɛ n naannι thιιkɛɛ thɩ̃, a-n debire dι do Thãgbaa lãlaardaar.
Thueekɛ Thãgba tinəni tibil, nι pɛrɛ haar mɔlɔ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ so ayι, a hananɛ gbugi thɩ̃ ƴaalɛ ya?
Sι Thãgba n 'laarɛ bɔ jιιr dιι jɔr dιι ha mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ sɛbɛ sonι ayι: “Thãgba n bãbaranɛ i ƴaaldara, sι a-n jιrɛ dιbara jodara bʋɔra.”
Dι gɛr gι na-n jɔ anιbara Thãgbara, nι pιɛrɛ Satã kĩkĩ a fuu saa faa nι.
Na-n wɔrɔnɛ Thãgba a na wɔrɔ̃ nɛr. Nɛr sopugodara, na-n hulo nyɛ̃ɛ, nι dɔ anι ha na-n phu nɛrkɛ n ƴeƴerenenι.
Nι yɛ mɔ̃ nι donι bɔ kʋ tɩbɩla; na-n bɛ dɩ na-n khɩa. Nɩ dɔ anɩ mãthɩ̃ n debi gɩ do benɩɛ, anɩ da n debi gɩ do gbobire.
Na-n jɔ dɩbara Kɔ̃tɩnɩ ƴɛra dɩ ɔr na ɩrɛ nɩ.

Omɩna na-n mɩɩ thɩmɩɩ puunə na pɛ khasɔa'. Ʋrɛ mɩanɩ dapuu ɔɔ omina, agɩbo dɩ 'laa da-n yɩ ɔɔ omiida, jɔfʋ a mɩɩrɔ puure da-n kɩɩlna gɩrɛ jɔfʋ sonɩ. Dɩ a fa kɩɩlna gɩrɛ jɔfʋ sonɩ, ga do jɔfʋ hɩ̃hɩn ha fa', sɩ kɩɩldaar ha fɩ.
Bɩɛl dɩbara dʋɔn jɔfʋ 'laadaar na kɩɩldaar; ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ na punoneni na cʋʋ tibil da 'lɛ taarɛ, agɩbo a bu. Sɩ fɛrɛ, amɛ fɛrkɛ do dɩ fɩ 'laa na yɩ afɩ 'walãkha tibilida.
Dɩ nɛnɛ̃, nɛrkɛ n sɔnɩ dɩ nɩ yɩ: Nĩ agɩbo cʋɔ sa jaal dɩ ʋrɛra, na too yɛ bɩɛl sɩ ƴabɩ sa-n 'lɛ mũsumo,
sɩ na jɩ mɔ̃ anɩ yi na hanɩ cʋɔa'. Anye anɩ yi do? Ɩsiirikɛ n bananɩ bɔɔ gbe fɩɩʋ sɩ dɩɩ kur nɩ do.
Nɩ teenanɛ nɩ ka na sɔ: A Kɔ̃tɩn tu dɩ sɩ hana yire, sa cʋʋrɛ gekɛ na gekɛ.
Sɩ nɛnɛ̃ na-n ƴaal ire kpãkpalã ga, dɩ na-n sona kuune. I ƴaal caar thakɛ puurore ka.
Mɛ̃ gɩ ʋrɛ jɛnɩ thɩ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛ sɩ aa-n cʋa', sopugo a-n cʋʋ.
Dɩ nɛnɛ̃, nɛr lɛ̃lɛ, nɩ pɛ nũu, na-n khɩa a na bɛna lɩɛrɛra puureraakɛ na dana nɩnɩ.
Anɩ lẽle thɩ̃ n hɩrɛ dɩ ophɛphɛlɛɛ n khor anɩ kẽkẽsɔ.
Anɩ dɛ na anɩ war dɩrɛ dʋʋn, dɩ awɩ do dɩɩle ɩɩrɛ dɩ ga-n pɛ nar sor, dɩ gɛr na kʋɛa anɩ tomɩ mɔ̃ dɔɔ n hɩnɩ thɩ̃ɛ. Pɩpɩɩ bɔɔ gɩ, sɩ nɩ khɩɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛ a thɩɩn.
Nɩ hɩnɛ thɔ̃daraakɛ kɔɔ khanɩ anɩ jʋ sɩ nɩ tɔ̃ wɩ lɩmɩnɛ n hulene, dɩ jʋ khaa hulẽbirə jʋʋnɛ a lõ Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ dɔnɩ fãga koo hɩ̃daarɩ nũ kaar.
Nɩ hananɛ nũfe thɩ̃ɛ kɛ thɩɩra a too kãkarra; nι hire phi a khɔ̃, sιι do kʋkʋ togʋʋ nι too.
Nι kɔɔ heene tιɩ sarʋ sor a kʋ, sɩ aa kɔɔ so thɩ̃a'.
Na-n fɔ haar omɩna phaphapharakɛ Kɔ̃tɩn na bire na ɩ̃. Nɩ hɩnɛ kokol n fʋrɛ haar sɩ da-n pɩɛr phaphapha lɩɛra n haa thĩ bʋɔ. A-n fʋ garɛ haar waa dɩ thãgba khaa na pɩpɩɩ thãgba n dana.
Nɛrɛ dakha na-n fɔ haar ɔmɛ̃ a jɩlɛ kɩbɩ, gɩdonɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ ɩ̃ bɔ wɔrɔnɛ.
Na-n hũhuun na pɛ khasɔa' omɩna, dɩ mɛ̃ na 'lɛ kɩɩlʋa'. Nɩ hɩnɛ kɩɩldaar har lõfonɔɔ a jɩɩl.
Ɩ̃ omisɔ, nɩ gba Thãgbaa bobonasɔɔkɛ kɔɔ mɩanɩ thɩ̃ɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ irəə bɔ gaar na awɩ ha fʋ, gɩ do nar thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ.

Nɩ hɩnɛ, sɩ-n sor dɩ sɩ yɩ: Gɩ da wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ gaarɛnɩ bʋɔ na ha fʋrɛ. Nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛrɛ mɔ̃ Jɔbɩ kɔɔ fʋnɩ haar, dɩ nɩ jɩrɛ dakha gɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩn kɔɔ cʋʋraanɩ pɩpɩɩ paar, gɩdonɩ bɔ fʋdaar Kɔ̃tɩn do na bɔ jɩdaar.
Thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩɩnakɛ ɩ̃ omisɔ dʋɔn, na-n ʋlfɛna thãgbara ƴũ dι thιɩkɛ ga; na-n ʋlfɛna dιkhaa thɩ̃ kpιιraka', sι nι dɔ anι “ɔɔ” n do “ɔɔ”, anι “ooho” n do “ooho”, dι mɛ̃ na 'lɛ kιιlʋa'.
Tibil ʋkha har anι thɩ̃thιιn da-n gaar bʋɔ ya? Ntɛ na-n bιɛlnɛ Thãgba. Tibil ʋkha hale dι daʋ fʋʋ ya? Ntɛ na-n khιna Thãgba nιɛ.
Tibil ʋkha har anι thɩ̃thιιn dι ga-n khʋʋ ya? Dɔ ntɛ n we we gbɛbιdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ dι wa bιɛl Thãgba na pιɛraa wι pɛnanaa niin na Kɔ̃tιnι i.
Ha pɛ bιɛlɛ na taarɛ khodaar dɔɔ, dι Kɔ̃tιn na cʋgʋʋrɛ dι na ιιr, dι ado a cʋʋrɛ sopugo Thãgba na faarɛ na haa.
Gɛr gι na-n cana kha sopugosɔ, sa bιɛlnɛ Thãgba na pɛ khasɔ, mɛ̃ khoo na kpɛɛ nar. Tιι sarʋʋ Thãgba bɩɛl hananɛ fãga ka dɩɩ cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ.
Tibil Elι do dakha mɔ̃kɛ sι hanι, sι a kɔɔ bιɛlɛ Thãgba na yιrrɛ ƴɛrr thãgba nyʋɔn na-n ɩ̃a', dι thãgba na kɔɔ ɩ̃ ger dιɩ cʋʋna yɛna yẽther na pora maadõa'.
Sɩ agɩpɩ a bire bɩɛl Thãgba dɩ thãgbara ƴũ 'laa nyʋɔn dɩphã dɩ thɩɩ bir phu thɩ̃ɛ.
Ɩ̃ omisɔ, ado tibil ha anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn a lɛ̃ sa faa sobɔr dɩ tɩɩ kpɩɩ bir kpaa a pɛ hʋɛra,
nɩ jɛna dɩ ntɛɛle na kpanɩ sopugodaar dɔɔle ɔɔ bu pa a na birnə, tibil a taa khirrə, dɩ ga dor sopugo jɔjʋɔ thero.
Mɛr Pɩɛrɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔn thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha nɛrɛɛkɛ Thãgba phiirni, kɛ bɩ̃bɩlanɛnɩ gɩrɛ a do kpakpala Pɔ̃, na Galasɩ, na Kapadɔsɩ, na Ajɩ, na Bitini.
Thãgba Thɩrɛ kɔɔ phire ni dɩɩ do ɔɔ thɩ̃ mãa jιra gι ɩhe, Thu Phuu n lee nɩ kpɩɩ, na-n nι Jeju Kirisiti nũu, ɔɔ tɔmɩ̃ dakha na-n jɛbɩ nar. Thãgba na-n jɛ nɩ bʋɔra jɔɔ, a na-n hana nɩ dakha ha ɩɩ jɔɔ.
Thãgba asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii Thɩ hɩna khɩɩrɛ, ɔɔ bɔ dona kɔ̃tɩnaakɛ a bironi kɔ̃ sɩ wo dɩɩ do Jeju Kirisitii khi ɩɩrra gɩ the, dɩ sa hana nũ pɛ yire,
dɩ sa 'lɛ dakha thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na punoneni na kʋɛa', ga puno dakha na bisə', bɔɔkɛ gɩ bɔrnɩ ga puno wo a na deba', dɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ gɩ thɩɩn anɩ thɩɩn,
nɛrɛɛkɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar dɩ Thãgba na-n bɛr nɩ na ɔɔ fãga nɩ puno nɩ 'lɛ taarɛɛkɛ na yɩranɩ dɩphã pɩpɩɩ bɔɔ.
Dɩ nɩ hana garɛ kãkar sɩrakɛ gɩ teenanɛ bɔɔ gbe nɩ yɛ bɔ gaar caar dɩɩdɩɩkɛ n hana nɩnɩ gbobire,

gɩ mɩɛ anɩ ha pɛ gɩ hɩɩn, kɛ ɔɔ the nɔ khɩɩrnɩ a jɔ dɛɛkɛ n kʋɛanɩ, kɛ wɩ-n gbanɩ dɔɔ dɩ wɩ mɩɛna hɩɩn, thale anɩ ha pɛ na hana khɩɩrɛ, a na do i dʋbɩ thɩ̃ɛ, na cʋ thɩ̃ɛ bɔɔraakɛ Jeju Kirisiti na-n mɩ.
Nɩ-n naarɛ sɩrakɛ na kɔɔ yɩa', na yɩɩnɩ gɩra', sɩ nɩ pɩɛrɛ haar, dɩ daʋʋkɛ na hanɩ mɩɛrɛra ga a kɔ̃tɩ̃ dakha ka n fʋ nɛr;
gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ na 'lɛnɩ anɩ ha pɛra pɩpɩɩ paar dʋɔn anɩ thɛthɛɛ taa.
Thãgbaa bobonaakɛ kɔɔ mɩanɩ bɔ jɩɩrɩdaakɛ Thãgba na jɩ nɩnɩ, kɔɔ ƴaalɛ ka a 'lo wɩ jɩ mɔ̃ taarɛɛdaalera hanɩ.
Kirisitii Thuukɛ hanɩ awɩ bɩnɔ kɔɔ mãa mɩɩrɛ Kirisitii bɔ gaarda na i dʋbɩrɛɛkɛ na kpa garnɩ, a mɩɩ wɛr dɩ wa-n 'lo wɩ jɩ bɔ ca dɔɔkɛ gelela na danɩ na mɔ̃ ga hanɩ.

Thãgba kɔɔ nɩ warɛ dɩ ga do wɛr na 'lɛ ga thɩ̃ɩlera wɩ-n mɩɩna', sɩ anɩda gɩ. Dɩ nɛnɛ̃, wɩrɛ n mɩanɩ tutugo bʋɔ na Thu Phuu fãgaakɛ thɛnɩ ƴũ kɔɔ mɩa nɩ ga thɩ̃ɩle. Dɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ yɛrɛrakɛ n ƴaalɛ wɩ kpu wa-n hɩɩn ga thɩ̃ɩlera.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ fɔ dɩbara anɩ kpɩɛrra, a na jʋrɛna, a na pɩɛrna bɔɔbɔɔ bɔ jɩ khaardaakɛ na 'lɛnɩ bɔɔraakɛ Jeju Kirisiti na ɩnɩ.
Mɔ̃kɛ nũ nɩdara n hanɩ, nɩ hana ɔmɛ̃. Na-n bir na hana thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛkɛ n kɔɔ kɔ nɩnɩ thuee fɩl, mɔ̃kɛ nɩ kɔɔ hana gɩnɩ mamara bɔɔraakɛ nɩ kɔɔ donɩ yʋ 'leedara ga.
Sɩ mɔ̃kɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ wɛ nɩnɩ donɩ Tɩɩ phuu, nɛrɛ dakha nɩ deba a dɔ tɩɩ phuusɔ anɩ fɩlla fɛʋ.
Gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Nɩ pho gɩdonɩ mɛrɛ Tɩɩ phuu ha mɩ.”
Ado nɩ-n wer ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n hɩnɛnɩ tɩbɩla dɩɩdɩa' Thɩrɛ, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ na kɩlɛnanɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl mɔ̃ awɩ thɔ̃ hanɩ, a nɩ jɩ na-n jɩɛ ɩɩr na maar anɩ yi hanana kɛ thɩɩra.
Gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩrɛ dɩɩ do, ga do thɩ̃ kʋɛnaakɛ dɔnɩ war na dɛ Thãgba kɔɔ birsena nɩ anɩ thɩthɩsɔɔ də̃bəəl fɩllaakɛ nɩ hanana',
sɩ Kirisitii tɔmɩ̃ɩkɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ kʋkʋʋ tə̃ə gɩ, mɔ̃kɛ a donɩ bana biikɛ na hananɩ taana', aa hana dakha jiinə'.
Thãgba kɔɔ mãa phiirəə kɛkɛkɛ sɩ thɩɩkɛ na fʋ tir pa', sɩ pɩpɩɩ bɔɔkɛ a gbaarɛ nɩna dɩphã dɩɩ do anɩda dɔ nɔɔ.
Ɔr dɔ nɔɔ nɩ pɛrɔnɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba haar, kɛ kɔɔ cʋgɛɛnɩ dɩ ɩɩr a the khirera, a cʋʋnaa dakha dɩ 'lɛ i dʋbɩrɛ, dɩ mɛ̃ anɩ ha pɛ na anɩ nũ pɛ na ha Thãgbara.
Anɩ nũukɛ nι-n nιnι sobɔr, gι cʋʋ nɛr dι nι phu na-n jιι na anι omisɔɔkɛ nι donanι kha ha pɛdara na naʋʋkɛ huloneni; na-n jιɛ na kha bɩɛlbɩɛl sobɔr na haar fɛʋ,
nɛrkɛ Thãgba birni kɔ̃ kɔ̃ phaa sɩ ga do thɩ̃ diir kʋɛsʋ kɔna na', sɩ thɩ̃ diireekɛ na dɔnɩ dakʋɛnaa gaa gɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩkɛ hananɩ yire, a dona dakha khorrdaa.
Gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Tibil hʋrɛ hʋɔn, dɩ ɔɔ ɓɔ̃ ɓibi ho hɔ̃ phɩ̃ɩ. Hʋɔn n khɩrɛ dɩ phɩ̃ɩ n jɛ,
sɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ thɩmɩɩ khorr gɩ ha.” Dɩ ga thɩmɩɩlera dɔ tutugo bʋɔɔkɛ kɔɔ mɩa nɩnɩ.
Gɛr gɩ nɩ dɔna bɩ̃ kpallɛ fɛʋ a faa, na fɩɩlɛ fɛʋ, na bɩnɛ yenyɔ fɩlɛ, na gbugi, na tɩɩ kuere ɓibi;
sɩ na-n ƴaalɛ na gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛ ilẽ bʋɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ mɔ̃ bibɔrɔsɔ n ƴaalnɩ ɩlɛ̃, gɛr na khɔnɔ na dana taarɛ,
gɩdonɩ “nɩ jɩrɛ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ bɔɔkɛ a bɔrnɩ.”
Na-n wɔrɔnɛ ɔr thɛthɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ boka yireekɛ tɩbɩla kɔɔ bonɩ, sɩɩ do thɩ̃ɛ a do waa gel Thãgbara dɩ phiiruu.
Dɩ nɛrɛ dakha mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ boka ye, nɩ dɔ Thãgba n gba nɩ a na-n mɩna cʋɔrɩkɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ Thuuda, nɩ doro bonɩ jida phuusɔ na-n ji bonɩɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ Thudaa, kɛ n danɩ Thãgba haar, gɩ do Jeju Kirisiti dɔ nɔɔ.
Gɩdonɩ gɩ kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayɩ: “Hɩnɛ, mɩ thɩɩnɛ Sɩyɔna go tɩ bokaar, kɛ dɔ marnɩ thɩ̃ɛ waa gel dɩ ɩ̃ phiir. Dɩ ʋrɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar ɔrra, ga ɩ̃ kpɩɩrakɛ a na dʋʋraa yicuruə'.”
Nɛrkɛ wer pɩɛrnɩ haar, a do narɛ daɓʋ̃ɔ ka, sɩ ado wɩrɛraakɛ na-n pɩɛrnɩ haara gɩ, Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “Bokaarɩkɛ cɔ mɛ kɔɔ bonɩ a do, sɩɩ do ɔr deba a do go tɩ bokaar.”
Wo: “Nɛ bara bokaar gɩ a dona nɛ bara gbãgbaan.” Wɩ-n berore nɔɔ gɩdonɩ wɩ nʋʋrɛ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩra nũu dɩ ga thɩɩn wɩ kɔɔ thɩɩn wɩrakɛ.

Sɩ ne wer, nɛr dɔ caarɩkɛ Thãgba phiirni, a dona Fãgadaarɩ bonɩ jidara, nɩ dor ɔɔ tibilsɔɔkɛ phonɩ, na ɔɔ tookɛ a hɩnɩ, gɩ do nɔɔ na-n mɩɩ ɔɔ nɔ kpaa thɩ̃ cʋʋ, ɔrkɛ wɛ nɩnɩ dɩ nɩ the dabirəra a lõ ɔɔ nɔ kpaa dahɩrɛra.
Nɛrkɛ mamara na kɔɔ dɔnɩ ɔɔ toa', nɩ dor nɛnɛ̃ Thãgbaa too; nɛrɛɛkɛ na-n kɔɔ yɛnɩ bɔ jɩɩra', sɩ nɛnɛ̃ Thãgba jɩ nɛr bʋɔra.
Nɛrkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, nɩ jɛna kpakpala ha nɩ dɩ nɩ dona kpãkpara, gɛr gɩ mɩ-n kpãkpãa narɛ nɩ faa thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛkɛ n kɔ nɩnɩ thue, kɛ n kɛ̃kɛrɛnanɩ thudaa.
Na-n hana fɩl bʋɔ thɩldaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ thɩ̃ dooraakɛ wɩ-n kue nini dɩɩ ho puu cʋʋdara ha nɩ, wa ƴɩrɛ anɩ thɔ̃ bɔ wa-n khɩɩ Thãgba wireekɛ a na birni na kher nɩ.
Kɔ̃tɩn dɔ kɩrʋ, gɛr gɩ nɩ jɔ dɩbara ƴɛ kʋlasɔraakɛ fɛʋ tɩbɩla pɛrnɩ, a gobanɛrɩkɛ dɔnɩ yʋʋ gɩ,
ado fãgadara wɛɛkɛ a pɛrnɩ wa-n heene puu cʋʋdara sor sɩ na khɩa bɔ cʋʋdara;
gɩdonɩ gɩrɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ dʋɔn na-n hana fɩl bʋɔ ga-n khaan dəbələəkɛ na-n jɛnɩ gɩrɛ wɩ-n mɩɩna' nʋɔ.
Na-n ɩrɛ mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ waɩa, sɩ na-n gba wa dʋʋrɩle a phiro sɩ na cʋʋ gɩrɛ puuronə', sɩ nɩ ka na ɩrɛ mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃dara.
Na-n cɔ tɩbɩla fɛʋ; na-n na omɩna; na-n ma Thãgba; na-n cɔ fãgadaar.
Thɔ̃dara na-n jɔ anɩbara anɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔra na maar, ga do kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɔɩra na hɛlɛlɛ fɩldarara dɩbara ga, sɩrakɛ na wɩrɛraakɛ awɩda khɩɩrnɩ.
Ha fʋʋr bɔ gaarɛraakɛ tibil n yɩnɩ sɩ ga-n do ɔɔ pa dɩɩ tha', sɩɩ do Thãgba a-n nana, gɛr n da Thãgba haar.
Gɩdonɩ anyee bɔ ca na yɩrɔ ado nɩ cʋʋ sopugo dɩ bɔ gaarɛ ɩ̃ a thʋ nɩ? Sɩ ado nɩ ka na cʋʋ bɔɔ dι ga ιna nar bɔ gaarɛ dι nι fʋrɔ haar, gɛr n da Thãgba haar.
Gιdonι gelela Thãgba ka we nar, gιdonι Kirisitii thɛthɛ dakha kɔɔ gaarɛ bʋɔ anι sora a nι nar fιlɛɛkɛ na phɛlnι gι do nɔɔ na-n 'loro ɔɔ nɛkara.
Ɔr dɔ ʋrɛɛkɛ na kɔɔ cʋɛnι sopugoə', dι fιιlɛ dakha na kɔɔ the ɔɔ nɔa'.
Ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ wι-n kɔɔ nιιrnι sι aa-n bir dι nιιra', a-n kɔɔ gaarnι bʋɔ sι aa kɔɔ so tibilə', sι a kɔɔ faa gɛr a ha ʋrɛ n kιlɛnι kιιl sarʋ.
Ɔr thɛthɛ dɔ ʋrɛ kɔɔ heenenι asι sopugosɔ ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ tomιra thιrʋra, gι do nɔɔ gι do nι khire sopugo cʋʋrɛra sa hana yire dιι do fιl sardaa. Ɔɔ kho sɛɛkɛ a 'lɛnι dɔ asι kho kpɛɛda.
Gιdonι nι kɔɔ hor banaakɛ bureni, sι nɛnɛ̃kɛ nι kɛrrɛ bir khekheraakɛ dɔnι ʋrɛ n bɛranι anι thu.
Mɛ̃ gι ha dakha na nɛr khɛra, na-n jɔ anιbara anι kora, gι do nɔɔ a ιkhasɔ halerakɛ a na nι Thãgbaa thιmɩɩ nũə', sɩ fɩlɛɛkɛ awɩ khɛr hananɩ ga cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wa pɛr haar, sɩ ga dorakɛ khɛr mɩa thɩ̃a';
sɩ gɩdonɩ wɩ-n yɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ hananɩ fɩl phuu na cʋʋr.
Na-n barana yʋ lɩɩr, na dɛ thɩ̃ tʋʋr, na kẽkẽ ɓɔ̃ tʋʋr mɔ̃ na bɔrnɩ hɩɩnɛna ga,
sɩ nɩ dɔ anɩ biir cʋʋ n do hadaa, kɛ dɔnɩ hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ, a ha jɔjɔjɔl ga do dakʋɛnaa ga, gɩdonɩ gɛr dɔ thɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra.
Mɛ̃ khɛ bɔɩɩkɛ mamara n kɔɔ pɛnɩ Thãgba nũu n kɔɔ gbɛbɩ awɩ biir, mɔ̃ wɩ-n jonɩ dɩbara awɩ kora.
Thale Sara kɔɔ ha. A kɔɔ nɩrɛ Abɩraham nũu a thʋ̃ da-n wɩɩ kɔ̃tɩn, dɩ ɔɔ bikhɛrsɔ nɩ debi do gɩrɛ ado nɩ-n cʋʋrɛ bɔɔ, ado dakha thɩ̃ bιɛl na-n cʋʋ nɩ dɩ maar na-n fʋ na'.

Mɛ̃ gɩ dakha na nɛr kona, na-n jɩɛ too kha bɔɔbɔɔ na anɩ khɛr mɔ̃ a donɩ tibilikɛ yɔɔnɩ a jɔ nɩ, na-n cʋɔnɛɛ mɔ̃kɛ nɩ bulni kha khaardaakɛ dɔnɩ yireekɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbara, dɩ mɛ̃ thɩ̃ɛ na bãbarã anɩ Thãgba bɩɛla'.
Ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩ kpa pa dʋɔn: Na-n hana kpɩɛrnɔ bɩɛl, na-n hana pəpər haar, nɩ dɔ omi naar, na bɔ jɩɩr, na dɩbara jor n hi ni haarra.
Na-n gba puure a lɩmɩ puurə'; a tibil nɩɩr nɩ na-n bir nɩɩrʋa', sɩ nɩ ka na bɔnaa, gɩdonɩ gɛr Thãgba we nar dɩ mɛ̃ na 'lɛ dakha bɔnanɛ.
Dɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “Ado tibil hale a na yi hananɛ, a ƴaal dakha wi bʋɔ na-n phana nar, dɔ ntɛ n fʋ ɔɔ delẽbi thɩmɩɩ puu mɩɩrɛra, na ɔɔ nɔfa fɩɩlɛla.
Dɔ a hʋnɔna puure, sɩ a na-n cʋʋ bɔɔ. Dɔ ha ii ƴaalɛ n do ɔɔda a na-n gbuuro yʋʋ.
Gιdonι Kɔ̃tιn n gar ɔɔ yi tιι sarara, dι a-n pɛr dakha awι bιɛl nũu, sι Kɔ̃tɩn n fire khiru di pɛ wɩrɛraakɛ n cʋɛnɩ puure.”
Amɛ na hʋɔlɛ nar ado na cʋʋ thɩ̃ bʋɔɔkɛ n kɔ nɩnɩ thue?
Adorakɛ na gaar bʋɔ gɩrɛraakɛ saranɩ, sɩ bɔnadaa gɩ do nar. Na-n ma gɩrɛɛkɛ tɩbɩla n mana'; na-n do haar na-n jẽ nɩ fɩɩʋraka'.
Sɩ na-n cɔ Kirisiti Kɔ̃tɩ̃ cʋʋr le anɩ hara. Nɩ tɔɔ ga too a na nɛna tibilikɛ n bulene nini kɩrʋ nũ pɛrɛraakɛra nɩ hananɩ, sɩ na-n cʋɛ na hɛlɛlɛ fɩlɛ na maar.
Na-n hanana dakha kpɩɛrnɔɔkɛ na heene nɩnɩ sora', dɩ thɩ̃ dooraakɛ wɩ-n kue nini dɩɩ ho puu cʋʋdara ha nɩ, anɩ fɩl bɔɔkɛ nɩ hananɩ Kirisitira na pɛ warɛ yicuru.
Gaarɛ thɩ̃ bɔ cʋʋrɛra, ado gɛr n da Thãgba haar, gɩ baar gaarɛ puu cʋʋrɛra.
Gɩdonɩ Kirisiti dakha kɔɔ khire asɩ sopugora babɩɛl, ɔrkɛ saranɩ khe sɛrɛraakɛ na sarana', dɩ a na kpa sɩ na ha Thãgba. Wɩ kɔɔ kʋrɛ ɔɔ tomɩ wer, sɩ Thue pallɛ ɩɩr na yire.
Thueelera a jalna a mɩɩ thuesɔɔkɛ hanɩ khaɩra mɔ̃ thɩ̃ɛ hanɩ,
kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ kɔɔ nʋrɛnɩ nũu mamara bɔɔraakɛ Thãgba fʋnɩ haar ƴɛrr Noee bato cʋʋ bɔ, kɛ tɩbɩla fɩɩʋ kɔɔ lʋʋnnɩ, a thɩɛna gaa tɩbɩla makõther wɛ, a kɔɔ taa nyʋɔnna.

Gɛr n hʋɔn kha na yɔ kpɛɛrɛɛkɛ n taa nɩnɩ nɛnɛ̃, dɩɩ do Jeju Kirisitii khi ɩɩrra gɩ the, dɩ yɔ kpɛɛrɛɛle ga do tomɩ jiin yɔ hʋr ga, sɩɩ do kpɩɛr tir gɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra, mɔ̃ sa hananɩ kpɩɛrnɔɔkɛ na heene sɩnɩ sora'.
Jeju Kirisitira kɔɔ jʋʋnɛ Thãgbaa dʋɔ a too Thãgbaa nyɔ̃bɔra, ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ punoneni thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ, na fãgadarasɔ, na punodara dɩ wɩ jʋʋraa.
Gɛr gɩ gɩdonɩ Kirisiti kɔɔ gaarɛ bʋɔ tomɩrra, nɛrɛ dakha nɩ hana ga kpɩɛr ca, gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ gaarɛnɩ bʋɔ tomɩrra a-n sɩrɔrɛ sopugo cʋʋrɛ.
Thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛkɛ n kɔnɩ tibil thue ga-n do gɛr dɔ ɔɔ yi hana bã, sɩ mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba n ƴaalnɩ a-n hana fɩlɛ ɔɔ yirəəkɛ sɩɛraanɩ kɛkɛ thɩɩra.

Gɩdonɩ bɔɔkɛ kɔɔ kanɩ gɩ thʋnɛ dã mɛ̃ mɔ̃ nɩ kɔɔ cʋʋnɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ n kɔɔ danɩ thɩldara haar dɩ wa-n cʋʋ. Nɩ kɔɔ faarɛ dɩbara dakhaba cʋʋrɛra, na thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛlaakɛ n kɔ nɩnɩ thue, na ta laarɛra, na gbõgolõ dɩko khorra, na ta yɔ kpãkpaanɛna, na thɩl kpal dɩɩrsɔra.
Dɩ wɩ yɩɛnɩ dɩɩ kpal war mɔ̃ na-n tuni na-n kpaarɛ kha na wɛr dakhaba thɩ̃ cʋʋ jɔjʋɔraalera bã wɩ-n kue ner;
sɩ wa mɩɩrɛ awɩda na ha ʋrɛɛkɛ tɔɔnɩ ga too sɩ a na-n kɩɩlna yidara na khe.
Gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ dakha dɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ wɩrɛraakɛ kɔɔ khenɩ, dɩ ga dor mɔ̃ awɩ tomɩ 'lɛnɩ kɩɩlʋ mɔ̃ wɩ donɩ tibil, awɩ thu na hananɛ yire mɔ̃ Thãgba hana gɩnɩ.
Thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋ khu pa wɔrɔnɛ, gɛr gɩ nɩ fɔ dɩbara, a na jʋrɛna, a na bɩɛlna Thãgba.
Sɩ gɩrɛ jɔnɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ dʋɔn na-n jɩɛ na kha bɔɔbɔɔ, gɩdonɩ naʋ n thire sopugo jɔjʋɔra.
Na-n tea kha kpakpaalɛ sɩ hũhuune na-n hala'.
Mɔ̃ nɩ donɩ wɩrɛ 'lɛnɩ Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ khaardasɔ dɩɩdɩɩ dɩ na-n dona thɔmaakɛ bʋɔnɔnɩ, dɔ nɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl n gba khaardaakɛra nɩ 'lɛnɩ na-n bulnə ɩkhasɔ.

Dɩ a tibil 'lɛ punone thɩmɩɩ mɩɩrɛra, dɔ a na-n mɩɩ thɩmɩaakɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbaa nɔɔ; dɩ a tibil 'lɛ punone thɔ̃ dʋʋrra, a na-n dɔ na Thãgbaa fãgaakɛ a haanɩ; dɩ mɛ̃ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋra Thãgba na 'lɛr khɩɩrɛ, gɩ do Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the, kɛ hɩnanɩ i dʋbɩrɛ na fãga bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, na-n do gɩ kpal nar gɩ ho nar thɩ̃ phaa, dɔɔraakɛ nɩ hanɩ gɩrɛ dɩɩ mɩɛ nɩ dɩ ga-n hɩɩna'.
Sɩ nɩ ka na kãkanɛ mɔ̃ nɩ bulni kha na gaarɛɛkɛ Kirisiti kɔɔ gaarnɩ, gɩ do nɔɔ dakha na-n kãka na daʋ ɔɔ i dʋbɩ wirəəkɛ na phananɩ.
A Kirisitii i do kɩrʋ dɩ wa nɩɩr nɩ ga-n da nar, gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa Thuukɛ n nɛnanɩ mɔ̃ ɔɔ i dʋbɩ hanɩ ha narɛ.
Tibil nɛrɛra na-n gaar tɩɩ kʋdaar dʋʋrra ga, dɩ yudaar dʋʋrra ga, dɩ puu cʋʋdaar dʋʋrra ga, dɩ gɩrɛraakɛ na hɩɩrɛɛnaa ga,
sɩ ado Kirisitiida dʋʋrra gι, yicuru na-n fʋ nta', sι a ka na khιa Thãgba ireraalera.
Gιdonι bɔɔkɛ Thãgba na kɔɔ fʋnanι ɔɔ too kιιlɛ gι daan; dι ado sɛr ga kɔɔ fʋna ɓo, wιrɛ na-n nιɛnι Thãgbaa tutugo bʋɔɔ thιmιι nũə', mɔ̃ awιda na ha?
Gιdonι gι kherere Thãgbaa sɛbɛra ayι: “A gι sι fιιʋ sιι do tιι sarʋ na 'lɛ taara', dι mɔ̃ ga ha ʋrɛraakɛ na-n therananι Thãgba ga a dona sopugodaar?”
Gɛr gι wιrɛ n gaarɛnι mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba tuur hanι na-n jalana awι bɔ cʋʋra a gbana awι ha na pɛ thɩ̃ Tidaar bʋɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Mι sor wιrɛraakɛ dɔnɩ we gbɛbɩdaraa kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ anɩ pa, mɔ̃kɛ mɩ donɩ dakha kɔ̃tɩn awɩ kha, a tor yire Kirisitii bɔ gaarra, a dona dakha ʋrɛ na buloni kha na i dʋbɩrɛɛkɛ na yɩranɩ,
nɛrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ kɔ̃tɩna mɩ so gɩrɛ ayɩ: Na-n khɛ Thãgbaa banaakɛ a pɛ narnɩ; na-n cʋʋ gɩ ho fɛrɛ pɛr ga, sɩ na-n cʋɛ na haar fɛʋ Thãgbara. Na-n khe wɩ warra ga, sɩ na-n khɛ wɩ na bɩ̃ bʋɔ.
Na-n cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ na fãga wɩrɛraakɛ wɩ pɛ narnɩ na-n hɩna', sɩ nɩ dɔ thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ banaana.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ bana khedaar kɔ̃tɩn na ɩnɩ na 'lɛr khor cacadaar dʋʋrra, kɛ dɔnɩ i dʋbɩrɛɛkɛ na dɔnɩ dakʋɛnaa ga.

Mɛ̃ gɩ dakha na nɛr daɓola, nɩ jɔ dɩbara kɔ̃tɩnana. Nɛrɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl anɩ cʋʋ para nɩ hanana kha dɩbara jor, gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa sɛbɛ sor ayɩ: “Thãgba n bãbaranɛ i ƴaaldara, sɩ a-n jɩrɛ dɩbara jodara bʋɔra.”
Gɛr gɩ na-n jɔ dɩbara Thãgbaa fãga nyɔ̃kɔɔ dɩ ɔr, a bɔɔ dã, a na ɩɩr nɛr.
Nɩ gba anɩ dɛsɔ fɛʋ a na faaraa gɩdonɩ ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ n hɩnɛ nɩnɩ.
Na-n jʋrɛ a na jɩɛ dʋ bʋrɛ, anɩ lãlaardaar Satã a-n kpaarɛ a ho sidũ'ũukɛ n huoneni, da-n ƴaalna ʋrɛ a na khonɩ.
Nɩ pɩɛrɛɛ kĩkĩ mɔ̃ nɩ jɩɩlnɩ kɩbɩ ha pɛrɛra, dɩ na-n jɛna gɩ dɩ bɔ gaar ca bɩɛlla anɩ omisɔ thɩɩraakɛ n yɩ.

Thãgbaakɛ bɔ jɩɩr fɛʋ n thernɩ, kɛ kɔɔ wɛ nɩnɩ nɩ bulo kha na ɔɔ khorr i dʋbɩ, gɩ the anɩ bɩɛl dora na Kirisiti, ado nɩ pɩ bʋɔɔkɛ nɩ-n gaarnɩ gɩrɛ bɔɔ gbe, a na cʋʋ nɛr dɩ na bɔr na ka, a na tɩ, a na hana dakha fãga, na ha tutugo paara'.
Ɔr hɩna fãga bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Sɩlvɛ̃ɛkɛ mɩ-n wenɩ sobɔ omine, ɔr bulo mi dɩ ɩ̃ khere sɛbɛ buukɛ gɩ cʋʋ nι nι faa haar, ɩ̃ mιι nɩ dakha nɩ jɩɩ jɩ tue dɩ Thãgbaa bɔ jɩɩkɛra nɩ harɔnɩ bɔ jɩɩr gι gel, nι tɔɔ gar kɩbɩ.
We gbɛbιdaraakɛ hanι Babιlɔn, kɛ Thãgba phiirni anι kha, wι fʋɔr nɛr. Ɩ̃ bikuun Markɩ dakha fʋɔr nɛr.
Na-n fʋɔrɛ khasɔ na ha lõ fʋɔrɛ. Thãgba na-n hana nɛrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ Kirisitira ha ɩɩ.

Mɛr Sɩmɔ̃ Pɩɛrɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃daar na thɔ̃thɔn, thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha nɛrɛɛkɛra 'lɛnɩ ha pɛ ca bɩɛlɩkɛ ɓɔnanɩ mɔ̃kɛ sɩ 'lɛ gɩnɩ, dɩɩ the Jeju Kirisitii fɩl sarra, kɛ dɔnɩ asɩ Thãgba a dona Taadaar.
Thãgba na-n jɛ nɩ bʋɔra jɔɔ, a na-n hana nɩ dakha ha ɩɩ jɔɔ, mɔ̃ nɩ-n jɩnɩ ɔr Thãgba na Jeju asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ dɩ ga-n pɛr.
Fãgaakɛ thɛnɩ ɔɔ Thãgba dora, gɛr hana sɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na bulo sini asɩ yi hanana na Thãgba fɩl hananɛna, gɩ the asɩ jɩraakɛ sɩ jɩnɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ kɔɔ wɛ sɩnɩ sɩ bulo kha na ɔɔ i dʋbɩ na ɔɔ bɔɔkɛ a bɔrnɩ,

kɛ dɔnɩ thɩ̃ɛsɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ nɔɔ dɩ ʋlfɛna sɩ ʋlfɛrɛsɔɔkɛ kɔ̃tɩnanɩ ka a ɓɔ̃ dakha ka, dɩ gɛrra na dɔ hʋɛ na yɩrɔnɩ a na debiro na do wɩrɛ na ɓananɩ kha na Thãgba ɔɔ Thãgba dora, mɔ̃ nɩ fuuni kʋɛrɛraakɛ ha pɩɛrɛ cʋʋnɩ dɩɩ lõ thɩɩraakɛ.
Dɩ gɛrra dɔ nɔɔ na-n gbɛ̃gbɛrɛnɛ dɩphã a hanana fɩl telẽe a dɛba anɩ ha pɛra, a hanana jɩɩr a dɛba fɩl teleena,
a hanana dɩbara fʋrɛ a dɛba jɩɩrra, a hanana yɩrrɛ a dɛba dɩbara fʋrɛra, a hanana Thãgba fɩlɛ a dɛba yɩrrɛra,
a hanana omi naar a dɛba Thãgba fɩlɛla, a hanana naʋ hulõo a dɛba omi naarra.
Gɩdonɩ ado ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ har anɩ bɩnɔ jɔɔ na too mɔlɔa', sɩ na-n cʋʋrɛ thɩ̃ɛ, na khʋɔn dakha na-n pɛr jɩɩrraakɛ nɩ jɩnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti.
Sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ ga thɩ̃sɔɔka', yaarʋ a do, aa-n yɩ ƴɔa', a diinəne mɔ̃ Thãgba cɔcɔgɔɔnɩ ɔɔ sopugo tɩ̃sɔ.
Gɛr dɔ nɔɔ ɩ̃ omisɔ, na-n bãbanɛ a cʋɛ werɩkɛ Thãgba we nɩnɩ na phiireekɛ a phiir nini gɩ jɩɩ do thɩ̃ɛ phubi. Ado na cʋʋ mɛ̃ na tharsɩ na ji kpɩɩraka'.
Ga dor mɛ̃ Thãgba na ha nɩ hʋɛ kpẽgelẽ dɩ na lõ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ na Taadaar Jeju Kirisitii khorr fãgadaar dɩra.
Gɛrra dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ɩ̃ ƴaal ma-n khe nar wire fɛʋ ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ sɩɩ dorakɛ nɩ kɔɔ 'lire jɩ gar a jɩɩl kɩbɩ sobɔrraakɛ nɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ.
Bɔɔraakɛ mɩ hanɩ gɩrɛ ɩ̃ waraakɛ, mɩ yɩɛrɛ dɩɩ bɔr dɩ ma khe nar ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛra gɩ jaa nar,
mɔ̃ mɩ jɩnɩ tue gɩrɛ dɩɩ ha mɔ̃kɛra asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ nɩ marnɩ, dɩ bɔɔkɛ ma thenɩ ɩ̃ warara ga hʋnɔa'.
Ma dor bʋɔ sɩ ɩ̃ cʋʋ thɩ̃ɛ, a mɩ kɔ̃ pɩ sɩ dɩɩ ha mɔnakɛ, sɩ na-n jɩna gɩ.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ nɩnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii fãgada na ɔɔ bir ɩ̃ thɩmɩɩ, ga do kpuro nɩɛ 'lã'lã'lã sɩ kɔɔ pɛ nũu a gba a dιιrna na', sι wιrɛ kɔɔ yɛnι ɔɔ wabι na yire sι do.
Gιdonι a kɔɔ 'lɛr Thãgba Thιrɛra cʋrɛ na i dʋbιrɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ nʋɔ kɔɔ thenι carbara kʋkʋʋraale a so ayι: “Ʋrɛɛkɛra dʋɔn ɩ̃ Bikuunikɛ mι-n nanι, ɔr dɔ ʋrɛ lona mιnι haar ka.”
Sɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ kɔɔ nιɛnɛ na asι nũ nʋɔɔkɛ kɔɔ thɛnι ƴũ ɔbɔɔkɛ sι kɔɔ hanι kha na ɔr gɔ̃gɔ̃ phuurəəle.
Mɛ̃ sι jιɩ jι tue gel thιmιιrraakɛ Thãgbaa bobonasɔ kɔɔ mιɩnɩ; gɩ bɔrɛ dɩ na pɛ gɩ nũu, gɩdonɩ gɩ hʋrɛ lãphãakɛ n hɩrɛnɛnɩ pa birə paar phaphapha dɩɩ n wɩl, dɩwɩl ƴepələ̃bire n phã anɩ hara.
Sɩ caca thɩ̃ɛ, dɔ nɩ jɩ dɩ tibil na puno na ɔɔ thɛthɛɛ kpɩɛr na ti Thãgbaa bobonɩ thɩmɩɩkɛ kherenenɩɩ kɩra';
gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa bobonɩ thɩmɩɩkɛ kɔɔ thɛnɩ, ga do mɔ̃ tibili ƴaal hanɩ mɛ̃ gɩ kɔɔ ha kpɩɩraka', sɩ Thu Phuu kɔɔ cʋɛ tɩbɩla dɩ wɩ kɔɔ mɩɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbaa pa.

Mamara sõso bobona kɔɔ hale tɩbɩlaa thɩ̃thɩɩn, mɛna gɩ sõso dɩɩrdara na wolone na lõ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn na sõso dɩɩrɛɛkɛ na bũburoneni tibil. Wa bor Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ kɔɔ thɛ wɩnɩ dɩ wa gbaar bũburoneekɛ na phuroneni tibil dapaara a na heen dɩbara.
Tibil jɔjʋɔ na kpar awɩ dakhaba thɔna, dɩ wɛr na dɔ nɔɔ dɩ tɩbɩla na mɩɩ dapuu wa-n pɛ sobɔ hʋɛra.
Ha pɩɛrɛ na cʋʋ wɛr dι wa gba sõso thιmɩɩr wɩ fɩɩlna nɩ wa-n 'lɛrɔ khor; sɩ gɩ maanɛ awɩ so heen hanɩ gbɛbɩrɔ, dɩ awɩ bũburõ ga do gɩ phɩnɛ daara'.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba na kɔɔ sɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔraakɛ kɔɔ cʋɛnɩ sopugoə', sɩ a kɔɔ fʋlɛ wɛr, a li a faa kõkor huloona dabirə paar tĩtĩtĩ gɩ dana kɩɩl wire.
Aa kɔɔ sɩrɔ dakha mama thɩa', sɩ a kɔɔ cʋʋrɛ yɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ dɩɩ phã a thii tɩbɩla fɛʋʋkɛ na-n theranaana'; Noe dɩbara, kɛ n kɔɔ mɩanɩ tɩbɩla fɩl sar thɩmɩɩr, a kɔɔ taa na wɩ̃ tibil makonyɔ.
Dɩ dakha a kɔɔ heene Sɔdɔm na Gɔmɔɔrdara bũburõ so heene a thii wi na dɔɔ, a gba gɩ gɩrɛ da-n dɩɩrna wɩrɛ na-n theranaana' gɩrɛ na dana wɩnɩ.
A kɔɔ taarɛ dakha Lɔtɩ tɩɩ sarʋʋkɛ haar n helnɩ tɩɩ khabaasɔɔ cʋʋ pa kpalaale;
kũu sarʋʋlera kɔɔ hanɩ awɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, wire fɛʋ haar n heluu gɩdonɩ tɩɩ sarʋ a do, sɩ da-n yɩ awɩ cʋʋ pa puu da-n nɩɛna ga thɩmɩɩ dakha.
Wɩrɛ n cʋɔnnɩ Kɔ̃tɩn a-n jɩ gɛr da-n taa wɩ bɔ gaarɛra, sɩ dɩ thɩɩn wɩrɛ na sarana', a heen wɩ sor kɩɩl wirera.

Wɩrɛ n bɔnɩ dɩ wa-n ɩɩrna thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛkɛ n kɔnɩ awɩ tibil do pa thue, dɩ wa-n beesina dakha fãgaakɛ pɩɛrnɩ, wɛr ga bo na ɩɩrɔ. Sõso dɩɩrdaraale wɩ-n 'lar ka, wɩ gbɩllɛ, maar na-n kʋ wɩ ƴũ fãgadarasɔɔ kpɛra ga;
sɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔkɛrakɛ hananɩ fãga na punone a jɔ wɩ, na tu na pɛ ƴũ fãgadarasɔɔle sor na kpɛɩ Kɔ̃tɩnɩ ƴɛra ga.
Sɩ tibil ca wele wɩ hʋrɛ lɩɔ̃ nʋnɩaakɛ na hananɩ yʋa', kɛ wɩ kɔnɩ wɩ fɔ a na kɔ; wɩ-n kpɛr gɩrɛɛkɛ wa jɩna', nʋ̃ khaara wa bũburõ.

Wa 'lɛr bɔ gaarɛ gɩdonɩ mɛ̃ wɩ-n gaar tɩbɩla. Gɩrɛ n daan warnɩ dʋɔn wɩ tɔɔ gbelẽ gbelẽ a na cʋɛ puureekɛ n kɔ wɩnɩ thue. Jɩɩn tɩbɩla wɛ a khã; mɔ̃ wɩ-n hanɩ anɩ fɛtɩ cʋʋ pa dι wa-n fιιl nι gι-n da warɛ ka.
Khɛ kpιι ƴaal ƴιɛ wι hana; wa-n hi sopugo cʋʋra'; wι-n fιɩlɛ dakha tɩbɩlaakɛ na tɩɛnna'; ha pɩɛrɛ hi wer bɩnɔ; tɩbɩlaakɛ hanɩ sʋɔnna wɩ do.
Mɔ̃ wɩ faanɩ hʋ telẽe pɩ, wɩ buure dɩ wa-n kpaan Balam Bewɔɔrɩ bikuuni hʋra, kɛ kɔɔ naannɩ gõgolõ lɩmɩnɛ.
Sɩ a kɔɔ caananɛ phaanɛ ɔɔ puu cʋʋrara. Kũkə̃əkɛ na-n mιanι nʋɔa', sι a kɔɔ mιιraarɛ thιmιιr tibil khaa dιι cʋʋ bobon də̃bəl dι jιιl.
Tιbιlaale hor yɔ bu kanaakɛ na-n hananι nyʋɔna'; wι hor dakha thãgbaakɛ n jonanι sι dι jιɛ n ti gi; pa hulõ paarιkɛ birəneni tĩtĩtĩ Thãgba thιιn khorr dι ga-n pιɛr wι.
I ƴaal thιmιa na nɔfaar n thɛ wι nɔɔ. Thɩ̃ puukɛ n kɔnι tibil thue, kɛ dɔnι dakhaba thɔma wι gba dι wa-n fιιlna tιbɩlaakɛ fuonni fuu phaa a the sa faa wɩrɛ hanɩ sõsorra.
Dɩ wɩ-n so warɛ dɩ wɩ yɩ, ɩna cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wa do waɩa, sɩɩ do wɛr thɛthɛ dea wɩ do thɩɛnaakɛ na kʋɛa wɩnɩ, gɩdonɩ tibil n dor dee thɩɛnaakɛ jʋɔraanɩ.
Ado tɩbɩla fuu thɩɩkɛɛdaraakɛ n biseneni tibil pɩ, mɔ̃ wɩ jɩnɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ na Taadaar Jeju Kirisiti, sɩ ado wɩ bir lõ ga thɩnaale dɩɩ puno wi, awɩ pɩpɩɩ pa na puurore a na jɔ cacadaa.
Mɔ̃kɛ wɩ jɩnɩ jɔfʋ phuukɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ha wɩnɩ sa gba faa, gɩ ka baarrakɛ ado wa ka kɔɔ jɩ fɩl sar hʋɛa'.
Gɩ dã warɛ waa mɔ̃kɛ sobɔ sokpaara hanɩ ger kɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ: “Bɩɩn n fire dɩ kho gɩrɛ a kɔɔ kpeenɩ”, dakha wo: “Sɩthookɛ wɩ-n cɔcɔɔnɩ n bire dapaara dɩ bɩɩr pɔɔsɔ.”
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, ʋrɛ dʋɔn balanyɔ sɛbɛɛkɛ mɩ khere narnɩ gɩrɛ. Sɛbɛ yenyɔraakɛ fɛʋ mɩ khe narɛ gɩ cʋʋ kpɩɛrɛ gɩ jaa nar;
dɩ mɛ̃ na jɩna gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgbaa bobon phuusɔ kɔɔ maanɩ mɩɩrɛ, na Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ dɔnɩ Taadaarɩ jɔfʋʋkɛ anɩ thɔ̃thɔna kɔɔ 'laanɩ.
Cacaca nɩ jɛna dɩ pɩpɩɩ wiresɔra ɓoɓorodara na ɩɩrɛ na maanɛ jɔɔ. Wɛr dɔ wɩrɛ n ɩrɛnɩ mɔ̃kɛ awɩ thɩ̃ puu ƴaal n kʋ wɩnɩ thue.
Wa sor nayɩ: Ɩɩnkɛra a kɔɔ yɩnɩ ɩna bire na ɩ̃, kana gɩ ha? Gɩdonɩ a fʋna wireekɛ asɩ thɩthɩsɔ kɔɔ khiirni, oti thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ too mɔnanakɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ti gini.
Sɩɩ do wɩ-n jɩrɛ gbobi, sɩ dɩ wɩ diinə, dɩ mamara nʋɔ Thãgba kɔɔ sona dɩ ƴũ na thɩɩkɛ hale gɩrɛ. Nyʋɔn a kɔɔ gba a cʋʋna thɩɩ dɩ nyʋɔnnana thɩɩ kɔɔ the.
Dɩ nyʋɔnna kɔɔ the thɩɩraakɛ kɔɔ hanɩle mamara dɩɩ kʋɛ.
Sɩ ƴũ na thɩɩkɛ hanɩkɛ nɛnɛ̃, thɩmɩɩ nɔ ca bɩɛlɩlera thɩnɛ gɩ, dɔɔ n kʋɛa gɩ wireekɛ dɔnɩ kɩɩl wire, kɛ wɩrɛ na-n therananɩ Thãgba ga na bũburoni.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, thɩ̃ bɩɛl hale na-n diinə ga, gɛr dʋɔn, Kɔ̃tɩnna wi bɩɛl hor yɛna gbɩlanɩ, dɩ yɛna gbɩlanɩ ho wi bɩɛl.
Kɔ̃tɩn na-n pʋɔr sɩ dɩ cʋʋ gɩrɛɛkɛ a-n yɩnɩ ɩna cʋʋra', mɔ̃kɛ ɩkhasɔ n kpɩɛrnɩ gɩra', sɩ haar a-n fʋ nɛrɛra aa-n ƴaal tibil bɩɛl n buə', sɩ a-n ƴaalɛ tɩbɩla fɛʋ n deba haar.
Kɔ̃tɩnɩ wi na daan mɔ̃ yu n ɩnɩ, ga Wiile thãgbara ƴũ na phor na ka na helle, dɩ ƴepələ̃be na mar dɔɔ a na hɩ̃ fɛʋ, dɩ thɩɩ na thɔmaakɛ n dʋɔnnɩ kɛ na thiire fɛʋ.
Dɩ gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ɛɛle fɛʋ thale ga kʋɛ, ʋmɔ̃ɔ tibil ca teana nɩ dɔ? Gɩ teenanɛ nɩ hanana fɩl phuu na Thãgba maar.
Na-n pɩɛrɛ sɩ nɩ phana dakha Thãgbaa wi gɩ dã, kɛ thãgbara ƴũ na donɩ dɔ haar a na hɩ̃ fɛʋ, ƴepələ̃be dakha n ma dɔɔ ga-n hɩl.
Ƴũ phaa na thɩ phaakɛ fɩl sarʋ na harɔnɩ sɩ-n pɩɛr, mɔ̃kɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ʋlfɛna sɩnɩ ɩna ha sɛr.
Gɛr gɩ, nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, mɔ̃ nɩ hanɩ pɩɛrɔ gɩrɛ, na-n bãbanɛ na-n do a yɩ nɩ na jiine na dɩ paara', sɩ nɩ dɔ a yɩ nɩ na ha ɩɩ.
Na-n jɛna dɩ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ ha fʋ dʋɔn anɩ taa, mɔ̃kɛ Pol asɩ omiikɛ sɩ-n nanɩ kɔɔ khere narnɩ na kpɛsɛrɛɛkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ haanɩ.
Mɛ̃ a-n so ɔɔ sɛbɛsɔra fɛʋ ka a-n mɩɩnɩ ga thɩmɩɩ. Paar hale a khɩɩr jɩɩrra, dɩ jɩ 'leedara na wɩrɛ na tɩɛnna' n fi gi mɔ̃kɛ wɩ-n cʋʋnι na gɩ̃ Thãgbaa sɛbɛsɔ dakha, sι dιι do awι thɛthɛɛ kʋɛ gι.
Gɛr gι nɛrkɛ mι-n nanι, ne wer 'lire jιιr ga thɩ̃sɔɔle; na-n jιɛ hιιn dι tιι khabaasɔɔ fιl puu na-n cʋʋ nι nι lɛ̃ hʋɛra sι nι faa anɩ kɩbɩ jɩɩla'.
Nɩ jɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitiikɛ kɔɔ taa sɩnɩ ga-n pɛr, dɩ dɔ nɩ jɩ dakha bɔ jɩɩrɩkɛ a kɔɔ jɩ sɩnɩ ga-n pɛr. Ɔr hɩna i dʋbɩrɛ nɛnɛ̃ waa, gɩ jalna khorr.
Gιrɛ kɔɔ hanι kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar, gιrɛ sɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ, gɩrɛ sɩ kɔɔ yɩnɩ na asɩ yi dɩ sa-n hɩɩn, dɩ asɩ nyɛ̃ dakha kɔɔ tharrɔ, kɛ dɔnɩ yi thɩmɩɩ, gɛr sɩ khere nar.
Dɩ yireele kɔɔ yɩrrɛ dι sɩ kɔɔ yɩ gɩ, dɩ sa-n mɩɩ sobɔ so jɩɩr, dɩ yire khorrɩdara sɩ-n mɩɩ nɩ, kɛ kɔɔ hanɩ Thɩrɛɛ pa sa yɩr sar gɩrɛ.
Gelela sɩ kɔɔ yɩnɩ a nɩɛna gɛr sɩ-n mɩɩ nɩ, dɩ mɛ̃ nɛrɛ dakha na do kha kũu bɩnɔ na sɛrɛ; dɩ ado sɛr gɩ sɩ dor kha kũu bɩnɔ na Thɩrɛ nakha ɔɔ Bikuun Jeju Kirisiti.
Dɩ sɩ-n kherere ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ dɩ mɛ̃ asɩ da na jɩɩ do daʋ na ka.
Dɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛra sι kɔɔ nιnι ɔɔ pa, dι sa-n mιι nι gιrɛ, gɛr dʋɔn Thãgba dʋɔn dahιrɛ, dabirə na haaraa fιιʋraka'.
Dι a sι so ayι, sι dor kha kũu bιnɔ na ɔr, sιι do dabirə sι-n jalna, sõsor sι kur, sa-n cʋʋ gιrɛ dɔnι sobɔra'.
Sι ado sι-n jaal na dahιrɛ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ hanι dahιrɛra, ga dor sι kuune khasɔ bιɛlbιɛl dι ɔɔ Bikuun Jejuu tɔmɩ̃ na-n cɔcɔɔ sɛr sopugo ɓibi.
Ado sι so ayι, sa hana sopugoə', ga dor dɩbara sɩ-n fɩɩl dɩ sobɔr na ha sara'.
Sɩ ado sɩ cã asɩ sopugosɔ, sobɔdaar Thãgba do, na fɩl sardaar, a na faa asɩ sopugosɔ na ha sɩ, sɩ a cɔcɔɔ sɩ asɩ thɩ̃ gõgolõ fɛʋ.
Dɩ ado sɩ so ayɩ, sa kɔɔ cʋʋ sopugoə', ga dor sõsodaar sɩ cʋgʋʋ dɩ do, dɩ ga dor ɔɔ so na haan asɩ bɩnɔa'.
Ɩ̃ bɩsã bi mɩ-n khere narɛ ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ dɩ na-n cʋʋ sopugoə', sɩ ado tibil cʋʋ sopugo, sι hananɛ so ƴɛɛdaar Thιrɛɛ pa, Jeju Kirisiti fιl sardaar gι.
Dι ɔɔ thɛthɛra dʋɔn bonι jirikɛ hɛlanι asι sopugosɔ, ga do asι sopugosɔ dιbara ga, sι tɩbɩla fɛʋ thιιraada dakha.
Ado sι-n hιιnɛ ɔɔ jɔfʋ, liir sa jιι jɩna dɩ sɩ jɩɩrɛ.
Tibilikɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ, ɩnɩ jɩɩrɛ sɩ aa-n hɩɩn ɔɔ jɔfʋa', sõsodaar gɩ, dɩ dakha sobɔr na haaraa ga.
Ado tibil na hɩɩn ɔɔ so, ga dor Thãgba naʋ daan waa vʋ̃ʋ ntɛɛ pa, gɛr na cʋɛ sɩ dɩ sa jɩ tue dɩ sɩ haaraarɛ.
Dɩ tibilikɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ, ɔrra ɩnɩ too, gɩ teenanɛ ntɛ na-n ɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ kɔɔ ɩɩrnɩ.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, ga do jɔfʋ phaa mɩ-n khere nara', sɩ jɔfʋ tɩ̃ɩ gɩɩkɛ nɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar, dɩ jɔfʋ tɩ̃ɩkɛra dʋɔn thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ.
Sɩrakɛ jɔfʋ phaa gɩ dɩ ɩ̃ khere nar, dɩ sobɔr gɩ do ɔrra na nɛrɛra, gɩdonɩ dabirə n kar sɩ dɩ dahɩrɛ bɔ 'li yɩrrɛ.
Tibilikɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ, ɩnɩ har dahɩrɛra, sɩ da-n laar ɔɔ omi, dabirəra a ha 'lo.
Tibilikɛ n naannɩ ɔɔ omi dahɩrɛra a too, dɩ nɛ baradaa na haaraa ga.
Sɩ tibilikɛ n laarɛnɩ ɔɔ omi dabirəra a ha, dɩ dabirərara a-n ɩɩr, dɩ aa jɩ kãkɛ a-n jalna', gɩdonɩ dabirə tɔnaa yɩr.
Mɩ khere narɛ bɩsã bii, gɩdonɩ ɔɔ i dɔ nɔɔ dɩ nɩ 'lɛ sopugo faarɛ.
Mɩ khere narɛ thɛ, gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩrɛ ʋrɛ kɔɔ hanɩle kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar. Mɩ khere narɛ daɓola, gɩdonɩ nɩ punone puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daar. Mι kɔɔ khere narɛ bιsana, gιdonι nι jιrɛ Thɩrɛ.
Mɩ kɔɔ khere narɛ thɛ, gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩrɛ ʋrɛ kɔɔ hanɩle kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar. Mɩ kɔɔ khere narɛ daɓola, gɩdonɩ nɩ hananɛ fãga, dɩ dakha Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ too nɛrɛra, dɩ nɩ puno puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daar.
Na-n do thɩɩkɛ na ɔɔda n bo ga-n too nɩ haara ga. A tibil na na thɩɩkɛɛ thɩ̃ aa-n hana naʋ Thɩrɛra ga.
Gɩdonɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ hanι thιιra, kɛ dʋɔnnι thɩ̃ puukɛ n kɔnɩ tibil thue, na gɩrɛ n kɔnɩ yinə thue, na i ƴaalɛ thɩ̃ hananɛna, ga do Thɩrɛɛ pa gɩ tha', sɩ thɩɩra gɩ the.
Dɩ thɩɩra n kar na gɩrɛra n kɔnɩ tibil thue kɛ n thɩɛraanɩ, sɩ tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ Thãgba tuur n toore khorr.
Bɩsana, pɩpɩɩ bɔɔ ha gɩrɛ, dɩ mɔ̃ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ dɩ Kirisitii vardaar n ɩnɛ, nɛnɛnakɛ Kirisitii vardarasɔra jɔɔ hale, gɛrra sɩ jɩ dɩ pɩpɩɩ bɔɔ gɩ.
Wɩ kɔɔ ther asɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn, dɩ asɩda wɩ kɔɔ doraka'; gɩdonɩ ado asɩda wɩ kɔɔ do ga dor wa kɔɔ toona sɛr. Sɩ gele daan dɩ mɛ̃ ga nɩna dɩ bɩɛl na kɔɔ do asɩda ga.
Sɩ nɛrɛ, ʋrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ Daphuu, Thu Phuu a kɔɔ ha nɩ, dɩ nɛrɛ fɛʋ jɩɩr na 'lee na'.
Mɩ kɔɔ khere narɛ gɩdonɩ ga do na jɩ sobɔraa ga, sɩ gɩdonɩ nɩ jɩ gɛr, dɩ sõso bɩɛllakɛ na the sobɔrra ga.
Amɛ dʋɔn sõsodaar saagado ʋrɛ n bananɛnɩ dɩ yɩ Kirisiti Jeju doaa ga; dɩ olela dʋɔn Kirisitii vardaar, ɔr n bɔ Thɩrɛ na Bikuun.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ n bɔnɩ Bikuun aa hana dakha Thɩra', sɩ tibilikɛ n tuonni Bikuun a hananɛ dakha Thɩrɛ.
Ado ne wer gɩ, nɩ dɔ gɩrɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar n too nɛrɛra; ado gɩrɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar n toore nɛrɛra, ga dor nɛrɛ dakha na toore Bikuunna na Thɩrɛra.
Dɩ ʋlfɛrɛɛkɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ kɔɔ ʋlfɛna sɩnɩ gɛr dʋɔn yire khorr.
Wɩrɛ n cʋɛ nɩnɩ dɩ na-n lɛ̃ hʋɛra dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ ɩ̃ khere nar ga thɩ̃ɩkɛ.

Ado nɛr gɩ, Thu Phuukɛ nɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ ɔɔ pa toore nɛrɛra, dɩ na hana ƴaalɛ ʋkha na-n dɩrɛ nɩ thɩ̃a', sɩ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ Thu Phuu n dɩɩr nɩnɩ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ, na mɔ̃ a donɩ sobɔ sodaar ga do sõsodaar ga, nɩ tɔɔ ɔrra mɔ̃kɛra a kɔɔ dɩɩr nɩnɩ.
Dι nɛnɛ̃ bɩsã bii, nι tɔɔ ɔrra dɩ mɛ̃ wireekɛ a na phanɩ sa hananɛ 'lar, gɩ do ɔɔ bir ɩ̃ bɔɔ yicuru na fʋ sɩ sɩ hʋnɔnaa ga.
Ado nɩ jɩrɛ dɩɩ do fɩl sardaar a do, nɩ jɛ dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ dasarʋ ɔr kɔna ntɛ.
Nɩ yɛ naʋ caakɛ Thɩrɛ kɔɔ na sɩnɩ ɓoɓo dɩ wɩ thʋ̃ dɩ wa-n we sɩ Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔ, dɩ gɛrra sɩ do. Dɩ gɛrra dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ thɩdara na jɩ sa', gɩdonɩ wa kɔɔ jɩɩ dakha ga.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔ sɩ do gɩrɛ, sɩ gɩrɛ sa donɩ ga yɩr pa'; sɩ sɩ jɩrɛ wireekɛ a na phanɩ sa hʋʋrɛ, gιdonι sa yιιrɛ mɔ̃kɛ a hanι.
Dι tibil wo tibilikɛ hananι nũ pɛ caakɛ n cʋʋrɛ dιbara a na-n phu mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ phuni.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ n cʋɛnι sopugo Thãgbaa jɔfʋ a-n kʋɛ, dι sopugo cʋʋrɛ dʋɔn jɔfʋ kʋɛrɛ.
Sι nι jιrɛ dι Jeju kɔɔ ιnɛ kɛ a ti asι sopugosɔ, dι ɔɔ thɛthɛra sopugo na haaraa ga.
Dι tibil wo tibilikɛ tɔɔnι ɔrra aa-n cʋʋ sopugoə'; tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ sopugo ntɛɛle na kɔɔ yɩa', aa kɔɔ jɩɩ dakha ga.
Bɩsã bii, na-n do tibil n fɩɩl na'; tibilikɛ n cʋɛnɩ dasarʋ, fɩl sardaar a do mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ thɛthɛ donɩ fɩl sardaar.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ n cʋɛnɩ sopugo Satãa pa a the, gɩdonɩ Satã kɔɔ mãa fʋrɛ sopugo cʋʋrɛ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar, dɩ gɛr gɩ dɩ Thãgbaa Bikuun kɔɔ ɩ̃ a bũburõ Satãa thɔna.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ Thãgba kɔnɩ aa-n cʋʋ sopugoə', gɩdonɩ beekɛ Thãgba diirni har ɔɔ bɩnɔ, dɩ aa-n puno dɩ cʋʋ sopugoə', gιdonι Thãgba kɔnaa.
Gɩrɛ wɩ-n jɩnanɩ Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔ na Satãa bɩsãsɔ ha gɩrɛ: Tibil wo tibilikɛ na-n cʋɛnɩ dasarʋa', ga do Thãgbaada a doa', mɛna gɩ na ʋrɛ na-n naannɩ ɔɔ oma'.
Thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar gɛr ha gɩrɛ: Sa-n na kha fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Dɩ sa-n ho Kayɛ̃ɛkɛ kɔɔ dɔnɩ puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarɩda, kɛ kɔɔ kɔnɩ ɔɔ õkuuna'. Dɩ mɔ̃gɩdo dɩ kʋʋ? Gɩdonɩ ɔɔ thɔ̃ puurore sɩ ɔɔ õkuunida sar.
Omɩna ado tɩbɩla thɩɩra na laar nɩ, na-n do nʋɔ n kpaa na'.
Sɛrɛ sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sɩ ther khirrə a lõ yirera, gɩdonɩ sɩ-n nar omɩna; ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ naʋa', khirrə a bo too.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ n laarɛnɩ ɔɔ omi tɩɩ kʋ haa, dɩ nɩ jɩrɛ dɩ tɩɩ kʋ bɩɛllakɛ na-n hana yire khorra'.
Sι jιrɛ gιrɛ n dɔnι naʋ, dι gɩ ther gιrɛraakɛ Kirisiti kɔɔ faa sarnι ɔɔ yi, sɛrɛ dakha gι teenanɛ sa-n faa asɩ yi omɩnana.
Ado tibil hana thɩɩkɛɛ thɩ̃ sa yɩ ɔɔ omi thɩ̃ ɓɔrɛra sɩ aa ƴaal a kher a hɩɩnʋa', mɔ̃ dɔ Thãgba naʋ haaraarɛ?
Bɩsã bii, sa-n na kha na nʋɔ dɩbara dɩ delẽbire ga, sɩ sa-n na kha na thɩ̃ cʋʋrɛ nakha sobɔr.
Gɛr sa jɩna dɩ sɩ dor sobɔdara, dɩ sa faarɛ haar yala ɔɔ ƴɛra.
Gɩdonɩ ado asɩ ha na heen sɩ sor, Thãgba kɔ̃tɩnɛ a jɔ asɩ ha, dɩ a jɩrɛ thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, ado asɩ ha na-n heen sɩ sora', sɩ hananɛ tu jɩɩr Thãgbaa pa,
dɩ thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ sɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ a-n ha sɛr, gɩdonɩ sɩ-n hɩɩnɛ ɔɔ jɔfʋ dɩ sa-n cʋʋna gɩrɛ n daaraanɩ.
Dɩ gɩrɛ dɔ ɔɔ jɔfʋ ayɩ: Dɔ sɩ pɛr ɔɔ Bikuun Jeju Kirisitii i haar dɩ sa-n na kha fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl mɔ̃kɛ jɔfʋʋkɛ a kɔɔ ha sɩnɩ n sonɩ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ n hɩnɛnɩ Thãgbaa jɔfʋ ɔr n tɔɔraa dɩ Thãgba n haaraa; dɩ Thu Phuukɛ a kɔɔ ha sɩnɩ sɩ jɩna dɩ a-n hana sɛr.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, na-n pɛ tɩbɩla fɛʋʋda haara', sɩ na-n jʋrɛ wɩ na hɩnɛ ado Thãgbaa Thu n thɔɔ wɩ, gɩdonɩ sõso bobona jɔɔ ɩɩrɛ a lõ thɩɩra.
Gɩrɛ na jɩrɔnɩ dɩ Thãgbaa Thu gɩ: Tibil wo tibilikɛ n tuonni dɩ tomɩr Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ hana a ɩnɩ, Thãgbaa Thu ntɛɛle hana.
Sɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ na-n tuonni Jeju thala', ga do Thãgbaa Thu ntɛɛle hana ga, gɛr dʋɔn Kirisitii vardaarɩdara nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ ga ɩ̃, kɛ 'lenɩ hakɛrakɛ gɩrɛ thɩɩra.
Bɩsã bii, nɛrɛ, Thãgbaada nɩ do, dɩ nɩ puno wer, gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ hanɩ anɩ bɩnɔ a kɔ̃tɩnɛ a jɔ ʋrɛɛkɛ hanɩ thɩdarara.
Wɛr, thɩɩda wɩ do, gɛr gɩ dɩ wa-n mɩɩ gɩrɛ thɩdara n mɩɩnɩ, dɩ thɩdara n pɛ wɛr nũu.
Sɩ sɛrɛ, Thãgbaada sɩ do. Ʋrɛɛkɛ jɩɛnnɩ jɩ Thãgba a-n pɛ sɛr nũu, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na dɔnɩ Thãgbaada ga, aa-n pɛ sɩ nũə'; liir sɩ-n jɩna sobɔ thue na fɩfɩɩl thue.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, sa-n na kha fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl, gɩdonɩ naʋ Thãgbara gɩ the, dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ hananɩ naʋ, Thãgba kɔnaa dɩ jɩ Thãgba.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ naʋa', aa jɩ Thãgba ga, gɩdonɩ Thãgba dʋɔn naʋ.
Gɩrɛ n nɛnanɩ naʋʋkɛ Thãgba na sɩnɩ dʋɔn mɔ̃ a kɔɔ thɔnɩ ɔɔ Bikũu bɩɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽ thɩɩra, dɩ mɛ̃ sa 'lɩɛraa yire.
Dɩ hɩnɛ mɔ̃ naʋra hanɩ, gɛr dʋɔn ga do sɛr kɔɔ naan Thãgba ga, sɩ ɔr gɩɩkɛ kɔɔ naan sɩnɩ a thɔ̃ ɔɔ Bikuun dɩ do sar bonɩ jirikɛ hɛlanɩ asɩ sopugo.
Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, ado Thãgba kɔɔ na sɛr thale, gɩ teenanɛ sɛrɛ dakha sa-n na kha fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Tibil na kɔɔ yɩ Thãgba yuuraka', sɩ ado sɩ-n nar kha fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl Thãgba har asɩ bɩnɔ, dɩ ɔɔ naʋ daan waa vʋ̃ʋ sɛrɛra.
Gɩrɛ sɩ jɩnanɩ dɩ sɩ tooraarɛ dɩ ɔr ha sɛrɛra dʋɔn gɩ ther gɩrɛraakɛ a kɔɔ ha sɩnɩ ɔɔ Thu.
Dɩ sɛrɛ, sɩ yɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ Thɩrɛ kɔɔ thɔnɩ ɔɔ Bikuun dɩ do tɩbɩla fɛʋ thɩɩraa Taadaar, dɩ gɛr sɩ-n mɩɩrɔ sobɔ so jɩɩr.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na tuonni nayɩ Jeju dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun, Thãgba haaraarɛ, dɩ ɔr dakha too Thãgbara.
Dɩ sɛrɛ, sɩ jɩrɛ naʋʋkɛ Thãgba hana sarnɩ dɩ sɩ pɛ gɛr haar. Thãgba dʋɔn naʋ, dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ tɔɔnɩ naʋra a toore Thãgbara, dɩ Thãgba haaraa.
Mɔ̃ a hanɩ mɛ̃ sɩ ha ser thɩɩraakɛ, gelela dɔ nɔɔ dɩ naʋ dã waa vʋ̃ʋ asɩ bɩnɔ, dɩ mɛ̃ sa hana tu jɩɩr kɩɩl wire.
Naʋ na-n hana maara', sɩ naʋʋkɛ dananɩ vʋ̃ʋ n weere maar, gɩdonɩ maar n nɩnanɛ dɩ so 'lɛr n kpaanɛ, dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ maar n kʋnɩ na hana naʋʋkɛ dananɩ bɔɔbɔa'.
Ado sɛr gɩ, sɩ-n naarɛ gɩdonɩ ɔr kɔɔ naan sɩ caca.
Ado tibil so ayɩ, ɩnɩ-n nar Thãgba, sɩ na laar ɔɔ omi, sõsodaar gɩ; gɩdonɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n naannɩ ɔɔ omiikɛ a-n yɩna', mɔ̃ a na puno a na na Thãgbaakɛ aa yɩna?
Dɩ ɔrra sɩ 'lɛ jɔfʋʋkɛ ayɩ: Dɔ ʋrɛɛkɛ n naannɩ Thãgba a na-n na dakha ɔɔ omi.
Tibil wo tibilikɛ pɩɛrnɩ haar dɩ Jeju dʋɔn Kirisiti, Thãgba kɔnaa; dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ n naannɩ Thãgbaakɛ n kɔnanɩ tibil, a-n nar dakha ʋrɛɛkɛ Thãgbara kɔnɩ.
Sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sɩ-n nar Thãgbaa bɩsãsɔ ɔbɔɔkɛ sɩ-n nanɩ Thãgba dɩ sa-n cʋʋna ɔɔ jɔfʋ.
Gɩdonɩ Thãgba naar dʋɔn ɔɔ jɔfʋ hɩɩnɛ, dɩ ɔɔ jɔfʋra na khɩɩra'.
Gɩdonɩ ʋrɛ Thãgba kɔnɩ n punone thɩdaa; dɩ fãgaakɛ n punoneni thɩdaa dʋɔn asɩ ha pɛ.
Amɛ dɔ ʋrɛ n punoneni thɩdaa? Ʋrɛ dɩbara pɩɛrnɩ haar dɩ Jeju dʋɔn Thãgbaa Bikuun gɩ.
Ɔr dɔ Jeju Kirisitiikɛ kɔɔ ɩnanɩ na nyʋɔn na tɔmɩn, ga do nyʋɔn a ɩna dɩbara ga, sɩ nyʋɔn gɩ na tɔmɩn. Dɩ Thu Phuu dʋɔn ʋrɛɛkɛ n mɩanɩ sobɔ so jɩɩr, gɩdonɩ Thu Phuu dʋɔn sobɔr.
Gɩdonɩ yẽther hale n mɩanɩ sobɔ so jɩɩr:
Thu Phuu, nyʋɔn na tɔmɩn, dɩ wɛr yẽther dor kha nɔ bɩɛl.
Ado sa tu tɩbɩlaa sobɔ so jɩ, Thãgbaa sobɔ so jɩ kɔ̃tɩnɛ a jɔ gɩ, dɩ sobɔ so jɩɩrɩlera Thãgbaa thɛthɛ mɩa a pɛ ɔɔ Bikuunna.

Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ n pɩɛrnɩ haar Thãgbaa Bikuunna, a hananɛ ga sobɔ so jɩɩle ɔɔ bɩnɔ; sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na-n pɩɛrnɩ Thãgba haara', n cʋʋrɛ dɩɩ do sõsodaar Thãgba do, gɩdonɩ aa pɛr haar sobɔ so jɩɩrraakɛ Thãgba mɩɩnɩ a pɛr ɔɔ Bikuunna ga.
Dɩ hɩnɛ gɩrɛ dɔnɩ ga sobɔ so jɩɩkɛra, gɛr dʋɔn yire khorrɩkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ ha sɩnɩ, dɩ yireelera ɔɔ Bikuunna gɩ ha.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ Bikuun a hananɛ yire, sɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ na hananɩ Thãgbaa Bikuuna', aa hana yirə'.
Mɩ khere narɛ ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛ dɩ mɛ̃ na jɩɩ jɩ dɩ nɩ hananɛ yire khorr, nɛrɛɛkɛ n pɩɛrnɩ Thãgbaa Bikuuni i haar.
Tu jɩɩrɩkɛ sɩ hananɩ ɔrra dʋɔn, ado sa bɩɛlaa thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛ dɩɩ do ɔɔ tuur gɩ, a-n pɛ sɛr nũu.
Dɩ ado sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ a-n pɛ sɛr nũu thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩɛnaakɛ sɩ-n bɩɛlnɩ, sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ sɩ 'lɛr thɩ̃ dookɛra sɩ kɔɔ bɩɛlaanɩ.

Ado tibil yɩ ɔɔ omi dɩ cʋʋ sopugookɛ na halaanɩ na jalna khirrə ga, a bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba omi dɔɔle na 'lɛr yire. A thɩɛna gaa, wɩrɛɛkɛ na-n cʋɛnɩ sopugookɛ n halanɩ dɩɩ jalna khirrə ga mɩ so. Sopugo hale n halanɩ tibil dɩɩ jalna khirrə, ga do ga sopugoole mɩ yɩ nɩ bɩɛllɔ Thãgba ga.
Thɩ̃ɛ wo thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na sarana', sopugo gɩ, sɩ sopugo hale na-n halanɩ tibil dɩɩ jalna khirrə ga.
Sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ tibil wo tibilikɛ Thãgba kɔnɩ aa-n cʋʋ sopugoə', gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa Bikuun n bɛraa, dɩ puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daar na-n thaaraa ga.
Sɩ jɩrɛ dɩ Thãgbaada sɩ do, sɩ thɩɩ koo puu cʋʋ hɩ̃daarɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ gɩ ha.
Sɩ jɩrɛ dakha dɩ Thãgbaa Bikuun kɔɔ ɩnɛ kɛ a ha sɩ jɩɩr dɩ sa jɩna sobɔdaar; dɩ mɔ̃ sɩ hanɩ ɔɔ Bikuun Jeju Kirisitira, sobɔdaarra sɩ ha; ɔr gɩɩkɛ dɔnɩ sobɔ Thãgba a dona yire khorr.
Bɩsã bii, na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn, na-n ha kha dɩkha na thɩla fɩɩʋraka'.
Mɛr kɔ̃tɩn thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha Kɩrɩa, kɛ dʋɔnnɩ khɛrɩkɛ Thãgba phiirni, a hana dakha ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ, kɛ dɔnɩ nɛrkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ na sobɔr, sɩ ga do mɛr dɩbara n naan na', sɩ wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ jɛnɩ sobɔr n naan nɩ,
dɩɩ the sobɔrraakɛ tɔɔnɩ sɛrɛra, kɛ na hanɩ kha na sɛrɛ na dana bɔɔ khorr.
Thãgba Thɩrɛ na Jeju Kirisitiikɛ dɔnɩ Thɩrɛɛ Bikuun na-n jɛ sɩ bʋɔra, a na-n dɔna sɩ dakha bʋɔ, a na-n hana sɩ dakha ha ɩɩ mɔ̃ sɩ donɩ wɩrɛ jɛnɩ sobɔr kɛ n naannɩ khasɔ.
Gɩ da marɛ haar ka dɩ ɩ̃ kɔɔ yɩ mɔ̃ afɩ bɩsã ɩkha n ɩɩrnɩ sobɔrra, mɔ̃kɛ jɔfʋʋkɛ sɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ Thɩrɛɛ pa hanɩ.
Dɩ nɛnɛ̃kɛ gɩrɛ mɩ-n ƴaal farnɩ Kɩrɩa, ga do jɔfʋ phaa mɩ-n khere fara', Sɩ gɩrɛra sɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar gɩ, gɛr dʋɔn sa-n na kha fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Dɩ naʋ dʋɔn wɔɔ, sa-n ɩrɛ mɔ̃kɛ ɔɔ jɔfʋ hanɩ; gɛr dʋɔn jɔfʋʋkɛ teananɩ na-n ɩrɛrɔ mɔ̃kɛra nɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ kɛkɛkɛ fʋ paar.
Gɩdonɩ fɩfɩla jɔɔjɔɔ ɩɩrɛ a lõ thɩɩra, dɩ wa-n tu wɩ yɛ tomɩr Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ hana a ɩna'. Ʋrɛ hanɩ thale ɔr dʋɔn fɩfɩl na Kirisitii vardaar.
Na-n jɩɛ hɩɩn dɩbara dɩ gɩrɛ na 'lɛnɩ anɩ thɔna na-n do dakʋɛsʋa', sɩ nɩ 'lɛrɔ khor waɩ.
Ʋrɛ n ɩrɛnɩ da-n kəəro si aa-n too Kirisitii dɩɩrra ga, aa hana Thãgba ga. Sɩ ʋrɛ tɔɔnɩ dɩɩrɛraakɛ, ɔr hana Thɩrɛ na Bikuun.
Ado tibil pɔ anɩ pa, sɩ ga do dɩɩr ca ʋrɛ a pɔna ga, na-n teguu a to cʋɔrɔa', na-n fʋɔrʋʋrakɛ dakha ga.
Gɩdonɩ ntɛɛkɛ na fʋɔrɛɛnɩ ɔɔ thɔ̃ puusɔ a tu.
Mɩ hananɛ thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ a na khere nar gbobi, sɩ ma ƴaal ɩ̃ gba sɛbɛ na sɛbɛ khere nyʋɔn ɩ̃ mɩɩna na', sɩ mɩ-n pɛrɛ haar ɩ̃ pɔ anɩ pa sɩ mɩɩ kha ƴɛ biro, dɩ mɛ̃ asɩ da na jɩɩ do daʋ na ka.
Afɩ õkhɛrɩkɛ Thãgba phiirni, ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ fʋɔr fɛr.
Mɛr kɔ̃tɩn thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha Gayʋsɩɩkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ. Mɩ-n naarɛ na sobɔr.
Ɩ̃ kuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, mɔ̃ mɩ-n ƴaalnɩ gɩ hana far dʋɔn, thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ na-n jala far bɔɔ, fɩ 'lɛ tomɩ kheu, mɔ̃ afɩ thuda n jalnɩ bɔɔ.
Gɩ da marɛ haar ka, ɔbɔɔkɛ omɩna kɔɔ ɩnɩ a mɩɩ sobɔ so jɩɩr sobɔrraakɛ hanɩ afɩ pa, kɛ dɔnɩ mɔ̃ fɩ-n ɩɩrnɩ sobɔrra.
Ma hana daʋ dɩɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ jɔ da ʋra', kɛ dɔnɩ mɔ̃ mɩ-n nɩɛnɩ dɩ ɩ̃ bɩsãsɔ n ɩɩrɛ sobɔrra.
Ɩ̃ kuunikɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, fɩ-n cʋʋrɛ bɔɔ gɩrɛraakɛ fɩ-n cʋʋnɩ omɩnana, narakɛ omɩnanaakɛ dɔnɩ kpakpala.
Wɩ mɩɩrɛ sobɔ so jɩɩr afɩ naʋra we gbɛbɩdaraa thɩ̃thɩɩn; ga bɔrɛ ado fɩ bul wi na fɩlɛɛkɛ na danɩ Thãgbara awɩ kpaar para.
Gɩdonɩ Jeju Kirisitii i dɔ nɔɔ wɩ thenι jal, sɩ wa-n tee thɩ̃ɛ ca kpalaa pa ga.
Gɛr gɩ sɛrɛ, sɩ teenanɛ sɩ tea wa tibil casɔɔle, a gbɛba kha thɔma na dɔ sobɔrra.
Mι kɔɔ kherere thɩmιιr gbe a ha we gbɛbιdara, sι Diyotιrɛfιιkɛ n ƴaalɛnι ιnι-n dɔ war ƴɛ kʋl aa-n gba asιda ga.

Gɛr gι ado mι pɔ, cʋʋ caalera a-n cʋʋnιsɔ ma ιιrna gɛr, gιdonι a-n mιιrɛ thιmιι puunə da-n pɛ sar, sι gelelakɛ ga-n nιιraa pa', sι ɔɔ thɛthɛ n yι, ιna tee omιna ga, dι wιrɛ n ƴaalɛnι wa-n cʋʋ wo a-n pιɛr wɛr, sι dι wee wι we gbɛbιdaraa thɩ̃thιιn da-n faa.
Ɩ̃ kuunikɛ mι-n nanι, fa-n phɛl thɩ̃ puə', sι na phɛla thɩ̃ bʋɔ. Ʋrɛɛkɛ n cʋɛnι gιrɛɛkɛ bʋɔnɔnι Thãgbaada a do, sι ʋrɛ n cʋɛnι gιrɛ puurohi aa yι Thãgba ga.
Tιbιla fɛʋ na sobɔrι thɛthɛrakɛ n mιιrɛ so jι bʋɔ dι wa-n pɛ Demetiriynsira; sɛrɛ dakha sι-n mιιrɛ so jιιr dι sa-n pιɛraa, dι fι jιrɛ asι so jι dʋɔn sobɔr.
Mι hananɛ thɩ̃ɛ jɔɔ a na khere far, sι ma-n ƴaal ɩ̃ gba sɛbɛ khere nyʋɔn na sɛbɛ kheredaa ɩ̃ mιιna fa'.
Sι mι pɛrɛ haar kιɛr na gbe ma yι fɛr sι mιι kha ƴɛ biro.
Thãgba na-n hana fι ha ιι. Asι kuunsɔ fʋɔr fɛr; fʋɔrɛ asι kuunsɔ fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl na awι i.
Mɛr Juudiikɛ dɔnɩ Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃daar, a dona Jakɩɩ õkuun, thɔna sɛbɛɛkɛ a ha wɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgba Thɩrɛ wenɩ a na na wɩ dakha, kɛ dɔnɩ wɩrɛ Jeju Kirisiti n bɛrnɩ.
Thãgba na-n dɔna nɩ bʋɔ jɔɔ, a na-n hana nɩ dakha ha ɩɩ jɔɔ, a cʋɛ nɩ nɩ jɩɩ jɩ ɔɔ naʋ jɔɔ.

Nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, ƴaalɛɛkɛ mɩ kɔɔ hananɩ ɩ̃ hara dʋɔn ɩ̃ khere nar sɛbɛ taarɛraakɛ sɩ bulni khaa thɩmɩɩra, dɩ mɩ yɩ gɛr dɩɩ do dɔ ɩ̃ khere nar ger phubi ɩ̃ kpãkpãa nar nɩ kɛ̃kɛrɛ̃ na-n pɛ ha pɛdaaraakɛ tɩɩ phuusɔ 'lɛnɩ babɩɛl khorr.

Gɩdonɩ ɩkhaa tibilsɔ kɔɔ wolone a lõ anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn; tɩbɩla wɛɛkɛ na-n therananɩ Thãgba ga, wɩ debire Thãgbaa bɔ jɩ thɩmɩɩ ga-n jala mɔ̃kɛ awɩ khaakhaar thɩ̃ cʋʋ hanι, wι bor dakha Jeju Kirisiti asι Kɔ̃tɩ̃ bιɛl 'lẽ'lẽ'lẽekɛ dɔnι fãgadaar. Wɛr dɔ tιbιlaakɛ awι so heen kɔɔ maanι kherere.
Nɛrkɛ jιɛnnι ga thɩ̃sɔɔlera fɛʋ mɔ̃kɛ gι hanι, sι mι-n ƴaalɛ ɩ̃ bir ɩ̃ khe nar wo nι jιna dι ɔbɔɔkɛ Kɔ̃tιn kɔɔ taanι ɔɔ too Ejipiti dιιra pι, wιrɛ na kɔɔ pιɛnι haara', a kɔɔ bũburõ wer.
Nι jɛna dakha dι thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔkɛ kɔɔ faanι gιrɛ wι pɛ warnι, wa kɔɔ too dakha awι pa ga, a kɔɔ li wer khorr a faa dahulõ paar dabirəra, phaphapha gι dana wi kɔ̃tɩ̃ιkɛ a na kιιlna wιnι.

Nι jɛna dakha Sɔdɔm na Gɔmɔɔr na awι dι khudaraada, kɛ kɔɔ faanι awιbara bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛra oti, dɩ wa-n cʋʋna gɩrɛ Thãgba na kɔɔ tini tibil a cʋɛa'; wɩ kɔɔ 'lɛr so heene khorr dɔɔra, dɩ gɩrɛra dana wɩnɩ dor gɩrɛ thɩ̃ nɩrɔrɛ tɩbɩlala fɛʋ.
Mɛna tɩbɩlaale n yɛnɩ thɩ̃ɛ ɩnɩ yɩ ha dakha, awɩ tomɩ wɩ-n bise, wɩ-n beesire dakha Kɔ̃tɩnɩ fãga hana dɩ wa-n kpɛna ƴũ fãgadarasɔ.

Mɩsɛlɩkɛrakɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, ɔbɔɔkɛ sʋʋ kɔɔ ιιrnι dι wa-n bana kha na Satã Mʋιjιι forra, sιrakɛ aa kɔɔ heenuu sor na kpɛra', sι gιrɛ a sʋʋraanι dιbara dʋɔn: Kɔ̃tιn n pɛ far sor.
Sι tιbιlaale wer, gιrɛ wa jιnιnaka' wι-n kpɛ gɛr, sι gιrɛ wι jιnι hɔ̃ nʋ̃ khaa dιι do mɛ̃ gι-n do, gɛr dɔ gιrɛ na kʋɛa wιnι.
Ga puu warɛ dɛ, gιdonι Kayɛ̃ɛ hʋ wι gba a lona dakha dι paarra war ƴaalɛla Balamι kha, wι bũburone mɔ̃ wι ιιrnanι lãʋ Koree kha.

Pheru wɩ do mɔ̃ wɩ-n hanɩ anɩ naʋ dɩko kho pa sɩ dɩ wɩ gɔ lõ khaakhaar cʋʋrɛra, sɩ yicuru na-n fʋ wa'; wa-n therna tibil saagado awɩbara gaaga. Wɩ hʋrɛ thãgbaakɛ n jonanɩ sɩ dɩ jɩɛ n ti gi; wɩ hʋrɛ dakha thɩraakɛ dananɩ sɩɩr sɩ ga-n sa'; thɩr khɩna yɛɛkɛ wɩ phiirni faa.
Wɩ hʋrɛ lanyʋɔnɩkɛ jɩɛ na-n sɩrɔnɩ cɔcɔa', awɩ yicur thɔ̃ cʋʋ n ther yɔkhɔrɔ̃ khaa. Wɩ hʋrɛ dakha ƴepələ̃beekɛ n fileneni bababa; pa hulõ paarιkɛ birəneni tĩtĩtĩ Thãgba thιιn khorr dι ga-n pιɛr wι.
Sι Enɔkι, mama kɔ̃tιn, kɛ dɔnι makonyɔdaarιkɛ Adã karɔnι sι dι kpaan, a kɔɔ mιιrɛ awιda dιι do bʋʋr gι dι bo ayι: “Kɔ̃tιn ιnɛ na ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ tə̃tə̃tə̃,
a kιιlna tιbιla fɛʋ, a heen wιrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ na-n theranaana' sor, gι the awι thɔ̃ puurəəkɛ wι kɔɔ cʋʋnι Thãgbara, na awι thιmιι kpallaakɛ wɛr sopugodaraalera na-n theranaana' kɔɔ mιιraanι.”
Tɩbɩla wɛɛkɛ hũhuune donɩ awɩda na cɩ̃cɩmanɛ; wɩ-n ɩɩrɛ mɔ̃ awɩ ha pɩɛr hanɩ; i ƴaal thɩmɩɩ haar n thɛ wɩ nɔɔ; wɩ-n fɩɩlɛ tɩbɩla wa-n 'lɛrɔ khor.
Sɩ nɛrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ omɩnaakɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, na-n jɛna thɩmɩaakɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii thɔ̃thɔ̃sɔ kɔɔ maanɩ mɩɩrɛ.
Wɩ-n kɔɔ so narɛ ayɩ: A pɩpɩɩ bɔɔ na dã, wɩrɛɛkɛ na-n maanɛ nɩnɩ na hale, wa-n ɩɩr mɔ̃kɛ awɩ thɩ̃ puu ƴaal n kʋ wɩnɩ thue.
Wɛr dɔ tɩbɩlaakɛ na-n pɩɛrnɩ leere; thɩɩkɛɛda wɩ do, wa hana Thãgbaa Thuə'.
Sɩ nɛrɛɛkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ, nɩ khɔna na pɩɛr anɩ ha pɛ bɔraakɛ nɩ hananɩ; na-n bɩɛlnɛ Thãgba na Thu Phuu fãga.
Nɩ jɩɛ too naʋraakɛ Thãgba na sɩnɩ, mɔ̃ nɩ-n pɩɛrnɩ yire khorrɩkɛ asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisiti na ha nɩnɩ, gɩ do ɔɔ bɔ donana gɩ the.
Wɩrɛ n ƴeƴerenenɩ na-n bulo wi;
na-n taa wɩ a vənə wi dɔɔra na te; ɩkhasɔ wo, na-n jɛ wɩ bʋɔra sɩ nɩ dɔ gɩ do bɔ jɩɩrɩkɛ hananɩ maar, nɩ thʋ̃ na-n laarnanakɛ khələlələ kɩ̃kɩɩnɩkɛ thɩ̃ puu ƴaalɛɛkɛ n kɔ wɩnɩ thue cʋʋnɩ dɩɩ bise.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na punoneni na fʋ nɩ dɩ na jə', a cʋʋ nɩ dakha nɩ jɩɩlna kãkar ɔɔ ƴɛraakɛ n carbaranɛnɩ, nɩ 'lee dɩ paar;

ʋrɛɛkɛra dɔnɩ Thãgba bɩɛl dɩbara gɩ, kɛ kɔɔ taa sɩnɩ dɩɩ do asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ Jeju Kirisitii pa gɩ the, dɔ gɩ do ɔr hɩna i dʋbɩrɛ, na wabɩrɛ, na fãga, na punone, bɔɔ fɛʋraakɛ kɔɔ kanɩ, na nɛnɛ̃, na bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Gɩrɛɛkɛ dʋɔn nɩrɔrɛɛkɛ Thãgba kɔɔ hanɩ Jeju Kirisiti a gba nɛna Thãgbaa thɔ̃darasɔ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ na dananɩ kɔrɔ. Dɩ Kirisiti thʋɔn ɔɔ thɔ̃daar thu a cʋɛ ɔɔ thɔ̃daar Jã a jɩ gɩ,
kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ mɩanɩ gɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ a yɩnɩ, kɛ dɔnɩ thɩmɩɩrɩkɛ thɛnɩ Thãgbaa pa na sobɔrɩkɛ Jeju Kirisiti kɔɔ mɩgʋʋnɩ.
Ga dar ʋrɛraakɛ n hɩnɛnɩ sɛbɛɛkɛ na wɩrɛraakɛ n pɛnɩ Thãgbaa bobonɩ thɩmɩɩkɛ nũu, dɩ wa-n nɩ nũu dakha gɩrɛraakɛ kherenenɩ, gɩdonɩ bɔɔkɛ ga thɩ̃sɔɔkɛra na danɩ gɩ daan.

Jã thɔna fʋɔrɛɛkɛ a ha we gbɛbɩdaraa cɔ makonyɔɔkɛ hanɩ Ajɩ ayɩ: Bɔ jɩɩr na ha ɩɩ n dana nɩ, kɛ n thɛnɩ Thãgbaraakɛ hanɩle gɩrɛ, kɛ dakha kɔɔ hanɩle, kɛ na ɩnanɩ, kɛ n thɛnɩ dakha thue makonyɔraakɛ hanɩ ɔɔ fãga too pa ƴɛ bʋrɔ,

kɛ dakha n thɛnɩ Jeju Kirisitii pa, kɛ dɔnɩ sobɔ so jɩdaar, na cacadaarɩkɛ Thãgba kɔnɩ, kɛ kɔɔ ɩrɛnɩ a the khirera, kɛ dɔnɩ gɩrɛ Fãgadaar kpɩɛ fãgadarara kɛ thɩɩra. Ʋrɛɛkɛ naan sɩnɩ a thʋbɩ sɩ sopugo pɔ̃ɔ na ɔɔ tɔmɩ̃,
ɔr gɩɩkɛ kɔɔ cʋɛ sɩnɩ dɩ sɩ do fãgadaraakɛ dɔnɩ bonɩ jidara Thãgbaraakɛ dɔnɩ ɔɔ Thɩ, dɔ ɔr n hɩ̃ i dʋbɩrɛ na fãga bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Hɩnɛ a-n ɩnɛ na ndɔlɔ̃pana, dɩ tɩbɩla fɛʋ na yɩɩrɛ narakɛ wɩrɛ kɔɔ gʋɔnɩ na khalʋ, dɩ tibil caar fɛʋ thɩɩra na-n bɩrɛ ɔɔdara. Sobɔr gɩ thalera ga ha. Amɛn.
Mɛr dʋɔn Alfa na Omega, Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaakɛ dɔnɩ fãga fɛʋʋ hɩ̃daar, kɛ hanɩle gɩrɛ, kɛ dakha kɔɔ hanɩle, kɛ na ɩnanɩ, mɛr sɔ.

Mɛr Jã anɩ omiikɛ buloni kha na nɛrɛ bɔ gaarɛ, na fãgadaar dɩɩ, nakha yɩrrɛ dɩɩ do asɩ bɩɛl dora na Jeju gɩ the, mɩ kɔɔ har yɔ dɩɩraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Patɩmɔsɩ gɩdonɩ Thãgbaa thɩmɩɩ na sobɔrɩkɛ dɔnɩ Jejuuda mɩ-n kɔɔ mɩɩ.
Thu Phuu kɔɔ ɩɩrna mɛr Kɔ̃tɩnɩ wi dɩ mɩ kɔɔ nɩrɛ nɔ khɩɩr ɩ̃ khiro dɩɩ ho mɔ̃ wɩ-n ʋnɩ tutuu,
dɩɩ so ayɩ: Gɩrɛra fɩ yɩnɩ, khera gɩ sɛbɛra, a thɔna hana we gbɛbɩdaraa cɔ makonyɔɔkɛ hanɩ Efɛjɩ, na Sɩmɩrnɩ, na Pɛrgam, na Tɩatɩɩr, na Saardɩ, na Fɩladɛlfɩ, na Laʋdɩse.
Dɩ mɩ kɔɔ kɩɩlɛ ɩ̃ hɩɩn wi dɔɔlera n mɩana mɩnɩ, dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ kɩɩlnɩ, mɩ yɩrɛ dɔ carã dɛ̃ɛ paarɩkɛ dɔnɩ dɛdaa makonyɔ,
dɩ tibil hale a jɩɩl thɩ̃thɩɩn da-n hona tibili bikuun, a to kẽkẽ gbãa dɩɩ dã nɛɛ, sa khɩmɩ dɛ lo phɛrɛ kũkuno.
Ɔɔ yʋsũ bulolole phɩphɩphɩl a ho phũgə̃, a hona dakha mɩlɛ, sɩ ɔɔ yisɔ hʋrɛ dɔlɩnanɛ.
Ɔɔ nɛsɔ n carbararɛ mɔ̃kɛ the sɩɛ n hɩlnɩ dɔɔra, sɩ ɔɔ nɔ so pa ho yɔ jɔ helle.
Ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔra ƴepələ̃be makonyɔ hale dɩ fʋrɔ, dɩ khalgbãakɛ n khɛnɩ bilə yenyɔ fɛʋ kɔɔ hale a thɩɩ nʋɔra, sɩ ɔɔ ƴɛ wer hʋrɛ mɔ̃ wire n carbaranɩ ʋlkhɔɔ.
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ mɩ yɩɩnɩ mɩ jire ɔɔ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn a ho khire, sɩ a tha marɛ na nyɔ̃bɔɔ sa so ayɩ: Fa-n do maar n fʋ fa'. Mɛr dɔ cacadaar na pɩpɩɩdaar,
a dona yidaar. Mɩ kɔɔ khire, sɩ hɩnɛ mɩ hananɛ yire gɩrɛ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ, dɩ mɛr n punone khir na khĩdi dɩɩ dakha.
Gɛr gɩ khera gɩrɛɛkɛra fɩ yɩnɩ, kɛ hanɩle gɩrɛ, na gɩrɛ na pɩrɔnɛnɩ na kpaan.

Ado ƴepələ̃be makonyɔɔdaakɛ fɩ yɩnɩ ɩ̃ nyɔ̃bɔra gɩ, na dɔ carã dɛ̃ɛ paarɩkɛ dɔnɩ dɛdaa makonyɔɔda, thɩ̃ gbul gɩ, dɩ ga kɩr dʋɔn: Ƴepələ̃be makonyɔɔle dʋɔn thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔkɛ hanɩ we gbɛbɩdaraa cɔ makonyɔ, sɩ dɔ carã dɛ̃ɛ paar makonyɔɔle dʋɔn we gbɛbɩdaraa cɔ makonyɔ.

Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Efɛjɩ we gbɛbɩdaraada. Hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ fɔrɔnɩ ƴepələ̃be makonyɔ ɔɔ nyɔ̃bɔra, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ n kpaarɛnɩ dɔ carã dɛ̃ɛ paarɩkɛ dɔnɩ dɛdaa makonyɔɔ thɩ̃thɩɩn sonɩ ayɩ:

Mɩ jɩrɛ afɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ, na afɩ thɔ̃, na afɩ ha fʋ. Mɩ jɩrɛ mɔ̃ fa-n punoni a na bɔ kha na puu cʋʋdara ga. Wɩrɛ yɛnɩ thɔ̃thɔna ɩnɩ do sɩɩ do wa doa', fɩ kɔɔ be wer bɩnɛ a hɩɩn a yɩɛ dɩɩ do sõsodara wɩ do.
Fɩ hananɛ ha fʋrɛ, fɩ kɔɔ fʋrɛ dakha haar bʋɔraakɛ fɩ kɔɔ gaarnɩ dɩɩ do ɩ̃ i dɔ nɔɔ sɩ fa kɔɔ vɔa'.
Sɩ sorɩkɛ mɩ hana fɩnɩ dʋɔn mɔ̃ fɩ faanɩ naʋʋkɛ fɩ kɔɔ hananɩ cacara.
Jɛna ka fɩ thenɩ ɓoɓo a thʋ̃ ji sa deba haar, a birə na cʋɛ afɩ caca thɔ̃, agado mɛ̃ ga, ma pɔ farɛ dɩ ma gbaar afɩ dɔ carã dɛ̃ɛ pa, agado haar fɩ deba'.
Sɩ gɩrɛ fɩ hananɩ wer dʋɔn mɔ̃ fɩ-n laarnɩ Nɩkolayɩtɩsɔɔ thɔ̃ khələlələ, kɛ dɔnɩ thɔmaakɛ mɛrɛɛ thɛthɛ n laarnɩ dakha.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra. Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni, ma haarɛ hʋɛ dɩ na kho yi thɩrʋʋ biikɛ hanɩ hɩɩr paar Thãgbaa kal ƴɔɔ.
Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Sɩmɩrnɩ we gbɛbɩdaraada. Hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ cacadaar na pɩpɩɩdaar, kɛ kɔɔ khenɩ sa bir ɩɩr a hana yire sonɩ ayɩ:
Mɩ jɩrɛ afɩ bɔ gaar na afɩ bɔdaar do phuphuphul, sɩɩ dorakɛ lẽledaar fɩ do. Mɩ jɩrɛ dakha i kʋɛrɛɛkɛ wɛkɛ yɛnɩ Juifisɔ ɩnɩ do n kʋɛ fɩnɩ, sɩɩ do wa do Juifisɔa', Satã wɩ-n kpa jɛ a na fʋɔr.

Fa-n do maar n fʋ fɩ gɩrɛraakɛ fa gaarna'. Hɩnɛ Satã na cʋʋrɛ dι wa fʋlɛ ιkhasɔ anι thɩ̃thιιn a na to khaιra gι be nι bιnɛ gι hιιn, dι na gaarɛ bʋɔ wire yʋɔr. Dɔ sobɔ cʋʋdaar a danana khir dɩ fa 'lɛr ɩ̃ pa khorɩkɛ dɔnɩ yidaa.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra. Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni, balanyɔ khir na puno na cʋgʋʋ thɩ̃a'.
Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Pɛrgam we gbɛbɩdaraada. Hinɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ khalgbãakɛ n khɛnɩ bilə yenyɔ fɛʋ sonɩ ayɩ:

Mɩ jɩrɛ ka fɩ-n cɔnɩ, dɩ liir Satãa fãga too pa ha, sɩ fɩ fʋrɔrɛ ɩ̃ i. Ãtɩpasɩɩ bɔɔrakɛ, sɩ fa kɔɔ faa ha pɛrɛɛkɛ fɩ hana marna'. Ãtɩpasɩra sobɔ tibil a kɔɔ do mar da-n mɩɩ ɩ̃ dabɔ, dɩ wɩ kɔɔ kʋʋ anɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn kãkɛ Satã n cɔnɩ.

Sɩ dɩ pa ɩkhaakɛ mɩ yɩ farnɩ dʋɔn mɔ̃ ɩkhaa tibilsɔ hanɩ afɩ pa, dɩ wɩ bo dɩ wa-n ma Balamɩ dɩɩrra, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ kɔɔ dɩrɛnɩ Balakɩ dɩ pɛr bara paar Ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsanana dɩ wa kho thɩl thɩ̃ɛ, a na faana dakha dɩbara bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛra.
Mɛna gɩ ha gɩrɛ dakha, fɩ hananɛ tɩbɩla afɩ pa kɛ n bɔnɩ dɩ wa-n ma Nɩkolayɩtɩsɔɔ dɩɩrra.
Gɛr gɩ deba haar dɛ, ado mɛ̃ ga, ma pɔ farɛ kɔrɔ a na kɛ̃kɛrɛna wɩ na ɩ̃ nɔ khalgbã.

Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra. Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni ma haarɛ maan kɛ keranɩ, ma haarɛ dakha boka bulo, dɩ boka bulolaalera i phaa na khere, kɛ tibil na jɩnɩ saagado ɔrkɛra 'lɛnɩ gaaga.
Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Tɩatɩɩrdaraada. Hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thãgbaa Bikuunikɛ ɔɔ yisɔ honɩ dɔlɩnanɛ, dɩ nɛɛ na-n carbara mɔ̃kɛ the sɩɛ n hɩlnɩ dɔɔra sonɩ ayɩ:
Mɩ jɩrɛ afɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ, na afɩ naʋ, na afɩ ha pɛ, na afɩ thɔ̃ do, na afɩ ha fʋ, na afɩ nɛnɛ̃ thɔ̃ɔkɛ jɔnɩ mamadaa.
Sɩ sorɩkɛ mɩ hana fɩnɩ dʋɔn mɔ̃ fɩ sɩnɩ khɛrraakɛ wɩ-n wenɩ Jejabɛl, kɛ yɛnɩ khɛ bobon ha nɩ, da-n dɩɩr da-n fɩɩlna ɩ̃ thɔ̃daarsɔ dɩ wa faa dɩbara bɔdɛl cʋʋrɛra, wa-n kho dakha thɩl thɩ̃ɛ.
Mɩ kɔɔ haarɛ bɔɔ dɩ a na debi haar, sɩ aa-n ƴaal a deba haar ɔɔ bɔdɛl cʋʋrara ga.
Fa yɩ gaa, ma tʋɔrɛ na kpɛɛ phɩ̃ paar sɩ ɩ̃ thɔnanaa bɔ gaarɛ, gɩ wabɩ na wɛkɛrara n phɩnanaanɩ dakha. agado haar wɩ debi a faa ɔɔ thɔ̃ɔlera ga.
Ma cʋʋrɛ ɔɔ bɩsãsɔ dɩ wa khiir, dɩ we gbɛbɩdara fɛʋ na jɩrɛ dɩ mɛr dʋɔn bɩɛlɩkɛ n bəəreni tibili kpɩɛr na ɔɔ ha, dɩ ma 'laa narɛ fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl thɩ̃ɛ mɔ̃ anɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ hanɩ.
Sɩ ado nɛrkɛ sɛnɩ Tɩatɩɩr, kɛ na-n tuonni ga dɩɩrɩla', kɛ na jɛnɩ thɩ̃ dookɛ welela n wenɩ Satãa thɩ̃ hulõə', ma gba heenda kpɩɩ na heen nɩ bã;
sɩ gɩrɛ nɩ hananɩ, nɩ jɩɛ fʋ gɩ kĩkĩkĩ phaphapha ɩ̃ pɔ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni, kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ fɔrɔnɩ ɩ̃ thɔ̃ a dana khu paar, ma haarɛ punone tibil caarra,
dɩ ga ha mɔ̃kɛra mɩ 'lɛ gɩnɩ ɩ̃ Thɩɩ nyɔ̃kɔɔ, dɩ “ɔr na khɛ wɩ na the gbʋʋl, a na-n cɔ wɩ khʋma khʋma ce khaa”,
dɩ ma haarɛ dakha dɩwɩl ƴepələ̃bire.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra.

Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Saardɩ we gbɛbɩdaraada. Hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ hɩnanɩ Thãgbaa Thu makonyɔ na ƴepələ̃be makonyɔ sonɩ ayɩ: Mɩ jɩrɛ afɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ. A wɩ yɩ fɩ wɩ-n ka jɩna yidaar ha fɩ sɩɩ do fɩ khire.
Jaga a cʋɛ gɩrɛ sɛnɩ sɩ dɩ ga-n jal khiir paar gɩ hana yire, gɩdonɩ ma yɩ afɩ thɔ̃ dɩɩ thʋ̃ bɔr a dã thu ɩ̃ Thãgbaa ƴɛra ga.
Jɛna gɩrɛ fɩ kɔɔ 'lɛnɩ a nɩɛna, dɩ na ɔ gar sa deba haar. A fa jaga, ma ɩnɛ yudaar khaa, dɩ fa jɩ bɔɔkɛ ma phuro fina'.
Sɩ ɩkhasɔ hale anɩ thɩ̃thɩɩn le Saardɩ, kɛ na kɔɔ biseneni awɩ kẽkẽsɔa'. Wɛr na-n ɩrɛ kha na mɛrɛ na kẽkẽ bulona gɩdonɩ wɩ teena gɛr.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni a na 'lɛr kẽkẽ bulo a na to, dɩ ma pɩɩn ɔɔ i yi sɛbɛra ga, sɩ ma caan ɩ̃ Thɩɩ ƴɛra na ɔɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔɔ ƴɛra nayɩ ɩ̃da a do.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra.

Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Fɩladɛlfɩ we gbɛbɩdaraada. Hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ daphuu na sobɔdaar, ʋrɛɛkɛ fɔrɔnɩ Davɩdɩɩ lakile, ʋrɛɛkɛ n khɛranɩ dɩ tibil na-n puno dɩ khaana', kɛ dɔnɩ ʋrɛ n khaanɛnɩ dɩ tibil na-n puno dɩ khɛra' sonɩ ayɩ:
Mɩ jɩrɛ afɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ. Afɩ fãga na kpɛra', sɩɩ do fɩ kɔɔ fʋrɛ ɩ̃ nɔ, fa kɔɔ bananɔ ɩ̃ iə'. Hɩnɛ mɩ faarɛ loo dɩɩ khɛr hoo afɩ ƴɛbʋrɔ, kɛ tibil na punoni na khaana'.
Hɩnɛ gɩrɛ ma cʋʋnɩ wɩrɛɛkɛ n kpanɩ jɛ a na fʋɔr Satã, kɛ n sõsonenɩ dɩ wɩ yɩ, Juifisɔ ha nɩ, sɩɩ do wa do Juifisɔa', ma cʋʋ wɛr dɩ wa tha na thʋnɔ sɩ na gburõku far, dι wa jιrɛ dakha mι na fɛr.
Gιdonι fι kɔɔ fʋrɛ ɩ̃ nɔ a hana ha fʋrɛ, mɛrɛ dakha ma bɛr fɛr bɔ gaar bɔɔkɛ na ιnanι na gba thιιkɛ koo gι be tιbιla bιnɛ gι hιιn.
Ma ιnɛ kɔrɔ. Jιɛ fʋ gιrɛ fι hananι kĩkĩkĩ, dι mɛ̃ tibil na taa far khorιkɛ fa 'lɛna'.

Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni ma cʋgʋʋrɛ dɩ na do thɩkarʋ cʋɔrraakɛ dɔnɩ ɩ̃ Thãgbaada, dɩ a na the le bã. Ma gbaar ɩ̃ Thãgbaa i a na khereraa, na ɩ̃ Thãgbaa dɩɩ i, kɛ dɔnɩ Jerujalɛm phaakɛ thɛnɩ ɩ̃ Thãgbaa pa ƴũ a gbũ, ɩ̃ kherenanaa dakha ɩ̃ i pha.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thu Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra.
Khera thakɛ a hana thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ dɔnɩ Laʋdɩse we gbɛbɩdaraada. Hɩnɛ gɩrɛɛkɛ ʋrɛɛkɛ dɔnɩ Amɛn, a dona sobɔ so jɩdaar bʋɔ, a dona Thãgbaa thɩ̃ tinə fɛʋʋ the pa sonɩ ayɩ:
Mɩ jɩrɛ afɩ thɩ̃ cʋʋ. Fa ɩa', fa kpora'; mɩ-n ƴaalɛ fɩ ie agɩbo fɩ kpor.
Sɩ gɩdonɩ fɩ har bɔnɔnɔnɔ, fa ɩa', fa kpora', ma kpee fer na faa.
Gɩdonɩ fɩ sor ayɩ, fɩ ler aa, thɩ̃ɛ fɩ 'lɛ a le, dɩ dakha wo thɩ̃ɛ na-n ɓɔr fa', sɩɩ do fa jɩ dɩ fɛrɛ, fa do tibiləə ga, bɔ kʋ tibil ha fɩ, fɩ dor dakha bɔdaar bulo, a dona yaarʋ, a hanana sãɓɔlɔ̃.

Gɛr gɩ mɩ-n ha fɛr fɩlɛ, a fɩ jɩ thɛ mar dɛɛkɛ wɩ thiini dɔɔ dɩɩ bɔr, mɛ̃ fa debi na do lẽledaar dɩphã; na kẽkẽ bulo dakha fɩ to fɩ kɛɛna yicuru, tibil na yɩ afɩ sãɓɔlɔ̃a'; na dakha wo yi thɩɩkɛ fa pɛnɩ yiro fɩ puno fa-n yɩ.
Mɛrɛ, wɩrɛ fɛʋʋkɛ mɩ-n nanɩ wɛr mɩ-n nɩna dɩ paar dɩ ma-n wɛbɩna wɩ. Gɛr gɩ hanana ƴaalɛ jɔɔ a deba haar.
Hɩnɛ, mɩ hakɛ a jɩɩl lõfonɔɔ dɩ ma-n be. Ado tibil nɩ ɩ̃ nɔ, a khɛr mɩ loo, ma lʋʋn na too ntɛɛ pa sa-n kho kha dɩkɔ.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ na kəəneni ma haarɛ hʋɛ da too kha na mɛrɛ ɩ̃ fãga too para, mɔ̃kɛ mɛrɛ dakha kəəni sa too gɩrɛ na ɩ̃ Thɩ ɔɔ fãga too para.
Ʋrɛɛkɛ hananɩ nũu, dɔ a na-n nɩ gɩrɛɛkɛ Thʋ Phuu n sonɩ we gbɛbɩdarasɔra.

A gele pɩ, mɩ-n kɔɔ hɩɩnɛ dɩɩ do lõfonʋɔ gɩ a khɛr Thãgbaa dʋɔ, dɩ caca nʋɔɔkɛ mɩ kɔɔ nɩɛnɩ dɩ a-n mɩɩna mɩ a ho tutuu ʋʋn gɩ so marɛ ayɩ: Jʋnɛ kɛ, ma nɩ farɛ gɩrɛ teananɩ gɩ dana bɔɔraakɛ na kpaanɛnɩ.
Dapaara Thu Phuu kɔɔ ɩɩrna mɛr dɩ ɩ̃ yɩ fãga too paar dɩɩ hale Thãgbaa dʋɔ, dɩ tibil hale a too fãga too paarraalera.

Dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛra kɔɔ tɔɔrɔnɩ n carbararɛ jasɩpɩ boka khaa na sardʋan boka khaa, kɛ dɔnɩ bokanaakɛ khiinoni the nʋɔ ka, dɩ thãgba khalʋ kɔɔ hale a dii fãga too paarraalera dɩ a-n hona emərodi bokaarɩkɛ khiinoni dakha the nʋɔ ka.
Dɩ fãga too pa kpelẽ yenã hale a dii fãga too paarraalera, dɩ kɔ̃tɩna kpelẽ yenã hale a too fãga too paarsɔrara, a to kẽkẽ bulona, a suunə dɛ fãgadaar kpɩɛr yʋɔ.
Dɩ thãgba jʋ khor, na nɔ khena, na thãgba tiire n ther le fãga too paarraalera; dɩ lãphã makonyɔ hale a do dɔ haar dɩ ga-n le fãga too pa ƴɩɛraalera, gɛr dʋɔn Thãgbaa Thu makonyɔ.
Dɩ fãga too pa ƴɩɛraalera thɩ̃ɛ hale dɩ ga-n hona lanyʋɔn wɩwɩwɩl sa ho hɩɩnʋ. Dɩ fãga too pa thɩ̃thɩɩn thɩ̃ ye yenã hale a diiro, dɩ yinə hire awɩ tomɩra ƴɛbʋrɔ na khiru fɛʋ.
Caca thɩ̃ yire hor sidũ'ũu, balanyɔ thɩ̃ yire ho na ɓolʋ, balãther thɩ̃ yire hana tibil ƴɩɛ, sɩ balanã thɩ̃ yire ho gbʋɔrɛɛkɛ n dɩɛnnɩ.

Dɩ thɩ̃ ye yenãale bɩɛlbɩɛl hananɛ gbɛla maadõ maadõ, wɩ hinəne yinə bɩnɔ na tomɩrra dakha, dɩ wa hana pɩrrɛ kpɩɩ dɩwɩlʋ na dɩtɩnɔa', sɩ mɛ̃ wɩ-n so aa: “Daphuu, daphuu, daphuu, Thãgba Kɔ̃tɩnɩkɛ dɔnɩ fãga fɛʋʋ hɩ̃daar do, kɛ kɔɔ hanɩle, kɛ hanɩle gɩrɛ, kɛ na ɩnanɩ.”
Dɩ ɔbɔɔkɛ thɩ̃ yeele n dʋbɩnɩ ʋrɛ tɔɔnɩ fãga too paar, kɛ hɩnanɩ yire bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ, dɩ wa-n kpãganaa, dɩ wa-n khɩɩnaa,

kɔ̃tɩna kpelẽ yenãale gburõkure ʋrɛraakɛ tɔɔnɩ fãga too paarraale ƴɩɛra, dɩ wa-n fʋɔr ɔrkɛra hɩnanɩ yire bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ, dɩ wɩ phubire awɩ fãgadaar kpɛsɔ a kpɛɛ fãga too pa ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn sɩ wa-n so:
Asɩ Kɔ̃tɩ̃ na asɩ Thãgba wei, fɛr teana a na 'lɛ i dʋbɩrɛ, na cʋʋr, na punone; gɩdonɩ fɛr kɔɔ te thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋ, dɩ afɩ tuur dɔ nɔɔ dɩ gɩ hale gɩrɛ a hana yire.
Dɩ mɩ yɩrɛ sɛbɛ dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ tɔɔnɩ fãga too paar thɛbɩ na nyɔ̃bɔɔ, dɩɩ khere bɩnɔ na jɩɛra fɛʋ, dɩ jena makonyɔ hale a dʋrɔ dɩɩ do gɛr khaanɛ gɩ.
Dɩ mɩ yɩrɛ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuukɛ hananɩ fãga dɩɩ və̃vĩə, dɩ hulẽ nʋɔ dɩɩ khɩɩr ka ayɩ: Amɛ teana a na cʋɔr jɩɩnsɔɔle dɩ sɛbɛɛle na phubi?
Dɩ tibil bɩɛllakɛ na hale Thãgbaa dʋɔ, dɩ thɩɩra gɩ, dɩ thɩɩraakɛ tɩɛr gɩ, a na puno na phubi sɛbɛra ga, a na puno dakha wo a na hɩɩna'.
Dɩ mɩ kɔɔ khɩɩrɛ jɔɔ ka gɩrɛraakɛ tibil na yɩnɩ, kɛ teananɩ a na phubi sɛbɛra agɩbo a hɩɩna'.
Sɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl kɔ̃tɩnanaalera so marɛ ayɩ: Fa-n khɩa'. Hɩnɛ sidũ'ũukɛ thɛnɩ Judaa cara, a dona Davɩdɩɩ məl, ɔr kəəne a na cʋɔr jena makonyɔɔlera sɩ na phubi sɛbɛra.

Dɩ mɩ yɩrɛ fãga too pa thɩ̃thɩɩnɩle, na thɩ̃ ye yenãale, na kɔ̃tɩnaa thɩ̃thɩɩn, Bana bii dɩ jɩɩl le sa ho mɔ̃ wɩ kʋʋnɩ, sɩ a hananɛ ʋma makonyɔ na yinə makonyɔɔkɛ dɔnɩ Thãgbaa Thu makonyɔ, kɛ a thɔnɩ thɩɩraakɛ koo.
Dɩ a pɔr, a tee sɛbɛɛle olelaalera hana gɩnɩ a fʋrɔ nyɔ̃bɔɔra a toona fãga too paarra.

Ɔbɔɔkɛ a teenɩ sɛbɛɛle pɩ, thɩ̃ ye yenãale, na kɔ̃tɩna kpelẽ yenãale gburõkure Bana bɩɩ ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn; wɛr fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl kɔɔ fʋrɔrɛ salãa na dɛ bilẽse dɩɩ hinə latɩkolookɛ dɔnɩ tɩɩ phuusɔɔ Thãgba bɩɛl.

Dɩ wɩ khɩnɛ nɩ phaakɛ sɔnɩ ayɩ: Fɛr teana fɩ tee sɛbɛra fɩ cʋɔr dakha jɩɩnsɔ, gɩdonɩ wɩ kɔɔ kʋ fɛr dɩ fɩ gba afɩ tɔmɩ̃ a birsena tɩbɩla, caarra fɛʋ, na thɩmɩɩrra fɛʋ, na tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ thɩ̃thɩɩn, na ca kpalala fɛʋ a ha Thãgba.
Fɩ cʋʋ wɛr dι wι do fãgadaraakɛ dɔnι bonι jidara asι Thãgbara, dι wa dor fãgadara thιιra.
Dι mι-n kɔɔ hιιnɛ a nιɛ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu jɔjʋɔɔ wi, kɛ awι ther nɔ kanιkɛ gbιlanι der paar gbιlanι, wι thʋnɛ və̃vĩə, a dii fãga too paarra, na thɩ̃ yera na kɔ̃tιnanaale,
dι wι so na nɔ kheu ayι: Bana biikɛ wι kɔɔ kʋnι a teenanɛ a 'lɛ punone, na ler, na kpɛsɛrɛ, na fãga, na cʋʋr, na i dʋbιrɛ, na khιιrɛ.

Dɩ thɩ̃ tinəne fɛʋʋkɛ hanɩ Thãgbaa dʋɔ, na thιιra, na thιιraakɛ tιɛr, na lanyʋɔnna, na thɩ̃ɛ fɛʋʋkɛ harɔnι bιnɔ, mι nιɛrɛ dι wele fɛʋ na-n so ayι: Ʋrɛ tɔɔnι fãga too paar na Bana bii, dɔ ɔr n hɩ̃ khιιrɛ, na cʋʋr, na i dʋbιrɛ, na fãga bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ.
Dι thɩ̃ ye yenãale dee aa: Amɛn. Dι kɔ̃tιnaale gburõku dι wa-n fʋɔr.
Dι mι yιɛrɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ Bana bii kɔɔ cʋɔrnι caca jιιn jena makonyɔraale, mι nιɛrɛ thɩ̃ yi bιɛl thɩ̃ ye yenanaale dι so nʋɔ dιι ho thãgba phɛɛrɛ ayι: Ɩna.
Dι ma hιιn dιι do gãgo bulo gι a the, dι ʋrɛ kɔɔ jʋnɛɛnι kɔɔ hananɛ thaa na tʋʋ, dι wι haarɛ fãgadaar kpιɛr dι a ther mɔ̃ a donι kəkəədaar a 'lɛ kəəre.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ a cʋɔrnι balanyɔ jιιn, mι nιɛrɛ balanyɔ thɩ̃ yire dι so: Ɩna.
Dι gãgo sιɛ khəkhəkhə ther, dι ʋrɛ jʋnɛɛnι kɔɔ 'lɛr punone a na tinə ha ιι thιιra na faa, dι mɛ̃ tιbιla na-n kʋʋr kha; dι a 'lɛr dakha bajιna kɔ̃tɩ̃ι.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ cʋɔrnι balãther jιιn, mι nιɛrɛ balãther thɩ̃ yire dι so ayι: Ɩna. Dι ma hιιn a yι gãgo biru, dι ʋrɛ jʋnɛɛnι fʋrɔrɛ thɩ̃ mιɛdaa ɔɔ nyɔ̃kɔɔ.
Dι mι nιrɛ nʋɔ dιι the thɩ̃ ye yenãa thɩ̃thιιnιle a so ayι: Jʋ mιɛ nɔ bιɛl, gɛr dɔ wi bιɛl thɔ̃ lιmιnɛ; ɔljʋ mιɛ nʋɔ yẽther, gɛr dɔ wi bιɛl thɔ̃ lιmιnɛ; sι niin wer na taan, fa-n cʋʋrɔ thɩ̃a'.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ cʋɔrnι balanã jιιn, mι nιɛrɛ balanã thɩ̃ yire dι so ayι: Ɩna.

Dι ma hιιn a yι gãgʋʋkɛ hanι phʋaphʋa, dι ʋrɛ jʋnɛɛnιι i n dʋɔn khir, dι khĩdi dιι na-n kpaaraa sιkaar, dι wι 'lɛr punone a na gbana bajιna, na kɔmɛr, na kho puu, na hɔ̃ nʋma thιιra a na bũburona tιbιla thι phɛrɛ yenana bιɛlbιɛl.
Dι ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ cʋɔrnι balamɔι jιιn, mι yιrɛ tιbιlaa thusɔ bonι ji pa ballɔ, kɛ dɔnι wιrɛ wι kɔɔ kʋʋrnι Thãgbaa sora, na awι sobɔdaar doraakɛ wι jιιlnι.
Dι wι hulene dιι khιιr ka ayι: Kɔ̃tιn, daphuu na sobɔdaar, ka ga dã sι fa kιιl kιιlʋ a na tiir asι tɔmɩ̃ hel thιdarara?
Dι wɛr fɛʋ bιɛlbιɛl 'lɛr kẽkẽ bulo gbana a to, sι dι wι so war ayι, wι tɔɔ ɓo cɔcɔcɔ phaphapha wιrɛ dɔnι thɔ̃ dona awι kha, na awι omisɔɔkɛ wa kʋʋrnι awι kha, awι nɔ n dã ɓo.
Dɩ mɩ yɩɛrɛ ɔbɔɔkɛ a kɔɔ cʋɔrnɩ maadõ jɩɩn, thɩ jɩɩn kɔɔ hale a kɔ̃tɩ̃ ka, dɩ wire debire a biiro tĩtĩtĩ a ho bʋ bir lokaar, dɩ por biləni debi a sɩɛrɔ a ho tɔmɩn.
Dɩ ƴepələ̃be na-n jɛ thɩɩra, mɔ̃kɛ jɩɛ na-n və̃viləni thɩr khonanɛ dɩ bi pholoo na-n jɛ.
Dɩ thãgbara ƴũ pur kʋla kʋla mɔ̃ wɩ-n purni dɛbɛ, dι gɔ̃gɔnasɔ fɛʋ na yɔ dιιsɔ fɛʋ kɔɔ əəle a ha dιkhãa pa.
Dι le fãgadara thιιra, na kɔ̃tιnasɔ, na sɔrasɛɛ kɔ̃tɩ̃sɔ, na lẽledara, na fãga hɩ̃dara, na dea ɓibi, na waιasɔ n wɔ̃ wιwιl kanana na boka kɔ̃tɩ̃ ballɔsɔɔkɛ hanι gɔ̃gɔnana;
sι wa-n so gɔ̃gɔnana na boka kɔ̃tιnana ayι: Nι je the sarrakɛ a phe sι, sι hʋnɔna ʋrɛɛkɛ tɔɔnι fãga too paar na Bana bii nĩkhirə.
Gιdonι awι nĩkhi wi kɔ̃tɩ̃ phaan, dι ʋmɔ̃ hale na jιιl?
A gele pι, mι yιrɛ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu yenã dι wι jιιl thι khu paar yenã, sa fʋ jιɛ yenãakɛ n thɛnι thιιra a fʋrɔ, dι mɛ̃ jιɛ na-n the thιιra, dι lanyʋɔnna gι, dι thιr bιɛlla gιraka'.
Dι ɩ̃ bir yι thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kpιι wo dι the wi phã paar da-n jʋʋn, a fʋrɔ Thãgba yidaarι jẽ pɛda sa hulẽ nʋɔ dιι khιιr ka thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu yenanaale kɔɔ 'lɛnι hʋɛ a na cʋʋna thιι puure na lanyʋɔn,
a so ayι: Na-n cʋʋ thιιra puure na lanyʋɔn pa', dι thιra ga, phaphapha sι pɛ asι Thãgbaa thɔ̃darasɔra jιιn kobera ɓo.
Dι mɩ nɩrɛ wɩrɛ wɩ pɛrnɩ jɩɩnnaa nɔ dɩ wɩ yɩ tɩbɩla gbɩlanɩ tamaa na kpalanyɔ na gbɩlanɩ yenã wɛ, kɛ thɛnɩ Ɩjɩrayɛl bɩsanaa cara fɛʋ bɩɛlbɩɛl.
Judaa cara, gbɩlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ wɩ dʋrɔ jɩɩnna, Rubɛnɩ cara, gbɩlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ, Gaadɩɩ cara, gbɩlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ,
Ajɛɛrɩ cara, gbɩlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ, Nɛfɩtalɩɩ cara, gbɩlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ,
Manasee cara, gbɩlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ, Sɩmɛ̃ʋʋ cara, gbιlanι yʋɔr yenyɔ, Levιι cara, gbιlanι yʋɔr yenyɔ,
Ɩsakaarι cara, gbιlanι yʋɔr yenyɔ, Jabʋlɔ̃ɔ cara, gbιlanι yʋɔr yenyɔ, Jojɛfιι cara, gbιlanι yʋɔr yenyɔ, Bɛ̃jamɛ̃ɛ cara, gbιlanɩ yʋɔr yenyɔ, wɩ dʋrɔ jɩɩnna.

A gele pɩ mɩ-n kɔɔ hɩɩnɛ dɩɩ do tibil jɔ wɛ tə̃tə̃tə̃, kɛ tibil na punoni na thera', a the ca kpalala fɛʋ, na caarra fɛʋ, na tɩbɩla fɛʋʋ thɩ̃thιιn, na thɩmɩɩrra fɛʋ, dɩ wa-n jɩɩl fãga too pa ƴɩɛra na Bana bii ƴɛ thɩ̃thɩɩn, a to kẽkẽ bulo gbana sa fʋrɔ kalã jɛ̃ɛ nyɛɛna.
Dɩ wɩ-n hulene nɔ khena ayɩ: Asɩ Thãgbaakɛra tɔɔnɩ fãga too paar, ɔrra taarɛ n the na Bana biirə.
Dɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thusɔ fɛʋ jɩɩlɛ a dii fãga too paarra, na kɔ̃tɩnana, na thɩ̃ ye yenana, a gburõku fãga too pa ƴɩɛra dɩ wa-n fʋɔr Thãgba,
dɩ wa-n sona ayɩ: Amɛn. Khɩɩrɛ, na i dʋbɩrɛ, na kpɛsɛrɛ, na fʋɔrɛ, na cʋʋr, na punone, na fãga, asɩ Thãgba hɩna bɔɔ fɛʋ waa khorr vʋ̃ʋ. Amɛn.
Dɩ kɔ̃tɩ̃ bɩɛl kɔ̃tɩnanaale bule mi ayɩ: Welela tɔnɩ kẽkẽ bulo gbana, ana wɛ dɩ ka wɩ the?
Dɩ ɩ̃ sʋʋraa: Ɩ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ ya mee fɛr ka jɩ gɩ. Dɩ a so marɛ ayɩ: Wɛr dʋɔn tɩbɩlaakɛ thɛnɩ bɔ gaar kɔ̃tɩɩnaale; wɩ kɔɔ cɔcɔɔrɛ awɩ kẽkẽsɔ a cʋʋ gɩ na Bana bii tɔmɩ̃ dɩɩ bulolo.
Gɛr dɔ kɩrʋ dɩ wɩ ha Thãgbaa fãga too pa ƴɩɛra, dɩ wa-n dʋʋraa thɔma dɩwɩlʋ na dɩtɩnɛ ɔɔ cɔra; dɩ ʋrɛɛkɛ tɔɔnɩ fãga too paarra na dʋrɛ ɔɔ wa na thi war.
Kɔmɛr na fʋ wɩ bã, yɔlkhaa na fʋ wɩ bã, dɩ ɩtʋɛ na dakporuu na 'lɛ wɩ dakha bã.
Gɩdonɩ Bana biikɛ hanɩ fãga too pa thɩ̃thɩɩn na-n khɛ wɩ a thɔɔ wɩ a na-n jalna yi yɔ bu kanana, dɩ Thãgba na pɩɩnɛ yilẽbe fɛʋ awɩ yirə.
Ɔbɔɔkɛ Bana biirə kɔɔ cʋɔrnɩ makonyɔ jɩɩn, pɩrrɛ kɔɔ hale Thãgbaa dʋɔ a cʋ lɩɛr kuru.
Dɩ mɩ kɔɔ yɩrɛ Thãgbaa thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu makonyɔɔkɛ n jɩlɛnɩ Thãgbaa ƴɛra, dɩ wɩ 'lɛr tutuu makonyɔ.

Dɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kpɩɩ pɔr a jɩɩl bonɩ ji pa kɩrɔ, a hana latɩkolo 'wiidaakɛ wɩ cʋʋnanɩ dɛ; dɩ a 'lɛr latɩkolo jɔɔ a gba a na-n 'laa, nakha tɩɩ phuu fɛʋʋ Thãgba bɩɛl, dɛ bonɩ ji paarraalera hanɩ fãga too pa ƴɩɛra.
Dɩ latɩkoloolee isi gbɛbɩnanɛ tɩɩ phuusɔɔ Thãgba bɩɛl a the thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuulee nyɔ̃kɔɔ, dɩ ga-n jʋʋn Thãgbara.
Dɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thuule gbaar latɩkolo 'wiidaale a ti bonɩ ji dɔɔ pɛr dɩɩ hi, dɩ dʋna faa thɩɩra, dɩ thãgba tiire kɔɔ hale na nɔ khena, na thãgba jʋ khor na thɩ jɩɩn.
Dɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu makonyɔɔkɛ fɔrɔnɩ tutuu makonyɔ kɔɔ gbɛbɩrɛ ʋ̃ ʋ̃ gbɛbɩrʋʋ.

Dɩ cacadaar kɔɔ ʋnɛ ɔɔ tutuu, dɩ thãgba bara hale na dɔɔ a nyanyaana tɔmɩn dɩ ga-n cʋr thɩɩra, dɩ thɩ phɛrɛ bɩɛl thɩ phɛrɛ yẽtherra kɔɔ hɩnɛ koo, dɩ thɩr der pa bɩɛl der paar yẽtherra kɔɔ hɩnɛ dakha, dɩ hɔ̃ ƴolosɔ fɛʋ kɔɔ hɩnɛ.
Dɩ balanyɔ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ ʋnɛ ɔɔ tutuu, dɩ dɩkha gɩ, a ho gɔ̃gɔ̃ kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ, a do dɔ haar, a əl ji lanyʋɔnna, dɩ lanyɔ̃ phɛrɛ bɩɛl yẽtherra debi a do tɔmɩn.
Dɩ thɩ̃ tinə der pa bɩɛl der paar yẽtherra, kɛ hanɩ lanyʋɔnna a do yidara kɔɔ khiire, dɩ bato kɔ̃tĩ jɛ pa bɩɛl jɛ paar yẽtherra kɔɔ wɩɛlɛ fɛʋ.
Dɩ balãther thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ ʋnɛ ɔɔ tutuu, dɩ ƴepələ̃bi kɔ̃tɩ̃ɩ gɩ, a hana dɔɔ dɔlɩna khaa, a the ƴũ, a ji mɩɩr phɛrɛ bɩɛl mɩɩr phɛrɛ yẽtherra na yɔ bu kanasɔra.
Ƴepələ̃biree iilera n dʋɔn Dakhaa, dɩ yɔ ɓɛl bɩɛl yɔ kuur paar yẽtherra debire a khar kpakpakpa, dɩ tibil jɔjʋɔ kɔɔ khiire, dɩɩ do nyʋɔnɩlera debanɩ a khar dɔ nɔɔ.

Dɩ balanã thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ ʋnɛ ɔɔ tutuu, dɩ thɩ̃ɛ kɔɔ cʋʋrɛ wi ɓɛl bɩɛl ɓɛl paar yẽtherra, na po ɓɛl bɩɛl daɓɛla yẽtherra, na ƴepələ̃bi der pa bɩɛl der paar yẽtherra, dɩ ga ɓɛlsɔɔle fɛʋ debire a birə, dɩ dɩwɩl ɓɛl bɩɛl ɓɛl paar yẽtherraa dahɩrɛ bure, mɛna gɩ ha dakha na dɩtɩnɛ.
Dɩ mɩ-n kɔɔ hɩɩnɛ a nɩɛ dɩ gbʋɔrɛ ubi da-n ka thãgbara ƴũ fii, sɩ da-n so nɔ khɩɩr ayɩ: Ga puurore, ga puurore, ga puure thɩdarara ɔbɔɔkɛ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu yẽtherɩkɛ sɛnɩ na ʋnɩ awɩ tutuu.
Dɩ balamɔɩ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu kɔɔ ʋnɛ ɔɔ tutuu, dɩ ɩ̃ yɩ ƴepələ̃bireekɛ kɔɔ thɛnɩ ƴũ a ji thɩɩra, a 'lɛ thɛrɛ 'lee kõkor lakile.
Dɩ a gbaar a khɛrna thɛrɛ 'lee kõkorʋra, dɩ isiir the le dɩ ga-n jʋʋn a ho dɔ kɔ̃tɩ̃ isiir, dɩ wire na jɩɛ birəre kõkor isiirraale.
Dɩ toosõosɔ kɔɔ ther isiirraale a bɩ̃bɩlã thɩɩra, dɩ wɩ kɔɔ 'lɛr punone dɩɩ mãkhana punoneekɛ lana thɩɩra n hananɩ.
Dɩ wɩ kɔɔ so warɛ ayɩ, wa-n cʋʋ hʋɔn thɩɩra thɩ̃ɛ, dɩ thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ phonɩ gɩ, dɩ thɩra ga, sɩ tɩbɩla dɩbara, kɛ na hananɩ Thãgbaa jẽ awɩ kobirə ga.
Wa kɔɔ 'lɛ hʋɛ a na kʋ tibilə', sɩ kpoore wa kpoo war a na cʋʋna pora yemɔɩ; dɩ kpooreekɛra wa kpoo warnɩ mɔ̃ laan n thanɩ tibil dɩ a-n khʋʋ, mɛ̃ ga ha.
Ga bɔɔle tιbιla na-n ƴaalɛ khir sι wa yι ga; khi thue na fʋ wɛr, sι khir na car sι na sι war.
Toosõosɔɔle hʋrɛ gãgʋʋsɔɔkɛ wι-n gbɛbιnι wι jalna kʋʋr. Wɩ subire thɩ̃ɛɛkɛ hɔnɩ dɛ fãgadaar kpɩɛr awɩ yʋɔ, sɩ awɩ ƴɛ ho tibil ƴɩɛ.
Wɩ hananɛ yʋsuune dɩɩ ho khɛraa yʋsũ, sɩ awɩ nyɩ̃ ho sidũ'ũ nyιma.
Dι wι hananɛ dakha kũkũ kɛɛdaa dιι ho thɛ dι wι kɛɛ, dι awι gbɛl n helle mɔ̃kɛ gãgo hotoro jɔjʋɔ n canι lõ kʋʋrra dι a-n tii.
Wι hananɛ sʋʋ dιι ho lã sʋʋ a hana tha paar cιba cιba, dι awι sʋraalera awι puno ha, kɛ wa-n cʋʋnanι tιbιla puure gι dana pora yemɔι.
Awι fãgadaarιkɛ dɔ warnι yʋʋ dʋɔn thɛrɛ 'lee kõkorʋʋ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu. Ɔɔ i na ebirə thιmιιr n dʋɔn Abadɔ̃, sι gιrɛkι thιmιιr wι-n wena Apolιyɔ̃; i kιrʋ dʋɔn gbõgolõdaar.
Caca puu 'lɛr kar, sι agιpι yenyɔ puu 'lɛr hale wo a na kpaan.
Dι thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu maadõdaar kɔɔ ʋnɛ ɔɔ tutuu, dι ɩ̃ nιɛ nʋɔ dιι the dɛ bonι ji paar ʋma yenana, kɛ hanι Thãgbaa ƴɛra,
a so thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu maadõdaarraakɛ hananι tutuu ayι: Thʋba thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu yenãakɛ wι lini Efιratι mιιr kɔ̃tιιna a faa.
Dι wι kɔɔ thʋbιrɛ thɔ̃thɔ̃daar thu yenãale kɛ gbɛbanι pι ga lιɛrraale, na ga wirəəle, na ga poraale, na ga yɛraale, wι kʋrɛ tibil der pa bιɛl der paar yẽtherra.
Dι awι sɔrasιsɔɔkɛ tɔɔnι gãgʋʋsɔra kɔɔ har gbιlanι der paar gbιlanι ɔɔ der pa taanyɔ. Thale mι kɔɔ nιɛ dι wι ha.

Ɩ̃ thɩ̃ nιrɔra thakɛ mι kɔɔ yι gãgʋʋsɔ na wɩrɛ jʋnɛ wɩnɩ dɩ wɩ ha: Wɩ kɔɔ hananɛ kũkũ kɛɛda sɩɛsɔ dɩɩ ho dɔɔ, na dathʋ̃phʋaasɔ, na dodaasɔɔkɛ hɔnɩ girbi. Sɩ gãgʋʋsɔɔ yʋʋle hor sidũ'ũ yʋʋ, sɩ dɔɔ na-n the awɩ nɔɔ, na isiir, na girbi.
Dɩ tibil der pa bɩɛl der paar yẽtherra kɔɔ khiire thɩlkena yẽtherraale kɛ dɔnɩ dɔɔ, na isiir, na girbi, kɛ n thɛnɩ gãgonaalee nɔɔ.
Gɩdonɩ gãgʋʋsɔɔlee puno, awɩ nɔra gɩ ha na awɩ sʋra. Awɩ sʋ hor siisɔ, a hana yʋʋ, dɩ gɛrra wɩ-n cʋʋna puurera.
